text2: vipofu wanaona , viwete wanatembea , wenye ukoma wanatakaswa na viziwi wanasikia , wafu wanafufuliwa na maskini wanahubiriwa Habari Njema .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Heri mtu yule asiyekuwa na mashaka nami . "

text: And as they departed , Jesus began to say unto the multitudes concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Basi , hao wajumbe wa Yohane walipokuwa wanakwenda zao , Yesu alianza kuyaambia makundi ya watu habari za Yohane : " Mlikwenda kutazama nini kule jangwani ? Je , mlitaka kuona mwanzi unaotikiswa na upepo ?

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? behold , they that wear soft clothing are in kings ' houses .
text2: Lakini mlikwenda kuona nini ? Mlikwenda kumtazama mtu aliyevaa mavazi maridadi ? Watu wanaovaa mavazi maridadi hukaa katika nyumba za wafalme .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? yea , I say unto you , and more than a prophet .
text2: Basi , mlikwenda kuona nini ? Nabii ? Naam , hakika ni zaidi ya nabii .

text: For this is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: " Huyu ndiye anayesemwa katika Maandiko Matakatifu : Tazama , hapa namtuma mjumbe wangu , asema Bwana , akutangulie na kukutayarishia njia yako .

text: Verily I say unto you , Among them that are born of women there hath not risen a greater than John the Baptist : notwithstanding he that is least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he .
text2: Kweli nawaambieni , miongoni mwa watoto wote wa watu , hajatokea aliye mkuu kuliko Yohane mbatizaji . Hata hivyo , yule aliye mdogo kabisa katika Ufalme wa mbinguni , ni mkubwa kuliko yeye .

text: And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence , and the violent take it by force .
text2: Tangu wakati wa Yohane mbatizaji mpaka leo hii , Ufalme wa mbinguni unashambuliwa vikali , na watu wakali wanajaribu kuunyakua kwa nguvu .

text: For all the prophets and the law prophesied until John .
text2: Mafundisho yote ya manabii na sheria yalibashiri juu ya nyakati hizi .

text: And if ye will receive it , this is Elias , which was for to come .
text2: Kama mwaweza kukubali basi , Yohane ndiye Eliya ambaye angekuja .

text: He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Mwenye masikio na asikie !

text: But whereunto shall I liken this generation ? It is like unto children sitting in the markets , and calling unto their fellows ,
text2: " Basi , nitakifananisha kizazi hiki na kitu gani ? Ni kama vijana waliokuwa wamekaa uwanjani , wakawa wakiambiana kikundi kimoja kwa kingine :

text: And saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned unto you , and ye have not lamented .
text2: Tumewapigieni ngoma lakini hamkucheza ; tumeimba nyimbo za huzuni lakini hamkulia !

text: For John came neither eating nor drinking , and they say , He hath a devil .
text2: Kwa maana Yohane alikuja , akafunga na wala hakunywa divai , nao wakasema : Amepagawa na pepo .

text: The Son of man came eating and drinking , and they say , Behold a man gluttonous , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners . But wisdom is justified of her children .
text2: Mwana wa Mtu akaja , anakula na kunywa , nao wakasema : Mtazameni huyu , mlafi na mlevi , rafiki yao watoza ushuru na wahalifu ! Hata hivyo , hekima ya Mungu inathibitishwa kuwa njema kutokana na matendo yake . "

text: Then began he to upbraid the cities wherein most of his mighty works were done , because they repented not :
text2: Kisha Yesu akaanza kuilaumu miji ambayo , ingawaje alifanya miujiza mingi humo , watu wake hawakutaka kubadili nia zao mbaya :

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works , which were done in you , had been done in Tyre and Sidon , they would have repented long ago in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: " Ole wako Korazini ! Ole wako Bethsaida ! Maana , kama miujiza iliyofanyika kwako ingalifanyika kule Tiro na Sidoni , watu wake wangalikwisha vaa mavazi ya gunia na kujipaka majivu zamani , ili kuonyesha kwamba wametubu .

text: But I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the day of judgment , than for you .
text2: Hata hivyo nawaambieni , Siku ya hukumu , ninyi mtapata adhabu kubwa kuliko Tiro na Sidoni .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted unto heaven , shalt be brought down to hell : for if the mighty works , which have been done in thee , had been done in Sodom , it would have remained until this day .
text2: Na wewe Kafarnaumu , je , utajikweza mpaka mbinguni ? Utaporomoshwa mpaka Kuzimu ! Maana , kama miujiza iliyofanyika kwako ingalifanyika kule Sodoma , mji huo ungalikuwako mpaka hivi leo .

text: But I say unto you , That it shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom in the day of judgment , than for thee .
text2: Lakini nawaambieni , Siku ya hukumu itakuwa nafuu zaidi kwa watu wa Sodoma , kuliko kwako wewe . "

text: At that time Jesus answered and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , because thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes .
text2: Wakati huo Yesu alisema , " Nakushukuru ee Baba , Bwana wa mbingu na dunia , maana umewaficha wenye hekima mambo haya , ukawafumbulia watoto wadogo .

text: Even so , Father : for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: Naam Baba , ndivyo ilivyokupendeza .

text: All things are delivered unto me of my Father : and no man knoweth the Son , but the Father ; neither knoweth any man the Father , save the Son , and he to whomsoever the Son will reveal him .
text2: " Baba yangu amenikabidhi vitu vyote . Hakuna amjuaye Mwana ila Baba , wala amjuaye Baba ila Mwana , na yeyote yule ambaye Mwana atapenda kumjulisha .

text: Come unto me , all ye that labour and are heavy laden , and I will give you rest .
text2: Njoni kwangu ninyi nyote msumbukao na kulemewa na mizigo , nami nitawapumzisha .

text: Take my yoke upon you , and learn of me ; for I am meek and lowly in heart : and ye shall find rest unto your souls .
text2: Jifungeni nira yangu , mkajifunze kwangu , maana mimi ni mpole na mnyenyekevu wa moyo , nanyi mtatulizwa rohoni mwenu .

text: For my yoke is easy , and my burden is light .
text2: Maana , nira niwapayo mimi ni laini , na mzigo wangu ni mwepesi . "

text: At that time Jesus went on the sabbath day through the corn ; and his disciples were an hungred , and began to pluck the ears of corn , and to eat .
text2: Wakati huo , Yesu alikuwa anapita katika mashamba ya ngano siku ya Sabato . Basi , wanafunzi wake wakaona njaa , wakaanza kukwanyua masuke ya ngano , wakala punje zake .

text: But when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto him , Behold , thy disciples do that which is not lawful to do upon the sabbath day .
text2: Mafarisayo walipoona hayo , wakamwambia Yesu , " Tazama , wanafunzi wako wanafanya jambo ambalo si halali siku ya Sabato . "

text: But he said unto them , Have ye not read what David did , when he was an hungred , and they that were with him ;
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Je , hamjasoma alivyofanya Daudi pamoja na wenzake wakati walipokuwa na njaa ?

text: How he entered into the house of God , and did eat the shewbread , which was not lawful for him to eat , neither for them which were with him , but only for the priests ?
text2: Yeye aliingia katika Nyumba ya Mungu pamoja na wenzake , wakala ile mikate iliyowekwa mbele ya Mungu . Yeye wala hao wenzake hawakuruhusiwa kula mikate hiyo isipokuwa tu makuhani peke yao .

text: Or have ye not read in the law , how that on the sabbath days the priests in the temple profane the sabbath , and are blameless ?
text2: Au je , hamjasoma katika Sheria kwamba kila siku ya Sabato makuhani huivunja Sheria Hekaluni , lakini hawafikiriwi kuwa na hatia ?

text: But I say unto you , That in this place is one greater than the temple .
text2: Basi , nawaambieni kwamba hapa pana kikuu kuliko Hekalu .

text: But if ye had known what this meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice , ye would not have condemned the guiltless .
text2: Kama tu mngejua maana ya maneno haya : Nataka huruma wala si dhabihu , hamngewahukumu watu wasio na hatia .

text: For the Son of man is Lord even of the sabbath day .
text2: Maana Mwana wa Mtu ni Bwana wa Sabato . "

text: And when he was departed thence , he went into their synagogue :
text2: Yesu alitoka hapo , akaenda katika sunagogi lao .

text: And , behold , there was a man which had his hand withered . And they asked him , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath days ? that they might accuse him .
text2: Kulikuwa na mtu mmoja mwenye mkono uliopooza . Basi , watu wakamwuliza Yesu , " Je , ni halali kumponya mtu siku ya Sabato ? " Walimwuliza hivyo wapate kisa cha kumshtaki .

text: And he said unto them , What man shall there be among you , that shall have one sheep , and if it fall into a pit on the sabbath day , will he not lay hold on it , and lift it out ?
text2: Lakini Yesu akawaambia , " Tuseme mmoja wenu ana kondoo wake ambaye ametumbukia shimoni ; je , hatamshika na kumtoa humo siku ya Sabato ?

text: How much then is a man better than a sheep ? Wherefore it is lawful to do well on the sabbath days .
text2: Mtu ana thamani kuliko kondoo ! Basi , ni halali kutenda mema siku ya Sabato . "

text: Then saith he to the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it forth ; and it was restored whole , like as the other .
text2: Kisha akamwambia yule mtu , " Nyosha mkono wako . " Akaunyosha , nao ukawa mzima kabisa kama ule mwingine .

text: Then the Pharisees went out , and held a council against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Basi , Mafarisayo wakatoka nje , wakashauriana jinsi watakavyomwangamiza Yesu .

text: But when Jesus knew it , he withdrew himself from thence : and great multitudes followed him , and he healed them all ;
text2: Lakini Yesu alipojua jambo hilo , akatoka mahali pale . Watu wengi walimfuata , akawaponya wagonjwa wote ,

text: And charged them that they should not make him known :
text2: akawaamuru wasiwaambie watu habari zake ,

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: ili yale aliyosema nabii Isaya yatimie :

text: Behold my servant , whom I have chosen ; my beloved , in whom my soul is well pleased : I will put my spirit upon him , and he shall shew judgment to the Gentiles .
text2: " Hapa ni mtumishi wangu niliyemteua , mpendwa wangu anipendezaye moyoni . Nitaiweka Roho yangu juu yake , naye atatangaza hukumu yangu kwa mataifa yote .

text: He shall not strive , nor cry ; neither shall any man hear his voice in the streets .
text2: Hatakuwa na ubishi wala kupiga kelele , wala sauti yake haitasikika barabarani .

text: A bruised reed shall he not break , and smoking flax shall he not quench , till he send forth judgment unto victory .
text2: Mwanzi uliopondeka hatauvunja , wala utambi ufukao moshi hatauzima , mpaka atakapoifanya hukumu ya haki itawale .

text: And in his name shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: Katika jina lake mataifa yatakuwa na tumaini . "

text: Then was brought unto him one possessed with a devil , blind , and dumb : and he healed him , insomuch that the blind and dumb both spake and saw .
text2: Hapo watu wakamletea Yesu kipofu mmoja ambaye alikuwa bubu kwa sababu alikuwa amepagawa na pepo . Yesu akamponya hata , akaweza kusema na kuona .

text: And all the people were amazed , and said , Is not this the son of David ?
text2: Umati wote wa watu ulishangaa ukasema , " Je , huenda ikawa huyu ndiye Mwana wa Daudi ? "

text: But when the Pharisees heard it , they said , This fellow doth not cast out devils , but by Beelzebub the prince of the devils .
text2: Lakini Mafarisayo waliposikia hayo , wakasema , " Mtu huyu anawafukuza pepo kwa uwezo wa Beelzebuli , mkuu wa pepo . "

text: And Jesus knew their thoughts , and said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and every city or house divided against itself shall not stand :
text2: Yesu , akiwa anayajua mawazo yao , akawaambia , " Ufalme wowote uliogawanyika makundimakundi yanayopingana , hauwezi kudumu , na mji wowote au jamaa yoyote iliyogawanyika makundimakundi yanayopingana , itaanguka .

text: And if Satan cast out Satan , he is divided against himself ; how shall then his kingdom stand ?
text2: Ikiwa Shetani anamfukuza Shetani , anajipinga mwenyewe . Basi , ufalme wake utasimamaje ?

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your children cast them out ? therefore they shall be your judges .
text2: Ninyi mnasema ati nawafukuza pepo kwa uwezo wa Beelzebuli ; je , watoto wenu huwafukuza kwa uwezo wa nani ? Kwa sababu hiyo wao ndio watakaowahukumu ninyi .

text: But if I cast out devils by the Spirit of God , then the kingdom of God is come unto you .
text2: Lakini ikiwa ninawafukuza pepo kwa nguvu ya Roho wa Mungu , basi jueni kwamba Ufalme wa Mungu umekwisha fika kwenu .

text: Or else how can one enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he first bind the strong man ? and then he will spoil his house .
text2: " Au , anawezaje mtu kuivamia nyumba ya mtu mwenye nguvu na kumnyang ' anya mali yake , bila kwanza kumfunga huyo mtu mwenye nguvu ? Hapo ndipo atakapoweza kumnyang ' anya mali yake .

text: He that is not with me is against me ; and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad .
text2: " Yeyote asiyejiunga nami , anapingana nami ; na yeyote asiyekusanya pamoja nami , hutawanya .

text: Wherefore I say unto you , All manner of sin and blasphemy shall be forgiven unto men : but the blasphemy against the Holy Ghost shall not be forgiven unto men .
text2: Kwa sababu hiyo , nawaambieni , watu watasamehewa dhambi na kufuru zao zote , lakini hawatasamehewa dhambi ya kumkufuru Roho Mtakatifu .

text: And whosoever speaketh a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but whosoever speaketh against the Holy Ghost , it shall not be forgiven him , neither in this world , neither in the world to come .
text2: Tena , asemaye neno la kumpinga Mwana wa Mtu atasamehewa , lakini yule asemaye neno la kumpinga Roho Mtakatifu , hatasamehewa , wala katika ulimwengu huu , wala katika ulimwengu ujao .

text: Either make the tree good , and his fruit good ; or else make the tree corrupt , and his fruit corrupt : for the tree is known by his fruit .
text2: " Ufanyeni mti kuwa mzuri na matunda yake yatakuwa mema ; ufanyeni kuwa mbaya na matunda yake yatakuwa mabaya . Mti hujulikana kwa matunda yake .

text: O generation of vipers , how can ye , being evil , speak good things ? for out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaketh .
text2: Enyi kizazi cha nyoka ! Mnawezaje kusema mambo mema hali ninyi ni waovu ? Maana mtu husema kutokana na yale yaliyojaa moyoni .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of the heart bringeth forth good things : and an evil man out of the evil treasure bringeth forth evil things .
text2: Mtu mwema hutoa mambo mema katika hazina yake njema ; na mtu mbaya hutoa mambo mabaya katika hazina yake mbaya .

text: But I say unto you , That every idle word that men shall speak , they shall give account thereof in the day of judgment .
text2: " Basi , nawaambieni , Siku ya hukumu watu watapaswa kujibu juu ya kila neno lisilofaa wanalosema .

text: For by thy words thou shalt be justified , and by thy words thou shalt be condemned .
text2: Maana kwa maneno yako , utakubaliwa kuwa mwadilifu , na kwa maneno yako , utahukumiwa kuwa na hatia . "

text: Then certain of the scribes and of the Pharisees answered , saying , Master , we would see a sign from thee .
text2: Kisha baadhi ya walimu wa Sheria na Mafarisayo wakamwambia Yesu , " Mwalimu , tunataka kuona ishara kutoka kwako . "

text: But he answered and said unto them , An evil and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given to it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas :
text2: Naye akawajibu , " Kizazi kiovu kisicho na uaminifu ! Mnataka ishara ; hamtapewa ishara nyingine , ila tu ile ishara ya nabii Yona .

text: For as Jonas was three days and three nights in the whale ' s belly ; so shall the Son of man be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth .
text2: Jinsi Yona alivyokaa siku tatu kutwa kucha tumboni mwa nyangumi , ndivyo naye Mwana wa Mtu atakavyokaa ndani ya ardhi siku tatu kutwa kucha .

text: The men of Nineveh shall rise in judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : because they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Watu wa Ninewi watatokea siku ya hukumu , nao watakihukumu kizazi hiki kwamba kina hatia . Maana Waninewi walitubu kwa sababu ya mahubiri ya Yona , na kumbe hapa kuna kikuu kuliko Yona !

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for she came from the uttermost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Malkia wa kusini atatokea wakati kizazi hiki kitakapohukumiwa , naye atakihukumu kwamba kina hatia . Maana yeye alisafiri kutoka mbali akaja kusikiliza maneno ya hekima ya Solomoni , na kumbe hapa kuna kikuu kuliko Solomoni .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest , and findeth none .
text2: " Pepo mchafu akifukuzwa kwa mtu , huzururazurura jangwani akitafuta mahali pa kupumzika asipate .

text: Then he saith , I will return into my house from whence I came out ; and when he is come , he findeth it empty , swept , and garnished .
text2: Hapo hujisemea : Nitarudi nyumbani kwangu nilikotoka . Lakini anaporudi na kuikuta tupu , imefagiwa na kupambwa ,

text: Then goeth he , and taketh with himself seven other spirits more wicked than himself , and they enter in and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first . Even so shall it be also unto this wicked generation .
text2: huenda kuwachukua pepo wengine saba , wabaya kuliko yeye ; na wote huja wakamwingia huyo mtu . Na hali ya mtu huyo sasa huwa mbaya kuliko hapo mwanzo . Ndivyo itakavyokuwa kwa watu hawa waovu . "

text: While he yet talked to the people , behold , his mother and his brethren stood without , desiring to speak with him .
text2: Yesu alikuwa bado anasema na umati wa watu wakati mama yake na ndugu zake walipofika na kusimama nje , wakitaka kusema naye .

text: Then one said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to speak with thee .
text2: Basi , mtu mmoja akamwambia , " Mama yako na ndugu zako wako nje , wanataka kusema nawe . "

text: But he answered and said unto him that told him , Who is my mother ? and who are my brethren ?
text2: Lakini Yesu akamjibu mtu huyo , " Mama yangu ni nani ? Na ndugu zangu ni kina nani ? "

text: And he stretched forth his hand toward his disciples , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Kisha akaunyosha mkono wake kuelekea wanafunzi wake , akasema , " Hawa ndio mama yangu na ndugu zangu !

text: For whosoever shall do the will of my Father which is in heaven , the same is my brother , and sister , and mother .
text2: Maana yeyote anayefanya anavyotaka Baba yangu aliye mbinguni , huyo ndiye ndugu yangu , dada yangu na mama yangu . "

text: The same day went Jesus out of the house , and sat by the sea side .
text2: Siku hiyohiyo , Yesu alitoka katika ile nyumba , akaenda na kuketi kando ya ziwa .

text: And great multitudes were gathered together unto him , so that he went into a ship , and sat ; and the whole multitude stood on the shore .
text2: Makundi makubwa ya watu yalimzunguka hata Yesu akapanda mashua , akaketi . Hao watu walisimama kwenye ukingo wa ziwa ,

text: And he spake many things unto them in parables , saying , Behold , a sower went forth to sow ;
text2: naye Yesu akawaambia mambo mengi kwa mifano . " Sikilizeni ! Mpanzi alikwenda kupanda mbegu .

text: And when he sowed , some seeds fell by the way side , and the fowls came and devoured them up :
text2: Alipokuwa akipanda , nyingine zilianguka njiani , ndege wakaja wakazila .

text: Some fell upon stony places , where they had not much earth : and forthwith they sprung up , because they had no deepness of earth :
text2: Nyingine zilianguka penye mawe pasipokuwa na udongo mwingi . Zikaota mara kwa kuwa udongo haukuwa na kina .

text: And when the sun was up , they were scorched ; and because they had no root , they withered away .
text2: Jua lilipochomoza , zilichomeka ; na kwa kuwa mizizi yake haikuwa na nguvu , zikanyauka .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprung up , and choked them :
text2: Nyingine zilianguka kwenye miti ya miiba , nayo ikakua na kuzisonga .

text: But other fell into good ground , and brought forth fruit , some an hundredfold , some sixtyfold , some thirtyfold .
text2: Lakini nyingine zilianguka penye udongo mzuri , zikaota , zikazaa : nyingine punje mia moja , nyingine sitini na nyingine thelathini .

text: Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Mwenye masikio na asikie ! "

text: And the disciples came , and said unto him , Why speakest thou unto them in parables ?
text2: Wanafunzi wake wakamwendea , wakamwuliza , " Kwa nini unasema na watu kwa mifano ? "

text: He answered and said unto them , Because it is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven , but to them it is not given .
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Ninyi mmejaliwa kuzijua siri za Ufalme wa mbinguni , lakini wao hawakujaliwa .

text: For whosoever hath , to him shall be given , and he shall have more abundance : but whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken away even that he hath .
text2: Maana , aliye na kitu atapewa na kuzidishiwa ; lakini yule asiye na kitu , hata kile alicho nacho kitachukuliwa .

text: Therefore speak I to them in parables : because they seeing see not ; and hearing they hear not , neither do they understand .
text2: Ndiyo maana ninasema nao kwa mifano , kwa sababu wanatazama lakini hawaoni , wanasikiliza lakini hawasikii , wala hawaelewi .

text: And in them is fulfilled the prophecy of Esaias , which saith , By hearing ye shall hear , and shall not understand ; and seeing ye shall see , and shall not perceive :
text2: Kwao yametimia yale aliyosema nabii Isaya : Kusikia mtasikia , lakini hamtaelewa ; Kutazama mtatazama , lakini hamtaona .

text: For this people ' s heart is waxed gross , and their ears are dull of hearing , and their eyes they have closed ; lest at any time they should see with their eyes , and hear with their ears , and should understand with their heart , and should be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Maana akili za watu hawa zimepumbaa , wameyaziba masikio yao , wameyafumba macho yao . La sivyo , wangeona kwa macho yao . wangesikia kwa masikio yao , wangeelewa kwa akili zao , na kunigeukia , asema Bwana , nami ningewaponya .

text: But blessed are your eyes , for they see : and your ears , for they hear .
text2: " Lakini heri yenu ninyi , maana macho yenu yanaona na masikio yenu yanasikia .

text: For verily I say unto you , That many prophets and righteous men have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Kweli nawaambieni , manabii na watu wengi wema walitamani kuyaona yale mnayoyaona , wasiyaone , na kuyasikia yale mnayoyasikia , wasiyasikie .

text: Hear ye therefore the parable of the sower .
text2: " Basi , ninyi sikilizeni maana ya mfano huo wa mpanzi .

text: When any one heareth the word of the kingdom , and understandeth it not , then cometh the wicked one , and catcheth away that which was sown in his heart . This is he which received seed by the way side .
text2: Yeyote asikiaye ujumbe wa ufalme bila kuuelewa , ni kama zile mbegu zilizoanguka njiani ; yule Mwovu huja na kunyakua kile kilichopandwa moyoni mwake .

text: But he that received the seed into stony places , the same is he that heareth the word , and anon with joy receiveth it ;
text2: Ile mbegu iliyopandwa penye mawe ni mfano wa mtu asikiaye ujumbe huo na mara akaupokea kwa furaha .

text: Yet hath he not root in himself , but dureth for a while : for when tribulation or persecution ariseth because of the word , by and by he is offended .
text2: Lakini haumwingii na kuwa na mizizi ndani yake ; huendelea kuuzingatia ujumbe huo kwa kitambo tu , na wakati taabu au udhalimu vinapotokea kwa sababu ya ujumbe huo , anakata tamaa mara .

text: He also that received seed among the thorns is he that heareth the word ; and the care of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , choke the word , and he becometh unfruitful .
text2: Ile mbegu iliyoanguka kati ya miti ya miiba , ni mfano wa mtu asikiaye huo ujumbe , lakini wasiwasi wa ulimwengu huu na anasa za mali huusonga ujumbe huo , naye hazai matunda .

text: But he that received seed into the good ground is he that heareth the word , and understandeth it ; which also beareth fruit , and bringeth forth , some an hundredfold , some sixty , some thirty .
text2: Ile mbegu iliyopandwa katika udongo mzuri ni mfano wa mtu ausikiaye ujumbe huo na kuuelewa , naye huzaa matunda ; mmoja mia , mwingine sitini na mwingine thelathini . "

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man which sowed good seed in his field :
text2: Yesu akawaambia watu mfano mwingine : " Ufalme wa mbinguni unafanana na mtu aliyepanda mbegu nzuri katika shamba lake .

text: But while men slept , his enemy came and sowed tares among the wheat , and went his way .
text2: Lakini watu wakiwa wamelala , adui yake akaja akapanda magugu kati ya ngano , akaenda zake .

text: But when the blade was sprung up , and brought forth fruit , then appeared the tares also .
text2: Basi , mimea ilipoota na kuanza kuchanua , magugu pia yakaanza kuonekana .

text: So the servants of the householder came and said unto him , Sir , didst not thou sow good seed in thy field ? from whence then hath it tares ?
text2: Watumishi wa yule mwenye shamba wakamwendea , wakamwambia , Mheshimiwa , bila shaka ulipanda mbegu nzuri katika shamba lako . Sasa magugu yametoka wapi ?

text: He said unto them , An enemy hath done this . The servants said unto him , Wilt thou then that we go and gather them up ?
text2: Yeye akawajibu , Adui ndiye aliyefanya hivyo . Basi , watumishi wake wakamwuliza , Je , unataka twende tukayang ' oe

text: But he said , Nay ; lest while ye gather up the tares , ye root up also the wheat with them .
text2: Naye akawajibu , La , msije labda mnapokusanya magugu , mkang ' oa na ngano pia .

text: Let both grow together until the harvest : and in the time of harvest I will say to the reapers , Gather ye together first the tares , and bind them in bundles to burn them : but gather the wheat into my barn .
text2: Acheni vikue pamoja mpaka wakati wa mavuno . Wakati huo nitawaambia wavunaji : kusanyeni kwanza magugu mkayafunge mafungumafungu ya kuchomwa . Lakini ngano ikusanyeni mkaiweke ghalani mwangu . "

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is like to a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and sowed in his field :
text2: Yesu akawaambia watu mfano mwingine : " Ufalme wa mbinguni unafanana na mbegu ya haradali aliyotwaa mtu mmoja , akaipanda katika shamba lake .

text: Which indeed is the least of all seeds : but when it is grown , it is the greatest among herbs , and becometh a tree , so that the birds of the air come and lodge in the branches thereof .
text2: Yenyewe ni ndogo kuliko mbegu zote , lakini ikishaota huwa kubwa kuliko mimea yote . Hukua ikawa mti , na ndege wa angani huja na kujenga viota katika matawi yake . "

text: Another parable spake he unto them ; The kingdom of heaven is like unto leaven , which a woman took , and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Yesu akawaambia mfano mwingine : " Ufalme wa mbinguni umefanana na chachu aliyotwaa mama mmoja , akaichanganya na unga pishi tatu , hata unga wote ukaumuka . "

text: All these things spake Jesus unto the multitude in parables ; and without a parable spake he not unto them :
text2: Yesu aliwaambia watu hayo yote kwa mifano . Hakuwaambia chochote bila kutumia mifano ,

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying , I will open my mouth in parables ; I will utter things which have been kept secret from the foundation of the world .
text2: ili jambo lililonenwa na nabii litimie : " Nitasema kwa mifano ; nitawaambia mambo yaliyofichika tangu kuumbwa ulimwengu . "

text: Then Jesus sent the multitude away , and went into the house : and his disciples came unto him , saying , Declare unto us the parable of the tares of the field .
text2: Kisha Yesu aliwaaga wale watu , akaingia nyumbani . Wanafunzi wake wakamwendea , wakamwambia , " Tufafanulie ule mfano wa magugu shambani . "

text: He answered and said unto them , He that soweth the good seed is the Son of man ;
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Mpanzi wa zile mbegu nzuri ni Mwana wa Mtu .

text: The field is the world ; the good seed are the children of the kingdom ; but the tares are the children of the wicked one ;
text2: Lile shamba ni ulimwengu . Zile mbegu nzuri ni watu wale ambao Ufalme ni wao . Lakini yale magugu ni wale watu wa yule Mwovu .

text: The enemy that sowed them is the devil ; the harvest is the end of the world ; and the reapers are the angels .
text2: Adui aliyepanda yale magugu ni Ibilisi . Mavuno ni mwisho wa nyakati na wavunaji ni malaika .

text: As therefore the tares are gathered and burned in the fire ; so shall it be in the end of this world .
text2: Kama vile magugu yanavyokusanywa kuchomwa moto , ndivyo itakavyokuwa mwishoni mwa nyakati ;

text: The Son of man shall send forth his angels , and they shall gather out of his kingdom all things that offend , and them which do iniquity ;
text2: Mwana wa Mtu atawatuma malaika wake wawakusanye kutoka katika Ufalme wake wale wote wenye kusababisha dhambi , na wote wenye kutenda maovu ,

text: And shall cast them into a furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: na kuwatupa katika tanuru ya moto , na huko watalia na kusaga meno .

text: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father . Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Kisha , wale wema watang ' ara kama jua katika Ufalme wa Baba yao . Sikieni basi , kama mna masikio !

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto treasure hid in a field ; the which when a man hath found , he hideth , and for joy thereof goeth and selleth all that he hath , and buyeth that field .
text2: " Ufalme wa mbinguni umefanana na hazina iliyofichika shambani . Mtu mmoja aliigundua , akaificha tena . Alifurahi sana hata akaenda kuuza yote aliyokuwa nayo , akalinunua shamba lile .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a merchant man , seeking goodly pearls :
text2: " Tena , Ufalme wa mbinguni umefanana na mfanyabiashara mmoja mwenye kutafuta lulu nzuri .

text: Who , when he had found one pearl of great price , went and sold all that he had , and bought it .
text2: Alipopata lulu moja ya thamani kubwa , alienda akauza yote aliyokuwa nayo , akainunua lulu ile .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a net , that was cast into the sea , and gathered of every kind :
text2: " Tena , Ufalme wa mbinguni unafanana na wavu uliotupwa baharini , ukanasa samaki wa kila aina .

text: Which , when it was full , they drew to shore , and sat down , and gathered the good into vessels , but cast the bad away .
text2: Ulipojaa , watu waliuvuta pwani , wakaketi , wakachagua samaki wazuri wakawaweka ndani ya vikapu vyao , na wabaya wakawatupa .

text: So shall it be at the end of the world : the angels shall come forth , and sever the wicked from among the just ,
text2: Ndivyo itakavyokuwa mwishoni mwa nyakati : malaika watatokea , watawatenganisha watu wabaya na watu wema ,

text: And shall cast them into the furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: na kuwatupa hao wabaya katika tanuru ya moto . Huko watalia na kusaga meno . "

text: Jesus saith unto them , Have ye understood all these things ? They say unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Yesu akawauliza , " Je , mmeelewa mambo haya yote ? " Wakamjibu , " Naam . "

text: Then said he unto them , Therefore every scribe which is instructed unto the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which bringeth forth out of his treasure things new and old .
text2: Naye akawaambia , " Hivyo basi , kila mwalimu wa Sheria aliye mwanafunzi wa Ufalme wa mbinguni anafanana na mwenye nyumba atoaye katika hazina yake vitu vipya na vya kale . "

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these parables , he departed thence .
text2: Yesu alipomaliza kusema mifano hiyo alitoka mahali hapo ,

text: And when he was come into his own country , he taught them in their synagogue , insomuch that they were astonished , and said , Whence hath this man this wisdom , and these mighty works ?
text2: akaenda kijijini kwake . Huko akawa anawafundisha watu katika sunagogi hata wakashangaa , wakasema , " Huyu amepata wapi hekima hii na maajabu ?

text: Is not this the carpenter ' s son ? is not his mother called Mary ? and his brethren , James , and Joses , and Simon , and Judas ?
text2: Je , huyu si yule mwana wa seremala ? Je , mama yake si anaitwa Maria , na ndugu zake si kina Yakobo , Yosefu , Simoni na Yuda ?

text: And his sisters , are they not all with us ? Whence then hath this man all these things ?
text2: Na dada zake je , si wote wako hapa pamoja nasi ? Basi amepata wapi haya yote ? "

text: And they were offended in him . But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , save in his own country , and in his own house .
text2: Basi , wakawa na mashaka naye . Lakini Yesu akawaambia , " Nabii hakosi kuheshimiwa , isipokuwa katika nchi yake na nyumbani mwake ! "

text: And he did not many mighty works there because of their unbelief .
text2: Kwa hiyo , hakutenda miujiza mingi pale kwa sababu ya kutoamini kwao .

text: At that time Herod the tetrarch heard of the fame of Jesus ,
text2: Wakati huo , mtawala Herode alisikia sifa za Yesu .

text: And said unto his servants , This is John the Baptist ; he is risen from the dead ; and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Basi , akawaambia watumishi wake , " Mtu huyu ni Yohane mbatizaji , amefufuka kutoka wafu ; ndiyo maana nguvu za miujiza zinafanya kazi ndani yake . "

text: For Herod had laid hold on John , and bound him , and put him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife .
text2: Herode ndiye aliyekuwa amemtia Yohane nguvuni , akamfunga minyororo na kumtia gerezani kwa sababu ya Herodia , mke wa Filipo , ndugu yake . Sababu hasa ni

text: For John said unto him , It is not lawful for thee to have her .
text2: kwamba alikuwa amemwambia Herode , " Si halali kwako kuishi na huyo mwanamke ! "

text: And when he would have put him to death , he feared the multitude , because they counted him as a prophet .
text2: Herode alitaka kumwua Yohane , lakini aliogopa watu kwa sababu kwao Yohane alikuwa nabii .

text: But when Herod ' s birthday was kept , the daughter of Herodias danced before them , and pleased Herod .
text2: Katika sherehe za sikukuu ya kuzaliwa kwake Herode , binti ya Herodia alicheza mbele ya wageni . Herode alifurahiwa ,

text: Whereupon he promised with an oath to give her whatsoever she would ask .
text2: hata akaahidi kwa kiapo kumpa huyo msichana chochote atakachoomba .

text: And she , being before instructed of her mother , said , Give me here John Baptist ' s head in a charger .
text2: Naye , huku akichochewa na mama yake , akaomba , " Nipe papahapa katika sinia kichwa cha Yohane mbatizaji . "

text: And the king was sorry : nevertheless for the oath ' s sake , and them which sat with him at meat , he commanded it to be given her .
text2: Mfalme alihuzunika , lakini kwa sababu ya kile kiapo chake na kwa sababu ya wale wageni karamuni , akaamuru apewe .

text: And he sent , and beheaded John in the prison .
text2: Basi , Herode akatuma mtu gerezani amkate kichwa Yohane .

text: And his head was brought in a charger , and given to the damsel : and she brought it to her mother .
text2: Kichwa chake kikaletwa katika sinia , wakampa yule msichana , naye akampelekea mama yake .

text: And his disciples came , and took up the body , and buried it , and went and told Jesus .
text2: Wanafunzi wa Yohane wakaja , wakauchukua mwili wake , wakauzika . Kisha wakaenda kumpasha habari Yesu .

text: When Jesus heard of it , he departed thence by ship into a desert place apart : and when the people had heard thereof , they followed him on foot out of the cities .
text2: Yesu alipopata habari hiyo , aliondoka mahali pale kwa mashua , akaenda mahali pa faragha peke yake . Lakini watu walipata habari , wakamfuata kwa miguu toka mijini .

text: And Jesus went forth , and saw a great multitude , and was moved with compassion toward them , and he healed their sick .
text2: Basi , aliposhuka pwani , aliona umati mkubwa wa watu , akawaonea huruma , akawaponya wagonjwa wao .

text: And when it was evening , his disciples came to him , saying , This is a desert place , and the time is now past ; send the multitude away , that they may go into the villages , and buy themselves victuals .
text2: Kulipokuwa jioni , wanafunzi wake walimwendea wakamwambia , " Mahali hapa ni nyikani , na saa zimepita . Basi , uwaage watu ili waende vijijini wakajinunulie chakula . "

text: But Jesus said unto them , They need not depart ; give ye them to eat .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Si lazima waende , wapeni ninyi chakula . "

text: And they say unto him , We have here but five loaves , and two fishes .
text2: Lakini wao wakamwambia , " Tunayo mikate mitano tu na samaki wawili . "

text: He said , Bring them hither to me .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Nileteeni hapa . "

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the grass , and took the five loaves , and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed , and brake , and gave the loaves to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Akawaamuru watu waketi katika nyasi . Kisha akaitwaa ile mikate mitano na wale samaki wawili , akatazama juu mbinguni , akamshukuru Mungu . Halafu akaimega hiyo mikate , akawapa wanafunzi wake , nao wakawapa watu .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the fragments that remained twelve baskets full .
text2: Watu wote wakala , wakashiba . Kisha wanafunzi wakakusanya mabaki , wakajaza vikapu kumi na viwili .

text: And they that had eaten were about five thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Jumla ya waliokula ilikuwa wanaume wapatao elfu tano , bila kuhesabu wanawake na watoto .

text: And straightway Jesus constrained his disciples to get into a ship , and to go before him unto the other side , while he sent the multitudes away .
text2: Mara , Yesu akawaamuru wanafunzi wake wapande mashua , wamtangulie ng ' ambo ya ziwa wakati yeye anawaaga watu .

text: And when he had sent the multitudes away , he went up into a mountain apart to pray : and when the evening was come , he was there alone .
text2: Baada ya kuwaaga , alipanda mlimani peke yake kusali . Ilipokuwa jioni , yeye alikuwa huko peke yake ,

text: But the ship was now in the midst of the sea , tossed with waves : for the wind was contrary .
text2: na wakati huo ile mashua ilikwishafika karibu katikati ya ziwa , lakini ilikuwa inakwenda mrama kwa sababu upepo ulikuwa unaipinga .

text: And in the fourth watch of the night Jesus went unto them , walking on the sea .
text2: Usiku , karibu na mapambazuko , Yesu aliwaendea wanafunzi akitembea juu ya maji .

text: And when the disciples saw him walking on the sea , they were troubled , saying , It is a spirit ; and they cried out for fear .
text2: Wanafunzi wake walipomwona akitembea juu ya maji waliingiwa na hofu , wakasema , " Ni mzimu ! " Wakapiga kelele kwa hofu .

text: But straightway Jesus spake unto them , saying , Be of good cheer ; it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Mara , Yesu akasema nao , " Tulieni , ni mimi . Msiogope ! "

text: And Peter answered him and said , Lord , if it be thou , bid me come unto thee on the water .
text2: Petro akamwambia , " Bwana , ikiwa ni wewe kweli , amuru nitembee juu ya maji nije kwako . "

text: And he said , Come . And when Peter was come down out of the ship , he walked on the water , to go to Jesus .
text2: Yesu akasema , " Haya , njoo . " Basi , Petro akashuka kutoka ile mashua , akatembea juu ya maji , akamwendea Yesu .

text: But when he saw the wind boisterous , he was afraid ; and beginning to sink , he cried , saying , Lord , save me .
text2: Lakini alipouona ule upepo , aliogopa , akaanza kuzama ; akalia kwa sauti , " Bwana , niokoe ! "

text: And immediately Jesus stretched forth his hand , and caught him , and said unto him , O thou of little faith , wherefore didst thou doubt ?
text2: Hapo , Yesu akaunyosha mkono wake , akamshika na kumwambia , " Ewe mwenye imani haba ! Kwa nini uliona shaka ? "

text: And when they were come into the ship , the wind ceased .
text2: Basi , wakapanda mashuani , na upepo ukatulia .

text: Then they that were in the ship came and worshipped him , saying , Of a truth thou art the Son of God .
text2: Wote waliokuwa ndani ya mashua walimsujudia , wakasema , " Hakika wewe ni Mwana wa Mungu . "

text: And when they were gone over , they came into the land of Gennesaret .
text2: Walivuka ziwa , wakafika nchi ya Genesareti .

text: And when the men of that place had knowledge of him , they sent out into all that country round about , and brought unto him all that were diseased ;
text2: Watu wa huko walipomtambua , wakaeneza habari pote katika sehemu hizo . Basi , wakamletea Yesu wagonjwa wote ,

text: And besought him that they might only touch the hem of his garment : and as many as touched were made perfectly whole .
text2: wakamwomba awaruhusu waguse tu pindo la vazi lake ; wote waliomgusa walipona .

text: Then came to Jesus scribes and Pharisees , which were of Jerusalem , saying ,
text2: Kisha Mafarisayo na walimu wa Sheria wakafika kutoka Yerusalemu , wakamwendea Yesu , wakamwuliza ,

text: Why do thy disciples transgress the tradition of the elders ? for they wash not their hands when they eat bread .
text2: " Kwa nini wanafunzi wako hawajali mapokeo tuliyopokea kutoka kwa wazee wetu ? Hawanawi mikono yao kama ipasavyo kabla ya kula ! "

text: But he answered and said unto them , Why do ye also transgress the commandment of God by your tradition ?
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Kwa nini nanyi mnapendelea mapokeo yenu wenyewe na hamuijali Sheria ya Mungu ?

text: For God commanded , saying , Honour thy father and mother : and , He that curseth father or mother , let him die the death .
text2: Mungu amesema : Waheshimu baba yako na mama yako , na Anayemkashifu baba yake au mama yake , lazima auawe .

text: But ye say , Whosoever shall say to his father or his mother , It is a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ;
text2: Lakini ninyi mwafundisha ati mtu akiwa na kitu ambacho angeweza kuwasaidia nacho baba au mama yake , lakini akasema : Kitu hiki nimemtolea Mungu ,

text: And honour not his father or his mother , he shall be free . Thus have ye made the commandment of God of none effect by your tradition .
text2: basi , hapaswi tena kumheshimu baba yake ! Ndivyo mnavyodharau neno la Mungu kwa kufuata mafundisho yenu wenyewe .

text: Ye hypocrites , well did Esaias prophesy of you , saying ,
text2: Enyi wanafiki ! Isaya alitabiri sawa kabisa juu yenu :

text: This people draweth nigh unto me with their mouth , and honoureth me with their lips ; but their heart is far from me .
text2: Watu hawa , asema Mungu , huniheshimu kwa maneno tu , lakini mioyoni mwao wako mbali nami .

text: But in vain they do worship me , teaching for doctrines the commandments of men .
text2: Kuniabudu kwao hakufai , maana mambo wanayofundisha ni maagizo ya kibinadamu tu . "

text: And he called the multitude , and said unto them , Hear , and understand :
text2: Yesu aliuita ule umati wa watu , akawaambia , " Sikilizeni na muelewe !

text: Not that which goeth into the mouth defileth a man ; but that which cometh out of the mouth , this defileth a man .
text2: Kitu kinachomtia mtu najisi si kile kiingiacho kinywani , bali kile kitokacho kinywani . Hicho ndicho kimtiacho mtu najisi . "

text: Then came his disciples , and said unto him , Knowest thou that the Pharisees were offended , after they heard this saying ?
text2: Kisha wanafunzi wakamwendea , wakamwambia , " Je , unajua kwamba Mafarisayo walichukizwa waliposikia maneno yako ? "

text: But he answered and said , Every plant , which my heavenly Father hath not planted , shall be rooted up .
text2: Lakini yeye akawajibu , " Kila mmea ambao Baba yangu aliye mbinguni hakuupanda , utang ' olewa .

text: Let them alone : they be blind leaders of the blind . And if the blind lead the blind , both shall fall into the ditch .
text2: Waacheni wenyewe ! Wao ni vipofu , viongozi wa vipofu ; na kipofu akimwongoza kipofu , wote wawili hutumbukia shimoni . "

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Declare unto us this parable .
text2: Petro akadakia , " Tufafanulie huo mfano . "

text: And Jesus said , Are ye also yet without understanding ?
text2: Yesu akasema , " Hata nyinyi hamwelewi ?

text: Do not ye yet understand , that whatsoever entereth in at the mouth goeth into the belly , and is cast out into the draught ?
text2: Je , hamwelewi kwamba kila kinachoingia kinywani huenda tumboni na baadaye hutupwa nje chooni ?

text: But those things which proceed out of the mouth come forth from the heart ; and they defile the man .
text2: Lakini yale yatokayo kinywani hutoka moyoni , na hayo ndiyo yanayomtia mtu najisi .

text: For out of the heart proceed evil thoughts , murders , adulteries , fornications , thefts , false witness , blasphemies :
text2: Maana moyoni hutoka mawazo maovu yanayosababisha uuaji , uzinzi , uasherati , wizi , ushahidi wa uongo na kashfa .

text: These are the things which defile a man : but to eat with unwashen hands defileth not a man .
text2: Hayo ndiyo yanayomtia mtu najisi . Lakini kula chakula bila kunawa mikono hakumtii mtu najisi . "

text: Then Jesus went thence , and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon .
text2: Yesu aliondoka mahali hapo akaenda kukaa katika sehemu za Tiro na Sidoni .

text: And , behold , a woman of Canaan came out of the same coasts , and cried unto him , saying , Have mercy on me , O Lord , thou Son of David ; my daughter is grievously vexed with a devil .
text2: Basi , mama mmoja Mkaanani wa nchi hiyo alimjia , akapaaza sauti : " Mheshimiwa , Mwana wa Daudi , nionee huruma ! Binti yangu anasumbuliwa na pepo . "

text: But he answered her not a word . And his disciples came and besought him , saying , Send her away ; for she crieth after us .
text2: Lakini Yesu hakumjibu neno . Basi , wanafunzi wake wakamwendea , wakamwambia , " Mwambie aende zake kwa maana anatufuatafuata akipiga kelele . "

text: But he answered and said , I am not sent but unto the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Yesu akajibu , " Sikutumwa ila kwa watu wa Israeli waliopotea kama kondoo . "

text: Then came she and worshipped him , saying , Lord , help me .
text2: Hapo huyo mama akaja , akapiga magoti mbele yake , akasema , " Mheshimiwa , nisaidie . "

text: But he answered and said , It is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it to dogs .
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Si sawa kuchukua chakula cha watoto na kuwatupia mbwa . "

text: And she said , Truth , Lord : yet the dogs eat of the crumbs which fall from their masters ' table .
text2: Huyo mama akajibu , " Ni kweli , Mheshimiwa ; lakini hata mbwa hula makombo yanayoanguka kutoka meza ya bwana wao . "

text: Then Jesus answered and said unto her , O woman , great is thy faith : be it unto thee even as thou wilt . And her daughter was made whole from that very hour .
text2: Hapo Yesu akamjibu , " Mama , imani yako ni kubwa ; basi , ufanyiwe kama unavyotaka . " Yule binti yake akapona tangu saa hiyo wakati huohuo .

text: And Jesus departed from thence , and came nigh unto the sea of Galilee ; and went up into a mountain , and sat down there .
text2: Yesu alitoka hapo akaenda kando ya ziwa Galilaya , akapanda mlimani , akaketi .

text: And great multitudes came unto him , having with them those that were lame , blind , dumb , maimed , and many others , and cast them down at Jesus ' feet ; and he healed them :
text2: Watu wengi sana wakamjia wakiwaleta vilema , vipofu , viwete , bubu na wengine wengi waliokuwa wagonjwa , wakawaweka mbele ya miguu yake , naye Yesu akawaponya .

text: Insomuch that the multitude wondered , when they saw the dumb to speak , the maimed to be whole , the lame to walk , and the blind to see : and they glorified the God of Israel .
text2: Umati ule wa watu ulishangaa sana ulipoona bubu wakiongea , waliokuwa wamelemaa wamepona , viwete wakitembea na vipofu wakiona ; wakamsifu Mungu wa Israeli .

text: Then Jesus called his disciples unto him , and said , I have compassion on the multitude , because they continue with me now three days , and have nothing to eat : and I will not send them away fasting , lest they faint in the way .
text2: Basi , Yesu aliwaita wanafunzi wake , akasema , " Nawaonea watu hawa huruma kwa sababu kwa siku tatu wamekuwa nami , wala hawana chakula . Sipendi kuwaacha waende bila kula wasije wakazimia njiani . "

text: And his disciples say unto him , Whence should we have so much bread in the wilderness , as to fill so great a multitude ?
text2: Wanafunzi wakamwambia , " Hapa tuko nyikani ; tutapata wapi chakula cha kuwatosha watu wengi hivi ? "

text: And Jesus saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven , and a few little fishes .
text2: Yesu akawauliza , " Mnayo mikate mingapi ? " Wakamjibu , " Saba na visamaki vichache . "

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the ground .
text2: Basi , Yesu akawaamuru watu wakae chini .

text: And he took the seven loaves and the fishes , and gave thanks , and brake them , and gave to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Akaitwaa ile mikate saba na vile visamaki , akamshukuru Mungu , akavimega , akawapa wanafunzi , nao wakawagawia watu .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets full .
text2: Wote wakala , wakashiba . Kisha wakakusanya makombo , wakajaza vikapu saba .

text: And they that did eat were four thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Hao waliokula walikuwa wanaume elfu nne , bila kuhesabu wanawake na watoto .

text: And he sent away the multitude , and took ship , and came into the coasts of Magdala ,
text2: Basi , Yesu akawaaga watu , akapanda mashua , akaenda katika eneo la Magadani .

text: The Pharisees also with the Sadducees came , and tempting desired him that he would shew them a sign from heaven .
text2: Mafarisayo na Masadukayo walimwendea Yesu , na kwa kumjaribu , wakamwomba afanye ishara itokayo mbinguni .

text: He answered and said unto them , When it is evening , ye say , It will be fair weather : for the sky is red .
text2: Lakini Yesu akawajibu , " Wakati wa jioni ukifika ninyi husema : Hali ya hewa itakuwa nzuri kwa maana anga ni jekundu !

text: And in the morning , It will be foul weather to day : for the sky is red and lowring . O ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky ; but can ye not discern the signs of the times ?
text2: Na alfajiri mwasema : Leo hali ya hewa itakuwa ya dhoruba , maana anga ni jekundu na tena mawingu yametanda ! Basi , ninyi mnajua sana kusoma majira kwa kuangalia anga , lakini kutambua dalili za nyakati hizi hamjui .

text: A wicked and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given unto it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas . And he left them , and departed .
text2: Kizazi kiovu kisicho na uaminifu ! Mnataka ishara , lakini hamtapewa ishara yoyote isipokuwa tu ile ya Yona . " Basi , akawaacha , akaenda zake .

text: And when his disciples were come to the other side , they had forgotten to take bread .
text2: Wanafunzi wake walipokwisha vukia upande wa pili wa ziwa , walijikuta wamesahau kuchukua mikate .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Take heed and beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Muwe macho na mjihadhari na chachu ya Mafarisayo na Masadukayo ! "

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have taken no bread .
text2: Lakini wao wakawa wanajadiliana : " Anasema hivyo kwa kuwa hatukuchukua mikate . "

text: Which when Jesus perceived , he said unto them , O ye of little faith , why reason ye among yourselves , because ye have brought no bread ?
text2: Yesu alijua mawazo yao , akawaambia , " Enyi watu wenye imani haba ! Mbona mnajadiliana juu ya kutokuwa na mikate ?

text: Do ye not yet understand , neither remember the five loaves of the five thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: Je , hamjaelewa bado ? Je , hamkumbuki nilipoimega ile mikate mitano kwa ajili ya wale watu elfu tano ? Je , mlijaza vikapu vingapi vya makombo ?

text: Neither the seven loaves of the four thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: Au , ile mikate saba waliyogawiwa wale watu elfu nne , je , mlikusanya vikapu vingapi vya mabaki ?

text: How is it that ye do not understand that I spake it not to you concerning bread , that ye should beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees ?
text2: Inawezekanaje hamwelewi ya kwamba sikuwa nikisema juu ya mikate ? Jihadharini na chachu ya Mafarisayo na Masadukayo ! "

text: Then understood they how that he bade them not beware of the leaven of bread , but of the doctrine of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Hapo wanafunzi wakafahamu kwamba aliwaambia wajihadhari siyo na chachu ya mikate , bali na mafundisho ya Mafarisayo na Masadukayo .

text: When Jesus came into the coasts of Caesarea Philippi , he asked his disciples , saying , Whom do men say that I the Son of man am ?
text2: Yesu alipofika pande za Kaisarea Filipi , aliwauliza wanafunzi wake , " Watu wanasema Mwana wa Mtu kuwa ni nani ? "

text: And they said , Some say that thou art John the Baptist : some , Elias ; and others , Jeremias , or one of the prophets .
text2: Wakamjibu , " Wengine wanasema kuwa ni Yohane mbatizaji , wengine Eliya , wengine Yeremia au mmojawapo wa manabii . "

text: He saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ?
text2: Yesu akawauliza , " Na ninyi je , mwasema mimi ni nani ? "

text: And Simon Peter answered and said , Thou art the Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Simoni Petro akajibu , " Wewe ndiwe Kristo , Mwana wa Mungu aliye hai . "

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Blessed art thou , Simon Barjona : for flesh and blood hath not revealed it unto thee , but my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Yesu akasema , " Heri wewe Simoni mwana wa Yona , kwa maana si binadamu aliyekufunulia ukweli huu , ila Baba yangu aliye mbinguni .

text: And I say also unto thee , That thou art Peter , and upon this rock I will build my church ; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it .
text2: Nami nakwambia : wewe ni Petro , na juu ya mwamba huu nitalijenga kanisa langu ; wala kifo chenyewe hakitaweza kulishinda .

text: And I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom of heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Nitakupa funguo za Ufalme wa mbinguni ; kila utakachofunga duniani , kitafungwa pia mbinguni ; kila utakachofungua duniani , kitafunguliwa pia mbinguni . "

text: Then charged he his disciples that they should tell no man that he was Jesus the Christ .
text2: Kisha akawaonya wanafunzi wasimwambie mtu yeyote kwamba yeye ndiye Kristo .

text: From that time forth began Jesus to shew unto his disciples , how that he must go unto Jerusalem , and suffer many things of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be killed , and be raised again the third day .
text2: Tangu wakati huo Yesu alianza kuwajulisha waziwazi wanafunzi wake : " Ni lazima mimi niende Yerusalemu , na huko nikapate mateso mengi yatakayosababishwa na wazee , makuhani wakuu na walimu wa Sheria . Nitauawa , na siku ya tatu nitafufuliwa . "

text: Then Peter took him , and began to rebuke him , saying , Be it far from thee , Lord : this shall not be unto thee .
text2: Hapo Petro akamchukua kando , akaanza kumkemea : " Isiwe hivyo Bwana ! Jambo hili halitakupata ! "

text: But he turned , and said unto Peter , Get thee behind me , Satan : thou art an offence unto me : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but those that be of men .
text2: Lakini Yesu akageuka , akamwambia Petro , " Ondoka mbele yangu Shetani ! Wewe ni kikwazo kwangu . Mawazo yako si ya mungu bali ni ya kibinadamu ! "

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Kisha Yesu akawaambia wanafunzi wake , " Kama mtu yeyote anataka kuwa mfuasi wangu , ni lazima ajikane mwenyewe , auchukue msalaba wake , anifuate .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : and whosoever will lose his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Maana , mtu anayetaka kuyaokoa maisha yake mwenyewe , atayapoteza ;

text: For what is a man profited , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ? or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: lakini mtu anayeyapoteza maisha yake kwa ajili yangu , atayapata . Je , mtu atafaidi nini akiupata utajiri wote wa ulimwengu na hali amepoteza maisha yake ? Au , mtu atatoa kitu gani kiwe badala ya maisha yake ?

text: For the Son of man shall come in the glory of his Father with his angels ; and then he shall reward every man according to his works .
text2: Maana , Mwana wa Mtu atakuja katika utukufu wa Baba yake pamoja na malaika wake , na hapo ndipo atakapomlipa kila mtu kadiri ya matendo yake .

text: Verily I say unto you , There be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the Son of man coming in his kingdom .
text2: Kweli nawaambieni , wako wengine papahapa ambao hawatakufa kabla ya kumwona Mwana wa Mtu akija katika Ufalme wake . "

text: And after six days Jesus taketh Peter , James , and John his brother , and bringeth them up into an high mountain apart ,
text2: Baada ya siku sita , Yesu aliwachukua Petro , Yakobo na Yohane nduguye , akaenda nao peke yao juu ya mlima mrefu .

text: And was transfigured before them : and his face did shine as the sun , and his raiment was white as the light .
text2: Huko , wakiwa wanamtazama , akageuka sura , uso wake ukang ' aa kama jua na mavazi yake yakawa meupe kama nuru .

text: And , behold , there appeared unto them Moses and Elias talking with him .
text2: Mose na Eliya wakawatokea , wakawa wanazungumza naye .

text: Then answered Peter , and said unto Jesus , Lord , it is good for us to be here : if thou wilt , let us make here three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Hapo Petro akamwambia Yesu , " Bwana , ni vizuri sana kwamba tupo hapa ! Ukipenda nitajenga vibanda vitatu : kimoja chako , kimoja cha Mose na kimoja cha Eliya . "

text: While he yet spake , behold , a bright cloud overshadowed them : and behold a voice out of the cloud , which said , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased ; hear ye him .
text2: Alipokuwa bado anasema hivyo , wingu jeupe likawafunika , na sauti ikasikika kutoka katika hilo wingu : " Huyu ni Mwanangu mpendwa , ninayependezwa naye , msikilizeni . "

text: And when the disciples heard it , they fell on their face , and were sore afraid .
text2: Wanafunzi waliposikia hivyo wakaanguka kifudifudi , wakaogopa sana .

text: And Jesus came and touched them , and said , Arise , and be not afraid .
text2: Yesu akawaendea , akawagusa , akasema , " Simameni , msiogope ! "

text: And when they had lifted up their eyes , they saw no man , save Jesus only .
text2: Walipoinua macho yao hawakumwona mtu , ila Yesu peke yake .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , Jesus charged them , saying , Tell the vision to no man , until the Son of man be risen again from the dead .
text2: Basi , walipokuwa wanashuka mlimani , Yesu akawaonya : " Msimwambie mtu mambo mliyoyaona mpaka Mwana wa Mtu atakapofufuliwa kutoka wafu . "

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Why then say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Kisha wanafunzi wakamwuliza , " Mbona walimu wa Sheria wanasema ati ni lazima kwanza Eliya aje ? "

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Elias truly shall first come , and restore all things .
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Kweli , Eliya atakuja kutayarisha mambo yote .

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is come already , and they knew him not , but have done unto him whatsoever they listed . Likewise shall also the Son of man suffer of them .
text2: Lakini nawaambieni , Eliya amekwisha kuja nao hawakumtambua , bali walimtendea jinsi walivyotaka . Mwana wa Mtu atateswa vivyo hivyo mikononi mwao . "

text: Then the disciples understood that he spake unto them of John the Baptist .
text2: Hapo hao wanafunzi wakafahamu kwamba alikuwa akiwaambia juu ya Yohane mbatizaji .

text: And when they were come to the multitude , there came to him a certain man , kneeling down to him , and saying ,
text2: Walipojiunga tena na ule umati wa watu , mtu mmoja alimwendea Yesu , akampigia magoti ,

text: Lord , have mercy on my son : for he is lunatick , and sore vexed : for ofttimes he falleth into the fire , and oft into the water .
text2: akasema , " Mheshimiwa , mwonee huruma mwanangu kwa kuwa ana kifafa , tena anateseka sana ; mara nyingi yeye huanguka motoni na majini .

text: And I brought him to thy disciples , and they could not cure him .
text2: Nilimleta kwa wanafunzi wako lakini hawakuweza kumponya . "

text: Then Jesus answered and said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him hither to me .
text2: Yesu akajibu , " Enyi kizazi kisicho na imani , kilichopotoka ! Nitakaa nanyi mpaka lini ? Nitawavumilia ninyi mpaka lini ? Mleteni hapa huyo mtoto . "

text: And Jesus rebuked the devil ; and he departed out of him : and the child was cured from that very hour .
text2: Basi , Yesu akamkemea huyo pepo , naye akamtoka , na yule mtoto akapona wakati huohuo .

text: Then came the disciples to Jesus apart , and said , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Kisha wanafunzi wakamwendea Yesu kwa faragha , wakamwuliza , " Kwa nini sisi hatukuweza kumtoa yule pepo ? "

text: And Jesus said unto them , Because of your unbelief : for verily I say unto you , If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye shall say unto this mountain , Remove hence to yonder place ; and it shall remove ; and nothing shall be impossible unto you .
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Kwa sababu ya imani yenu haba . Nawaambieni kweli , kama tu mkiwa na imani , hata iwe ndogo kama mbegu ya haradali , mtaweza kuuambia mlima huu : Toka hapa uende pale , nao utakwenda . Hakuna chochote ambacho hakingewezekana kwenu . "

text: Howbeit this kind goeth not out but by prayer and fasting .
text2: " Pepo wa namna hii hawezi kuondolewa ila kwa sala na kufunga . "

text: And while they abode in Galilee , Jesus said unto them , The Son of man shall be betrayed into the hands of men :
text2: Walipokuwa pamoja huko Galilaya , Yesu aliwaambia , " Mwana wa Mtu atakabidhiwa kwa watu .

text: And they shall kill him , and the third day he shall be raised again . And they were exceeding sorry .
text2: Watamuua , lakini siku ya tatu atafufuliwa . " Wanafunzi wakahuzunika mno .

text: And when they were come to Capernaum , they that received tribute money came to Peter , and said , Doth not your master pay tribute ?
text2: Walipofika Kafarnaumu watu wenye kukusanya fedha ya zaka ya Hekalu walimwendea Petro , wakamwuliza , " Je , mwalimu wenu hulipa fedha ya zaka ? "

text: He saith , Yes . And when he was come into the house , Jesus prevented him , saying , What thinkest thou , Simon ? of whom do the kings of the earth take custom or tribute ? of their own children , or of strangers ?
text2: Petro akajibu , " Naam , hulipa . " Basi , Petro alipoingia ndani ya nyumba , kabla hata hajasema neno , Yesu akamwuliza , " Simoni , wewe unaonaje ? Wafalme wa dunia hukusanya ushuru au kodi kutoka kwa kina nani ? Kutoka kwa wananchi ama kutoka kwa wageni ? "

text: Peter saith unto him , Of strangers . Jesus saith unto him , Then are the children free .
text2: Petro akajibu , " Kutoka kwa wageni . " Yesu akamwambia , " Haya basi , wananchi hawahusiki .

text: Notwithstanding , lest we should offend them , go thou to the sea , and cast an hook , and take up the fish that first cometh up ; and when thou hast opened his mouth , thou shalt find a piece of money : that take , and give unto them for me and thee .
text2: Lakini kusudi tusiwakwaze , nenda ziwani ukatupe ndoana ; chukua samaki wa kwanza atakayenaswa , fungua kinywa chake , na ndani utakuta fedha taslimu ya zaka . Ichukue ukawape kwa ajili yangu na kwa ajili yako . "

text: At the same time came the disciples unto Jesus , saying , Who is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven ?
text2: Wakati ule wanafunzi walimwendea Yesu , wakamwuliza , " Ni nani aliye mkuu katika Ufalme wa mbinguni ? "

text: And Jesus called a little child unto him , and set him in the midst of them ,
text2: Yesu akamwita mtoto mmoja , akamsimamisha kati yao ,

text: And said , Verily I say unto you , Except ye be converted , and become as little children , ye shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: kisha akasema , " Nawaambieni kweli , msipogeuka na kuwa kama watoto , hamtaingia kamwe katika Ufalme wa mbinguni .

text: Whosoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child , the same is greatest in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Yeyote anayejinyenyekesha kama mtoto huyu , huyo ndiye aliye mkubwa katika Ufalme wa mbinguni .

text: And whoso shall receive one such little child in my name receiveth me .
text2: Yeyote anayemkaribisha mtoto mmoja kama huyu kwa jina langu , ananikaribisha mimi .

text: But whoso shall offend one of these little ones which believe in me , it were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea .
text2: " Yeyote atakayemkosesha mmoja wa hawa wadogo wanaoniamini , ingekuwa afadhali afungwe shingoni jiwe kubwa la kusagia na kuzamishwa kwenye kilindi cha bahari .

text: Woe unto the world because of offences ! for it must needs be that offences come ; but woe to that man by whom the offence cometh !
text2: Ole wake ulimwengu kwa sababu ya vikwazo vinavyowaangusha wengine . Vikwazo hivyo ni lazima vitokee lakini ole wake mtu yule atakayevisababisha .

text: Wherefore if thy hand or thy foot offend thee , cut them off , and cast them from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life halt or maimed , rather than having two hands or two feet to be cast into everlasting fire .
text2: " Kama mkono au mguu wako ukikukosesha , ukate na kuutupa mbali nawe . Ni afadhali kwako kuingia katika uzima bila mkono au mguu , kuliko kutupwa katika moto wa milele ukiwa na mikono miwili na miguu yako miwili .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life with one eye , rather than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire .
text2: Na kama jicho lako likikukosesha , ling ' oe na kulitupa mbali nawe . Ni afadhali kwako kuingia katika uzima ukiwa chongo , kuliko kutupwa katika moto wa Jehanamu ukiwa na macho yako yote mawili .

text: Take heed that ye despise not one of these little ones ; for I say unto you , That in heaven their angels do always behold the face of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: " Jihadharini ! Msimdharau mmojawapo wa wadogo hawa . Nawaambieni , malaika wao huko mbinguni wako daima mbele ya Baba yangu aliye mbinguni .

text: For the Son of man is come to save that which was lost .
text2: Maana Mwana wa Mtu alikuja kuwaokoa wale waliopotea .

text: How think ye ? if a man have an hundred sheep , and one of them be gone astray , doth he not leave the ninety and nine , and goeth into the mountains , and seeketh that which is gone astray ?
text2: Mnaonaje ? Mtu akiwa na kondoo mia , akimpoteza mmoja , hufanyaje ? Huwaacha wale tisini na tisa mlimani , na huenda kumtafuta yule aliyepotea .

text: And if so be that he find it , verily I say unto you , he rejoiceth more of that sheep , than of the ninety and nine which went not astray .
text2: Akimpata , nawaambieni kweli , humfurahia huyo kuliko awafurahiavyo wale tisini na tisa ambao hawakupotea .

text: Even so it is not the will of your Father which is in heaven , that one of these little ones should perish .
text2: Hali kadhalika , Baba yenu wa mbinguni hapendi hata mmoja wa hawa wadogo apotee .

text: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee , go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone : if he shall hear thee , thou hast gained thy brother .
text2: " Ndugu yako akikukosea , mwendee ukamwonye mkiwa ninyi peke yenu . Akikusikia utakuwa umempata ndugu yako .

text: But if he will not hear thee , then take with thee one or two more , that in the mouth of two or three witnesses every word may be established .
text2: Asipokusikia , chukua mtu mmoja au wawili pamoja nawe , ili kwa mawaidha ya mashahidi wawili au watatu , kila tatizo litatuliwe .

text: And if he shall neglect to hear them , tell it unto the church : but if he neglect to hear the church , let him be unto thee as an heathen man and a publican .
text2: Asipowasikia hao , liambie kanisa . Na kama hatalisikia kanisa , na awe kwako kama watu wasiomjua Mungu na watoza ushuru .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: " Nawaambieni kweli , mtakachofunga duniani kitafungwa mbinguni , na mtakachofungua duniani kitafunguliwa mbinguni .

text: Again I say unto you , That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask , it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Tena nawaambieni , wawili miongoni mwenu wakikubaliana hapa duniani kuhusu jambo lolote la kuomba , Baba yangu wa mbinguni atawafanyia jambo hilo .

text: For where two or three are gathered together in my name , there am I in the midst of them .
text2: Kwa maana popote pale wanapokusanyika wawili au watatu kwa jina langu , mimi nipo hapo kati yao . "

text: Then came Peter to him , and said , Lord , how oft shall my brother sin against me , and I forgive him ? till seven times ?
text2: Kisha Petro akamwendea Yesu , akamwuliza , " Je , ndugu yangu akinikosea , nimsamehe mara ngapi ? Mara saba ? "

text: Jesus saith unto him , I say not unto thee , Until seven times : but , Until seventy times seven .
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Sisemi mara saba tu , bali sabini mara saba .

text: Therefore is the kingdom of heaven likened unto a certain king , which would take account of his servants .
text2: Ndiyo maana Ufalme wa mbinguni umefanana na mfalme mmoja aliyeamua kukagua hesabu za watumishi wake .

text: And when he had begun to reckon , one was brought unto him , which owed him ten thousand talents .
text2: Ukaguzi ulipoanza , akaletewa mtu mmoja aliyekuwa na deni la fedha talanta elfu kumi .

text: But forasmuch as he had not to pay , his lord commanded him to be sold , and his wife , and children , and all that he had , and payment to be made .
text2: Mtu huyo hakuwa na chochote cha kulipa ; hivyo bwana wake aliamuru wauzwe , yeye , mke wake , watoto wake na vitu vyote alivyokuwa navyo , ili deni lilipwe .

text: The servant therefore fell down , and worshipped him , saying , Lord , have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Basi , huyo mtumishi akapiga magoti mbele yake , akasema , Unisubiri nami nitakulipa deni lote .

text: Then the lord of that servant was moved with compassion , and loosed him , and forgave him the debt .
text2: Yule bwana alimwonea huruma , akamsamehe lile deni , akamwacha aende zake .

text: But the same servant went out , and found one of his fellowservants , which owed him an hundred pence : and he laid hands on him , and took him by the throat , saying , Pay me that thou owest .
text2: " Lakini huyo mtumishi akaondoka , akamkuta mmoja wa watumishi wenzake aliyekuwa na deni lake fedha denari mia moja . Akamkamata , akamkaba koo akisema , Lipa deni lako !

text: And his fellowservant fell down at his feet , and besought him , saying , Have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Huyo mtumishi mwenzake akapiga magoti , akamwomba , Unisubiri nami nitalipa deni langu lote .

text: And he would not : but went and cast him into prison , till he should pay the debt .
text2: Lakini yeye hakutaka , bali alimtia gerezani mpaka hapo atakapolipa lile deni .

text: So when his fellowservants saw what was done , they were very sorry , and came and told unto their lord all that was done .
text2: " Basi , watumishi wenzake walipoona jambo hilo walisikitika sana , wakaenda kumpasha habari bwana wao juu ya mambo hayo yaliyotukia .

text: Then his lord , after that he had called him , said unto him , O thou wicked servant , I forgave thee all that debt , because thou desiredst me :
text2: Hapo yule bwana alimwita huyo mtumishi , akamwambia , Wewe ni mtumishi mbaya sana ! Uliniomba , nami nikakusamehe deni lako lote .

text: Shouldest not thou also have had compassion on thy fellowservant , even as I had pity on thee ?
text2: Je , haikukupasa nawe kumhurumia mtumishi mwenzako kama nilivyokuhurumia ?

text: And his lord was wroth , and delivered him to the tormentors , till he should pay all that was due unto him .
text2: " Basi , huyo bwana alikasirika sana , akamtoa huyo mtumishi aadhibiwe mpaka hapo atakapolipa deni lote .

text: So likewise shall my heavenly Father do also unto you , if ye from your hearts forgive not every one his brother their trespasses .
text2: Na baba yangu aliye mbinguni atawafanyieni vivyo hivyo kama kila mmoja wenu hatamsamehe ndugu yake kwa moyo wake wote . "

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these sayings , he departed from Galilee , and came into the coasts of Judaea beyond Jordan ;
text2: Yesu alipomaliza kusema maneno hayo , alitoka Galilaya , akaenda katika mkoa wa Yudea , ng ' ambo ya mto Yordani .

text: And great multitudes followed him ; and he healed them there .
text2: Watu wengi walimfuata huko , naye akawaponya .

text: The Pharisees also came unto him , tempting him , and saying unto him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife for every cause ?
text2: Mafarisayo kadhaa walimjia , wakamwuliza kwa kumtega , " Je , ni halali mume kumpa talaka mkewe kwa kisa chochote ? "

text: And he answered and said unto them , Have ye not read , that he which made them at the beginning made them male and female ,
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Je , hamkusoma katika Maandiko Matakatifu kwamba Mungu aliyemuumba mtu tangu mwanzo alimfanya mwanamume na mwanamke ,

text: And said , For this cause shall a man leave father and mother , and shall cleave to his wife : and they twain shall be one flesh ?
text2: na akasema : Kwa sababu hiyo mwanamume atamwacha baba yake na mama yake , ataungana na mke wake , nao wawili watakuwa mwili mmoja ?

text: Wherefore they are no more twain , but one flesh . What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Kwa hiyo wao si wawili tena , bali mwili mmoja . Basi , alichounganisha Mungu , binadamu asikitenganishe . "

text: They say unto him , Why did Moses then command to give a writing of divorcement , and to put her away ?
text2: Lakini wao wakamwuliza , " Kwa nini basi , Mose alituagiza mwanamke apewe hati ya talaka na kuachwa ? "

text: He saith unto them , Moses because of the hardness of your hearts suffered you to put away your wives : but from the beginning it was not so .
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Mose aliwaruhusu kuwaacha wake zenu kwa sababu ya ugumu wa mioyo yenu .

text: And I say unto you , Whosoever shall put away his wife , except it be for fornication , and shall marry another , committeth adultery : and whoso marrieth her which is put away doth commit adultery .
text2: Lakini haikuwa hivyo tangu mwanzo . Basi nawaambieni , yeyote atakayemwacha mke wake isipokuwa kwa sababu ya uzinzi , akaoa mke mwingine , anazini . "

text: His disciples say unto him , If the case of the man be so with his wife , it is not good to marry .
text2: Wanafunzi wake wakamwambia , " Ikiwa mambo ya mume na mkewe ni hivyo , ni afadhali kutooa kabisa . "

text: But he said unto them , All men cannot receive this saying , save they to whom it is given .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Si wote wanaoweza kulipokea fundisho hili , isipokuwa tu wale waliojaliwa na Mungu .

text: For there are some eunuchs , which were so born from their mother ' s womb : and there are some eunuchs , which were made eunuchs of men : and there be eunuchs , which have made themselves eunuchs for the kingdom of heaven ' s sake . He that is able to receive it , let him receive it .
text2: Maana kuna sababu kadhaa za kutoweza kuoa : wengine ni kwa sababu wamezaliwa hivyo , wengine kwa sababu wamefanywa hivyo na watu , na wengine wameamua kutooa kwa ajili ya Ufalme wa mbinguni . Awezaye kulipokea fundisho hili na alipokee . "

text: Then were there brought unto him little children , that he should put his hands on them , and pray : and the disciples rebuked them .
text2: Kisha watu wakamletea Yesu watoto wadogo ili awawekee mikono na kuwaombea . Lakini wanafunzi wakawakemea .

text: But Jesus said , Suffer little children , and forbid them not , to come unto me : for of such is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Yesu akasema , " Waacheni hao watoto waje kwangu , wala msiwazuie ; maana Ufalme wa mbinguni ni wa watu walio kama watoto hawa . "

text: And he laid his hands on them , and departed thence .
text2: Basi , akawawekea mikono , kisha akaondoka mahali hapo .

text: And , behold , one came and said unto him , Good Master , what good thing shall I do , that I may have eternal life ?
text2: Mtu mmoja alimjia Yesu , akamwuliza , " Mwalimu , nifanye kitu gani chema ili niupate uzima wa milele ? "

text: And he said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God : but if thou wilt enter into life , keep the commandments .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Mbona unaniuliza kuhusu jambo jema ? Kuna mmoja tu aliye mwema . Ukitaka kuingia katika uzima , shika amri . "

text: He saith unto him , Which ? Jesus said , Thou shalt do no murder , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness ,
text2: Yule mtu akamwuliza , " Amri zipi ? " Yesu akasema , " Usiue , usizini , usiibe , usitoe ushahidi wa uongo ,

text: Honour thy father and thy mother : and , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: waheshimu baba yako na mama yako ; na , mpende jirani yako kama unavyojipenda mwenyewe . "
