text: The young man saith unto him , All these things have I kept from my youth up : what lack I yet ?
text2: Huyo kijana akamwambia , " Hayo yote nimeyazingatia tangu utoto wangu ; sasa nifanye nini zaidi ? "

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou wilt be perfect , go and sell that thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come and follow me .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Kama unapenda kuwa mkamilifu , nenda ukauze mali yako uwape maskini hiyo fedha , nawe utakuwa na hazina mbinguni , kisha njoo unifuate . "

text: But when the young man heard that saying , he went away sorrowful : for he had great possessions .
text2: Huyo kijana aliposikia hayo , alienda zake akiwa mwenye huzuni , maana alikuwa na mali nyingi .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , Verily I say unto you , That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Hapo Yesu akawaambia wanafunzi wake , " Kweli nawaambieni , itakuwa vigumu sana kwa tajiri kuingia katika Ufalme wa mbinguni .

text: And again I say unto you , It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Tena nawaambieni , ni rahisi zaidi kwa ngamia kupita katika tundu la sindano , kuliko kwa tajiri kuingia katika Ufalme wa mbinguni . "

text: When his disciples heard it , they were exceedingly amazed , saying , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Wale wanafunzi waliposikia hivyo walishangaa , wakamwuliza , " Ni nani basi , awezaye kuokoka ? "

text: But Jesus beheld them , and said unto them , With men this is impossible ; but with God all things are possible .
text2: Yesu akawatazama , akasema , " Kwa binadamu jambo hili haliwezekani , lakini kwa Mungu mambo yote huwezekana . "

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Behold , we have forsaken all , and followed thee ; what shall we have therefore ?
text2: Kisha Petro akasema , " Na sisi je ? Tumeacha yote tukakufuata ; tutapata nini basi ? "

text: And Jesus said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That ye which have followed me , in the regeneration when the Son of man shall sit in the throne of his glory , ye also shall sit upon twelve thrones , judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Nawaambieni kweli , Mwana wa Mtu atakapoketi katika kiti cha enzi cha utukufu wake katika ulimwengu mpya , ninyi mlionifuata mtaketi katika viti kumi na viwili mkiyahukumu makabila kumi na mawili ya Israeli .

text: And every one that hath forsaken houses , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my name ' s sake , shall receive an hundredfold , and shall inherit everlasting life .
text2: Na kila aliyeacha nyumba , au ndugu , au dada , au baba , au mama , au watoto , au mashamba , kwa ajili yangu , atapokea mara mia zaidi , na kupata uzima wa milele .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last shall be first .
text2: Lakini walio wa kwanza watakuwa wa mwisho , na walio wa mwisho watakuwa wa kwanza .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which went out early in the morning to hire labourers into his vineyard .
text2: " Ufalme wa mbinguni unafanana na mtu mwenye shamba la mizabibu , ambaye alitoka asubuhi na mapema kuwaajiri wafanyakazi katika shamba lake .

text: And when he had agreed with the labourers for a penny a day , he sent them into his vineyard .
text2: Akapatana nao kuwalipa dinari moja kwa siku , kisha akawapeleka katika shamba lake la mizabibu .

text: And he went out about the third hour , and saw others standing idle in the marketplace ,
text2: Akatoka mnamo saa tatu asubuhi , akaona watu wengine wamesimama sokoni , hawana kazi .

text: And said unto them ; Go ye also into the vineyard , and whatsoever is right I will give you . And they went their way .
text2: Akawaambia , Nendeni nanyi mkafanye kazi katika shamba la mizabibu , nami nitawapeni haki yenu .

text: Again he went out about the sixth and ninth hour , and did likewise .
text2: Basi , wakaenda . Huyo mwenye shamba akatoka tena mnamo saa sita na saa tisa , akafanya vivyo hivyo .

text: And about the eleventh hour he went out , and found others standing idle , and saith unto them , Why stand ye here all the day idle ?
text2: Hata mnamo saa kumi na moja jioni , akatoka tena ; akakuta watu wengine wamesimama pale sokoni . Basi , akawauliza , Mbona mmesimama hapa mchana kutwa bila kazi ?

text: They say unto him , Because no man hath hired us . He saith unto them , Go ye also into the vineyard ; and whatsoever is right , that shall ye receive .
text2: Wakamjibu : Kwa sababu hakuna mtu aliyetuajiri . Yeye akawaambia , Nendeni nanyi mkafanye kazi katika shamba la mizabibu .

text: So when even was come , the lord of the vineyard saith unto his steward , Call the labourers , and give them their hire , beginning from the last unto the first .
text2: " Kulipokuchwa , huyo mwenye shamba alimwambia mtunza hazina wake , Waite wafanyakazi ukawalipe mshahara wao , ukianzia na wale walioajiriwa mwisho , na kumalizia na wale wa kwanza .

text: And when they came that were hired about the eleventh hour , they received every man a penny .
text2: Basi , wakaja wale walioajiriwa mnamo saa kumi na moja , wakapokea kila mmoja dinari moja .

text: But when the first came , they supposed that they should have received more ; and they likewise received every man a penny .
text2: Wale wa kwanza walipofika , walikuwa wanadhani watapewa zaidi ; lakini hata wao wakapewa kila mmoja dinari moja .

text: And when they had received it , they murmured against the goodman of the house ,
text2: Wakazipokea fedha zao , wakaanza kumnung ' unikia yule bwana .

text: Saying , These last have wrought but one hour , and thou hast made them equal unto us , which have borne the burden and heat of the day .
text2: Wakasema , Watu hawa walioajiriwa mwisho walifanya kazi kwa muda wa saa moja tu , mbona umetutendea sawa na wao hali sisi tumevumilia kazi ngumu kutwa na jua kali ?

text: But he answered one of them , and said , Friend , I do thee no wrong : didst not thou agree with me for a penny ?
text2: " Hapo yule bwana akamjibu mmoja wao , Rafiki , sikukupunja kitu ! Je , hukupatana nami mshahara wa denari moja ?

text: Take that thine is , and go thy way : I will give unto this last , even as unto thee .
text2: Chukua haki yako , uende zako . Napenda kumpa huyu wa mwisho sawa na wewe .

text: Is it not lawful for me to do what I will with mine own ? Is thine eye evil , because I am good ?
text2: Je , sina haki ya kufanya na mali yangu nipendavyo ? Je , unaona kijicho kwa kuwa mimi ni mwema ? "

text: So the last shall be first , and the first last : for many be called , but few chosen .
text2: Yesu akamaliza kwa kusema , " Hivyo , walio wa mwisho watakuwa wa kwanza na wa kwanza watakuwa wa mwisho . "

text: And Jesus going up to Jerusalem took the twelve disciples apart in the way , and said unto them ,
text2: Yesu alipokuwa anakwenda Yerusalemu , aliwachukua wale wanafunzi kumi na wawili faraghani , na njiani akawaambia ,

text: Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be betrayed unto the chief priests and unto the scribes , and they shall condemn him to death ,
text2: " Sikilizeni ! Tunakwenda Yerusalemu , na huko Mwana wa Mtu atakabidhiwa kwa makuhani wakuu na walimu wa Sheria , nao watamhukumu auawe .

text: And shall deliver him to the Gentiles to mock , and to scourge , and to crucify him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Watamkabidhi kwa watu wa mataifa mengine ili adhihakiwe , apigwe viboko na kusulubiwa ; lakini siku ya tatu atafufuliwa . "

text: Then came to him the mother of Zebedee ' s children with her sons , worshipping him , and desiring a certain thing of him .
text2: Hapo mama yao wana wa Zebedayo alimjia Yesu pamoja na wanawe , akapiga magoti mbele yake na kumwomba kitu .

text: And he said unto her , What wilt thou ? She saith unto him , Grant that these my two sons may sit , the one on thy right hand , and the other on the left , in thy kingdom .
text2: Yesu akamwuliza , " Unataka nini ? " Huyo mama akamwambia , " Ahidi kwamba katika Ufalme wako , hawa wanangu wawili watakaa mmoja upande wako wa kulia na mwingine upande wako wa kushoto . "

text: But Jesus answered and said , Ye know not what ye ask . Are ye able to drink of the cup that I shall drink of , and to be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ? They say unto him , We are able .
text2: Yesu akajibu , " Hamjui mnaomba nini . Je , mnaweza kunywa kikombe nitakachokunywa mimi ? " Wakamjibu , " Tunaweza . "

text: And he saith unto them , Ye shall drink indeed of my cup , and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with : but to sit on my right hand , and on my left , is not mine to give , but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared of my Father .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Kweli mtakunywa kikombe changu , lakini kuketi kulia au kushoto kwangu si kazi yangu kupanga ; jambo hilo watapewa wale waliowekewa tayari na Baba yangu . "

text: And when the ten heard it , they were moved with indignation against the two brethren .
text2: Wale wanafunzi wengine kumi waliposikia hayo , wakawakasirikia hao ndugu wawili .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Ye know that the princes of the Gentiles exercise dominion over them , and they that are great exercise authority upon them .
text2: Hivyo Yesu akawaita , akawaambia , " Mnajua kwamba watawala wa mataifa hutawala watu wao kwa mabavu na wakuu hao huwamiliki watu wao .

text: But it shall not be so among you : but whosoever will be great among you , let him be your minister ;
text2: Lakini kwenu isiwe hivyo , ila yeyote anayetaka kuwa mkuu kati yenu sharti awe mtumishi wa wote ;

text: And whosoever will be chief among you , let him be your servant :
text2: na anayetaka kuwa wa kwanza kati yenu sharti awe mtumishi wenu .

text: Even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Jinsi hiyohiyo , Mwana wa Mtu hakuja kutumikiwa , bali kutumikia na kutoa maisha yake kuwa fidia ya watu wengi . "

text: And as they departed from Jericho , a great multitude followed him .
text2: Yesu alipokuwa anaondoka mjini Yeriko , umati wa watu ulimfuata .

text: And , behold , two blind men sitting by the way side , when they heard that Jesus passed by , cried out , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Basi , kulikuwa na vipofu wawili wameketi kando ya njia , na waliposikia kwamba Yesu alikuwa anapitia hapo , walipaaza sauti : " Mheshimiwa , Mwana wa Daudi , utuhurumie ! "

text: And the multitude rebuked them , because they should hold their peace : but they cried the more , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Ule umati wa watu ukawakemea na kuwaambia wanyamaze . Lakini wao wakazidi kupaaza sauti : " Mheshimiwa , Mwana wa Daudi , utuhurumie ! "

text: And Jesus stood still , and called them , and said , What will ye that I shall do unto you ?
text2: Yesu akasimama , akawaita na kuwauliza , " Mnataka niwafanyie nini ? "

text: They say unto him , Lord , that our eyes may be opened .
text2: Wakamjibu , " Mheshimiwa , tunaomba macho yetu yafumbuliwe . "

text: So Jesus had compassion on them , and touched their eyes : and immediately their eyes received sight , and they followed him .
text2: Basi , Yesu akawaonea huruma , akawagusa macho yao , na papo hapo wakaweza kuona , wakamfuata .

text: And when they drew nigh unto Jerusalem , and were come to Bethphage , unto the mount of Olives , then sent Jesus two disciples ,
text2: Yesu na wanafunzi wake walipokaribia Yerusalemu na kufika Bethfage katika mlima wa Mizeituni , aliwatuma wanafunzi wake wawili ,

text: Saying unto them , Go into the village over against you , and straightway ye shall find an ass tied , and a colt with her : loose them , and bring them unto me .
text2: akawaambia , " Nendeni hadi kijiji kilicho mbele yenu na mtamkuta punda amefungwa na mtoto wake . Wafungueni mkawalete kwangu .

text: And if any man say ought unto you , ye shall say , The Lord hath need of them ; and straightway he will send them .
text2: Kama mtu akiwauliza sababu , mwambieni , Bwana anawahitaji , naye atawaachieni mara . "

text: All this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Jambo hili lilifanyika ili yale yaliyosemwa na nabii yatimie :

text: Tell ye the daughter of Sion , Behold , thy King cometh unto thee , meek , and sitting upon an ass , and a colt the foal of an ass .
text2: " Uambieni mji wa Sioni : Tazama , Mfalme wako anakujia ! Ni mpole na amepanda punda , mwana punda , mtoto wa punda . "

text: And the disciples went , and did as Jesus commanded them ,
text2: Hivyo , wale wanafunzi walienda wakafanya kama Yesu alivyowaagiza .

text: And brought the ass , and the colt , and put on them their clothes , and they set him thereon .
text2: Wakamleta yule punda na mtoto wake , wakatandika nguo zao juu yao na Yesu akaketi juu yake .

text: And a very great multitude spread their garments in the way ; others cut down branches from the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Umati mkubwa wa watu ukatandaza nguo zao barabarani , na watu wengine wakakata matawi ya miti wakayatandaza barabarani .

text: And the multitudes that went before , and that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna to the Son of David : Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord ; Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Makundi ya watu waliomtangulia na wale waliomfuata wakapaaza sauti : " Hosana Mwana wa Daudi ! Abarikiwe huyo ajaye kwa jina la Bwana ! Hosana Mungu juu mbinguni ! "

text: And when he was come into Jerusalem , all the city was moved , saying , Who is this ?
text2: Yesu alipokuwa anaingia Yerusalemu , mji wote ukajaa ghasia . Watu wakawa wanauliza , " Huyu ni nani ? "

text: And the multitude said , This is Jesus the prophet of Nazareth of Galilee .
text2: Watu katika ule umati wakasema , " Huyu ni nabii Yesu , kutoka Nazareti katika mkoa wa Galilaya . "

text: And Jesus went into the temple of God , and cast out all them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ,
text2: Basi , Yesu akaingia Hekaluni , akawafukuza nje watu waliokuwa wanauza na kununua vitu ndani ya Hekalu ; akazipindua meza za wale waliokuwa wanavunja fedha , na viti vya wale waliokuwa wanauza njiwa .

text: And said unto them , It is written , My house shall be called the house of prayer ; but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Akawaambia , " Imeandikwa katika Maandiko Matakatifu : Nyumba yangu itaitwa nyumba ya sala . Lakini ninyi mmeifanya kuwa pango la wanyang ' anyi . "

text: And the blind and the lame came to him in the temple ; and he healed them .
text2: Vipofu na vilema walimwendea huko Hekaluni , naye Yesu akawaponya .

text: And when the chief priests and scribes saw the wonderful things that he did , and the children crying in the temple , and saying , Hosanna to the Son of David ; they were sore displeased ,
text2: Basi , makuhani wakuu na walimu wa Sheria walipoyaona maajabu aliyoyafanya Yesu , na pia watoto walipokuwa wanapaaza sauti zao Hekaluni wakisema : " Sifa kwa Mwana wa Daudi , " wakakasirika .

text: And said unto him , Hearest thou what these say ? And Jesus saith unto them , Yea ; have ye never read , Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings thou hast perfected praise ?
text2: Hivyo wakamwambia , " Je , husikii wanachosema ? " Yesu akawajibu , " Naam , nasikia ! Je hamjasoma Maandiko haya Matakatifu ? Kwa vinywa vya watoto wadogo na wanyonyao unajipatia sifa kamilifu . "

text: And he left them , and went out of the city into Bethany ; and he lodged there .
text2: Basi , akawaacha , akatoka nje ya mji na kwenda Bethania , akalala huko .

text: Now in the morning as he returned into the city , he hungered .
text2: Yesu alipokuwa anarudi mjini asubuhi na mapema , aliona njaa .

text: And when he saw a fig tree in the way , he came to it , and found nothing thereon , but leaves only , and said unto it , Let no fruit grow on thee henceforward for ever . And presently the fig tree withered away .
text2: Akauona mtini mmoja kando ya njia , akauendea ; lakini aliukuta hauma chochote ila majani matupu . Basi akauambia , " Usizae tena matunda milele ! " Papo hapo huo mtini ukanyauka .

text: And when the disciples saw it , they marvelled , saying , How soon is the fig tree withered away !
text2: Wanafunzi walipouona walishangaa wakisema , " Kwa nini mtini huu umenyauka ghafla ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Verily I say unto you , If ye have faith , and doubt not , ye shall not only do this which is done to the fig tree , but also if ye shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; it shall be done .
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Kweli nawaambieni , kama mkiwa na imani bila kuwa na mashaka , mnaweza si tu kufanya hivyo , bali hata mkiuambia mlima huu : Ng ' oka ukajitose baharini , itafanyika hivyo .

text: And all things , whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer , believing , ye shall receive .
text2: Na mkiwa na imani , chochote mtakachoomba katika sala , mtapata . "

text: And when he was come into the temple , the chief priests and the elders of the people came unto him as he was teaching , and said , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority ?
text2: Yesu aliingia Hekaluni , akawa anafundisha . Alipokuwa akifundisha , makuhani wakuu na wazee wa watu wakamwuliza , " Unafanya mambo haya kwa mamlaka gani ? Nani amekupa mamlaka haya ? "

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I also will ask you one thing , which if ye tell me , I in like wise will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Na mimi nitawaulizeni swali moja ; mkinijibu , basi nami nitawaambieni ninafanya mambo haya kwa mamlaka gani .

text: The baptism of John , whence was it ? from heaven , or of men ? And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say unto us , Why did ye not then believe him ?
text2: Je , mamlaka ya Yohane ya kubatiza yalitoka kwa nani ? Je , yalitoka mbinguni ama kwa watu ? " Lakini wakajadiliana wao kwa wao hivi : " Tukisema , Yalitoka mbinguni , atatuuliza , Basi , mbona hamkumsadiki ?

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; we fear the people ; for all hold John as a prophet .
text2: Na tukisema , Yalitoka kwa watu , tunaogopa umati wa watu maana wote wanakubali kwamba Yohane ni nabii . "

text: And they answered Jesus , and said , We cannot tell . And he said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Basi , wakamjibu , " Hatujui ! " Naye Yesu akawaambia , " Nami pia sitawaambieni ninafanya mambo haya kwa mamlaka gani .

text: But what think ye ? A certain man had two sons ; and he came to the first , and said , Son , go work to day in my vineyard .
text2: " Ninyi mnaonaje ; mtu mmoja alikuwa na wana wawili . Akamwambia yule wa kwanza , Mwanangu , leo nenda ukafanye kazi katika shamba la mizabibu .

text: He answered and said , I will not : but afterward he repented , and went .
text2: Yule kijana akamwambia , Sitaki ! Lakini baadaye akabadili nia , akaenda kufanya kazi .

text: And he came to the second , and said likewise . And he answered and said , I go , sir : and went not .
text2: Yule baba akamwambia mtoto wake wa pili vivyo hivyo , naye akamjibu , Naam baba ! Lakini hakwenda kazini .

text: Whether of them twain did the will of his father ? They say unto him , The first . Jesus saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That the publicans and the harlots go into the kingdom of God before you .
text2: Je , ni nani kati ya hawa wawili aliyetimiza matakwa ya baba yake ? " Wakamjibu , " Yule mtoto wa kwanza . " Basi , Yesu akawaambia , " Kweli nawaambieni , watoza ushuru na waasherati wataingia katika Ufalme wa Mungu kabla yenu .

text: For John came unto you in the way of righteousness , and ye believed him not : but the publicans and the harlots believed him : and ye , when ye had seen it , repented not afterward , that ye might believe him .
text2: Maana Yohane alikuja kwenu akawaonyesha njia njema ya kuishi , nanyi hamkumwamini ; lakini watoza ushuru na waasherati walimwamini . Hata baada ya kuona hayo yote ninyi hamkubadili mioyo yenu , na hamkusadiki . "

text: Hear another parable : There was a certain householder , which planted a vineyard , and hedged it round about , and digged a winepress in it , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country :
text2: Yesu akasema , " Sikilizeni mfano mwingine . Mtu mmoja mwenye nyumba alilima shamba la mizabibu ; akalizungushia ukuta , akachimba kisima cha kusindikia divai , akajenga humo mnara pia . Kisha akalikodisha kwa wakulima , akasafiri kwenda nchi ya mbali .

text: And when the time of the fruit drew near , he sent his servants to the husbandmen , that they might receive the fruits of it .
text2: Wakati wa mavuno ulipofika , aliwatuma watumishi wake kwa wale wakulima , ili wakachukue sehemu ya mavuno yake .

text: And the husbandmen took his servants , and beat one , and killed another , and stoned another .
text2: Wale wakulima wakawakamata hao watumishi ; mmoja wakampiga , mwingine wakamwua na mwingine wakampiga mawe .

text: Again , he sent other servants more than the first : and they did unto them likewise .
text2: Huyo mtu akawatuma tena watumishi wengine , wengi kuliko wa safari ya kwanza . Wale wakulima wakawatendea namna ileile .

text: But last of all he sent unto them his son , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: Mwishowe akamtuma mwanawe huku akifikiri : Watamheshimu mwanangu .

text: But when the husbandmen saw the son , they said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and let us seize on his inheritance .
text2: Lakini wale wakulima walipomwona mwanawe wakasemezana wao kwa wao : Huyu ndiye mrithi ; na tumuue ili tuuchukue urithi wake !

text: And they caught him , and cast him out of the vineyard , and slew him .
text2: Basi , wakamkamata , wakamtoa nje ya lile shamba la mizabibu , wakamwua .

text: When the lord therefore of the vineyard cometh , what will he do unto those husbandmen ?
text2: " Sasa , huyo mwenye shamba la mizabibu atakapokuja , atawafanyaje hao wakulima ? "

text: They say unto him , He will miserably destroy those wicked men , and will let out his vineyard unto other husbandmen , which shall render him the fruits in their seasons .
text2: Wao wakamjibu , " Atawaangamiza vibaya hao waovu , na lile shamba atawapa wakulima wengine ambao watampa sehemu ya mavuno wakati wa mavuno . "

text: Jesus saith unto them , Did ye never read in the scriptures , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner : this is the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Hapo Yesu akawaambia , " Je , hamkusoma jambo hili katika Maandiko Matakatifu ? Jiwe walilokataa waashi sasa limekuwa jiwe kuu la msingi . Bwana ndiye aliyefanya jambo hili , nalo ni la ajabu sana kwetu !

text: Therefore say I unto you , The kingdom of God shall be taken from you , and given to a nation bringing forth the fruits thereof .
text2: " Kwa hiyo nawaambieni , Ufalme wa Mungu utaondolewa kwenu na kupewa watu wa mataifa mengine wenye kutoa matunda yake . "

text: And whosoever shall fall on this stone shall be broken : but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: " Atakayeanguka juu ya jiwe hilo atavunjika vipandevipande ; na likimwangukia mtu yeyote , litamponda . "

text: And when the chief priests and Pharisees had heard his parables , they perceived that he spake of them .
text2: Makuhani wakuu na Mafarisayo waliposikia hiyo mifano yake walitambua kwamba alikuwa anawasema wao .

text: But when they sought to lay hands on him , they feared the multitude , because they took him for a prophet .
text2: Kwa hiyo wakawa wanatafuta njia ya kumtia nguvuni , lakini waliwaogopa watu kwa sababu wao walimtambua yeye kuwa nabii .

text: And Jesus answered and spake unto them again by parables , and said ,
text2: Yesu alisema nao tena kwa kutumia mifano :

text: The kingdom of heaven is like unto a certain king , which made a marriage for his son ,
text2: " Ufalme wa mbinguni umefanana na mfalme aliyemwandalia mwanawe karamu ya arusi .

text: And sent forth his servants to call them that were bidden to the wedding : and they would not come .
text2: Basi , akawatuma watumishi kuwaita walioalikwa waje arusini , lakini walioalikwa hawakutaka kufika .

text: Again , he sent forth other servants , saying , Tell them which are bidden , Behold , I have prepared my dinner : my oxen and my fatlings are killed , and all things are ready : come unto the marriage .
text2: Akawatuma tena watumishi wengine , akisema , Waambieni wale walioalikwa : karamu yangu iko tayari sasa ; fahali wangu na ng ' ombe wanono wamekwisha chinjwa ; kila kitu ni tayari , njoni arusini .

text: But they made light of it , and went their ways , one to his farm , another to his merchandise :
text2: Lakini wao hawakujali , wakaenda zao ; mmoja shambani kwake , mwingine kwenye shughuli zake ,

text: And the remnant took his servants , and entreated them spitefully , and slew them .
text2: na wengine wakawakamata wale watumishi wakawatukana , wakawaua .

text: But when the king heard thereof , he was wroth : and he sent forth his armies , and destroyed those murderers , and burned up their city .
text2: Yule mfalme akakasirika , akawatuma askari wake wakawaangamize wauaji hao na kuuteketeza mji wao .

text: Then saith he to his servants , The wedding is ready , but they which were bidden were not worthy .
text2: Kisha akawaambia watumishi wake : Karamu ya arusi iko tayari kweli , lakini walioalikwa hawakustahili .

text: Go ye therefore into the highways , and as many as ye shall find , bid to the marriage .
text2: Basi , nendeni kwenye barabara na wowote wale mtakaowakuta waiteni waje arusini .

text: So those servants went out into the highways , and gathered together all as many as they found , both bad and good : and the wedding was furnished with guests .
text2: Wale watumishi wakatoka , wakaenda njiani , wakawaleta watu wote , wabaya na wema . Nyumba ya arusi ikajaa wageni .

text: And when the king came in to see the guests , he saw there a man which had not on a wedding garment :
text2: " Mfalme alipoingia kuwaona wageni , akamwona mtu mmoja ambaye hakuvaa mavazi ya arusi .

text: And he saith unto him , Friend , how camest thou in hither not having a wedding garment ? And he was speechless .
text2: Mfalme akamwuliza , Rafiki , umeingiaje hapa bila vazi la arusi ? Lakini yeye akakaa kimya .

text: Then said the king to the servants , Bind him hand and foot , and take him away , and cast him into outer darkness ; there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Hapo mfalme akawaambia watumishi , Mfungeni miguu na mikono mkamtupe nje gizani ; huko atalia na kusaga meno . "

text: For many are called , but few are chosen .
text2: Yesu akamaliza kwa kusema , " Wengi wamealikwa , lakini wachache wameteuliwa . "

text: Then went the Pharisees , and took counsel how they might entangle him in his talk .
text2: Kisha , Mafarisayo wakaenda zao , wakashauriana jinsi ya kumnasa Yesu kwa maneno yake .

text: And they sent out unto him their disciples with the Herodians , saying , Master , we know that thou art true , and teachest the way of God in truth , neither carest thou for any man : for thou regardest not the person of men .
text2: Basi , wakawatuma wafuasi wao pamoja na wafuasi wa kikundi cha Herode . Wakamwuliza , " Mwalimu , tunajua kwamba wewe ni mtu mwaminifu , na kwamba wafundisha njia ya Mungu kwa uaminifu ; humwogopi mtu yeyote , maana cheo cha mtu si kitu kwako .

text: Tell us therefore , What thinkest thou ? Is it lawful to give tribute unto Caesar , or not ?
text2: Haya , twambie maoni yako . Je , ni halali au la , kulipa Kaisari ? "

text: But Jesus perceived their wickedness , and said , Why tempt ye me , ye hypocrites ?
text2: Lakini Yesu alitambua uovu wao , akawaambia , " Enyi

text: Shew me the tribute money . And they brought unto him a penny .
text2: Nionyesheni fedha ya kulipia kodi . " Nao wakamtolea sarafu ya fedha . sarafu ya fedha .

text: And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ?
text2: Basi , Yesu akawauliza , " Sura na chapa hii ni ya nani ? "

text: They say unto him , Caesar ' s . Then saith he unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which are Caesar ' s ; and unto God the things that are God ' s .
text2: Wakamjibu , " Ni vya Kaisari . " Hapo Yesu akawaambia , " Basi , mpeni Kaisari yaliyo yake Kaisari , na Mungu yaliyo yake Mungu . "

text: When they had heard these words , they marvelled , and left him , and went their way .
text2: Waliposikia hivyo wakashangaa ; wakamwacha , wakaenda zao .

text: The same day came to him the Sadducees , which say that there is no resurrection , and asked him ,
text2: Siku hiyo , baadhi ya Masadukayo walimwendea Yesu . Hao ndio wale wasemao kwamba wafu hawafufuki .

text: Saying , Master , Moses said , If a man die , having no children , his brother shall marry his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: Basi , wakamwambia , " Mwalimu , Mose alisema mtu aliyeoa akifa bila kuacha watoto , lazima ndugu yake amwoe huyo mama mjane , amzalie ndugu yake watoto .

text: Now there were with us seven brethren : and the first , when he had married a wife , deceased , and , having no issue , left his wife unto his brother :
text2: Sasa , hapa petu palikuwa na ndugu saba . Wa kwanza alioa kisha akafa bila kujaliwa watoto , akamwachia ndugu yake huyo mke wake mjane .

text: Likewise the second also , and the third , unto the seventh .
text2: Ikawa vivyo hivyo kwa ndugu wa pili , na wa tatu , mpaka wa saba .

text: And last of all the woman died also .
text2: Baada ya ndugu hao wote kufa , akafa pia yule mama .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife shall she be of the seven ? for they all had her .
text2: Je , siku wafu watakapofufuka mama huyo atakuwa mke wa nani miongoni mwa wale ndugu saba ? Maana Wote saba walimwoa . "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Ye do err , not knowing the scriptures , nor the power of God .
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Kweli mmekosea kwa sababu hamjui Maandiko Matakatifu wala nguvu ya Mungu !

text: For in the resurrection they neither marry , nor are given in marriage , but are as the angels of God in heaven .
text2: Maana wafu watakapofufuliwa hawataoa wala kuolewa , watakuwa kama malaika mbinguni .

text: But as touching the resurrection of the dead , have ye not read that which was spoken unto you by God , saying ,
text2: Lakini kuhusu suala la wafu kufufuka , hamjasoma yale aliyowaambieni Mungu ?

text: I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ? God is not the God of the dead , but of the living .
text2: Aliwaambia , Mimi ni Mungu wa Abrahamu , Isaka na Yakobo ! Basi , yeye si Mungu wa wafu , bali ni Mungu wa walio hai . "

text: And when the multitude heard this , they were astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Ule umati wa watu uliposikia hivyo ukayastaajabia mafundisho yake .

text: But when the Pharisees had heard that he had put the Sadducees to silence , they were gathered together .
text2: Mafarisayo waliposikia kwamba Yesu alikuwa amewanyamazisha Masadukayo , wakakutana pamoja .

text: Then one of them , which was a lawyer , asked him a question , tempting him , and saying ,
text2: Mmoja wao , mwanasheria , akamwuliza Yesu kwa kumjaribu ,

text: Master , which is the great commandment in the law ?
text2: " Mwalimu , ni amri ipi iliyo kuu katika Sheria ya Mose ? "

text: Jesus said unto him , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind .
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Mpende Bwana Mungu wako kwa moyo wako wote , kwa roho yako yote na kwa akili yako yote .

text: This is the first and great commandment .
text2: Hii ndiyo amri kuu ya kwanza .

text: And the second is like unto it , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Ya pili inafanana na hiyo : Mpende jirani yako kama unavyojipenda wewe mwenyewe .

text: On these two commandments hang all the law and the prophets .
text2: Sheria yote ya Mose na mafundisho ya manabii vinategemea amri hizi mbili . "

text: While the Pharisees were gathered together , Jesus asked them ,
text2: Mafarisayo walipokusanyika pamoja , Yesu aliwauliza ,

text: Saying , What think ye of Christ ? whose son is he ? They say unto him , The Son of David .
text2: " Ninyi mwaonaje juu ya Kristo ? Je , ni mwana wa nani ? " Wakamjibu , " Wa Daudi . "

text: He saith unto them , How then doth David in spirit call him Lord , saying ,
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Basi , inawezekanaje kwamba kwa nguvu ya Roho Mtakatifu Daudi anamwita yeye Bwana ? Maana alisema :

text: The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: Bwana alimwambia Bwana wangu : keti upande wangu wa kulia , mpaka niwaweke adui zako chini ya miguu yako .

text: If David then call him Lord , how is he his son ?
text2: Basi , ikiwa Daudi anamwita Kristo Bwana , anawezaje kuwa mwanawe ? "

text: And no man was able to answer him a word , neither durst any man from that day forth ask him any more questions .
text2: Hakuna mtu yeyote aliyeweza kumjibu neno . Na tangu siku hiyo hakuna aliyethubutu tena kumwuliza swali .

text: Then spake Jesus to the multitude , and to his disciples ,
text2: Kisha Yesu akauambia umati wa watu pamoja na wanafunzi wake ,

text: Saying , The scribes and the Pharisees sit in Moses ' seat :
text2: " Walimu wa Sheria na Mafarisayo wana mamlaka ya kufafanua Sheria ya Mose .

text: All therefore whatsoever they bid you observe , that observe and do ; but do not ye after their works : for they say , and do not .
text2: Kwa hiyo shikeni na kutekeleza chochote watakachowaambieni . Lakini msiyaige matendo yao , maana hawatekelezi yale wanayoyahubiri .

text: For they bind heavy burdens and grievous to be borne , and lay them on men ' s shoulders ; but they themselves will not move them with one of their fingers .
text2: Hufunga mizigo mizito na kuwatwika watu mabegani , lakini wao wenyewe hawataki kunyosha hata kidole wapate kuibeba .

text: But all their works they do for to be seen of men : they make broad their phylacteries , and enlarge the borders of their garments ,
text2: Wao hufanya matendo yao yote ili watu wawaone . Huvaa tepe zenye maandishi ya Sheria juu ya panda la uso na mikononi na hupanua pindo za makoti yao .

text: And love the uppermost rooms at feasts , and the chief seats in the synagogues ,
text2: Hupenda nafasi za heshima katika karamu na viti vya heshima katika masunagogi .

text: And greetings in the markets , and to be called of men , Rabbi , Rabbi .
text2: Hupenda kusalimiwa kwa heshima sokoni na kupendelea kuitwa na watu : Mwalimu .

text: But be not ye called Rabbi : for one is your Master , even Christ ; and all ye are brethren .
text2: Lakini ninyi msiitwe kamwe Mwalimu , maana mwalimu wenu ni mmoja tu , nanyi nyote ni ndugu .

text: And call no man your father upon the earth : for one is your Father , which is in heaven .
text2: Wala msimwite mtu yeyote Baba hapa duniani , maana Baba yenu ni mmoja tu aliye mbinguni .

text: Neither be ye called masters : for one is your Master , even Christ .
text2: Wala msiitwe Viongozi , maana kiongozi wenu ni mmoja tu , ndiye Kristo .

text: But he that is greatest among you shall be your servant .
text2: Aliye mkubwa miongoni mwenu ni lazima awe mtumishi wenu .

text: And whosoever shall exalt himself shall be abased ; and he that shall humble himself shall be exalted .
text2: Anayejikweza atashushwa , na anayejishusha atakwezwa .

text: But woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye shut up the kingdom of heaven against men : for ye neither go in yourselves , neither suffer ye them that are entering to go in .
text2: " Ole wenu walimu wa Sheria na Mafarisayo , wanafiki ! Mnaufunga mlango wa Ufalme wa mbinguni mbele ya macho ya watu . Ninyi wenyewe hamwingii ndani , wala hamwaruhusu wanaotaka kuingia waingie .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayer : therefore ye shall receive the greater damnation .
text2: Ole wenu walimu wa Sheria na Mafarisayo , wanafiki ! Mnawanyonya wajane na kujisingizia kuwa watu wema kwa kusali sala ndefu . Kwa sababu hiyo mtapata adhabu kali .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye compass sea and land to make one proselyte , and when he is made , ye make him twofold more the child of hell than yourselves .
text2: " Ole wenu walimu wa Sheria na Mafarisayo , wanafiki ! Mnasafiri baharini na nchi kavu ili kumpata mtu mmoja afuate dini yenu . Mnapompata , mnamfanya astahili maradufu kwenda katika moto wa Jehanamu kuliko ninyi wenyewe .

text: Woe unto you , ye blind guides , which say , Whosoever shall swear by the temple , it is nothing ; but whosoever shall swear by the gold of the temple , he is a debtor !
text2: " Ole wenu viongozi vipofu ! Ninyi mwasema ati mtu akiapa kwa Hekalu , kiapo hicho si kitu ; lakini akiapa kwa dhahabu ya Hekalu , kiapo hicho kinamshika .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gold , or the temple that sanctifieth the gold ?
text2: Enyi vipofu wapumbavu ! Kipi kilicho cha maana zaidi : dhahabu au Hekalu linalofanya hiyo dhahabu kuwa takatifu ?

text: And , Whosoever shall swear by the altar , it is nothing ; but whosoever sweareth by the gift that is upon it , he is guilty .
text2: Tena mwasema ati mtu akiapa kwa madhabahu si kitu ; lakini akiapa kwa zawadi iliyowekwa juu ya madhabahu , kiapo hicho humshika .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gift , or the altar that sanctifieth the gift ?
text2: Enyi vipofu ! Ni kipi kilicho cha maana zaidi : ile zawadi , au madhabahu ambayo hufanya hiyo zawadi kuwa takatifu ?

text: Whoso therefore shall swear by the altar , sweareth by it , and by all things thereon .
text2: Anayeapa kwa madhabahu ameapa kwa hiyo madhabahu , na kwa chochote kilichowekwa juu yake .

text: And whoso shall swear by the temple , sweareth by it , and by him that dwelleth therein .
text2: Na anayeapa kwa Hekalu ameapa kwa hilo Hekalu na pia kwa yule akaaye ndani yake .

text: And he that shall swear by heaven , sweareth by the throne of God , and by him that sitteth thereon .
text2: Na anayeapa kwa mbingu ameapa kwa kiti cha enzi cha Mungu , na kwa huyo aketiye juu yake .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin , and have omitted the weightier matters of the law , judgment , mercy , and faith : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: Ole wenu walimu wa Sheria na Mafarisayo , wanafiki ! Mnatoza watu zaka , hata juu ya majani yenye harufu nzuri , bizari na jira , na huku mnaacha mambo muhimu ya Sheria kama vile haki , huruma na imani . Haya ndiyo hasa mliyopaswa kuyazingatia bila kusahau yale mengine .

text: Ye blind guides , which strain at a gnat , and swallow a camel .
text2: Viongozi vipofu ! Mnatoa nzi katika kinywaji , lakini mnameza ngamia !

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye make clean the outside of the cup and of the platter , but within they are full of extortion and excess .
text2: " Ole wenu walimu wa Sheria na Mafarisayo , wanafiki ! Mnasafisha kikombe na bakuli kwa nje , lakini ndani mnaacha kumejaa vitu mlivyopata kwa unyang ' anyi na uchoyo .

text: Thou blind Pharisee , cleanse first that which is within the cup and platter , that the outside of them may be clean also .
text2: Mfarisayo kipofu ! Kisafishe kikombe ndani kwanza na nje kutakuwa safi pia .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are like unto whited sepulchres , which indeed appear beautiful outward , but are within full of dead men ' s bones , and of all uncleanness .
text2: " Ole wenu walimu wa Sheria na Mafarisayo , wanafiki ! Mko kama makaburi yaliyopakwa chokaa ambayo kwa nje yanaonekana kuwa mazuri , lakini ndani yamejaa mifupa ya maiti na kila namna ya uchafu .

text: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men , but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity .
text2: Hali kadhalika ninyi mnaonekana na watu kwa nje kuwa wema , lakini kwa ndani mmejaa unafiki na uovu .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! because ye build the tombs of the prophets , and garnish the sepulchres of the righteous ,
text2: " Ole wenu walimu wa Sheria na Mafarisayo , wanafiki ! Mnajenga makaburi ya manabii na kuyapamba makaburi ya watu wema .

text: And say , If we had been in the days of our fathers , we would not have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets .
text2: Mwasema : Kama sisi tungaliishi nyakati za wazee wetu hatungalishirikiana nao katika mauaji ya manabii !

text: Wherefore ye be witnesses unto yourselves , that ye are the children of them which killed the prophets .
text2: Hivyo mnathibitisha ninyi wenyewe kwamba ninyi ni watoto wa watu waliowaua manabii .

text: Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers .
text2: Haya , kamilisheni ile kazi wazee wenu waliyoianza !

text: Ye serpents , ye generation of vipers , how can ye escape the damnation of hell ?
text2: Enyi kizazi cha nyoka wenye sumu ! Mnawezaje kuiepa hukumu ya moto wa Jehanamu ?

text: Wherefore , behold , I send unto you prophets , and wise men , and scribes : and some of them ye shall kill and crucify ; and some of them shall ye scourge in your synagogues , and persecute them from city to city :
text2: Ndiyo maana mimi ninawapelekea ninyi manabii , watu wenye hekima na walimu ; mtawaua na kuwasulubisha baadhi yao , na wengine mtawapiga viboko katika masunagogi yenu na kuwasaka katika kila mji .

text: That upon you may come all the righteous blood shed upon the earth , from the blood of righteous Abel unto the blood of Zacharias son of Barachias , whom ye slew between the temple and the altar .
text2: Hivyo lawama yote itawapateni kwa ajili ya damu yote ya watu wema iliyomwagwa juu ya ardhi . Naam , tangu kuuawa kwa Abeli ambaye hakuwa na hatia , mpaka kuuawa kwa Zakariya , mwana wa Barakia , ambaye mlimuua Hekaluni kati ya patakatifu na madhabahu .

text: Verily I say unto you , All these things shall come upon this generation .
text2: Nawaambieni kweli , kizazi hiki kitapata adhabu kwa sababu ya mambo haya .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , thou that killest the prophets , and stonest them which are sent unto thee , how often would I have gathered thy children together , even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: " Yerusalemu , Ee Yerusalemu ! Unawaua manabii na kuwapiga mawe wale waliotumwa kwako . Mara ngapi nimejaribu kuwakusanya watoto wako kwangu , kama vile kuku anavyokusanya vifaranga vyake chini ya mabawa yake , lakini hukutaka .

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate .
text2: Haya basi , nyumba yako itaachwa mahame .

text: For I say unto you , Ye shall not see me henceforth , till ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Nakwambia kweli , hutaniona tena mpaka wakati utakaposema : Abarikiwe huyo ajaye kwa jina la Bwana . "

text: And Jesus went out , and departed from the temple : and his disciples came to him for to shew him the buildings of the temple .
text2: Yesu alitoka Hekaluni , na alipokuwa akienda zake , wanafunzi wake walimwendea , wakamwonyesha majengo ya Hekalu .

text: And Jesus said unto them , See ye not all these things ? verily I say unto you , There shall not be left here one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Sawa , mnaweza kuyatazama haya yote ! Kweli nawaambieni , hakuna hata jiwe moja litakalosalia hapa juu ya lingine ; kila kitu kitaharibiwa . "

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives , the disciples came unto him privately , saying , Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign of thy coming , and of the end of the world ?
text2: Yesu alipokuwa ameketi juu ya mlima wa Mizeituni , wanafunzi walimwendea faraghani , wakamwuliza , " Twambie mambo haya yatatukia lini ? Ni ishara gani itakayoonyesha kuja kwako na mwisho wa nyakati ? "

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Take heed that no man deceive you .
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Jihadharini msije mkadanganywa na mtu .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Maana wengi watatokea na kulitumia jina langu wakisema : Mimi ndiye Kristo , nao watawapotosha watu wengi .

text: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars : see that ye be not troubled : for all these things must come to pass , but the end is not yet .
text2: Mtasikia juu ya vita na fununu za vita ; lakini msifadhaike , maana hayo hayana budi kutokea , lakini mwisho wenyewe ungali bado .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be famines , and pestilences , and earthquakes , in divers places .
text2: Taifa moja litapigana na taifa lingine ; ufalme mmoja utapigana na ufalme mwingine . Hapa na pale patakuwa na njaa na mitetemeko ya ardhi .

text: All these are the beginning of sorrows .
text2: Yote hayo ni kama mwanzo wa maumivu ya kujifungua mtoto .

text: Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted , and shall kill you : and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name ' s sake .
text2: " Kisha watawatoeni ili mteswe na kuuawa . Mataifa yote yatawachukieni kwa ajili ya jina langu .

text: And then shall many be offended , and shall betray one another , and shall hate one another .
text2: Tena , wengi wataiacha imani yao , watasalitiana na kuchukiana .

text: And many false prophets shall rise , and shall deceive many .
text2: Watatokea manabii wengi wa uongo watakaowapotosha watu wengi .

text: And because iniquity shall abound , the love of many shall wax cold .
text2: Kwa sababu ya ongezeko la uhalifu , upendo wa watu wengi utafifia .

text: But he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Lakini atakayevumilia mpaka mwisho , ataokoka .

text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations ; and then shall the end come .
text2: Ila , kabla ya mwisho kufika , hii Habari Njema ya Ufalme wa Mungu itahubiriwa ulimwenguni kote kama ushuhuda kwa mataifa yote .

text: When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , stand in the holy place , ( whoso readeth , let him understand : )
text2: " Basi , mtakapoona Chukizo Haribifu lililonenwa na nabii Danieli limesimama mahali patakatifu , ( msomaji na atambue maana yake ) ,

text: Then let them which be in Judaea flee into the mountains :
text2: hapo , walioko Yudea na wakimbilie milimani .

text: Let him which is on the housetop not come down to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Aliye juu ya paa la nyumba yake asishuke kuchukua kitu nyumbani mwake .

text: Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes .
text2: Aliye shambani asirudi nyuma kuchukua vazi lake .

text: And woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: Ole wao kina mama waja wazito na wanaonyonyesha siku hizo !

text: But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter , neither on the sabbath day :
text2: Ombeni ili kukimbia kwenu kusiwe siku za baridi au siku ya Sabato !

text: For then shall be great tribulation , such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time , no , nor ever shall be .
text2: Maana wakati huo kutakuwa na dhiki kuu ambayo haijapata kuwako tangu mwanzo wa ulimwengu mpaka leo , wala haitapata kutokea tena .

text: And except those days should be shortened , there should no flesh be saved : but for the elect ' s sake those days shall be shortened .
text2: Kama siku hizo hazingalipunguzwa , hakuna binadamu yeyote ambaye angeokoka ; lakini siku hizo zitapunguzwa kwa ajili ya wale walioteuliwa .

text: Then if any man shall say unto you , Lo , here is Christ , or there ; believe it not .
text2: " Basi , mtu akiwaambieni siku hizo : Kristo yuko hapa au Yuko pale , msimsadiki .

text: For there shall arise false Christs , and false prophets , and shall shew great signs and wonders ; insomuch that , if it were possible , they shall deceive the very elect .
text2: Maana watatokea kina Kristo wa uongo na manabii wa uongo . Watafanya ishara kubwa na maajabu ya kuweza kuwapotosha ikiwezekana hata wateule wa Mungu .

text: Behold , I have told you before .
text2: Sikilizeni , nimekwisha kuwaonya kabla ya wakati .

text: Wherefore if they shall say unto you , Behold , he is in the desert ; go not forth : behold , he is in the secret chambers ; believe it not .
text2: Basi , wakiwaambieni , Tazameni , yuko jangwani , msiende huko ; au , Tazameni , amejificha ndani , msisadiki ;

text: For as the lightning cometh out of the east , and shineth even unto the west ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: maana , kama vile umeme uangazavyo toka mashariki hadi magharibi , ndivyo kutakavyokuwa kuja kwake Mwana wa Mtu .

text: For wheresoever the carcase is , there will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Pale ulipo mzoga , ndipo watakapokusanyika tai .

text: Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light , and the stars shall fall from heaven , and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken :
text2: " Mara baada ya dhiki ya siku hizo , jua litatiwa giza , mwezi hautaangaza , nyota zitaanguka kutoka angani , na nguvu za mbingu zitatikiswa .

text: And then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven : and then shall all the tribes of the earth mourn , and they shall see the Son of man coming in the clouds of heaven with power and great glory .
text2: Kisha , ishara ya Mwana wa Mtu itaonekana angani , na hapo makabila yote duniani yatalalamika ; watamwona Mwana wa Mtu akija juu ya mawingu ya angani mwenye nguvu na utukufu mwingi .

text: And he shall send his angels with a great sound of a trumpet , and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from one end of heaven to the other .
text2: Naye atawatuma malaika wake wenye tarumbeta la kuvuma sana , nao watawakusanya wateule wake kutoka pande zote nne za dunia , toka mwisho huu wa mbingu hadi mwisho huu .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When his branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is nigh :
text2: " Kwa mtini jifunzeni mfano huu : Mara tu matawi yake yanapoanza kuwa laini na kuchanua majani , mnajua kwamba wakati wa kiangazi umekaribia .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall see all these things , know that it is near , even at the doors .
text2: Hali kadhalika nanyi mtakapoona mambo haya yote yakitendeka , jueni kwamba yuko karibu sana .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass , till all these things be fulfilled .
text2: Nawaambieni kweli , kizazi hiki hakitapita kabla ya mambo hayo yote kutukia .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away , but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Naam , mbingu na dunia zitapita , lakini maneno yangu hayatapita kamwe .

text: But of that day and hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels of heaven , but my Father only .
text2: " Lakini , juu ya siku au saa hiyo , hakuna mtu ajuaye itakuja lini ; wala malaika wa mbinguni , wala Mwana , ila Baba peke yake ndiye ajuaye .

text: But as the days of Noe were , so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Kwa maana kama ilivyokuwa nyakati za Noa , ndivyo itakavyokuwa kuja kwake Mwana wa Mtu .

text: For as in the days that were before the flood they were eating and drinking , marrying and giving in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark ,
text2: Maana nyakati hizo , kabla ya gharika kuu , watu walikuwa wakila na kunywa , wakioa na kuolewa , mpaka Noa alipoingia ndani ya ile safina .

text: And knew not until the flood came , and took them all away ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Hawakujua kuna nini mpaka ile gharika ilipotokea , ikawakumba wote . Ndivyo itakavyokuwa wakati Mwana wa Mtu atakapokuja .

text: Then shall two be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Wakati huo watu wawili watakuwa shambani ; mmoja atachukuliwa na mwingine ataachwa .

text: Two women shall be grinding at the mill ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Kina mama wawili watakuwa wanasaga nafaka , mmoja atachukuliwa na mwingine ataachwa .

text: Watch therefore : for ye know not what hour your Lord doth come .
text2: Basi , kesheni , kwa maana hamjui siku atakayokuja Bwana wenu .

text: But know this , that if the goodman of the house had known in what watch the thief would come , he would have watched , and would not have suffered his house to be broken up .
text2: Lakini kumbukeni jambo hili : kama mwenye nyumba angejua siku mwizi atakapofika , angekesha , wala hangeiacha nyumba yake ivunjwe .

text: Therefore be ye also ready : for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh .
text2: Kwa hiyo , nanyi pia muwe tayari , kwa maana Mwana wa Mtu atakuja saa msiyoitazamia . "

text: Who then is a faithful and wise servant , whom his lord hath made ruler over his household , to give them meat in due season ?
text2: Yesu akaendelea kusema , " Ni nani basi mtumishi mwaminifu na mwenye busara , ambaye bwana wake atamweka juu ya watu wake , awape chakula kwa wakati wake ?

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Heri mtumishi yule ambaye bwana wake atakapokuja atamkuta akifanya hivyo .

text: Verily I say unto you , That he shall make him ruler over all his goods .
text2: Kweli nawaambieni , atamweka mtumishi huyo aisimamie mali yake yote .

text: But and if that evil servant shall say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ;
text2: Lakini kama mtumishi mbaya akijisemea moyoni : Bwana wangu anakawia kurudi ,

text: And shall begin to smite his fellowservants , and to eat and drink with the drunken ;
text2: kisha akaanza kuwapiga watumishi wenzake , akaanza kula na kunywa pamoja na walevi ,

text: The lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for him , and in an hour that he is not aware of ,
text2: bwana wake atakuja siku asiyoitazamia na saa asiyoijua .

text: And shall cut him asunder , and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Atamkatilia mbali na kumweka kundi moja na wanafiki . Huko kutakuwa na kilio na kusaga meno .

text: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins , which took their lamps , and went forth to meet the bridegroom .
text2: " Wakati huo , Ufalme wa mbinguni utafanana na wasichana kumi waliochukua taa zao , wakaenda kumlaki bwana arusi .

text: And five of them were wise , and five were foolish .
text2: Watano miongoni mwao walikuwa wapumbavu na watano walikuwa wenye busara .

text: They that were foolish took their lamps , and took no oil with them :
text2: Wale wapumbavu walichukua taa zao , lakini hawakuchukua akiba ya mafuta .

text: But the wise took oil in their vessels with their lamps .
text2: Lakini wale wenye busara walichukua mafuta katika chupa pamoja na taa zao .

text: While the bridegroom tarried , they all slumbered and slept .
text2: Kwa kuwa bwana arusi alikawia kuja , wale wanawali wote wote walisinzia , wakalala .

text: And at midnight there was a cry made , Behold , the bridegroom cometh ; go ye out to meet him .
text2: Usiku wa manane kukawa na kelele : Haya , haya ! Bwana arusi anakuja ; nendeni kumlaki .

text: Then all those virgins arose , and trimmed their lamps .
text2: Hapo wale wanawali wote wakaamka , wakazitayarisha taa zao .

text: And the foolish said unto the wise , Give us of your oil ; for our lamps are gone out .
text2: Wale wapumbavu wakawaambia wale wenye busara : Tupeni mafuta yenu kidogo maana taa zetu zinazimika .

text: But the wise answered , saying , Not so ; lest there be not enough for us and you : but go ye rather to them that sell , and buy for yourselves .
text2: Lakini wale wenye busara wakawaambia , Hayatatutosha sisi na ninyi ! Afadhali mwende dukani mkajinunulie wenyewe !

text: And while they went to buy , the bridegroom came ; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage : and the door was shut .
text2: Basi , wale wanawali wapumbavu walipokwenda kununua mafuta , bwana arusi akafika , na wale wanawali waliokuwa tayari wakaingia pamoja naye katika jumba la arusi , kisha mlango ukafungwa .

text: Afterward came also the other virgins , saying , Lord , Lord , open to us .
text2: Baadaye wale wanawali wengine wakaja , wakaita : Bwana , bwana , tufungulie !

text: But he answered and said , Verily I say unto you , I know you not .
text2: Lakini yeye akawajibu , Nawaambieni kweli , siwajui ninyi . "

text: Watch therefore , for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh .
text2: Kisha Yesu akasema , " Kesheni basi , kwa maana hamjui siku wala saa .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country , who called his own servants , and delivered unto them his goods .
text2: " Itakuwa kama mtu mmoja aliyetaka kusafiri ng ' ambo : aliwaita watumishi wake , akawakabidhi mali yake .

text: And unto one he gave five talents , to another two , and to another one ; to every man according to his several ability ; and straightway took his journey .
text2: Alimpa kila mmoja kadiri ya uwezo wake : mmoja sarafu tano za fedha ziitwazo talanta , mwingine talanta mbili na mwingine talanta moja , kisha akasafiri .

text: Then he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same , and made them other five talents .
text2: Mara yule aliyekabidhiwa talanta tano akafanya kazi nazo akapata faida talanta tano .

text: And likewise he that had received two , he also gained other two .
text2: Hali kadhalika na yule aliyekabidhiwa talanta mbili akapata faida talanta mbili .

text: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth , and hid his lord ' s money .
text2: Lakini yule aliyekabidhiwa talanta moja akaenda akachimba shimo ardhini , akaificha fedha ya bwana wake .

text: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh , and reckoneth with them .
text2: " Baada ya muda mrefu , yule bwana alirudi , akaanza kukagua hesabu ya matumizi na mapato ya fedha yake .

text: And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents , saying , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me five talents : behold , I have gained beside them five talents more .
text2: Mtumishi aliyekabidhiwa talanta tano akaja amechukua zile talanta tano faida , akamwambia , Bwana , ulinikabidhi talanta tano , hapa pana talanta tano zaidi faida niliyopata .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , thou good and faithful servant : thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: Bwana wake akamwambia , Vema , mtumishi mwema na mwaminifu . Umekuwa mwaminifu katika mambo madogo nitakukabidhi makubwa . Njoo ufurahi pamoja na bwana wako .

text: He also that had received two talents came and said , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me two talents : behold , I have gained two other talents beside them .
text2: " Mtumishi aliyekabidhiwa talanta mbili akaja , akatoa talanta mbili faida , akisema , Bwana , ulinikabidhi talanta mbili . Chukua talanta mbili zaidi faida niliyopata .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , good and faithful servant ; thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: Bwana wake akamwambia , Vema , mtumishi mwema na mwaminifu . Umekuwa mwaminifu katika mambo madogo , nitakukabidhi makubwa . Njoo ufurahi pamoja na bwana wako .

text: Then he which had received the one talent came and said , Lord , I knew thee that thou art an hard man , reaping where thou hast not sown , and gathering where thou hast not strawed :
text2: " Lakini yule aliyekabidhiwa talanta moja akaja , akasema , Bwana , najua wewe ni mtu mgumu ; wewe huvuna pale ambapo hukupanda , na kukusanya pale ambapo hukutawanya .

text: And I was afraid , and went and hid thy talent in the earth : lo , there thou hast that is thine .
text2: Niliogopa , nikaificha fedha yako katika ardhi . Chukua basi mali yako .

text: His lord answered and said unto him , Thou wicked and slothful servant , thou knewest that I reap where I sowed not , and gather where I have not strawed :
text2: " Bwana wake akamwambia , Wewe ni mtumishi mwovu na mvivu ! Unajua kuwa mimi huvuna mahali ambapo sikupanda , na hukusanya pale ambapo sikutawanya .

text: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers , and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury .
text2: Ilikupasa basi , kuiweka fedha yangu katika benki , nami ningelichukua mtaji wangu na faida yake !

text: Take therefore the talent from him , and give it unto him which hath ten talents .
text2: Basi , mnyang ' anyeni hiyo fedha mkampe yule mwenye talanta kumi .

text: For unto every one that hath shall be given , and he shall have abundance : but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath .
text2: Maana , aliye na kitu atapewa na kuzidishiwa . Lakini yule asiye na kitu , hata kile alicho nacho kitachukuliwa .

text: And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Na kuhusu huyu mtumishi asiye na faida , mtupeni nje gizani ! Huko kutakuwa na kilio na kusaga meno .

text: When the Son of man shall come in his glory , and all the holy angels with him , then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory :
text2: " Wakati Mwana wa Mtu atakapokuja katika utukufu wake na malaika wote wakiwa pamoja naye , hapo ataketi juu ya kiti chake cha enzi kitukufu ,

text: And before him shall be gathered all nations : and he shall separate them one from another , as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats :
text2: na mataifa yote yatakusanyika mbele yake , naye atawatenganisha watu kama mchungaji anavyotenganisha kondoo na mbuzi .

text: And he shall set the sheep on his right hand , but the goats on the left .
text2: Atawaweka kondoo upande wake wa kulia na mbuzi upande wake wa kushoto .

text: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand , Come , ye blessed of my Father , inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world :
text2: " Kisha Mfalme atawaambia wale walio upande wake wa kulia , Njoni enyi mliobarikiwa na Baba yangu ; pokeeni Ufalme mliotayarishiwa tangu kuumbwa kwa ulimwengu .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me drink : I was a stranger , and ye took me in :
text2: Maana nilikuwa na njaa nanyi mkanipa chakula ; nilikuwa na kiu nanyi mkanipa maji ; nilikuwa mgeni nanyi mkanikaribisha ;

text: Naked , and ye clothed me : I was sick , and ye visited me : I was in prison , and ye came unto me .
text2: nilikuwa uchi , mkanivika ; nilikuwa mgonjwa nanyi mkaja kunitazama ; nilikuwa gerezani nanyi mkaja kunitembelea .

text: Then shall the righteous answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , and fed thee ? or thirsty , and gave thee drink ?
text2: Hapo , hao watu wema watamjibu mfalme Bwana , ni lini tulikuona mwenye njaa nasi tukakupa chakula , au ukiwa na kiu nasi tukakunywesha maji ?

text: When saw we thee a stranger , and took thee in ? or naked , and clothed thee ?
text2: Ni lini tulikuona ukiwa mgeni nasi tukakukaribisha , au bila nguo nasi tukakuvika ?

text: Or when saw we thee sick , or in prison , and came unto thee ?
text2: Ni lini tulikuona ukiwa mgonjwa au mfungwa nasi tukaja kukutazama ?

text: And the King shall answer and say unto them , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren , ye have done it unto me .
text2: Mfalme atawajibu , Kweli nawaambieni , kila kitu mlichomtendea mmojawapo wa hawa ndugu zangu wadogo , mlinitendea mimi .

text: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand , Depart from me , ye cursed , into everlasting fire , prepared for the devil and his angels :
text2: " Kisha atawaambia wale walio upande wake wa kushoto , Ondokeni mbele yangu enyi mliolaaniwa ! Nendeni katika moto wa milele aliotayarishiwa Ibilisi na malaika wake .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me no meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me no drink :
text2: Maana nilikuwa na njaa nanyi hamkunipa chakula ; nilikuwa na kiu nanyi hamkunipa maji .

text: I was a stranger , and ye took me not in : naked , and ye clothed me not : sick , and in prison , and ye visited me not .
text2: Nilikuwa mgeni nanyi hamkunikaribisha ; nilikuwa mgonjwa na mfungwa nanyi hamkuja kunitazama .

text: Then shall they also answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , or athirst , or a stranger , or naked , or sick , or in prison , and did not minister unto thee ?
text2: " Hapo nao watajibu , Bwana , ni lini tulikuona ukiwa na njaa au kiu , ukiwa mgeni au bila nguo , ukiwa mgonjwa au mfungwa , nasi hatukuja kukuhudumia ?

text: Then shall he answer them , saying , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye did it not to one of the least of these , ye did it not to me .
text2: Naye atawajibu , Nawaambieni kweli , kila mlipokataa kumtendea mambo haya mmojawapo wa hawa wadogo , mlikataa kunitendea mimi .

text: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment : but the righteous into life eternal .
text2: Basi , hawa watakwenda kwenye adhabu ya milele , lakini wale waadilifu watakwenda kwenye uzima wa milele . "

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had finished all these sayings , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Yesu alipomaliza kusema hayo yote , aliwaambia wanafunzi wake ,

text: Ye know that after two days is the feast of the passover , and the Son of man is betrayed to be crucified .
text2: " Mnajua kwamba baada ya siku mbili tutakuwa na sikukuu ya Pasaka , na Mwana wa Mtu atatolewa ili asulubiwe . "

text: Then assembled together the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders of the people , unto the palace of the high priest , who was called Caiaphas ,
text2: Wakati huo makuhani wakuu na wazee wa watu walikutana pamoja katika ukumbi wa Kayafa , Kuhani Mkuu .

text: And consulted that they might take Jesus by subtilty , and kill him .
text2: Wakashauriana jinsi ya kumtia Yesu nguvuni kwa hila wamuue .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar among the people .
text2: Lakini wakaamua jambo hilo lisifanyike wakati wa sikukuu , kusije kukatokea ghasia kati ya watu .

text: Now when Jesus was in Bethany , in the house of Simon the leper ,
text2: Yesu alipokuwa Bethania , nyumbani kwa Simoni , aitwaye Mkoma ,

text: There came unto him a woman having an alabaster box of very precious ointment , and poured it on his head , as he sat at meat .
text2: mama mmoja aliyekuwa na chupa ya alabasta yenye marashi ya thamani kubwa , alimjia pale mezani alipokuwa amekaa kula chakula , akammiminia hayo marashi kichwani .

text: But when his disciples saw it , they had indignation , saying , To what purpose is this waste ?
text2: Wanafunzi wake walipoona hayo wakakasirika , wakasema , " Ya nini hasara hii ?

text: For this ointment might have been sold for much , and given to the poor .
text2: Marashi haya yangaliweza kuuzwa kwa bei kubwa , maskini wakapewa hizo fedha . "

text: When Jesus understood it , he said unto them , Why trouble ye the woman ? for she hath wrought a good work upon me .
text2: Yesu alitambua mawazo yao , akawaambia , " Mbona mnamsumbua huyu mama ? Yeye amenitendea jambo jema .

text: For ye have the poor always with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Maskini mnao daima pamoja nanyi , lakini mimi sitakuwapo pamoja nanyi daima .

text: For in that she hath poured this ointment on my body , she did it for my burial .
text2: Huyu mama amenimiminia marashi ili kunitayarisha kwa maziko .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world , there shall also this , that this woman hath done , be told for a memorial of her .
text2: Nawaambieni kweli , popote ambapo hii Habari Njema itahubiriwa ulimwenguni , kitendo hiki alichofanya mama huyu kitatajwa kwa kumkumbuka yeye . "

text: Then one of the twelve , called Judas Iscariot , went unto the chief priests ,
text2: Kisha , Yuda Iskarioti , mmoja wa wale kumi na wawili , akaenda kwa makuhani wakuu ,

text: And said unto them , What will ye give me , and I will deliver him unto you ? And they covenanted with him for thirty pieces of silver .
text2: akawaambia , " Mtanipa kitu gani kama nikimkabidhi Yesu kwenu ? " Wakamhesabia sarafu thelathini za fedha ;

text: And from that time he sought opportunity to betray him .
text2: na tangu wakati huo Yuda akawa anatafuta nafasi ya kumsaliti .

text: Now the first day of the feast of unleavened bread the disciples came to Jesus , saying unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare for thee to eat the passover ?
text2: Siku ya kwanza kabla ya Sikukuu ya Mikate Isiyotiwa Chachu , wanafunzi walimwendea Yesu wakamwuliza , " Unataka tukuandalie wapi chakula cha Pasaka ? "

text: And he said , Go into the city to such a man , and say unto him , The Master saith , My time is at hand ; I will keep the passover at thy house with my disciples .
text2: Yeye akawajibu , " Nendeni mjini kwa mtu fulani , mkamwambie : Mwalimu anasema , wakati wangu umefika ; kwako nitakula Pasaka pamoja na wanafunzi wangu . "

text: And the disciples did as Jesus had appointed them ; and they made ready the passover .
text2: Wanafunzi wakafanya kama Yesu alivyowaagiza , wakaandaa Pasaka .

text: Now when the even was come , he sat down with the twelve .
text2: Kulipokuwa jioni , Yesu akakaa mezani pamoja na wanafunzi wake kumi na wawili .

text: And as they did eat , he said , Verily I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Walipokuwa wakila , Yesu akasema , " Nawaambieni kweli , mmoja wenu atanisaliti . "

text: And they were exceeding sorrowful , and began every one of them to say unto him , Lord , is it I ?
text2: Wanafunzi wakahuzunika sana , wakaanza kuuliza mmojammoja , " Bwana ! Je , ni mimi ? "

text: And he answered and said , He that dippeth his hand with me in the dish , the same shall betray me .
text2: Yesu akajibu , " Atakayechovya mkate pamoja nami katika bakuli ndiye atakayenisaliti .

text: The Son of man goeth as it is written of him : but woe unto that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! it had been good for that man if he had not been born .
text2: Naam , Mwana wa Mtu anakwenda zake kama Maandiko Matakatifu yasemavyo , lakini ole wake mtu yule atakayemsaliti Mwana wa Mtu ! Ingalikuwa afadhali kwa mtu huyo kama hangalizaliwa . "

text: Then Judas , which betrayed him , answered and said , Master , is it I ? He said unto him , Thou hast said .
text2: Yuda , ambaye ndiye aliyetaka kumsaliti , akamwuliza , " Mwalimu ! Je , ni mimi ? " Yesu akamjibu , " Wewe umesema . "

text: And as they were eating , Jesus took bread , and blessed it , and brake it , and gave it to the disciples , and said , Take , eat ; this is my body .
text2: Walipokuwa wanakula , Yesu akatwaa mkate , akashukuru , akaumega , akawapa wanafunzi wake akisema , " Twaeni mle ; huu ni mwili wangu . "

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and gave it to them , saying , Drink ye all of it ;
text2: Kisha akatwaa kikombe , akamshukuru Mungu , akawapa akisema , " Nyweni nyote ;

text: For this is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many for the remission of sins .
text2: maana hii ni damu yangu inayothibitisha agano , damu inayomwagwa kwa ajili ya watu wengi ili kuwaondolea dhambi .

text: But I say unto you , I will not drink henceforth of this fruit of the vine , until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father ' s kingdom .
text2: Nawaambieni , sitakunywa tena divai ya zabibu mpaka siku ile nitakapoinywa mpya pamoja nanyi katika Ufalme wa Baba yangu . "

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Baada ya kuimba wimbo , wakaondoka , wakaenda katika mlima wa Mizeituni .

text: Then saith Jesus unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered abroad .
text2: Kisha Yesu akawaambia , " Usiku huu wa leo , ninyi nyote mtakuwa na mashaka nami , maana Maandiko Matakatifu yasema : Nitampiga mchungaji , na kondoo wa kundi watatawanyika .

text: But after I am risen again , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Lakini baada ya kufufuka kwangu , nitawatangulieni Galilaya . "

text: Peter answered and said unto him , Though all men shall be offended because of thee , yet will I never be offended .
text2: Petro akamwambia Yesu " Hata kama wote watakuwa na mashaka nawe na kukuacha , mimi sitakuacha kamwe . "

text: Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this night , before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Kweli nakwambia , usiku huu kabla jogoo hajawika , utanikana mara tatu . "

text: Peter said unto him , Though I should die with thee , yet will I not deny thee . Likewise also said all the disciples .
text2: Petro akamwambia , " Hata kama ni lazima nife pamoja nawe , sitakukana kamwe . " Wale wanafunzi wengine wote wakasema vivyo hivyo .

text: Then cometh Jesus with them unto a place called Gethsemane , and saith unto the disciples , Sit ye here , while I go and pray yonder .
text2: Kisha Yesu akaenda pamoja nao bustanini Gethsemane , akawaambia wanafunzi wake , " Kaeni hapa nami niende pale mbele kusali . "

text: And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee , and began to be sorrowful and very heavy .
text2: Akawachukua Petro na wana wawili wa Zebedayo , akaanza kuwa na huzuni na mahangaiko .

text: Then saith he unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful , even unto death : tarry ye here , and watch with me .
text2: Hapo akawaambia , " Nina huzuni kubwa moyoni hata karibu kufa . Kaeni hapa mkeshe pamoja nami . "

text: And he went a little further , and fell on his face , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if it be possible , let this cup pass from me : nevertheless not as I will , but as thou wilt .
text2: Basi , akaenda mbele kidogo , akaanguka kifudifudi , akasali : " Baba yangu , kama inawezekana , aacha kikombe hiki cha mateso kinipite ; lakini isiwe nitakavyo mimi , ila utakavyo wewe . "

text: And he cometh unto the disciples , and findeth them asleep , and saith unto Peter , What , could ye not watch with me one hour ?
text2: Akawaendea wale wanafunzi , akawakuta wamelala . Akamwambia Petro , " Ndiyo kusema hamkuweza kukesha pamoja nami hata saa moja ?

text: Watch and pray , that ye enter not into temptation : the spirit indeed is willing , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Kesheni na kusali ili msije mkaingia katika majaribu . Roho i tayari lakini mwili ni dhaifu . "

text: He went away again the second time , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if this cup may not pass away from me , except I drink it , thy will be done .
text2: Akaenda tena mara ya pili akasali : " Baba yangu , kama haiwezekani kikombe hiki kinipite bila mimi kukinywa , basi , mapenzi yako yafanyike . "

text: And he came and found them asleep again : for their eyes were heavy .
text2: Akawaendea tena , akawakuta wamelala , maana macho yao yalikuwa yamebanwa na usingizi .

text: And he left them , and went away again , and prayed the third time , saying the same words .
text2: Basi , akawaacha , akaenda tena kusali mara ya tatu kwa maneno yaleyale .

text: Then cometh he to his disciples , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : behold , the hour is at hand , and the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Kisha akawaendea wale wanafunzi , akawaambia , " Je , mngali mmelala na kupumzika ? Tazameni ! Saa yenyewe imefika , na Mwana wa Mtu atatolewa kwa watu wenye dhambi .

text: Rise , let us be going : behold , he is at hand that doth betray me .
text2: Amkeni , twendeni zetu . Tazameni ! Anakuja yule atakayenisaliti . "

text: And while he yet spake , lo , Judas , one of the twelve , came , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and elders of the people .
text2: Basi , Yesu alipokuwa bado anasema nao , mara akaja Yuda , mmoja wa wale kumi na wawili . Pamoja naye walikuja watu wengi wenye mapanga na marungu ambao walitumwa na makuhani wakuu na wazee wa watu .

text: Now he that betrayed him gave them a sign , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he : hold him fast .
text2: Huyo aliyetaka kumsaliti Yesu , alikuwa amekwisha wapa ishara akisema : " Yule nitakayembusu ndiye ; mkamateni . "

text: And forthwith he came to Jesus , and said , Hail , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Basi , Yuda akamkaribia Yesu , akamwambia , " Shikamoo , Mwalimu ! " Kisha akambusu .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Friend , wherefore art thou come ? Then came they , and laid hands on Jesus , and took him .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Rafiki , fanya ulichokuja kufanya . " Hapo wale watu wakaja , wakamkamata Yesu , wakamtia nguvuni .

text: And , behold , one of them which were with Jesus stretched out his hand , and drew his sword , and struck a servant of the high priest ' s , and smote off his ear .
text2: Mmoja wa wale waliokuwa pamoja na Yesu akanyosha mkono , akauchomoa upanga wake , akampiga mtumishi wa Kuhani Mkuu , akamkata sikio .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Put up again thy sword into his place : for all they that take the sword shall perish with the sword .
text2: Hapo Yesu akamwambia , " Rudisha upanga wako alani , maana yeyote anayeutumia upanga , atakufa kwa upanga .

text: Thinkest thou that I cannot now pray to my Father , and he shall presently give me more than twelve legions of angels ?
text2: Je , hamjui kwamba ningeweza kumwomba Baba yangu naye mara angeniletea zaidi ya majeshi kumi na mawili ya malaika ?

text: But how then shall the scriptures be fulfilled , that thus it must be ?
text2: Lakini yatatimiaje Maandiko Matakatifu yasemayo kwamba ndivyo inavyopaswa kuwa ? "

text: In that same hour said Jesus to the multitudes , Are ye come out as against a thief with swords and staves for to take me ? I sat daily with you teaching in the temple , and ye laid no hold on me .
text2: Wakati huohuo Yesu akauambia huo umati wa watu waliokuja kumtia nguvuni , " Je , mmekuja kunikamata kwa mapanga na marungu kama kwamba mimi ni mnyang ' anyi ? Kila siku nilikuwa Hekaluni nikifundisha , na hamkunikamata !

text: But all this was done , that the scriptures of the prophets might be fulfilled . Then all the disciples forsook him , and fled .
text2: Lakini haya yote yametendeka ili Maandiko ya manabii yatimie . " Kisha wanafunzi wote wakamwacha , wakakimbia .

text: And they that had laid hold on Jesus led him away to Caiaphas the high priest , where the scribes and the elders were assembled .
text2: Basi , hao watu waliomkamata Yesu walimpeleka nyumbani kwa Kayafa , Kuhani Mkuu , walikokusanyika walimu wa Sheria na wazee .
