text: But Peter followed him afar off unto the high priest ' s palace , and went in , and sat with the servants , to see the end .
text2: Petro alimfuata kwa mbali mpaka uani kwa Kuhani Mkuu , akaingia ndani pamoja na walinzi ili apate kuona mambo yatakavyokuwa .

text: Now the chief priests , and elders , and all the council , sought false witness against Jesus , to put him to death ;
text2: Basi , makuhani wakuu na Baraza lote wakatafuta ushahidi wa uongo dhidi ya Yesu wapate kumwua ,

text: But found none : yea , though many false witnesses came , yet found they none . At the last came two false witnesses ,
text2: lakini hawakupata ushahidi wowote , ingawa walikuja mashahidi wengi wa uongo . Mwishowe wakaja mashahidi wawili ,

text: And said , This fellow said , I am able to destroy the temple of God , and to build it in three days .
text2: wakasema , " Mtu huyu alisema : Ninaweza kuliharibu Hekalu la Mungu na kulijenga tena kwa siku tatu . "

text: And the high priest arose , and said unto him , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Kuhani Mkuu akasimama , akamwuliza Yesu , " Je , hujibu neno ? Watu hawa wanashuhudia nini dhidi yako ? "

text: But Jesus held his peace . And the high priest answered and said unto him , I adjure thee by the living God , that thou tell us whether thou be the Christ , the Son of God .
text2: Lakini Yesu akakaa kimya . Kuhani Mkuu akamwambia , " Nakuapisha kwa Mungu aliye hai , twambie kama wewe ndiwe Kristo , Mwana wa Mungu ! "

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thou hast said : nevertheless I say unto you , Hereafter shall ye see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Wewe umesema ! Lakini nawaambieni , tangu sasa mtamwona Mwana wa Mtu ameketi upande wa kulia wa Mwenyezi , akija juu ya mawingu ya mbinguni . "

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , saying , He hath spoken blasphemy ; what further need have we of witnesses ? behold , now ye have heard his blasphemy .
text2: Hapo , Kuhani Mkuu akararua mavazi yake , akasema , " Amekufuru ! Tuna haja gani tena ya mashahidi ? Sasa mmesikia kufuru yake .

text: What think ye ? They answered and said , He is guilty of death .
text2: Ninyi mwaonaje ? " Wao wakamjibu , " Anastahili kufa ! "

text: Then did they spit in his face , and buffeted him ; and others smote him with the palms of their hands ,
text2: Kisha wakamtemea mate usoni , wakampiga makofi . Wengine wakiwa wanampiga makofi ,

text: Saying , Prophesy unto us , thou Christ , Who is he that smote thee ?
text2: wakasema , " Haya Kristo , tutabirie ; ni nani amekupiga ! "

text: Now Peter sat without in the palace : and a damsel came unto him , saying , Thou also wast with Jesus of Galilee .
text2: Petro alikuwa ameketi nje uani . Basi , mtumishi mmoja wa kike akamwendea , akasema , " Wewe ulikuwa pamoja na Yesu wa Galilaya . "

text: But he denied before them all , saying , I know not what thou sayest .
text2: Petro akakana mbele ya wote akisema , " Sijui hata unasema nini . "

text: And when he was gone out into the porch , another maid saw him , and said unto them that were there , This fellow was also with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Alipokuwa akitoka mlangoni , mtumishi mwingine wa kike akamwona , akawaambia wale waliokuwa pale , " Mtu huyu alikuwa pamoja na Yesu wa Nazareti . "

text: And again he denied with an oath , I do not know the man .
text2: Petro akakana tena kwa kiapo : " Simjui mtu huyo . "

text: And after a while came unto him they that stood by , and said to Peter , Surely thou also art one of them ; for thy speech bewrayeth thee .
text2: Baadaye kidogo , watu waliokuwa pale wakamwendea Petro , wakamwambia , " Hakika , wewe pia ni mmoja wao , maana msemo wako unakutambulisha . "

text: Then began he to curse and to swear , saying , I know not the man . And immediately the cock crew .
text2: Hapo Petro akaanza kujilaani na kuapa akisema , " Simjui mtu huyo ! " Mara jogoo akawika .

text: And Peter remembered the word of Jesus , which said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice . And he went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Petro akakumbuka maneno aliyoambiwa na Yesu : " Kabla jogoo hajawika , utanikana mara tatu . " Basi , akatoka nje akalia sana .

text: When the morning was come , all the chief priests and elders of the people took counsel against Jesus to put him to death :
text2: Kulipopambazuka , makuhani wakuu wote na wazee wa watu walifanya mashauri juu ya Yesu wapate kumwua .

text: And when they had bound him , they led him away , and delivered him to Pontius Pilate the governor .
text2: Wakamfunga pingu , wakamchukua , wakamkabidhi kwa Pilato , mkuu wa mkoa .

text: Then Judas , which had betrayed him , when he saw that he was condemned , repented himself , and brought again the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders ,
text2: Hapo , Yuda ambaye ndiye aliyemsaliti , alipoona kwamba wamekwisha mhukumu Yesu , akajuta , akawarudishia makuhani wakuu zile sarafu thelathini za fedha .

text: Saying , I have sinned in that I have betrayed the innocent blood . And they said , What is that to us ? see thou to that .
text2: Akawaambia , " Nimekosa kwa kumtoa mtu asiye na hatia auawe . " Lakini wao wakasema , " Yatuhusu nini sisi ? Hilo ni shauri lako . "

text: And he cast down the pieces of silver in the temple , and departed , and went and hanged himself .
text2: Naye akazitupa zile fedha Hekaluni , akatoka nje , akaenda akajinyonga .

text: And the chief priests took the silver pieces , and said , It is not lawful for to put them into the treasury , because it is the price of blood .
text2: Makuhani wakuu wakazichukua zile fedha , wakasema , " Haifai kuziweka katika hazina ya Hekalu kwa maana ni fedha za damu . "

text: And they took counsel , and bought with them the potter ' s field , to bury strangers in .
text2: Basi , wakashauriana , wakazitumia kununua shamba la mfinyanzi liwe mahali pa kuzika wageni .

text: Wherefore that field was called , The field of blood , unto this day .
text2: Ndiyo maana mpaka leo shamba hilo linaitwa Shamba la Damu .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying , And they took the thirty pieces of silver , the price of him that was valued , whom they of the children of Israel did value ;
text2: Hivyo maneno ya nabii Yeremia yakatimia : " Walizichukua sarafu thelathini za fedha , thamani ya yule ambaye watu wa Israeli walipanga bei ,

text: And gave them for the potter ' s field , as the Lord appointed me .
text2: wakanunua nazo shamba la mfinyanzi , kama Bwana alivyoniagiza . "

text: And Jesus stood before the governor : and the governor asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And Jesus said unto him , Thou sayest .
text2: Yesu alisimamishwa mbele ya mkuu wa mkoa . Basi , mkuu wa mkoa akamwuliza , " Je , wewe ndiwe Mfalme wa Wayahudi ? " Yesu akamwambia , " Wewe umesema . "

text: And when he was accused of the chief priests and elders , he answered nothing .
text2: Lakini makuhani wakuu na wazee walipokuwa wanamshtaki , hakujibu neno .

text: Then said Pilate unto him , Hearest thou not how many things they witness against thee ?
text2: Hivyo Pilato akamwuliza , " Je , husikii mashtaka hayo yote wanayotoa juu yako ? "

text: And he answered him to never a word ; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly .
text2: Lakini Yesu hakumjibu hata neno moja ; hata huyo mkuu wa mkoa akashangaa sana .

text: Now at that feast the governor was wont to release unto the people a prisoner , whom they would .
text2: Ilikuwa kawaida wakati wa Sikukuu ya Pasaka mkuu wa mkoa kuwafungulia Wayahudi mfungwa mmoja waliyemtaka .

text: And they had then a notable prisoner , called Barabbas .
text2: Wakati huo kulikuwa na mfungwa mmoja , jina lake Baraba .

text: Therefore when they were gathered together , Pilate said unto them , Whom will ye that I release unto you ? Barabbas , or Jesus which is called Christ ?
text2: Hivyo , watu walipokusanyika pamoja , Pilato akawauliza , " Mwataka nimfungue yupi kati ya wawili hawa , Baraba ama Yesu aitwae Kristo ? "

text: For he knew that for envy they had delivered him .
text2: Alisema hivyo maana alijua wazi kwamba walimleta kwake kwa sababu ya wivu .

text: When he was set down on the judgment seat , his wife sent unto him , saying , Have thou nothing to do with that just man : for I have suffered many things this day in a dream because of him .
text2: Pilato alipokuwa amekaa katika kiti cha hukumu , mke wake akampelekea ujumbe : " Usijitie katika shauri la mtu huyu mwema , maana leo nimeteseka sana katika ndoto kwa sababu yake . "

text: But the chief priests and elders persuaded the multitude that they should ask Barabbas , and destroy Jesus .
text2: Lakini makuhani wakuu na wazee wakawashawishi watu waombe Baraba afunguliwe na Yesu auawe .

text: The governor answered and said unto them , Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you ? They said , Barabbas .
text2: Mkuu wa mkoa akawauliza , " Ni yupi kati ya hawa wawili mnayetaka nimfungue ? " Wakamjibu , " Baraba ! "

text: Pilate saith unto them , What shall I do then with Jesus which is called Christ ? They all say unto him , Let him be crucified .
text2: Pilato akawauliza , " Sasa , nifanye nini na Yesu aitwaye Kristo ? " Wote wakasema , " Asulubiwe ! "

text: And the governor said , Why , what evil hath he done ? But they cried out the more , saying , Let him be crucified .
text2: Pilato akauliza , " Kwa nini ? Amefanya kosa gani ? " Wao wakazidi kupaaza sauti : " Asulubiwe ! "

text: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing , but that rather a tumult was made , he took water , and washed his hands before the multitude , saying , I am innocent of the blood of this just person : see ye to it .
text2: Basi , Pilato alipotambua kwamba hafanikiwi chochote na kwamba maasi yalikuwa yanaanza , alichukua maji , akanawa mikono mbele ya ule umati wa watu , akasema , " Mimi sina lawama juu ya kifo cha mtu huyu ; shauri lenu wenyewe . "

text: Then answered all the people , and said , His blood be on us , and on our children .
text2: Watu wote wakasema , " Damu yake na iwe juu yetu na juu ya watoto wetu ! "

text: Then released he Barabbas unto them : and when he had scourged Jesus , he delivered him to be crucified .
text2: Hapo Pilato akawafungulia Baraba kutoka gerezani , lakini akamtoa Yesu asulubiwe .

text: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the common hall , and gathered unto him the whole band of soldiers .
text2: Kisha askari wa mkuu wa mkoa wakamwingiza Yesu ndani ya ikulu , wakamkusanyikia kikosi kizima .

text: And they stripped him , and put on him a scarlet robe .
text2: Wakamvua nguo zake , wakamvika joho la rangi nyekundu .

text: And when they had platted a crown of thorns , they put it upon his head , and a reed in his right hand : and they bowed the knee before him , and mocked him , saying , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Kisha wakasokota taji ya miiba , wakamvika kichwani , wakamwekea pia mwanzi katika mkono wake wa kulia . Wakapiga magoti mbele yake , wakamdhihaki wakisema , " Shikamoo mfalme wa Wayahudi ! "

text: And they spit upon him , and took the reed , and smote him on the head .
text2: Wakamtemea mate , wakauchukua ule mwanzi , wakampiga nao kichwani .

text: And after that they had mocked him , they took the robe off from him , and put his own raiment on him , and led him away to crucify him .
text2: Baada ya kumdhihaki , wakamvua lile joho , wakamvika nguo zake , kisha wakampeleka kumsulubisha .

text: And as they came out , they found a man of Cyrene , Simon by name : him they compelled to bear his cross .
text2: Walipokuwa wakienda , wakamkuta mtu mmoja jina lake Simoni , mwenyeji wa Kurene , wakamlazimisha kuuchukua msalaba wake Yesu .

text: And when they were come unto a place called Golgotha , that is to say , a place of a skull ,
text2: Walipofika mahali paitwapo Golgotha , maana yake , " Mahali pa Fuvu la kichwa , "

text: They gave him vinegar to drink mingled with gall : and when he had tasted thereof , he would not drink .
text2: wakampa mchanganyiko wa divai na nyongo . Lakini Yesu alipoonja akakataa kunywa .

text: And they crucified him , and parted his garments , casting lots : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , They parted my garments among them , and upon my vesture did they cast lots .
text2: Walimsulubisha , kisha wakagawana mavazi yake kwa kuyapigia kura .

text: And sitting down they watched him there ;
text2: Wakaketi , wakawa wanamchunga .

text: And set up over his head his accusation written , THIS IS JESUS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Juu ya kichwa chake wakaweka shtaka dhidi yake lilioandikwa , " Huyu ni Yesu , Mfalme wa Wayahudi . "

text: Then were there two thieves crucified with him , one on the right hand , and another on the left .
text2: Wanyang ' anyi wawili walisulubishwa pia pamoja naye , mmoja upande wa kushoto na mwingine upande wa kulia .

text: And they that passed by reviled him , wagging their heads ,
text2: Watu waliokuwa wanapita mahali hapo walimtukana wakitikisa vichwa vyao na kusema ,

text: And saying , Thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days , save thyself . If thou be the Son of God , come down from the cross .
text2: " Wewe ! Si ulijidai kulivunja Hekalu na kulijenga kwa siku tatu ? Sasa jiokoe mwenyewe . Kama wewe ni Mwana wa Mungu , basi shuka msalabani ! "

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking him , with the scribes and elders , said ,
text2: Hali kadhalika na makuhani wakuu pamoja na walimu wa Sheria na wazee walimdhihaki wakisema ,

text: He saved others ; himself he cannot save . If he be the King of Israel , let him now come down from the cross , and we will believe him .
text2: " Aliwaokoa wengine , lakini kujiokoa mwenyewe hawezi ! Eti yeye ni mfalme wa Wayahudi ! Basi , sasa na ashuke msalabani , nasi tutamwamini .

text: He trusted in God ; let him deliver him now , if he will have him : for he said , I am the Son of God .
text2: Alimtumainia Mungu na kusema eti yeye ni Mwana wa Mungu ; basi , Mungu na amwokoe kama anamtaka . "

text: The thieves also , which were crucified with him , cast the same in his teeth .
text2: Hali kadhalika na wale waliosulubiwa pamoja naye wakamtukana .

text: Now from the sixth hour there was darkness over all the land unto the ninth hour .
text2: Tangu saa sita mchana mpaka saa tisa , nchi yote ikawa katika giza .

text: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eli , Eli , lama sabachthani ? that is to say , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Mnamo saa tisa Yesu akalia kwa sauti kubwa , " Eli , Eli , lema sabakthani ? " Maana yake , " Mungu wangu , Mungu wangu , mbona umeniacha ? "

text: Some of them that stood there , when they heard that , said , This man calleth for Elias .
text2: Lakini wale waliosimama pale waliposikia hivyo wakasema , " Anamwita Eliya . "

text: And straightway one of them ran , and took a spunge , and filled it with vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink .
text2: Mmoja wao akakimbia , akachukua sifongo , akaichovya katika siki , akaiweka juu ya mwanzi , akampa anywe .

text: The rest said , Let be , let us see whether Elias will come to save him .
text2: Wengine wakasema , " Acha tuone kama Eliya anakuja kumwokoa . "

text: Jesus , when he had cried again with a loud voice , yielded up the ghost .
text2: Basi , Yesu akalia tena kwa sauti kubwa , akakata roho .

text: And , behold , the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom ; and the earth did quake , and the rocks rent ;
text2: Hapo pazia la Hekalu likapasuka vipande viwili , toka juu mpaka chini ; nchi ikatetemeka ; miamba ikapasuka ;

text: And the graves were opened ; and many bodies of the saints which slept arose ,
text2: makaburi yakafunguka na watu wengi wa Mungu waliokufa wakafufuliwa ;

text: And came out of the graves after his resurrection , and went into the holy city , and appeared unto many .
text2: nao , baada ya kufufuka kwake , wakatoka makaburini , wakaingia katika Mji Mtakatifu , wakaonekana na watu wengi .

text: Now when the centurion , and they that were with him , watching Jesus , saw the earthquake , and those things that were done , they feared greatly , saying , Truly this was the Son of God .
text2: Basi , jemadari na wale waliokuwa wakimlinda Yesu walipoona tetemeko la ardhi na yale mambo yaliyotukia , wakaogopa sana , wakasema , " Hakika mtu huyu alikuwa Mwana wa Mungu . "

text: And many women were there beholding afar off , which followed Jesus from Galilee , ministering unto him :
text2: Mahali hapo walikuwapo wanawake wengi wakitazama kwa mbali . Hao ndio wale waliomfuata Yesu kutoka Galilaya wakimtumikia .

text: Among which was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James and Joses , and the mother of Zebedee ' s children .
text2: Miongoni mwao walikuwa Maria Magdalene , Maria mama yao Yakobo na Yosefu , pamoja na mama yao wana wa Zebedayo .

text: When the even was come , there came a rich man of Arimathaea , named Joseph , who also himself was Jesus ' disciple :
text2: Ilipokuwa jioni , akaja mtu mmoja tajiri mwenyeji wa Armathaya , jina lake Yosefu . Yeye pia alikuwa mwanafunzi wa Yesu .

text: He went to Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus . Then Pilate commanded the body to be delivered .
text2: Akamwendea Pilato , akaomba apewe mwili wa Yesu . Basi , Pilato akaamuru apewe .

text: And when Joseph had taken the body , he wrapped it in a clean linen cloth ,
text2: Yosefu akauchukua ule mwili akauzungushia sanda safi ya kitani ,

text: And laid it in his own new tomb , which he had hewn out in the rock : and he rolled a great stone to the door of the sepulchre , and departed .
text2: akauweka ndani ya kaburi lake jipya alilokuwa amelichonga katika mwamba . Kisha akavingirisha jiwe kubwa mbele ya mlango wa kaburi , akaenda zake .

text: And there was Mary Magdalene , and the other Mary , sitting over against the sepulchre .
text2: Maria Magdalene na yule Maria mwingine walikuwa wameketi kulielekea kaburi .

text: Now the next day , that followed the day of the preparation , the chief priests and Pharisees came together unto Pilate ,
text2: Kesho yake , yaani siku iliyofuata ile ya Maandalio , makuhani wakuu na Mafarisayo walimwendea Pilato ,

text: Saying , Sir , we remember that that deceiver said , while he was yet alive , After three days I will rise again .
text2: Wakasema , " Mheshimiwa , tunakumbuka kwamba yule mdanganyifu alisema kabla ya kufa ati , Baada ya siku tatu nitafufuka .

text: Command therefore that the sepulchre be made sure until the third day , lest his disciples come by night , and steal him away , and say unto the people , He is risen from the dead : so the last error shall be worse than the first .
text2: Kwa hiyo amuru kaburi lilindwe mpaka siku ya tatu ili wanafunzi wake wasije wakamwiba na kuwaambia watu kwamba amefufuka . Uongo huu wa mwisho utakuwa mbaya kuliko ule wa awali . "

text: Pilate said unto them , Ye have a watch : go your way , make it as sure as ye can .
text2: Pilato akawaambia , " Haya , mnao walinzi ; nendeni mkalinde kadiri mjuavyo . "

text: So they went , and made the sepulchre sure , sealing the stone , and setting a watch .
text2: Basi , wakaenda , wakalilinda kaburi , wakatia mhuri juu ya lile jiwe na kuacha hapo askari walinzi .

text: In the end of the sabbath , as it began to dawn toward the first day of the week , came Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the sepulchre .
text2: Baada ya Sabato , karibu na mapambazuko ya siku ile ya Jumapili , Maria Magdalene na yule Maria mwingine walikwenda kutazama lile kaburi .

text: And , behold , there was a great earthquake : for the angel of the Lord descended from heaven , and came and rolled back the stone from the door , and sat upon it .
text2: Ghafla kutatokea tetemeko kubwa la nchi ; malaika wa Bwana alishuka kutoka mbinguni , akalivingirisha lile jiwe , akalikalia .

text: His countenance was like lightning , and his raiment white as snow :
text2: Alionekana kama umeme na mavazi yake yalikuwa meupe kama theluji .

text: And for fear of him the keepers did shake , and became as dead men .
text2: Walinzi wa lile kaburi wakatetemeka kwa hofu kubwa , hata wakawa kama wamekufa .

text: And the angel answered and said unto the women , Fear not ye : for I know that ye seek Jesus , which was crucified .
text2: Lakini yule malaika akawaambia wale wanawake , " Ninyi msiogope ! Najua kwamba mnamtafuta Yesu aliyesulubiwa .

text: He is not here : for he is risen , as he said . Come , see the place where the Lord lay .
text2: Hayupo hapa maana amefufuka kama alivyosema . Njoni mkaone mahali alipokuwa amelala .

text: And go quickly , and tell his disciples that he is risen from the dead ; and , behold , he goeth before you into Galilee ; there shall ye see him : lo , I have told you .
text2: Basi , nendeni upesi mkawaambie wanafunzi wake kwamba amefufuka kutoka wafu , na sasa anawatangulieni kule Galilaya ; huko mtamwona . Haya , mimi nimekwisha waambieni . "

text: And they departed quickly from the sepulchre with fear and great joy ; and did run to bring his disciples word .
text2: Wakiwa wenye hofu na furaha kubwa , hao wanawake walitoka upesi kaburini , wakakimbia kwenda kuwaambia wanafunzi wake .

text: And as they went to tell his disciples , behold , Jesus met them , saying , All hail . And they came and held him by the feet , and worshipped him .
text2: Mara , Yesu akakutana nao , akawasalimu : " Salamu . " Hao wanawake wakamwendea , wakapiga magoti mbele yake , wakashika miguu yake .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Be not afraid : go tell my brethren that they go into Galilee , and there shall they see me .
text2: Kisha Yesu akawaambia , " Msiogope ! Nendeni mkawaambie ndugu zangu waende Galilaya , na huko wataniona . "

text: Now when they were going , behold , some of the watch came into the city , and shewed unto the chief priests all the things that were done .
text2: Wale wanawake walipokuwa wanakwenda zao , baadhi ya walinzi wa lile kaburi walikwenda mjini kutoa taarifa kwa makuhani wakuu juu ya mambo yote yaliyotukia .

text: And when they were assembled with the elders , and had taken counsel , they gave large money unto the soldiers ,
text2: Basi , wakakutana pamoja na wazee , na baada ya kushauriana , wakawapa wale askari kiasi kikubwa cha fedha

text: Saying , Say ye , His disciples came by night , and stole him away while we slept .
text2: wakisema , " Ninyi mtasema hivi : Wanafunzi wake walikuja usiku , wakamwiba sisi tukiwa tumelala .

text: And if this come to the governor ' s ears , we will persuade him , and secure you .
text2: Na kama mkuu wa mkoa akijua jambo hili , sisi tutasema naye na kuhakikisha kuwa ninyi hamtapata matatizo . "

text: So they took the money , and did as they were taught : and this saying is commonly reported among the Jews until this day .
text2: Wale walinzi wakazichukua zile fedha , wakafanya kama walivyofundishwa . Habari hiyo imeenea kati ya Wayahudi mpaka leo .

text: Then the eleven disciples went away into Galilee , into a mountain where Jesus had appointed them .
text2: Wale wanafunzi kumi na mmoja walikwenda Galilaya kwenye ule mlima aliowaagiza Yesu .

text: And when they saw him , they worshipped him : but some doubted .
text2: Walipomwona , wakamwabudu , ingawa wengine walikuwa na mashaka .

text: And Jesus came and spake unto them , saying , All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth .
text2: Yesu akaja karibu , akawaambia , " Nimepewa mamlaka yote mbinguni na duniani .

text: Go ye therefore , and teach all nations , baptizing them in the name of the Father , and of the Son , and of the Holy Ghost :
text2: Nendeni basi , mkawafanye watu wa mataifa yote wawe wanafunzi wangu ; mkiwabatiza kwa jina la Baba , na la Mwana , na la Roho Mtakatifu .

text: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you : and , lo , I am with you alway , even unto the end of the world . Amen .
text2: Wafundisheni kushika maagizo yote niliyowapeni . Nami nipo pamoja nanyi siku zote ; naam , mpaka mwisho wa nyakati . "

text: The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ , the Son of God ;
text2: Habari Njema ya Yesu Kristo , Mwana wa Mungu .

text: As it is written in the prophets , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Ilianza kama ilivyoandikwa katika kitabu cha nabii Isaya : " Tazama , namtuma mjumbe wangu akutangulie ; yeye atakutayarishia njia yako .

text: The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Sauti ya mtu imesikika jangwani : Mtayarishieni Bwana njia yake , nyoosheni mapito yake . "

text: John did baptize in the wilderness , and preach the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins .
text2: Yohane Mbatizaji alitokea jangwani , akahubiri kwamba ni lazima watu watubu na kubatizwa ili Mungu awasamehe dhambi zao .

text: And there went out unto him all the land of Judaea , and they of Jerusalem , and were all baptized of him in the river of Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Watu kutoka sehemu zote za Yudea na wenyeji wote wa Yerusalemu walimwendea , wakaziungama dhambi zao , naye akawabatiza katika mto Yordani .

text: And John was clothed with camel ' s hair , and with a girdle of a skin about his loins ; and he did eat locusts and wild honey ;
text2: Yohane alikuwa amevaa vazi lililofumwa kwa manyoya ya ngamia , na mkanda wa ngozi kiunoni mwake . Chakula chake kilikuwa nzige na asali ya mwituni .

text: And preached , saying , There cometh one mightier than I after me , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to stoop down and unloose .
text2: Naye alihubiri akisema , " Baada yangu anakuja mwenye uwezo zaidi kuliko mimi , ambaye mimi sistahili hata kuinama na kufungua kamba za viatu vyake .

text: I indeed have baptized you with water : but he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Mimi ninawabatiza kwa maji , lakini yeye atawabatiza kwa Roho Mtakatifu . "

text: And it came to pass in those days , that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee , and was baptized of John in Jordan .
text2: Siku hizo , Yesu alifika kutoka Nazareti , mji wa Galilaya , akabatizwa na Yohane katika mto Yordani .

text: And straightway coming up out of the water , he saw the heavens opened , and the Spirit like a dove descending upon him :
text2: Mara tu alipotoka majini , aliona mbingu zimefunguliwa , na Roho akishuka juu yake kama njiwa .

text: And there came a voice from heaven , saying , Thou art my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Sauti ikasikika kutoka mbinguni : " Wewe ni Mwanangu mpendwa , nimependezwa nawe . "

text: And immediately the Spirit driveth him into the wilderness .
text2: Mara akaongozwa na Roho kwenda jangwani ,

text: And he was there in the wilderness forty days , tempted of Satan ; and was with the wild beasts ; and the angels ministered unto him .
text2: akakaa huko siku arubaini akijaribiwa na Shetani . Alikuwa huko pamoja na wanyama wa porini , nao malaika wakawa wanamtumikia .

text: Now after that John was put in prison , Jesus came into Galilee , preaching the gospel of the kingdom of God ,
text2: Yohane alipokwisha fungwa gerezani , Yesu alikwenda Galilaya , akahubiri Habari Njema ya Mungu , akisema ,

text: And saying , The time is fulfilled , and the kingdom of God is at hand : repent ye , and believe the gospel .
text2: " Wakati umetimia , na Ufalme wa Mungu umekaribia . Tubuni na kuiamini Habari Njema ! "

text: Now as he walked by the sea of Galilee , he saw Simon and Andrew his brother casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Alipokuwa anapita kando ya ziwa Galilaya , aliwaona wavuvi wawili : Simoni na Andrea ndugu yake wakivua samaki kwa wavu .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Come ye after me , and I will make you to become fishers of men .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Nifuateni nami nitawafanya ninyi wavuvi wa watu . "

text: And straightway they forsook their nets , and followed him .
text2: Mara wakaziacha nyavu zao , wakamfuata .

text: And when he had gone a little further thence , he saw James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , who also were in the ship mending their nets .
text2: Alipokwenda mbele kidogo , aliwaona Yakobo na Yohane , wana wa Zebedayo . Nao pia walikuwa ndani ya mashua yao wakizitengeneza nyavu zao .

text: And straightway he called them : and they left their father Zebedee in the ship with the hired servants , and went after him .
text2: Yesu akawaita mara , nao wakamwacha baba yao Zebedayo katika mashua pamoja na wafanyakazi , wakamfuata .

text: And they went into Capernaum ; and straightway on the sabbath day he entered into the synagogue , and taught .
text2: Wakafika mjini Kafarnaumu , na mara ilipofika Sabato , Yesu akaingia katika Sunagogi , akaanza kufundisha .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for he taught them as one that had authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: Watu wote waliomsikia walishangazwa na mafundisho yake , maana hakuwa anafundisha kama walimu wao wa Sheria , bali kama mtu mwenye mamlaka .

text: And there was in their synagogue a man with an unclean spirit ; and he cried out ,
text2: Mara akatokea mle ndani ya sunagogi mtu mmoja mwenye pepo mchafu ,

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art , the Holy One of God .
text2: akapaaza sauti , " Una nini nasi , wewe Yesu wa Nazareti ? Je , umekuja kutuangamiza ? Najua wewe ni nani : wewe ni Mtakatifu wa Mungu ! "

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him .
text2: Yesu akamkemea , " Nyamaza ! Mtoke mtu huyu . "

text: And when the unclean spirit had torn him , and cried with a loud voice , he came out of him .
text2: Basi , huyo pepo mchafu akamtikisatikisa mtu huyo , kisha akalia kwa sauti kubwa , akamtoka .

text: And they were all amazed , insomuch that they questioned among themselves , saying , What thing is this ? what new doctrine is this ? for with authority commandeth he even the unclean spirits , and they do obey him .
text2: Watu wote wakashangaa , wakaulizana , " Ni mambo gani haya ? Je , ni mafundisho mapya ? Mtu huyu anayo mamlaka ya kuamuru hata pepo wachafu , nao wanamtii ! "

text: And immediately his fame spread abroad throughout all the region round about Galilee .
text2: Habari za Yesu zikaenea upesi kila mahali katika wilaya ya Galilaya .

text: And forthwith , when they were come out of the synagogue , they entered into the house of Simon and Andrew , with James and John .
text2: Wakatoka katika sunagogi , wakaenda moja kwa moja hadi nyumbani kwa Simoni na Andrea ; Yakobo na Yohane walikwenda pamoja nao .

text: But Simon ' s wife ' s mother lay sick of a fever , and anon they tell him of her .
text2: Basi , mama mmoja , mkwewe Simoni , alikuwa kitandani ana homa kali . Wakamwarifu Yesu mara alipowasili .

text: And he came and took her by the hand , and lifted her up ; and immediately the fever left her , and she ministered unto them .
text2: Yesu akamwendea huyo mama , akamshika mkono , akamwinua . Na ile homa ikamwacha , akaanza kuwatumikia .

text: And at even , when the sun did set , they brought unto him all that were diseased , and them that were possessed with devils .
text2: Jioni , jua lilipokwisha tua , wakamletea Yesu wagonjwa wote na watu waliopagawa na pepo .

text: And all the city was gathered together at the door .
text2: Watu wote wa mji ule wakakusanyika nje ya mlango .

text: And he healed many that were sick of divers diseases , and cast out many devils ; and suffered not the devils to speak , because they knew him .
text2: Naye Yesu akawaponya watu wengi waliokuwa na magonjwa mbalimbali ; aliwafukuza pepo wengi , lakini hakuwaruhusu kusema kitu maana walikuwa wanamjua yeye ni nani .

text: And in the morning , rising up a great while before day , he went out , and departed into a solitary place , and there prayed .
text2: Kesho yake , kabla ya mapambazuko , Yesu alitoka , akaenda mahali pa faragha kusali .

text: And Simon and they that were with him followed after him .
text2: Simoni na wenzake wakaenda kumtafuta .

text: And when they had found him , they said unto him , All men seek for thee .
text2: Walipomwona wakamwambia , " Kila mtu anakutafuta . "

text: And he said unto them , Let us go into the next towns , that I may preach there also : for therefore came I forth .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Twendeni katika miji mingine ya jirani nikahubiri huko pia , maana nimekuja kwa sababu hiyo . "

text: And he preached in their synagogues throughout all Galilee , and cast out devils .
text2: Basi , akaenda kila mahali Galilaya akihubiri katika masunagogi na kufukuza pepo .

text: And there came a leper to him , beseeching him , and kneeling down to him , and saying unto him , If thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Mtu mmoja mwenye ukoma alimwendea Yesu , akapiga magoti , akamwomba , " Ukitaka , waweza kunitakasa ! "

text: And Jesus , moved with compassion , put forth his hand , and touched him , and saith unto him , I will ; be thou clean .
text2: Yesu akamwonea huruma , akanyosha mkono wake , akamgusa na kumwambia , " Nataka , takasika ! "

text: And as soon as he had spoken , immediately the leprosy departed from him , and he was cleansed .
text2: Mara ukoma ukamwacha mtu huyo , akatakasika .

text: And he straitly charged him , and forthwith sent him away ;
text2: Kisha Yesu akamwambia aende zake upesi na kumwonya vikali ,

text: And saith unto him , See thou say nothing to any man : but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing those things which Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: " Usimwambie mtu yeyote jambo hili , ila nenda ukajionyeshe kwa kuhani ; kisha utoe sadaka kwa ajili ya kutakasika kwako kama alivyoamuru Mose , iwe uthibitisho kwao kwamba umepona . "

text: But he went out , and began to publish it much , and to blaze abroad the matter , insomuch that Jesus could no more openly enter into the city , but was without in desert places : and they came to him from every quarter .
text2: Lakini huyo mtu akaenda , akaanza kueneza habari hiyo kila mahali na kusema mambo mengi hata Yesu hakuweza tena kuingia katika mji wowote waziwazi ; ikamlazimu kukaa nje , mahali pa faragha . Hata hivyo , watu wakamwendea kutoka kila upande .

text: And again he entered into Capernaum , after some days ; and it was noised that he was in the house .
text2: Baada ya siku kadhaa , Yesu alirudi Kafarnaumu , watu wakapata habari kwamba alikuwa nyumbani .

text: And straightway many were gathered together , insomuch that there was no room to receive them , no , not so much as about the door : and he preached the word unto them .
text2: Basi , wakaja watu wengi sana hata nafasi yoyote ikakosekana mlangoni . Yesu alikuwa akiwahubiria ujumbe wake ,

text: And they come unto him , bringing one sick of the palsy , which was borne of four .
text2: wakati mtu mmoja aliyepooza alipoletwa kwake akiwa amechukuliwa na watu wanne .

text: And when they could not come nigh unto him for the press , they uncovered the roof where he was : and when they had broken it up , they let down the bed wherein the sick of the palsy lay .
text2: Kwa sababu ya huo umati wa watu , hawakuweza kumpeleka karibu na Yesu . Basi , wakatoboa sehemu ya dari iliyokuwa juu ya mahali alipokuwa Yesu . Walipokwisha pata nafasi , wakamteremsha huyo mtu akiwa amelala juu ya mkeka .

text: When Jesus saw their faith , he said unto the sick of the palsy , Son , thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Yesu alipoona imani yao , akamwambia huyo mtu aliyepooza , " Mwanangu , umesamehewa dhambi zako . "

text: But there were certain of the scribes sitting there , and reasoning in their hearts ,
text2: Baadhi ya walimu wa Sheria waliokuwa wameketi hapo wakawaza mioyoni mwao ,

text: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies ? who can forgive sins but God only ?
text2: " Anathubutuje kusema hivyo ? Anamkufuru Mungu ! Hakuna mtu awezaye kusamehe dhambi isipokuwa Mungu peke yake . "

text: And immediately when Jesus perceived in his spirit that they so reasoned within themselves , he said unto them , Why reason ye these things in your hearts ?
text2: Yesu alitambua mara mawazo yao , akawaambia , " Mbona mnawaza hivyo mioyoni mwenu ?

text: Whether is it easier to say to the sick of the palsy , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Ni lipi lililo rahisi zaidi : kumwambia mtu huyu aliyepooza , Umesamehewa dhambi zako , au kumwambia , Inuka ! Chukua mkeka wako utembee ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( he saith to the sick of the palsy , )
text2: Basi , nataka mjue kwamba Mwana wa Mtu anayo mamlaka ya kuwasamehe watu dhambi duniani . " Hapo akamwambia huyo mtu aliyepooza ,

text: I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy bed , and go thy way into thine house .
text2: " Nakwambia simama , chukua mkeka wako uende nyumbani ! "

text: And immediately he arose , took up the bed , and went forth before them all ; insomuch that they were all amazed , and glorified God , saying , We never saw it on this fashion .
text2: Mara , watu wote wakiwa wanamtazama , huyo mtu akainuka , akauchukua mkeka wake , akaenda zake . Watu wote wakashangaa na kumtukuza Mungu wakisema , " Hatujapata kamwe kuona jambo kama hili . "

text: And he went forth again by the sea side ; and all the multitude resorted unto him , and he taught them .
text2: Yesu alikwenda tena kando ya ziwa . Umati wa watu ukamwendea , naye akaanza kuwafundisha .

text: And as he passed by , he saw Levi the son of Alphaeus sitting at the receipt of custom , and said unto him , Follow me . And he arose and followed him .
text2: Alipokuwa akipita , akamwona Lawi mwana wa Alfayo , ameketi katika ofisi ya ushuru . Yesu akamwambia , " Nifuate ! " Lawi akasimama , akamfuata .

text: And it came to pass , that , as Jesus sat at meat in his house , many publicans and sinners sat also together with Jesus and his disciples : for there were many , and they followed him .
text2: Baadaye , Yesu alikuwa amekaa mezani , nyumbani kwa Lawi , kula chakula . Watoza ushuru wengi na wenye dhambi walikuwa wamemfuata Yesu na wengi wao wakawa wamekaa mezani pamoja naye na wanafunzi wake .

text: And when the scribes and Pharisees saw him eat with publicans and sinners , they said unto his disciples , How is it that he eateth and drinketh with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Basi , baadhi ya walimu wa Sheria ambao walikuwa Mafarisayo walipomwona Yesu akila pamoja na watu wenye dhambi na watoza ushuru , wakawauliza wanafunzi wake , " Kwa nini anakula pamoja na watoza ushuru na wenye dhambi ? "

text: When Jesus heard it , he saith unto them , They that are whole have no need of the physician , but they that are sick : I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Yesu alipowasikia , akawaambia , " Watu wenye afya hawahitaji daktari ; wanaomhitaji ni wale walio wagonjwa . Sikuja kuwaita watu wema , ila wenye dhambi . "

text: And the disciples of John and of the Pharisees used to fast : and they come and say unto him , Why do the disciples of John and of the Pharisees fast , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: Wakati mmoja wanafunzi wa Yohane na wanafunzi wa Mafarisayo walikuwa wanafunga . Basi , watu wakaja , wakamwuliza Yesu , " Kwa nini wanafunzi wa Yohane na wa Mafarisayo wanafunga , lakini wanafunzi wako hawafungi ? "

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ? as long as they have the bridegroom with them , they cannot fast .
text2: Yesu akajibu , " Walioalikwa harusini wanawezaje kufunga kama bwana harusi yupo pamoja nao ? Wakati wote wawapo pamoja na bwana harusi hawawezi kufunga .

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Lakini wakati utafika ambapo bwana harusi ataondolewa kati yao ; wakati huo ndipo watakapofunga .

text: No man also seweth a piece of new cloth on an old garment : else the new piece that filled it up taketh away from the old , and the rent is made worse .
text2: " Hakuna mtu anayekata kiraka kutoka katika nguo mpya na kukishonea katika nguo kuukuu . Kama akifanya hivyo , hicho kiraka kipya kitararuka kutoka hilo vazi kuukuu , nalo litaharibika zaidi .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles : else the new wine doth burst the bottles , and the wine is spilled , and the bottles will be marred : but new wine must be put into new bottles .
text2: Wala hakuna mtu atiaye divai mpya katika viriba vikuukuu . Kama akifanya hivyo , divai itavipasua hivyo viriba , nayo divai pamoja na hivyo viriba vitaharibika . Divai mpya hutiwa katika viriba vipya ! "

text: And it came to pass , that he went through the corn fields on the sabbath day ; and his disciples began , as they went , to pluck the ears of corn .
text2: Siku moja ya Sabato , Yesu alikuwa anapita katika mashamba ya ngano . Walipokuwa wanatembea , wanafunzi wake wakaanza kukwanyua masuke ya ngano .

text: And the Pharisees said unto him , Behold , why do they on the sabbath day that which is not lawful ?
text2: Mafarisayo wakawaambia , " Tazama ! Kwa nini wanafanya jambo ambalo si halali kufanya wakati wa Sabato ? "

text: And he said unto them , Have ye never read what David did , when he had need , and was an hungred , he , and they that were with him ?
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Je , hamjapata kusoma juu ya kile alichofanya Daudi wakati alipohitaji chakula ? Yeye pamoja na wenzake waliona njaa ,

text: How he went into the house of God in the days of Abiathar the high priest , and did eat the shewbread , which is not lawful to eat but for the priests , and gave also to them which were with him ?
text2: naye akaingia ndani ya Nyumba ya Mungu , akala ile mikate iliyowekwa mbele ya Mungu . Jambo hili lilifanyika wakati Abiathari alikuwa Kuhani Mkuu . Na ni makuhani tu peke yao waliokuwa wameruhusiwa kula mikate hiyo . Lakini Daudi aliila , tena akawapa na wenzake . "

text: And he said unto them , The sabbath was made for man , and not man for the sabbath :
text2: Basi , Yesu akawaambia , " Sabato iliwekwa kwa ajili ya binadamu na si binadamu kwa ajili ya Sabato !

text: Therefore the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Kwa hiyo , Mwana wa Mtu ni Bwana hata wa Sabato . "

text: And he entered again into the synagogue ; and there was a man there which had a withered hand .
text2: Yesu aliingia tena katika sunagogi na mle ndani mlikuwa na mtu aliyekuwa na mkono uliopooza .

text: And they watched him , whether he would heal him on the sabbath day ; that they might accuse him .
text2: Humo baadhi ya watu walimngojea amponye mtu huyo siku ya sabato ili wapate kumshtaki .

text: And he saith unto the man which had the withered hand , Stand forth .
text2: Yesu akamwambia huyo mtu aliyekuwa na mkono uliopooza , " Njoo hapa katikati . "

text: And he saith unto them , Is it lawful to do good on the sabbath days , or to do evil ? to save life , or to kill ? But they held their peace .
text2: Kisha , akawauliza , " Je , ni halali siku ya Sabato kutenda jambo jema au kutenda jambo baya ; kuokoa maisha au kuua ? " Lakini wao hawakusema neno .

text: And when he had looked round about on them with anger , being grieved for the hardness of their hearts , he saith unto the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it out : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Hapo akawatazama wote kwa hasira , akaona huzuni kwa sababu ya ugumu wa mioyo yao . Kisha akamwambia huyo mtu , " Nyosha mkono wako ! " Naye akaunyosha mkono wake , ukawa mzima tena .

text: And the Pharisees went forth , and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Mara Mafarisayo wakatoka nje , wakafanya shauri pamoja na watu wa kikundi cha Herode jinsi ya kumwangamiza Yesu .

text: But Jesus withdrew himself with his disciples to the sea : and a great multitude from Galilee followed him , and from Judaea ,
text2: Yesu aliondoka hapo pamoja na wanafunzi wake , akaenda kando ya ziwa , na umati wa watu ukamfuata . Watu hao walikuwa wametoka Yerusalemu , Yudea ,

text: And from Jerusalem , and from Idumaea , and from beyond Jordan ; and they about Tyre and Sidon , a great multitude , when they had heard what great things he did , came unto him .
text2: Idumea , ng ' ambo ya mto Yordani , Tiro na Sidoni . Watu hao wengi walimwendea Yesu kwa sababu ya kusikia mambo mengi aliyokuwa ameyatenda .

text: And he spake to his disciples , that a small ship should wait on him because of the multitude , lest they should throng him .
text2: Yesu akawaambia wanafunzi wake wamtayarishie mashua moja , ili umati wa watu usije ukamsonga .

text: For he had healed many ; insomuch that they pressed upon him for to touch him , as many as had plagues .
text2: Alikuwa amewaponya watu wengi , na wagonjwa wote wakawa wanamsonga ili wapate kumgusa .

text: And unclean spirits , when they saw him , fell down before him , and cried , saying , Thou art the Son of God .
text2: Na watu waliokuwa wamepagawa na pepo wachafu walipomwona , walijitupa chini mbele yake na kupaaza sauti , " Wewe ni Mwana wa Mungu ! "

text: And he straitly charged them that they should not make him known .
text2: Lakini Yesu akawaamuru kwa ukali wasimjulishe kwa watu .

text: And he goeth up into a mountain , and calleth unto him whom he would : and they came unto him .
text2: Yesu alipanda kilimani , akawaita wale aliowataka . Basi , wakamwendea ,

text: And he ordained twelve , that they should be with him , and that he might send them forth to preach ,
text2: naye akawateua watu kumi na wawili ambao aliwaita mitume , wakae naye , awatume kuhubiri

text: And to have power to heal sicknesses , and to cast out devils :
text2: na wawe na mamlaka ya kuwafukuza pepo .

text: And Simon he surnamed Peter ;
text2: Basi , hao kumi na wawili walioteuliwa ndio hawa : Simoni ( ambaye Yesu alimpa jina , Petro ) ,

text: And James the son of Zebedee , and John the brother of James ; and he surnamed them Boanerges , which is , The sons of thunder :
text2: Yakobo na Yohane , wana wa Zebedayo ( Yesu aliwapa hawa ndugu wawili jina Boanerge , maana yake " wanangurumo " ) ,

text: And Andrew , and Philip , and Bartholomew , and Matthew , and Thomas , and James the son of Alphaeus , and Thaddaeus , and Simon the Canaanite ,
text2: Andrea na Filipo , Batholomayo , Mathayo , Thoma , Yakobo mwana wa Alfayo , Thadayo , Simoni Mkanani na

text: And Judas Iscariot , which also betrayed him : and they went into an house .
text2: Yuda Iskarioti ambaye alimsaliti Yesu .

text: And the multitude cometh together again , so that they could not so much as eat bread .
text2: Kisha Yesu alikwenda nyumbani . Umati wa watu ukakusanyika tena , hata Yesu na wafuasi wake wasiweze kupata nafasi ya kula chakula .

text: And when his friends heard of it , they went out to lay hold on him : for they said , He is beside himself .
text2: Basi , watu wa jamaa yake walipopata habari hiyo wakatoka kwenda kumchukua maana walikuwa wanasema kwamba amepatwa na wazimu .

text: And the scribes which came down from Jerusalem said , He hath Beelzebub , and by the prince of the devils casteth he out devils .
text2: Nao walimu wa Sheria waliokuwa wametoka Yerusalemu , wakasema , " Ana Beelzebuli ! Tena , anawafukuza pepo kwa nguvu ya mkuu wa pepo . "

text: And he called them unto him , and said unto them in parables , How can Satan cast out Satan ?
text2: Hapo Yesu akawaita , akawaambia kwa mifano , " Shetani anawezaje kumfukuza Shetani ?

text: And if a kingdom be divided against itself , that kingdom cannot stand .
text2: Ikiwa utawala mmoja umegawanyika makundimakundi yanayopigana , utawala huo hauwezi kudumu .

text: And if a house be divided against itself , that house cannot stand .
text2: Tena , ikiwa jamaa moja imegawanyika makundimakundi yanayopingana , jamaa hiyo itaangamia .

text: And if Satan rise up against himself , and be divided , he cannot stand , but hath an end .
text2: Ikiwa basi , utawala wa Shetani umegawanyika vikundivikundi hauwezi kudumu , bali utaangamia kabisa .

text: No man can enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he will first bind the strong man ; and then he will spoil his house .
text2: " Hakuna mtu awezaye kuivamia nyumba ya mtu mwenye nguvu na kumnyang ' anya mali yake , isipokuwa kwanza amemfunga huyo mtu mwenye nguvu ; hapo ndipo atakapoweza kumnyang ' anya mali yake .

text: Verily I say unto you , All sins shall be forgiven unto the sons of men , and blasphemies wherewith soever they shall blaspheme :
text2: " Kweli nawaambieni , watu watasamehewa dhambi zao zote na kufuru zao zote ;

text: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness , but is in danger of eternal damnation :
text2: lakini anayesema mabaya dhidi ya Roho Mtakatifu , hatasamehewa kamwe ; ana hatia ya dhambi ya milele . "

text: Because they said , He hath an unclean spirit .
text2: ( Yesu alisema hivyo kwa sababu walikuwa wanasema , " Ana pepo mchafu . " )

text: There came then his brethren and his mother , and , standing without , sent unto him , calling him .
text2: Mama yake Yesu na ndugu zake walifika hapo , wakasimama nje , wakampelekea ujumbe kutaka kumwona .

text: And the multitude sat about him , and they said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren without seek for thee .
text2: Umati wa watu ulikuwa umekaa hapo kumzunguka . Basi , wakamwambia , " Mama yako na ndugu zako wako nje , wanataka kukuona . "

text: And he answered them , saying , Who is my mother , or my brethren ?
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Mama yangu na ndugu zangu ni kina nani ? "

text: And he looked round about on them which sat about him , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Hapo akawatazama watu waliokuwa wamemzunguka , akasema , " Tazameni ! Hawa ndio mama yangu na ndugu zangu .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of God , the same is my brother , and my sister , and mother .
text2: Mtu yeyote anayefanya anayotaka Mungu , huyo ndiye kaka yangu , dada yangu na mama yangu . "

text: And he began again to teach by the sea side : and there was gathered unto him a great multitude , so that he entered into a ship , and sat in the sea ; and the whole multitude was by the sea on the land .
text2: Yesu alianza kufundisha tena akiwa kando ya ziwa . Umati mkubwa wa watu ulimzunguka hata ikambidi aingie katika mashua na kuketi . Watu wakawa wamekaa katika nchi kavu , kando ya ziwa .

text: And he taught them many things by parables , and said unto them in his doctrine ,
text2: Aliwafundisha mambo mengi kwa mifano , na katika mafundisho yake aliwaambia ,

text: Hearken ; Behold , there went out a sower to sow :
text2: " Sikilizeni ! Mpanzi alikwenda kupanda mbegu .

text: And it came to pass , as he sowed , some fell by the way side , and the fowls of the air came and devoured it up .
text2: Alipokuwa akipanda , nyingine zilianguka njiani , ndege wakaja wakazila .

text: And some fell on stony ground , where it had not much earth ; and immediately it sprang up , because it had no depth of earth :
text2: Nyingine zilianguka penye mawe pasipokuwa na udongo mwingi . Mbegu hizo ziliota mara kwa kuwa udongo haukuwa na kina .

text: But when the sun was up , it was scorched ; and because it had no root , it withered away .
text2: Jua lilipochomoza , zikachomeka ; na kwa kuwa mizizi yake haikuwa na nguvu , zikanyauka .

text: And some fell among thorns , and the thorns grew up , and choked it , and it yielded no fruit .
text2: Nyingine zilianguka kwenye miti ya miiba , nayo ikakua na kuzisonga , nazo hazikuzaa nafaka .

text: And other fell on good ground , and did yield fruit that sprang up and increased ; and brought forth , some thirty , and some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Nyingine zilianguka katika udongo mzuri , zikakua na kuzaa : moja punje thelathini , moja sitini na nyingine mia . "

text: And he said unto them , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Kisha akawaambia , " Mwenye masikio na asikie ! "

text: And when he was alone , they that were about him with the twelve asked of him the parable .
text2: Yesu alipokuwa peke yake , baadhi ya wale waliomsikia walimwendea pamoja na wale kumi na wawili , wakamwuliza juu ya hiyo mifano .

text: And he said unto them , Unto you it is given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God : but unto them that are without , all these things are done in parables :
text2: Naye akawaambia , " Ninyi mmejaliwa kujua siri ya Utawala wa Mungu , lakini wale walio nje wataambiwa kila kitu kwa mifano ,

text: That seeing they may see , and not perceive ; and hearing they may hear , and not understand ; lest at any time they should be converted , and their sins should be forgiven them .
text2: ili , Watazame kweli , lakini wasione . Wasikie kweli , lakini wasielewe . La sivyo , wangemgeukia Mungu , naye angewasamehe . "

text: And he said unto them , Know ye not this parable ? and how then will ye know all parables ?
text2: Basi , Yesu akawauliza , " Je , ninyi hamwelewi mfano huu ? Mtawezaje basi , kuelewa mfano wowote ?

text: The sower soweth the word .
text2: Mpanzi hupanda neno la Mungu .

text: And these are they by the way side , where the word is sown ; but when they have heard , Satan cometh immediately , and taketh away the word that was sown in their hearts .
text2: Watu wengine ni kama wale walio njiani ambapo mbegu zilianguka . Hawa hulisikia hilo neno lakini mara Shetani huja na kuliondoa neno hilo lililopandwa ndani yao .

text: And these are they likewise which are sown on stony ground ; who , when they have heard the word , immediately receive it with gladness ;
text2: Watu wengine ni kama zile mbegu zilizopandwa penye mawe . Mara tu wanapolisikia hilo neno hulipokea kwa furaha .

text: And have no root in themselves , and so endure but for a time : afterward , when affliction or persecution ariseth for the word ' s sake , immediately they are offended .
text2: Lakini haliwaingii na kuwa na mizizi ndani yao ; huendelea kulizingatia kwa kitambo tu , na wakati taabu au udhalimu vinapotokea kwa sababu ya hilo neno mara wanakata tamaa .

text: And these are they which are sown among thorns ; such as hear the word ,
text2: Watu wengine ni kama zile mbegu zilizoanguka penye miti ya miiba . Huo ni mfano wa wale wanaolisikia hilo neno ,

text: And the cares of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , and the lusts of other things entering in , choke the word , and it becometh unfruitful .
text2: lakini wasiwasi wa ulimwengu huu , anasa za mali na tamaa za kila namna huwaingia na kulisonga hilo neno , nao hawazai matunda .

text: And these are they which are sown on good ground ; such as hear the word , and receive it , and bring forth fruit , some thirtyfold , some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Lakini wengine ni kama zile mbegu zilizopandwa katika udongo mzuri . Hawa hulisikia hilo neno , wakalipokea , wakazaa matunda : wengine thelathini , wengine sitini na wengine mia moja . "

text: And he said unto them , Is a candle brought to be put under a bushel , or under a bed ? and not to be set on a candlestick ?
text2: Yesu akaendelea kuwaambia , " Je , watu huwasha taa wakaileta ndani na kuifunika kwa pishi au kuiweka mvunguni ? La ! Huiweka juu ya kinara .

text: For there is nothing hid , which shall not be manifested ; neither was any thing kept secret , but that it should come abroad .
text2: Basi , kila kilichofichwa kitafichuliwa , na kila kilichofunikwa kitafunuliwa .

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Mwenye masikio na asikie ! "

text: And he said unto them , Take heed what ye hear : with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you : and unto you that hear shall more be given .
text2: Akawaambia pia , " Sikilizeni kwa makini mnachosikia ! Kipimo kilekile mnachowapimia watu wengine , ndicho mtakachopimiwa ; tena mtazidishiwa .

text: For he that hath , to him shall be given : and he that hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he hath .
text2: Aliye na kitu atapewa zaidi ; asiye na kitu , hata kile alicho nacho kitachukuliwa . "

text: And he said , So is the kingdom of God , as if a man should cast seed into the ground ;
text2: Yesu akaendelea kusema , " Ufalme wa Mungu ni kama ifuatavyo . Mtu hupanda mbegu shambani .

text: And should sleep , and rise night and day , and the seed should spring and grow up , he knoweth not how .
text2: Usiku hulala , mchana yu macho na wakati huo mbegu zinaota na kukua ; yeye hajui inavyofanyika .

text: For the earth bringeth forth fruit of herself ; first the blade , then the ear , after that the full corn in the ear .
text2: Udongo wenyewe huiwezesha mimea kukua na kuzaa matunda : kwanza huchipua jani changa , kisha suke , na mwishowe nafaka ndani ya suke .

text: But when the fruit is brought forth , immediately he putteth in the sickle , because the harvest is come .
text2: Nafaka inapoiva , huyo mtu huanza kutumia mundu wake , maana wakati wa mavuno umefika . "

text: And he said , Whereunto shall we liken the kingdom of God ? or with what comparison shall we compare it ?
text2: Tena , Yesu akasema , " Tuufananishe Utawala wa Mungu na nini ? Tuueleze kwa mifano gani ?

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which , when it is sown in the earth , is less than all the seeds that be in the earth :
text2: Ni kama mbegu ya haradali ambayo ni ndogo kuliko mbegu zote .

text: But when it is sown , it groweth up , and becometh greater than all herbs , and shooteth out great branches ; so that the fowls of the air may lodge under the shadow of it .
text2: Lakini ikisha pandwa , huota na kuwa mmea mkubwa kuliko mimea yote ya shambani . Matawi yake huwa makubwa hata ndege wa angani huweza kujenga viota vyao katika kivuli chake . "

text: And with many such parables spake he the word unto them , as they were able to hear it .
text2: Yesu aliwahubiria ujumbe wake kwa mifano mingine mingi ya namna hiyo ; aliongea nao kadiri walivyoweza kusikia .

text: But without a parable spake he not unto them : and when they were alone , he expounded all things to his disciples .
text2: Hakuongea nao chochote bila kutumia mifano ; lakini alipokuwa pamoja na wanafunzi wake peke yao alikuwa akiwafafanulia kila kitu .

text: And the same day , when the even was come , he saith unto them , Let us pass over unto the other side .
text2: Jioni , siku hiyohiyo , Yesu aliwaambia wanafunzi wake , " Tuvuke ziwa , twende ng ' ambo . "

text: And when they had sent away the multitude , they took him even as he was in the ship . And there were also with him other little ships .
text2: Basi , wakauacha ule umati wa watu , wakamchukua Yesu katika mashua alimokuwa . Palikuwapo pia mashua nyingine hapo .

text: And there arose a great storm of wind , and the waves beat into the ship , so that it was now full .
text2: Basi , dhoruba kali ikaanza kuvuma , mawimbi yakaipiga ile mashua hata ikaanza kujaa maji .

text: And he was in the hinder part of the ship , asleep on a pillow : and they awake him , and say unto him , Master , carest thou not that we perish ?
text2: Yesu alikuwa sehemu ya nyuma ya mashua , amelala juu ya mto . Basi , wanafunzi wakamwamsha na kumwambia , " Mwalimu , je , hujali kwamba sisi tunaangamia ? "

text: And he arose , and rebuked the wind , and said unto the sea , Peace , be still . And the wind ceased , and there was a great calm .
text2: Basi , akaamka , akaukemea ule upepo na kuyaamrisha mawimbi ya ziwa , " Kimya ! Tulia ! " Hapo upepo ukakoma , kukawa shwari kabisa .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye so fearful ? how is it that ye have no faith ?
text2: Kisha Yesu akawaambia wanafunzi wake , " Mbona mnaogopa ? Je , bado hamna imani ? "

text: And they feared exceedingly , and said one to another , What manner of man is this , that even the wind and the sea obey him ?
text2: Nao wakaogopa sana , wakawa wanaulizana , " Huyu ni nani basi , hata upepo na mawimbi vinamtii ? "

text: And they came over unto the other side of the sea , into the country of the Gadarenes .
text2: Basi , wakafika katika nchi ya Wagerase , ng ' ambo ya ziwa .

text: And when he was come out of the ship , immediately there met him out of the tombs a man with an unclean spirit ,
text2: Mara tu Yesu aliposhuka mashuani , mtu mmoja aliyepagawa na pepo mchafu alitoka makaburini , akakutana naye .

text: Who had his dwelling among the tombs ; and no man could bind him , no , not with chains :
text2: Mtu huyo alikuwa akiishi makaburini wala hakuna mtu aliyeweza tena kumfunga kwa minyororo .

text: Because that he had been often bound with fetters and chains , and the chains had been plucked asunder by him , and the fetters broken in pieces : neither could any man tame him .
text2: Mara nyingi walimfunga kwa pingu na minyororo lakini kila mara aliweza kuikata hiyo minyororo na kuzivunja hizo pingu , wala hakuna mtu aliyeweza kumzuia .

text: And always , night and day , he was in the mountains , and in the tombs , crying , and cutting himself with stones .
text2: Mchana na usiku alikaa makaburini na milimani akipaaza sauti na kujikatakata kwa mawe .

text: But when he saw Jesus afar off , he ran and worshipped him ,
text2: Alipomwona Yesu kwa mbali , alimkimbilia , akamwinamia

text: And cried with a loud voice , and said , What have I to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of the most high God ? I adjure thee by God , that thou torment me not .
text2: akisema kwa sauti kubwa , " Una shauri gani nami , wewe Yesu Mwana wa Mungu aliye juu ? Kwa jina la Mungu , nakusihi usinitese ! "

text: For he said unto him , Come out of the man , thou unclean spirit .
text2: ( Alisema hivyo kwa kuwa Yesu alikuwa amemwambia , " Pepo mchafu , mtoke mtu huyu . " )

text: And he asked him , What is thy name ? And he answered , saying , My name is Legion : for we are many .
text2: Basi , Yesu akamwuliza , " Jina lako nani ? " Naye akajibu , " Jina langu ni Jeshi , maana sisi tu wengi . "

text: And he besought him much that he would not send them away out of the country .
text2: Kisha akamsihi Yesu asiwafukuze hao pepo katika nchi ile .

text: Now there was there nigh unto the mountains a great herd of swine feeding .
text2: Kulikuwa na kundi kubwa la nguruwe malishoni kwenye mteremko wa mlima .

text: And all the devils besought him , saying , Send us into the swine , that we may enter into them .
text2: Basi , hao pepo wakamsihi , " Utupeleke kwa hao nguruwe , tuwaingie . "

text: And forthwith Jesus gave them leave . And the unclean spirits went out , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the sea , ( they were about two thousand ; ) and were choked in the sea .
text2: Naye akawaruhusu . Basi , hao pepo wachafu wakatoka , wakawaingia wale nguruwe . Kundi lote la nguruwe wapatao elfu mbili likaporomoka kwenye ule mteremko mkali mpaka ziwani , likatumbukia majini .

text: And they that fed the swine fled , and told it in the city , and in the country . And they went out to see what it was that was done .
text2: Wachungaji wa hao nguruwe walikimbia , wakatangaza jambo hilo mjini na mashambani . Watu wakafika kuona yaliyotukia .

text: And they come to Jesus , and see him that was possessed with the devil , and had the legion , sitting , and clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Wakamwendea Yesu , wakamwona na mtu yuleyule aliyekuwa amepagawa na jeshi la pepo ameketi chini , amevaa nguo na ana akili yake sawa , wakaogopa .

text: And they that saw it told them how it befell to him that was possessed with the devil , and also concerning the swine .
text2: Watu walishuhudia tukio hilo wakaeleza wengine mambo yaliyompata huyo mtu aliyekuwa amepagawa na pepo na juu ya wale nguruwe .

text: And they began to pray him to depart out of their coasts .
text2: Basi , wakaanza kumwomba aondoke katika nchi yao .

text: And when he was come into the ship , he that had been possessed with the devil prayed him that he might be with him .
text2: Yesu alipokuwa anapanda mashuani , yule mtu aliyekuwa amepagawa na pepo akamwomba amruhusu kwenda naye .

text: Howbeit Jesus suffered him not , but saith unto him , Go home to thy friends , and tell them how great things the Lord hath done for thee , and hath had compassion on thee .
text2: Lakini Yesu akamkatalia . Badala yake akamwambia , " Nenda nyumbani kwa jamaa yako , ukawaambie mambo yote Bwana aliyokutendea na jinsi alivyokuonea huruma . "

text: And he departed , and began to publish in Decapolis how great things Jesus had done for him : and all men did marvel .
text2: Basi , huyo mtu akaenda , akaanza kutangaza huko Dekapoli mambo yote Yesu aliyomtendea ; watu wote wakashangaa .

text: And when Jesus was passed over again by ship unto the other side , much people gathered unto him : and he was nigh unto the sea .
text2: Yesu alivukia tena upande wa pili wa ziwa kwa mashua . Umati mkubwa wa watu ukakusanyika mbele yake , naye akawa amesimama kando ya ziwa .

text: And , behold , there cometh one of the rulers of the synagogue , Jairus by name ; and when he saw him , he fell at his feet ,
text2: Hapo akaja mmojawapo wa maofisa wa sunagogi , jina lake Yairo . Alipomwona Yesu , akajitupa mbele ya miguu yake ,

text: And besought him greatly , saying , My little daughter lieth at the point of death : I pray thee , come and lay thy hands on her , that she may be healed ; and she shall live .
text2: akamsihi akisema , " Binti yangu mdogo ni mgonjwa karibu kufa . Twende tafadhali , ukamwekee mikono yako , apate kupona na kuishi . "

text: And Jesus went with him ; and much people followed him , and thronged him .
text2: Basi , Yesu akaondoka pamoja naye . Watu wengi sana wakamfuata , wakawa wanamsonga kila upande .

text: And a certain woman , which had an issue of blood twelve years ,
text2: Mmojawapo alikuwa mwanamke mwenye ugonjwa wa kutokwa damu kwa muda wa miaka kumi na miwili .

text: And had suffered many things of many physicians , and had spent all that she had , and was nothing bettered , but rather grew worse ,
text2: Mwanamke huyo alikuwa amekwisha sumbuka sana kuwaendea waganga wengi . Na ingawa alikuwa amekwisha tumia mali yake yote , hakupata nafuu bali hali yake ilizidi kuwa mbaya .

text: When she had heard of Jesus , came in the press behind , and touched his garment .
text2: Alikuwa amesikia habari za Yesu , na hivyo akaupenya msongamano wa watu kutoka nyuma , akagusa vazi lake .

text: For she said , If I may touch but his clothes , I shall be whole .
text2: Alifanya hivyo , maana alijisemea , " Nikigusa tu vazi lake , nitapona . "

text: And straightway the fountain of her blood was dried up ; and she felt in her body that she was healed of that plague .
text2: Mara chemchemi ya damu yake ikakauka , akajisikia mwilini mwake kwamba ameponywa ugonjwa wake .

text: And Jesus , immediately knowing in himself that virtue had gone out of him , turned him about in the press , and said , Who touched my clothes ?
text2: Yesu alitambua mara kwamba nguvu imemtoka . Basi akaugeukia ule umati wa watu , akauliza , " Nani aliyegusa mavazi yangu ? "

text: And his disciples said unto him , Thou seest the multitude thronging thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: Wanafunzi wake wakamjibu , " Unaona jinsi watu wanavyokusonga ; mbona wauliza nani aliyekugusa ? "

text: And he looked round about to see her that had done this thing .
text2: Lakini Yesu akaendelea kutazama amwone huyo aliyefanya hivyo .

text: But the woman fearing and trembling , knowing what was done in her , came and fell down before him , and told him all the truth .
text2: Hapo huyo mwanamke , akifahamu yaliyompata , akajitokeza akitetemeka kwa hofu , akajitupa chini mbele ya Yesu na kusema ukweli wote .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace , and be whole of thy plague .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Binti , imani yako imekuponya . Nenda kwa amani , upone kabisa ugonjwa wako . "

text: While he yet spake , there came from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house certain which said , Thy daughter is dead : why troublest thou the Master any further ?
text2: Yesu alipokuwa bado anaongea , watu walifika kutoka nyumbani kwa yule ofisa wa sunagogi , wakamwambia , " Binti yako amekwisha kufa . Ya nini kuendelea kumsumbua Mwalimu ? "

text: As soon as Jesus heard the word that was spoken , he saith unto the ruler of the synagogue , Be not afraid , only believe .
text2: Lakini , bila kujali walichosema , Yesu akamwambia mkuu wa sunagogi , " Usiogope , amini tu . "

text: And he suffered no man to follow him , save Peter , and James , and John the brother of James .
text2: Wala hakumruhusu mtu yeyote kufuatana naye ila Petro , Yakobo na Yohane nduguye Yakobo .

text: And he cometh to the house of the ruler of the synagogue , and seeth the tumult , and them that wept and wailed greatly .
text2: Wakafika nyumbani kwa ofisa wa sunagogi naye Yesu akasikia makelele , kilio na maombolezo mengi .

text: And when he was come in , he saith unto them , Why make ye this ado , and weep ? the damsel is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Akaingia ndani , akawaambia , " Mbona mnapiga kelele na kulia ? Msichana hakufa , amelala tu . "

text: And they laughed him to scorn . But when he had put them all out , he taketh the father and the mother of the damsel , and them that were with him , and entereth in where the damsel was lying .
text2: Lakini wao wakamcheka . Basi , akawaondoa wote nje , akawachukua baba na mama ya huyo msichana na wale wanafunzi wake , wakaingia chumbani alimokuwa huyo msichana .

text: And he took the damsel by the hand , and said unto her , Talitha cumi ; which is , being interpreted , Damsel , I say unto thee , arise .
text2: Kisha akamshika mkono , akamwambia , " Talitha , kumi , " maana yake , " Msichana , nakwambia , amka ! "

text: And straightway the damsel arose , and walked ; for she was of the age of twelve years . And they were astonished with a great astonishment .
text2: Mara msichana akasimama , akaanza kutembea . ( Alikuwa na umri wa miaka kumi na miwili . ) Hapo watu wakashangaa kupita kiasi .

text: And he charged them straitly that no man should know it ; and commanded that something should be given her to eat .
text2: Yesu akawakataza sana wasimjulishe mtu jambo hilo . Kisha akawaambia wampe huyo msichana chakula .

text: And he went out from thence , and came into his own country ; and his disciples follow him .
text2: Yesu aliondoka hapo akaenda katika kijiji chake , akifuatwa na wanafunzi wake .

text: And when the sabbath day was come , he began to teach in the synagogue : and many hearing him were astonished , saying , From whence hath this man these things ? and what wisdom is this which is given unto him , that even such mighty works are wrought by his hands ?
text2: Siku ya Sabato ilipofika , alianza kufundisha katika sunagogi . Wengi waliomsikia walishangaa , wakasema , " Je , ameyapata wapi mambo haya ? Ni hekima gani hii aliyopewa ? Tena , anatendaje maajabu haya anayoyafanya ?

text: Is not this the carpenter , the son of Mary , the brother of James , and Joses , and of Juda , and Simon ? and are not his sisters here with us ? And they were offended at him .
text2: Je , huyu si yule seremala mwana wa Maria , na ndugu yao kina Yakobo , Yose , Yuda na Simoni ; Je , dada zake si wanaishi papa hapa kwetu ? " Basi , wakawa na mashaka naye .

text: But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , but in his own country , and among his own kin , and in his own house .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Nabii hakosi heshima isipokuwa katika nchi yake , kwa jamaa zake na nyumbani mwake . "

text: And he could there do no mighty work , save that he laid his hands upon a few sick folk , and healed them .
text2: Hakuweza kutenda miujiza hapo , ila aliwawekea mikono wagonjwa wachache , akawaponya .

text: And he marvelled because of their unbelief . And he went round about the villages , teaching .
text2: Alishangaa sana kwa sababu ya kutoamini kwao . Kisha Yesu alivitembelea vijiji vya pale karibu akiwafundisha watu .

text: And he called unto him the twelve , and began to send them forth by two and two ; and gave them power over unclean spirits ;
text2: Aliwaita wale wanafunzi kumi na wawili , akaanza kuwatuma wawiliwawili . Aliwapa uwezo wa kuwatoa pepo wachafu ,

text: And commanded them that they should take nothing for their journey , save a staff only ; no scrip , no bread , no money in their purse :
text2: na kuwaamuru , " Msichukue chochote mnapokwenda isipokuwa fimbo tu . Msichukue mkate , wala mkoba , wala fedha kibindoni .

text: But be shod with sandals ; and not put on two coats .
text2: Vaeni viatu lakini msivae kanzu mbili . "

text: And he said unto them , In what place soever ye enter into an house , there abide till ye depart from that place .
text2: Tena aliwaambia , " Popote mtakapokaribishwa nyumbani , kaeni humo mpaka mtakapoondoka mahali hapo .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear you , when ye depart thence , shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them . Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Mahali popote ambapo watu watakataa kuwakaribisheni au kuwasikiliza , ondokeni hapo na kuyakung ' uta mavumbi miguuni mwenu kama onyo kwao . "

text: And they went out , and preached that men should repent .
text2: Basi , wakaondoka , wakahubiri watu watubu .

text: And they cast out many devils , and anointed with oil many that were sick , and healed them .
text2: Waliwafukuza pepo wengi wabaya ; wakawapaka mafuta wagonjwa wengi , wakawaponya .

text: And king Herod heard of him ; ( for his name was spread abroad : ) and he said , That John the Baptist was risen from the dead , and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Basi , mfalme Herode alisikia juu ya hayo yote , maana sifa za Yesu zilienea kila mahali . Baadhi ya watu walikuwa wakisema , " Yohane Mbatizaji amefufuka kutoka wafu , ndiyo maana nguvu za miujiza zinafanya kazi ndani yake . "

text: Others said , That it is Elias . And others said , That it is a prophet , or as one of the prophets .
text2: Wengine walisema , " Mtu huyu ni Eliya . " Wengine walisema , " Huyu ni nabii kama mmojawapo wa manabii wa kale . "

text: But when Herod heard thereof , he said , It is John , whom I beheaded : he is risen from the dead .
text2: Lakini Herode alipopata habari hizi alisema , " Huyu ni Yohane ! Nilimkata kichwa , lakini amefufuka . "

text: For Herod himself had sent forth and laid hold upon John , and bound him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife : for he had married her .
text2: Hapo awali Herode mwenyewe alikuwa ameamuru Yohane atiwe nguvuni , akamfunga gerezani . Herode alifanya hivyo kwa sababu ya Herodia ambaye Herode alimwoa ingawaje alikuwa mke wa Filipo , ndugu yake .

text: For John had said unto Herod , It is not lawful for thee to have thy brother ' s wife .
text2: Yohane alikuwa amemwambia Herode , " Si halali kwako kumchukua mke wa ndugu yako . "

text: Therefore Herodias had a quarrel against him , and would have killed him ; but she could not :
text2: Basi Herodia alimchukia sana Yohane , akataka kumwua , asiweze .

text: For Herod feared John , knowing that he was a just man and an holy , and observed him ; and when he heard him , he did many things , and heard him gladly .
text2: Herode alimwogopa Yohane kwa maana alijua kwamba yeye ni mtu mwema na mtakatifu , na hivyo akamlinda . Herode alipenda kumsikiliza Yohane , ingawaje baada ya kumsikiliza , alifadhaika sana .

text: And when a convenient day was come , that Herod on his birthday made a supper to his lords , high captains , and chief estates of Galilee ;
text2: Ikapatikana nafasi , wakati wa sikukuu ya kuzaliwa kwake Herode . Herode aliwafanyia karamu wazee wa baraza lake , majemadari na viongozi wa Galilaya .

text: And when the daughter of the said Herodias came in , and danced , and pleased Herod and them that sat with him , the king said unto the damsel , Ask of me whatsoever thou wilt , and I will give it thee .
text2: Basi , binti yake Herodia aliingia , akacheza , akawafurahisha sana Herode na wageni wake . Mfalme akamwambia huyo msichana , " Niombe chochote utakacho , nami nitakupa . "

text: And he sware unto her , Whatsoever thou shalt ask of me , I will give it thee , unto the half of my kingdom .
text2: Tena akamwapia , " Chochote utakachoniomba , nitakupa : hata ikiwa ni nusu ya ufalme wangu . "

text: And she went forth , and said unto her mother , What shall I ask ? And she said , The head of John the Baptist .
text2: Hapo huyo msichana akatoka , akamwuliza mama yake , " Niombe nini ? " Naye akamjibu , " Kichwa cha Yohane mbatizaji . "

text: And she came in straightway with haste unto the king , and asked , saying , I will that thou give me by and by in a charger the head of John the Baptist .
text2: Msichana akamrudia mfalme mbio akamwomba , " Nataka unipe sasa hivi katika sinia kichwa cha Yohane mbatizaji . "

text: And the king was exceeding sorry ; yet for his oath ' s sake , and for their sakes which sat with him , he would not reject her .
text2: Mfalme akahuzunika sana , lakini kwa sababu ya kiapo chake , na kwa ajili ya wale wageni wake karamuni , hakutaka kumkatalia .

text: And immediately the king sent an executioner , and commanded his head to be brought : and he went and beheaded him in the prison ,
text2: Basi , mfalme akamwamuru askari kukileta kichwa cha Yohane . Askari akaenda , akamkata kichwa Yohane mle gerezani ,

text: And brought his head in a charger , and gave it to the damsel : and the damsel gave it to her mother .
text2: akakileta katika sinia , akampa msichana naye msichana akampa mama yake .

text: And when his disciples heard of it , they came and took up his corpse , and laid it in a tomb .
text2: Wanafunzi wa Yohane walipopata habari , walikwenda wakachukua mwili wake , wakauzika kaburini .

text: And the apostles gathered themselves together unto Jesus , and told him all things , both what they had done , and what they had taught .
text2: Wale mitume walirudi , wakakusanyika mbele ya Yesu wakamwarifu yote waliyotenda na kufundisha .

text: And he said unto them , Come ye yourselves apart into a desert place , and rest a while : for there were many coming and going , and they had no leisure so much as to eat .
text2: Alisema hivyo kwa kuwa kulikuwa na watu wengi mno walikuwa wanafika hapo na kuondoka hata Yesu na wanafunzi wake hawakuweza kupata nafasi ya kula chakula . Basi , Yesu akawaambia , " Twendeni peke yetu mahali pa faragha kula chakula , mkapumzike kidogo . "

text: And they departed into a desert place by ship privately .
text2: Basi , Wakaondoka peke yao kwa mashua , wakaenda mahali pa faragha .

text: And the people saw them departing , and many knew him , and ran afoot thither out of all cities , and outwent them , and came together unto him .
text2: Lakini watu wengi waliwaona wakienda , wakawatambua . Hivyo wengi wakatoka katika kila mji , wakakimbilia huko Yesu na wanafunzi wake walikokuwa wanakwenda , wakawatangulia kufika .
