text: And Jesus , when he came out , saw much people , and was moved with compassion toward them , because they were as sheep not having a shepherd : and he began to teach them many things .
text2: Waliposhuka pwani , Yesu aliona umati mkubwa wa watu , akawahurumia , kwa sababu walikuwa kama kondoo wasio na mchungaji . Akaanza kuwafundisha mambo mengi .

text: And when the day was now far spent , his disciples came unto him , and said , This is a desert place , and now the time is far passed :
text2: Saa za mchana zilikwisha pita . Basi , wanafunzi wakamwendea Yesu , wakamwambia , " Hapa ni nyikani , na sasa kunakuchwa .

text: Send them away , that they may go into the country round about , and into the villages , and buy themselves bread : for they have nothing to eat .
text2: Afadhali uwaage watu waende mashambani na katika vijiji vya jirani , wanunue chakula . "

text: He answered and said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they say unto him , Shall we go and buy two hundred pennyworth of bread , and give them to eat ?
text2: Lakini Yesu akawaambia , " Wapeni ninyi chakula . " Nao wakamwuliza , " Je , twende kununua mikate kwa fedha dinari mia mbili , na kuwapa chakula ? "

text: He saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? go and see . And when they knew , they say , Five , and two fishes .
text2: Yesu akawauliza , " Mnayo mikate mingapi ? Nendeni mkatazame . " Walipokwisha tazama , wakamwambia , " Kuna mikate mitano na samaki wawili . "

text: And he commanded them to make all sit down by companies upon the green grass .
text2: Basi , Yesu akawaamuru wanafunzi wawaketishe watu wote makundimakundi penye nyasi .

text: And they sat down in ranks , by hundreds , and by fifties .
text2: Nao wakaketi makundimakundi ya watu mia moja na ya watu hamsini .

text: And when he had taken the five loaves and the two fishes , he looked up to heaven , and blessed , and brake the loaves , and gave them to his disciples to set before them ; and the two fishes divided he among them all .
text2: Kisha Yesu akaitwaa ile mikate mitano na wale samaki wawili , akatazama juu mbinguni , akamshukuru Mungu , akaimega mikate , akawapa wanafunzi wake wawagawie watu . Na wale samaki wawili pia akawagawia wote .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled .
text2: Watu wote wakala , wakashiba .

text: And they took up twelve baskets full of the fragments , and of the fishes .
text2: Wakaokota mabaki ya mikate na samaki pia , wakajaza vikapu kumi na viwili .

text: And they that did eat of the loaves were about five thousand men .
text2: Nao waliokula hiyo mikate walikuwa wanaume elfu tano .

text: And straightway he constrained his disciples to get into the ship , and to go to the other side before unto Bethsaida , while he sent away the people .
text2: Mara Yesu akawaamuru wanafunzi wake wapande mashua , wamtangulie kwenda Bethsaida , ng ' ambo ya ziwa , wakati yeye anauaga umati wa watu .

text: And when he had sent them away , he departed into a mountain to pray .
text2: Baada ya kuwaaga watu alikwenda mlimani kusali .

text: And when even was come , the ship was in the midst of the sea , and he alone on the land .
text2: Ilipokuwa jioni , mashua ilikuwa katikati ya ziwa , naye alikuwa peke yake katika nchi kavu .

text: And he saw them toiling in rowing ; for the wind was contrary unto them : and about the fourth watch of the night he cometh unto them , walking upon the sea , and would have passed by them .
text2: Basi , akawaona wanafunzi wake wakitaabika kwa kupiga makasia , maana upepo ulikuwa unawapinga . Karibu na mapambazuko , Yesu aliwaendea akitembea juu ya maji . Alitaka kuwapita .

text: But when they saw him walking upon the sea , they supposed it had been a spirit , and cried out :
text2: Lakini walimwona akitembea juu ya maji , wakadhani ni mzimu , wakapiga yowe .

text: For they all saw him , and were troubled . And immediately he talked with them , and saith unto them , Be of good cheer : it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Maana wote walipomwona waliogopa sana . Mara Yesu akasema nao , " Tulieni , ni mimi . Msiogope ! "

text: And he went up unto them into the ship ; and the wind ceased : and they were sore amazed in themselves beyond measure , and wondered .
text2: Kisha akapanda mashuani walimokuwa , na upepo ukatulia . Nao wakashangaa sana .

text: For they considered not the miracle of the loaves : for their heart was hardened .
text2: maana hawakuwa bado wameelewa maana ya ile mikate . Akili zao zilikuwa bado zimepumbazika .

text: And when they had passed over , they came into the land of Gennesaret , and drew to the shore .
text2: Walivuka ziwa , wakafika nchi ya Genesareti , wakatia nanga .

text: And when they were come out of the ship , straightway they knew him ,
text2: Walipotoka mashuani , mara watu wakamtambua Yesu .

text: And ran through that whole region round about , and began to carry about in beds those that were sick , where they heard he was .
text2: Basi , kwa haraka wakazunguka katika nchi ile yote , wakaanza kuwachukua wagonjwa wamelala juu ya mikeka yao , wakawapeleka kila mahali waliposikia Yesu yupo .

text: And whithersoever he entered , into villages , or cities , or country , they laid the sick in the streets , and besought him that they might touch if it were but the border of his garment : and as many as touched him were made whole .
text2: Kila mahali Yesu alipokwenda , vijijini , mijini , au mashambani , watu waliwaweka wagonjwa uwanjani , wakamsihi waguse walau pindo la vazi lake . Nao wote waliomgusa walipona .

text: Then came together unto him the Pharisees , and certain of the scribes , which came from Jerusalem .
text2: Baadhi ya Mafarisayo na walimu wa Sheria waliokuwa wametoka Yerusalemu walikusanyika mbele ya Yesu .

text: And when they saw some of his disciples eat bread with defiled , that is to say , with unwashen , hands , they found fault .
text2: Waliona kwamba baadhi ya wanafunzi wake walikula mikate kwa mikono najisi , yaani bila kunawa .

text: For the Pharisees , and all the Jews , except they wash their hands oft , eat not , holding the tradition of the elders .
text2: Maana Mafarisayo na Wayahudi wengine wote huzingatia mapokeo ya wazee wao : hawali kitu kabla ya kunawa mikono ipasavyo .

text: And when they come from the market , except they wash , they eat not . And many other things there be , which they have received to hold , as the washing of cups , and pots , brasen vessels , and of tables .
text2: Tena hawali kitu chochote kutoka sokoni mpaka wamekiosha kwanza . Kuna pia desturi nyingine walizopokea kama vile namna ya kuosha vikombe , sufuria na vyombo vya shaba .

text: Then the Pharisees and scribes asked him , Why walk not thy disciples according to the tradition of the elders , but eat bread with unwashen hands ?
text2: Basi , Mafarisayo na walimu wa Sheria wakamwuliza Yesu , " Mbona wanafunzi wako hawayajali mapokeo tuliyopokea kwa wazee wetu , bali hula chakula kwa mikono najisi ? "

text: He answered and said unto them , Well hath Esaias prophesied of you hypocrites , as it is written , This people honoureth me with their lips , but their heart is far from me .
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Wanafiki ninyi ! Nabii Isaya alitabiri ukweli juu yenu alipoandika : Watu hawa , asema Mungu , huniheshimu kwa maneno matupu , lakini mioyoni mwao wako mbali nami .

text: Howbeit in vain do they worship me , teaching for doctines the commandments of men .
text2: Kuniabudu kwao hakufai , maana mambo wanayofundisha ni maagizo ya kibinadamu tu .

text: For laying aside the commandment of God , ye hold the tradition of men , as the washing of pots and cups : and many other such like things ye do .
text2: Ninyi mnaiacha amri ya Mungu na kushikilia maagizo ya watu . "

text: And he said unto them , Full well ye reject the commandment of God , that ye may keep your own tradition .
text2: Yesu akaendelea kusema , " Ninyi mnajua kuepa kwa ujanja sheria ya Mungu kwa ajili ya kufuata mapokeo yenu .

text: For Moses said , Honour thy father and thy mother ; and , Whoso curseth father or mother , let him die the death :
text2: Maana Mose aliamuru : Waheshimu baba yako na mama yako , na , Anayemlaani baba au mama , lazima afe .

text: But ye say , If a man shall say to his father or mother , It is Corban , that is to say , a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ; he shall be free .
text2: Lakini ninyi mwafundisha , Kama mtu anacho kitu ambacho angeweza kuwasaidia nacho baba au mama yake , lakini akasema kwamba kitu hicho ni Korbani ( yaani ni zawadi kwa Mungu ) ,

text: And ye suffer him no more to do ought for his father or his mother ;
text2: basi , halazimiki tena kuwasaidia wazazi wake .

text: Making the word of God of none effect through your tradition , which ye have delivered : and many such like things do ye .
text2: Hivyo ndivyo mnavyodharau neno la Mungu kwa ajili ya mafundisho mnayopokezana . Tena mnafanya mambo mengi ya namna hiyo . "

text: And when he had called all the people unto him , he said unto them , Hearken unto me every one of you , and understand :
text2: Yesu aliuita tena ule umati wa watu , akawaambia , " Nisikilizeni nyote , mkaelewe .

text: There is nothing from without a man , that entering into him can defile him : but the things which come out of him , those are they that defile the man .
text2: Hakuna kitu kinachoingia ndani ya mtu toka nje ambacho chaweza kumtia mtu najisi . Lakini kinachotoka ndani ya mtu ndicho kinachomtia mtu najisi . "

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Mwenye masikio na asikie !

text: And when he was entered into the house from the people , his disciples asked him concerning the parable .
text2: Alipouacha umati wa watu na kuingia nyumbani , wanafunzi wake walimwuliza maana ya huo mfano .

text: And he saith unto them , Are ye so without understanding also ? Do ye not perceive , that whatsoever thing from without entereth into the man , it cannot defile him ;
text2: Naye akawaambia , " Je , hata ninyi hamwelewi ? Je , hamwelewi kwamba kitu kinachomwingia mtu toka nje hakiwezi kumtia unajisi ,

text: Because it entereth not into his heart , but into the belly , and goeth out into the draught , purging all meats ?
text2: kwa maana hakimwingii moyoni , ila tumboni , na baadaye hutolewa nje chooni ? " ( Kwa kusema hivyo , Yesu alivihalalisha vyakula vyote . )

text: And he said , That which cometh out of the man , that defileth the man .
text2: Akaendelea kusema , " Kinachotoka ndani ya mtu ndicho kinachomtia najisi .

text: For from within , out of the heart of men , proceed evil thoughts , adulteries , fornications , murders ,
text2: Kwa maana kutoka ndani , katika moyo wa mtu , hutoka mawazo mabaya , uasherati , wizi , uuaji ,

text: Thefts , covetousness , wickedness , deceit , lasciviousness , an evil eye , blasphemy , pride , foolishness :
text2: uzinzi , uchoyo , uovu , udanganyifu , ufisadi , wivu , kashfa , kiburi na upumbavu .

text: All these evil things come from within , and defile the man .
text2: Maovu hayo yote yatoka ndani ya mtu , nayo humtia mtu najisi . "

text: And from thence he arose , and went into the borders of Tyre and Sidon , and entered into an house , and would have no man know it : but he could not be hid .
text2: Yesu aliondoka hapo , akaenda hadi wilaya ya Tiro . Huko aliingia katika nyumba moja na hakutaka mtu ajue ; lakini hakuweza kujificha .

text: For a certain woman , whose young daughter had an unclean spirit , heard of him , and came and fell at his feet :
text2: Mwanamke mmoja ambaye binti yake alikuwa na pepo , alisikia habari za Yesu . Basi , akaja akajitupa chini mbele ya miguu yake .

text: The woman was a Greek , a Syrophenician by nation ; and she besought him that he would cast forth the devil out of her daughter .
text2: Mama huyo alikuwa Mgiriki , mwenyeji wa Sirofoinike . Basi , akamwomba Yesu amtoe binti yake pepo mchafu .

text: But Jesus said unto her , Let the children first be filled : for it is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it unto the dogs .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Kwanza watoto washibe ; kwa maana si vizuri kuchukua chakula cha watoto na kuwatupia mbwa . "

text: And she answered and said unto him , Yes , Lord : yet the dogs under the table eat of the children ' s crumbs .
text2: Lakini huyo mama akasema , " Sawa , Bwana , lakini hata mbwa walio chini ya meza hula makombo ya watoto . "

text: And he said unto her , For this saying go thy way ; the devil is gone out of thy daughter .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Kwa sababu ya neno hilo , nenda . Pepo amemtoka binti yako ! "

text: And when she was come to her house , she found the devil gone out , and her daughter laid upon the bed .
text2: Basi , akaenda nyumbani kwake , akamkuta mtoto amelala kitandani , na pepo amekwisha mtoka .

text: And again , departing from the coasts of Tyre and Sidon , he came unto the sea of Galilee , through the midst of the coasts of Decapolis .
text2: Kisha Yesu aliondoka wilayani Tiro , akapitia Sidoni , akafika ziwa Galilaya kwa kupitia nchi ya Dekapoli .

text: And they bring unto him one that was deaf , and had an impediment in his speech ; and they beseech him to put his hand upon him .
text2: Basi , wakamletea bubu - kiziwi , wakamwomba amwekee mikono .

text: And he took him aside from the multitude , and put his fingers into his ears , and he spit , and touched his tongue ;
text2: Yesu akamtenga na umati wa watu , akamtia vidole masikioni , akatema mate na kumgusa ulimi .

text: And looking up to heaven , he sighed , and saith unto him , Ephphatha , that is , Be opened .
text2: Kisha akatazama juu mbinguni , akapiga kite , akamwambia , " Efatha , " maana yake , " Funguka . "

text: And straightway his ears were opened , and the string of his tongue was loosed , and he spake plain .
text2: Mara masikio yake yakafunguka na ulimi wake ukafunguliwa , akaanza kusema sawasawa .

text: And he charged them that they should tell no man : but the more he charged them , so much the more a great deal they published it ;
text2: Yesu akawaamuru wasimwambie mtu juu ya jambo hilo . Lakini kadiri alivyowakataza , ndivyo walivyozidi kutangaza habari hiyo .

text: And were beyond measure astonished , saying , He hath done all things well : he maketh both the deaf to hear , and the dumb to speak .
text2: Watu walishangaa sana , wakasema , " Amefanya yote vyema : amewajalia viziwi kusikia , na bubu kusema ! "

text: In those days the multitude being very great , and having nothing to eat , Jesus called his disciples unto him , and saith unto them ,
text2: Wakati huo umati mkubwa wa watu ulikusanyika tena , na hawakuwa na chakula . Basi , Yesu akawaita wanafunzi wake , akawaambia ,

text: I have compassion on the multitude , because they have now been with me three days , and have nothing to eat :
text2: " Nawahurumia watu hawa kwa sababu wamekuwa nami kwa muda wa siku tatu , wala hawana chakula .

text: And if I send them away fasting to their own houses , they will faint by the way : for divers of them came from far .
text2: Nikiwaacha waende nyumbani wakiwa na njaa watazimia njiani , maana baadhi yao wametoka mbali . "

text: And his disciples answered him , From whence can a man satisfy these men with bread here in the wilderness ?
text2: Wanafunzi wake wakamwuliza , " Hapa nyikani itapatikana wapi mikate ya kuwashibisha watu hawa wote ? "

text: And he asked them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven .
text2: Yesu akawauliza , " Mnayo mikate mingapi ? " Nao wakamjibu , " Saba . "

text: And he commanded the people to sit down on the ground : and he took the seven loaves , and gave thanks , and brake , and gave to his disciples to set before them ; and they did set them before the people .
text2: Basi , akawaamuru watu wakae chini . Akaitwaa ile mikate saba , akamshukuru Mungu , akaimega , akawapa wanafunzi wake wawagawie watu , nao wakawagawia .

text: And they had a few small fishes : and he blessed , and commanded to set them also before them .
text2: Walikuwa pia na visamaki vichache . Yesu akavibariki , akaamuru vigawiwe watu vilevile .

text: So they did eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets .
text2: Watu wakala , wakashiba . Wakaokota mabaki yaliyosalia wakajaza makapu saba .

text: And they that had eaten were about four thousand : and he sent them away .
text2: Nao waliokula walikuwa watu wapatao elfu nne . Yesu akawaaga ,

text: And straightway he entered into a ship with his disciples , and came into the parts of Dalmanutha .
text2: na mara akapanda mashua pamoja na wanafunzi wake , akaenda wilaya ya Dalmanutha .

text: And the Pharisees came forth , and began to question with him , seeking of him a sign from heaven , tempting him .
text2: Mafarisayo walikuja , wakaanza kujadiliana na Yesu . Kwa kumjaribu , wakamtaka awafanyie ishara kuonyesha anayo idhini kutoka mbinguni .

text: And he sighed deeply in his spirit , and saith , Why doth this generation seek after a sign ? verily I say unto you , There shall no sign be given unto this generation .
text2: Yesu akahuzunika rohoni , akasema , " Mbona kizazi hiki kinataka ishara ? Kweli nawaambieni , kizazi hiki hakitapewa ishara yoyote ! "

text: And he left them , and entering into the ship again departed to the other side .
text2: Basi , akawaacha , akapanda tena mashua , akaanza safari kwenda ng ' ambo ya pili ya ziwa .

text: Now the disciples had forgotten to take bread , neither had they in the ship with them more than one loaf .
text2: Wanafunzi walikuwa wamesahau kuchukua mikate ; walikuwa na mkate mmoja tu katika mashua .

text: And he charged them , saying , Take heed , beware of the leaven of the Pharisees , and of the leaven of Herod .
text2: Yesu akawaonya , " Angalieni sana ! Jihadharini na chachu ya Mafarisayo na chachu ya Herode . "

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have no bread .
text2: Wanafunzi wakaanza kujadiliana wao kwa wao , " Anasema hivyo kwa kuwa hatuna mikate . "

text: And when Jesus knew it , he saith unto them , Why reason ye , because ye have no bread ? perceive ye not yet , neither understand ? have ye your heart yet hardened ?
text2: Yesu alitambua hayo , akawaambia , " Mbona mnajadiliana juu ya kutokuwa na mikate ? Je , bado hamjafahamu , wala hamjaelewa ? Je , mioyo yenu imeshupaa ?

text: Having eyes , see ye not ? and having ears , hear ye not ? and do ye not remember ?
text2: Je , Mnayo macho na hamwoni ? Mnayo masikio na hamsikii ? Je , hamkumbuki

text: When I brake the five loaves among five thousand , how many baskets full of fragments took ye up ? They say unto him , Twelve .
text2: wakati ule nilipoimega ile mikate mitano na kuwapa watu elfu tano ? Mlikusanya vikapu vingapi vya mabaki ya makombo ? " Wakamjibu , " Kumi na viwili . "

text: And when the seven among four thousand , how many baskets full of fragments took ye up ? And they said , Seven .
text2: " Na nilipoimega ile mikate saba na kuwapa watu elfu nne , mlikusanya makapu mangapi ya makombo ? " Wakamjibu , " Saba . "

text: And he said unto them , How is it that ye do not understand ?
text2: Basi , akawaambia , " Na bado hamjaelewa ? "

text: And he cometh to Bethsaida ; and they bring a blind man unto him , and besought him to touch him .
text2: Yesu alifika Bethsaida pamoja na wanafunzi wake . Huko watu wakamletea kipofu mmoja , wakamwomba amguse .

text: And he took the blind man by the hand , and led him out of the town ; and when he had spit on his eyes , and put his hands upon him , he asked him if he saw ought .
text2: Yesu akamshika mkono huyo kipofu , akampeleka nje ya kijiji . Akamtemea mate machoni , akamwekea mikono , akamwuliza , " Je , unaweza kuona kitu ? "

text: And he looked up , and said , I see men as trees , walking .
text2: Huyo kipofu akatazama , akasema , " Ninawaona watu wanaoonekana kama miti inayotembea . "

text: After that he put his hands again upon his eyes , and made him look up : and he was restored , and saw every man clearly .
text2: Kisha Yesu akamwekea tena mikono machoni , naye akakaza macho , uwezo wake wa kuona ukamrudia , akaona kila kitu sawasawa .

text: And he sent him away to his house , saying , Neither go into the town , nor tell it to any in the town .
text2: Yesu akamwambia aende zake nyumbani na kumwamuru , " Usirudi kijijini ! "

text: And Jesus went out , and his disciples , into the towns of Caesarea Philippi : and by the way he asked his disciples , saying unto them , Whom do men say that I am ?
text2: Kisha Yesu na wanafunzi wake walikwenda katika vijiji vya Kaisarea Filipi . Walipokuwa njiani , Yesu aliwauliza wanafunzi wake , " Watu wanasema mimi ni nani ? "

text: And they answered , John the Baptist : but some say , Elias ; and others , One of the prophets .
text2: Wakamjibu , " Wengine wanasema wewe ni Yohane Mbatizaji , wengine Eliya na wengine mmojawapo wa manabii . "

text: And he saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ? And Peter answereth and saith unto him , Thou art the Christ .
text2: Naye akawauliza , " Na ninyi je , mnasema mimi ni nani ? " Petro akamjibu , " Wewe ndiwe Kristo . "

text: And he charged them that they should tell no man of him .
text2: Kisha Yesu akawaonya wasimwambie mtu yeyote habari zake .

text: And he began to teach them , that the Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected of the elders , and of the chief priests , and scribes , and be killed , and after three days rise again .
text2: Yesu alianza kuwafundisha wanafunzi wake : " Ni lazima Mwana wa Mtu apatwe na mateso mengi na kukataliwa na wazee na makuhani wakuu na walimu wa Sheria . Atauawa na baada ya siku tatu atafufuka . "

text: And he spake that saying openly . And Peter took him , and began to rebuke him .
text2: Yesu aliwaambia jambo hilo waziwazi . Basi , Petro akamchukua kando , akaanza kumkemea .

text: But when he had turned about and looked on his disciples , he rebuked Peter , saying , Get thee behind me , Satan : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but the things that be of men .
text2: Lakini Yesu akageuka , akawatazama wanafunzi wake , akamkemea Petro akisema , " Ondoka mbele yangu , Shetani ! Fikira zako si za kimungu ila ni za kibinadamu ! "

text: And when he had called the people unto him with his disciples also , he said unto them , Whosoever will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Kisha akauita umati wa watu pamoja na wanafunzi wake , akawaambia , " Mtu yeyote akitaka kuwa mfuasi wangu , lazima ajikane mwenyewe , auchukue msalaba wake , anifuate .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it ; but whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel ' s , the same shall save it .
text2: Maana mtu anayetaka kuyaokoa maisha yake mwenyewe , atayapoteza , lakini mtu atakayepoteza maisha yake kwa ajili yangu na kwa ajili ya Habari Njema , atayaokoa .

text: For what shall it profit a man , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ?
text2: Je , kuna faida gani mtu kuupata ulimwengu wote na kuyapoteza maisha yake ?

text: Or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: Ama mtu atatoa kitu gani badala ya maisha yake ?

text: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation ; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed , when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels .
text2: Mtu yeyote katika kizazi hiki kiovu na kisichomjali Mungu anayenionea aibu mimi na mafundisho yangu , Mwana wa Mtu atamwonea aibu mtu huyo wakati atakapokuja katika utukufu wa Baba yake pamoja na malaika watakatifu . "

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That there be some of them that stand here , which shall not taste of death , till they have seen the kingdom of God come with power .
text2: Yesu akaendelea kuwaambia , " Kweli nawaambieni , wako wengine papa hapa ambao hawatakufa kabla ya kuuona Ufalme wa Mungu ukija kwa enzi . "

text: And after six days Jesus taketh with him Peter , and James , and John , and leadeth them up into an high mountain apart by themselves : and he was transfigured before them .
text2: Baada ya siku sita , Yesu aliwachukua Petro , Yakobo na Yohane juu ya mlima mrefu peke yao . Huko , Yesu akageuka sura mbele yao ,

text: And his raiment became shining , exceeding white as snow ; so as no fuller on earth can white them .
text2: mavazi yake yakang ' aa , yakawa meupe sana , jinsi dobi yeyote duniani asingeweza kuyafanya meupe .

text: And there appeared unto them Elias with Moses : and they were talking with Jesus .
text2: Eliya na Mose wakawatokea , wakazungumza na Yesu .

text: And Peter answered and said to Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Petro akamwambia Yesu , " Mwalimu , ni vizuri sana kwamba tuko hapa . Basi , afadhali tujenge vibanda vitatu : kimoja chako , kimoja cha Mose na kimoja cha Eliya . "

text: For he wist not what to say ; for they were sore afraid .
text2: Yeye na wenzake waliogopa hata hakujua la kusema .

text: And there was a cloud that overshadowed them : and a voice came out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: Kisha likatokea wingu likawafunika , na sauti ikasikika kutoka katika hilo wingu , " Huyu ni Mwanangu mpendwa , msikilizeni . "

text: And suddenly , when they had looked round about , they saw no man any more , save Jesus only with themselves .
text2: Mara wanafunzi hao wakatazama tena , lakini hawakumwona mtu mwingine , ila Yesu peke yake pamoja nao .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , he charged them that they should tell no man what things they had seen , till the Son of man were risen from the dead .
text2: Walipokuwa wakishuka mlimani , Yesu aliwakataza wasimwambie mtu yeyote mambo waliyoyaona , mpaka Mwana wa Mtu atakapokuwa amefufuka kutoka wafu .

text: And they kept that saying with themselves , questioning one with another what the rising from the dead should mean .
text2: Basi , wakashika agizo hilo , lakini wakawa wanajadiliana wao kwa wao maana ya kufufuka kutoka wafu .

text: And they asked him , saying , Why say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Wakamwuliza Yesu , " Mbona walimu wa Sheria wanasema kwamba ni lazima Eliya aje kwanza ? "

text: And he answered and told them , Elias verily cometh first , and restoreth all things ; and how it is written of the Son of man , that he must suffer many things , and be set at nought .
text2: Naye akawajibu , " Naam , Eliya anakuja kwanza kutayarisha yote . Hata hivyo , kwa nini basi imeandikwa katika Maandiko Matakatifu kwamba Mwana wa Mtu atapatwa na mateso mengi na kudharauliwa ?

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is indeed come , and they have done unto him whatsoever they listed , as it is written of him .
text2: Lakini nawaambieni , Eliya amekwisha kuja , nao wakamtendea walivyotaka kama ilivyoandikwa juu yake . "

text: And when he came to his disciples , he saw a great multitude about them , and the scribes questioning with them .
text2: Walipowafikia wale wanafunzi wengine , waliona umati mkubwa wa watu hapo . Na baadhi ya walimu wa Sheria walikuwa wanajadiliana nao .

text: And straightway all the people , when they beheld him , were greatly amazed , and running to him saluted him .
text2: Mara tu ule umati wa watu ulipomwona , wote walishangaa sana , wakamkimbilia wamsalimu .

text: And he asked the scribes , What question ye with them ?
text2: Yesu akawauliza , " Mnajadiliana nini nao ? "

text: And one of the multitude answered and said , Master , I have brought unto thee my son , which hath a dumb spirit ;
text2: Hapo mtu mmoja katika ule umati wa watu akamjibu , " Mwalimu , nimemleta mwanangu kwako , ana pepo aliyemfanya kuwa bubu .

text: And wheresoever he taketh him , he teareth him : and he foameth , and gnasheth with his teeth , and pineth away : and I spake to thy disciples that they should cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Kila mara anapomvamia , humwangusha chini na kumfanya atokwe na povu kinywani , akisaga meno na kuwa mkavu mwili wote . Niliwaomba wanafunzi wako wamtoe huyo pepo lakini hawakuweza . "

text: He answereth him , and saith , O faithless generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him unto me .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Enyi kizazi kisicho na imani ! Nitakaa nanyi mpaka lini ? Nitawavumilia mpaka lini ? Mleteni kwangu . "

text: And they brought him unto him : and when he saw him , straightway the spirit tare him ; and he fell on the ground , and wallowed foaming .
text2: Wakampeleka . Mara tu huyo pepo alipomwona Yesu , alimtia mtoto kifafa , naye mtoto akaanguka chini , akagaagaa na kutoka povu kinywani . Yesu akamwuliza baba yake huyo mtoto ,

text: And he asked his father , How long is it ago since this came unto him ? And he said , Of a child .
text2: " Amepatwa na mambo hayo tangu lini ? " Naye akamjibu , " Tangu utoto wake .

text: And ofttimes it hath cast him into the fire , and into the waters , to destroy him : but if thou canst do any thing , have compassion on us , and help us .
text2: Na mara nyingi pepo huyo amemwangusha motoni na majini , ili amwangamize kabisa . Basi , ikiwa waweza , utuhurumie na kutusaidia ! "

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou canst believe , all things are possible to him that believeth .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Eti ikiwa waweza ! Mambo yote yanawezekana kwa mtu aliye na imani . "

text: And straightway the father of the child cried out , and said with tears , Lord , I believe ; help thou mine unbelief .
text2: Hapo , huyo baba akalia kwa sauti , " Naamini ! Lakini imani yangu haitoshi , nisaidie ! "

text: When Jesus saw that the people came running together , he rebuked the foul spirit , saying unto him , Thou dumb and deaf spirit , I charge thee , come out of him , and enter no more into him .
text2: Yesu alipouona umati wa watu unaongezeka upesi mbele yake , alimkemea yule pepo mchafu , " Pepo unayemfanya huyu mtoto kuwa bubu - kiziwi , nakuamuru , mtoke mtoto huyu wala usimwingie tena ! "

text: And the spirit cried , and rent him sore , and came out of him : and he was as one dead ; insomuch that many said , He is dead .
text2: Hapo huyo pepo alipaaza sauti , akamwangusha huyo mtoto chini , kisha akamtoka . Mtoto alionekana kama maiti , hata wengine walisema , " Amekufa ! "

text: But Jesus took him by the hand , and lifted him up ; and he arose .
text2: Lakini Yesu akamshika mkono , akamwinua , naye akasimama .

text: And when he was come into the house , his disciples asked him privately , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Yesu alipoingia nyumbani , wanafunzi wake walimwuliza kwa faragha , " Kwa nini sisi hatukuweza kumtoa ? "

text: And he said unto them , This kind can come forth by nothing , but by prayer and fasting .
text2: Naye akawaambia , " Pepo wa aina hii hawezi kutoka isipokuwa kwa sala tu . "

text: And they departed thence , and passed through Galilee ; and he would not that any man should know it .
text2: Yesu na wanafunzi wake waliondoka hapo , wakaendelea na safari kupitia wilaya ya Galilaya . Yesu hakupenda watu wajue alipokuwa ,

text: For he taught his disciples , and said unto them , The Son of man is delivered into the hands of men , and they shall kill him ; and after that he is killed , he shall rise the third day .
text2: kwa sababu alikuwa anawafundisha wanafunzi wake . Aliwaambia , " Mwana wa Mtu atakabidhiwa kwa watu ambao watamuua ; lakini siku ya tatu baada ya kuuawa atafufuka . "

text: But they understood not that saying , and were afraid to ask him .
text2: Wanafunzi hawakufahamu jambo hilo . Wakaogopa kumwuliza .

text: And he came to Capernaum : and being in the house he asked them , What was it that ye disputed among yourselves by the way ?
text2: Basi , walifika Kafarnaumu . Na alipokuwa nyumbani , aliwauliza , " Mlikuwa mnajadiliana nini njiani ? "

text: But they held their peace : for by the way they had disputed among themselves , who should be the greatest .
text2: Lakini wao wakanyamaza , maana njiani walikuwa wamebishana ni nani aliye mkuu kati yao .

text: And he sat down , and called the twelve , and saith unto them , If any man desire to be first , the same shall be last of all , and servant of all .
text2: Yesu akaketi chini , akawaita wale kumi na wawili , akawaambia , " Yeyote anayetaka kuwa wa kwanza lazima awe wa mwisho na kuwa mtumishi wa wote . "

text: And he took a child , and set him in the midst of them : and when he had taken him in his arms , he said unto them ,
text2: Kisha akamchukua mtoto mdogo , akamsimamisha kati yao , akamku mbatia , halafu akawaambia ,

text: Whosoever shall receive one of such children in my name , receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me , receiveth not me , but him that sent me .
text2: " Anayempokea mtoto kama huyu kwa jina langu , ananipokea mimi ; na anayenipokea mimi , hanipokei mimi tu , bali anampokea yule aliyenituma . "

text: And John answered him , saying , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name , and he followeth not us : and we forbad him , because he followeth not us .
text2: Yohane akamwambia , " Mwalimu , tumemwona mtu mmoja akitoa pepo kwa kulitumia jina lako , nasi tukajaribu kumkataza kwa kuwa yeye si mmoja wetu . "

text: But Jesus said , Forbid him not : for there is no man which shall do a miracle in my name , that can lightly speak evil of me .
text2: Lakini Yesu akasema , " Msimkataze , maana hakuna mtu anayefanya muujiza kwa jina langu , na papo hapo akaweza kusema mabaya juu yangu .

text: For he that is not against us is on our part .
text2: Maana , asiyepingana nasi , yuko upande wetu .

text: For whosoever shall give you a cup of water to drink in my name , because ye belong to Christ , verily I say unto you , he shall not lose his reward .
text2: Mtu yeyote atakeyewapeni kikombe cha maji ya kunywa kwa sababu ninyi ni watu wake Kristo , hakika hatakosa kupata tuzo lake .

text: And whosoever shall offend one of these little ones that believe in me , it is better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he were cast into the sea .
text2: " Mtu yeyote atakayemfanya mmoja wa hawa wadogo wanaoniamini atende dhambi , ingekuwa afadhali kwa mtu huyo kufungiwa shingoni mwake jiwe kubwa la kusagia na kutupwa baharini .

text: And if thy hand offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter into life maimed , than having two hands to go into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Mkono wako ukikukosesha , ukate ! Afadhali kuingia kwenye uzima bila mkono mmoja , kuliko kuwa na mikono miwili na kwenda katika moto wa Jehanamu .

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: Humo , wadudu wake hawafi na moto hauzimiki .

text: And if thy foot offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter halt into life , than having two feet to be cast into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Na mguu wako ukikukosesha , ukate ! Afadhali kuingia katika uzima bila mguu mmoja , kuliko kuwa na miguu yote miwili na kutupwa katika moto wa Jehanamu .

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: Humo , wadudu wake hawafi na moto hauzimiki .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out : it is better for thee to enter into the kingdom of God with one eye , than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire :
text2: Na jicho lako likikukosesha , ling ' oe ! Afadhali kuingia katika utawala wa Mungu ukiwa na jicho moja tu , kuliko kuwa na macho yako yote mawili na kutupwa katika moto wa Jehanamu .

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: Humo wadudu wake hawafi , na moto hauzimiki .

text: For every one shall be salted with fire , and every sacrifice shall be salted with salt .
text2: " Maana kila mmoja atakolezwa kwa moto .

text: Salt is good : but if the salt have lost his saltness , wherewith will ye season it ? Have salt in yourselves , and have peace one with another .
text2: Chumvi ni nzuri , lakini ikipoteza ladha yake , itakolezwa na nini ? Muwe na chumvi ndani yenu na kudumisha amani kati yenu . "

text: And he arose from thence , and cometh into the coasts of Judaea by the farther side of Jordan : and the people resort unto him again ; and , as he was wont , he taught them again .
text2: Yesu alitoka hapo akaenda mkoani Yudea na hata ng ' ambo ya mto Yordani . Umati wa watu ukamwendea tena , naye akawafundisha tena kama ilivyokuwa desturi yake .

text: And the Pharisees came to him , and asked him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife ? tempting him .
text2: Basi , Mafarisayo wakamwendea , na kwa kumjaribu wakamwuliza , " Je , ni halali mtu kumpa talaka mkewe ? "

text: And he answered and said unto them , What did Moses command you ?
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Mose aliwapa maagizo gani ? "

text: And they said , Moses suffered to write a bill of divorcement , and to put her away .
text2: Nao wakasema , " Mose aliagiza mume kumpatia mkewe hati ya talaka na kumwacha . "

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , For the hardness of your heart he wrote you this precept .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Mose aliwaandikia amri hiyo kwa sababu ya ugumu wa mioyo yenu .

text: But from the beginning of the creation God made them male and female .
text2: Lakini tangu kuumbwa ulimwengu , Mungu aliumba mwanamume na mwanamke .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and cleave to his wife ;
text2: Hivyo mwanamume atawaacha baba yake na mama yake , ataungana na mkewe ,

text: And they twain shall be one flesh : so then they are no more twain , but one flesh .
text2: nao wawili watakuwa mwili mmoja . Kwa hiyo , wao si wawili tena bali mwili mmoja .

text: What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Basi , alichounganisha Mungu , binadamu asitenganishe . "

text: And in the house his disciples asked him again of the same matter .
text2: Walipoingia tena ndani ya nyumba , wanafunzi wake walimwuliza juu ya jambo hilo .

text: And he saith unto them , Whosoever shall put away his wife , and marry another , committeth adultery against her .
text2: Naye akawaambia , " Anayemwacha mkewe na kuoa mwingine , anazini dhidi ya mkewe .

text: And if a woman shall put away her husband , and be married to another , she committeth adultery .
text2: Na mwanamke anayemwacha mumewe na kuolewa na mwingine anazini . "

text: And they brought young children to him , that he should touch them : and his disciples rebuked those that brought them .
text2: Watu walimletea Yesu watoto wadogo ili awaguse , lakini wanafunzi wakawakemea .

text: But when Jesus saw it , he was much displeased , and said unto them , Suffer the little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Yesu alipoona hivyo , alikasirika akawaambia , " Waacheni hao watoto waje kwangu , wala msiwazuie , kwa maana Ufalme wa Mungu ni kwa ajili ya watu walio kama watoto hawa .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child , he shall not enter therein .
text2: Nawaambieni kweli , mtu yeyote asiyeupokea Ufalme wa Mungu kama mtoto mdogo hataingia katika Ufalme huo . "

text: And he took them up in his arms , put his hands upon them , and blessed them .
text2: Kisha akawapokea watoto hao , akawawekea mikono , akawabariki .

text: And when he was gone forth into the way , there came one running , and kneeled to him , and asked him , Good Master , what shall I do that I may inherit eternal life ?
text2: Yesu alipoanza tena safari yake , mtu mmoja alimjia mbio , akapiga magoti mbele yake , akamwuliza , " Mwalimu mwema , nifanyeje ili niupate uzima wa milele ? "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God .
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Mbona unaniita mwema ? Hakuna aliye mwema ila Mungu peke yake .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Defraud not , Honour thy father and mother .
text2: Unazijua amri : Usizini ; Usiue ; Usiibe ; Usitoe ushahidi wa uongo ; Usidanganye ; Waheshimu baba na mama yako . "

text: And he answered and said unto him , Master , all these have I observed from my youth .
text2: Naye akamjibu , " Mwalimu , hayo yote nimeyazingatia tangu ujana wangu . "

text: Then Jesus beholding him loved him , and said unto him , One thing thou lackest : go thy way , sell whatsoever thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , take up the cross , and follow me .
text2: Yesu akamtazama , akampenda , akamwambia , " Umepungukiwa na kitu kimoja : nenda ukauze vitu ulivyo navyo , uwape maskini , nawe utakuwa na hazina mbinguni ; kisha njoo unifuate . "

text: And he was sad at that saying , and went away grieved : for he had great possessions .
text2: Aliposikia hayo , alisikitika , akaenda zake akiwa na huzuni , kwa maana alikuwa na mali nyingi .

text: And Jesus looked round about , and saith unto his disciples , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Yesu akatazama pande zote , akawaambia wanafunzi wake , " Jinsi gani itakavyokuwa vigumu kwa matajiri kuingia katika Ufalme wa Mungu ! "

text: And the disciples were astonished at his words . But Jesus answereth again , and saith unto them , Children , how hard is it for them that trust in riches to enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Wanafunzi walishangazwa na maneno yake . Yesu akawaambia tena , " Watoto wangu , ni vigumu sana kuingia katika Ufalme wa Mungu !

text: It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Ni rahisi zaidi ngamia kupenya katika tundu la sindano , kuliko tajiri kuingia katika Ufalme wa Mungu . "

text: And they were astonished out of measure , saying among themselves , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Wanafunzi wake wakashangaa sana wakaulizana , " Ni nani basi , atakayeweza kuokoka ? "

text: And Jesus looking upon them saith , With men it is impossible , but not with God : for with God all things are possible .
text2: Yesu akawatazama , akawaambia , " Kwa binadamu haiwezekani , lakini kwa Mungu si hivyo , maana kwa Mungu mambo yote huwezekana . "

text: Then Peter began to say unto him , Lo , we have left all , and have followed thee .
text2: Petro akamwambia , " Na sisi je ? Tumeacha yote , tukakufuata ! "

text: And Jesus answered and said , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my sake , and the gospel ' s ,
text2: Yesu akasema , " Kweli nawaambieni , kila mtu aliyeacha nyumba , au ndugu , au dada , au mama , au baba , au watoto au mashamba kwa ajili yangu na kwa ajili ya Habari Njema ,

text: But he shall receive an hundredfold now in this time , houses , and brethren , and sisters , and mothers , and children , and lands , with persecutions ; and in the world to come eternal life .
text2: atapokea mara mia zaidi wakati huu wa sasa nyumba , ndugu , dada , mama , watoto na mashamba pamoja na mateso ; na katika wakati ujao atapokea uzima wa milele .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last first .
text2: Lakini wengi walio wa kwanza watakuwa wa mwisho , na walio wa mwisho watakuwa wa kwanza . "

text: And they were in the way going up to Jerusalem ; and Jesus went before them : and they were amazed ; and as they followed , they were afraid . And he took again the twelve , and began to tell them what things should happen unto him ,
text2: Basi , walikuwa njiani kwenda Yerusalemu , na Yesu alikuwa anawatangulia . Wanafunzi wake walijawa na hofu , na watu waliofuata waliogopa . Yesu akawachukua tena kando wale kumi na wawili , akaanza kuwaambia yale yatakayompata :

text: Saying , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be delivered unto the chief priests , and unto the scribes ; and they shall condemn him to death , and shall deliver him to the Gentiles :
text2: " Sikilizeni ! Tunakwenda Yerusalemu , na huko Mwana wa Mtu atakabidhiwa kwa makuhani wakuu na walimu wa Sheria , nao watamhukumu auawe na kumkabidhi kwa watu wa mataifa .

text: And they shall mock him , and shall scourge him , and shall spit upon him , and shall kill him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Nao watamdhihaki ; watamtemea mate , watampiga mijeledi na kumwua . Na baada ya siku tatu atafufuka . "

text: And James and John , the sons of Zebedee , come unto him , saying , Master , we would that thou shouldest do for us whatsoever we shall desire .
text2: Yakobo na Yohane , wana wa Zebedayo , walimwendea Yesu wakamwambia , " Mwalimu , tunataka utufanyie kitu tutakachokuomba . "

text: And he said unto them , What would ye that I should do for you ?
text2: Yesu akawauliza , " Mnataka niwafanyie nini ? "

text: They said unto him , Grant unto us that we may sit , one on thy right hand , and the other on thy left hand , in thy glory .
text2: Wakamjibu , " Uturuhusu tuketi mmoja upande wako wa kulia na mwingine upande wako wa kushoto katika utukufu wa Ufalme wako . "

text: But Jesus said unto them , Ye know not what ye ask : can ye drink of the cup that I drink of ? and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ?
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Hamjui mnachoomba ! Je , mnaweza kunywa kikombe nitakachokunywa , au kubatizwa kama nitakavyobatizwa ? "

text: And they said unto him , We can . And Jesus said unto them , Ye shall indeed drink of the cup that I drink of ; and with the baptism that I am baptized withal shall ye be baptized :
text2: Wakamjibu , " Tunaweza . " Yesu akawaambia , " Kikombe nitakachokunywa mtakinywa kweli , na mtabatizwa kama nitakavyobatizwa .

text: But to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give ; but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared .
text2: Lakini ni nani atakayeketi kulia au kushoto kwangu si wajibu wangu kupanga , bali nafasi hizo watapewa wale waliotayarishiwa . "

text: And when the ten heard it , they began to be much displeased with James and John .
text2: Wale wanafunzi wengine kumi waliposikia hayo , walianza kuchukizwa na Yakobo na Yohane .

text: But Jesus called them to him , and saith unto them , Ye know that they which are accounted to rule over the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and their great ones exercise authority upon them .
text2: Yesu akawaita , akawaambia , " Mnajua kwamba wale wanaofikiriwa kuwa watawala wa mataifa huwatawala watu wao kwa mabavu , na wakuu hao huwamiliki watu wao .

text: But so shall it not be among you : but whosoever will be great among you , shall be your minister :
text2: Lakini kwenu isiwe hivyo , ila anayetaka kuwa mkuu kati yenu , sharti awe mtumishi wenu .

text: And whosoever of you will be the chiefest , shall be servant of all .
text2: Anayetaka kuwa wa kwanza , sharti awe mtumishi wa wote .

text: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Maana Mwana wa Mtu hakuja kutumikiwa , ila alikuja kutumikia , na kutoa maisha yake kuwa fidia ya watu wengi . "

text: And they came to Jericho : and as he went out of Jericho with his disciples and a great number of people , blind Bartimaeus , the son of Timaeus , sat by the highway side begging .
text2: Basi , wakafika Yeriko , naye Yesu alipokuwa anatoka katika mji huo akiwa na wanafunzi wake pamoja na umati mkubwa wa watu , kipofu mwombaji aitwaye Bartimayo mwana wa Timayo alikuwa ameketi kando ya barabara .

text: And when he heard that it was Jesus of Nazareth , he began to cry out , and say , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Aliposikia kwamba ni Yesu wa Nazareti aliyekuwa anapita mahali hapo , alianza kupaaza sauti , " Yesu , Mwana wa Daudi , nihurumie ! "

text: And many charged him that he should hold his peace : but he cried the more a great deal , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Watu wengi walimkemea ili anyamaze , lakini yeye akazidi kupaaza sauti , " Mwana wa Daudi , nihurumie ! "

text: And Jesus stood still , and commanded him to be called . And they call the blind man , saying unto him , Be of good comfort , rise ; he calleth thee .
text2: Yesu alisimama , akasema , " Mwiteni . " Basi , wakamwita huyo kipofu , wakamwambia , " Jipe moyo ! Simama , anakuita . "

text: And he , casting away his garment , rose , and came to Jesus .
text2: Naye akatupilia mbali vazi lake , akaruka juu , akamwendea Yesu .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , What wilt thou that I should do unto thee ? The blind man said unto him , Lord , that I might receive my sight .
text2: Yesu akamwuliza , " Unataka nikufanyie nini ? " Huyo kipofu akamwambia , " Mwalimu , naomba nipate kuona . "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Go thy way ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And immediately he received his sight , and followed Jesus in the way .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Nenda , imani yako imekuponya . " Mara huyo kipofu akaweza kuona , akamfuata Yesu njiani .

text: And when they came nigh to Jerusalem , unto Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount of Olives , he sendeth forth two of his disciples ,
text2: Walipokuwa wanakaribia Yerusalemu walifika Bethfage na Bethania , karibu na mlima wa Mizeituni . Hapo aliwatuma wawili wa wanafunzi wake ,

text: And saith unto them , Go your way into the village over against you : and as soon as ye be entered into it , ye shall find a colt tied , whereon never man sat ; loose him , and bring him .
text2: akawaambia , " Nendeni katika kijiji kilicho mbele yenu . Mtakapokuwa mnaingia humo , mtakuta mwana punda amefungwa ambaye bado hajatumiwa na mtu . Mfungueni mkamlete .

text: And if any man say unto you , Why do ye this ? say ye that the Lord hath need of him ; and straightway he will send him hither .
text2: Kama mtu akiwauliza , Mbona mnafanya hivyo ? Mwambieni , Bwana anamhitaji na atamrudisha hapa mara . "

text: And they went their way , and found the colt tied by the door without in a place where two ways met ; and they loose him .
text2: Basi , wakaenda , wakamkuta mwana punda barabarani amefungwa mlangoni . Walipokuwa wakimfungua ,

text: And certain of them that stood there said unto them , What do ye , loosing the colt ?
text2: baadhi ya watu waliokuwa wamesimama hapo wakawauliza " Kwa nini mnamfungua huyo mwana punda ? "

text: And they said unto them even as Jesus had commanded : and they let them go .
text2: Wanafunzi wakajibu kama Yesu alivyokuwa amewaambia ; nao wakawaacha waende zao .

text: And they brought the colt to Jesus , and cast their garments on him ; and he sat upon him .
text2: Wakampelekea Yesu huyo mwana punda . Wakatandika mavazi yao juu ya huyo mwana punda , na Yesu akaketi juu yake .

text: And many spread their garments in the way : and others cut down branches off the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Watu wengi wakatandaza mavazi yao barabarani ; wengine wakatandaza matawi ya miti waliyoyakata mashambani .

text: And they that went before , and they that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna ; Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord :
text2: Watu wote waliotangulia na wale waliofuata wakapaaza sauti zao wakisema , " Hosana ! Abarikiwe huyo ajaye kwa jina la Bwana !

text: Blessed be the kingdom of our father David , that cometh in the name of the Lord : Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Ubarikiwe Ufalme ujao wa baba yetu Daudi . Hosana juu mbinguni ! "

text: And Jesus entered into Jerusalem , and into the temple : and when he had looked round about upon all things , and now the eventide was come , he went out unto Bethany with the twelve .
text2: Yesu aliingia mjini Yerusalemu akaenda moja kwa moja mpaka Hekaluni , akatazama kila kitu kwa makini . Lakini kwa vile ilikwisha kuwa jioni , akaenda Bethania pamoja na wale kumi na wawili .

text: And on the morrow , when they were come from Bethany , he was hungry :
text2: Kesho yake , walipokuwa wanatoka Bethania , Yesu aliona njaa .

text: And seeing a fig tree afar off having leaves , he came , if haply he might find any thing thereon : and when he came to it , he found nothing but leaves ; for the time of figs was not yet .
text2: Basi , akaona kwa mbali mtini wenye majani mengi . Akauendea ili aone kama ulikuwa na tunda lolote . Alipoufikia , aliukuta bila tunda lolote ila majani matupu , kwa vile hayakuwa majira ya mtini kuzaa matunda .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto it , No man eat fruit of thee hereafter for ever . And his disciples heard it .
text2: Hapo akauambia mtini , " Tangu leo hata milele mtu yeyote asile matunda kwako . " Nao wanafunzi wake walisikia maneno hayo .

text: And they come to Jerusalem : and Jesus went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ;
text2: Basi , wakafika Yerusalemu . Yesu akaingia Hekaluni , akaanza kuwafukuza nje watu waliokuwa wanauza na kununua vitu humo ndani . Akazipindua meza za wale waliokuwa wakibadilishana fedha na viti vya wale waliokuwa wakiuza njiwa .

text: And would not suffer that any man should carry any vessel through the temple .
text2: Hakumruhusu mtu yeyote kupitia Hekaluni akichukua kitu .

text: And he taught , saying unto them , Is it not written , My house shall be called of all nations the house of prayer ? but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Kisha akawafundisha , " Imeandikwa : Nyumba yangu itaitwa nyumba ya sala kwa ajili ya mataifa yote ! Lakini ninyi mmeifanya kuwa pango la wanyang ' anyi ! "

text: And the scribes and chief priests heard it , and sought how they might destroy him : for they feared him , because all the people was astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Makuhani wakuu na walimu wa Sheria waliposikia hayo , walianza kutafuta njia ya kumwangamiza . Lakini walimwogopa kwa sababu umati wa watu ulishangazwa na mafundisho yake .

text: And when even was come , he went out of the city .
text2: Ilipokuwa jioni , Yesu na wanafunzi wake waliondoka mjini .

text: And in the morning , as they passed by , they saw the fig tree dried up from the roots .
text2: Asubuhi na mapema , walipokuwa wanapita , waliuona ule mtini umenyauka wote , hata mizizi .

text: And Peter calling to remembrance saith unto him , Master , behold , the fig tree which thou cursedst is withered away .
text2: Petro aliukumbuka , akamwambia Yesu , " Mwalimu , tazama ! Ule mtini ulioulaani , umenyauka ! "

text: And Jesus answering saith unto them , Have faith in God .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Mwaminini Mungu .

text: For verily I say unto you , That whosoever shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; and shall not doubt in his heart , but shall believe that those things which he saith shall come to pass ; he shall have whatsoever he saith .
text2: Nawaambieni kweli , mtu akiuambia mlima huu : Ng ' oka ukajitose baharini bila kuona shaka moyoni mwake , ila akaamini kwamba mambo yote anayosema yanafanyika , atafanyiwa jambo hilo .

text: Therefore I say unto you , What things soever ye desire , when ye pray , believe that ye receive them , and ye shall have them .
text2: Kwa hiyo nawaambieni , mnaposali na kuomba kitu , aminini kwamba mmekipokea , nanyi mtapewa .

text: And when ye stand praying , forgive , if ye have ought against any : that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses .
text2: Mnaposimama kusali , sameheni kila mtu aliyewakosea chochote , ili Baba yenu aliye mbinguni awasamehe ninyi makosa yenu .

text: But if ye do not forgive , neither will your Father which is in heaven forgive your trespasses .
text2: Lakini msipowasamehe wengine , hata Baba yenu aliye mbinguni hatawasamehe ninyi makosa yenu . "

text: And they come again to Jerusalem : and as he was walking in the temple , there come to him the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders ,
text2: Basi , wakafika tena Yerusalemu . Yesu alipokuwa akitembea Hekaluni , makuhani wakuu , walimu wa Sheria na wazee walimwendea ,

text: And say unto him , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority to do these things ?
text2: wakamwuliza , " Unafanya mambo haya kwa mamlaka gani ? Nani aliyekupa mamlaka ya kufanya mambo haya ? "

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I will also ask of you one question , and answer me , and I will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Lakini Yesu akawaambia , " Nitawaulizeni swali moja ; mkinijibu , na pia nitawaambieni ni kwa mamlaka gani ninafanya mambo haya .

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ? answer me .
text2: Je , mamlaka ya Yohane ya kubatiza yalitoka mbinguni ama kwa watu ? Nijibuni . "

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then did ye not believe him ?
text2: Wakaanza kujadiliana , " Tukisema , Yalitoka mbinguni , atatuuliza , Basi , mbona hamkumsadiki ?

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; they feared the people : for all men counted John , that he was a prophet indeed .
text2: Na tukisema , Yalitoka kwa watu . . . " ( Waliogopa umati wa watu maana wote waliamini kwamba Yohane alikuwa kweli nabii . )

text: And they answered and said unto Jesus , We cannot tell . And Jesus answering saith unto them , Neither do I tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Basi , wakamjibu Yesu , " Sisi hatujui . " Naye Yesu akawaambia , " Nami pia sitawaambieni ninafanya mambo haya kwa mamlaka gani . "

text: And he began to speak unto them by parables . A certain man planted a vineyard , and set an hedge about it , and digged a place for the winefat , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country .
text2: Yesu alianza kusema nao kwa mifano : " Mtu mmoja alilima shamba la mizabibu . Akalizungushia ukuta , na katikati yake akachimba kisima cha kusindikia divai , akajenga mnara pia . Akalikodisha shamba hilo kwa wakulima , akasafiri hadi nchi ya mbali .

text: And at the season he sent to the husbandmen a servant , that he might receive from the husbandmen of the fruit of the vineyard .
text2: Wakati wa mavuno , alimtuma mtumishi wake kwa wale wakulima akamletee sehemu ya mazao ya shamba lake .

text: And they caught him , and beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Wale wakulima wakamkamata , wakampiga , wakamrudisha mikono mitupu .

text: And again he sent unto them another servant ; and at him they cast stones , and wounded him in the head , and sent him away shamefully handled .
text2: Akatuma tena mtumishi mwingine ; huyu wakamuumiza kichwa na kumtendea vibaya .

text: And again he sent another ; and him they killed , and many others ; beating some , and killing some .
text2: Mwenye shamba akatuma mtumishi mwingine tena , na huyo wakamuua . Wengine wengi waliotumwa , baadhi yao walipigwa , na wengi wakauawa .

text: Having yet therefore one son , his wellbeloved , he sent him also last unto them , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: Alibakiwa bado na mtu mmoja , yaani mwanawe mpendwa . Mwishowe akamtuma huyo akisema , Watamheshimu mwanangu .

text: But those husbandmen said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and the inheritance shall be ours .
text2: Lakini hao wakulima wakaambiana , Huyu ndiye mrithi , basi , tumuue ili urithi wake uwe wetu !

text: And they took him , and killed him , and cast him out of the vineyard .
text2: Kwa hiyo wakamkamata , wakamuua na kumtupa nje ya lile shamba la mizabibu .

text: What shall therefore the lord of the vineyard do ? he will come and destroy the husbandmen , and will give the vineyard unto others .
text2: " Basi , mwenye shamba atafanya nini ? Atakuja kuwaangamiza hao wakulima na kulikodisha hilo shamba la mizabibu kwa watu wengine .

text: And have ye not read this scripture ; The stone which the builders rejected is become the head of the corner :
text2: Je , hamjasoma Maandiko haya ? Jiwe walilokataa waashi sasa limekuwa jiwe kuu la msingi .

text: This was the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Bwana ndiye aliyefanya jambo hili , nalo ni la ajabu sana kwetu . "

text: And they sought to lay hold on him , but feared the people : for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them : and they left him , and went their way .
text2: Makuhani wakuu , walimu wa Sheria na wazee walifahamu ya kwamba mfano huo ulikuwa unawahusu . Kwa hiyo walijaribu kumtia nguvuni , lakini waliogopa umati wa watu . Basi , wakamwacha wakaenda zao .

text: And they send unto him certain of the Pharisees and of the Herodians , to catch him in his words .
text2: Basi , baadhi ya Mafarisayo na wafuasi wa kikundi cha Herode walitumwa ili wamtege Yesu kwa maneno yake .

text: And when they were come , they say unto him , Master , we know that thou art true , and carest for no man : for thou regardest not the person of men , but teachest the way of God in truth : Is it lawful to give tribute to Caesar , or not ?
text2: Wakamwendea , wakamwambia , " Mwalimu , tunajua kwamba wewe ni mtu mwaminifu unayesema ukweli mtupu , wala humjali mtu yeyote . Wala cheo cha mtu si kitu kwako , lakini wafundisha ukweli kuhusu njia ya Mungu . Je , ni halali kulipa kodi kwa Kaisari , au la ? Tulipe au tusilipe ? "

text: Shall we give , or shall we not give ? But he , knowing their hypocrisy , said unto them , Why tempt ye me ? bring me a penny , that I may see it .
text2: Lakini Yesu alijua unafiki wao , akawaambia , " Mbona mnanijaribu ? Nionyesheni sarafu . "

text: And they brought it . And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ? And they said unto him , Caesar ' s .
text2: Wakamwonyesha . Naye akawauliza , " Sura na chapa hii ni ya nani ? " Wakamjibu , " Ni ya Kaisari . "

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Render to Caesar the things that are Caesar ' s , and to God the things that are God ' s . And they marvelled at him .
text2: Basi , Yesu akawaambia , " Mpeni Kaisari yaliyo yake Kaisari na Mungu yaliyo yake Mungu . " Wakashangazwa sana naye .

text: Then come unto him the Sadducees , which say there is no resurrection ; and they asked him , saying ,
text2: Masadukayo wasemao kwamba hakuna ufufuo walimwendea Yesu , wakamwuliza ,

text: Master , Moses wrote unto us , If a man ' s brother die , and leave his wife behind him , and leave no children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: " Mwalimu , Mose alituagiza hivi : Mtu akifa na kuacha mke bila mtoto , ndugu yake lazima amchukue huyo mama mjane amzalie watoto ndugu yake marehemu .

text: Now there were seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and dying left no seed .
text2: Basi , kulikuwa na ndugu saba . Wa kwanza alioa , akafa bila kuacha mtoto .

text: And the second took her , and died , neither left he any seed : and the third likewise .
text2: Ndugu wa pili akamwoa huyo mjane , naye pia akafa bila kuacha mtoto ; na ndugu watatu hali kadhalika .

text: And the seven had her , and left no seed : last of all the woman died also .
text2: Wote saba walikufa bila kuacha mtoto . Mwishowe yule mama mjane naye akafa .

text: In the resurrection therefore , when they shall rise , whose wife shall she be of them ? for the seven had her to wife .
text2: Basi , siku watu watakapofufuka , mama huyo atakuwa mke wa nani ? Maana wote saba walikuwa wamemwoa . "

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Do ye not therefore err , because ye know not the scriptures , neither the power of God ?
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Ninyi mmekosea sana , kwa sababu hamjui Maandiko Matakatifu wala nguvu ya Mungu .

text: For when they shall rise from the dead , they neither marry , nor are given in marriage ; but are as the angels which are in heaven .
text2: Maana wafu watakapofufuka , hawataoa wala kuolewa ; watakuwa kama malaika wa mbinguni .

text: And as touching the dead , that they rise : have ye not read in the book of Moses , how in the bush God spake unto him , saying , I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ?
text2: Lakini kuhusu kufufuliwa kwa wafu , je , hamjasoma kitabu cha Mose katika sehemu inayohusu kile kichaka kilichokuwa kinawaka moto ? Mungu alimwambia Mose , Mimi ni Mungu wa Abrahamu , Mungu wa Isaka , na Mungu wa Yakobo .

text: He is not the God of the dead , but the God of the living : ye therefore do greatly err .
text2: Basi , yeye si Mungu wa wafu , bali ni Mungu wa walio hai . Ninyi mmekosea sana ! "

text: And one of the scribes came , and having heard them reasoning together , and perceiving that he had answered them well , asked him , Which is the first commandment of all ?
text2: Mmojawapo wa walimu wa Sheria alifika , akasikia mabishano yao . Alipoona kwamba Yesu aliwajibu vyema , akajitokeza akamwuliza , " Katika amri zote ni ipi iliyo ya kwanza ? "

text: And Jesus answered him , The first of all the commandments is , Hear , O Israel ; The Lord our God is one Lord :
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Ya kwanza ndiyo hii : Sikiliza , Israeli ! Bwana Mungu wetu ndiye peke yake Bwana .

text: And thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind , and with all thy strength : this is the first commandment .
text2: Mpende Bwana Mungu wako kwa moyo wako wote , kwa roho yako yote , kwa akili yako yote na kwa nguvu zako zote .

text: And the second is like , namely this , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself . There is none other commandment greater than these .
text2: Na ya pili ndiyo hii : Mpende jirani yako kama unavyojipenda mwenyewe . Hakuna amri nyingine iliyo kuu kuliko hizi . "

text: And the scribe said unto him , Well , Master , thou hast said the truth : for there is one God ; and there is none other but he :
text2: Basi , yule mwalimu wa Sheria akamwambia , " Vyema Mwalimu ! Umesema kweli kwamba Mungu ni mmoja tu wala hakuna mwingine ila yeye .

text: And to love him with all the heart , and with all the understanding , and with all the soul , and with all the strength , and to love his neighbour as himself , is more than all whole burnt offerings and sacrifices .
text2: Na ni lazima mtu kumpenda Mungu kwa moyo wote , kwa akili yote , na kwa nguvu zote , na kumpenda jirani yake kama anavyojipenda mwenyewe . Jambo hili ni muhimu zaidi kuliko dhabihu na sadaka zote za kuteketezwa . "

text: And when Jesus saw that he answered discreetly , he said unto him , Thou art not far from the kingdom of God . And no man after that durst ask him any question .
text2: Yesu alipoona kwamba huyu mtu alimjibu kwa ujasiri , akamwambia , " Wewe huko mbali na Ufalme wa Mungu . " Baada ya hayo , hakuna mtu aliyethubutu tena kumwuliza kitu .

text: And Jesus answered and said , while he taught in the temple , How say the scribes that Christ is the Son of David ?
text2: Wakati Yesu alipokuwa akifundisha Hekaluni , aliuliza , " Mbona walimu wa Sheria wanasema ya kwamba Kristo ni mwana wa Daudi ?

text: For David himself said by the Holy Ghost , The Lord said to my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: Daudi mwenyewe akiongozwa na Roho Mtakatifu alisema : Bwana alimwambia Bwana wangu : Keti upande wangu wa kulia , Mpaka nitakapowaweka adui zako chini ya miguu yako . "

text: David therefore himself calleth him Lord ; and whence is he then his son ? And the common people heard him gladly .
text2: " Daudi mwenyewe anamwita Kristo Bwana . Basi , Kristo atakuwaje mwanae ? " Umati wa watu ulikuwa ukimsikiliza kwa furaha .

text: And he said unto them in his doctrine , Beware of the scribes , which love to go in long clothing , and love salutations in the marketplaces ,
text2: Katika mafundisho yake , Yesu alisema , " Jihadharini na walimu wa Sheria ambao hupenda kupitapita wamejivalia kanzu ndefu na kusalimiwa na watu kwa heshima sokoni ; hupenda kuketi mahali pa heshima katika masunagogi ,

text: And the chief seats in the synagogues , and the uppermost rooms at feasts :
text2: na kuchukua nafasi za heshima katika karamu .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayers : these shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Huwanyonya wajane huku wakijisingizia kusali sala ndefu . Siku ya hukumu watapata adhabu kali ! "

text: And Jesus sat over against the treasury , and beheld how the people cast money into the treasury : and many that were rich cast in much .
text2: Yesu alikuwa ameketi karibu na sanduku la hazina . Akawa anatazama jinsi watu wengi walivyokuwa wakitoa fedha na kuzitia katika hazina ya Hekalu . Matajiri wengi walitoa fedha nyingi .

text: And there came a certain poor widow , and she threw in two mites , which make a farthing .
text2: Hapo akaja mama mmoja mjane maskini , akatoa sarafu mbili ndogo za fedha .

text: And he called unto him his disciples , and saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That this poor widow hath cast more in , than all they which have cast into the treasury :
text2: Yesu akawaita wanafunzi wake , akawaambia , " Kweli nawaambieni , huyu mama mjane maskini ametoa zaidi kuliko wengine wote waliotia fedha katika sanduku la hazina .

text: For all they did cast in of their abundance ; but she of her want did cast in all that she had , even all her living .
text2: Maana wote walitoa kutokana na ziada ya mali zao , lakini huyu mama , ingawa ni maskini , ametoa yote aliyokuwa nayo , ametoa kila kitu alichohitaji kwa kuishi . "

text: And as he went out of the temple , one of his disciples saith unto him , Master , see what manner of stones and what buildings are here !
text2: Yesu alipokuwa anatoka Hekaluni , mmoja wa wanafunzi wake alimwambia , " Mwalimu , tazama jinsi mawe haya na majengo haya yalivyo ya ajabu ! "

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Seest thou these great buildings ? there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Je , unayaona majengo haya makubwa ? Hakuna hata jiwe moja litakalosalia juu ya lingine ; kila kitu kitabomolewa . "

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple , Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately ,
text2: Yesu alipokuwa ameketi juu ya mlima wa Mizeituni akielekea Hekalu , Petro , Yakobo , Yohane na Andrea wakamwuliza kwa faragha ,

text: Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled ?
text2: " Twambie mambo haya yatatukia lini ? Ni ishara gani itakayoonyesha kwamba mambo haya karibu yatimizwe ? "

text: And Jesus answering them began to say , Take heed lest any man deceive you :
text2: Yesu akaanza kuwaambia , " Jihadharini msije mkadanganywa na mtu .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Maana wengi watakuja wakilitumia jina langu , wakisema , Mimi ndiye ! nao watawapotosha watu wengi .

text: And when ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars , be ye not troubled : for such things must needs be ; but the end shall not be yet .
text2: Mtakaposikia juu ya vita na fununu za vita , msifadhaike . Mambo hayo lazima yatokee , lakini mwisho wenyewe ungali bado .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be earthquakes in divers places , and there shall be famines and troubles : these are the beginnings of sorrows .
text2: Taifa moja litapigana na taifa lingine ; utawala mmoja utapigana na utawala mwingine ; kila mahali kutakuwa na mitetemeko ya ardhi na njaa . Mambo haya ni kama tu maumivu ya kwanza ya kujifungua mtoto .

text: But take heed to yourselves : for they shall deliver you up to councils ; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten : and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them .
text2: " Lakini ninyi jihadharini . Maana watu watawapelekeni mahakamani , na kuwapigeni katika masunagogi . Mtapelekwa mbele ya watawala na wafalme kwa sababu yangu ili mpate kunishuhudia kwao .

text: And the gospel must first be published among all nations .
text2: Lakini lazima kwanza Habari Njema ihubiriwe kwa mataifa yote .

text: But when they shall lead you , and deliver you up , take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak , neither do ye premeditate : but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour , that speak ye : for it is not ye that speak , but the Holy Ghost .
text2: Nao watakapowatieni nguvuni na kuwapeleka mahakamani , msiwe na wasiwasi juu ya yale mtakayosema ; saa ile itakapofika , semeni chochote mtakachopewa , maana si ninyi mtakaosema , bali Roho Mtakatifu .

text: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death , and the father the son ; and children shall rise up against their parents , and shall cause them to be put to death .
text2: Ndugu atamsaliti ndugu yake auawe ; baba atamsaliti mwanae ; watoto watawashambulia wazazi wao na kuwaua .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Watu wote watawachukieni ninyi kwa sababu ya jina langu . Lakini atakayevumilia mpaka mwisho ndiye atakayeokolewa .

text: But when ye shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , standing where it ought not , ( let him that readeth understand , ) then let them that be in Judaea flee to the mountains :
text2: " Mtakapoona Chukizo Haribifu limesimama mahali ambapo si pake , ( msomaji na atambue maana yake ! ) Hapo watu walioko Yudea wakimbilie milimani .

text: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house , neither enter therein , to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Mtu aliye juu ya paa la nyumba asishuke kuingia nyumbani mwake kuchukua kitu .

text: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment .
text2: Aliye shambani asirudi nyuma kuchukua vazi lake .

text: But woe to them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: Ole wao waja wazito na wanaonyonyesha siku hizo !

text: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter .
text2: Ombeni ili mambo hayo yasitukie nyakati za baridi .

text: For in those days shall be affliction , such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time , neither shall be .
text2: Maana wakati huo kutakuwa na dhiki ambayo haijatokea tangu Mungu alipoumba ulimwengu mpaka leo , wala haitatokea tena .

text: And except that the Lord had shortened those days , no flesh should be saved : but for the elect ' s sake , whom he hath chosen , he hath shortened the days .
text2: Kama Bwana asingepunguza siku hizo , hakuna binadamu ambaye angeokolewa . Lakini kwa ajili ya wateule wake , Bwana amezipunguza siku hizo .

text: And then if any man shall say to you , Lo , here is Christ ; or , lo , he is there ; believe him not :
text2: " Basi mtu akiwaambieni , Tazama , Kristo yupo hapa ! au Yupo pale ! msimsadiki .

text: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise , and shall shew signs and wonders , to seduce , if it were possible , even the elect .
text2: Maana watatokea kina Kristo wa uongo na manabii wa uongo , watafanya ishara na maajabu , ili kuwapotosha wateule wa Mungu , kama ikiwezekana .

text: But take ye heed : behold , I have foretold you all things .
text2: Lakini ninyi jihadharini . Mimi nimewaambieni mambo yote kabla hayajatokea .

text: But in those days , after that tribulation , the sun shall be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light ,
text2: " Basi , siku hizo baada ya dhiki hiyo , jua litatiwa giza na mwezi hautaangaza .

text: And the stars of heaven shall fall , and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Nyota zitaanguka kutoka angani , na nguvu za mbingu zitatikiswa .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory .
text2: Hapo watamwona Mwana wa Mtu akija katika mawingu kwa nguvu nyingi na utukufu .

text: And then shall he send his angels , and shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven .
text2: Kisha atawatuma malaika wake ; atawakusanya wateule wake kutoka pande zote nne za dunia , kutoka mwisho wa dunia mpaka mwisho wa mbingu .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When her branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is near :
text2: " Kwa mtini jifunzeni mfano huu : Mara tu matawi yake yanapoanza kuwa laini na kuchanua majani , mnajua kwamba wakati wa kiangazi umekaribia .

text: So ye in like manner , when ye shall see these things come to pass , know that it is nigh , even at the doors .
text2: Hali kadhalika nanyi mtakapoona mambo hayo yakitendeka , jueni kwamba Mwana wa Mtu yuko karibu sana .

text: Verily I say unto you , that this generation shall not pass , till all these things be done .
text2: Nawaambieni kweli , kizazi hiki hakitapita kabla ya mambo hayo yote kutukia .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Mbingu na dunia zitapita , lakini maneno yangu hayatapita kamwe .

text: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels which are in heaven , neither the Son , but the Father .
text2: " Lakini hakuna mtu ajuaye siku au saa hiyo itakuja lini ; wala malaika wa mbinguni , wala Mwana ; Baba peke yake ndiye ajuaye .

text: Take ye heed , watch and pray : for ye know not when the time is .
text2: Muwe waangalifu na kesheni , maana hamjui wakati huo utafika lini .

text: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey , who left his house , and gave authority to his servants , and to every man his work , and commanded the porter to watch .
text2: Itakuwa kama mtu anayeondoka nyumbani kwenda safari akiwaachia watumishi wake madaraka , kila mmoja na kazi yake ; akamwambia mlinzi wa mlango awe macho .

text: Watch ye therefore : for ye know not when the master of the house cometh , at even , or at midnight , or at the cockcrowing , or in the morning :
text2: Kesheni , basi , kwa maana hamjui mwenye nyumba atarudi lini ; huenda ikawa jioni , usiku wa manane , alfajiri au asubuhi .

text: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping .
text2: Kesheni ili akija ghafla asije akawakuta mmelala .

text: And what I say unto you I say unto all , Watch .
text2: Ninayowaambieni ninyi , nawaambia wote : Kesheni ! "

text: After two days was the feast of the passover , and of unleavened bread : and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft , and put him to death .
text2: Ilikuwa siku mbili tu kabla ya sikukuu ya Pasaka na ya Mikate Isiyotiwa Chachu . Makuhani wakuu na walimu wa Sheria walikuwa wakitafuta njia ya kumtia Yesu nguvuni kwa hila wamuue .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar of the people .
text2: Lakini walisema , " Tusimtie nguvuni wakati wa sikukuu , watu wasije wakafanya ghasia . "

text: And being in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper , as he sat at meat , there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of spikenard very precious ; and she brake the box , and poured it on his head .
text2: Yesu alikuwa Bethania , nyumbani kwa Simoni , Mkoma . Alipokuwa mezani kula chakula , mama mmoja aliyekuwa na chupa ya alabasta yenye marashi ya nardo safi ya thamani kubwa alikuja , akaivunja hiyo chupa , akammiminia Yesu marashi hayo kichwani .

text: And there were some that had indignation within themselves , and said , Why was this waste of the ointment made ?
