text2: Akamjibu , " Mpende Bwana Mungu wako kwa moyo wako wote , kwa roho yako yote , kwa nguvu zako zote na kwa akili yako yote . Na , mpende jirani yako kama unavyojipenda mwenyewe . "

text: And he said unto him , Thou hast answered right : this do , and thou shalt live .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Vema ! Fanya hivyo , nawe utaishi . "

text: But he , willing to justify himself , said unto Jesus , And who is my neighbour ?
text2: Lakini yeye akitaka kujihakikishia kuwa mwema akamwuliza Yesu , " Na jirani yangu ni nani ? "

text: And Jesus answering said , A certain man went down from Jerusalem to Jericho , and fell among thieves , which stripped him of his raiment , and wounded him , and departed , leaving him half dead .
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Mtu mmoja alikuwa anashuka kutoka Yerusalemu kwenda Yeriko . Alipokuwa njiani , alivamiwa na majambazi , wakamnyang ' anya mali yake na kumpiga , wakamwacha amelala pale nusu mfu .

text: And by chance there came down a certain priest that way : and when he saw him , he passed by on the other side .
text2: Kumbe , kuhani mmoja akawa anapita barabara ileile , akamwona , akapita kando .

text: And likewise a Levite , when he was at the place , came and looked on him , and passed by on the other side .
text2: Hali kadhalika na Mlawi mmoja , alipofika mahali akamwona , akapita kando .

text: But a certain Samaritan , as he journeyed , came where he was : and when he saw him , he had compassion on him ,
text2: Lakini Msamaria mmoja aliyekuwa anasafiri , alifika pale yule mtu alipokuwa , naye alipomwona , alimwonea huruma .

text: And went to him , and bound up his wounds , pouring in oil and wine , and set him on his own beast , and brought him to an inn , and took care of him .
text2: Akamwendea , akamtibu majeraha yake kwa kumtia mafuta na divai ; na kuyafunga halafu akampandisha juu ya punda wake akampeleka katika nyumba moja ya wageni akamuuguza .

text: And on the morrow when he departed , he took out two pence , and gave them to the host , and said unto him , Take care of him ; and whatsoever thou spendest more , when I come again , I will repay thee .
text2: Kesho yake akatoa fedha dinari mbili akampa yule mwenye nyumba , akamwambia , Muuguze mtu huyu ; na chochote utakachotumia zaidi , nitakulipa nitakaporudi . "

text: Which now of these three , thinkest thou , was neighbour unto him that fell among the thieves ?
text2: Kisha Yesu akauliza , " Kati ya hao watatu , ni yupi aliyeonyesha kuwa jirani yake yule aliyevamiwa na majambazi ? "

text: And he said , He that shewed mercy on him . Then said Jesus unto him , Go , and do thou likewise .
text2: Yule mwalimu wa Sheria akamjibu , " Ni yule aliyemwonea huruma . " Yesu akamwambia , " Nenda ukafanye vivyo hivyo . "

text: Now it came to pass , as they went , that he entered into a certain village : and a certain woman named Martha received him into her house .
text2: Walipokuwa safarini , waliingia katika kijiji kimoja na mwanamke mmoja , aitwaye Martha , alimkaribisha nyumbani kwake .

text: And she had a sister called Mary , which also sat at Jesus ' feet , and heard his word .
text2: Martha alikuwa na dada yake aitwaye Maria ; huyu aliketi karibu na Yesu akisikiliza mafundisho yake .

text: But Martha was cumbered about much serving , and came to him , and said , Lord , dost thou not care that my sister hath left me to serve alone ? bid her therefore that she help me .
text2: Lakini Martha alikuwa anashughulika na mambo mengi . Basi , akamwendea Yesu , akamwambia , " Bwana , hivi hujali kwamba dada yangu ameniacha nishughulike peke yangu ? Mwambie basi , anisaidie . "

text: And Jesus answered and said unto her , Martha , Martha , thou art careful and troubled about many things :
text2: Lakini Bwana akamjibu , " Martha , Martha , unahangaika na kusumbuka kwa mambo mengi .

text: But one thing is needful : and Mary hath chosen that good part , which shall not be taken away from her .
text2: Kitu kimoja tu ni muhimu . Maria amechagua kitu bora zaidi ambacho hakuna mtu atakayemnyag ' anya . "

text: And it came to pass , that , as he was praying in a certain place , when he ceased , one of his disciples said unto him , Lord , teach us to pray , as John also taught his disciples .
text2: Siku moja , Yesu alikuwa mahali fulani akisali . Alipomaliza kusali , mmoja wa wanafunzi wake akamwambia , " Bwana , tunakuomba utufundishe kusali kama Yohane mbatizaji alivyowafundisha wanafunzi wake . "

text: And he said unto them , When ye pray , say , Our Father which art in heaven , Hallowed be thy name . Thy kingdom come . Thy will be done , as in heaven , so in earth .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Mnaposali , semeni : Baba ! Jina lako litukuzwe ; Ufalme wako ufike .

text: Give us day by day our daily bread .
text2: Utupe daima chakula chetu cha kila siku .

text: And forgive us our sins ; for we also forgive every one that is indebted to us . And lead us not into temptation ; but deliver us from evil .
text2: Utusamehe dhambi zetu , maana sisi tunawasamehe wote waliotukosea ; wala usitutie katika majaribu . "

text: And he said unto them , Which of you shall have a friend , and shall go unto him at midnight , and say unto him , Friend , lend me three loaves ;
text2: Kisha akawaambia , " Tuseme mmoja wenu anaye rafiki , akaenda kwake usiku wa manane , akamwambia : Rafiki , tafadhali niazime mikate mitatu ,

text: For a friend of mine in his journey is come to me , and I have nothing to set before him ?
text2: kwa kuwa rafiki yangu amepitia kwangu akiwa safarini nami sina cha kumpa .

text: And he from within shall answer and say , Trouble me not : the door is now shut , and my children are with me in bed ; I cannot rise and give thee .
text2: Naye , akiwa ndani angemjibu : Usinisumbue ! Nimekwisha funga mlango . Mimi na watoto wangu tumelala ; siwezi kuamka nikupe !

text: I say unto you , Though he will not rise and give him , because he is his friend , yet because of his importunity he will rise and give him as many as he needeth .
text2: Hakika , ingawa hataamka ampe kwa sababu yeye ni rafiki yake , lakini , kwa sababu ya huyo mtu kuendelea kumwomba , ataamka ampe chochote anachohitaji .

text: And I say unto you , Ask , and it shall be given you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened unto you .
text2: Kwa hiyo , ombeni , nanyi mtapewa , tafuteni , nanyi mtapata , bisheni nanyi mtafunguliwa .

text: For every one that asketh receiveth ; and he that seeketh findeth ; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened .
text2: Maana yeyote aombaye hupewa , atafutaye hupata na abishaye hufunguliwa .

text: If a son shall ask bread of any of you that is a father , will he give him a stone ? or if he ask a fish , will he for a fish give him a serpent ?
text2: Mtoto akimwomba baba yake samaki , je , atampa nyoka badala ya samaki ?

text: Or if he shall ask an egg , will he offer him a scorpion ?
text2: Na kama akimwomba yai , je , atampa ng ' e ?

text: If ye then , being evil , know how to give good gifts unto your children : how much more shall your heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to them that ask him ?
text2: Ninyi , ingawa ni waovu , mnajua kuwapa watoto wenu vitu vizuri . Basi , baba yenu wa mbinguni atafanya zaidi ; atawapa Roho Mtakatifu wale wanaomwomba . "

text: And he was casting out a devil , and it was dumb . And it came to pass , when the devil was gone out , the dumb spake ; and the people wondered .
text2: Siku moja Yesu alikuwa anamfukuza pepo aliyemfanya mtu mmoja kuwa bubu . Basi , huyo pepo alipomtoka , yule mtu akaweza kuongea hata umati wa watu ukashangaa .

text: But some of them said , He casteth out devils through Beelzebub the chief of the devils .
text2: Lakini baadhi ya watu hao wakasema , " Anamfukuza pepo kwa uwezo wa Beelzebuli , mkuu wa pepo . "

text: And others , tempting him , sought of him a sign from heaven .
text2: Wengine , wakimjaribu , wakamtaka afanye ishara kuonyesha kama alikuwa na idhini kutoka mbinguni .

text: But he , knowing their thoughts , said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and a house divided against a house falleth .
text2: Lakini yeye , akiwa anayajua mawazo yao , akawaambia , " Ufalme wowote uliofarakana wenyewe , hauwezi kudumu ; kadhalika , jamaa yeyote inayofarakana huangamia .

text: If Satan also be divided against himself , how shall his kingdom stand ? because ye say that I cast out devils through Beelzebub .
text2: Kama Shetani anajipinga mwenyewe , utawala wake utasimamaje ? Mnasemaje , basi , kwamba ninawafukuza pepo kwa uwezo wa Beelzebuli ?

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your sons cast them out ? therefore shall they be your judges .
text2: Kama ninafukuza pepo kwa uwezo wa Beelzebuli , watoto wenu huwafukuza kwa uwezo wa nani ? Kwa sababu hiyo , wao ndio watakaowahukumu ninyi .

text: But if I with the finger of God cast out devils , no doubt the kingdom of God is come upon you .
text2: Lakini ikiwa ninawafukuza pepo kwa uwezo wa Mungu , basi jueni kwamba Ufalme wa Mungu umekwisha fika kwenu .

text: When a strong man armed keepeth his palace , his goods are in peace :
text2: " Mtu mwenye nguvu anapolinda jumba lake kwa silaha , mali yake yote iko salama .

text: But when a stronger than he shall come upon him , and overcome him , he taketh from him all his armour wherein he trusted , and divideth his spoils .
text2: Lakini akija mwenye nguvu zaidi akamshambulia na kumshinda , huyo huziteka silaha zake alizotegemea na kugawanya nyara .

text: He that is not with me is against me : and he that gathereth not with me scattereth .
text2: Yeyote asiyejiunga nami , ananipinga ; na yeyote asiyekusanya pamoja nami , hutawanya .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest ; and finding none , he saith , I will return unto my house whence I came out .
text2: " Pepo mchafu akifukuzwa kwa mtu fulani , huzururazurura jangwani akitafuta mahali pa kupumzikia . Asipopata , hujisemea : Nitarudi kwenye makao yangu nilikotoka .

text: And when he cometh , he findeth it swept and garnished .
text2: Anaporudi , huikuta ile nyumba imefagiwa na kupambwa .

text: Then goeth he , and taketh to him seven other spirits more wicked than himself ; and they enter in , and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first .
text2: Basi , huenda na kuwachukua pepo wengine saba waovu zaidi kuliko yeye ; wote huenda na kumwingia mtu yule . Hivyo , basi hali ya mtu huyo sasa huwa mbaya zaidi kuliko pale mwanzo . "

text: And it came to pass , as he spake these things , a certain woman of the company lifted up her voice , and said unto him , Blessed is the womb that bare thee , and the paps which thou hast sucked .
text2: Alipokuwa akisema hayo , mwanamke mmoja katika lile kundi la watu , akasema kwa sauti kubwa : " Heri tumbo lililokuzaa , na maziwa yaliyokunyonyesha ! "

text: But he said , Yea rather , blessed are they that hear the word of God , and keep it .
text2: Lakini Yesu akasema , " Lakini heri zaidi wale wanaolisikia neno la Mungu na kulishika . "

text: And when the people were gathered thick together , he began to say , This is an evil generation : they seek a sign ; and there shall no sign be given it , but the sign of Jonas the prophet .
text2: Umati wa watu ulipozidi kuongezeka , Yesu akawaambia , " Kizazi hiki ni kizazi kiovu . Kinataka ishara , lakini hakitapewa ishara yoyote isipokuwa ile ya Yona .

text: For as Jonas was a sign unto the Ninevites , so shall also the Son of man be to this generation .
text2: Jinsi Yona alivyokuwa ishara kwa watu wa Ninewi , ndivyo pia Mwana wa Mtu atakavyokuwa ishara kwa kizazi hiki .

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with the men of this generation , and condemn them : for she came from the utmost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Malkia wa kusini atatokea wakati kizazi hiki kitakapohukumiwa , naye atashuhudia kwamba kina hatia . Yeye alisafiri kutoka mbali , akaja kusikiliza maneno ya hekima ya Solomoni ; kumbe hapa pana mkuu zaidi kuliko Solomoni .

text: The men of Nineve shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Watu wa Ninewi watatokea wakati kizazi hiki kitakapohukumiwa , na watashuhudia kwamba kizazi hiki kina hatia . Hao watu wa Ninewi walitubu kwa sababu ya mahubiri ya Yona ; na hapa pana mkuu zaidi kuliko Yona !

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , putteth it in a secret place , neither under a bushel , but on a candlestick , that they which come in may see the light .
text2: " Hakuna mtu anayewasha taa na kuifunika kwa pishi , bali huiweka juu ya kinara ili watu wanaoingia ndani wapate kuona mwanga .

text: The light of the body is the eye : therefore when thine eye is single , thy whole body also is full of light ; but when thine eye is evil , thy body also is full of darkness .
text2: Jicho lako ni kama taa ya mwili wako ; likiwa zima , mwili wako wote utakuwa katika mwanga . Jicho lako likiwa bovu , na mwili wako pia utakuwa katika giza .

text: Take heed therefore that the light which is in thee be not darkness .
text2: Uwe mwangalifu basi mwanga ulio ndani yako usije ukawa giza .

text: If thy whole body therefore be full of light , having no part dark , the whole shall be full of light , as when the bright shining of a candle doth give thee light .
text2: Basi , kama mwili wako wote una mwanga , bila kuwa na sehemu yoyote yenye giza , mwili huo utang ' aa kikamilifu kama vile taa inavyokuangazia kwa mwanga wake . "

text: And as he spake , a certain Pharisee besought him to dine with him : and he went in , and sat down to meat .
text2: Yesu alipokuwa akiongea , Mfarisayo mmoja alimkaribisha chakula nyumbani kwake , naye akaenda , akaketi kula chakula .

text: And when the Pharisee saw it , he marvelled that he had not first washed before dinner .
text2: Huyo Mfarisayo alistaajabu kuona kwamba alikula chakula bila kunawa .

text: And the Lord said unto him , Now do ye Pharisees make clean the outside of the cup and the platter ; but your inward part is full of ravening and wickedness .
text2: Bwana akamwambia , " Ninyi Mafarisayo huosha kikombe na sahani kwa nje , lakini ndani mmejaa udhalimu na uovu .

text: Ye fools , did not he that made that which is without make that which is within also ?
text2: Wapumbavu ninyi ! Je , aliyetengeneza nje si ndiye aliyetengeneza ndani pia ?

text: But rather give alms of such things as ye have ; and , behold , all things are clean unto you .
text2: Toeni kwa maskini vile vitu vilivyomo ndani , na vingine vyote vitakuwa halali kwenu .

text: But woe unto you , Pharisees ! for ye tithe mint and rue and all manner of herbs , and pass over judgment and the love of God : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: " Lakini ole wenu Mafarisayo , kwa sababu mnatoza watu zaka hata juu ya majani ya kukolezea chakula , mchicha na majani mengine , na huku hamjali juu ya haki na upendo kwa Mungu . Mambo haya iliwapasa muwe mmeyazingatia bila kuyasahau yale mengine .

text: Woe unto you , Pharisees ! for ye love the uppermost seats in the synagogues , and greetings in the markets .
text2: " Ole wenu ninyi Mafarisayo , kwa sababu mnapenda kuketi mbele mahali pa heshima katika masunagogi , na kusalimiwa kwa heshima hadharani .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are as graves which appear not , and the men that walk over them are not aware of them .
text2: Ole wenu , kwa sababu mko kama makaburi yaliyofichika ; watu hutembea juu yake bila kufahamu . "

text: Then answered one of the lawyers , and said unto him , Master , thus saying thou reproachest us also .
text2: Mmoja wa walimu wa Sheria akamwambia , " Mwalimu , maneno yako yanatukashifu na sisi pia . "

text: And he said , Woe unto you also , ye lawyers ! for ye lade men with burdens grievous to be borne , and ye yourselves touch not the burdens with one of your fingers .
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Na ninyi walimu wa Sheria , ole wenu ; maana mnawatwika watu mizigo isiyochukulika , huku ninyi wenyewe hamnyoshi hata kidole kuwasaidia .

text: Woe unto you ! for ye build the sepulchres of the prophets , and your fathers killed them .
text2: Ole wenu , kwa kuwa mnajenga makaburi ya manabii wale ambao wazee wenu waliwaua .

text: Truly ye bear witness that ye allow the deeds of your fathers : for they indeed killed them , and ye build their sepulchres .
text2: Kwa hiyo mnashuhudia na kukubaliana na matendo ya wazee wenu ; maana wao waliwaua hao manabii , nanyi mnajenga makaburi yao .

text: Therefore also said the wisdom of God , I will send them prophets and apostles , and some of them they shall slay and persecute :
text2: Kwa hiyo , Hekima ya Mungu ilisema hivi : Nitawapelekea manabii na mitume , lakini watawaua baadhi yao , na kuwatesa wengine .

text: That the blood of all the prophets , which was shed from the foundation of the world , may be required of this generation ;
text2: Matokeo yake ni kwamba kizazi hiki kitaadhibiwa kwa sababu ya damu ya manabii wote iliyomwagika tangu mwanzo wa ulimwengu ;

text: From the blood of Abel unto the blood of Zacharias , which perished between the altar and the temple : verily I say unto you , It shall be required of this generation .
text2: tangu kumwagwa damu ya Abeli mpaka kifo cha Zakariya ambaye walimuua kati ya madhabahu na mahali patakatifu . Naam , hakika kizazi hiki kitaadhibiwa kwa matendo haya .

text: Woe unto you , lawyers ! for ye have taken away the key of knowledge : ye entered not in yourselves , and them that were entering in ye hindered .
text2: " Ole wenu ninyi walimu wa Sheria , kwa sababu mmeuficha ule ufunguo wa mlango wa elimu ; ninyi wenyewe hamkuingia na mmewazuia waliokuwa wanaingia wasiingie . "

text: And as he said these things unto them , the scribes and the Pharisees began to urge him vehemently , and to provoke him to speak of many things :
text2: Alipokuwa akitoka pale , wale Mafarisayo na walimu wa Sheria wakaanza kumshambulia vikali na kumsonga kwa maswali mengi

text: Laying wait for him , and seeking to catch something out of his mouth , that they might accuse him .
text2: ili wapate kumnasa kwa maneno yake .

text: In the mean time , when there were gathered together an innumerable multitude of people , insomuch that they trode one upon another , he began to say unto his disciples first of all , Beware ye of the leaven of the Pharisees , which is hypocrisy .
text2: Wakati watu kwa maelfu walipokuwa wamekusanyika hata wakawa wanakanyagana , Yesu aliwaambia kwanza wanafunzi wake , " Jihadharini na chachu ya Mafarisayo , yaani unafiki .

text: For there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; neither hid , that shall not be known .
text2: Kila kilichofunikwa kitafunuliwa , kila kilichofichika kitafichuliwa .

text: Therefore whatsoever ye have spoken in darkness shall be heard in the light ; and that which ye have spoken in the ear in closets shall be proclaimed upon the housetops .
text2: Kwa hiyo , kila mliyosema gizani , watu watayasikia katika mwanga , na kila mliyonong ' ona faraghani milango imefungwa , yatatangazwa juu ya nyumba .

text: And I say unto you my friends , Be not afraid of them that kill the body , and after that have no more that they can do .
text2: " Nawaambieni ninyi rafiki zangu : msiwaogope wale wanaoua mwili , wasiweze kufanya kitu kingine zaidi .

text: But I will forewarn you whom ye shall fear : Fear him , which after he hath killed hath power to cast into hell ; yea , I say unto you , Fear him .
text2: Nitawaonyesheni yule ambaye ni lazima kumwogopa : mwogopeni yule ambaye baada ya kuua ana uwezo wa kumtupa mtu katika moto wa Jehanamu . Naam , ninawaambieni , mwogopeni huyo .

text: Are not five sparrows sold for two farthings , and not one of them is forgotten before God ?
text2: Inajulikana kwamba shomoro watano huuzwa kwa senti kumi , au sivyo ? Lakini mbele ya Mungu hasahauliki hata mmoja .

text: But even the very hairs of your head are all numbered . Fear not therefore : ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: Lakini hata nywele za vichwa vyenu zimehesabiwa zote . Msiogope , basi , ninyi mna thamani zaidi kuliko shomoro wengi !

text: Also I say unto you , Whosoever shall confess me before men , him shall the Son of man also confess before the angels of God :
text2: " Nawaambieni kweli , kila mtu anayekiri hadharani kwamba yeye ni wangu , Mwana wa Mtu naye atakiri mbele ya malaika wa Mungu kwamba mtu huyo ni wake .

text: But he that denieth me before men shall be denied before the angels of God .
text2: Lakini , mtu yeyote anayenikana mbele ya watu , naye atakanwa mbele ya malaika wa Mungu .

text: And whosoever shall speak a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but unto him that blasphemeth against the Holy Ghost it shall not be forgiven .
text2: " Yeyote anayesema neno la kumpinga Mwana wa Mtu atasamehewa ; lakini anayemkufuru Roho Mtakatifu hatasamehewa .

text: And when they bring you unto the synagogues , and unto magistrates , and powers , take ye no thought how or what thing ye shall answer , or what ye shall say :
text2: " Watakapowapeleka ninyi mbele ya masunagogi na mbele ya wakuu na watawala msiwe na wasiwasi juu ya jinsi mtakavyojitetea au jinsi mtakavyosema .

text: For the Holy Ghost shall teach you in the same hour what ye ought to say .
text2: Kwa maana wakati huo Roho Mtakatifu atawafundisheni kile mnachopaswa kusema . "

text: And one of the company said unto him , Master , speak to my brother , that he divide the inheritance with me .
text2: Mtu mmoja katika ule umati wa watu akamwambia , " Mwalimu , mwambie ndugu yangu tugawane urithi aliotuachia baba . "

text: And he said unto him , Man , who made me a judge or a divider over you ?
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Rafiki , ni nani aliyeniweka mimi mwamuzi au msuluhishi kati yenu ? "

text: And he said unto them , Take heed , and beware of covetousness : for a man ' s life consisteth not in the abundance of the things which he possesseth .
text2: Basi , akawaambia wote , " Jihadharini na kila aina ya tamaa ; maana uzima wa mtu hautegemei wingi wa vitu alivyo navyo . "

text: And he spake a parable unto them , saying , The ground of a certain rich man brought forth plentifully :
text2: Kisha akawaambia mfano : " Kulikuwa na tajiri mmoja ambaye shamba lake lilizaa mavuno mengi .

text: And he thought within himself , saying , What shall I do , because I have no room where to bestow my fruits ?
text2: Tajiri huyo akafikiri moyoni mwake : Nitafanyaje nami sina mahali pa kuhifadhia mavuno yangu ?

text: And he said , This will I do : I will pull down my barns , and build greater ; and there will I bestow all my fruits and my goods .
text2: Nitafanya hivi : nitabomoa ghala zangu na kujenga kubwa zaidi , na humo nitahifadhi mavuno yangu yote na mali yangu .

text: And I will say to my soul , Soul , thou hast much goods laid up for many years ; take thine ease , eat , drink , and be merry .
text2: Hapo nitaweza kuiambia roho yangu : sasa unayo akiba ya matumizi kwa miaka na miaka . Ponda mali , ule , unywe na kufurahi .

text: But God said unto him , Thou fool , this night thy soul shall be required of thee : then whose shall those things be , which thou hast provided ?
text2: Lakini Mungu akamwambia : Mpumbavu wewe ; leo usiku roho yako itachukuliwa . Na vitu vile vyote ulivyojilundikia vitakuwa vya nani ? "

text: So is he that layeth up treasure for himself , and is not rich toward God .
text2: Yesu akamaliza kwa kusema " Ndivyo ilivyo kwa mtu anayejilundikia mali kwa ajili yake mwenyewe , lakini si tajiri mbele ya Mungu . "

text: And he said unto his disciples , Therefore I say unto you , Take no thought for your life , what ye shall eat ; neither for the body , what ye shall put on .
text2: Kisha Yesu akawaambia wanafunzi wake , " Kwa sababu hiyo nawaambieni , msiwe na wasiwasi juu ya chakula mnachohitaji ili kuishi , wala juu ya mavazi mnayohitaji kwa ajili ya miili yenu .

text: The life is more than meat , and the body is more than raiment .
text2: Kwa sababu uzima ni bora kuliko chakula , na mwili ni bora kuliko mavazi .

text: Consider the ravens : for they neither sow nor reap ; which neither have storehouse nor barn ; and God feedeth them : how much more are ye better than the fowls ?
text2: Chukueni kwa mfano , kunguru : hawapandi , hawavuni wala hawana ghala yoyote . Hata hivyo , Mungu huwalisha . Ninyi mna thamani zaidi kuliko ndege !

text: And which of you with taking thought can add to his stature one cubit ?
text2: Ni nani kati yenu kwa kuwa na wasiwasi anaweza kuongeza urefu wa maisha yake ?

text: If ye then be not able to do that thing which is least , why take ye thought for the rest ?
text2: Basi , kama hamwezi kufanya jambo dogo kama hilo , kwa nini kuwa na wasiwasi juu ya yale mengine ?

text: Consider the lilies how they grow : they toil not , they spin not ; and yet I say unto you , that Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
text2: Angalieni maua jinsi yanavyomea . Hayafanyi kazi wala hayafumi . Hata hivyo , nawahakikishieni kwamba hata Solomoni mwenyewe na fahari zake zote hakupata kuvikwa vizuri kama ua mojawapo .

text: If then God so clothe the grass , which is to day in the field , and to morrow is cast into the oven ; how much more will he clothe you , O ye of little faith ?
text2: Lakini , kama Mungu hulivika vizuri jani la shambani ambalo leo liko na kesho latupwa motoni , je , hatawafanyia ninyi zaidi ? Enyi watu wenye imani haba !

text: And seek not ye what ye shall eat , or what ye shall drink , neither be ye of doubtful mind .
text2: " Basi , msivurugike akili , mkihangaika daima juu ya mtakachokula au mtakachokunywa .

text: For all these things do the nations of the world seek after : and your Father knoweth that ye have need of these things .
text2: Kwa maana hayo yote ndiyo yanayohangaikiwa na watu wasiomjua Mungu . Baba yenu anajua kwamba mnahitaji vitu hivyo .

text: But rather seek ye the kingdom of God ; and all these things shall be added unto you .
text2: Shughulikieni kwanza Ufalme wa Mungu , na hayo yote mtapewa kwa ziada .

text: Fear not , little flock ; for it is your Father ' s good pleasure to give you the kingdom .
text2: " Msiogope , enyi kundi dogo ! Maana Baba yenu amependa kuwapeni Ufalme .

text: Sell that ye have , and give alms ; provide yourselves bags which wax not old , a treasure in the heavens that faileth not , where no thief approacheth , neither moth corrupteth .
text2: Uzeni mali yenu mkawape maskini misaada . Jifanyieni mifuko isiyochakaa , na jiwekeeni hazina mbinguni ambako haitapungua . Huko wezi hawakaribii , wala nondo hawaharibu .

text: For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
text2: Pale ilipo hazina yako , ndipo pia utakapokuwa moyo wako .

text: Let your loins be girded about , and your lights burning ;
text2: " Muwe tayari ! Jifungeni mkanda kiunoni , na taa zenu ziwe zinawaka ;

text: And ye yourselves like unto men that wait for their lord , when he will return from the wedding ; that when he cometh and knocketh , they may open unto him immediately .
text2: muwe kama watumishi wanaomngojea bwana wao arudi kutoka arusini , ili wamfungulie mara atakapobisha hodi .

text: Blessed are those servants , whom the lord when he cometh shall find watching : verily I say unto you , that he shall gird himself , and make them to sit down to meat , and will come forth and serve them .
text2: Heri yao watumishi wale ambao bwana wao atakaporudi atawakuta wanakesha ! Nawaambieni hakika , huyo bwana atajifunga mkanda kiunoni , atawaketisha mezani na kuwahudumia .

text: And if he shall come in the second watch , or come in the third watch , and find them so , blessed are those servants .
text2: Heri yao watumishi hao ikiwa bwana wao atawakuta wanakesha hata ikiwa atarudi usiku wa manane au alfajiri .

text: And this know , that if the goodman of the house had known what hour the thief would come , he would have watched , and not have suffered his house to be broken through .
text2: Jueni kwamba , kama mwenye nyumba angejua saa ambayo mwizi atakuja , angekesha , wala hangeiacha nyumba yake ivunjwe .

text: Be ye therefore ready also : for the Son of man cometh at an hour when ye think not .
text2: Nanyi , kadhalika muwe tayari , maana Mwana wa Mtu atakuja saa msiyoitazamia . "

text: Then Peter said unto him , Lord , speakest thou this parable unto us , or even to all ?
text2: Petro akamwambia , " Bwana , mfano huo ni kwa ajili yetu tu , au ni kwa ajili ya watu wote ? "

text: And the Lord said , Who then is that faithful and wise steward , whom his lord shall make ruler over his household , to give them their portion of meat in due season ?
text2: Bwana akajibu , " Ni nani basi , mtumishi aliye mwaminifu na mwenye busara , ambaye bwana wake atamweka juu ya watumishi wake ili awape chakula wakati ufaao ?

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Heri yake mtumishi huyo ikiwa bwana wake atakaporudi atamkuta akifanya hivyo .

text: Of a truth I say unto you , that he will make him ruler over all that he hath .
text2: Hakika atampa madaraka juu ya mali yake yote .

text: But and if that servant say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ; and shall begin to beat the menservants and maidens , and to eat and drink , and to be drunken ;
text2: Lakini , kama mtumishi huyo atafikiri moyoni mwake : na kusema : Bwana wangu amekawia sana kurudi halafu aanze kuwapiga watumishi wenzake , wa kiume au wa kike , na kula , kunywa na kulewa ,

text: The lord of that servant will come in a day when he looketh not for him , and at an hour when he is not aware , and will cut him in sunder , and will appoint him his portion with the unbelievers .
text2: bwana wake atarudi siku asiyoitazamia na saa asiyoijua ; atamkatilia mbali na kumweka fungu moja na wasioamini .

text: And that servant , which knew his lord ' s will , and prepared not himself , neither did according to his will , shall be beaten with many stripes .
text2: Mtumishi ambaye anajua matakwa ya bwana wake lakini hajiweki tayari kufanya anavyotakiwa , atapigwa sana .

text: But he that knew not , and did commit things worthy of stripes , shall be beaten with few stripes . For unto whomsoever much is given , of him shall be much required : and to whom men have committed much , of him they will ask the more .
text2: Lakini yule afanyaye yanayostahili adhabu bila kujua , atapigwa kidogo . Aliyepewa vingi atatakiwa vingi ; aliyekabidhiwa vingi zaidi atatakiwa kutoa vingi zaidi .

text: I am come to send fire on the earth ; and what will I if it be already kindled ?
text2: " Nimekuja kuwasha moto duniani , laiti ungekuwa umewaka tayari !

text: But I have a baptism to be baptized with ; and how am I straitened till it be accomplished !
text2: Ninao ubatizo ambao inanipasa niupokee ; jinsi gani ninavyohangaika mpaka ukamilike !

text: Suppose ye that I am come to give peace on earth ? I tell you , Nay ; but rather division :
text2: Mnadhani nimekuja kuleta amani duniani ? Hata kidogo ; si amani bali utengano .

text: For from henceforth there shall be five in one house divided , three against two , and two against three .
text2: Na tangu sasa , jamaa ya watu watano itagawanyika ; watatu dhidi ya wawili , na wawili dhidi ya watatu .

text: The father shall be divided against the son , and the son against the father ; the mother against the daughter , and the daughter against the mother ; the mother in law against her daughter in law , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: Baba atakuwa dhidi ya mwanawe , mwana dhidi ya baba yake ; mama dhidi ya bintiye , binti dhidi ya mama yake ; mama mkwe dhidi ya mke wa mwanawe na huyo dhidi ya mama mkwe wake . "

text: And he said also to the people , When ye see a cloud rise out of the west , straightway ye say , There cometh a shower ; and so it is .
text2: Yesu akayaambia tena makundi ya watu , " Mnapoona mawingu yakitokea upande wa magharibi , mara mwasema : Mvua itanyesha , na kweli hunyesha .

text: And when ye see the south wind blow , ye say , There will be heat ; and it cometh to pass .
text2: Mnapoona upepo wa kusi unavuma , mwasema Kutakuwa na hali ya joto na ndivyo inavyokuwa .

text: Ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky and of the earth ; but how is it that ye do not discern this time ?
text2: Enyi wanafiki ! Mnajua kutabiri hali ya hewa kwa kuangalia dunia na anga ; kwa nini basi , hamwezi kujua maana ya nyakati hizi ?

text: Yea , and why even of yourselves judge ye not what is right ?
text2: " Na kwa nini hamwezi kujiamulia wenyewe jambo jema la kufanya ?

text: When thou goest with thine adversary to the magistrate , as thou art in the way , give diligence that thou mayest be delivered from him ; lest he hale thee to the judge , and the judge deliver thee to the officer , and the officer cast thee into prison .
text2: Maana kama mshtaki wako anakupeleka mahakamani , ingekuwa afadhali kwako kupatana naye mkiwa bado njiani , ili asije akakupeleka mbele ya hakimu , naye hakimu akakutoa kwa polisi , nao wakakutia ndani .

text: I tell thee , thou shalt not depart thence , till thou hast paid the very last mite .
text2: Hakika hutatoka huko nakwambia , mpaka utakapomaliza kulipa senti ya mwisho . "

text: There were present at that season some that told him of the Galilaeans , whose blood Pilate had mingled with their sacrifices .
text2: Wakati huo watu fulani walikuja , wakamweleza Yesu juu ya watu wa Galilaya ambao Pilato alikuwa amewaua wakati walipokuwa wanachinja wanyama wao wa tambiko .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Suppose ye that these Galilaeans were sinners above all the Galilaeans , because they suffered such things ?
text2: Naye Yesu akawaambia , " Mnadhani Wagalilaya hao walikuwa wahalifu zaidi kuliko Wagalilaya wengine , ati kwa sababu wameteseka hivyo ?

text: I tell you , Nay : but , except ye repent , ye shall all likewise perish .
text2: Nawaambieni hakika sivyo ; lakini nanyi , hali kadhalika , msipotubu , mtaangamia kama wao .

text: Or those eighteen , upon whom the tower in Siloam fell , and slew them , think ye that they were sinners above all men that dwelt in Jerusalem ?
text2: Au wale kumi na wanane walioangukiwa na mnara kule Siloamu wakafa ; mnadhani wao walikuwa wakosefu zaidi kuliko wengine wote walioishi Yerusalemu ?

text: I tell you , Nay : but , except ye repent , ye shall all likewise perish .
text2: Nawaambieni sivyo ; lakini nanyi msipotubu , mtaangamia kama wao . "

text: He spake also this parable ; A certain man had a fig tree planted in his vineyard ; and he came and sought fruit thereon , and found none .
text2: Kisha , Yesu akawaambia mfano huu : " Mtu mmoja alikuwa na mtini katika shamba lake . Mtu huyu akaenda akitaka kuchuma matunda yake , lakini akaukuta haujazaa hata tunda moja .

text: Then said he unto the dresser of his vineyard , Behold , these three years I come seeking fruit on this fig tree , and find none : cut it down ; why cumbereth it the ground ?
text2: Basi , akamwambia mfanyakazi wake : Angalia ! Kwa miaka mitatu nimekuwa nikija kuchuma matunda ya mtini huu , nami nisiambulie kitu . Ukate ! Kwa nini uitumie ardhi bure ?

text: And he answering said unto him , Lord , let it alone this year also , till I shall dig about it , and dung it :
text2: Lakini naye akamjibu : Bwana , tuuache tena mwaka huu ; nitauzungushia mtaro na kuutilia mbolea .

text: And if it bear fruit , well : and if not , then after that thou shalt cut it down .
text2: Kama ukizaa matunda mwaka ujao , vema ; la sivyo , basi utaweza kuukata . "

text: And he was teaching in one of the synagogues on the sabbath .
text2: Yesu alikuwa akifundisha katika sunagogi moja siku ya Sabato .

text: And , behold , there was a woman which had a spirit of infirmity eighteen years , and was bowed together , and could in no wise lift up herself .
text2: Na hapo palikuwa na mwanamke mmoja aliyekuwa mgonjwa kwa miaka kumi na minane kutokana na pepo aliyekuwa amempagaa . Kwa sababu hiyo , mwili wake ulikuwa umepindika vibaya hata asiweze kusimama wima .

text: And when Jesus saw her , he called her to him , and said unto her , Woman , thou art loosed from thine infirmity .
text2: Yesu alipomwona , alimwita , akamwambia , " Mama , umeponywa ugonjwa wako . "

text: And he laid his hands on her : and immediately she was made straight , and glorified God .
text2: Akamwekea mikono , na mara mwili wake ukawa wima tena , akawa anamtukuza Mungu .

text: And the ruler of the synagogue answered with indignation , because that Jesus had healed on the sabbath day , and said unto the people , There are six days in which men ought to work : in them therefore come and be healed , and not on the sabbath day .
text2: Lakini mkuu wa sunagogi alikasirika kwa sababu Yesu alikuwa amemponya siku ya Sabato . Hivyo akawaambia wale watu walikusanyika pale , " Mnazo siku sita za kufanya kazi . Basi , fikeni siku hizo mkaponywe magonjwa yenu ; lakini msije siku ya Sabato . "

text: The Lord then answered him , and said , Thou hypocrite , doth not each one of you on the sabbath loose his ox or his ass from the stall , and lead him away to watering ?
text2: Hapo Bwana akamjibu , " Enyi wanafiki ! Nani kati yenu hangemfungua ng ' ombe au punda wake kutoka zizini ampeleke kunywa maji , hata kama siku hiyo ni ya Sabato ?

text: And ought not this woman , being a daughter of Abraham , whom Satan hath bound , lo , these eighteen years , be loosed from this bond on the sabbath day ?
text2: Sasa , hapa yupo binti wa Abrahamu ambaye Shetani alimfanya kilema kwa muda wa miaka kumi na minane . Je , haikuwa vizuri kumfungulia vifungo vyake siku ya Sabato ? "

text: And when he had said these things , all his adversaries were ashamed : and all the people rejoiced for all the glorious things that were done by him .
text2: Alipokwisha sema hayo , wapinzani wake waliona aibu lakini watu wengine wote wakajaa furaha kwa sababu ya mambo yote aliyotenda .

text: Then said he , Unto what is the kingdom of God like ? and whereunto shall I resemble it ?
text2: Yesu akauliza : " Ufalme wa Mungu unafanana na nini ? Nitaulinganisha na nini ?

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and cast into his garden ; and it grew , and waxed a great tree ; and the fowls of the air lodged in the branches of it .
text2: NI kama mbegu ya haradali aliyotwaa mtu mmoja na kuipanda shambani mwake ; ikaota hata ikawa mti . Ndege wa angani wakajenga viota vyao katika matawi yake . "

text: And again he said , Whereunto shall I liken the kingdom of God ?
text2: Tena akauliza : " Nitaulinganisha Ufalme wa Mungu na nini ?

text: It is like leaven , which a woman took and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Ni kama chachu aliyoitwaa mama mmoja na kuichanganya pamoja na unga debe moja kisha unga wote ukaumuka wote . "

text: And he went through the cities and villages , teaching , and journeying toward Jerusalem .
text2: Yesu alindelea na safari yake kwenda Yerusalemu huku akipitia mijini na vijijini , akihubiri .

text: Then said one unto him , Lord , are there few that be saved ? And he said unto them ,
text2: Mtu mmoja akamwuliza , " Je , Mwalimu , watu watakaookoka ni wachache ? "

text: Strive to enter in at the strait gate : for many , I say unto you , will seek to enter in , and shall not be able .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Jitahidini kuingia kwa kupitia mlango mwembamba ; maana nawaambieni , wengi watajaribu kuingia lakini hawataweza .

text: When once the master of the house is risen up , and hath shut to the door , and ye begin to stand without , and to knock at the door , saying , Lord , Lord , open unto us ; and he shall answer and say unto you , I know you not whence ye are :
text2: " Wakati utakuja ambapo mwenye nyumba atainuka na kufunga mlango . Ninyi mtasimama nje na kuanza kupiga hodi mkisema : Bwana , tufungulie mlango . Lakini yeye atawajibu : Sijui mmetoka wapi .

text: Then shall ye begin to say , We have eaten and drunk in thy presence , and thou hast taught in our streets .
text2: Nanyi mtaanza kumwambia : Sisi ndio wale tuliokula na kunywa pamoja nawe ; na wewe ulifundisha katika vijiji vyetu .

text: But he shall say , I tell you , I know you not whence ye are ; depart from me , all ye workers of iniquity .
text2: Lakini yeye atasema : Sijui ninyi mmetoka wapi ; ondokeni mbele yangu , enyi nyote watenda maovu .

text: There shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth , when ye shall see Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob , and all the prophets , in the kingdom of God , and you yourselves thrust out .
text2: Ndipo mtakuwa na kulia na kusaga meno , wakati mtakapowaona Abrahamu , Isaka na Yakobo , na manabii wote wapo katika Ufalme wa Mungu , lakini ninyi wenyewe mmetupwa nje !

text: And they shall come from the east , and from the west , and from the north , and from the south , and shall sit down in the kingdom of God .
text2: Watu watakuja kutoka mashariki na magharibi , kutoka kaskazini na kusini , watakuja na kukaa kwenye karamu katika Ufalme wa Mungu .

text: And , behold , there are last which shall be first , and there are first which shall be last .
text2: Naam , wale walio wa mwisho watakuwa wa kwanza ; na wale walio wa kwanza watakuwa wa mwisho . "

text: The same day there came certain of the Pharisees , saying unto him , Get thee out , and depart hence : for Herod will kill thee .
text2: Wakati huohuo , Mafarisayo na watu wengine walimwendea Yesu wakamwambia , " Ondoka hapa uende mahali pengine , kwa maana Herode anataka kukuua . "

text: And he said unto them , Go ye , and tell that fox , Behold , I cast out devils , and I do cures to day and to morrow , and the third day I shall be perfected .
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Nendeni mkamwambie huyo mbweha hivi : Leo na kesho ninafukuza pepo na kuponya wagonjwa , na siku ya tatu nitakamilisha kazi yangu .

text: Nevertheless I must walk to day , and to morrow , and the day following : for it cannot be that a prophet perish out of Jerusalem .
text2: Hata hivyo , kwa leo , kesho na kesho kutwa , ni lazima niendelee na safari yangu , kwa sababu si sawa nabii auawe nje ya Yerusalemu .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , which killest the prophets , and stonest them that are sent unto thee ; how often would I have gathered thy children together , as a hen doth gather her brood under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: " Yerusalemu ! We Yerusalemu ! Unawaua manabii na kuwapiga mawe wale waliotumwa kwako ! Mara ngapi nimetaka kuwakusanya watoto wako pamoja kama kuku anavyokusanya vifaranga vyake chini ya mabawa yake , Lakini wewe umekataa .

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate : and verily I say unto you , Ye shall not see me , until the time come when ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Haya , utaachiwa mwenyewe nyumba yako . Naam , hakika nawaambieni , hamtaniona mpaka wakati utakapofika mseme : Abarikiwe huyo ajaye kwa jina la Bwana . "

text: And it came to pass , as he went into the house of one of the chief Pharisees to eat bread on the sabbath day , that they watched him .
text2: Siku moja ya Sabato , Yesu alikwenda kula chakula nyumbani kwa mmoja wa viongozi wa Mafarisayo ; watu waliokuwapo hapo wakawa wanamchunguza .

text: And , behold , there was a certain man before him which had the dropsy .
text2: Mbele yake Yesu palikuwa na mtu mmoja aliyekuwa na ugonjwa wa kuvimba mwili .

text: And Jesus answering spake unto the lawyers and Pharisees , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath day ?
text2: Yesu akawauliza walimu wa Sheria na Mafarisayo , " Je , ni halali au la kumponya mtu siku ya sabato ? "

text: And they held their peace . And he took him , and healed him , and let him go ;
text2: Lakini wao wakakaa kimya . Yesu akamshika huyo mgonjwa , akamponya , akamwacha aende zake .

text: And answered them , saying , Which of you shall have an ass or an ox fallen into a pit , and will not straightway pull him out on the sabbath day ?
text2: Halafu akawaambia , " Ni nani kati yenu ambaye mtoto wake au ng ' ombe wake akitumbukia shimoni , hangemtoa hata kama ni siku ya Sabato ? "

text: And they could not answer him again to these things .
text2: Nao hawakuweza kumjibu swali hilo .

text: And he put forth a parable to those which were bidden , when he marked how they chose out the chief rooms ; saying unto them ,
text2: Yesu aliona jinsi wale walioalikwa walivyokuwa wanajichagulia nafasi za heshima , akawaambia mfano :

text: When thou art bidden of any man to a wedding , sit not down in the highest room ; lest a more honourable man than thou be bidden of him ;
text2: " Kama mtu akikualika arusini , usiketi mahali pa heshima isije ikawa amealikwa mwingine mheshimiwa kuliko wewe ;

text: And he that bade thee and him come and say to thee , Give this man place ; and thou begin with shame to take the lowest room .
text2: na mwenyeji wenu ninyi wawili atakuja na kukwambia : Mwachie huyu nafasi . Hapo utaaibika mbele ya wote na kulazimika kwenda kuchukua nafasi ya mwisho .

text: But when thou art bidden , go and sit down in the lowest room ; that when he that bade thee cometh , he may say unto thee , Friend , go up higher : then shalt thou have worship in the presence of them that sit at meat with thee .
text2: Bali ukialikwa kwenye karamu , keti mahali pa mwisho , ili mwenyeji wako atakapokuja akwambie : Rafiki , njoo hapa mbele , mahali pazuri zaidi . Hapo utakuwa umeheshimika mbele ya wote wanaoketi pamoja nawe .

text: For whosoever exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: Kwa maana yeyote anayejikweza atashushwa , na anayejishusha , atakwezwa . "

text: Then said he also to him that bade him , When thou makest a dinner or a supper , call not thy friends , nor thy brethren , neither thy kinsmen , nor thy rich neighbours ; lest they also bid thee again , and a recompence be made thee .
text2: Halafu akamwambia na yule aliyemwalika , " Kama ukiwaandalia watu karamu mchana au jioni , usiwaalike rafiki zako au jamaa zako au jirani zako walio matajiri , wasije nao wakakualika nawe ukawa umelipwa kile ulichowatendea .

text: But when thou makest a feast , call the poor , the maimed , the lame , the blind :
text2: Badala yake , unapofanya karamu , waalike maskini , vilema viwete na vipofu ,

text: And thou shalt be blessed ; for they cannot recompense thee : for thou shalt be recompensed at the resurrection of the just .
text2: nawe utakuwa umepata baraka , kwa kuwa hao hawana cha kukulipa . Maana Mungu atakupa tuzo lako wakati watu wema watakapofufuka . "

text: And when one of them that sat at meat with him heard these things , he said unto him , Blessed is he that shall eat bread in the kingdom of God .
text2: Mmoja wa wale waliokuwa wameketi pamoja na Yesu akasema , " Ana heri mtu yule atakayekula chakula katika Ufalme wa Mungu . "

text: Then said he unto him , A certain man made a great supper , and bade many :
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Mtu mmoja alifanya karamu kubwa , akaalika watu wengi .

text: And sent his servant at supper time to say to them that were bidden , Come ; for all things are now ready .
text2: Wakati wa karamu ulipofika alimtuma mtumishi wake awaambie walioalikwa , Njoni , kila kitu ni tayari .

text: And they all with one consent began to make excuse . The first said unto him , I have bought a piece of ground , and I must needs go and see it : I pray thee have me excused .
text2: Lakini wote , kwa namna moja , wakaanza kuomba radhi . Wa kwanza akamwambia mtumishi : Nimenunua shamba , kwa hiyo sina budi kwenda kuliangalia ; nakuomba uniwie radhi .

text: And another said , I have bought five yoke of oxen , and I go to prove them : I pray thee have me excused .
text2: Mwingine akasema : Nimenunua ng ' ombe jozi tano wa kulima ; sasa nimo njiani kwenda kuwajaribu ; nakuomba uniwie radhi .

text: And another said , I have married a wife , and therefore I cannot come .
text2: Na mwingine akasema : Nimeoa mke , kwa hiyo siwezi kuja .

text: So that servant came , and shewed his lord these things . Then the master of the house being angry said to his servant , Go out quickly into the streets and lanes of the city , and bring in hither the poor , and the maimed , and the halt , and the blind .
text2: Mtumishi huyo akarudi na kumwarifu bwana wake jambo hilo . Yule mwenye nyumba alikasirika , akamwambia mtumishi wake : Nenda upesi kwenye barabara na vichochoro vya mji , uwalete hapa ndani maskini , viwete , vipofu na waliolemaa .

text: And the servant said , Lord , it is done as thou hast commanded , and yet there is room .
text2: Baadaye , mtumishi huyo akasema : Bwana mambo yamefanyika kama ulivyoamuru , lakini bado iko nafasi .

text: And the lord said unto the servant , Go out into the highways and hedges , and compel them to come in , that my house may be filled .
text2: Yule bwana akamwambia mtumishi : Nenda katika barabara na vichochoro vya mji uwashurutishe watu kuingia ili nyumba yangu ijae .

text: For I say unto you , That none of those men which were bidden shall taste of my supper .
text2: Kwa maana , nawaambieni , hakuna hata mmoja wa wale walioalikwa atakayeonja karamu yangu . "

text: And there went great multitudes with him : and he turned , and said unto them ,
text2: Hapo , makundi mengi yakawa yanaandamana pamoja na Yesu . Basi , akawageukia akawaambia ,

text: If any man come to me , and hate not his father , and mother , and wife , and children , and brethren , and sisters , yea , and his own life also , he cannot be my disciple .
text2: " Mtu yeyote akija kwangu , asipowachukia baba na mama yake , mke wake , watoto , ndugu na dada zake , naam , hata na nafsi yake mwenyewe , hawezi kuwa mwanafunzi wangu .

text: And whosoever doth not bear his cross , and come after me , cannot be my disciple .
text2: Mtu asipochukua msalaba wake na kunifuata hawezi kuwa mwanafunzi wangu .

text: For which of you , intending to build a tower , sitteth not down first , and counteth the cost , whether he have sufficient to finish it ?
text2: Kwa maana , ni nani miongoni mwenu ambaye akitaka kujenga mnara hataketi kwanza akadirie gharama zake ili ajue kama ana kiasi cha kutosha cha kumalizia ?

text: Lest haply , after he hath laid the foundation , and is not able to finish it , all that behold it begin to mock him ,
text2: La sivyo , baada ya kuweka msingi na kushindwa kumaliza , watu watamcheka

text: Saying , This man began to build , and was not able to finish .
text2: wakisema : Mtu huyu alianza kujenga , lakini hakumalizia .

text: Or what king , going to make war against another king , sitteth not down first , and consulteth whether he be able with ten thousand to meet him that cometh against him with twenty thousand ?
text2: " Au , ni mfalme gani ambaye , akitaka kwenda kupigana na mfalme mwingine , hataketi kwanza chini na kufikiri kama ataweza , kwa askari wake elfu ishirini ?

text: Or else , while the other is yet a great way off , he sendeth an ambassage , and desireth conditions of peace .
text2: Kama anaona hataweza , atawatuma wajumbe kutaka masharti ya amani wakati mfalme huyo mwingine angali mbali .

text: So likewise , whosoever he be of you that forsaketh not all that he hath , he cannot be my disciple .
text2: Vivyo hivyo , basi , hakuna hata mmoja wenu atakayekuwa mwanafunzi wangu kama asipoachilia kila kitu alicho nacho .

text: Salt is good : but if the salt have lost his savour , wherewith shall it be seasoned ?
text2: " Chumvi ni nzuri ; lakini ikipoteza ladha yake , itakolezwa na nini ?

text: It is neither fit for the land , nor yet for the dunghill ; but men cast it out . He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Haifai kitu wala kwa udongo wala kwa mbolea . Watu huitupilia mbali . Sikieni basi , kama mna masikio ! "

text: Then drew near unto him all the publicans and sinners for to hear him .
text2: Siku moja , watoza ushuru na wahalifu wengi walikwenda kumsikiliza Yesu .

text: And the Pharisees and scribes murmured , saying , This man receiveth sinners , and eateth with them .
text2: Mafarisayo na walimu wa Sheria wakaanza kunung ' unika : " Mtazameni mtu huyu ! Anawakaribisha wenye dhambi , na tena anakula nao . "

text: And he spake this parable unto them , saying ,
text2: Yesu akawajibu kwa mfano :

text: What man of you , having an hundred sheep , if he lose one of them , doth not leave the ninety and nine in the wilderness , and go after that which is lost , until he find it ?
text2: " Hivi , mtu akiwa na kondoo mia , akigundua kwamba mmoja wao amepotea , atafanya nini ? Atawaacha wale tisini na tisa mbugani , na kwenda kumtafuta yule aliyepotea mpaka ampate .

text: And when he hath found it , he layeth it on his shoulders , rejoicing .
text2: Akimpata , atambeba mabegani kwa furaha .

text: And when he cometh home , he calleth together his friends and neighbours , saying unto them , Rejoice with me ; for I have found my sheep which was lost .
text2: Anapofika nyumbani , atawaita rafiki zake akiwaambia , Furahini pamoja nami , kwa sababu nimempata yule kondoo wangu aliyepotea .

text: I say unto you , that likewise joy shall be in heaven over one sinner that repenteth , more than over ninety and nine just persons , which need no repentance .
text2: Kadhalika nawaambieni , ndivyo kutakavyokuwa na furaha mbinguni kwa ajili ya kutubu kwa mwenye dhambi mmoja , kuliko kwa ajili ya watu tisini na tisa wanaojiona kuwa wema , wasiohitaji kutubu .

text: Either what woman having ten pieces of silver , if she lose one piece , doth not light a candle , and sweep the house , and seek diligently till she find it ?
text2: " Au mwaonaje ? Tuseme mwanamke fulani ana sarafu kumi za fedha , akipoteza moja , atafanya nini ? Atawasha taa , aifagie nyumba na kuitafuta kwa uangalifu mpaka aipate .

text: And when she hath found it , she calleth her friends and her neighbours together , saying , Rejoice with me ; for I have found the piece which I had lost .
text2: Akiipata , atawaita rafiki na jirani zake akisema , Furahini pamoja nami , kwa sababu nimeipata ile sarafu yangu iliyopotea .

text: Likewise , I say unto you , there is joy in the presence of the angels of God over one sinner that repenteth .
text2: Kadhalika nawaambieni , ndivyo watakavyofurahi malaika wa Mungu kwa sababu ya mwenye dhambi mmoja anayetubu . "

text: And he said , A certain man had two sons :
text2: Yesu akaendelea kusema , " Kulikuwa na mtu mmoja mwenye wana wawili .

text: And the younger of them said to his father , Father , give me the portion of goods that falleth to me . And he divided unto them his living .
text2: Yule mdogo , alimwambia baba yake : Baba , nipe urithi wangu . Naye akawagawia mali yake .

text: And not many days after the younger son gathered all together , and took his journey into a far country , and there wasted his substance with riotous living .
text2: Baada ya siku chache , yule mdogo aliuza urithi wake , akasafiri na fedha aliyopata , akaenda nchi ya mbali ambako aliitumia ovyo .

text: And when he had spent all , there arose a mighty famine in that land ; and he began to be in want .
text2: Alipomaliza kutumia kila kitu , kukatokea njaa kali katika nchi ile , naye akaanza kuhangaika .

text: And he went and joined himself to a citizen of that country ; and he sent him into his fields to feed swine .
text2: Akaomba kazi kwa mwananchi mtu mmoja wa huko naye akampeleka shambani mwake kulisha nguruwe .

text: And he would fain have filled his belly with the husks that the swine did eat : and no man gave unto him .
text2: Alitamani kula maganda waliyokula wale nguruwe , ila hakuna mtu aliyempa kitu .

text: And when he came to himself , he said , How many hired servants of my father ' s have bread enough and to spare , and I perish with hunger !
text2: Alipoanza kupata akili akafikiri : Mbona kuna wafanyakazi wengi wa baba yangu wanaokula na kusaza , nami ninakufa njaa ?

text: I will arise and go to my father , and will say unto him , Father , I have sinned against heaven , and before thee ,
text2: Nitarudi kwa baba yangu na kumwambia : Baba , nimemkosea Mungu , na nimekukosea wewe pia .

text: And am no more worthy to be called thy son : make me as one of thy hired servants .
text2: Sistahili hata kuitwa mwanao . Nifanye kama mmoja wa wafanyakazi wako .

text: And he arose , and came to his father . But when he was yet a great way off , his father saw him , and had compassion , and ran , and fell on his neck , and kissed him .
text2: Basi , akaanza safari ya kurudi kwa baba yake . Alipokuwa bado yu mbali , baba yake alimwona , na kwa moyo wa huruma alimkimbilia , akamkumbatia na kumbusu .

text: And the son said unto him , Father , I have sinned against heaven , and in thy sight , and am no more worthy to be called thy son .
text2: " Mwanawe akamwambia : Baba , nimemkosea Mungu , na nimekukosea wewe pia . Sistahili hata kuitwa mwanao .

text: But the father said to his servants , Bring forth the best robe , and put it on him ; and put a ring on his hand , and shoes on his feet :
text2: Lakini baba yake akawaambia watumishi wake : Haraka ! Leteni nguo nzuri mkamvike ! Mvisheni pete na viatu !

text: And bring hither the fatted calf , and kill it ; and let us eat , and be merry :
text2: Mchinjeni ndama mnono ; tule kusherehekea !

text: For this my son was dead , and is alive again ; he was lost , and is found . And they began to be merry .
text2: Kwa sababu huyu mwanangu alikuwa amekufa , kumbe yu mzima alikuwa amepotea , lakini sasa amepatikana . Wakaanza kufanya sherehe .

text: Now his elder son was in the field : and as he came and drew nigh to the house , he heard musick and dancing .
text2: " Wakati huo kaka yake alikuwa bado shambani . Alipokuwa akirudi na kukaribia nyumbani akasikia vifijo na ngoma .

text: And he called one of the servants , and asked what these things meant .
text2: Akamwita mmoja wa watumishi , akamwuliza : Kuna nini ?

text: And he said unto him , Thy brother is come ; and thy father hath killed the fatted calf , because he hath received him safe and sound .
text2: Huyo mtumishi akamwambia : Ndugu yako amerudi nyumbani , na baba yako amemchinjia ndama mnono kwa kuwa amempata akiwa salama salimini .

text: And he was angry , and would not go in : therefore came his father out , and intreated him .
text2: Huyo kijana mkubwa akawaka hasira hata akakataa kuingia nyumbani . Baba yake akatoka nje na kumsihi aingie .

text: And he answering said to his father , Lo , these many years do I serve thee , neither transgressed I at any time thy commandment : and yet thou never gavest me a kid , that I might make merry with my friends :
text2: Lakini yeye akamjibu : Kumbuka ! Miaka yote nimekutumikia , sijavunja amri yako hata mara moja . Umenipa nini ? Hujanipa hata mwana mbuzi mmoja nikafanye sherehe pamoja na rafiki zangu !

text: But as soon as this thy son was come , which hath devoured thy living with harlots , thou hast killed for him the fatted calf .
text2: Lakini mtoto wako huyu aliyekula mali yako pamoja na makahaba , mara tu alipokuja umemchinjia yule ndama mnono .

text: And he said unto him , Son , thou art ever with me , and all that I have is thine .
text2: Baba yake akamjibu : Mwanangu , wewe uko pamoja nami siku zote , na kila nilicho nacho ni chako .

text: It was meet that we should make merry , and be glad : for this thy brother was dead , and is alive again ; and was lost , and is found .
text2: Ilitubidi kufanya sherehe na kufurahi , kwa sababu huyu ndugu yako alikuwa amekufa , kumbe yu mzima ; alikuwa amepotea , lakini sasa amepatikana . "

text: And he said also unto his disciples , There was a certain rich man , which had a steward ; and the same was accused unto him that he had wasted his goods .
text2: Yesu aliwaambia wanafunzi wake : " Tajiri mmoja alikuwa na karani wake . Huyu karani alichongewa kwamba alitumia ovyo mali ya tajiri wake .

text: And he called him , and said unto him , How is it that I hear this of thee ? give an account of thy stewardship ; for thou mayest be no longer steward .
text2: Yule tajiri akamwita akamwambia : Ni mambo gani haya ninayosikia juu yako ? Toa hesabu ya mapato na matumizi ya mali yangu , kwa maana huwezi kuwa karani tena .

text: Then the steward said within himself , What shall I do ? for my lord taketh away from me the stewardship : I cannot dig ; to beg I am ashamed .
text2: Yule karani akafikiri : Bwana wangu amenifukuza kazi ya ukarani ; nitafanya nini ? Kwenda kulima siwezi ; kwenda kuombaomba kama maskini ni aibu .

text: I am resolved what to do , that , when I am put out of the stewardship , they may receive me into their houses .
text2: Naam , najua la kufanya , ili nitakapofukuzwa kazi , watu waweze kunikaribisha nyumbani kwao .

text: So he called every one of his lord ' s debtors unto him , and said unto the first , How much owest thou unto my lord ?
text2: Basi , akawaita wadeni wa bwana wake , mmoja mmoja , akamwambia yule wa kwanza : Unadaiwa kiasi gani na bwana wangu ?

text: And he said , An hundred measures of oil . And he said unto him , Take thy bill , and sit down quickly , and write fifty .
text2: Yeye akamjibu : Mapipa mia ya mafuta ya zeituni . Yule karani akamwambia : Chukua hati yako ya deni , keti haraka , andika hamsini .

text: Then said he to another , And how much owest thou ? And he said , An hundred measures of wheat . And he said unto him , Take thy bill , and write fourscore .
text2: Kisha akamwuliza mdeni mwingine : Wewe unadaiwa kiasi gani ? Yeye akamjibu : Magunia mia ya ngano . Yule karani akamwambia : Chukua hati yako ya deni , andika themanini .

text: And the lord commended the unjust steward , because he had done wisely : for the children of this world are in their generation wiser than the children of light .
text2: " Basi , yule bwana akamsifu huyo karani asiye mwaminifu , kwa kuwa alitumia busara . Kwa maana watu wa dunia hii wana busara zaidi na mambo yao kuliko watu wa mwanga . "

text: And I say unto you , Make to yourselves friends of the mammon of unrighteousness ; that , when ye fail , they may receive you into everlasting habitations .
text2: Naye Yesu akaendelea kusema , " Nami nawaambieni , jifanyieni marafiki kutokana na mali ya dunia , ili zitakapowaishieni , mweze kupokewa nao katika makao ya milele .

text: He that is faithful in that which is least is faithful also in much : and he that is unjust in the least is unjust also in much .
text2: Yeyote aliye mwaminifu katika mambo madogo , atakuwa mwaminifu katika mambo makubwa ; na yeyote asiye mwaminifu katika mambo madogo , hatakuwa mwaminifu katika mambo makubwa .

text: If therefore ye have not been faithful in the unrighteous mammon , who will commit to your trust the true riches ?
text2: Kama basi , ninyi si hamjawa waaminifu mali mbaya za dunia , ni nani atakayewakabidhi zile mali za kweli ?

text: And if ye have not been faithful in that which is another man ' s , who shall give you that which is your own ?
text2: Na kama hamjakuwa waaminifu katika mali ya mtu mwingine , ni nani atakayewakabidhi mali yenu wenyewe ?

text: No servant can serve two masters : for either he will hate the one , and love the other ; or else he will hold to the one , and despise the other . Ye cannot serve God and mammon .
text2: " Hakuna mtumishi awezaye kuwatumikia mabwana wawili ; kwa maana atamchukia mmoja na kumpenda mwingine , au ataambatana na mmoja na kumdharau mwingine . Hamwezi kumtumikia Mungu na mali . "

text: And the Pharisees also , who were covetous , heard all these things : and they derided him .
text2: Lakini Mafarisayo waliposikia hayo , kwa vile wao walikuwa wanapenda sana fedha , wakamdharau Yesu .

text: And he said unto them , Ye are they which justify yourselves before men ; but God knoweth your hearts : for that which is highly esteemed among men is abomination in the sight of God .
text2: Hapo akawaambia , " Ninyi mnajifanya wema mbele ya watu , lakini Mungu anaijua mioyo yenu . Kwa maana kile kinachoonekana kuwa kitukufu mbele ya watu , Mungu anakiona kuwa takataka .

text: The law and the prophets were until John : since that time the kingdom of God is preached , and every man presseth into it .
text2: " Sheria na maandishi ya manabii vilikuweko mpaka wakati wa Yohane mbatizaji . Tangu hapo , Ufalme wa Mungu unahubiriwa , na kila mmoja anauingia kwa nguvu .

text: And it is easier for heaven and earth to pass , than one tittle of the law to fail .
text2: Lakini ni rahisi zaidi mbingu na dunia kupita , kuliko hata herufi moja ya Sheria kufutwa .

text: Whosoever putteth away his wife , and marrieth another , committeth adultery : and whosoever marrieth her that is put away from her husband committeth adultery .
text2: " Yeyote anayemwacha mke wake na kuoa mwingine , anazini ; na yeyote anayemwoa mwanamke aliyepewa talaka , anazini .

text: There was a certain rich man , which was clothed in purple and fine linen , and fared sumptuously every day :
text2: " Palikuwa na mtu mmoja tajiri , ambaye alikuwa anavaa mavazi ya bei kubwa sana ya rangi ya zambarau , na ya kitani safi , na kufanya sherehe kila siku .

text: And there was a certain beggar named Lazarus , which was laid at his gate , full of sores ,
text2: Kulikuwa pia na maskini mmoja jina lake Lazaro , aliyekuwa amejaa vidonda na alikuwa analazwa mlangoni pa nyumba ya huyo tajiri .

text: And desiring to be fed with the crumbs which fell from the rich man ' s table : moreover the dogs came and licked his sores .
text2: Lazaro alitamani kula makombo yaliyoanguka kutoka meza ya tajiri ; na zaidi ya hayo , mbwa walikuwa wanakuja na kulamba vidonda vyake !

text: And it came to pass , that the beggar died , and was carried by the angels into Abraham ' s bosom : the rich man also died , and was buried ;
text2: " Ikatokea kwamba huyo maskini akafa , malaika wakamchukua , wakamweka karibu na Abrahamu . Na yule tajiri pia akafa , akazikwa .

text: And in hell he lift up his eyes , being in torments , and seeth Abraham afar off , and Lazarus in his bosom .
text2: Huyo tajiri , alikuwa na mateso makali huko kuzimu , akainua macho yake , akamwona Abrahamu kwa mbali na Lazaro karibu naye .

text: And he cried and said , Father Abraham , have mercy on me , and send Lazarus , that he may dip the tip of his finger in water , and cool my tongue ; for I am tormented in this flame .
text2: Basi , akaita kwa sauti : Baba Abrahamu , nionee huruma ; umtume Lazaro angalau achovye ncha ya kidole chake katika maji , auburudishe ulimi wangu , maana ninateseka mno katika moto huu .

text: But Abraham said , Son , remember that thou in thy lifetime receivedst thy good things , and likewise Lazarus evil things : but now he is comforted , and thou art tormented .
text2: Lakini Abrahamu akamjibu : Kumbuka mwanangu , kwamba ulipokea mema yako katika maisha , naye Lazaro akapokea mabaya . Sasa lakini , yeye anatulizwa , nawe unateswa .

text: And beside all this , between us and you there is a great gulf fixed : so that they which would pass from hence to you cannot ; neither can they pass to us , that would come from thence .
text2: Licha ya hayo , kati yetu na ninyi kumewekwa shimo kubwa , ili wanaotaka kuja kwenu kutoka huku wasiweze , wala wanaotaka kutoka kwenu kuja kwetu wasiweze .

text: Then he said , I pray thee therefore , father , that thou wouldest send him to my father ' s house :
text2: Huyo aliyekuwa tajiri akasema : Basi baba , nakuomba umtume aende nyumbani kwa baba yangu ,

text: For I have five brethren ; that he may testify unto them , lest they also come into this place of torment .
text2: maana ninao ndugu watano , ili awaonye wasije wakaja huku kwenye mateso .

text: Abraham saith unto him , They have Moses and the prophets ; let them hear them .
text2: Lakini Abrahamu akamwambia : Ndugu zako wanao Mose na manabii ; waache wawasikilize hao .

text: And he said , Nay , father Abraham : but if one went unto them from the dead , they will repent .
text2: Lakini yeye akasema : Sivyo baba Abrahamu , ila kama mtu atafufuka kutoka wafu na kuwaendea , watatubu .

text: And he said unto him , If they hear not Moses and the prophets , neither will they be persuaded , though one rose from the dead .
text2: Naye Abrahamu akasema : Kama hawawasikilizi Mose na manabii , hawatajali hata kama mtu angefufuka kutoka wafu . "

text: Then said he unto the disciples , It is impossible but that offences will come : but woe unto him , through whom they come !
text2: Kisha , Yesu akawaambia wanafunzi wake , " Haiwezekani kabisa kusitokee vikwazo vinavyosababisha dhambi ; lakini ole wake mtu yule atakayevisababisha .

text: It were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he cast into the sea , than that he should offend one of these little ones .
text2: Ingekuwa afadhali kwake kufungiwa shingoni jiwe kubwa la kusagia na kutoswa baharini , kuliko kumkwaza mmoja wa wadogo hawa .

text: Take heed to yourselves : If thy brother trespass against thee , rebuke him ; and if he repent , forgive him .
text2: Jihadharini ! Kama ndugu yako akikukosea , mwonye ; akitubu , msamehe .

text: And if he trespass against thee seven times in a day , and seven times in a day turn again to thee , saying , I repent ; thou shalt forgive him .
text2: Na kama akikukosea mara saba kwa siku , na kila mara akarudi kwako akisema Nimetubu , lazima umsamehe . "

text: And the apostles said unto the Lord , Increase our faith .
text2: Mitume wakamwambia Bwana , " Utuongezee imani . "

text: And the Lord said , If ye had faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye might say unto this sycamine tree , Be thou plucked up by the root , and be thou planted in the sea ; and it should obey you .
text2: Naye Bwana akajibu , " Kama imani yenu ingekuwa ndogo hata kama chembe ndogo ya haradali , mngeweza kuuambia mti huu wa mkuyu : Ng ' oka ukajipandikize baharini , nao ungewatii .

text: But which of you , having a servant plowing or feeding cattle , will say unto him by and by , when he is come from the field , Go and sit down to meat ?
text2: " Tuseme mmoja wenu ana mtumishi ambaye analima shambani au anachunga kondoo . Je , anaporudi kutoka shambani , atamwambia : Haraka , njoo ule chakula ?

text: And will not rather say unto him , Make ready wherewith I may sup , and gird thyself , and serve me , till I have eaten and drunken ; and afterward thou shalt eat and drink ?
text2: La ! Atamwambia : Nitayarishie chakula , ujifunge tayari kunitumikia mpaka nitakapomaliza kula na kunywa , ndipo nawe ule na unywe .

text: Doth he thank that servant because he did the things that were commanded him ? I trow not .
text2: Je utamshukuru huyo mtumishi kwa sababu ametimiza aliyoamriwa ?

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall have done all those things which are commanded you , say , We are unprofitable servants : we have done that which was our duty to do .
text2: Hali kadhalika na ninyi mkisha fanya yote mliyoamriwa , semeni : Sisi ni watumishi tusio na faida , tumetimiza tu yale tuliyotakiwa kufanya . "

text: And it came to pass , as he went to Jerusalem , that he passed through the midst of Samaria and Galilee .
text2: Yesu akiwa safarini kwenda Yerusalemu alipitia mipakani mwa Samaria na Galilaya .

text: And as he entered into a certain village , there met him ten men that were lepers , which stood afar off :
text2: Alipokuwa anaingia katika kijiji kimoja , watu kumi wenye ukoma walikutana naye , wakasimama kwa mbali .

text: And they lifted up their voices , and said , Jesus , Master , have mercy on us .
text2: Wakapaza sauti wakisema , " Yesu Mwalimu , tuonee huruma ! "

text: And when he saw them , he said unto them , Go shew yourselves unto the priests . And it came to pass , that , as they went , they were cleansed .
text2: Alipowaona akawaambia , " Nendeni mkajionyeshe kwa makuhani . " Basi , ikawa walipokuwa wanakwenda , wakatakasika .

text: And one of them , when he saw that he was healed , turned back , and with a loud voice glorified God ,
text2: Mmoja wao alipoona kwamba ameponywa alirudi akimtukuza Mungu kwa sauti kubwa .

text: And fell down on his face at his feet , giving him thanks : and he was a Samaritan .
text2: Akajitupa chini mbele ya miguu ya Yesu huku akimshukuru . Huyo alikuwa Msamaria .

text: And Jesus answering said , Were there not ten cleansed ? but where are the nine ?
text2: Hapo Yesu akasema , " Je , si watu kumi walitakaswa ? Wale tisa wako wapi ?

text: There are not found that returned to give glory to God , save this stranger .
text2: Hakupatikana mwingine aliyerudi kumtukuza Mungu ila tu huyu mgeni ? "

text: And he said unto him , Arise , go thy way : thy faith hath made thee whole .
text2: Halafu akamwambia huyo mtu , " Simama , uende zako ; imani yako imekuponya . "

text: And when he was demanded of the Pharisees , when the kingdom of God should come , he answered them and said , The kingdom of God cometh not with observation :
text2: Wakati mmoja , Mafarisayo walimwuliza Yesu , " Ufalme wa Mungu utakuja lini ? " Naye akawajibu , " Ufalme wa Mungu hauji kwa namna itakayoweza kuonekana .

text: Neither shall they say , Lo here ! or , lo there ! for , behold , the kingdom of God is within you .
text2: Wala hakuna atakayeweza kusema , Uko hapa , au Uko pale . Kwa kweli Ufalme wa Mungu uko kati yenu . "

text: And he said unto the disciples , The days will come , when ye shall desire to see one of the days of the Son of man , and ye shall not see it .
text2: Halafu akawaambia wanafunzi wake , " Siku zinakuja ambapo mtatamani kuona mojawapo ya siku za Mwana wa Mtu , lakini hamtaiona .

text: And they shall say to you , See here ; or , see there : go not after them , nor follow them .
text2: Na watu watawaambieni : Tazameni yuko hapa ; ninyi msitoke wala msiwafuate .

text: For as the lightning , that lighteneth out of the one part under heaven , shineth unto the other part under heaven ; so shall also the Son of man be in his day .
text2: Kwa maana kama vile umeme unavyotokea ghafla na kuangaza anga upande mmoja hadi mwingine , ndivyo Mwana wa Mtu atakavyokuwa siku yake .

text: But first must he suffer many things , and be rejected of this generation .
text2: Lakini kabla ya hayo , itambidi ateseke sana na kukataliwa na kizazi hiki .

text: And as it was in the days of Noe , so shall it be also in the days of the Son of man .
text2: Kama ilivyokuwa nyakati za Noa , ndivyo itakavyokuwa katika siku za Mwana wa Mtu .

text: They did eat , they drank , they married wives , they were given in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark , and the flood came , and destroyed them all .
text2: Watu waliendelea kula na kunywa , kuoa na kuolewa mpaka wakati ule Noa alipoingia katika safina . Gharika ikatokea na kuwaangamiza wote .

text: Likewise also as it was in the days of Lot ; they did eat , they drank , they bought , they sold , they planted , they builded ;
text2: Itakuwa kama ilivyotokea wakati wa Loti . Watu waliendelea kula na kunywa , kununua na kuuza , kupanda mbegu na kujenga .

text: But the same day that Lot went out of Sodom it rained fire and brimstone from heaven , and destroyed them all .
text2: Lakini siku ile Loti alipoondoka Sodoma , moto na kiberiti vikanyesha kama mvua kutoka mbinguni na kuwaangamiza wote .

text: Even thus shall it be in the day when the Son of man is revealed .
text2: Ndivyo itakavyokuwa siku ile Mwana wa Mtu atakapofunuliwa .

text: In that day , he which shall be upon the housetop , and his stuff in the house , let him not come down to take it away : and he that is in the field , let him likewise not return back .
text2: " Siku hiyo , yeyote atakayekuwa juu ya paa asishuke nyumbani kuchukua mali yake . Kadhalika , naye atakayekuwa shambani asirudi nyuma .

text: Remember Lot ' s wife .
text2: Kumbukeni yaliyompata mke wa Loti .

text: Whosoever shall seek to save his life shall lose it ; and whosoever shall lose his life shall preserve it .
text2: Yeyote anayetaka kuiokoa nafsi yake , ataipoteza ; na yeyote anayeipoteza , ataiokoa .

text: I tell you , in that night there shall be two men in one bed ; the one shall be taken , and the other shall be left .
text2: Nawaambieni , siku ile usiku watu wawili watakuwa wanalala pamoja , mmoja atachukuliwa na yule mwingine ataachwa .

text: Two women shall be grinding together ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Wanawake wawili watakuwa wakisaga nafaka pamoja ; mmoja atachukuliwa na mwingine ataachwa . "

text: Two men shall be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Watu wawili watakuwa shambani ; mmoja atachukuliwa na mwingine ataachwa .

text: And they answered and said unto him , Where , Lord ? And he said unto them , Wheresoever the body is , thither will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Hapo wakamwuliza , " Ni wapi Bwana ? " Naye akawaambia , " Ulipo mzoga , ndipo tai watakapokusanyikia . "

text: And he spake a parable unto them to this end , that men ought always to pray , and not to faint ;
text2: Basi , Yesu aliwasimulia mfano kuonyesha kwamba ni lazima kusali daima bila kukata tamaa .

text: Saying , There was in a city a judge , which feared not God , neither regarded man :
text2: Alisema : " Katika mji mmoja kulikuwa na hakimu ambaye hakuwa anamcha Mungu wala kumjali binadamu .

text: And there was a widow in that city ; and she came unto him , saying , Avenge me of mine adversary .
text2: Katika mji huohuo , kulikuwa pia na mama mmoja mjane , ambaye alimwendea huyo hakimu mara nyingi akimwomba amtetee apate haki yake kutoka kwa adui yake .

text: And he would not for a while : but afterward he said within himself , Though I fear not God , nor regard man ;
text2: Kwa muda mrefu huyo hakimu hakupenda kumtetea huyo mjane ; lakini , mwishowe akajisemea : Ingawa mimi simchi Mungu wala simjali binadamu ,

text: Yet because this widow troubleth me , I will avenge her , lest by her continual coming she weary me .
text2: lakini kwa vile huyu mjane ananisumbua , nitamtetea ; la sivyo ataendelea kufika hapa , na mwisho atanichosha kabisa ! "

text: And the Lord said , Hear what the unjust judge saith .
text2: Basi , Bwana akaendelea kusema , " Sikieni jinsi alivyosema huyo hakimu mbaya .

text: And shall not God avenge his own elect , which cry day and night unto him , though he bear long with them ?
text2: Je , ndio kusema Mungu hatawatetea wale aliowachagua , ambao wanamlilia mchana na usiku ? Je , atakawia kuwasikiliza ?

text: I tell you that he will avenge them speedily . Nevertheless when the Son of man cometh , shall he find faith on the earth ?
text2: Nawaambieni atawatetea upesi . Hata hivyo , je , kutakuwako na imani duniani wakati Mwana wa Mtu atakapokuja ? "

text: And he spake this parable unto certain which trusted in themselves that they were righteous , and despised others :
text2: Halafu Yesu aliwaambia pia mfano wa wale ambao walijiona kuwa wema na kuwadharau wengine .

text: Two men went up into the temple to pray ; the one a Pharisee , and the other a publican .
text2: " Watu wawili walipanda kwenda Hekaluni kusali : mmoja Mfarisayo , na mwingine mtoza ushuru .

text: The Pharisee stood and prayed thus with himself , God , I thank thee , that I am not as other men are , extortioners , unjust , adulterers , or even as this publican .
text2: Huyo Mfarisayo akasimama , akasali kimoyomoyo : Ee Mungu , nakushukuru kwa vile mimi si kama watu wengine : walafi , wadanganyifu au wazinzi . Nakushukuru kwamba mimi si kama huyu mtoza ushuru .
