text: I fast twice in the week , I give tithes of all that I possess .
text2: Nafunga mara mbili kwa juma , natoa zaka sehemu ya kumi ya pato langu .

text: And the publican , standing afar off , would not lift up so much as his eyes unto heaven , but smote upon his breast , saying , God be merciful to me a sinner .
text2: Lakini yule mtoza ushuru , akiwa amesimama kwa mbali bila hata kuinua macho yake mbinguni , ila tu akijipiga kifua kwa huzuni , alisema : Ee Mungu , unionee huruma mimi mwenye dhambi .

text: I tell you , this man went down to his house justified rather than the other : for every one that exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: Nawaambieni , huyu mtoza ushuru alirudi nyumbani akiwa amesamehewa . Lakini yule mwingine , sivyo . Kwa maana kila anayejikweza atashushwa , na kila anayejishusha atakwezwa . "

text: And they brought unto him also infants , that he would touch them : but when his disciples saw it , they rebuked them .
text2: Watu walimletea Yesu watoto wadogo ili awawekee mikono yake . Wanafunzi walipowaona , wakawazuia kwa maneno makali .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Suffer little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Lakini Yesu akawaita kwake akisema : " Waacheni hao watoto waje kwangu , wala msiwazuie , kwa maana Ufalme wa Mungu ni kwa ajili ya watu kama hawa .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child shall in no wise enter therein .
text2: Nawaambieni kweli , mtu yeyote asiyeupokea Ufalme wa Mungu kama mtoto mdogo , hataingia katika Ufalme huo . "

text: And a certain ruler asked him , saying , Good Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: Kiongozi mmoja , Myahudi , alimwuliza Yesu , " Mwalimu mwema , nifanye nini ili niweze kuupata uzima wa milele ? "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? none is good , save one , that is , God .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Mbona waniita mwema ? Hakuna aliye mwema ila Mungu peke yake .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Honour thy father and thy mother .
text2: Unazijua amri : Usizini ; usiue ; usiibe ; usitoe ushahidi wa uongo ; waheshimu baba yako na mama yako . "

text: And he said , All these have I kept from my youth up .
text2: Yeye akasema , " Hayo yote nimeyazingatia tangu ujana wangu . "

text: Now when Jesus heard these things , he said unto him , Yet lackest thou one thing : sell all that thou hast , and distribute unto the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , follow me .
text2: Yesu aliposikia hayo akamwambia , " Unatakiwa bado kufanya kitu kimoja : uza kila ulicho nacho , wagawie maskini , na hivyo utakuwa na hazina yako mbinguni ; halafu njoo unifuate . "

text: And when he heard this , he was very sorrowful : for he was very rich .
text2: Lakini huyo mtu aliposikia hayo , alihuzunika sana kwa sababu alikuwa tajiri sana .

text: And when Jesus saw that he was very sorrowful , he said , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Yesu alipoona akihuzunika hivyo , akasema , " Jinsi gani ilivyo vigumu kwa matajiri kuingia katika Ufalme wa Mungu !

text: For it is easier for a camel to go through a needle ' s eye , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Naam , ni rahisi zaidi kwa ngamia kupita katika tundu la sindano , kuliko tajiri kuingia katika Ufalme wa Mungu . "

text: And they that heard it said , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Wale watu waliposikia hayo , wakasema , " Nani basi , atakayeokolewa ? "

text: And he said , The things which are impossible with men are possible with God .
text2: Yesu akajibu , " Yasiyowezekana kwa binadamu , yanawezekana kwa Mungu . "

text: Then Peter said , Lo , we have left all , and followed thee .
text2: Naye Petro akamwuliza , " Na sisi je ? Tumeacha vitu vyote tukakufuata ! "

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or parents , or brethren , or wife , or children , for the kingdom of God ' s sake ,
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Kweli nawaambieni , mtu yeyote aliyeacha nyumba au mke au kaka au wazazi au watoto kwa ajili ya Ufalme wa Mungu ,

text: Who shall not receive manifold more in this present time , and in the world to come life everlasting .
text2: atapokea mengi zaidi wakati huu wa sasa , na kupokea uzima wa milele wakati ujao . "

text: Then he took unto him the twelve , and said unto them , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem , and all things that are written by the prophets concerning the Son of man shall be accomplished .
text2: Yesu aliwachukua kando wale kumi na wawili , akawaambia , " Sikilizeni ! Tunakwenda Yerusalemu na huko kila kitu kilichoandikwa na manabii kuhusu Mwana wa Mtu kitakamilishwa .

text: For he shall be delivered unto the Gentiles , and shall be mocked , and spitefully entreated , and spitted on :
text2: Kwa maana atakabidhiwa kwa watu wa mataifa nao watamtendea vibaya na kumtemea mate .

text: And they shall scourge him , and put him to death : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Watampiga mijeledi , watamuua ; lakini siku ya tatu atafufuka . "

text: And they understood none of these things : and this saying was hid from them , neither knew they the things which were spoken .
text2: Lakini wao hawakuelewa hata kidogo jambo hilo ; walikuwa wamefichwa maana ya maneno hayo , na hawakutambua yaliyosemwa .

text: And it came to pass , that as he was come nigh unto Jericho , a certain blind man sat by the way side begging :
text2: Wakati Yesu alipokaribia Yeriko , kulikuwa na mtu mmoja kipofu ameketi njiani akiomba .

text: And hearing the multitude pass by , he asked what it meant .
text2: Aliposikia umati wa watu ukipita aliuliza , " Kuna nini ? "

text: And they told him , that Jesus of Nazareth passeth by .
text2: Wakamwambia , " Yesu wa Nazareti anapita . "

text: And he cried , saying , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Naye akapaza sauti akisema , " Yesu , Mwana wa Daudi , nihurumie ! "

text: And they which went before rebuked him , that he should hold his peace : but he cried so much the more , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Wale watu waliotangulia wakamkemea wakimwambia anyamaze ; lakini yeye akazidi kupaza sauti : " Mwana wa Daudi , nihurumie ; "

text: And Jesus stood , and commanded him to be brought unto him : and when he was come near , he asked him ,
text2: Yesu alisimama , akaamuru wamlete mbele yake . Yule kipofu alipofika karibu , Yesu akamwuliza ,

text: Saying , What wilt thou that I shall do unto thee ? And he said , Lord , that I may receive my sight .
text2: " Unataka nikufanyie nini ? " Naye akamjibu , " Bwana , naomba nipate kuona tena . "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Receive thy sight : thy faith hath saved thee .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Ona ! Imani yako imekuponya . "

text: And immediately he received his sight , and followed him , glorifying God : and all the people , when they saw it , gave praise unto God .
text2: Na mara yule aliyekuwa kipofu akapata kuona , akamfuata Yesu akimtukuza Mungu . Watu wote walipoona hayo , wakamsifu Mungu .

text: And Jesus entered and passed through Jericho .
text2: Yesu aliingia mjini Yeriko , akawa anapita katika njia za mji huo .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Zacchaeus , which was the chief among the publicans , and he was rich .
text2: Kulikuwa na mtu mmoja mjini , jina lake Zakayo ambaye alikuwa mkuu wa watoza ushuru tena mtu tajiri .

text: And he sought to see Jesus who he was ; and could not for the press , because he was little of stature .
text2: Alitaka kuona Yesu alikuwa nani , lakini kwa sababu ya umati wa watu , na kwa vile alikuwa mfupi , hakufaulu .

text: And he ran before , and climbed up into a sycomore tree to see him : for he was to pass that way .
text2: Hivyo , alitangulia mbio , akapanda juu ya mkuyu ili aweze kumwona Yesu , kwa maana alikuwa apitie hapo .

text: And when Jesus came to the place , he looked up , and saw him , and said unto him , Zacchaeus , make haste , and come down ; for to day I must abide at thy house .
text2: Basi , Yesu alipofika mahali pale , aliangalia juu akamwambia , " Zakayo , shuka upesi , maana leo ni lazima nishinde nyumbani mwako . "

text: And he made haste , and came down , and received him joyfully .
text2: Zakayo akashuka haraka , akamkaribisha kwa furaha .

text: And when they saw it , they all murmured , saying , That he was gone to be guest with a man that is a sinner .
text2: Watu wote walipoona hayo , wakaanza kunung ' unika wakisema , " Amekwenda kukaa kwa mtu mwenye dhambi . "

text: And Zacchaeus stood , and said unto the Lord ; Behold , Lord , the half of my goods I give to the poor ; and if I have taken any thing from any man by false accusation , I restore him fourfold .
text2: Lakini Zakayo akasimama akamwambia Yesu , " Sikiliza Bwana ! Mimi nitawapa maskini nusu ya mali yangu , na kama nimenyang ' anya mtu yeyote kitu , nitamrudishia mara nne . "

text: And Jesus said unto him , This day is salvation come to this house , forsomuch as he also is a son of Abraham .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Leo wokovu umefika katika nyumba hii , kwa vile huyu pia ni wa ukoo wa Abrahamu .

text: For the Son of man is come to seek and to save that which was lost .
text2: Kwa maana Mwana wa Mtu amekuja kutafuta na kuokoa waliopotea . "

text: And as they heard these things , he added and spake a parable , because he was nigh to Jerusalem , and because they thought that the kingdom of God should immediately appear .
text2: Wakati watu walipokuwa bado wanasikiliza hayo , Yesu akawaambia mfano . ( Hapo alikuwa anakaribia Yerusalemu , na watu wale walidhani kwamba muda si muda , Ufalme wa Mungu ungefika . )

text: He said therefore , A certain nobleman went into a far country to receive for himself a kingdom , and to return .
text2: Hivyo akawaambia , " Kulikuwa na mtu mmoja wa ukoo wa kifalme aliyefanya safari kwenda nchi ya mbali ili apokee madaraka ya ufalme , halafu arudi .

text: And he called his ten servants , and delivered them ten pounds , and said unto them , Occupy till I come .
text2: Basi , kabla ya kuondoka aliwaita watumishi wake kumi , akawapa kiasi cha fedha kila mmoja na kumwambia : Fanyeni nazo biashara mpaka nitakaporudi .

text: But his citizens hated him , and sent a message after him , saying , We will not have this man to reign over us .
text2: Lakini wananchi wenzake walimchukia na hivyo wakatuma wajumbe waende wakaseme : Hatumtaki huyu atutawale .

text: And it came to pass , that when he was returned , having received the kingdom , then he commanded these servants to be called unto him , to whom he had given the money , that he might know how much every man had gained by trading .
text2: " Huyo mtu mashuhuri alirudi nyumbani baada ya kufanywa mfalme , na mara akaamuru wale watumishi aliowapa zile fedha waitwe ili aweze kujua kila mmoja amepata faida gani .

text: Then came the first , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained ten pounds .
text2: Mtumishi wa kwanza akatokea , akasema : Mheshimiwa , faida iliyopatikana ni mara kumi ya zile fedha ulizonipa .

text: And he said unto him , Well , thou good servant : because thou hast been faithful in a very little , have thou authority over ten cities .
text2: Naye akamwambia : Vema ; wewe ni mtumishi mwema . Kwa kuwa umekuwa mwaminifu katika jambo dogo , utakuwa na madaraka juu ya miji kumi !

text: And the second came , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained five pounds .
text2: Mtumishi wa pili akaja , akasema : Mheshimiwa , faida iliyopatikana ni mara tano ya zile fedha ulizonipa .

text: And he said likewise to him , Be thou also over five cities .
text2: Naye akamwambia pia : Nawe utakuwa na madaraka juu ya miji mitano .

text: And another came , saying , Lord , behold , here is thy pound , which I have kept laid up in a napkin :
text2: " Mtumishi mwingine akaja , akasema : Chukua fedha yako ; niliificha salama katika kitambaa ,

text: For I feared thee , because thou art an austere man : thou takest up that thou layedst not down , and reapest that thou didst not sow .
text2: kwa maana niliogopa kwa sababu wewe ni mtu mkali . Wewe ni mtu ambaye huchukua yasiyo yako , na huchuma ambacho hukupanda .

text: And he saith unto him , Out of thine own mouth will I judge thee , thou wicked servant . Thou knewest that I was an austere man , taking up that I laid not down , and reaping that I did not sow :
text2: Naye akamwambia : Nakuhukumu kutokana na msemo wako , ewe mtumishi mbaya ! Ulijua kwamba mimi ni mtu mkali , ambaye huchukua yasiyo yangu na kuchuma nisichopanda .

text: Wherefore then gavest not thou my money into the bank , that at my coming I might have required mine own with usury ?
text2: Kwa nini basi , hukuiweka fedha yangu benki , nami ningeichukua pamoja na faida baada ya kurudi kwangu ?

text: And he said unto them that stood by , Take from him the pound , and give it to him that hath ten pounds .
text2: Hapo akawaambia wale waliokuwa pale : Mnyang ' anyeni hizo fedha , mkampe yule aliyepata faida mara kumi .

text: ( And they said unto him , Lord , he hath ten pounds . )
text2: Nao wakamwambia : Lakini Mheshimiwa , huyo ana faida ya kiasi hicho mara kumi !

text: For I say unto you , That unto every one which hath shall be given ; and from him that hath not , even that he hath shall be taken away from him .
text2: Naye akawajibu : Kila aliye na kitu atapewa na kuzidishiwa . Lakini yule asiye na kitu , hata kile alicho nacho kitachukuliwa .

text: But those mine enemies , which would not that I should reign over them , bring hither , and slay them before me .
text2: Na sasa , kuhusu hao maadui wangu ambao hawapendi niwe mfalme wao , waleteni hapa , mkawaue papa hapa mbele yangu . "

text: And when he had thus spoken , he went before , ascending up to Jerusalem .
text2: Yesu alisema hayo , kisha akatangulia mbele yao kuelekea Yerusalemu .

text: And it came to pass , when he was come nigh to Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount called the mount of Olives , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Alipokaribia kufika Bethfage na Bethania , karibu na mlima wa Mizeituni , aliwatuma wanafunzi wake wawili ,

text: Saying , Go ye into the village over against you ; in the which at your entering ye shall find a colt tied , whereon yet never man sat : loose him , and bring him hither .
text2: akawaambia : " Nendeni katika kijiji kilicho mbele yenu . Mtakapokuwa mnaingia kijijini , mtamkuta mwana punda amefungwa ambaye hajatumiwa na mtu . Mfungeni , mkamlete hapa .

text: And if any man ask you , Why do ye loose him ? thus shall ye say unto him , Because the Lord hath need of him .
text2: Kama mtu akiwauliza , kwa nini mnamfungua , mwambieni , Bwana ana haja naye . "

text: And they that were sent went their way , and found even as he had said unto them .
text2: Basi , wakaenda , wakakuta sawa kama alivyowaambia .

text: And as they were loosing the colt , the owners thereof said unto them , Why loose ye the colt ?
text2: Walipokuwa wanamfungua yule mwana punda , wenyewe wakawauliza , " Kwa nini mnamfungua mwana punda huyu ? "

text: And they said , The Lord hath need of him .
text2: Nao wakawajibu , " Bwana anamhitaji . "

text: And they brought him to Jesus : and they cast their garments upon the colt , and they set Jesus thereon .
text2: Basi , wakampelekea Yesu yule mwana punda . Kisha wakatandika mavazi yao juu yake wakampandisha Yesu .

text: And as he went , they spread their clothes in the way .
text2: Yesu akaendelea na safari , na watu wakatandaza mavazi yao barabarani .

text: And when he was come nigh , even now at the descent of the mount of Olives , the whole multitude of the disciples began to rejoice and praise God with a loud voice for all the mighty works that they had seen ;
text2: Alipofika karibu na Yerusalemu , katika mteremko wa mlima wa Mizeituni , umati wote na wanafunzi wake , wakaanza kushangilia na kumtukuza Mungu kwa sauti kubwa , kwa sababu ya mambo makuu waliyoyaona ;

text: Saying , Blessed be the King that cometh in the name of the Lord : peace in heaven , and glory in the highest .
text2: wakawa wanasema : " Abarikiwe Mfalme ajaye kwa jina la Bwana . Amani mbinguni , na utukufu juu mbinguni ! "

text: And some of the Pharisees from among the multitude said unto him , Master , rebuke thy disciples .
text2: Hapo baadhi ya Mafarisayo waliokuwako katika lile kundi la watu , wakamwambia Yesu , " Mwalimu , wanyamazishe wanafunzi wako ! "

text: And he answered and said unto them , I tell you that , if these should hold their peace , the stones would immediately cry out .
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Nawaambieni , kama hawa wakinyamaza , hakika hayo mawe yatapaza sauti . "

text: And when he was come near , he beheld the city , and wept over it ,
text2: Alipokaribia zaidi na kuuona ule mji , Yesu aliulilia

text: Saying , If thou hadst known , even thou , at least in this thy day , the things which belong unto thy peace ! but now they are hid from thine eyes .
text2: akisema : " Laiti ungelijua leo hii yale yaletayo amani ! Lakini sasa yamefichika machoni pako .

text: For the days shall come upon thee , that thine enemies shall cast a trench about thee , and compass thee round , and keep thee in on every side ,
text2: Maana siku zaja ambapo adui zako watakuzungushia maboma , watakuzingira na kukusonga pande zote .

text: And shall lay thee even with the ground , and thy children within thee ; and they shall not leave in thee one stone upon another ; because thou knewest not the time of thy visitation .
text2: Watakupondaponda wewe pamoja na watoto wako ndani ya kuta zako ; hawatakuachia hata jiwe moja juu jingine , kwa sababu hukuutambua wakati Mungu alipokujia kukuokoa . "

text: And he went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold therein , and them that bought ;
text2: Kisha , Yesu aliingia Hekaluni , akaanza kuwafukuzia nje wafanyabiashara

text: Saying unto them , It is written , My house is the house of prayer : but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: akisema , " Imeandikwa : Nyumba yangu itakuwa nyumba ya sala ; lakini ninyi mmeifanya kuwa pango la wanyang ' anyi . "

text: And he taught daily in the temple . But the chief priests and the scribes and the chief of the people sought to destroy him ,
text2: Yesu akawa anafundisha kila siku Hekaluni . Makuhani wakuu , walimu wa Sheria na viongozi wa watu walitaka kumwangamiza ,

text: And could not find what they might do : for all the people were very attentive to hear him .
text2: lakini hawakuwa na la kufanya , maana watu wote walikuwa wakimsikiliza kwa makini kabisa .

text: And it came to pass , that on one of those days , as he taught the people in the temple , and preached the gospel , the chief priests and the scribes came upon him with the elders ,
text2: Siku moja , Yesu alipokuwa akiwafundisha watu Hekaluni na kuwahubiria juu ya Habari Njema , makuhani wakuu na walimu wa Sheria pamoja na wazee walifika ,

text: And spake unto him , saying , Tell us , by what authority doest thou these things ? or who is he that gave thee this authority ?
text2: wakasema , " Tuambie ! Unafanya mambo haya kwa mamlaka gani ? "

text: And he answered and said unto them , I will also ask you one thing ; and answer me :
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Na mimi nitawaulizeni swali :

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ?
text2: mamlaka ya Yohane ya kubatiza yalitoka kwa Mungu au kwa watu ? "

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then believed ye him not ?
text2: Lakini wao wakajadiliana hivi : " Tukisema yalitoka mbinguni , yeye atatuuliza : Mbona hamkumsadiki ?

text: But and if we say , Of men ; all the people will stone us : for they be persuaded that John was a prophet .
text2: Na tukisema yalitoka kwa binadamu , watu wote hapa watatupiga mawe , maana wote wanaamini kwamba Yohane alikuwa nabii . "

text: And they answered , that they could not tell whence it was .
text2: Basi , wakamwambia , " Hatujui mamlaka hayo yalitoka wapi . "

text: And Jesus said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Hata mimi sitawaambia ninafanya mambo haya kwa mamlaka gani . "

text: Then began he to speak to the people this parable ; A certain man planted a vineyard , and let it forth to husbandmen , and went into a far country for a long time .
text2: Yesu akaendelea kuwaambia watu mfano huu : " Mtu mmoja alilima shamba la mizabibu , akalikodisha kwa wakulima ; kisha akasafiri hadi nchi ya mbali , akakaa huko kwa muda mrefu .

text: And at the season he sent a servant to the husbandmen , that they should give him of the fruit of the vineyard : but the husbandmen beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Wakati wa mavuno , mtu huyo alimtuma mtumishi wake kwa wale wakulima , akachukue sehemu ya matunda ya shamba la mizabibu . Lakini wale wakulima wakampiga mtumishi huyo wakamrudisha mikono mitupu .

text: And again he sent another servant : and they beat him also , and entreated him shamefully , and sent him away empty .
text2: Yule bwana akamtuma tena mtumishi mwingine ; lakini wao wakampiga huyo vilevile na kumtendea vibaya , wakamrudisha mikono mitupu .

text: And again he sent a third : and they wounded him also , and cast him out .
text2: Akamtuma tena wa tatu ; huyu naye , baada ya kumwumiza , wakamfukuza .

text: Then said the lord of the vineyard , What shall I do ? I will send my beloved son : it may be they will reverence him when they see him .
text2: Yule mwenye shamba akafikiri : Nitafanya nini ? Nitamtuma mwanangu mpenzi ; labda watamjali yeye .

text: But when the husbandmen saw him , they reasoned among themselves , saying , This is the heir : come , let us kill him , that the inheritance may be ours .
text2: Wale wakulima walipomwona tu , wakasemezana : Huyu ndiye mrithi . Basi , tumwue ili urithi wake uwe wetu .

text: So they cast him out of the vineyard , and killed him . What therefore shall the lord of the vineyard do unto them ?
text2: Basi , wakamtoa nje ya lile shamba la mizabibu , wakamwua . " Yesu akauliza , " Yule mwenye shamba atawafanya nini hao wakulima ?

text: He shall come and destroy these husbandmen , and shall give the vineyard to others . And when they heard it , they said , God forbid .
text2: Atakuja kuwaangamiza wakulima hao , na atawapa wakulima wengine hilo shamba la mizabibu . " Watu waliposikia maneno hayo , walisema : " Hasha ! Yasitukie hata kidogo ! "

text: And he beheld them , and said , What is this then that is written , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner ?
text2: Lakini Yesu akawatazama , akawaambia , " Maandiko haya Matakatifu yana maana gani basi ? Jiwe walilokataa waashi , sasa limekuwa jiwe kuu la msingi !

text: Whosoever shall fall upon that stone shall be broken ; but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Mtu yeyote akianguka juu ya jiwe hilo , atavunjika vipandevipande ; na likimwangukia mtu yeyote , litamsaga kabisa . "

text: And the chief priests and the scribes the same hour sought to lay hands on him ; and they feared the people : for they perceived that he had spoken this parable against them .
text2: Walimu wa Sheria na makuhani wakuu walifahamu kwamba mfano huo ulikuwa unawahusu , na hivyo walitaka kumkamata palepale , ila tu waliogopa watu .

text: And they watched him , and sent forth spies , which should feign themselves just men , that they might take hold of his words , that so they might deliver him unto the power and authority of the governor .
text2: Basi , wakawa wanatafuta wakati wa kufaa . Wakawahonga watu fulani wajisingizie kuwa wema , wakawatuma wamnase Yesu kwa maswali , na hivyo waweze kumtia nguvuni na kumpeleka kwa wakuu wa serikali .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , we know that thou sayest and teachest rightly , neither acceptest thou the person of any , but teachest the way of God truly :
text2: Hao wapelelezi wakamwambia , " Mwalimu , tunajua kwamba unasema na kufundisha mambo ya kweli ; tunajua kwamba wewe huna ubaguzi ; wewe wafundisha ukweli juu ya njia ya Mungu .

text: Is it lawful for us to give tribute unto Caesar , or no ?
text2: Basi , twambie kama ni halali , au la , kulipa kodi kwa Kaisari ! "

text: But he perceived their craftiness , and said unto them , Why tempt ye me ?
text2: Yesu alitambua mtego wao , akawaambia ,

text: Shew me a penny . Whose image and superscription hath it ? They answered and said , Caesar ' s .
text2: " Nionyesheni sarafu . Je , sura na chapa ni vya nani ? "

text: And he said unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which be Caesar ' s , and unto God the things which be God ' s .
text2: Nao wakamjibu , " Ni vya Kaisari . " Yesu akawaambia , " Basi , mpeni Kaisari vilivyo vyake Kaisari , na Mungu vilivyo vyake Mungu . "

text: And they could not take hold of his words before the people : and they marvelled at his answer , and held their peace .
text2: Hawakufaulu kumnasa kwa neno lolote pale mbele ya watu na hivyo wakakaa kimya wakilistaajabia jibu lake .

text: Then came to him certain of the Sadducees , which deny that there is any resurrection ; and they asked him ,
text2: Kisha Masadukayo , ambao husema kwamba wafu hawafufuki , wakamjia Yesu , wakasema :

text: Saying , Master , Moses wrote unto us , If any man ' s brother die , having a wife , and he die without children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: " Mwalimu , Mose alituandikia kwamba kama ndugu ya mtu fulani akifa na kumwacha mjane wake bila watoto , ni lazima ndugu yake amchukue huyo mama mjane , amzalie watoto ndugu yake marehemu .

text: There were therefore seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and died without children .
text2: Sasa , wakati mmoja kulikuwa na ndugu saba . Yule wa kwanza alioa na baadaye akafa bila kuacha mtoto .

text: And the second took her to wife , and he died childless .
text2: Yule ndugu wa pili akamwoa yule mjane , naye pia , akafa ;

text: And the third took her ; and in like manner the seven also : and they left no children , and died .
text2: na ndugu wa tatu vilevile . Mambo yakawa yaleyale kwa wote saba - - wote walikufa bila kuacha watoto .

text: Last of all the woman died also .
text2: Mwishowe akafa pia yule mwanamke .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them is she ? for seven had her to wife .
text2: Je , siku wafu watakapofufuliwa , mwanamke huyo atakuwa mke wa nani ? Alikuwa ameolewa na wote saba . "

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , The children of this world marry , and are given in marriage :
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Watu wa nyakati hizi huoa na kuolewa ;

text: But they which shall be accounted worthy to obtain that world , and the resurrection from the dead , neither marry , nor are given in marriage :
text2: lakini wale ambao Mungu atawawezesha kushiriki ule wakati wa ufufuo , hawataoa wala kuolewa .

text: Neither can they die any more : for they are equal unto the angels ; and are the children of God , being the children of the resurrection .
text2: Ama hakika , hawawezi kufa tena , kwa sababu watakuwa kama malaika , na ni watoto wa Mungu kwa vile wamefufuliwa katika wafu .

text: Now that the dead are raised , even Moses shewed at the bush , when he calleth the Lord the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob .
text2: Lakini , kwamba kuna kufufuka kutoka wafu , hata Mose alithibitisha jambo hilo katika Maandiko Matakatifu . Katika sehemu ya Maandiko Matakatifu juu ya kile kichaka kilichokuwa kinawaka moto , anamtaja Bwana kama Mungu wa Abrahamu , Isaka na Yakobo .

text: For he is not a God of the dead , but of the living : for all live unto him .
text2: Basi , yeye si Mungu wa wafu , bali ni Mungu wa wale walio hai ; maana wale aliowaita kwake , wanaishi naye . "

text: Then certain of the scribes answering said , Master , thou hast well said .
text2: Baadhi ya wale walimu wa Sheria wakasema , " Mwalimu , umejibu vema kabisa . "

text: And after that they durst not ask him any question at all .
text2: Walisema hivyo kwa sababu hawakuthubutu kumwuliza tena maswali mengine .

text: And he said unto them , How say they that Christ is David ' s son ?
text2: Yesu akawauliza , " Yasemekanaje kwamba Kristo ni mwana wa Daudi ?

text: And David himself saith in the book of Psalms , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Maana Daudi mwenyewe anasema katika Zaburi : Bwana alimwambia Bwana wangu : Keti upande wangu wa kulia

text: Till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: mpaka niwafanye adui zako kama kiti cha kuwekea miguu yako .

text: David therefore calleth him Lord , how is he then his son ?
text2: Ikiwa Daudi anamwita yeye , Bwana , basi atakuwaje mwanawe ? "

text: Then in the audience of all the people he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Yesu aliwaambia wanafunzi wake mbele ya watu wote ,

text: Beware of the scribes , which desire to walk in long robes , and love greetings in the markets , and the highest seats in the synagogues , and the chief rooms at feasts ;
text2: " Jihadharini na walimu wa Sheria ambao hupenda kupitapita wamevalia kanzu . Hupenda kusalimiwa na watu kwa heshima masokoni , huketi mahali pa heshima katika masunagogi na kuchukua nafasi za heshima katika karamu .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a shew make long prayers : the same shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Huwadhulumu wajane huku wakisingizia kuwa wema kwa kusali sala ndefu . Hao watapata hukumu kali zaidi ! "

text: And he looked up , and saw the rich men casting their gifts into the treasury .
text2: Yesu alitazama kwa makini , akawaona matajiri walivyokuwa wanatia sadaka zao katika hazina ya Hekalu ,

text: And he saw also a certain poor widow casting in thither two mites .
text2: akamwona pia mama mmoja mjane akitumbukiza humo sarafu mbili ndogo .

text: And he said , Of a truth I say unto you , that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all :
text2: Basi , akasema , " Nawaambieni kweli , mama huyu mjane ametia zaidi katika hazina kuliko wote .

text: For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God : but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had .
text2: Kwa maana , wengine wote wametoa sadaka zao kutokana na ziada ya mali zao , lakini huyu mama , ingawa ni maskini , ametoa kila kitu alichohitaji kwa kuishi . "

text: And as some spake of the temple , how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts , he said ,
text2: Baadhi ya wanafunzi walikuwa wanazungumza juu ya Hekalu , jinsi lilivyopambwa kwa mawe ya thamani , pamoja na sadaka zilizotolewa kwa Mungu . Yesu akasema ,

text: As for these things which ye behold , the days will come , in the which there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: " Haya yote mnayoyaona - - zitakuja siku ambapo hakuna hata jiwe moja litakalosalia juu ya lingine ; kila kitu kitaharibiwa . "

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , but when shall these things be ? and what sign will there be when these things shall come to pass ?
text2: Basi , wakamwuliza , " Mwalimu , mambo hayo yatatokea lini ? Na ni ishara gani zitakazoonyesha kwamba karibu mambo hayo yatokee ? "

text: And he said , Take heed that ye be not deceived : for many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and the time draweth near : go ye not therefore after them .
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Jihadharini , msije mkadanganyika . Maana wengi watatokea na kulitumia jina langu wakisema : Mimi ndiye , na , Wakati ule umekaribia . Lakini ninyi msiwafuate !

text: But when ye shall hear of wars and commotions , be not terrified : for these things must first come to pass ; but the end is not by and by .
text2: Basi , mtakaposikia habari za vita na misukosuko , msitishike ; maana ni lazima hayo yatokee kwanza , lakini mwisho wa yote , bado . "

text: Then said he unto them , Nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom :
text2: Halafu akaendelea kusema : " Taifa moja litapigana na taifa lingine , na ufalme mmoja utapigana na ufalme mwingine .

text: And great earthquakes shall be in divers places , and famines , and pestilences ; and fearful sights and great signs shall there be from heaven .
text2: Kila mahali kutakuwa na mitetemeko mikubwa ya ardhi , kutakuwa na njaa na tauni . Kutakuwa na vituko vya kutisha na ishara kubwa angani .

text: But before all these , they shall lay their hands on you , and persecute you , delivering you up to the synagogues , and into prisons , being brought before kings and rulers for my name ' s sake .
text2: Lakini kabla ya kutokea hayo yote , watawatieni nguvuni , watawatesa na kuwapelekeni katika masunagogi na kuwatia gerezani ; mtapelekwa mbele ya wafalme na watawala kwa ajili ya jina langu .

text: And it shall turn to you for a testimony .
text2: Hii itawapeni fursa ya kushuhudia Habari Njema .

text: Settle it therefore in your hearts , not to meditate before what ye shall answer :
text2: Muwe na msimamo huu mioyoni mwenu : hakuna kufikiria kabla ya wakati juu ya jinsi mtakavyojitetea ,

text: For I will give you a mouth and wisdom , which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist .
text2: kwa sababu mimi mwenyewe nitawapeni ufasaha wa maneno na hekima , hivyo kwamba zenu hawataweza kustahimili wala kupinga .

text: And ye shall be betrayed both by parents , and brethren , and kinsfolks , and friends ; and some of you shall they cause to be put to death .
text2: Wazazi wenu , ndugu , jamaa na rafiki zenu watawasaliti ninyi ; na baadhi yenu mtauawa .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake .
text2: Watu wote watawachukieni kwa sababu ya jina langu .

text: But there shall not an hair of your head perish .
text2: Lakini , hata unywele mmoja wa vichwa vyenu hautapotea .

text: In your patience possess ye your souls .
text2: Kwa uvumilivu wenu , mtayaokoa maisha yenu .

text: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies , then know that the desolation thereof is nigh .
text2: " Mtakapoona mji wa Yerusalemu umezungukwa na majeshi , ndipo mtambue ya kwamba wakati umefika ambapo mji huo utaharibiwa .

text: Then let them which are in Judaea flee to the mountains ; and let them which are in the midst of it depart out ; and let not them that are in the countries enter thereinto .
text2: Hapo walioko Yudea wakimbilie milimani ; wale walio mjini watoke ; na wale walio mashambani wasirudi mjini .

text: For these be the days of vengeance , that all things which are written may be fulfilled .
text2: Kwa maana siku hizo ni siku za adhabu , ili yote yaliyoandikwa yatimie .

text: But woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck , in those days ! for there shall be great distress in the land , and wrath upon this people .
text2: Ole wao waja wazito na wanyonyeshao siku hizo ! Kwa maana kutakuwa na dhiki kubwa katika nchi , na hasira ya Mungu itawajia watu hawa .

text: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword , and shall be led away captive into all nations : and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles , until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled .
text2: Wengine watauawa kwa upanga , wengine watachukuliwa mateka katika nchi zote ; na mji wa Yerusalemu utakanyagwa na watu wa mataifa mengine , hadi nyakati zao zitakapotimia .

text: And there shall be signs in the sun , and in the moon , and in the stars ; and upon the earth distress of nations , with perplexity ; the sea and the waves roaring ;
text2: " Kutakuwa na ishara katika jua na mwezi na nyota . Mataifa duniani yatakuwa na dhiki kwa sababu ya wasiwasi kutokana na mshindo wa mawimbi ya bahari .

text: Men ' s hearts failing them for fear , and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth : for the powers of heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Watu watazirai kwa sababu ya uoga , wakitazamia mambo yatakayoupata ulimwengu ; kwa maana nguvu za mbingu zitatikiswa .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory .
text2: Halafu , watamwona Mwana wa Mtu akija katika wingu , mwenye nguvu na utukufu mwingi .

text: And when these things begin to come to pass , then look up , and lift up your heads ; for your redemption draweth nigh .
text2: Wakati mambo hayo yatakapoanza kutukia , simameni na kuinua vichwa vyenu juu , kwa maana ukombozi wenu umekaribia . "

text: And he spake to them a parable ; Behold the fig tree , and all the trees ;
text2: Kisha akawaambia mfano : " Angalieni mtini na miti mingine yote .

text: When they now shoot forth , ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand .
text2: Mnapoona kwamba imeanza kuchipua majani , mwatambua kwamba wakati wa kiangazi umekaribia .

text: So likewise ye , when ye see these things come to pass , know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand .
text2: Vivyo hivyo , mtakapoona mambo hayo yanatendeka , mtatambua kwamba Ufalme wa Mungu umekaribia .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass away , till all be fulfilled .
text2: Nawaambieni hakika , kizazi hiki cha sasa hakitapita kabla ya hayo yote kutendeka .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Mbingu na dunia vitapita , lakini maneno yangu hayatapita .

text: And take heed to yourselves , lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting , and drunkenness , and cares of this life , and so that day come upon you unawares .
text2: " Muwe macho , mioyo yenu isije ikalemewa na anasa , ulevi na shughuli za maisha haya . La sivyo , Siku ile itawajieni ghafla .

text: For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth .
text2: Kwa maana itawajia kama mtego , wote wanaoishi duniani pote .

text: Watch ye therefore , and pray always , that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass , and to stand before the Son of man .
text2: Muwe waangalifu basi , na salini daima ili muweze kupata nguvu ya kupita salama katika mambo haya yote yatakayotokea , na kusimama mbele ya Mwana wa Mtu . "

text: And in the day time he was teaching in the temple ; and at night he went out , and abode in the mount that is called the mount of Olives .
text2: Wakati wa mchana , siku hizo , Yesu alikuwa akifundisha watu Hekaluni ; lakini usiku alikuwa akienda katika mlima wa Mizeituni na kukaa huko .

text: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple , for to hear him .
text2: Watu wote walikuwa wanakwenda Hekaluni asubuhi na mapema , wapate kumsikiliza .

text: Now the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh , which is called the Passover .
text2: Sikukuu ya Mikate Isiyotiwa chachu , iitwayo Pasaka , ilikuwa inakaribia .

text: And the chief priests and scribes sought how they might kill him ; for they feared the people .
text2: Makuhani wakuu na walimu wa Sheria wakawa wanatafuta njia ya kumwua Yesu , lakini waliwaogopa watu .

text: Then entered Satan into Judas surnamed Iscariot , being of the number of the twelve .
text2: Basi , Shetani akamwingia Yuda aitwae Iskarioti , mmoja wa wale mitume kumi na wawili .

text: And he went his way , and communed with the chief priests and captains , how he might betray him unto them .
text2: Yuda akaenda akajadiliana na makuhani wakuu na walinzi wa Hekalu kuhusu atakavyomsaliti Yesu kwao .

text: And they were glad , and covenanted to give him money .
text2: Nao wakafurahi na kupatana naye kumlipa fedha .

text: And he promised , and sought opportunity to betray him unto them in the absence of the multitude .
text2: Yuda akakubali , na akawa anatafuta nafasi nzuri ya kumkabidhi kwao bila umati wa watu kujua .

text: Then came the day of unleavened bread , when the passover must be killed .
text2: Basi , siku ya Mikate Isiyotiwa chachu ikafika . Hiyo ndiyo siku ambayo mwana kondoo wa Pasaka huchinjwa .

text: And he sent Peter and John , saying , Go and prepare us the passover , that we may eat .
text2: Hivyo Yesu akawatuma Petro na Yohane , akawaambia , " Nendeni mkatuandalie karamu ili tupate kula Pasaka . "

text: And they said unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare ?
text2: Nao wakamwuliza , " Unataka tuiandae wapi ? "

text: And he said unto them , Behold , when ye are entered into the city , there shall a man meet you , bearing a pitcher of water ; follow him into the house where he entereth in .
text2: Akawaambia , " Sikilizeni ! Mtakapokuwa mnakwenda mjini , mtakutana na mwanamume anayebeba mtungi wa maji . Mfuateni mpaka ndani ya nyumba atakayoingia .

text: And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house , The Master saith unto thee , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Mwambieni mwenye nyumba : Mwalimu anakuuliza , kiko wapi kile chumba ambamo nitakula Pasaka pamoja na wanafunzi wangu ?

text: And he shall shew you a large upper room furnished : there make ready .
text2: Naye atawaonyesheni chumba kikubwa ghorofani ambacho kimepambwa . Andalieni humo . "

text: And they went , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Basi , wakaenda , wakakuta kila kitu sawa kama Yesu alivyokuwa amewaambia ; wakaandaa karamu ya Pasaka .

text: And when the hour was come , he sat down , and the twelve apostles with him .
text2: Saa ilipotimia , Yesu akakaa kula chakula pamoja na mitume wake .

text: And he said unto them , With desire I have desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer :
text2: Akawaambia , " Nimetamani sana kula Pasaka hii pamoja nanyi kabla ya kuteswa kwangu .

text: For I say unto you , I will not any more eat thereof , until it be fulfilled in the kingdom of God .
text2: Maana nawaambieni , sitaila tena hadi hapo itakapokamilika katika Ufalme wa Mungu . "

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and said , Take this , and divide it among yourselves :
text2: Kisha akatwaa kikombe , akashukuru akasema , " Pokeeni , mgawanye ninyi kwa ninyi .

text: For I say unto you , I will not drink of the fruit of the vine , until the kingdom of God shall come .
text2: Kwa maana nawaambieni , sitakunywa tena divai ya zabibu mpaka Ufalme wa Mungu utakapokuja . "

text: And he took bread , and gave thanks , and brake it , and gave unto them , saying , This is my body which is given for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: Halafu akatwaa mkate , akashukuru , akaumega , akawapa akisema , " Huu ni mwili wangu , unaotolewa kwa ajili yenu . Fanyeni hivi kwa kunikumbuka . "

text: Likewise also the cup after supper , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood , which is shed for you .
text2: Akafanya vivyo hivyo na kikombe , baada ya chakula , akisema , " Kikombe hiki ni agano jipya linalothibitishwa kwa damu yangu inayomwagika kwa ajili yenu .

text: But , behold , the hand of him that betrayeth me is with me on the table .
text2: " Lakini , tazameni ! Yule atakayenisaliti yuko nami hapa mezani .

text: And truly the Son of man goeth , as it was determined : but woe unto that man by whom he is betrayed !
text2: Kweli Mwana wa Mtu anakwenda kuuawa kama ilivyopangwa , lakini ole wake mtu anayemsaliti . "

text: And they began to inquire among themselves , which of them it was that should do this thing .
text2: Hapo wakaanza kuulizana wao kwa wao ni nani kati yao atakayefanya jambo hilo .

text: And there was also a strife among them , which of them should be accounted the greatest .
text2: Kulitokea ubishi kati ya hao mitume kuhusu nani miongoni mwao anayefikiriwa kuwa mkuu zaidi kuliko wengine .

text: And he said unto them , The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Wafalme wa mataifa huwatawala watu wao kwa mabavu , nao huitwa wafadhili wa watu .

text: But ye shall not be so : but he that is greatest among you , let him be as the younger ; and he that is chief , as he that doth serve .
text2: Lakini isiwe hivyo kati yenu ; bali , yule aliye mkuu kati yenu ni lazima awe mdogo wa wote , na aliye kiongozi lazima awe kama mtumishi .

text: For whether is greater , he that sitteth at meat , or he that serveth ? is not he that sitteth at meat ? but I am among you as he that serveth .
text2: Kwa maana , ni nani aliye mkuu : yule anayeketi mezani kula chakula , ama yule anayetumikia ? Bila shaka ni yule anayeketi mezani kula chakula ! Hata hivyo , mimi niko hapa kati yenu kama mtumishi .

text: Ye are they which have continued with me in my temptations .
text2: " Ninyi ndio mliobaki nami wakati wote wa majaribu yangu ;

text: And I appoint unto you a kingdom , as my Father hath appointed unto me ;
text2: na , kama vile Baba yangu alivyonikabidhi Ufalme , vivyo hivyo nami nitawakabidhi ninyi Ufalme .

text: That ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom , and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Mtakula na kunywa mezani pangu katika ufalme wangu , na mtaketi katika viti vya enzi kuyahukumu makabila kumi na mawili ya Israeli .

text: And the Lord said , Simon , Simon , behold , Satan hath desired to have you , that he may sift you as wheat :
text2: " Simoni , Simoni ! Sikiliza ! Shetani alitaka kuwapepeta ninyi kama mtu anavyopepeta ngano .

text: But I have prayed for thee , that thy faith fail not : and when thou art converted , strengthen thy brethren .
text2: Lakini mimi nimekuombea ili imani yako isipungue . Nawe utakaponirudia , watie moyo ndugu zako . "

text: And he said unto him , Lord , I am ready to go with thee , both into prison , and to death .
text2: Naye Petro akamjibu , " Bwana , mimi niko tayari kwenda pamoja nawe gerezani , na hata kufa . "

text: And he said , I tell thee , Peter , the cock shall not crow this day , before that thou shalt thrice deny that thou knowest me .
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Nakwambia wewe Petro , kabla jogoo hajawika leo utakuwa umenikana mara tatu . "

text: And he said unto them , When I sent you without purse , and scrip , and shoes , lacked ye any thing ? And they said , Nothing .
text2: Kisha , Yesu akawauliza wanafunzi wake , " Wakati nilipowatuma bila mfuko wa fedha wala mkoba wala viatu , mlitindikiwa chochote ? " Wakajibu , " La . "

text: Then said he unto them , But now , he that hath a purse , let him take it , and likewise his scrip : and he that hath no sword , let him sell his garment , and buy one .
text2: Naye akawaambia , " Lakini sasa , yule aliye na mfuko wa fedha auchukue ; na aliye na mkoba , hali kadhalika . Na yeyote asiye na upanga , auze koti lake anunue mmoja .

text: For I say unto you , that this that is written must yet be accomplished in me , And he was reckoned among the transgressors : for the things concerning me have an end .
text2: Maana nawaambieni , haya maneno ya Maandiko Matakatifu : Aliwekwa kundi moja na wahalifu , ni lazima yatimie . Naam , yale yanayonihusu yanafikia ukamilifu wake . "

text: And they said , Lord , behold , here are two swords . And he said unto them , It is enough .
text2: Nao wakasema , " Bwana , tazama ; hapa kuna panga mbili . " Naye akasema , " Basi ! "

text: And he came out , and went , as he was wont , to the mount of Olives ; and his disciples also followed him .
text2: Yesu akatoka , na kama ilivyokuwa desturi yake , akaenda katika mlima wa Mizeituni ; wanafunzi wake wakamfuata .

text: And when he was at the place , he said unto them , Pray that ye enter not into temptation .
text2: Alipofika huko akawaambia , " Salini , msije mkaingia katika kishawishi . "

text: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone ' s cast , and kneeled down , and prayed ,
text2: Kisha akawaacha , akaenda umbali wa mtu kuweza kutupa jiwe , akapiga magoti , akasali :

text: Saying , Father , if thou be willing , remove this cup from me : nevertheless not my will , but thine , be done .
text2: " Baba , kama wapenda , ukiondoe kwangu kikombe hiki ; hata hivyo , mapenzi yako yatimizwe , wala siyo yangu . "

text: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven , strengthening him .
text2: Hapo , malaika kutoka mbinguni , akamtokea ili kumtia moyo .

text: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly : and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground .
text2: Akiwa katika uchungu mkubwa , alisali kwa bidii zaidi ; na jasho likamtoka , kama matone ya damu , likatiririka mpaka chini .

text: And when he rose up from prayer , and was come to his disciples , he found them sleeping for sorrow ,
text2: Baada ya kusali , aliwarudia wanafunzi wake , akawakuta wamelala , kwani walikuwa na huzuni .

text: And said unto them , Why sleep ye ? rise and pray , lest ye enter into temptation .
text2: Akawaambia , " Mbona mnalala ? Amkeni msali , msije mkaingia katika kishawishi . "

text: And while he yet spake , behold a multitude , and he that was called Judas , one of the twelve , went before them , and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him .
text2: Alipokuwa bado anaongea , kundi la watu likaja likiongozwa na yule aliyeitwa Yuda , mmoja wa wale mitume kumi na wawili . Yuda akaenda kumsalimu Yesu kwa kumbusu .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Judas , betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss ?
text2: Lakini Yesu akamwambia , " Yuda ! Je , unamsaliti Mwana wa Mtu kwa kumbusu ? "

text: When they which were about him saw what would follow , they said unto him , Lord , shall we smite with the sword ?
text2: Wale wanafunzi wake walipoona hayo wakasema , " Bwana , tutumie panga zetu ? "

text: And one of them smote the servant of the high priest , and cut off his right ear .
text2: Na mmoja wao akampiga upanga mtumishi wa Kuhani Mkuu , akamkata sikio lake la kulia .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Suffer ye thus far . And he touched his ear , and healed him .
text2: Hapo , Yesu akasema , " Acha ! Hii inatosha . " Akaligusa sikio la mtu huyo akaliponya .

text: Then Jesus said unto the chief priests , and captains of the temple , and the elders , which were come to him , Be ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and staves ?
text2: Kisha Yesu akawaambia makuhani wakuu , wakubwa wa walinzi wa Hekalu na wazee waliokuja kumkamata : " Je , mmekuja na mapanga na marungu kunikamata kana kwamba mimi ni mnyang ' anyi ?

text: When I was daily with you in the temple , ye stretched forth no hands against me : but this is your hour , and the power of darkness .
text2: Nilipokuwa pamoja nanyi kila siku Hekaluni hamkunitia nguvuni . Lakini , huu ndio wakati wenu hasa , ndio wakati wa utawala wa giza . "

text: Then took they him , and led him , and brought him into the high priest ' s house . And Peter followed afar off .
text2: Basi , wakamkamata , wakamchukua na kwenda naye nyumbani kwa Kuhani Mkuu . Petro akawa anamfuata nyuma kwa mbali .

text: And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall , and were set down together , Peter sat down among them .
text2: Moto ulikuwa umewashwa katikati ya ua , nao wakawa wameketi pamoja Petro akiwa miongoni mwao .

text: But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire , and earnestly looked upon him , and said , This man was also with him .
text2: Mjakazi mmoja alipomwona Petro ameketi karibu na moto , akamkodolea macho , akasema , " Mtu huyu alikuwa pia pamoja na Yesu . "

text: And he denied him , saying , Woman , I know him not .
text2: Lakini Petro akakana akisema , " Wee ! simjui mimi . "

text: And after a little while another saw him , and said , Thou art also of them . And Peter said , Man , I am not .
text2: Baadaye kidogo , mtu mwingine akamwona Petro , akasema , " Wewe ni mmoja wao . " Lakini Petro akajibu " Bwana we ; si mimi ! "

text: And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed , saying , Of a truth this fellow also was with him : for he is a Galilaean .
text2: Kama saa moja baadaye , mtu mwingine akasisitiza , " Hakika huyu alikuwa pamoja naye ; ametoka Galilaya ati . "

text: And Peter said , Man , I know not what thou sayest . And immediately , while he yet spake , the cock crew .
text2: Lakini Petro akasema , " Bwana wee ; sijui hata unachosema ! " Na papo hapo , akiwa bado anaongea , jogoo akawika .

text: And the Lord turned , and looked upon Peter . And Peter remembered the word of the Lord , how he had said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Bwana akageuka na kumtazama Petro , naye Petro akakumbuka yale aliyokuwa ameambiwa na Bwana : " Leo kabla jogoo hajawika , utanikana mara tatu . "

text: And Peter went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Hapo akatoka nje , akalia sana .

text: And the men that held Jesus mocked him , and smote him .
text2: Wale watu waliokuwa wanamchunga Yesu , walimpiga na kumdhihaki .

text: And when they had blindfolded him , they struck him on the face , and asked him , saying , Prophesy , who is it that smote thee ?
text2: Walimfunga kitambaa usoni , wakawa wanamwuliza , " Ni nani aliyekupiga ? Hebu bashiri tuone ! "

text: And many other things blasphemously spake they against him .
text2: Wakamtolea maneno mengi ya matusi .

text: And as soon as it was day , the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together , and led him into their council , saying ,
text2: Kulipokucha , kikao cha wazee wa watu kilifanyika , ambacho kilihudhuriwa na makuhani wakuu na walimu wa Sheria . Yesu akaletwa mbele ya Baraza hilo .

text: Art thou the Christ ? tell us . And he said unto them , If I tell you , ye will not believe :
text2: Nao wakamwambia , " Twambie ! Je , wewe ndiwe Kristo ? " Lakini Yesu akawaambia , " Hata kama nikiwaambieni , hamtasadiki ;

text: And if I also ask you , ye will not answer me , nor let me go .
text2: na hata kama nikiwaulizeni swali , hamtanijibu .

text: Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God .
text2: Lakini tangu sasa , Mwana wa Mtu atakuwa ameketi upande wa kulia wa Mungu Mwenyezi . "

text: Then said they all , Art thou then the Son of God ? And he said unto them , Ye say that I am .
text2: Hapo wote wakasema , " Ndiyo kusema wewe ni Mwana wa Mungu ? " Naye akasema , " Ninyi mnasema kwamba mimi ndiye . "

text: And they said , What need we any further witness ? for we ourselves have heard of his own mouth .
text2: Nao wakasema , " Je , tunahitaji ushahidi mwingine ? Sisi wenyewe tumesikia akisema kwa mdomo wake mwenyewe . "

text: And the whole multitude of them arose , and led him unto Pilate .
text2: Kisha , wote kwa jumla , wakasimama , wakampeleka Yesu mbele ya Pilato .

text: And they began to accuse him , saying , We found this fellow perverting the nation , and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar , saying that he himself is Christ a King .
text2: Wakaanza kumshtaki wakisema : " Tulimkuta mtu huyu akiwapotosha watu wetu , akipinga kulipa kodi kwa Kaisari na kujiita ati yeye ni Kristo , Mfalme . "

text: And Pilate asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answered him and said , Thou sayest it .
text2: Pilato akamwuliza Yesu , " Wewe ni Mfalme wa Wayahudi ? " Yesu akamjibu , " Wewe umesema . "

text: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people , I find no fault in this man .
text2: Pilato akawaambia makuhani wakuu na umati wa watu , " Sioni kosa lolote katika mtu huyu . "

text: And they were the more fierce , saying , He stirreth up the people , teaching throughout all Jewry , beginning from Galilee to this place .
text2: Lakini wao wakasisitiza wakisema : " Anawachochea watu kwa mafundisho yake katika nchi yote ya Yudea ; alianza Galilaya , na sasa yuko hapa . "

text: When Pilate heard of Galilee , he asked whether the man were a Galilaean .
text2: Pilato aliposikia hayo , akauliza , " Je , mtu huyu ni mwenyeji wa Galilaya ? "

text: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod ' s jurisdiction , he sent him to Herod , who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time .
text2: Alipojua kwamba Yesu alikuwa chini ya utawala wa Herode , akampeleka kwa Herode , ambaye wakati huo alikuwa Yerusalemu .

text: And when Herod saw Jesus , he was exceeding glad : for he was desirous to see him of a long season , because he had heard many things of him ; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him .
text2: Herode alifurahi sana alipomwona Yesu . Alikuwa amekwisha sikia habari zake , na hivyo alikuwa anatazamia kwa muda mrefu kumwona kwa macho yake mwenyewe . Zaidi ya hayo , alikuwa anatumaini kumwona Yesu akitenda mwujiza .

text: Then he questioned with him in many words ; but he answered him nothing .
text2: Basi , akamwuliza maswali mengi kwa muda mrefu , lakini Yesu hakumjibu neno .

text: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him .
text2: Makuhani wakuu na walimu wa Sheria wakajitokeza mbele , wakatoa mashtaka yao kwa nguvu sana .

text: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought , and mocked him , and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe , and sent him again to Pilate .
text2: Basi , herode pamoja na maaskari wake , wakamwaibisha Yesu na kumfanyia mzaha ; kisha wakamvika vazi la kifalme , wakamrudisha kwa Pilato .

text: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together : for before they were at enmity between themselves .
text2: Herode na Pilato , ambao hapo awali walikuwa maadui , tangu siku hiyo wakawa marafiki .

text: And Pilate , when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people ,
text2: Basi , Pilato akaitisha mkutano wa makuhani wakuu , viongozi na watu ,

text: Said unto them , Ye have brought this man unto me , as one that perverteth the people : and , behold , I , having examined him before you , have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him :
text2: akawaambia , " Mmemleta mtu huyu kwangu mkisema kwamba alikuwa anawapotosha watu . Sasa sikilizeni ! Baada ya kuchunguza jambo hilo mbele yenu , sikumpata na kosa lolote kuhusu mashtaka yenu juu yake .

text: No , nor yet Herod : for I sent you to him ; and , lo , nothing worthy of death is done unto him .
text2: Wala si mimi tu , bali hata Herode hakuona kosa lolote , kwa maana amemrudisha kwangu . Ni dhahiri kwamba mtu huyu hakufanya chochote kinachostahili adhabu ya kifo .

text: I will therefore chastise him , and release him .
text2: Hivyo , nitaamuru apigwe viboko , halafu nitamwachilia . "

text: ( For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast . )
text2: Kila sikukuu ya Pasaka , ilimlazimu Pilato kuwafungulia mfungwa mmoja .

text: And they cried out all at once , saying , Away with this man , and release unto us Barabbas :
text2: Lakini wote wakapiga kelele pamoja : " Mwondoe huyo , utufungulie Baraba ! "

text: ( Who for a certain sedition made in the city , and for murder , was cast into prison . )
text2: ( Baraba alikuwa ametiwa ndani kwa kusababisha uasi katika mji na pia kwa sababu ya kuua . )

text: Pilate therefore , willing to release Jesus , spake again to them .
text2: Pilato alitaka kumwachilia Yesu , hivyo akasema nao tena ;

text: But they cried , saying , Crucify him , crucify him .
text2: lakini wao wakapiga kelele : " Msulubishe , msulubishe ! "

text: And he said unto them the third time , Why , what evil hath he done ? I have found no cause of death in him : I will therefore chastise him , and let him go .
text2: Pilato akawaambia mara ya tatu , " Amefanya kosa gani ? Sioni kosa lolote kwake linalomstahili auawe ; kwa hiyo nitampiga viboko , halafu nimwachilie . "

text: And they were instant with loud voices , requiring that he might be crucified . And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed .
text2: Lakini wao wakazidi kupiga kelele kwa nguvu sana , kwamba Yesu ni lazima asulubiwe . Mwishowe , sauti zao zikashinda .

text: And Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they required .
text2: Basi , Pilato akaamua kwamba matakwa yao yatimizwe .

text: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison , whom they had desired ; but he delivered Jesus to their will .
text2: Akamfungua kutoka gerezani yule waliyemtaka , ambaye alikuwa ametiwa gerezani kwa sababu ya uasi na kuua ; akamtoa Yesu kwao , wamfanyie walivyotaka .

text: And as they led him away , they laid hold upon one Simon , a Cyrenian , coming out of the country , and on him they laid the cross , that he might bear it after Jesus .
text2: Walipokuwa wakimpeleka , walikutana na mtu mmoja , aitwaye Simoni wa Kurene , aliyekuwa anatoka shambani . Basi , walimkamata , wakamtwika ule msalaba auchukue nyuma ya Yesu .

text: And there followed him a great company of people , and of women , which also bewailed and lamented him .
text2: Watu , umati kwa umati , walimfuata ; miongoni mwao wakiwemo wanawake waliokuwa wanaomboleza na kumlilia .

text: But Jesus turning unto them said , Daughters of Jerusalem , weep not for me , but weep for yourselves , and for your children .
text2: Yesu akawageukia , akasema , " Enyi kina mama wa Yerusalemu ! Msinililie mimi , ila lieni kwa ajili yenu wenyewe na kwa ajili ya watoto wenu .

text: For , behold , the days are coming , in the which they shall say , Blessed are the barren , and the wombs that never bare , and the paps which never gave suck .
text2: Maana , hakika siku zitakuja ambapo watasema : Heri yao wale walio tasa , ambao hawakupata kuzaa wala kunyonyesha watoto !

text: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains , Fall on us ; and to the hills , Cover us .
text2: Wakati huo , ndipo watu wataanza kuiambia milima : Tuangukieni ! na vilima , Tufunikeni !

text: For if they do these things in a green tree , what shall be done in the dry ?
text2: Kwa maana , kama watu wanautendea mti mbichi namna hiyo , itakuwaje kwa mti mkavu ? "

text: And there were also two other , malefactors , led with him to be put to death .
text2: Waliwachukua pia watu wengine wawili , wahalifu , wauawe pamoja naye .

text: And when they were come to the place , which is called Calvary , there they crucified him , and the malefactors , one on the right hand , and the other on the left .
text2: Walipofika mahali paitwapo , " Fuvu la Kichwa , " ndipo wakamsulubisha Yesu pamoja na wale wahalifu wawili , mmoja upande wake wa kulia na mwingine upande wake wa kushoto .

text: Then said Jesus , Father , forgive them ; for they know not what they do . And they parted his raiment , and cast lots .
text2: Yesu akasema , " Baba , uwasamehe kwa maana hawajui wanalofanya . " Kisha wakagawana mavazi yake kwa kuyapigia kura .

text: And the people stood beholding . And the rulers also with them derided him , saying , He saved others ; let him save himself , if he be Christ , the chosen of God .
text2: Watu wakawa wamesimama pale wakitazama . Nao viongozi wakamdhihaki wakisema : " Amewaokoa wengine ; sasa na ajiokoe mwenyewe , kama yeye ndiye Kristo , mteule wa Mungu ! "

text: And the soldiers also mocked him , coming to him , and offering him vinegar ,
text2: Askari nao walimdhihaki pia ; walimwendea wakampa siki

text: And saying , If thou be the king of the Jews , save thyself .
text2: wakisema : " Kama kweli wewe ni Mfalme wa Wayahudi , jiokoe mwenyewe . "

text: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek , and Latin , and Hebrew , THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Vilevile maandishi haya yalikuwa yameandikwa na kuwekwa juu yake : " Huyu ndiye Mfalme wa Wayahudi . "

text: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him , saying , If thou be Christ , save thyself and us .
text2: Mmoja wa wale wahalifu waliotundikwa msalabani , alimtukana akisema : " Je , si kweli kwamba wewe ndiwe Kristo ? Basi , jiokoe mwenyewe , utuokoe na sisi pia . "

text: But the other answering rebuked him , saying , Dost not thou fear God , seeing thou art in the same condemnation ?
text2: Lakini yule mhalifu mwingine akamkemea mwenzake akisema : " Wewe humwogopi Mungu hata kidogo ? Wewe umepata adhabu hiyohiyo .

text: And we indeed justly ; for we receive the due reward of our deeds : but this man hath done nothing amiss .
text2: Wewe na mimi tunastahili , maana haya ni malipo ya yale tuliyotenda . Lakini mtu huyu hakufanya chochote kibaya . "

text: And he said unto Jesus , Lord , remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom .
text2: Kisha akasema , " Ee Yesu ! Unikumbuke wakati utakapoingia katika ufalme wako . "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , To day shalt thou be with me in paradise .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Nakwambia kwa hakika , leo utakuwa pamoja nami peponi . "

text: And it was about the sixth hour , and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour .
text2: Ilikuwa yapata saa sita mchana ; jua likaacha kuangaza , giza likafunika nchi yote mpaka saa tisa ,

text: And the sun was darkened , and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst .
text2: na pazia lililokuwa limetundikwa Hekaluni likapasuka vipande viwili .

text: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice , he said , Father , into thy hands I commend my spirit : and having said thus , he gave up the ghost .
text2: Yesu akalia kwa sauti kubwa : " Baba , naiweka roho yangu mikononi mwako . " Alipokwisha sema hayo , akakata roho .

text: Now when the centurion saw what was done , he glorified God , saying , Certainly this was a righteous man .
text2: Hapo , yule jemadari alipoona yaliyotukia akamsifu Mungu akisema : " Hakika huyu alikuwa mtu mwema . "

text: And all the people that came together to that sight , beholding the things which were done , smote their breasts , and returned .
text2: Watu wale wote waliokuwa wamekusanyika hapo kwa ajili ya tukio hilo , walipoona hayo yaliyotukia , walirudi makwao wakijipiga vifua kwa huzuni .

text: And all his acquaintance , and the women that followed him from Galilee , stood afar off , beholding these things .
text2: Marafiki zake wote pamoja na wale wanawake walioandamana naye kutoka Galilaya , walisimama kwa mbali kutazama tukio hilo .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Joseph , a counseller ; and he was a good man , and a just :
text2: Kulikuwa na mtu mmoja jina lake Yosefu , mwenyeji wa kijiji kimoja cha Wayahudi kiitwacho Armathaya . Alikuwa mtu mwema anayeheshimika ;

text: ( The same had not consented to the counsel and deed of them ; ) he was of Arimathaea , a city of the Jews : who also himself waited for the kingdom of God .
text2: Alikuwa akitazamia kuja kwa Ufalme wa Mungu . Ingawa alikuwa mmoja wa Baraza kuu la Wayahudi , hakuwa amekubaliana nao katika kitendo chao .

text: This man went unto Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus .
text2: Basi , yeye alikwenda kwa Pilato , akaomba apewe mwili wa Yesu .

text: And he took it down , and wrapped it in linen , and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone , wherein never man before was laid .
text2: Kisha , akaushusha mwili huo kutoka msalabani , akauzungushia sanda ya kitani , akauweka katika kaburi lililokuwa limechongwa kwenye mwamba , ambalo halikuwa limetumika .

text: And that day was the preparation , and the sabbath drew on .
text2: Siku hiyo ilikuwa Ijumaa , na maandalio ya siku ya Sabato yalikuwa yanaanza .

text: And the women also , which came with him from Galilee , followed after , and beheld the sepulchre , and how his body was laid .
text2: Wale wanawake walioandamana na Yesu kutoka Galilaya walimfuata Yosefu , wakaliona lile kaburi na jinsi mwili wake Yesu ulivyowekwa

text: And they returned , and prepared spices and ointments ; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment .
text2: Halafu , walirudi nyumbani , wakatayarisha manukato na marashi kuyapaka mwili wa Yesu . Siku ya Sabato walipumzika kama ilivyoamriwa na sheria .

text: Now upon the first day of the week , very early in the morning , they came unto the sepulchre , bringing the spices which they had prepared , and certain others with them .
text2: Jumapili , alfajiri na mapema , wale wanawake walikwenda kaburini wakichukua yale manukato waliyotayarisha .

text: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre .
text2: Walikuta lile jiwe limeviringishwa mbali na kaburi .

text: And they entered in , and found not the body of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Walipoingia ndani , hawakuona mwili wa Bwana Yesu .

text: And it came to pass , as they were much perplexed thereabout , behold , two men stood by them in shining garments :
text2: Walipokuwa bado wanashangaa juu ya jambo hilo , mara watu wawili waliovaa mavazi yenye kung ' aa sana , wakasimama karibu nao .

text: And as they were afraid , and bowed down their faces to the earth , they said unto them , Why seek ye the living among the dead ?
text2: Hao wanawake wakaingiwa na hofu , wakainama chini . Ndipo wale watu wakawaambia , " Kwa nini mnamtafuta aliye hai kati ya wafu ?

text: He is not here , but is risen : remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee ,
text2: Hayuko hapa ; amefufuka . Kumbukeni aliyowaambieni alipokuwa kule Galilaya :

text: Saying , The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men , and be crucified , and the third day rise again .
text2: Ni lazima Mwana wa Mtu atolewe kwa watu waovu , nao watamsulubisha , na siku ya tatu atafufuka . "

text: And they remembered his words ,
text2: Hapo wanawake wakayakumbuka maneno yake ,

text: And returned from the sepulchre , and told all these things unto the eleven , and to all the rest .
text2: wakarudi kutoka kaburini , wakawapa mitume wale kumi na mmoja na wengine habari za mambo hayo yote .

text: It was Mary Magdalene , and Joanna , and Mary the mother of James , and other women that were with them , which told these things unto the apostles .
text2: Hao waliotoa habari hizo kwa mitume ni : Maria Magdalene , Yoana na Maria mama wa Yakobo , pamoja na wanawake wengine walioandamana nao .

text: And their words seemed to them as idle tales , and they believed them not .
text2: Mitume waliyachukua maneno hayo kama yasiyo na msingi , hivyo hawakuamini .

text: Then arose Peter , and ran unto the sepulchre ; and stooping down , he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves , and departed , wondering in himself at that which was come to pass .
text2: Lakini Petro alitoka , akaenda mbio hadi kaburini . Alipoinama kuchungulia ndani , akaiona tu ile sanda . Akarudi nyumbani huku akiwa anashangaa juu ya hayo yaliyotokea .

text: And , behold , two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus , which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs .
text2: Siku hiyohiyo , wawili kati ya wafuasi wake Yesu wakawa wanakwenda katika kijiji kimoja kiitwacho Emau , umbali wa kilomita kumi na moja kutoka Yerusalemu .

text: And they talked together of all these things which had happened .
text2: Wakawa wanazungumza juu ya hayo yote yaliyotukia .

text: And it came to pass , that , while they communed together and reasoned , Jesus himself drew near , and went with them .
text2: Walipokuwa wakizungumza na kujadiliana , Yesu mwenyewe akatokea , akatembea pamoja nao .

text: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him .
text2: Walimwona kwa macho , lakini hawakumtambua .

text: And he said unto them , What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another , as ye walk , and are sad ?
text2: Akawauliza , " Mnazungumza nini huku mnatembea ? " Nao wakasimama kimya , nyuso zao wamezikunja kwa huzuni .

text: And the one of them , whose name was Cleopas , answering said unto him , Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem , and hast not known the things which are come to pass therein these days ?
text2: Mmoja , aitwaye Kleopa , akamjibu , " Je , wewe ni mgeni peke yako Yerusalemu ambaye hujui yaliyotukia huko siku hizi ? "

text: And he said unto them , What things ? And they said unto him , Concerning Jesus of Nazareth , which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people :
text2: Naye akawajibu , " Mambo gani ? " Wao wakamjibu , " Mambo yaliyompata Yesu wa Nazareti . Yeye alikuwa nabii mwenye uwezo wa kutenda na kufundisha mbele ya Mungu na mbele ya watu wote .

text: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death , and have crucified him .
text2: Makuhani na watawala wetu walimtoa ahukumiwe kufa , wakamsulubisha .

text: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel : and beside all this , to day is the third day since these things were done .
text2: Lakini sisi tulitumaini kwamba yeye ndiye angeikomboa Israeli . Zaidi ya hayo yote , leo ni siku ya tatu tangu mambo hayo yalipotendeka .

text: Yea , and certain women also of our company made us astonished , which were early at the sepulchre ;
text2: Tena , wanawake wengine wa kwetu wametushtua . Walikwenda kaburini mapema asubuhi ,

text: And when they found not his body , they came , saying , that they had also seen a vision of angels , which said that he was alive .
text2: wasiukute mwili wake . Wakarudi wakasema kwamba walitokewa na malaika waliowaambia kwamba alikuwa hai .

text: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre , and found it even so as the women had said : but him they saw not .
text2: Wengine wetu walikwenda kaburini wakashuhudia yale waliyosema hao wanawake ; ila yeye hawakumwona . "

text: Then he said unto them , O fools , and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken :
text2: Kisha Yesu akawaambia , " Mbona mu wapumbavu kiasi hicho na mioyo yenu ni mizito hivyo kusadiki yote yaliyonenwa na manabii ?

text: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things , and to enter into his glory ?
text2: Je , haikumpasa Kristo kuteswa , na hivyo aingie katika utukufu wake ? "

text: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets , he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself .
text2: Akawafafanulia mambo yote yaliyomhusu yeye katika Maandiko Matakatifu kuanzia Mose hadi manabii wote .

text: And they drew nigh unto the village , whither they went : and he made as though he would have gone further .
text2: Walipokikaribia kile kijiji walikokuwa wanakwenda , Yesu akafanya kana kwamba anaendelea na safari ;

text: But they constrained him , saying , Abide with us : for it is toward evening , and the day is far spent . And he went in to tarry with them .
text2: lakini wao wakamsihi wakisema , " Kaa pamoja nasi , maana kunakuchwa , na usiku unakaribia . " Basi , akaingia kijijini , akakaa pamoja nao .

text: And it came to pass , as he sat at meat with them , he took bread , and blessed it , and brake , and gave to them .
text2: Alipoketi kula chakula pamoja nao , akachukua mkate , akaubariki , akaumega , akawapa .

text: And their eyes were opened , and they knew him ; and he vanished out of their sight .
text2: Mara macho yao yakafumbuliwa , wakamtambua ; lakini yeye akatoweka kati yao .

text: And they said one to another , Did not our heart burn within us , while he talked with us by the way , and while he opened to us the scriptures ?
text2: Basi , wakaambiana , " Je , mioyo yetu haikuwa inawaka ndani yetu wakati alipokuwa anatufafanulia Maandiko Matakatifu kule njiani ? "

text: And they rose up the same hour , and returned to Jerusalem , and found the eleven gathered together , and them that were with them ,
text2: Wakaondoka saa ileile , wakarudi Yerusalemu : wakawakuta wale mitume kumi na mmoja na wale wengine waliokuwa pamoja nao , wamekusanyika

text: Saying , The Lord is risen indeed , and hath appeared to Simon .
text2: wakisema , " Hakika Bwana amefufuka , amemtokea Simoni . "

text: And they told what things were done in the way , and how he was known of them in breaking of bread .
text2: Basi , hao wafuasi wawili wakawajulisha yale yaliyowapata njiani , na jinsi walivyomtambua katika kumega mkate .

text: And as they thus spake , Jesus himself stood in the midst of them , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Wanafunzi wote wawili walipokuwa wakiwaambia hayo , Yesu mwenyewe akasimama kati yao , akawaambia " Amani kwenu . "

text: But they were terrified and affrighted , and supposed that they had seen a spirit .
text2: Wakashtuka na kushikwa na hofu wakidhani wameona mzimu .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye troubled ? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts ?
text2: Lakini yeye akawaambia , " Kwa nini mnafadhaika ? Mbona mnakuwa na mashaka mioyoni mwenu ?

text: Behold my hands and my feet , that it is I myself : handle me , and see ; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones , as ye see me have .
text2: Angalieni mikono na miguu yangu , ya kwamba ni mimi mwenyewe . Nipapaseni mkanione , maana mzimu hauna mwili na mifupa kama mnionavyo . "

text: And when he had thus spoken , he shewed them his hands and his feet .
text2: Baada ya kusema hayo , akawaonyesha mikono na miguu .

text: And while they yet believed not for joy , and wondered , he said unto them , Have ye here any meat ?
text2: Wakiwa bado katika hali ya kutosadiki kwa sababu ya furaha yao , na wakiwa wanastaajabu , akawauliza , " Mnacho chakula chochote hapa ? "

text: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish , and of an honeycomb .
text2: Wakampa kipande cha samaki wa kuokwa .

text: And he took it , and did eat before them .
text2: Akakichukua , akala , wote wakimwona .

text: And he said unto them , These are the words which I spake unto you , while I was yet with you , that all things must be fulfilled , which were written in the law of Moses , and in the prophets , and in the psalms , concerning me .
text2: Halafu akawaambia , " Hii ndiyo maana ya maneno niliyowaambia nilipokuwa pamoja nanyi : kwamba ilikuwa lazima kukamilisha yote yaliyoandikwa juu yangu katika Sheria ya Mose na katika vitabu vya manabii na katika kitabu cha Zaburi . "

text: Then opened he their understanding , that they might understand the scriptures ,
text2: Kisha , akaziangazia akili zao ili wapate kuelewa Maandiko Matakatifu .

text: And said unto them , Thus it is written , and thus it behoved Christ to suffer , and to rise from the dead the third day :
text2: Akawaambia , " Ndivyo ilivyoandikwa , kwamba Kristo atateswa na siku ya tatu atafufuka kutoka wafu ,

text: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations , beginning at Jerusalem .
text2: na kwamba ni lazima , kwa jina lake , mataifa yote kuanzia na Yerusalemu yahubiriwe juu ya kutubu na kusamehewa dhambi .

text: And ye are witnesses of these things .
text2: Ninyi ni mashahidi wa mambo hayo .

text: And , behold , I send the promise of my Father upon you : but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem , until ye be endued with power from on high .
text2: Nami mwenyewe nitawapelekeeni yule ambaye Baba aliahidi kumtuma , lakini ngojeni huku mjini mpaka mtakapopewa ile nguvu itokayo juu . "

text: And he led them out as far as to Bethany , and he lifted up his hands , and blessed them .
text2: Kisha akawaongoza nje ya mji hadi Bethania , akainua mikono yake juu , akawabariki .

text: And it came to pass , while he blessed them , he was parted from them , and carried up into heaven .
text2: Alipokuwa anawabariki , akawaacha ; akachukuliwa mbinguni .

text: And they worshipped him , and returned to Jerusalem with great joy :
text2: Wao wakamwabudu , wakarudi Yerusalemu wakiwa na furaha kubwa :

text: And were continually in the temple , praising and blessing God . Amen .
text2: wakakaa muda wote Hekaluni wakimsifu Mungu .

text: In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and the Word was God .
text2: Hapo Mwanzo , Neno alikuwako ; naye alikuwa na Mungu , naye alikuwa Mungu .

text: The same was in the beginning with God .
text2: Tangu mwanzo Neno alikuwa na Mungu .
