text: All things were made by him ; and without him was not any thing made that was made .
text2: Kwa njia yake vitu vyote viliumbwa ; hakuna hata kiumbe kimoja kilichoumbwa pasipo yeye .

text: In him was life ; and the life was the light of men .
text2: Yeye alikuwa chanzo cha uhai na uhai huo ulikuwa mwanga wa watu .

text: And the light shineth in darkness ; and the darkness comprehended it not .
text2: Na mwanga huo huangaza gizani , nalo giza halikuweza kuushinda .

text: There was a man sent from God , whose name was John .
text2: Mungu alimtuma mtu mmoja jina lake Yohane ,

text: The same came for a witness , to bear witness of the Light , that all men through him might believe .
text2: ambaye alikuja kuwaambia watu juu ya huo mwanga . Alikuja ili kwa ujumbe wake watu wote wapate kuamini .

text: He was not that Light , but was sent to bear witness of that Light .
text2: Yeye hakuwa huo mwanga , ila alikuja tu kuwaambia watu juu ya huo mwanga .

text: That was the true Light , which lighteth every man that cometh into the world .
text2: Huu ndio mwanga halisi , mwanga unaokuja ulimwenguni , na kuwaangazia watu wote .

text: He was in the world , and the world was made by him , and the world knew him not .
text2: Basi , Neno alikuwako ulimwenguni ; na kwa njia yake ulimwengu uliumbwa , lakini ulimwengu haukumtambua .

text: He came unto his own , and his own received him not .
text2: Alikuja katika nchi yake mwenyewe , nao walio wake hawakumpokea .

text: But as many as received him , to them gave he power to become the sons of God , even to them that believe on his name :
text2: Lakini wale wote waliompokea na kumwamini , hao aliwapa uwezo wa kuwa watoto wa Mungu .

text: Which were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
text2: Hawa wamekuwa watoto wa Mungu si kwa uwezo wa kibinadamu , wala kwa nguvu za kimwili , wala kwa mapenzi ya mtu , bali Mungu mwenyewe ndiye baba yao .

text: And the Word was made flesh , and dwelt among us , ( and we beheld his glory , the glory as of the only begotten of the Father , ) full of grace and truth .
text2: Naye Neno akawa mwanadamu , akakaa kwetu . Nasi tumeuona utukufu wake , utukufu wake yeye aliye Mwana wa pekee wa Baba ; amejaa neema na ukweli .

text: John bare witness of him , and cried , saying , This was he of whom I spake , He that cometh after me is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Yohane aliwaambia watu habari zake , akasema kwa sauti , " Huyu ndiye niliyemtaja wakati niliposema : Anakuja mtu mmoja baada yangu ambaye ni mkuu kuliko mimi , maana alikuwako kabla mimi sijazaliwa . "

text: And of his fulness have all we received , and grace for grace .
text2: Kutokana na ukamilifu wake sisi tumepokea neema mfululizo .

text: For the law was given by Moses , but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ .
text2: Maana Mungu alitoa Sheria kwa njia ya Mose , lakini neema na kweli vimekuja kwa njia ya Kristo .

text: No man hath seen God at any time ; the only begotten Son , which is in the bosom of the Father , he hath declared him .
text2: Hakuna mtu aliyemwona Mungu wakati wowote ule . Mwana wa pekee aliye sawa na Mungu ambaye ameungana na Baba , ndiye aliyetujulisha habari za Mungu .

text: And this is the record of John , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , Who art thou ?
text2: Huu ndio ushahidi Yohane alioutoa wakati viongozi wa Wayahudi kule Yerusalemu walipowatuma makuhani wa Walawi kwake wamwulize : " Wewe u nani ? "

text: And he confessed , and denied not ; but confessed , I am not the Christ .
text2: Yohane hakukataa kujibu swali hilo , bali alisema waziwazi , " Mimi siye Kristo . "

text: And they asked him , What then ? Art thou Elias ? And he saith , I am not . Art thou that prophet ? And he answered , No .
text2: Hapo wakamwuliza , " Basi , wewe ni nani ? Je , wewe ni Eliya ? " Yohane akajibu , " La , mimi siye . " Wakamwuliza , " Je , wewe ni yule nabii ? " Yohane akawajibu , " La ! "

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? that we may give an answer to them that sent us . What sayest thou of thyself ?
text2: Nao wakamwuliza , " Basi , wewe ni nani ? Wasema nini juu yako mwenyewe ? Tuambie , ili tuwapelekee jibu wale waliotutuma . "

text: He said , I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness , Make straight the way of the Lord , as said the prophet Esaias .
text2: Yohane akawajibu , " Mimi ndiye yule ambaye nabii Isaya alisema habari zake : Sauti ya mtu imesikika jangwani : Nyoosheni njia ya Bwana . "

text: And they which were sent were of the Pharisees .
text2: Hao watu walikuwa wametumwa na Mafarisayo .

text: And they asked him , and said unto him , Why baptizest thou then , if thou be not that Christ , nor Elias , neither that prophet ?
text2: Basi , wakamwuliza Yohane , " Kama wewe si Kristo , wala Eliya , wala yule nabii , mbona wabatiza ? "

text: John answered them , saying , I baptize with water : but there standeth one among you , whom ye know not ;
text2: Yohane akawajibu , " Mimi nabatiza kwa maji , lakini yuko mmoja kati yenu , msiyemjua bado .

text: He it is , who coming after me is preferred before me , whose shoe ' s latchet I am not worthy to unloose .
text2: Huyo anakuja baada yangu , lakini mimi sistahili hata kumfungua kamba za viatu vyake . "

text: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan , where John was baptizing .
text2: Mambo haya yalifanyika huko Bethania , ng ' ambo ya mto Yordani ambako Yohane alikuwa anabatiza .

text: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him , and saith , Behold the Lamb of God , which taketh away the sin of the world .
text2: Kesho yake , Yohane alimwona Yesu akimjia , akasema , " Huyu ndiye Mwana - kondoo wa Mungu aondoaye dhambi ya ulimwengu !

text: This is he of whom I said , After me cometh a man which is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Huyu ndiye niliyesema juu yake : Baada yangu anakuja mtu mmoja aliye mkuu zaidi kuliko mimi , maana alikuwako kabla mimi sijazaliwa !

text: And I knew him not : but that he should be made manifest to Israel , therefore am I come baptizing with water .
text2: Mimi mwenyewe sikumfahamu , lakini nimekuja kubatiza kwa maji ili watu wa Israeli wapate kumjua . "

text: And John bare record , saying , I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove , and it abode upon him .
text2: Huu ndio ushahidi Yohane alioutoa : " Nilimwona Roho akishuka kama njiwa kutoka mbinguni na kutua juu yake .

text: And I knew him not : but he that sent me to baptize with water , the same said unto me , Upon whom thou shalt see the Spirit descending , and remaining on him , the same is he which baptizeth with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Mimi sikumjua , lakini yule aliyenituma nikabatize watu kwa maji alikuwa ameniambia : Mtu yule utakayemwona Roho akimshukia kutoka mbinguni na kukaa juu yake , huyo ndiye anayebatiza kwa Roho Mtakatifu .

text: And I saw , and bare record that this is the Son of God .
text2: Mimi nimeona na ninawaambieni kwamba huyu ndiye Mwana wa Mungu . "

text: Again the next day after John stood , and two of his disciples ;
text2: Kesho yake , Yohane alikuwa tena mahali hapo pamoja na wanafunzi wake wawili .

text: And looking upon Jesus as he walked , he saith , Behold the Lamb of God !
text2: Alipomwona Yesu akipita akasema , " Tazameni ! Huyu ndiye Mwana - kondoo wa Mungu . "

text: And the two disciples heard him speak , and they followed Jesus .
text2: Hao wanafunzi walimsikia Yohane akisema maneno hayo , wakamfuata Yesu .

text: Then Jesus turned , and saw them following , and saith unto them , What seek ye ? They said unto him , Rabbi , ( which is to say , being interpreted , Master , ) where dwellest thou ?
text2: Basi , Yesu aligeuka , na alipowaona hao wanafunzi wanamfuata , akawauliza , " Mnatafuta nini ? " Nao wakamjibu , " Rabi ( yaani Mwalimu ) , unakaa wapi ? "

text: He saith unto them , Come and see . They came and saw where he dwelt , and abode with him that day : for it was about the tenth hour .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Njoni , nanyi mtaona . " Hao wanafunzi wakamfuata , wakaona mahali alipokuwa anakaa , wakashinda naye siku hiyo . Ilikuwa yapata saa kumi jioni .

text: One of the two which heard John speak , and followed him , was Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother .
text2: Andrea , nduguye Simoni Petro , alikuwa mmoja wa hao wawili waliokuwa wamemsikia Yohane akisema hivyo , wakamfuata Yesu .

text: He first findeth his own brother Simon , and saith unto him , We have found the Messias , which is , being interpreted , the Christ .
text2: Andrea alimkuta kwanza Simoni , ndugu yake , akamwambia , " Tumemwona Masiha " ( maana yake Kristo ) .

text: And he brought him to Jesus . And when Jesus beheld him , he said , Thou art Simon the son of Jona : thou shalt be called Cephas , which is by interpretation , A stone .
text2: Kisha akampeleka Simoni kwa Yesu . Naye Yesu akamtazama Simoni akasema , " Wewe ni Simoni mwana wa Yohane . Sasa utaitwa Kefa . " ( maana yake ni Petro , yaani , " Mwamba . " )

text: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee , and findeth Philip , and saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Kesho yake Yesu aliamua kwenda Galilaya . Basi , akamkuta Filipo , akamwambia , " Nifuate . "

text: Now Philip was of Bethsaida , the city of Andrew and Peter .
text2: Filipo alikuwa mwenyeji wa Bethsaida , mji wa akina Andrea na Petro .

text: Philip findeth Nathanael , and saith unto him , We have found him , of whom Moses in the law , and the prophets , did write , Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph .
text2: Naye Filipo akamkuta Nathanieli , akamwambia , " Tumemwona yule ambaye Mose aliandika juu yake katika kitabu cha Sheria , na ambaye manabii waliandika habari zake , yaani Yesu Mwana wa Yosefu , kutoka Nazareti . "

text: And Nathanael said unto him , Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth ? Philip saith unto him , Come and see .
text2: Naye Nathanieli akamwuliza Filipo , " Je , kitu chema chaweza kutoka Nazareti ? " Filipo akamwambia , " Njoo uone . "

text: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him , and saith of him , Behold an Israelite indeed , in whom is no guile !
text2: Yesu alipomwona Nathanieli akimjia alisema juu yake , " Tazameni ! Huyo ni Mwisraeli halisi : hamna hila ndani yake . "

text: Nathanael saith unto him , Whence knowest thou me ? Jesus answered and said unto him , Before that Philip called thee , when thou wast under the fig tree , I saw thee .
text2: Naye Nathanieli akamwuliza , " Umepataje kunijua ? " Yesu akamwambia , " Ulipokuwa chini ya mtini hata kabla Filipo hajakuita , nilikuona . "

text: Nathanael answered and saith unto him , Rabbi , thou art the Son of God ; thou art the King of Israel .
text2: Hapo Nathanieli akamwambia , " Mwalimu , wewe ni Mwana wa Mungu . Wewe ni Mfalme wa Israeli ! "

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Because I said unto thee , I saw thee under the fig tree , believest thou ? thou shalt see greater things than these .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Je , umeamini kwa kuwa nimekwambia kwamba nilikuona chini ya mtini ? Utaona makubwa zaidi kuliko haya . "

text: And he saith unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Hereafter ye shall see heaven open , and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man .
text2: Yesu akaendelea kusema , " Nawaambieni kweli , mtaona mbingu zinafunguka na malaika wa Mungu wakipanda na kushuka juu ya Mwana wa Mtu . "

text: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee ; and the mother of Jesus was there :
text2: Siku ya tatu kulikuwa na arusi mjini Kana , mkoani Galilaya . Mama yake Yesu alikuwapo ,

text: And both Jesus was called , and his disciples , to the marriage .
text2: naye Yesu alikuwa amealikwa arusini pamoja na wanafunzi wake .

text: And when they wanted wine , the mother of Jesus saith unto him , They have no wine .
text2: Divai ilipokwisha , mama yake akamwambia , " Hawana divai ! "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , what have I to do with thee ? mine hour is not yet come .
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Mama , usiniambie la kufanya . Saa yangu bado . "

text: His mother saith unto the servants , Whatsoever he saith unto you , do it .
text2: Hapo mama yake akawaambia watumishi , " Lolote atakalowaambieni , fanyeni . "

text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone , after the manner of the purifying of the Jews , containing two or three firkins apiece .
text2: Hapo palikuwa na mitungi sita ya mawe , ambayo kila mmoja uliweza kuchukua kiasi cha madebe mawili au matatu . Ilikuwa imewekwa hapo kufuatana na desturi ya Kiyahudi ya kutawadha .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Fill the waterpots with water . And they filled them up to the brim .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Ijazeni mitungi hiyo maji . " Nao wakaijaza mpaka juu .

text: And he saith unto them , Draw out now , and bear unto the governor of the feast . And they bare it .
text2: Kisha akawaambia , " Sasa choteni mkampelekee mkuu wa karamu . "

text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine , and knew not whence it was : ( but the servants which drew the water knew ; ) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom ,
text2: Mkuu wa karamu alipoonja hayo maji , kumbe yalikuwa yamegeuka kuwa divai . Yeye hakujua ilikotoka , ( lakini wale watumishi waliochota maji walijua ) . Mkuu wa karamu akamwita bwana arusi ,

text: And saith unto him , Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine ; and when men have well drunk , then that which is worse : but thou hast kept the good wine until now .
text2: akamwambia , " Kila mtu huandaa divai nzuri kwanza hata wakisha tosheka huandaa ile hafifu . Lakini wewe umeiweka divai nzuri mpaka sasa ! "

text: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee , and manifested forth his glory ; and his disciples believed on him .
text2: Yesu alifanya ishara hii ya kwanza huko Kana , Galilaya , akaonyesha utukufu wake ; nao wanafunzi wake wakamwamini .

text: After this he went down to Capernaum , he , and his mother , and his brethren , and his disciples : and they continued there not many days .
text2: Baada ya hayo , Yesu alishuka pamoja na mama yake , ndugu zake na wanafunzi wake , wakaenda Kafarnaumu ambako walikaa kwa siku chache .

text: And the Jews ' passover was at hand , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem ,
text2: Sikukuu ya Wayahudi ya Pasaka ilikuwa imekaribia ; hivyo Yesu akaenda Yerusalemu .

text: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves , and the changers of money sitting :
text2: Hekaluni aliwakuta watu wakiuza ng ' ombe , kondoo na njiwa , na wavunja fedha walikuwa wamekaa kwenye meza zao .

text: And when he had made a scourge of small cords , he drove them all out of the temple , and the sheep , and the oxen ; and poured out the changers ' money , and overthrew the tables ;
text2: Akatengeneza mjeledi wa kamba , akawafukuza wote nje ya Hekalu pamoja na kondoo na ng ' ombe wao , akazimwaga sarafu za wenye kuvunja fedha na kupindua meza zao .

text: And said unto them that sold doves , Take these things hence ; make not my Father ' s house an house of merchandise .
text2: Akawaambia wale waliokuwa wanauza njiwa , " Ondoeni vitu hivi hapa . Msiifanye nyumba ya Baba yangu kuwa soko ! "

text: And his disciples remembered that it was written , The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up .
text2: Wanafunzi wake wakakumbuka kwamba Maandiko yasema : " Upendo wangu kwa nyumba yako waniua . "

text: Then answered the Jews and said unto him , What sign shewest thou unto us , seeing that thou doest these things ?
text2: Baadhi ya Wayahudi wakamwuliza Yesu , " Utafanya muujiza gani kuonyesha kwamba unayo haki kufanya mambo haya ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Vunjeni Hekalu hili , nami nitalijenga kwa siku tatu . "

text: Then said the Jews , Forty and six years was this temple in building , and wilt thou rear it up in three days ?
text2: Hapo Wayahudi wakasema , " Hekalu hili lilijengwa kwa muda wa miaka arobaini na sita . Je , wewe utalijenga kwa siku tatu ? "

text: But he spake of the temple of his body .
text2: Lakini Yesu alikuwa anaongea juu ya Hekalu ambalo ni mwili wake .

text: When therefore he was risen from the dead , his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them ; and they believed the scripture , and the word which Jesus had said .
text2: Basi , alipofufuliwa kutoka wafu , wanafunzi wake walikumbuka kwamba alikuwa amesema hayo , wakaamini Maandiko Matakatifu na yale maneno aliyokuwa akisema Yesu .

text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover , in the feast day , many believed in his name , when they saw the miracles which he did .
text2: Yesu alipokuwa Yerusalemu kwa sikukuu ya Pasaka , watu wengi walimwamini walipoona ishara alizozifanya .

text: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them , because he knew all men ,
text2: Lakini Yesu hakuwa na imani nao kwa sababu aliwajua wote .

text: And needed not that any should testify of man : for he knew what was in man .
text2: Hakuhitaji kuambiwa chochote juu ya watu , maana aliyajua barabara mambo yote yaliyomo mioyoni mwao .

text: There was a man of the Pharisees , named Nicodemus , a ruler of the Jews :
text2: Kulikuwa na kiongozi mmoja Myahudi , wa kikundi cha Mafarisayo , jina lake Nikodemo .

text: The same came to Jesus by night , and said unto him , Rabbi , we know that thou art a teacher come from God : for no man can do these miracles that thou doest , except God be with him .
text2: Siku moja alimwendea Yesu usiku , akamwambia , " Rabi , tunajua kwamba wewe ni mwalimu uliyetumwa na Mungu , maana hakuna mtu awezaye kufanya ishara unazozifanya Mungu asipokuwa pamoja naye . "

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born again , he cannot see the kingdom of God .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Kweli nakwambia , mtu asipozaliwa upya hataweza kuuona ufalme wa Mungu . "

text: Nicodemus saith unto him , How can a man be born when he is old ? can he enter the second time into his mother ' s womb , and be born ?
text2: Nikodemo akamwuliza , " Mtu mzima awezaje kuzaliwa tena ? Hawezi kuingia tumboni mwa mama yake na kuzaliwa mara ya pili ! "

text: Jesus answered , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit , he cannot enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Kweli nakwambia , mtu asipozaliwa kwa maji na Roho , hawezi kamwe kuingia katika ufalme wa Mungu .

text: That which is born of the flesh is flesh ; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit .
text2: Mtu huzaliwa kimwili kwa baba na mama , lakini huzaliwa kiroho kwa Roho .

text: Marvel not that I said unto thee , Ye must be born again .
text2: Usistaajabu kwamba nimekwambia kuwa ni lazima kuzaliwa upya .

text: The wind bloweth where it listeth , and thou hearest the sound thereof , but canst not tell whence it cometh , and whither it goeth : so is every one that is born of the Spirit .
text2: Upepo huvuma kuelekea upendako ; waisikia sauti yake , lakini hujui unakotoka wala unakokwenda . Ndivyo ilivyo kwa mtu aliyezaliwa kwa Roho . "

text: Nicodemus answered and said unto him , How can these things be ?
text2: Nikodemo akamwuliza , " Mambo haya yanawezekanaje ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Art thou a master of Israel , and knowest not these things ?
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Je , wewe ni mwalimu katika Israel na huyajui mambo haya ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , We speak that we do know , and testify that we have seen ; and ye receive not our witness .
text2: Kweli nakwambia , sisi twasema tunayoyajua na kushuhudia tuliyoyaona , lakini ninyi hamkubali ujumbe wetu .

text: If I have told you earthly things , and ye believe not , how shall ye believe , if I tell you of heavenly things ?
text2: Ikiwa nimewaambieni mambo ya kidunia nanyi hamniamini , mtawezaje kuamini nikiwaambieni mambo ya mbinguni ?

text: And no man hath ascended up to heaven , but he that came down from heaven , even the Son of man which is in heaven .
text2: Hakuna mtu aliyepata kwenda juu mbinguni isipokuwa Mwana wa Mtu ambaye ameshuka kutoka mbinguni .

text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the Son of man be lifted up :
text2: " Kama vile Mose alivyomwinua juu nyoka wa shaba kule jangwani , naye Mwana wa Mtu atainuliwa juu vivyo hivyo ,

text: That whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have eternal life .
text2: ili kila anayemwamini awe na uzima wa milele .

text: For God so loved the world , that he gave his only begotten Son , that whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have everlasting life .
text2: Maana Mungu aliupenda ulimwengu hivi hata akamtoa Mwana wake wa pekee , ili kila amwaminiye asipotee , bali awe na uzima wa milele .

text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world ; but that the world through him might be saved .
text2: Maana Mungu hakumtuma Mwanae ulimwenguni ili auhukumu ulimwengu , bali aukomboe ulimwengu .

text: He that believeth on him is not condemned : but he that believeth not is condemned already , because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God .
text2: " Anayemwamini Mwana hahukumiwi ; asiyemwamini amekwisha hukumiwa kwa sababu hakumwamini Mwana wa pekee wa Mungu .

text: And this is the condemnation , that light is come into the world , and men loved darkness rather than light , because their deeds were evil .
text2: Na hukumu yenyewe ndiyo hii : Mwanga umekuja ulimwenguni lakini watu wakapenda giza kuliko mwanga , kwani matendo yao ni maovu .

text: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light , neither cometh to the light , lest his deeds should be reproved .
text2: Kila mtu atendaye maovu anauchukia mwanga , wala haji kwenye mwanga , maana hapendi matendo yake maovu yamulikwe .

text: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light , that his deeds may be made manifest , that they are wrought in God .
text2: Lakini mwenye kuuzingatia ukweli huja kwenye mwanga , ili matendo yake yaonekane yametendwa kwa kumtii Mungu . "

text: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea ; and there he tarried with them , and baptized .
text2: Baada ya hayo , Yesu alifika mkoani Yudea pamoja na wanafunzi wake . Alikaa huko pamoja nao kwa muda , akibatiza watu .

text: And John also was baptizing in Aenon near to Salim , because there was much water there : and they came , and were baptized .
text2: Yohane pia alikuwa akibatiza watu huko Ainoni , karibu na Salemu , maana huko kulikuwa na maji mengi . Watu walimwendea , naye akawabatiza .

text: For John was not yet cast into prison .
text2: ( Wakati huo Yohane alikuwa bado hajafungwa gerezani . )

text: Then there arose a question between some of John ' s disciples and the Jews about purifying .
text2: Ubishi ulitokea kati ya baadhi ya wanafunzi wa Yohane na Myahudi mmoja kuhusu desturi za kutawadha .

text: And they came unto John , and said unto him , Rabbi , he that was with thee beyond Jordan , to whom thou barest witness , behold , the same baptizeth , and all men come to him .
text2: Basi , wanafunzi hao wakamwendea Yohane na kumwambia , " Mwalimu , yule mtu aliyekuwa pamoja nawe ng ' ambo ya Yordani na ambaye wewe ulimshuhudia , sasa naye anabatiza , na watu wote wanamwendea . "

text: John answered and said , A man can receive nothing , except it be given him from heaven .
text2: Yohane akawaambia , " Mtu hawezi kuwa na kitu asipopewa na Mungu .

text: Ye yourselves bear me witness , that I said , I am not the Christ , but that I am sent before him .
text2: Nanyi wenyewe mwaweza kushuhudia kuwa nilisema : Mimi siye Kristo , lakini nimetumwa ili nimtangulie !

text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom : but the friend of the bridegroom , which standeth and heareth him , rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom ' s voice : this my joy therefore is fulfilled .
text2: Bibiarusi ni wake bwanaarusi , lakini rafiki yake bwana arusi , anayesimama na kusikiliza , hufurahi sana anapomsikia bwana arusi akisema . Ndivyo furaha yangu ilivyokamilishwa .

text: He must increase , but I must decrease .
text2: Ni lazima yeye azidi kuwa maarufu , na mimi nipungue .

text: He that cometh from above is above all : he that is of the earth is earthly , and speaketh of the earth : he that cometh from heaven is above all .
text2: " Anayekuja kutoka juu ni mkuu kuliko wote ; atokaye duniani ni wa dunia , na huongea mambo ya kidunia . Lakini anayekuja kutoka mbinguni ni mkuu kuliko wote .

text: And what he hath seen and heard , that he testifieth ; and no man receiveth his testimony .
text2: Yeye husema yale aliyoyaona na kuyasikia , lakini hakuna mtu anayekubali ujumbe wake .

text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true .
text2: Lakini mtu yeyote anayekubali ujumbe wake anathibitisha kwamba Mungu ni kweli .

text: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God : for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him .
text2: Yule aliyetumwa na Mungu husema maneno ya Mungu , maana Mungu humjalia mtu huyo Roho wake bila kipimo .

text: The Father loveth the Son , and hath given all things into his hand .
text2: Baba anampenda Mwana na amemkabidhi vitu vyote .

text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life : and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life ; but the wrath of God abideth on him .
text2: Anayemwamini Mwana anao uzima wa milele ; asiyemtii Mwana hatakuwa na uzima wa milele , bali ghadhabu ya Mungu hubaki juu yake . "

text: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John ,
text2: Mafarisayo walisikia kwamba Yesu alikuwa anabatiza na kuwapata wanafunzi wengi kuliko Yohane .

text: ( Though Jesus himself baptized not , but his disciples , )
text2: ( Lakini ukweli ni kwamba Yesu hakuwa anabatiza ila wanafunzi wake . )

text: He left Judaea , and departed again into Galilee .
text2: Basi , Yesu aliposikia hayo , alitoka Yudea akarudi Galilaya ;

text: And he must needs go through Samaria .
text2: na katika safari hiyo ilimbidi apitie Samaria .

text: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria , which is called Sychar , near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
text2: Basi , akafika Sukari , mji mmoja wa Samaria , karibu na shamba ambalo Yakobo alikuwa amempa mwanawe , Yosefu .

text: Now Jacob ' s well was there . Jesus therefore , being wearied with his journey , sat thus on the well : and it was about the sixth hour .
text2: Mahali hapo palikuwa na kisima cha Yakobo , naye Yesu , kutokana na uchovu wa safari , akaketi kando ya kisima . Ilikuwa yapata saa sita mchana .

text: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water : Jesus saith unto her , Give me to drink .
text2: Basi , mwanamke mmoja Msamaria akafika kuteka maji . Yesu akamwambia , " Nipatie maji ninywe . "

text: ( For his disciples were gone away unto the city to buy meat . )
text2: ( Wakati huo wanafunzi wake walikuwa wamekwenda mjini kununua chakula . )

text: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him , How is it that thou , being a Jew , askest drink of me , which am a woman of Samaria ? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans .
text2: Lakini huyo mwanamke akamwambia , " Wewe ni Myahudi ; mimi ni mwanamke Msamaria ! Unawezaje kuniomba maji ? " ( Wayahudi hawakuwa na ushirikiano na Wasamaria katika matumizi ya vitu . )

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , If thou knewest the gift of God , and who it is that saith to thee , Give me to drink ; thou wouldest have asked of him , and he would have given thee living water .
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Kama tu ungalijua zawadi ya Mungu na ni nani anayekwambia : Nipatie maji ninywe , ungalikwisha mwomba , naye angekupa maji yaliyo hai . "

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , thou hast nothing to draw with , and the well is deep : from whence then hast thou that living water ?
text2: Huyo mama akasema , " Mheshimiwa , wewe huna chombo cha kutekea maji , nacho kisima ni kirefu ; utapata wapi maji yaliyo hai ?

text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob , which gave us the well , and drank thereof himself , and his children , and his cattle ?
text2: Au , labda wewe wajifanya mkuu kuliko babu yetu Yakobo ? Yeye alitupa sisi kisima hiki ; na yeye mwenyewe , watoto wake na mifugo yake walikunywa maji ya kisima hiki . "

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Kila anayekunywa maji haya ataona kiu tena .

text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst ; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life .
text2: Lakini atakayekunywa maji nitakayompa mimi , hataona kiu milele . Maji nitakayompa yatakuwa ndani yake chemchemi ya maji ya uzima na kumpatia uzima wa milele . "

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , give me this water , that I thirst not , neither come hither to draw .
text2: Huyo mwanamke akamwambia , " Mheshimiwa , nipe maji hayo ili nisione kiu tena ; nisije tena mpaka hapa kuteka maji . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Go , call thy husband , and come hither .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Nenda ukamwite mumeo uje naye hapa . "

text: The woman answered and said , I have no husband . Jesus said unto her , Thou hast well said , I have no husband :
text2: Huyo mwanamke akamwambia , " Mimi sina mume . " Yesu akamwambia , " Umesema kweli , kwamba huna mume .

text: For thou hast had five husbands ; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband : in that saidst thou truly .
text2: Maana umekuwa na waume watano , na huyo unayeishi naye sasa si mume wako . Hapo umesema kweli . "

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , I perceive that thou art a prophet .
text2: Huyo Mwanamke akamwambia , " Mheshimiwa , naona ya kuwa wewe u nabii .

text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain ; and ye say , that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship .
text2: Babu zetu waliabudu juu ya mlima huu , lakini ninyi mwasema kwamba mahali pa kumwabudu Mungu ni kule Yerusalemu . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , believe me , the hour cometh , when ye shall neither in this mountain , nor yet at Jerusalem , worship the Father .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Niamini ; wakati unakuja ambapo hamtamwabudu Baba juu ya mlima huu , wala kule Yerusalemu .

text: Ye worship ye know not what : we know what we worship : for salvation is of the Jews .
text2: Ninyi Wasamaria mnamwabudu yule msiyemjua , lakini sisi tunamjua huyo tunayemwabudu , kwa maana wokovu unatoka kwa Wayahudi .

text: But the hour cometh , and now is , when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth : for the Father seeketh such to worship him .
text2: Lakini wakati unakuja , tena umekwisha fika , ambapo wanaoabudu kweli , watamwabudu Baba kwa nguvu ya Roho ; watu wanaomwabudu hivyo ndio Baba anaotaka .

text: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
text2: Mungu ni Roho , na watu wataweza tu kumwabudu kweli kwa nguvu ya Roho wake . "

text: The woman saith unto him , I know that Messias cometh , which is called Christ : when he is come , he will tell us all things .
text2: Huyo mama akamwambia , " Najua kwamba Masiha , aitwaye Kristo , anakuja . Atakapokuja atatujulisha kila kitu . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , I that speak unto thee am he .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Mimi ninayesema nawe , ndiye . "

text: And upon this came his disciples , and marvelled that he talked with the woman : yet no man said , What seekest thou ? or , Why talkest thou with her ?
text2: Hapo wanafunzi wake wakarudi , wakastaajabu sana kuona anaongea na mwanamke . Lakini hakuna mtu aliyesema : " Unataka nini ? " au , " Kwa nini unaongea na mwanamke ? "

text: The woman then left her waterpot , and went her way into the city , and saith to the men ,
text2: Huyo mama akauacha mtungi wake pale , akaenda mjini na kuwaambia watu ,

text: Come , see a man , which told me all things that ever I did : is not this the Christ ?
text2: " Njoni mkamwone mtu aliyeniambia mambo yote niliyotenda ! Je , yawezekana kuwa yeye ndiye Kristo ? "

text: Then they went out of the city , and came unto him .
text2: Watu wakatoka mjini , wakamwendea Yesu .

text: In the mean while his disciples prayed him , saying , Master , eat .
text2: Wakati huohuo wanafunzi wake walikuwa wanamsihi Yesu : " Mwalimu , ule chakula . "

text: But he said unto them , I have meat to eat that ye know not of .
text2: Lakini Yesu akawaambia , " Mimi ninacho chakula msichokijua ninyi . "

text: Therefore said the disciples one to another , Hath any man brought him ought to eat ?
text2: Wanafunzi wake wakaulizana , " Je , kuna mtu aliyemletea chakula ? "

text: Jesus saith unto them , My meat is to do the will of him that sent me , and to finish his work .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Chakula changu ni kufanya anachotaka yule aliyenituma na kuitimiza kazi yake .

text: Say not ye , There are yet four months , and then cometh harvest ? behold , I say unto you , Lift up your eyes , and look on the fields ; for they are white already to harvest .
text2: Ninyi mwasema : Bado miezi minne tu , na wakati wa mavuno utafika ! Lakini mimi nawaambieni , yatazameni mashamba ; mazao yako tayari kuvunwa .

text: And he that reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal : that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together .
text2: Mvunaji anapata mshahara wake , na anakusanya mavuno kwa ajili ya uzima wa milele ; hivyo mpandaji na mvunaji watafurahi pamoja .

text: And herein is that saying true , One soweth , and another reapeth .
text2: Kwa sababu hiyo msemo huu ni kweli : Mmoja hupanda na mwingine huvuna .

text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour : other men laboured , and ye are entered into their labours .
text2: Mimi nimewatuma mkavune mavuno ambayo hamkuyatolea jasho , wengine walifanya kazi , lakini ninyi mnafaidika kutokana na jasho lao . "

text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman , which testified , He told me all that ever I did .
text2: Wasamaria wengi wa kijiji kile waliamini kwa sababu ya maneno aliyosema huyo mama : " Ameniambia mambo yote niliyofanya . "

text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him , they besought him that he would tarry with them : and he abode there two days .
text2: Wasamaria walimwendea Yesu wakamwomba akae nao ; naye akakaa hapo siku mbili .

text: And many more believed because of his own word ;
text2: Watu wengi zaidi walimwamini kwa sababu ya ujumbe wake .

text: And said unto the woman , Now we believe , not because of thy saying : for we have heard him ourselves , and know that this is indeed the Christ , the Saviour of the world .
text2: Wakamwambia yule mama , " Sisi hatuamini tu kwa sababu ya maneno yako ; sisi wenyewe tumesikia , na tunajua kwamba huyu ndiye kweli Mwokozi wa ulimwengu . "

text: Now after two days he departed thence , and went into Galilee .
text2: Baada ya siku mbili Yesu aliondoka hapo , akaenda Galilaya .

text: For Jesus himself testified , that a prophet hath no honour in his own country .
text2: Maana Yesu mwenyewe alisema waziwazi kwamba , " Nabii hapati heshima katika nchi yake . "

text: Then when he was come into Galilee , the Galilaeans received him , having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast : for they also went unto the feast .
text2: Basi , alipofika Galilaya , Wagalilaya wengi walimkaribisha . Maana nao pia walikuwa kwenye sikukuu ya Pasaka , wakayaona mambo yote Yesu aliyotenda huko Yerusalemu wakati wa sikukuu hiyo .

text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee , where he made the water wine . And there was a certain nobleman , whose son was sick at Capernaum .
text2: Yesu alifika tena huko mjini Kana , mkoani Galilaya , mahali alipogeuza maji kuwa divai . Kulikuwa na ofisa mmoja aliyekuwa na mtoto mgonjwa huko Kafarnaumu .

text: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee , he went unto him , and besought him that he would come down , and heal his son : for he was at the point of death .
text2: Basi , huyo ofisa aliposikia kuwa Yesu alikuwa ametoka Yudea na kufika Galilaya , alimwendea akamwomba aende kumponya mtoto wake aliyekuwa mgonjwa mahututi .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Except ye see signs and wonders , ye will not believe .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Msipoona ishara na maajabu hamtaamini ! "

text: The nobleman saith unto him , Sir , come down ere my child die .
text2: Huyo ofisa akamwambia , " Mheshimiwa , tafadhali twende kabla mwanangu hajafa . "

text: Jesus saith unto him , Go thy way ; thy son liveth . And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him , and he went his way .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Nenda tu , mwanao yu mzima . " Huyo mtu akaamini maneno ya Yesu , akaenda zake .

text: And as he was now going down , his servants met him , and told him , saying , Thy son liveth .
text2: Alipokuwa bado njiani , watumishi wake walikutana naye , wakamwambia kwamba mwanawe alikuwa mzima .

text: Then inquired he of them the hour when he began to amend . And they said unto him , Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him .
text2: Naye akawauliza saa mtoto alipopata nafuu ; nao wakamwambia , " Jana saa saba mchana , homa ilimwacha . "

text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour , in the which Jesus said unto him , Thy son liveth : and himself believed , and his whole house .
text2: Huyo baba akakumbuka kwamba ilikuwa ni saa ileile ambapo Yesu alimwambia : " Mwanao yu mzima . " Basi , yeye akaamini pamoja na jamaa yake yote .

text: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did , when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee .
text2: Hii ilikuwa ishara ya pili aliyoifanya Yesu alipokuwa anatoka Yudea kwenda Galilaya .

text: After this there was a feast of the Jews ; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
text2: Baada ya hayo kulikuwa na sikukuu ya Wayahudi , naye Yesu akaenda Yerusalemu .

text: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool , which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda , having five porches .
text2: Huko Yerusalemu , karibu na mlango uitwao Mlango wa Kondoo , kulikuwa na bwawa la maji liitwalo kwa Kiebrania Bethzatha , ambalo lilikuwa na baraza tano zenye matao .

text: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk , of blind , halt , withered , waiting for the moving of the water .
text2: Humo barazani mlikuwa na wagonjwa wengi wamekaa : vipofu , viwete na waliopooza . Walikuwa wakingojea maji yatibuliwe ,

text: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool , and troubled the water : whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had .
text2: maana mara kwa mara malaika alishuka majini nyakati fulani na kuyatibua . Mtu yeyote aliyekuwa wa kwanza kuingia majini baada ya maji kutibuliwa , alipona ugonjwa wowote aliokuwa nao .

text: And a certain man was there , which had an infirmity thirty and eight years .
text2: Basi , hapo palikuwa na mtu mmoja aliyekuwa mgonjwa kwa muda wa miaka thelathini na minane .

text: When Jesus saw him lie , and knew that he had been now a long time in that case , he saith unto him , Wilt thou be made whole ?
text2: Naye alipomwona huyo mtu amelala hapo , akatambua kwamba alikuwa amekaa hapo kwa muda mrefu , akamwuliza , " Je , wataka kupona ? "

text: The impotent man answered him , Sir , I have no man , when the water is troubled , to put me into the pool : but while I am coming , another steppeth down before me .
text2: Naye akajibu , " Mheshimiwa , mimi sina mtu wa kunipeleka majini wakati yanapotibuliwa . Kila nikijaribu kuingia , mtu mwingine hunitangulia . "

text: Jesus saith unto him , Rise , take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Inuka , chukua mkeka wako utembee . "

text: And immediately the man was made whole , and took up his bed , and walked : and on the same day was the sabbath .
text2: Mara huyo mtu akapona , akachukua mkeka wake , akatembea . Jambo hili lilifanyika siku ya Sabato .

text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured , It is the sabbath day : it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed .
text2: Kwa hiyo baadhi ya Wayahudi wakamwambia huyo mtu aliyeponywa , " Leo ni Sabato , si halali kubeba mkeka wako . "

text: He answered them , He that made me whole , the same said unto me , Take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Lakini yeye akawaambia , " Yule mtu aliyeniponya ndiye aliyeniambia : Chukua mkeka wako , tembea . "

text: Then asked they him , What man is that which said unto thee , Take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Nao wakamwuliza , " Huyo mtu aliyekwambia : Chukua mkeka wako , tembea , ni nani ? "

text: And he that was healed wist not who it was : for Jesus had conveyed himself away , a multitude being in that place .
text2: Lakini yeye hakumjua huyo mtu aliyemponya , maana Yesu alikuwa amekwisha ondoka mahali hapo , kwani palikuwa na umati mkubwa wa watu .

text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple , and said unto him , Behold , thou art made whole : sin no more , lest a worse thing come unto thee .
text2: Basi , baadaye Yesu alimkuta huyo aliyeponywa Hekaluni , akamwambia , " Sasa umepona ; usitende dhambi tena , usije ukapatwa na jambo baya zaidi . "

text: The man departed , and told the Jews that it was Jesus , which had made him whole .
text2: Huyo mtu akaenda , akawaambia viongozi wa Wayahudi kwamba Yesu ndiye aliyemponya .

text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus , and sought to slay him , because he had done these things on the sabbath day .
text2: Kwa vile Yesu alifanya jambo hilo siku ya Sabato , Wayahudi walianza kumdhulumu .

text: But Jesus answered them , My Father worketh hitherto , and I work .
text2: Basi , Yesu akawaambia , " Baba yangu anafanya kazi daima , nami pia nafanya kazi . "

text: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him , because he not only had broken the sabbath , but said also that God was his Father , making himself equal with God .
text2: Kwa sababu ya maneno haya , viongozi wa Wayahudi walizidi kutafuta njia ya kumwua Yesu : si kwa kuwa aliivunja Sheria ya Sabato tu , bali pia kwa kuwa alisema kwamba Mungu ni Baba yake , na hivyo akajifanya sawa na Mungu .

text: Then answered Jesus and said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , The Son can do nothing of himself , but what he seeth the Father do : for what things soever he doeth , these also doeth the Son likewise .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Kweli nawaambieni , Mwana hawezi kufanya kitu peke yake ; anaweza tu kufanya kile anachomwona Baba akikifanya . Maana kile anachofanya Baba , Mwana hukifanya vilevile .

text: For the Father loveth the Son , and sheweth him all things that himself doeth : and he will shew him greater works than these , that ye may marvel .
text2: Baba ampenda Mwana , na humwonyesha kila kitu anachokifanya yeye mwenyewe , tena atamwonyesha mambo makuu kuliko haya , nanyi mtastaajabu .

text: For as the Father raiseth up the dead , and quickeneth them ; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will .
text2: Kama vile Baba huwafufua wafu na kuwapa uzima , vivyo hivyo naye Mwana huwapa uzima wale anaopenda .

text: For the Father judgeth no man , but hath committed all judgment unto the Son :
text2: Baba hamhukumu mtu yeyote ; shughuli yote ya hukumu amemkabidhi Mwana ,

text: That all men should honour the Son , even as they honour the Father . He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him .
text2: ili watu wote wamheshimu Mwana kama vile wanavyomheshimu Baba . Asiyemheshimu Mwana hamheshimu Baba ambaye amemtuma .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that heareth my word , and believeth on him that sent me , hath everlasting life , and shall not come into condemnation ; but is passed from death unto life .
text2: " Kweli nawaambieni , anayesikia neno langu , na kumwamini yule aliyenituma , anao uzima wa milele . Hatahukumiwa kamwe , bali amekwisha pita kutoka kifo na kuingia katika uzima .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The hour is coming , and now is , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God : and they that hear shall live .
text2: Kweli nawaambieni , wakati unakuja , tena umekwisha fika , ambapo wafu wataisikia sauti ya Mwana wa Mungu , nao watakaoisikia , wataishi .

text: For as the Father hath life in himself ; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself ;
text2: Kama vile Baba alivyo asili ya uhai , ndivyo pia alivyomjalia Mwanawe kuwa asili ya uhai .

text: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also , because he is the Son of man .
text2: Tena amempa mamlaka ya kuhukumu kwa sababu yeye ni Mwana wa Mtu .

text: Marvel not at this : for the hour is coming , in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice ,
text2: Msistaajabie jambo hili ; maana wakati unakuja ambapo wote waliomo makaburini wataisikia sauti yake ,

text: And shall come forth ; they that have done good , unto the resurrection of life ; and they that have done evil , unto the resurrection of damnation .
text2: nao watafufuka : wale waliotenda mema watafufuka na kuishi , na wale waliotenda maovu watafufuka na kuhukumiwa .

text: I can of mine own self do nothing : as I hear , I judge : and my judgment is just ; because I seek not mine own will , but the will of the Father which hath sent me .
text2: " Mimi siwezi kufanya kitu kwa uwezo wangu mwenyewe . Mimi nina hukumu kama ninavyosikia kutoka kwa Baba , nayo hukumu yangu ni ya haki . Nia yangu si kufanya nipendavyo mwenyewe , bali apendavyo yule aliyenituma .

text: If I bear witness of myself , my witness is not true .
text2: Nikijishuhudia mimi mwenyewe , ushahidi wangu hauwezi kukubaliwa kuwa wa kweli .

text: There is another that beareth witness of me ; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true .
text2: Lakini yuko mwingine ambaye hutoa ushahidi juu yangu , nami najua kwamba yote anayosema juu yangu ni ya kweli .

text: Ye sent unto John , and he bare witness unto the truth .
text2: Ninyi mlituma ujumbe kwa Yohane naye aliushuhudia ukweli .

text: But I receive not testimony from man : but these things I say , that ye might be saved .
text2: Si kwamba mimi nautegemea ushahidi wa wanadamu , lakini nasema mambo haya ili mpate kuokolewa .

text: He was a burning and a shining light : and ye were willing for a season to rejoice in his light .
text2: Yohane alikuwa kama taa iliyokuwa ikiwaka na kuangaza , nanyi mlikuwa tayari kufurahia mwanga huo kwa kitambo .

text: But I have greater witness than that of John : for the works which the Father hath given me to finish , the same works that I do , bear witness of me , that the Father hath sent me .
text2: Lakini mimi nina ushahidi juu yangu ambao ni mkuu zaidi kuliko ule wa Yohane . Kwa maana kazi ninazofanya , kazi alizonipa Baba nizifanye , ndizo zinazonishuhudia kwamba Baba ndiye aliyenituma .

text: And the Father himself , which hath sent me , hath borne witness of me . Ye have neither heard his voice at any time , nor seen his shape .
text2: Naye Baba aliyenituma hunishuhudia . Ninyi hamjapata kamwe kusikia sauti yake , wala kuuona uso wake ,

text: And ye have not his word abiding in you : for whom he hath sent , him ye believe not .
text2: na ujumbe wake haukai ndani yenu maana hamkumwamini yule aliyemtuma .

text: Search the scriptures ; for in them ye think ye have eternal life : and they are they which testify of me .
text2: Ninyi huyachunguza Maandiko Matakatifu mkidhani kwamba ndani yake mtapata uzima wa milele ; na kumbe maandiko hayohayo yananishuhudia !

text: And ye will not come to me , that ye might have life .
text2: Hata hivyo , ninyi hamtaki kuja kwangu ili mpate uzima .

text: I receive not honour from men .
text2: " Shabaha yangu si kupata sifa kutoka kwa watu .

text: But I know you , that ye have not the love of God in you .
text2: Lakini nawajua ninyi , najua kwamba upendo kwa Mungu haumo mioyoni mwenu .

text: I am come in my Father ' s name , and ye receive me not : if another shall come in his own name , him ye will receive .
text2: Mimi nimekuja kwa mamlaka ya Baba yangu , lakini hamnipokei ; bali mtu mwingine akija kwa mamlaka yake mwenyewe , mtampokea .

text: How can ye believe , which receive honour one of another , and seek not the honour that cometh from God only ?
text2: Mwawezaje kuamini , hali ninyi mnapenda kupokea sifa kutoka kwenu ninyi wenyewe , wala hamtafuti sifa kutoka kwake yeye aliye peke yake Mungu ?

text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father : there is one that accuseth you , even Moses , in whom ye trust .
text2: Msifikiri kwamba mimi nitawashtaki kwa Baba . Mose ambaye ninyi mmemtumainia ndiye atakayewashtaki .

text: For had ye believed Moses , ye would have believed me : for he wrote of me .
text2: Kama kweli mngemwamini Mose , mngeniamini na mimi pia ; maana Mose aliandika juu yangu .

text: But if ye believe not his writings , how shall ye believe my words ?
text2: Lakini hamuyaamini yale aliyoandika , mtawezaje basi , kuamini maneno yangu ? "

text: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee , which is the sea of Tiberias .
text2: Baada ya hayo , Yesu alivuka ziwa Galilaya ( au Ziwa Tiberia ) .

text: And a great multitude followed him , because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased .
text2: Umati mkubwa wa watu ulimfuata kwa sababu watu hao walikuwa wameona ishara alizokuwa akifanya kwa kuwaponya wagonjwa .

text: And Jesus went up into a mountain , and there he sat with his disciples .
text2: Yesu alipanda mlimani , akaketi pamoja na wanafunzi wake .

text: And the passover , a feast of the Jews , was nigh .
text2: Sikukuu ya Wayahudi iitwayo Pasaka ilikuwa imekaribia .

text: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes , and saw a great company come unto him , he saith unto Philip , Whence shall we buy bread , that these may eat ?
text2: Basi , Yesu na alipotazama na kuona umati wa watu ukija kwake , alimwambia Filipo , " Tununue wapi mikate ili watu hawa wapate kula ? "

text: And this he said to prove him : for he himself knew what he would do .
text2: ( Alisema hivyo kwa kumjaribu Filipo , kwani alijua mwenyewe atakalofanya . )

text: Philip answered him , Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them , that every one of them may take a little .
text2: Filipo akamjibu , " Mikate ya denari mia mbili za fedha haiwatoshi watu hawa hata kama ila mmoja atapata kipande kidogo tu ! "

text: One of his disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother , saith unto him ,
text2: Mmoja wa wanafunzi wake aitwaye Andrea , nduguye Simoni Petro , akamwambia ,

text: There is a lad here , which hath five barley loaves , and two small fishes : but what are they among so many ?
text2: " Yupo hapa mtoto mmoja aliye na mikate mitano ya shayiri na samaki wawili ; lakini hivi vyatosha nini kwa watu wengi kama hawa ? "

text: And Jesus said , Make the men sit down . Now there was much grass in the place . So the men sat down , in number about five thousand .
text2: Yesu akasema , " Waketisheni watu . " Palikuwa na nyasi tele mahali hapo . Basi , watu wakaketi , jumla yapata wanaume elfu tano .

text: And Jesus took the loaves ; and when he had given thanks , he distributed to the disciples , and the disciples to them that were set down ; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would .
text2: Yesu akaitwaa ile mikate , akamshukuru Mungu , akawagawia watu waliokuwa wameketi ; akafanya vivyo hivyo na wale samaki , kila mtu akapata kadiri alivyotaka .

text: When they were filled , he said unto his disciples , Gather up the fragments that remain , that nothing be lost .
text2: Watu waliposhiba Yesu akawaambia wanafunzi wake , " Kusanyeni vipande vilivyobaki visipotee . "

text: Therefore they gathered them together , and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves , which remained over and above unto them that had eaten .
text2: Basi , wakakusanya vipande vya mikate ya shayiri walivyobakiza wale watu waliokula , wakajaza vikapu kumi na viwili .

text: Then those men , when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did , said , This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world .
text2: Watu walipoiona ishara hiyo aliyoifanya Yesu , wakasema , " Hakika huyu ndiye nabii anayekuja ulimwenguni . "

text: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force , to make him a king , he departed again into a mountain himself alone .
text2: Yesu akajua ya kuwa watu walitaka kumchukua wamfanye mfalme , akaondoka tena , akaenda mlimani peke yake .

text: And when even was now come , his disciples went down unto the sea ,
text2: Ilipokuwa jioni wanafunzi wake waliteremka hadi ziwani ,

text: And entered into a ship , and went over the sea toward Capernaum . And it was now dark , and Jesus was not come to them .
text2: wakapanda mashua ili wavuke kwenda Kafarnaumu . Giza lilikuwa limeingia , na Yesu alikuwa hajawafikia bado .

text: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew .
text2: Ziwa likaanza kuchafuka kwa sababu upepo mkali ulikuwa unavuma .

text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs , they see Jesus walking on the sea , and drawing nigh unto the ship : and they were afraid .
text2: Wanafunzi walipokuwa wamekwenda umbali wa kilomita tano au sita , walimwona Yesu akitembea juu ya maji , anakaribia mashua ; wakaogopa sana .

text: But he saith unto them , It is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Ni mimi , msiogope ! "

text: Then they willingly received him into the ship : and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went .
text2: Walifurahi kumchukua Yesu katika mashua ; na mara mashua ikawasili nchi kavu walipokuwa wanakwenda .

text: The day following , when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there , save that one whereinto his disciples were entered , and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat , but that his disciples were gone away alone ;
text2: Kesho yake umati wa watu wale waliobaki upande wa pili wa ziwa walitambua kwamba kulikuwa na mashua moja tu pale , na Yesu hakuingia katika mashua pamoja na wanafunzi wake , ila wanafunzi hao walikuwa wamekwenda zao peke yao .

text: ( Howbeit there came other boats from Tiberias nigh unto the place where they did eat bread , after that the Lord had given thanks : )
text2: Mashua nyingine kutoka Tiberia zilifika mahali hapo watu walipokula ile mikate , Bwana alipokwisha mshukuru Mungu .

text: When the people therefore saw that Jesus was not there , neither his disciples , they also took shipping , and came to Capernaum , seeking for Jesus .
text2: Basi , hao watu walipogundua kwamba Yesu na wanafunzi wake hawakuwapo mahali hapo , walipanda mashua , wakaenda Kafarnaumu wakimtafuta .

text: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea , they said unto him , Rabbi , when camest thou hither ?
text2: Wale watu walipomkuta Yesu ng ' ambo ya pili wa ziwa walimwuliza , " Mwalimu , ulifika lini hapa ? "

text: Jesus answered them and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Ye seek me , not because ye saw the miracles , but because ye did eat of the loaves , and were filled .
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Kweli nawaambieni , mnanitafuta si kwa kuwa mmeona ishara , bali kwa sababu mlikula ile mikate mkashiba .

text: Labour not for the meat which perisheth , but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life , which the Son of man shall give unto you : for him hath God the Father sealed .
text2: Msikishughulikie chakula kiharibikacho ; kishugulikieni chakula kidumucho kwa ajili ya uzima wa milele . Mwana wa Mtu ambaye Baba amemthibitisha atawapeni chakula hicho . "

text: Then said they unto him , What shall we do , that we might work the works of God ?
text2: Wao wakamwuliza , " Tufanye nini ili tuweze kuzitenda kazi za Mungu ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , This is the work of God , that ye believe on him whom he hath sent .
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Hii ndiyo kazi anayotaka Mungu muifanye : kumwamini yule aliyemtuma . "

text: They said therefore unto him , What sign shewest thou then , that we may see , and believe thee ? what dost thou work ?
text2: Hapo wakamwambia , " Utafanya ishara gani ili tuione tupate kukuamini ? Utafanya kitu gani ?

text: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert ; as it is written , He gave them bread from heaven to eat .
text2: Wazee wetu walikula mana kule jangwani , kama yasemavyo Maandiko : Aliwalisha mkate kutoka mbinguni . "

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Moses gave you not that bread from heaven ; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Kweli nawaambieni , Mose hakuwapeni mkate kutoka mbinguni ; Baba yangu ndiye awapaye ninyi mkate halisi kutoka mbinguni .

text: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven , and giveth life unto the world .
text2: Maana mkate wa Mungu ni yule ashukaye kutoka mbinguni na aupaye ulimwengu uzima . "

text: Then said they unto him , Lord , evermore give us this bread .
text2: Basi , wakamwambia , " Mheshimiwa , tupe daima mkate huo . "

text: And Jesus said unto them , I am the bread of life : he that cometh to me shall never hunger ; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Mimi ndimi mkate wa uzima . Anayekuja kwangu hataona njaa ; anayeniamini hataona kiu kamwe .

text: But I said unto you , That ye also have seen me , and believe not .
text2: Lakini niliwaambieni kwamba ingawa mmeniona hamniamini .

text: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me ; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out .
text2: Wote anaonipa Baba watakuja kwangu ; nami sitamtupa nje yeyote anayekuja kwangu ,

text: For I came down from heaven , not to do mine own will , but the will of him that sent me .
text2: kwani nimeshuka kutoka mbinguni si kwa ajili ya kufanya matakwa yangu , ila kutimiza matakwa ya yule aliyenituma .

text: And this is the Father ' s will which hath sent me , that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing , but should raise it up again at the last day .
text2: Na matakwa ya yule aliyenituma ndiyo haya : nisimpoteze hata mmoja kati ya wale alionipa , ila niwafufue wote Siku ya mwisho .

text: And this is the will of him that sent me , that every one which seeth the Son , and believeth on him , may have everlasting life : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Maana anachotaka Baba yangu ndicho hiki : kila amwonaye Mwana na kumwamini awe na uzima wa milele ; nami nitamfufua Siku ya mwisho . "

text: The Jews then murmured at him , because he said , I am the bread which came down from heaven .
text2: Basi , Wayahudi wakaanza kunung ' unika kwa kuwa alisema : " Mimi ni mkate ulioshuka kutoka mbinguni . "

text: And they said , Is not this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? how is it then that he saith , I came down from heaven ?
text2: Wakasema , " Je , huyu si mwana wa Yosefu ? Tunawajua baba yake na mama yake ! Basi , anawezaje kusema kwamba ameshuka kutoka mbinguni ? "

text: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them , Murmur not among yourselves .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Acheni kunung ' unika ninyi kwa ninyi .

text: No man can come to me , except the Father which hath sent me draw him : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Hakuna mtu awezaye kuja kwangu , Baba aliyenituma asipomvuta kwangu ; nami nitamfufua mtu huyo Siku ya mwisho .

text: It is written in the prophets , And they shall be all taught of God . Every man therefore that hath heard , and hath learned of the Father , cometh unto me .
text2: Manabii wameandika : Watu wote watafundishwa na Mungu . Kila mtu anayemsikia Baba na kujifunza kutoka kwake , huja kwangu .

text: Not that any man hath seen the Father , save he which is of God , he hath seen the Father .
text2: Hii haina maana kwamba yupo mtu aliyemwona Baba , isipokuwa yule aliyetoka kwa Mungu ; huyo ndiye aliyemwona Baba .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me hath everlasting life .
text2: Kweli , nawaambieni , anayeamini anao uzima wa milele .

text: I am that bread of life .
text2: Mimi ni mkate wa uzima .

text: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness , and are dead .
text2: Wazee wenu walikula mana kule jangwani , lakini walikufa .

text: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven , that a man may eat thereof , and not die .
text2: Huu ndio mkate kutoka mbinguni ; mkate ambao anayekula hatakufa .

text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven : if any man eat of this bread , he shall live for ever : and the bread that I will give is my flesh , which I will give for the life of the world .
text2: Mimi ni mkate hai ulioshuka kutoka mbinguni . Mtu yeyote akila mkate huu ataishi milele . Na mkate nitakaompa ni mwili wangu ninaoutoa kwa ajili ya uzima wa ulimwengu . "

text: The Jews therefore strove among themselves , saying , How can this man give us his flesh to eat ?
text2: Ndipo Wayahudi wakaanza kubishana kati yao :

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man , and drink his blood , ye have no life in you .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Kweli nawaambieni , msipokula mwili wa Mwana wa Mtu na kunywa damu yake , hamtakuwa na uzima ndani yenu .

text: Whoso eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , hath eternal life ; and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Anayekula mwili wangu na kunywa damu yangu anao uzima wa milele nami nitamfufua siku ya mwisho .

text: For my flesh is meat indeed , and my blood is drink indeed .
text2: Maana mwili wangu ni chakula cha kweli , na damu yangu ni kinywaji cha kweli .

text: He that eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , dwelleth in me , and I in him .
text2: Aulaye mwili wangu na kunywa damu yangu , akaa ndani yangu , nami nakaa ndani yake .

text: As the living Father hath sent me , and I live by the Father : so he that eateth me , even he shall live by me .
text2: Baba aliye hai alinituma , nami naishi kwa sababu yake ; vivyo hivyo anilaye mimi ataishi pia kwa sababu yangu .

text: This is that bread which came down from heaven : not as your fathers did eat manna , and are dead : he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever .
text2: Basi , huu ndio mkate ulioshuka kutoka mbinguni ; si kama mana waliyokula babu zetu , wakafa . Aulaye mkate huu ataishi milele . "

text: These things said he in the synagogue , as he taught in Capernaum .
text2: Yesu alisema hayo alipokuwa akifundisha katika sunagogi kule Kafarnaumu .

text: Many therefore of his disciples , when they had heard this , said , This is an hard saying ; who can hear it ?
text2: Basi , wengi wa wafuasi wake waliposikia hayo , wakasema , " Haya ni mambo magumu ! Nani awezaye kuyasikiliza ? "

text: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it , he said unto them , Doth this offend you ?
text2: Yesu alijua bila kuambiwa na mtu kwamba wanafunzi wake walikuwa wananung ' unika juu ya jambo hilo , akawauliza , " Je , jambo hili linawafanya muwe na mashaka ?

text: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before ?
text2: Itakuwaje basi , mtakapomwona Mwana wa Mtu akipanda kwenda kule alikokuwa kwanza ?

text: It is the spirit that quickeneth ; the flesh profiteth nothing : the words that I speak unto you , they are spirit , and they are life .
text2: Roho ndiye atiaye uzima ; binadamu peke yake hawezi . Maneno niliyowaambieni ni Roho , ni uzima .

text: But there are some of you that believe not . For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not , and who should betray him .
text2: Hata hivyo , wako baadhi yenu wasioamini . " ( Yesu alisema hivyo kwani alijua tangu mwanzo ni kina nani wasioamini , na pia ni nani atakayemsaliti . )

text: And he said , Therefore said I unto you , that no man can come unto me , except it were given unto him of my Father .
text2: Kisha akasema , " Ndiyo maana niliwaambieni kwamba hakuna awezaye kuja kwangu asipowezeshwa na Baba yangu . "

text: From that time many of his disciples went back , and walked no more with him .
text2: Kutokana na hayo , wengi wa wafuasi wake walirudi nyuma wasiandamane naye tena .

text: Then said Jesus unto the twelve , Will ye also go away ?
text2: Basi , Yesu akawauliza wale kumi na wawili , " Je , nanyi pia mwataka kwenda zenu ? "

text: Then Simon Peter answered him , Lord , to whom shall we go ? thou hast the words of eternal life .
text2: Simoni Petro akamjibu , " Bwana , tutakwenda kwa nani ? Wewe unayo maneno yaletayo uzima wa milele .

text: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Sisi tunaamini , na tunajua kwamba wewe ndiwe yule Mtakatifu wa Mungu . "

text: Jesus answered them , Have not I chosen you twelve , and one of you is a devil ?
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Je , sikuwachagua ninyi kumi na wawili ? Hata hivyo , mmoja wenu ni Ibilisi ! "

text: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon : for he it was that should betray him , being one of the twelve .
text2: Yesu alisema hayo juu ya Yuda , mwana wa Simoni Iskarioti ; maana huyu alikuwa ndiye atakayemsaliti , ingawa alikuwa mmoja wa wale kumi na wawili .

text: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee : for he would not walk in Jewry , because the Jews sought to kill him .
text2: Baada ya hayo , Yesu alikuwa akitembea katika Galilaya . Hakutaka kutembea mkoani Yudea kwa sababu viongozi wa Wayahudi walikuwa wanataka kumwua .

text: Now the Jews ' feast of tabernacles was at hand .
text2: Sikukuu ya Vibanda ya Wayahudi ilikuwa imekaribia .

text: His brethren therefore said unto him , Depart hence , and go into Judaea , that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest .
text2: Basi ndugu zake wakamwambia , " Ondoka hapa uende Yudea ili wanafunzi wako wazione kazi unazozifanya .

text: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret , and he himself seeketh to be known openly . If thou do these things , shew thyself to the world .
text2: Mtu hafanyi mambo kwa siri kama anataka kujulikana kwa watu . Maadam unafanya mambo haya , basi , jidhihirishe kwa ulimwengu . "

text: For neither did his brethren believe in him .
text2: ( Hata ndugu zake hawakumwamini ! )

text: Then Jesus said unto them , My time is not yet come : but your time is alway ready .
text2: Basi , Yesu akawaambia , " Wakati wangu ufaao haujafika bado . Lakini kwenu ninyi kila wakati unafaa .

text: The world cannot hate you ; but me it hateth , because I testify of it , that the works thereof are evil .
text2: Ulimwengu hauwezi kuwachukia ninyi , lakini mimi wanichukia kwa sababu mimi nauambia wazi kwamba matendo yake ni maovu .

text: Go ye up unto this feast : I go not up yet unto this feast ; for my time is not yet full come .
text2: Ninyi nendeni kwenye sikukuu hiyo . Mimi siendi kwenye sikukuu hiyo , maana saa yangu ifaayo haijafika . "

text: When he had said these words unto them , he abode still in Galilee .
text2: Alisema hayo kisha akabaki huko Galilaya .

text: But when his brethren were gone up , then went he also up unto the feast , not openly , but as it were in secret .
text2: Baada ya ndugu zake kwenda kwenye sikukuu , Yesu naye alikwenda , lakini hakuenda kwa hadhara bali kwa siri .

text: Then the Jews sought him at the feast , and said , Where is he ?
text2: Viongozi wa Wayahudi walikuwa wanamtafuta kwenye sikukuu hiyo ; Wakauliza : " Yuko wapi ? "

text: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him : for some said , He is a good man : others said , Nay ; but he deceiveth the people .
text2: Kulikuwa na minong ' ono mingi katika umati wa watu . Baadhi yao walisema , " Ni mtu mwema . " Wengine walisema , " La ! Anawapotosha watu . "

text: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews .
text2: Hata hivyo hakuna mtu aliyethubutu kusema , habari zake hadharani kwa kuwaogopa viongozi wa Wayahudi .

text: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple , and taught .
text2: Sikukuu hiyo ilipofikia katikati , Yesu naye alikwenda Hekaluni , akaanza kufundisha .

text: And the Jews marvelled , saying , How knoweth this man letters , having never learned ?
text2: Basi , Wayahudi wakashangaa na kusema " Mtu huyu amepataje elimu naye hakusoma shuleni ? "

text: Jesus answered them , and said , My doctrine is not mine , but his that sent me .
text2: Hapo Yesu akawajibu , " Mafundisho ninayofundisha si yangu , bali ni yake yeye aliyenituma .

text: If any man will do his will , he shall know of the doctrine , whether it be of God , or whether I speak of myself .
text2: Mtu anayependa kufanya yale anayotaka Mungu , atajua kama mafundisho yangu yametoka kwa Mungu , au mimi najisemea tu mwenyewe .

text: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory : but he that seeketh his glory that sent him , the same is true , and no unrighteousness is in him .
text2: Yeye anayejisemea tu mwenyewe anatafuta sifa yake mwenyewe ; lakini anayetafuta sifa ya yule aliyemtuma , huyo ni mwaminifu , na ndani yake hamna uovu wowote .

text: Did not Moses give you the law , and yet none of you keepeth the law ? Why go ye about to kill me ?
text2: Je , Mose hakuwapeni Sheria ? Hata hivyo , hakuna hata mmoja wenu anayeishika Sheria . Kwa nini mnataka kuniua ? "

text: The people answered and said , Thou hast a devil : who goeth about to kill thee ?
text2: Hapo watu wakamjibu , " Una wazimu wewe ! Nani anataka kukuua ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , I have done one work , and ye all marvel .
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Kuna jambo moja nililofanya , nanyi mnalistaajabia .

text: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision ; ( not because it is of Moses , but of the fathers ; ) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man .
text2: Mose aliwapeni ile desturi ya kutahiri . ( Si kwamba desturi hiyo ilitoka kwa Mose , bali ilitoka kwa mababu ) . Sasa ninyi humtahiri mtu hata siku ya Sabato .

text: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision , that the law of Moses should not be broken ; are ye angry at me , because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day ?
text2: Ikiwa basi , mtu hutahiriwa hata siku ya Sabato kusudi Sheria ya Mose isivunjwe , mbona mnanikasirikia kwa sababu nimemfanya mtu kuwa mzima kabisa siku ya Sabato ?

text: Judge not according to the appearance , but judge righteous judgment .
text2: Msihukumu mambo kwa nje tu ; toeni hukumu ya haki . "

text: Then said some of them of Jerusalem , Is not this he , whom they seek to kill ?
text2: Baadhi ya watu wa Yerusalemu walisema , " Je , yule mtu wanayemtafuta wamuue si huyu ?

text: But , lo , he speaketh boldly , and they say nothing unto him . Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ ?
text2: Tazameni sasa ! Anawaonya hadharani , wala hakuna mtu anayemwambia hata neno . Je , yawezekana kuwa viongozi wametambua kweli kwamba huyu ndiye Kristo ?

text: Howbeit we know this man whence he is : but when Christ cometh , no man knoweth whence he is .
text2: Kristo atakapokuja hakuna mtu atakayejua mahali alikotoka , lakini sisi tunajua alikotoka mtu huyu ! "

text: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught , saying , Ye both know me , and ye know whence I am : and I am not come of myself , but he that sent me is true , whom ye know not .
text2: Basi , Yesu alipokuwa anafundisha Hekaluni alipaaza sauti na kusema , " Ati mnanijua ; hata nilikotoka mnakujua ! Hata hivyo , sikuja kwa mamlaka yangu mwenyewe ; ila yeye aliyenituma mimi ni wa kweli , nanyi hamumjui .

text: But I know him : for I am from him , and he hath sent me .
text2: Lakini mimi namjua kwa sababu nimetoka kwake , naye ndiye aliyenituma . "

text: Then they sought to take him : but no man laid hands on him , because his hour was not yet come .
text2: Basi , watu wakataka kumtia nguvuni , lakini hakuna mtu aliyethubutu kumkamata kwa sababu saa yake ilikuwa haijafika bado .

text: And many of the people believed on him , and said , When Christ cometh , will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done ?
text2: Wengi katika ule umati wa watu walimwamini , wakasema , " Je , Kristo akija atafanya ishara kubwa zaidi kuliko alizozifanya huyu ? "

text: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him ; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him .
text2: Mafarisayo waliwasikia watu wakinong ' ona maneno hayo juu ya Yesu . Basi , wao pamoja na makuhani wakuu wakawatuma walinzi wamtie nguvuni .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Yet a little while am I with you , and then I go unto him that sent me .
text2: Yesu akasema , " Bado niko nanyi kwa muda mfupi , kisha nitamwendea yule aliyenituma .

text: Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come .
text2: Mtanitafuta lakini hamtaniona , maana pale nitakapokuwa ninyi hamwezi kufika . "

text: Then said the Jews among themselves , Whither will he go , that we shall not find him ? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles , and teach the Gentiles ?
text2: Viongozi wa Wayahudi wakasema wao kwa wao , " Mtu huyu atakwenda wapi ambapo hatutaweza kumpata ? Atakwenda kwa Wayahudi waliotawanyika kati ya Wagiriki , na kuwafundisha Wagiriki ?

text: What manner of saying is this that he said , Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come ?
text2: Ana maana gani anaposema : Mtanitafuta lakini hamtanipata , na mahali nitakapokuwa ninyi hamwezi kufika ? "

text: In the last day , that great day of the feast , Jesus stood and cried , saying , If any man thirst , let him come unto me , and drink .
text2: Siku ya mwisho ya sikukuu hiyo ilikuwa siku maalum . Yesu alisimama , akasema kwa sauti kubwa , " Aliye na kiu na aje kwangu anywe .

text: He that believeth on me , as the scripture hath said , out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water .
text2: Kama yasemavyo Maandiko Matakatifu : Anayeniamini mimi , mito ya maji yenye uzima itatiririka kutoka moyoni mwake ! "

text: ( But this spake he of the Spirit , which they that believe on him should receive : for the Holy Ghost was not yet given ; because that Jesus was not yet glorified . )
text2: ( Alisema hayo kumhusu Roho ambaye wale waliomwamini yeye watampokea . Wakati huo Roho alikuwa hajafika kwa sababu Yesu alikuwa hajatukuzwa bado . )

text: Many of the people therefore , when they heard this saying , said , Of a truth this is the Prophet .
text2: Baadhi ya watu katika ule umati walisikia maneno hayo , wakasema , " Kweli mtu huyu ndiye yule nabii ! "

text: Others said , This is the Christ . But some said , Shall Christ come out of Galilee ?
text2: Wengine wakasema , " Huyu ndiye Kristo ! " Lakini wengine walisema , " Je , yawezekana Kristo akatoka Galilaya ?

text: Hath not the scripture said , That Christ cometh of the seed of David , and out of the town of Bethlehem , where David was ?
text2: Maandiko Matakatifu yasemaje ? Yanasema : Kristo atatoka katika ukoo wa Daudi , na atazaliwa Bethlehemu , mji wa Daudi ! "

text: So there was a division among the people because of him .
text2: Basi , kukatokea mafarakano juu yake katika ule umati wa watu .

text: And some of them would have taken him ; but no man laid hands on him .
text2: Baadhi ya watu walitaka kumtia nguvuni lakini hakuna aliyejaribu kumkamata .

text: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees ; and they said unto them , Why have ye not brought him ?
text2: Kisha wale walinzi wakarudi kwa makuhani wakuu na Mafarisayo ; nao wakawauliza , " Kwa nini hamkumleta ? "

text: The officers answered , Never man spake like this man .
text2: Walinzi wakawajibu , " Hakuna mtu aliyepata kamwe kusema kama asemavyo mtu huyu ! "

text: Then answered them the Pharisees , Are ye also deceived ?
text2: Mafarisayo wakawauliza , " Je , nanyi pia mmedanganyika ?

text: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him ?
text2: Je , mmekwisha mwona hata mmoja wa viongozi wa watu , au mmoja wa Mafarisayo aliyemwamini ?

text: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed .
text2: Lakini umati huu haujui Sheria ya Mose ; umelaaniwa ! "

text: Nicodemus saith unto them , ( he that came to Jesus by night , being one of them , )
text2: Mmoja wao alikuwa Nikodemo ambaye hapo awali alikuwa amemwendea Yesu . Basi , yeye akawaambia ,

text: Doth our law judge any man , before it hear him , and know what he doeth ?
text2: " Je , Sheria yetu humhukumu mtu kabla ya kumsikia kwanza na kujua anafanya nini ? "

text: They answered and said unto him , Art thou also of Galilee ? Search , and look : for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet .
text2: Nao wakamjibu , " Je , wewe pia umetoka Galilaya ? Haya , kayachunguze Maandiko Matakatifu nawe utaona kwamba Galilaya hakutoki kamwe nabii ! "

text: And every man went unto his own house .
text2: Basi , wote wakaondoka , kila mtu akaenda zake ;

text: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives .
text2: lakini Yesu akaenda kwenye mlima wa Mizeituni .

text: And early in the morning he came again into the temple , and all the people came unto him ; and he sat down , and taught them .
text2: Kesho yake asubuhi na mapema alikwenda tena Hekaluni . Watu wote wakamwendea , naye akaketi akawa anawafundisha .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery ; and when they had set her in the midst ,
text2: Basi , walimu wa Sheria na Mafarisayo wakamletea mwanamke mmoja aliyefumaniwa katika uzinzi . Wakamsimamisha katikati yao .

text: They say unto him , Master , this woman was taken in adultery , in the very act .
text2: Kisha wakamwuliza Yesu , " Mwalimu ! Mwanamke huyu alifumaniwa katika uzinzi .

text: Now Moses in the law commanded us , that such should be stoned : but what sayest thou ?
text2: Katika Sheria yetu Mose alituamuru mwanamke kama huyu apigwe mawe . Basi , wewe wasemaje ? "

text: This they said , tempting him , that they might have to accuse him . But Jesus stooped down , and with his finger wrote on the ground , as though he heard them not .
text2: Walisema hivyo kumjaribu , wapate kisa cha kumshtaki . Lakini Yesu akainama chini , akaandika ardhini kwa kidole .

text: So when they continued asking him , he lifted up himself , and said unto them , He that is without sin among you , let him first cast a stone at her .
text2: Walipozidi kumwuliza , Yesu akainuka , akawaambia , " Mtu asiye na dhambi miongoni mwenu na awe wa kwanza kumpiga jiwe . "

text: And again he stooped down , and wrote on the ground .
text2: Kisha akainama tena , akawa anaandika ardhini .

text: And they which heard it , being convicted by their own conscience , went out one by one , beginning at the eldest , even unto the last : and Jesus was left alone , and the woman standing in the midst .
text2: Waliposikia hivyo , wakaanza kutoweka mmojammoja , wakitanguliwa na wazee . Yesu akabaki peke yake , na yule mwanamke amesimama palepale .

text: When Jesus had lifted up himself , and saw none but the woman , he said unto her , Woman , where are those thine accusers ? hath no man condemned thee ?
text2: Yesu alipoinuka akamwuliza huyo mwanamke , " Wako wapi wale watu ? Je , hakuna hata mmoja aliyekuhukumu ? "

text: She said , No man , Lord . And Jesus said unto her , Neither do I condemn thee : go , and sin no more .
text2: Huyo mwanamke akamjibu , " Mheshimiwa , hakuna hata mmoja ! " Naye Yesu akamwambia , " Wala mimi sikuhukumu . Nenda zako ; na tangu sasa usitende dhambi tena . "
