text: Then spake Jesus again unto them , saying , I am the light of the world : he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness , but shall have the light of life .
text2: Yesu alipozungumza nao tena , aliwaambia , " Mimi ndimi mwanga wa ulimwengu . Anayenifuata mimi hatembei kamwe gizani , bali atakuwa na mwanga wa uzima . "

text: The Pharisees therefore said unto him , Thou bearest record of thyself ; thy record is not true .
text2: Basi , Mafarisayo wakamwambia , " Wewe unajishuhudia mwenyewe ; kwa hiyo ushahidi wako si halali . "

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Though I bear record of myself , yet my record is true : for I know whence I came , and whither I go ; but ye cannot tell whence I come , and whither I go .
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Hata kama ninajishuhudia mwenyewe , ushahidi wangu ni wa kweli kwa sababu mimi najua nilikotoka na ninakokwenda . Lakini ninyi hamjui nilikotoka wala ninakokwenda .

text: Ye judge after the flesh ; I judge no man .
text2: Ninyi mnahukumu kwa fikira za kibinadamu , lakini mimi simhukumu mtu .

text: And yet if I judge , my judgment is true : for I am not alone , but I and the Father that sent me .
text2: Hata nikihukumu , hukumu yangu ni ya haki kwa sababu mimi siko peke yangu ; Baba aliyenituma yuko pamoja nami .

text: It is also written in your law , that the testimony of two men is true .
text2: Imeandikwa katika Sheria yenu ya kwamba ushahidi wa watu wawili ni halali .

text: I am one that bear witness of myself , and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me .
text2: Mimi najishuhudia mwenyewe , naye Baba aliyenituma , ananishuhudia pia . "

text: Then said they unto him , Where is thy Father ? Jesus answered , Ye neither know me , nor my Father : if ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also .
text2: Hapo wakamwuliza , " Baba yako yuko wapi ? " Yesu akawajibu " Ninyi hamnijui mimi wala hamumjui Baba . Kama mngenijua mimi , mngemjua na Baba yangu pia . "

text: These words spake Jesus in the treasury , as he taught in the temple : and no man laid hands on him ; for his hour was not yet come .
text2: Yesu alisema maneno hayo kwenye chumba cha hazina alipokuwa anafundisha Hekaluni . Wala hakuna mtu aliyemtia nguvuni , kwa sababu saa yake ilikuwa haijafika bado .

text: Then said Jesus again unto them , I go my way , and ye shall seek me , and shall die in your sins : whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Yesu akawaambia tena , " Naenda zangu nanyi mtanitafuta , lakini mtakufa katika dhambi zenu . Niendako mimi , ninyi hamwezi kufika . "

text: Then said the Jews , Will he kill himself ? because he saith , Whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Basi , viongozi wa Wayahudi wakasema , " Je , atajiua ? Mbona anasema : Niendako ninyi hamwezi kufika ? "

text: And he said unto them , Ye are from beneath ; I am from above : ye are of this world ; I am not of this world .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Ninyi mmetoka papa hapa chini , mimi nimetoka juu ; ninyi ni wa ulimwengu huu , mimi si wa ulimwengu huu .

text: I said therefore unto you , that ye shall die in your sins : for if ye believe not that I am he , ye shall die in your sins .
text2: Ndiyo maana niliwaambieni mtakufa katika dhambi zenu . Kama msipoamini kwamba Mimi ndimi , mtakufa katika dhambi zenu . "

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? And Jesus saith unto them , Even the same that I said unto you from the beginning .
text2: Nao wakamwuliza , " Wewe ni nani ? " Yesu akawajibu , " Nimewaambieni tangu mwanzo !

text: I have many things to say and to judge of you : but he that sent me is true ; and I speak to the world those things which I have heard of him .
text2: Ninayo mengi ya kusema na kuhukumu juu yenu . Lakini yule aliyenituma ni kweli ; nami nauambia ulimwengu mambo yale tu niliyoyasikia kutoka kwake . "

text: They understood not that he spake to them of the Father .
text2: Hawakuelewa kwamba Yesu alikuwa akisema nao juu ya Baba .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , When ye have lifted up the Son of man , then shall ye know that I am he , and that I do nothing of myself ; but as my Father hath taught me , I speak these things .
text2: Basi , Yesu akawaambia , " Mtakapokwisha mwinua Mwana wa Mtu hapo ndipo mtakapojua kwamba Mimi ndimi , na kwamba sifanyi chochote mimi mwenyewe , ila nasema tu yale Baba aliyonifundisha .

text: And he that sent me is with me : the Father hath not left me alone ; for I do always those things that please him .
text2: Yule aliyenituma yuko pamoja nami ; yeye hakuniacha peke yangu kwani nafanya daima yale yanayompendeza . "

text: As he spake these words , many believed on him .
text2: Baada ya kusema hayo watu wengi walimwamini .

text: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him , If ye continue in my word , then are ye my disciples indeed ;
text2: Basi , Yesu akawaambia wale Wayahudi waliomwamini , " Kama mkiyazingatia mafundisho yangu mtakuwa kweli wanafunzi wangu .

text: And ye shall know the truth , and the truth shall make you free .
text2: Mtaujua ukweli , nao ukweli utawapeni uhuru . "

text: They answered him , We be Abraham ' s seed , and were never in bondage to any man : how sayest thou , Ye shall be made free ?
text2: Nao wakamjibu , " Sisi ni wazawa wa Abrahamu , na hatujapata kamwe kuwa watumwa wa mtu yeyote yule . Una maana gani unaposema : mtakuwa huru ? "

text: Jesus answered them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin .
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Kweli nawaambieni , kila mtu anayetenda dhambi ni mtumwa wa dhambi .

text: And the servant abideth not in the house for ever : but the Son abideth ever .
text2: Mtumwa hana makao ya kudumu nyumbani , lakini mwana anayo makao ya kudumu .

text: If the Son therefore shall make you free , ye shall be free indeed .
text2: Kama mwana akiwapeni uhuru mtakuwa huru kweli .

text: I know that ye are Abraham ' s seed ; but ye seek to kill me , because my word hath no place in you .
text2: Najua kwamba ninyi ni wazawa wa Abrahamu . Hata hivyo , mnataka kuniua kwa sababu hamuyakubali mafundisho yangu .

text: I speak that which I have seen with my Father : and ye do that which ye have seen with your father .
text2: Mimi nasema yale aliyonionyesha Baba , lakini ninyi mwafanya yale aliyowaambieni baba yenu . "

text: They answered and said unto him , Abraham is our father . Jesus saith unto them , If ye were Abraham ' s children , ye would do the works of Abraham .
text2: Wao wakamjibu , " Baba yetu ni Abrahamu ! " Yesu akawaambia , " Kama ninyi mngekuwa watoto wa Abrahamu , mngefanya kama alivyofanya Abrahamu ,

text: But now ye seek to kill me , a man that hath told you the truth , which I have heard of God : this did not Abraham .
text2: Mimi nimewaambieni ukweli niliousikia kwa Mungu ; hata hivyo , ninyi mwataka kuniua . Abrahamu hakufanya hivyo !

text: Ye do the deeds of your father . Then said they to him , We be not born of fornication ; we have one Father , even God .
text2: Ninyi mnafanya mambo yaleyale aliyofanya babu yenu . " Wao wakamwambia , " Sisi si watoto haramu ! Tunaye baba mmoja tu , yaani Mungu . "

text: Jesus said unto them , If God were your Father , ye would love me : for I proceeded forth and came from God ; neither came I of myself , but he sent me .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Kama Mungu angekuwa Baba yenu , mngenipenda mimi , maana mimi nilitoka kwa Mungu na sasa niko hapa . Sikuja kwa mamlaka yangu mwenyewe , ila yeye alinituma .

text: Why do ye not understand my speech ? even because ye cannot hear my word .
text2: Kwa nini hamwelewi hayo ninayosema ? Ni kwa kuwa hamwezi kuusikiliza ujumbe wangu .

text: Ye are of your father the devil , and the lusts of your father ye will do . He was a murderer from the beginning , and abode not in the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he speaketh a lie , he speaketh of his own : for he is a liar , and the father of it .
text2: Ninyi ni watoto wa baba yenu Ibilisi na mnataka tu kutekeleza tamaa za baba yenu . Yeye alikuwa muuaji tangu mwanzo ; hana msimamo katika ukweli , kwani ukweli haumo ndani yake . Kila asemapo uongo , husema kutokana na hali yake ya maumbile , maana yeye ni mwongo na baba wa uongo .

text: And because I tell you the truth , ye believe me not .
text2: Mimi nasema ukweli , na ndiyo maana ninyi hamniamini .

text: Which of you convinceth me of sin ? And if I say the truth , why do ye not believe me ?
text2: Nani kati yenu awezaye kuthibitisha kuwa mimi nina dhambi ? Ikiwa basi nasema ukweli , kwa nini hamniamini ?

text: He that is of God heareth God ' s words : ye therefore hear them not , because ye are not of God .
text2: Aliye wa Mungu husikiliza maneno ya Mungu . Lakini ninyi hamsikilizi kwa sababu ninyi si ( watu wa ) Mungu . "

text: Then answered the Jews , and said unto him , Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan , and hast a devil ?
text2: Wayahudi wakamwambia , " Je , hatukusema kweli kwamba wewe ni Msamaria , na tena una pepo ? "

text: Jesus answered , I have not a devil ; but I honour my Father , and ye do dishonour me .
text2: Yesu akajibu , " Mimi sina pepo ; mimi namheshimu Baba yangu , lakini ninyi hamniheshimu .

text: And I seek not mine own glory : there is one that seeketh and judgeth .
text2: Mimi sijitafutii utukufu wangu mwenyewe ; yuko mmoja mwenye kuutafuta utukufu huo , naye ni hakimu .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , If a man keep my saying , he shall never see death .
text2: Kweli nawaambieni , anayeuzingatia ujumbe wangu hatakufa milele . "

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Now we know that thou hast a devil . Abraham is dead , and the prophets ; and thou sayest , If a man keep my saying , he shall never taste of death .
text2: Basi , Wayahudi wakasema , " Sasa tunajua kweli kwamba wewe ni mwendawazimu ! Abrahamu alikufa , na manabii pia walikufa , nawe wasema ati , Anayeuzingatia ujumbe wangu hatakufa milele !

text: Art thou greater than our father Abraham , which is dead ? and the prophets are dead : whom makest thou thyself ?
text2: Je , unajifanya mkuu zaidi kuliko baba yetu Abrahamu ambaye alikufa ? Hata na manabii walikufa . Wewe unajifanya kuwa nani ? "

text: Jesus answered , If I honour myself , my honour is nothing : it is my Father that honoureth me ; of whom ye say , that he is your God :
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Nikijitukuza mwenyewe , utukufu wangu si kitu . Baba yangu ambaye ninyi mwasema ni Baba yenu , ndiye anayenitukuza .

text: Yet ye have not known him ; but I know him : and if I should say , I know him not , I shall be a liar like unto you : but I know him , and keep his saying .
text2: Ninyi hamjapata kumjua , lakini mimi namjua . Na , nikisema simjui , nitakuwa mwongo kama ninyi . Mimi namjua na ninashika neno lake .

text: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day : and he saw it , and was glad .
text2: Abrahamu , baba yenu , alishangilia aione siku yangu ; naye aliiona , akafurahi . "

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Thou art not yet fifty years old , and hast thou seen Abraham ?
text2: Basi , Wayahudi wakamwambia , " Wewe hujatimiza miaka hamsini bado , nawe umemwona Abrahamu ? "

text: Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Before Abraham was , I am .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Kweli nawaambieni , kabla Abrahamu hajazaliwa , mimi niko . "

text: Then took they up stones to cast at him : but Jesus hid himself , and went out of the temple , going through the midst of them , and so passed by .
text2: Hapo wakaokota mawe ili wamtupie , lakini Yesu akajificha , akatoka Hekaluni .

text: And as Jesus passed by , he saw a man which was blind from his birth .
text2: Yesu alipokuwa akipita alimwona mtu mmoja , kipofu tangu kuzaliwa .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Master , who did sin , this man , or his parents , that he was born blind ?
text2: Basi , wanafunzi wakamwuliza , " Mwalimu ! Ni nani aliyetenda dhambi : mtu huyu , ama wazazi wake , hata akazaliwa kipofu ? "

text: Jesus answered , Neither hath this man sinned , nor his parents : but that the works of God should be made manifest in him .
text2: Yesu akajibu , " Jambo hili halikutukia kwa sababu ya dhambi zake yeye , wala dhambi za wazazi wake ; ila alizaliwa kipofu ili nguvu ya Mungu ionekane ikifanya kazi ndani yake .

text: I must work the works of him that sent me , while it is day : the night cometh , when no man can work .
text2: Kukiwa bado mchana yatupasa kuendelea kufanya kazi za yule aliyenituma ; maana usiku unakuja ambapo mtu hawezi kufanya kazi .

text: As long as I am in the world , I am the light of the world .
text2: Wakati ningali ulimwenguni , mimi ni mwanga wa ulimwengu . "

text: When he had thus spoken , he spat on the ground , and made clay of the spittle , and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay ,
text2: Baada ya kusema hayo , akatema mate chini , akafanyiza tope , akampaka yule kipofu machoni ,

text: And said unto him , Go , wash in the pool of Siloam , ( which is by interpretation , Sent . ) He went his way therefore , and washed , and came seeing .
text2: akamwambia , " Nenda ukanawe katika bwawa la Siloamu . " ( maana ya jina hili ni " aliyetumwa " ) . Basi , huyo kipofu akaenda , akanawa , kisha akarudi akiwa anaona .

text: The neighbours therefore , and they which before had seen him that he was blind , said , Is not this he that sat and begged ?
text2: Basi , jirani zake na wale waliokuwa wanajua kwamba hapo awali alikuwa maskini mwombaji , wakasema , " Je , huyu siye yule maskini aliyekuwa akiketi na kuomba ? "

text: Some said , This is he : others said , He is like him : but he said , I am he .
text2: Baadhi yao wakasema , " Ndiye . " Wengine wakasema , " La ! Ila anafanana naye . " Lakini huyo aliyekuwa kipofu akasema , " Ni mimi ! "

text: Therefore said they unto him , How were thine eyes opened ?
text2: Basi , wakamwuliza , " Sasa , macho yako yalipataje kufumbuliwa ? "

text: He answered and said , A man that is called Jesus made clay , and anointed mine eyes , and said unto me , Go to the pool of Siloam , and wash : and I went and washed , and I received sight .
text2: Naye akawajibu , " Yule mtu aitwaye Yesu alifanya tope , akanipaka machoni na kuniambia : Nenda ukanawe katika bwawa la Siloamu . Basi , mimi nikaenda , nikanawa , nikapata kuona . "

text: Then said they unto him , Where is he ? He said , I know not .
text2: Wakamwuliza , " Yeye yuko wapi ? " Naye akawajibu , " Mimi sijui ! "

text: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind .
text2: Kisha wakampeleka huyo mtu aliyekuwa kipofu kwa Mafarisayo .

text: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay , and opened his eyes .
text2: Siku hiyo Yesu alipofanya tope na kumfumbua macho mtu huyo , ilikuwa siku ya Sabato .

text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight . He said unto them , He put clay upon mine eyes , and I washed , and do see .
text2: Basi , Mafarisayo wakamwuliza mtu huyo , " Umepataje kuona ? " Naye akawaambia , " Alinipaka tope machoni , nami nikanawa na sasa naona . "

text: Therefore said some of the Pharisees , This man is not of God , because he keepeth not the sabbath day . Others said , How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles ? And there was a division among them .
text2: Baadhi ya Mafarisayo wakasema , " Mtu huyu hakutoka kwa Mungu , maana hashiki sheria ya Sabato . " Lakini wengine wakasema , " Mtu mwenye dhambi awezaje kufanya ishara za namna hii ? " Kukawa na mafarakano kati yao .

text: They say unto the blind man again , What sayest thou of him , that he hath opened thine eyes ? He said , He is a prophet .
text2: Wakamwuliza tena huyo mtu aliyekuwa kipofu , " Maadam yeye amekufungua macho , wasemaje juu yake ? " Naye akawaambia , " Yeye ni nabii ! "

text: But the Jews did not believe concerning him , that he had been blind , and received his sight , until they called the parents of him that had received his sight .
text2: Viongozi wa Wayahudi hawakusadiki kwamba mtu huyo alikuwa kipofu hapo awali na sasa anaona mpaka walipowaita wazazi wake .

text: And they asked them , saying , Is this your son , who ye say was born blind ? how then doth he now see ?
text2: Basi , wakawauliza hao wazazi , " Je , huyu ndiye mtoto wenu ambaye ninyi mwasema alizaliwa kipofu ? Sasa amepataje kuona ? "

text: His parents answered them and said , We know that this is our son , and that he was born blind :
text2: Wazazi wake wakajibu , " Tunajua kwamba huyu ni mtoto wetu , na kwamba alizaliwa kipofu .

text: But by what means he now seeth , we know not ; or who hath opened his eyes , we know not : he is of age ; ask him : he shall speak for himself .
text2: Lakini amepataje kuona , hatujui ; na wala hatumjui yule aliyemfumbua macho . Mwulizeni yeye mwenyewe ; yeye ni mtu mzima , anaweza kujitetea mwenyewe . "

text: These words spake his parents , because they feared the Jews : for the Jews had agreed already , that if any man did confess that he was Christ , he should be put out of the synagogue .
text2: Wazazi wake walisema hivyo kwa sababu waliwaogopa viongozi wa Wayahudi kwani viongozi hao walikuwa wamepatana ya kwamba mtu yeyote atakayekiri kwamba Yesu ni Kristo atafukuzwa nje ya sunagogi .

text: Therefore said his parents , He is of age ; ask him .
text2: Ndiyo maana wazazi wake walisema : " Yeye ni mtu mzima , mwulizeni . "

text: Then again called they the man that was blind , and said unto him , Give God the praise : we know that this man is a sinner .
text2: Basi , wakamwita tena aliyekuwa kipofu , wakamwambia , " Sema ukweli mbele ya Mungu ! Sisi tunajua kwamba mtu huyu ni mwenye dhambi . "

text: He answered and said , Whether he be a sinner or no , I know not : one thing I know , that , whereas I was blind , now I see .
text2: Yeye akajibu , " Kama ni mwenye dhambi mimi sijui . Lakini kitu kimoja najua : Nilikuwa kipofu , na sasa naona . "

text: Then said they to him again , What did he to thee ? how opened he thine eyes ?
text2: Basi , wakamwuliza , " Alikufanyia nini ? Alikufumbuaje macho yako ? "

text: He answered them , I have told you already , and ye did not hear : wherefore would ye hear it again ? will ye also be his disciples ?
text2: Huyo mtu akawajibu , " Nimekwisha waambieni , nanyi hamkusikiliza ; kwa nini mwataka kusikia tena ? Je , ninyi pia mnataka kuwa wafuasi wake ? "

text: Then they reviled him , and said , Thou art his disciple ; but we are Moses ' disciples .
text2: Lakini wao wakamtukana wakisema , " Wewe ni mfuasi wake ; sisi ni wafuasi wa Mose .

text: We know that God spake unto Moses : as for this fellow , we know not from whence he is .
text2: Sisi tunajua kwamba Mungu alisema na Mose , lakini mtu huyu hatujui ametoka wapi ! "

text: The man answered and said unto them , Why herein is a marvellous thing , that ye know not from whence he is , and yet he hath opened mine eyes .
text2: Naye akawajibu , " Hili ni jambo la kushangaza ! Ninyi hamjui ametoka wapi , lakini amenifumbua macho yangu !

text: Now we know that God heareth not sinners : but if any man be a worshipper of God , and doeth his will , him he heareth .
text2: Tunajua kwamba Mungu hawasikilizi watu wenye dhambi , ila humsikiliza yeyote mwenye kumcha na kutimiza mapenzi yake .

text: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind .
text2: Tangu mwanzo wa ulimwengu haijasikika kwamba mtu ameyafumbua macho ya mtu aliyezaliwa kipofu .

text: If this man were not of God , he could do nothing .
text2: Kama mtu huyu hakutoka kwa Mungu , hangeweza kufanya chochote ! "

text: They answered and said unto him , Thou wast altogether born in sins , and dost thou teach us ? And they cast him out .
text2: Wao wakamjibu , " Wewe ulizaliwa na kulelewa katika dhambi ; unawezaje kutufundisha sisi ? " Basi , wakamfukuzia mbali .

text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out ; and when he had found him , he said unto him , Dost thou believe on the Son of God ?
text2: Yesu alisikia kwamba walikuwa wamemfukuzia mbali , naye alipomkuta akamwuliza , " Je , wewe unamwamini Mwana wa Mtu ? "

text: He answered and said , Who is he , Lord , that I might believe on him ?
text2: Huyo mtu akajibu , " Mheshimiwa , niambie yeye ni nani , ili nipate kumwamini . "

text: And Jesus said unto him , Thou hast both seen him , and it is he that talketh with thee .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Umekwisha mwona , naye ndiye anayesema nawe sasa . "

text: And he said , Lord , I believe . And he worshipped him .
text2: Basi , huyo mtu akasema , " Ninaamini Bwana ! " Akamsujudia .

text: And Jesus said , For judgment I am come into this world , that they which see not might see ; and that they which see might be made blind .
text2: Yesu akasema , " Mimi nimekuja ulimwenguni kutoa hukumu , kusudi wasioona wapate kuona , na wale wanaoona wawe vipofu . "

text: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words , and said unto him , Are we blind also ?
text2: Baadhi ya Mafarisayo waliokuwa pamoja naye walisikia maneno hayo , wakamwuliza , " Je , sisi pia ni vipofu ? "

text: Jesus said unto them , If ye were blind , ye should have no sin : but now ye say , We see ; therefore your sin remaineth .
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Kama mngekuwa vipofu , hamngekuwa na hatia ; lakini sasa ninyi mwasema : Sisi tunaona , na hiyo yaonyesha kwamba mna hatia bado .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that entereth not by the door into the sheepfold , but climbeth up some other way , the same is a thief and a robber .
text2: Yesu alisema " Kweli nawaambieni , yeyote yule asiyeingia katika zizi la kondoo kwa kupitia mlangoni , bali hupenya na kuingia kwa njia nyingine , huyo ni mwizi na mnyang ' anyi .

text: But he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
text2: Lakini anayeingia kwa kupitia mlangoni , huyo ndiye mchungaji wa kondoo .

text: To him the porter openeth ; and the sheep hear his voice : and he calleth his own sheep by name , and leadeth them out .
text2: Mngoja mlango wa zizi humfungulia , na kondoo husikia sauti yake , naye huwaita kondoo wake kila mmoja kwa jina lake na kuwaongoza nje .

text: And when he putteth forth his own sheep , he goeth before them , and the sheep follow him : for they know his voice .
text2: Akisha watoa nje huwatangulia mbele nao kondoo humfuata , kwani wanaijua sauti yake .

text: And a stranger will they not follow , but will flee from him : for they know not the voice of strangers .
text2: Kondoo hao hawawezi kumfuata mgeni , bali watamkimbia kwa sababu hawaijui sauti yake . "

text: This parable spake Jesus unto them : but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them .
text2: Yesu aliwaambia mfano huo , lakini wao hawakuelewa alichotaka kuwaambia .

text: Then said Jesus unto them again , Verily , verily , I say unto you , I am the door of the sheep .
text2: Basi , akasema tena , " Kweli nawaambieni , mimi ni mlango wa kondoo .

text: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers : but the sheep did not hear them .
text2: Wale wengine wote waliokuja kabla yangu ni wezi na wanyang ' anyi , nao kondoo hawakuwasikiliza .

text: I am the door : by me if any man enter in , he shall be saved , and shall go in and out , and find pasture .
text2: Mimi ni mlango . Anayeingia kwa kupitia kwangu ataokolewa ; ataingia na kutoka , na kupata malisho .

text: The thief cometh not , but for to steal , and to kill , and to destroy : I am come that they might have life , and that they might have it more abundantly .
text2: Mwizi huja kwa shabaha ya kuiba , kuua na kuharibu . Mimi nimekuja mpate kuwa na uzima - - uzima kamili .

text: I am the good shepherd : the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep .
text2: " Mimi ni mchungaji mwema . Mchungaji mwema huutoa uhai wake kwa ajili ya kondoo wake .

text: But he that is an hireling , and not the shepherd , whose own the sheep are not , seeth the wolf coming , and leaveth the sheep , and fleeth : and the wolf catcheth them , and scattereth the sheep .
text2: Mtu wa kuajiriwa ambaye si mchungaji , na wala kondoo si mali yake , anapoona mbwa mwitu anakuja , huwaacha kondoo na kukimbia . Kisha mbwa mwitu huwakamata na kuwatawanya .

text: The hireling fleeth , because he is an hireling , and careth not for the sheep .
text2: Yeye hajali kitu juu ya kondoo kwa sababu yeye ni mtu wa mshahara tu .

text: I am the good shepherd , and know my sheep , and am known of mine .
text2: Mimi ni mchungaji mwema . Nawajua walio wangu , nao walio wangu wananijua mimi ,

text: As the Father knoweth me , even so know I the Father : and I lay down my life for the sheep .
text2: kama vile Baba anijuavyo , nami nimjuavyo Baba . Mimi nayatoa maisha yangu kwa ajili yao .

text: And other sheep I have , which are not of this fold : them also I must bring , and they shall hear my voice ; and there shall be one fold , and one shepherd .
text2: Tena ninao kondoo wengine ambao hawamo zizini humu . Inanibidi kuwaleta hao pia , nao wataisikia sauti yangu , na kutakuwako kundi moja na mchungaji mmoja .

text: Therefore doth my Father love me , because I lay down my life , that I might take it again .
text2: " Baba ananipenda kwani nautoa uhai wangu ili nipate kuupokea tena .

text: No man taketh it from me , but I lay it down of myself . I have power to lay it down , and I have power to take it again . This commandment have I received of my Father .
text2: Hakuna mtu anayeninyang ' anya uhai wangu ; mimi na nautoa kwa hiari yangu mwenyewe . Ninao uwezo wa kuutoa na uwezo wa kuuchukua tena . Hivi ndivyo Baba alivyoniamuru nifanye . "

text: There was a division therefore again among the Jews for these sayings .
text2: Kukawa tena na mafarakano kati ya Wayahudi kwa sababu ya maneno haya .

text: And many of them said , He hath a devil , and is mad ; why hear ye him ?
text2: Wengi wao wakasema , " Ana pepo ; tena ni mwendawazimu ! Ya nini kumsikiliza ? "

text: Others said , These are not the words of him that hath a devil . Can a devil open the eyes of the blind ?
text2: Wengine wakasema , " Haya si maneno ya mwenye pepo . Je , pepo anaweza kuyafumbua macho ya vipofu ? "

text: And it was at Jerusalem the feast of the dedication , and it was winter .
text2: Huko Yerusalemu kulikuwa na sikukuu ya Kutabaruku . Wakati huo ulikuwa wa baridi .

text: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Naye Yesu akawa anatembea Hekaluni katika ukumbi wa Solomoni .

text: Then came the Jews round about him , and said unto him , How long dost thou make us to doubt ? If thou be the Christ , tell us plainly .
text2: Basi , Wayahudi wakamzunguka , wakamwuliza , " Utatuacha katika mashaka mpaka lini ? Kama wewe ndiye Kristo , basi , tuambie wazi . "

text: Jesus answered them , I told you , and ye believed not : the works that I do in my Father ' s name , they bear witness of me .
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Nimewaambieni , lakini hamsadiki . Kazi ninazozifanya mimi kwa jina la Baba yangu zinanishuhudia .

text: But ye believe not , because ye are not of my sheep , as I said unto you .
text2: Lakini ninyi hamsadiki kwa sababu ninyi si kondoo wangu .

text: My sheep hear my voice , and I know them , and they follow me :
text2: Kondoo wangu huisikia sauti yangu ; mimi nawajua , nao hunifuata .

text: And I give unto them eternal life ; and they shall never perish , neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand .
text2: Mimi nawapa uzima wa milele ; nao hawatapotea milele , wala hakuna mtu atakayeweza kuwatoa mkononi mwangu .

text: My Father , which gave them me , is greater than all ; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father ' s hand .
text2: Baba yangu ambaye ndiye aliyenipa hao ni mkuu kuliko wote , wale hakuna awezaye kuwatoa mikononi mwake Baba .

text: I and my Father are one .
text2: Mimi na Baba , tu mmoja . "

text: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him .
text2: Basi , Wayahudi wakachukua mawe ili wamtupie .

text: Jesus answered them , Many good works have I shewed you from my Father ; for which of those works do ye stone me ?
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Nimewaonyesheni kazi nyingi kutoka kwa Baba . Ni ipi kati ya hizo inayowafanya mnipige mawe ? "

text: The Jews answered him , saying , For a good work we stone thee not ; but for blasphemy ; and because that thou , being a man , makest thyself God .
text2: Wayahudi wakamjibu , " Hatukupigi mawe kwa ajili ya tendo jema , ila kwa sababu ya kukufuru ! Maana wajifanya kuwa Mungu hali wewe ni binadamu tu . "

text: Jesus answered them , Is it not written in your law , I said , Ye are gods ?
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Je , haikuandikwa katika Sheria yenu : Mimi nimesema , ninyi ni miungu ?

text: If he called them gods , unto whom the word of God came , and the scripture cannot be broken ;
text2: Mungu aliwaita miungu wale waliopewa neno lake ; nasi twajua kwamba Maandiko Matakatifu yasema ukweli daima .

text: Say ye of him , whom the Father hath sanctified , and sent into the world , Thou blasphemest ; because I said , I am the Son of God ?
text2: Je , yeye ambaye Baba alimweka wakfu na kumtuma ulimwenguni , mnamwambia : Unakufuru , eti kwa sababu nilisema : Mimi ni Mwana wa Mungu ?

text: If I do not the works of my Father , believe me not .
text2: Kama sifanyi kazi za Baba yangu msiniamini .

text: But if I do , though ye believe not me , believe the works : that ye may know , and believe , that the Father is in me , and I in him .
text2: Lakini ikiwa ninazifanya , hata kama hamniamini , walau ziaminini hizo kazi mpate kujua na kutambua kwamba Baba yuko ndani yangu , nami niko ndani yake . "

text: Therefore they sought again to take him : but he escaped out of their hand ,
text2: Wakajaribu tena kumkamata lakini akachopoka mikononi mwao .

text: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized ; and there he abode .
text2: Yesu akaenda tena ng ' ambo ya mto Yordani , mahali Yohane alipokuwa akibatiza , akakaa huko .

text: And many resorted unto him , and said , John did no miracle : but all things that John spake of this man were true .
text2: Watu wengi walimwendea wakasema , " Yohane hakufanya ishara yoyote . Lakini yale yote Yohane aliyosema juu ya mtu huyu ni kweli kabisa . "

text: And many believed on him there .
text2: Watu wengi mahali hapo wakamwamini .

text: Now a certain man was sick , named Lazarus , of Bethany , the town of Mary and her sister Martha .
text2: Mtu mmoja aitwaye Lazaro , mwenyeji wa Bethania , alikuwa mgonjwa . ( Kijiji cha Bethania kilikuwa mahali walipokaa Maria na Martha , dada yake .

text: ( It was that Mary which anointed the Lord with ointment , and wiped his feet with her hair , whose brother Lazarus was sick . )
text2: Maria ndiye yule aliyempaka Bwana marashi na kumpangusa kwa nywele zake . Lazaro , kaka yake , ndiye aliyekuwa mgonjwa . )

text: Therefore his sisters sent unto him , saying , Lord , behold , he whom thou lovest is sick .
text2: Basi , hao dada wakatuma ujumbe huu kwa Yesu : " Bwana , rafiki yako ni mgonjwa ! "

text: When Jesus heard that , he said , This sickness is not unto death , but for the glory of God , that the Son of God might be glorified thereby .
text2: Yesu aliposikia hivyo akasema , " Ugonjwa huo hautaleta kifo , ila ni kwa ajili ya kumtukuza Mungu ; ameugua ili kwa njia hiyo Mwana wa Mungu atukuzwe . "

text: Now Jesus loved Martha , and her sister , and Lazarus .
text2: Yesu aliwapenda Martha , dada yake na Lazaro .

text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick , he abode two days still in the same place where he was .
text2: Alipopata habari kwamba Lazaro ni mgonjwa , Yesu aliendelea kukaa mahali hapo alipokuwa kwa siku mbili zaidi .

text: Then after that saith he to his disciples , Let us go into Judaea again .
text2: Kisha akawaambia wanafunzi wake , " Twendeni tena Yudea ! "

text: His disciples say unto him , Master , the Jews of late sought to stone thee ; and goest thou thither again ?
text2: Wanafunzi wakamwambia , " Mwalimu ! Muda mfupi tu umepita tangu Wayahudi walipotaka kukuua kwa mawe , nawe unataka kwenda huko tena ? "

text: Jesus answered , Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If any man walk in the day , he stumbleth not , because he seeth the light of this world .
text2: Yesu akajibu , " Je , saa za mchana si kumi na mbili ? Basi , mtu akitembea mchana hawezi kujikwaa kwa kuwa anauona mwanga wa ulimwengu huu .

text: But if a man walk in the night , he stumbleth , because there is no light in him .
text2: Lakini mtu akitembea usiku atajikwaa kwa maana mwanga haumo ndani yake . "

text: These things said he : and after that he saith unto them , Our friend Lazarus sleepeth ; but I go , that I may awake him out of sleep .
text2: Yesu alipomaliza kusema maneno hayo , akawaambia , " Rafiki yetu Lazaro amelala , lakini mimi nitakwenda kumwamsha . "

text: Then said his disciples , Lord , if he sleep , he shall do well .
text2: Wanafunzi wake wakamwambia , " Bwana , ikiwa amelala , basi atapona . "

text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death : but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep .
text2: Wao walidhani kwamba alikuwa amesema juu ya kulala usingizi , kumbe alikuwa amesema juu ya kifo cha Lazaro .

text: Then said Jesus unto them plainly , Lazarus is dead .
text2: Basi , Yesu akawaambia waziwazi , " Lazaro amekufa ;

text: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there , to the intent ye may believe ; nevertheless let us go unto him .
text2: Lakini nafurahi kwa ajili yenu kwamba sikuwako huko , ili mpate kuamini . Haya , twendeni kwake . "

text: Then said Thomas , which is called Didymus , unto his fellowdisciples , Let us also go , that we may die with him .
text2: Thoma ( aitwaye Pacha ) akawaambia wanafunzi wenzake , " Twendeni nasi tukafe pamoja naye ! "

text: Then when Jesus came , he found that he had lain in the grave four days already .
text2: Yesu alipofika huko alikuta Lazaro amekwisha kaa kaburini kwa siku nne .

text: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem , about fifteen furlongs off :
text2: Kijiji cha Bethania kilikuwa karibu na Yerusalemu umbali upatao kilomita tatu .

text: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary , to comfort them concerning their brother .
text2: Wayahudi wengi walikuwa wamefika kwa Martha na Maria kuwafariji kwa kifo cha kaka yao .

text: Then Martha , as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming , went and met him : but Mary sat still in the house .
text2: Basi , Martha aliposikia kwamba Yesu alikuwa anakuja , akaenda kumlaki ; lakini Maria alibaki nyumbani .

text: Then said Martha unto Jesus , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Martha akamwambia Yesu , " Bwana , kama ungalikuwa hapa , kaka yangu hangalikufa !

text: But I know , that even now , whatsoever thou wilt ask of God , God will give it thee .
text2: Lakini najua kwamba hata sasa chochote utakachomwomba Mungu , atakupa . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Thy brother shall rise again .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Kaka yako atafufuka . "

text: Martha saith unto him , I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day .
text2: Martha akamjibu , " Najua kwamba atafufuka wakati wa ufufuo , siku ya mwisho . "

text: Jesus said unto her , I am the resurrection , and the life : he that believeth in me , though he were dead , yet shall he live :
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Mimi ndimi ufufuo na uzima . Anayeniamini mimi hata kama anakufa , ataishi :

text: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die . Believest thou this ?
text2: na kila anayeishi na kuniamini , hatakufa kamwe . Je , waamini hayo ? "

text: She saith unto him , Yea , Lord : I believe that thou art the Christ , the Son of God , which should come into the world .
text2: Martha akamwambia , " Ndiyo Bwana ! Naamini kwamba wewe ndiwe Kristo , Mwana wa Mungu , yule ajaye ulimwenguni . "

text: And when she had so said , she went her way , and called Mary her sister secretly , saying , The Master is come , and calleth for thee .
text2: Baada ya kusema hayo , Martha alikwenda kumwita Maria , dada yake , akamwabia faraghani , " Mwalimu yuko hapa , anakuita . "

text: As soon as she heard that , she arose quickly , and came unto him .
text2: Naye aliposikia hivyo , akainuka mara , akamwendea Yesu .

text: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town , but was in that place where Martha met him .
text2: Yesu alikuwa hajaingia kijijini , ila alikuwa bado mahali palepale Martha alipomlaki .

text: The Jews then which were with her in the house , and comforted her , when they saw Mary , that she rose up hastily and went out , followed her , saying , She goeth unto the grave to weep there .
text2: Basi , Wayahudi waliokuwa nyumbani pamoja na Maria wakimfariji walipomwona ameinuka na kutoka nje ghafla , walimfuata . Walidhani alikuwa anakwenda kaburini kuomboleza .

text: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was , and saw him , she fell down at his feet , saying unto him , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Basi , Maria alipofika mahali pale Yesu alipokuwa na kumwona , alipiga magoti , akamwabia , " Bwana , kama ungalikuwa hapa , kaka yangu hangalikufa ! "

text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping , and the Jews also weeping which came with her , he groaned in the spirit , and was troubled ,
text2: Yesu alipomwona analia , na wale Wayahudi waliokuja pamoja naye wanalia pia , alijawa na huzuni na kufadhaika moyoni .

text: And said , Where have ye laid him ? They said unto him , Lord , come and see .
text2: Kisha akawauliza , " Mlimweka wapi ? " Wakamwambia , " Bwana , njoo uone . "

text: Jesus wept .
text2: Yesu akalia machozi .

text: Then said the Jews , Behold how he loved him !
text2: Basi , Wayahudi wakasema , " Tazameni jinsi alivyompenda ! "

text: And some of them said , Could not this man , which opened the eyes of the blind , have caused that even this man should not have died ?
text2: Lakini baadhi yao wakasema , " Je , huyu aliyemfumbua macho yule kipofu , hakuweza kumfanya Lazaro asife ? "

text: Jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the grave . It was a cave , and a stone lay upon it .
text2: Basi , Yesu akiwa amehuzunika tena moyoni , akafika kaburini . Kaburi lenyewe lilikuwa pango , na lilikuwa limefunikwa kwa jiwe .

text: Jesus said , Take ye away the stone . Martha , the sister of him that was dead , saith unto him , Lord , by this time he stinketh : for he hath been dead four days .
text2: Yesu akasema , " Ondoeni hilo jiwe ! " Martha , dada yake huyo aliyekufa , akamwambia , " Bwana , amekwishaanza kunuka ; amekaa kaburini siku nne ! "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Said I not unto thee , that , if thou wouldest believe , thou shouldest see the glory of God ?
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Je , sikukwambia kwamba ukiamini utaona utukufu wa Mungu ? "

text: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid . And Jesus lifted up his eyes , and said , Father , I thank thee that thou hast heard me .
text2: Basi , wakaliondoa lile jiwe . Yesu akatazama juu mbinguni , akasema , " Nakushukuru Baba kwa kuwa wewe wanisikiliza .

text: And I knew that thou hearest me always : but because of the people which stand by I said it , that they may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Najua kwamba unanisikiliza daima . Lakini nimesema hayo kwa ajili ya watu hawa waliopo hapa ili wapate kuamini kwamba wewe ndiwe uliyenituma . "

text: And when he thus had spoken , he cried with a loud voice , Lazarus , come forth .
text2: Alipokwisha sema hayo , akaita kwa sauti kubwa : " Lazaro ! Toka nje ! "

text: And he that was dead came forth , bound hand and foot with graveclothes : and his face was bound about with a napkin . Jesus saith unto them , Loose him , and let him go .
text2: Huyo aliyekuwa amekufa akatoka nje , huku amefungwa sanda miguu na mikono , na uso wake umefunikwa . Yesu akawaambia , " Mfungueni , mkamwache aende zake . "

text: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary , and had seen the things which Jesus did , believed on him .
text2: Basi , Wayahudi wengi waliokuwa wamefika kwa Maria walipoona kitendo hicho alichokifanya Yesu wakamwamini .

text: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees , and told them what things Jesus had done .
text2: Lakini baadhi yao walikwenda kwa Mafarisayo wakatoa taarifa ya jambo hilo alilofanya Yesu .

text: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council , and said , What do we ? for this man doeth many miracles .
text2: kwa hiyo makuhani wakuu na Mafarisayo wakafanya kikao cha Baraza kuu , wakasema , " Tufanye nini ? Mtu huyu anafanya ishara nyingi mno .

text: If we let him thus alone , all men will believe on him : and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation .
text2: Tukimwacha tu watu wote watamwamini , nao Waroma watakuja kuliharibu Hekalu letu na taifa letu ! "

text: And one of them , named Caiaphas , being the high priest that same year , said unto them , Ye know nothing at all ,
text2: Hapo , mmoja wao aitwaye Kayafa , ambaye alikuwa Kuhani Mkuu mwaka huo , akawaambia , " Ninyi hamjui kitu !

text: Nor consider that it is expedient for us , that one man should die for the people , and that the whole nation perish not .
text2: Je , hamwoni kwamba ni afadhali kwenu mtu mmoja afe kwa ajili ya watu , kuliko taifa zima liangamizwe ? "

text: And this spake he not of himself : but being high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation ;
text2: Yeye hakusema hivyo kwa hiari yake mwenyewe , bali kwa vile alikuwa Kuhani Mkuu mwaka huo , alibashiri kwamba Yesu atakufa kwa ajili ya taifa lao ;

text: And not for that nation only , but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad .
text2: na wala si kwa ajili yao tu , bali pia apate kuwaleta pamoja watoto wa Mungu waliotawanyika .

text: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death .
text2: Basi , tangu siku hiyo viongozi wa Wayahudi walifanya mipango ya kumwua Yesu .

text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews ; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness , into a city called Ephraim , and there continued with his disciples .
text2: Kwa hiyo , Yesu hakutembea tena hadharani kati ya Wayahudi , bali alitoka hapo , akaenda mahali karibu na jangwa , katika mji uitwao Efraimu . Akakaa huko pamoja na wanafunzi wake .

text: And the Jews ' passover was nigh at hand : and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover , to purify themselves .
text2: Sikukuu ya Wayahudi ya Pasaka ilikuwa karibu , na watu wengi walikwenda Yerusalemu ili wajitakase kabla ya sikukuu hiyo .

text: Then sought they for Jesus , and spake among themselves , as they stood in the temple , What think ye , that he will not come to the feast ?
text2: Basi , wakawa wanamtafuta Yesu ; nao walipokusanyika pamoja Hekaluni wakaulizana , " Mwaonaje ? Yaonekana kwamba haji kabisa kwenye sikukuu , au sivyo ? "

text: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment , that , if any man knew where he were , he should shew it , that they might take him .
text2: Makuhani wakuu na Mafarisayo walikuwa wametoa amri kwamba mtu akijua mahali aliko Yesu awaarifu kusudi wamtie nguvuni .

text: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany , where Lazarus was which had been dead , whom he raised from the dead .
text2: Siku sita kabla ya sikukuu ya Pasaka , Yesu alifika Bethania alikoishi Lazaro ambaye Yesu alikuwa amemfufua kutoka wafu .

text: There they made him a supper ; and Martha served : but Lazarus was one of them that sat at the table with him .
text2: Huko walimwandalia chakula cha jioni , naye Martha akawa anawatumikia . Lazaro alikuwa mmoja wa wale waliokuwa mezani pamoja na Yesu .

text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard , very costly , and anointed the feet of Jesus , and wiped his feet with her hair : and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment .
text2: Basi , Maria alichukua chupa ya marashi ya nardo safi ya thamani kubwa , akampaka Yesu miguu na kuipangusa kwa nywele zake . Nyumba yote ikajaa harufu ya marashi .

text: Then saith one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , which should betray him ,
text2: Basi , Yuda Iskarioti , mmoja wa wale kumi na wawili ambaye ndiye atakayemsaliti Yesu , akasema ,

text: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence , and given to the poor ?
text2: " Kwa nini marashi hayo hayakuuzwa kwa fedha dinari mia tatu , wakapewa maskini ? "

text: This he said , not that he cared for the poor ; but because he was a thief , and had the bag , and bare what was put therein .
text2: Alisema hivyo , si kwa kuwa alijali chochote juu ya maskini , bali kwa sababu alikuwa mweka hazina , na kwa kuwa alikuwa mwizi , mara kwa mara aliiba kutoka katika hiyo hazina .

text: Then said Jesus , Let her alone : against the day of my burying hath she kept this .
text2: Lakini Yesu akasema , " Msimsumbue huyu mama ! Mwacheni ayaweke kwa ajili ya siku ya mazishi yangu .

text: For the poor always ye have with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Maskini mtakuwa nao siku zote , lakini hamtakuwa nami siku zote . "

text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there : and they came not for Jesus ' sake only , but that they might see Lazarus also , whom he had raised from the dead .
text2: Wayahudi wengi walisikia kwamba Yesu alikuwa Bethania . Basi , wakafika huko si tu kwa ajili ya kumwona Yesu , ila pia wapate kumwona Lazaro ambaye Yesu alimfufua kutoka wafu .

text: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death ;
text2: Makuhani wakuu waliamua pia kumwua Lazaro ,

text: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away , and believed on Jesus .
text2: Maana kwa sababu ya Lazaro Wayahudi wengi waliwaasi viongozi wao , wakamwamini Yesu .

text: On the next day much people that were come to the feast , when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem ,
text2: Kesho yake , kundi kubwa la watu waliokuja kwenye sikukuu walisikia kuwa Yesu alikuwa njiani kuja Yerusalemu .

text: Took branches of palm trees , and went forth to meet him , and cried , Hosanna : Blessed is the King of Israel that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Basi , wakachukua matawi ya mitende , wakatoka kwenda kumlaki ; wakapaaza sauti wakisema : " Hosana ! Abarikiwe huyo ajaye kwa jina la Bwana . Abarikiwe mfalme wa Israeli . "

text: And Jesus , when he had found a young ass , sat thereon ; as it is written ,
text2: Yesu akampata mwana punda mmoja akapanda juu yake kama yasemavyo Maandiko :

text: Fear not , daughter of Sion : behold , thy King cometh , sitting on an ass ' s colt .
text2: " Usiogope mji wa Sioni ! Tazama , Mfalme wako anakuja , Amepanda mwana punda . "

text: These things understood not his disciples at the first : but when Jesus was glorified , then remembered they that these things were written of him , and that they had done these things unto him .
text2: Wakati huo wanafunzi wake hawakuelewa mambo hayo , lakini Yesu alipokwisha tukuzwa , ndipo walipokumbuka kwamba hayo yalikuwa yameandikwa juu yake , na kwamba watu walikuwa wamemtendea hivyo .

text: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave , and raised him from the dead , bare record .
text2: Kundi la watu wale waliokuwa pamoja naye wakati alipomwita Lazaro kutoka kaburini , akamfufua kutoka wafu , walisema yaliyotukia .

text: For this cause the people also met him , for that they heard that he had done this miracle .
text2: Kwa hiyo umati huo wa watu ulimlaki , maana wote walisikia kwamba Yesu alikuwa amefanya ishara hiyo .

text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves , Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing ? behold , the world is gone after him .
text2: Basi , Mafarisayo wakaambiana , " Mnaona ? Hatuwezi kufanya chochote ! Tazameni , ulimwengu wote unamfuata . "

text: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast :
text2: Kulikuwa na Wagiriki kadhaa miongoni mwa watu waliokuwa wamefika Yerusalemu kuabudu wakati wa sikukuu hiyo .

text: The same came therefore to Philip , which was of Bethsaida of Galilee , and desired him , saying , Sir , we would see Jesus .
text2: Hao walimwendea Filipo , mwenyeji wa Bethsaida katika Galilaya , wakasema , " Mheshimiwa , tunataka kumwona Yesu . "

text: Philip cometh and telleth Andrew : and again Andrew and Philip tell Jesus .
text2: Filipo akaenda akamwambia Andrea , nao wawili wakaenda kumwambia Yesu .

text: And Jesus answered them , saying , The hour is come , that the Son of man should be glorified .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Saa ya kutukuzwa kwa Mwana wa Mtu imefika !

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die , it abideth alone : but if it die , it bringeth forth much fruit .
text2: Kweli nawaambieni , punje ya ngano hubaki punje tu isipokuwa ikianguka katika udongo na kufa . Kama ikifa , basi huzaa matunda mengi .

text: He that loveth his life shall lose it ; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal .
text2: Anayependa maisha yake , atayapoteza ; anayeyachukia maisha yake katika ulimwengu huu , atayaweka kwa ajili ya uzima wa milele .

text: If any man serve me , let him follow me ; and where I am , there shall also my servant be : if any man serve me , him will my Father honour .
text2: Anayetaka kunitumikia ni lazima anifuate , hivyo kwamba popote pale nilipo mimi ndipo na mtumishi wangu atakapokuwa . Mtu yeyote anayenitumikia Baba yangu atampa heshima .

text: Now is my soul troubled ; and what shall I say ? Father , save me from this hour : but for this cause came I unto this hour .
text2: " Sasa roho yangu imefadhaika , na niseme nini ? Je , niseme : Baba , usiruhusu saa hii inifikie ? Lakini ndiyo maana nimekuja - - ili nipite katika saa hii .

text: Father , glorify thy name . Then came there a voice from heaven , saying , I have both glorified it , and will glorify it again .
text2: Baba , ulitukuze jina lako . " Hapo sauti ikasema kutoka mbinguni , " Nimelitukuza , na nitalitukuza tena . "

text: The people therefore , that stood by , and heard it , said that it thundered : others said , An angel spake to him .
text2: Umati wa watu waliokuwa wamesimama hapo walisikia sauti hiyo , na baadhi yao walisema , " Malaika ameongea naye ! "

text: Jesus answered and said , This voice came not because of me , but for your sakes .
text2: Lakini Yesu akawaambia , " Sauti hiyo haikutokea kwa ajili yangu mimi , ila kwa ajili yenu .

text: Now is the judgment of this world : now shall the prince of this world be cast out .
text2: Sasa ndio wakati wa ulimwengu huu kuhukumiwa ; sasa mtawala wa ulimwengu huu atapinduliwa .

text: And I , if I be lifted up from the earth , will draw all men unto me .
text2: Nami nitakapoinuliwa juu ya nchi nitamvuta kila mmoja kwangu . "

text: This he said , signifying what death he should die .
text2: ( Kwa kusema hivyo alionyesha atakufa kifo gani ) .

text: The people answered him , We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever : and how sayest thou , The Son of man must be lifted up ? who is this Son of man ?
text2: Basi , umati huo ukamjibu , " Sisi tunaambiwa na Sheria yetu kwamba Kristo atadumu milele . Wawezaje basi , kusema ati Mwana wa Mtu anapaswa kuinuliwa ? Huyo Mwana wa Mtu ni nani ? "

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Yet a little while is the light with you . Walk while ye have the light , lest darkness come upon you : for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Mwanga bado uko nanyi kwa muda mfupi . Tembeeni mngali mnao huo mwanga ili giza lisiwapate ; maana atembeaye gizani hajui aendako .

text: While ye have light , believe in the light , that ye may be the children of light . These things spake Jesus , and departed , and did hide himself from them .
text2: Basi , wakati mnao huo mwanga uaminini ili mpate kuwa watu wa mwanga . " Baada ya kusema maneno hayo , Yesu alikwenda zake na kujificha mbali nao .

text: But though he had done so many miracles before them , yet they believed not on him :
text2: Ingawa Yesu alifanya miujiza hii yote mbele yao , wao hawakumwamini .

text: That the saying of Esaias the prophet might be fulfilled , which he spake , Lord , who hath believed our report ? and to whom hath the arm of the Lord been revealed ?
text2: Hivyo maneno aliyosema nabii Isaya yakatimia : " Bwana , nani aliyeuamini ujumbe wetu ? Na uwezo wa Bwana umedhihirishwa kwa nani ? "

text: Therefore they could not believe , because that Esaias said again ,
text2: Hivyo hawakuweza kuamini , kwani Isaya tena alisema :

text: He hath blinded their eyes , and hardened their heart ; that they should not see with their eyes , nor understand with their heart , and be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: " Mungu ameyapofusha macho yao , amezipumbaza akili zao ; wasione kwa macho yao , wasielewe kwa akili zao ; wala wasinigeukie , asema Bwana , ili nipate kuwaponya . "

text: These things said Esaias , when he saw his glory , and spake of him .
text2: Isaya alisema maneno haya kwa sababu aliuona utukufu wa Yesu , akasema habari zake .

text: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him ; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him , lest they should be put out of the synagogue :
text2: Hata hivyo , wengi wa viongozi wa Wayahudi walimwamini Yesu . Lakini kwa sababu ya Mafarisayo , hawakumkiri hadharani kwa kuogopa kwamba watatengwa na sunagogi .

text: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God .
text2: Walipendelea kusifiwa na watu kuliko kusifiwa na Mungu

text: Jesus cried and said , He that believeth on me , believeth not on me , but on him that sent me .
text2: Kisha Yesu akasema kwa sauti kubwa , " Mtu aliyeniamini , haniamini mimi tu , ila anamwamini pia yule aliyenituma .

text: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me .
text2: Anayeniona mimi anamwona pia yule aliyenituma .

text: I am come a light into the world , that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness .
text2: Mimi ni mwanga , nami nimekuja ulimwenguni ili wote wanaoniamini wasibaki gizani .

text: And if any man hear my words , and believe not , I judge him not : for I came not to judge the world , but to save the world .
text2: Anayeyasikia maneno yangu lakini hayashiki mimi sitamhukumu ; maana sikuja kuhukumu ulimwengu bali kuuokoa .

text: He that rejecteth me , and receiveth not my words , hath one that judgeth him : the word that I have spoken , the same shall judge him in the last day .
text2: Asiyeyashika maneno yangu anaye wa kumhukumu : neno lile nililosema ni hakimu wake siku ya mwisho .

text: For I have not spoken of myself ; but the Father which sent me , he gave me a commandment , what I should say , and what I should speak .
text2: Mimi sikunena kwa mamlaka yangu mwenyewe , ila Baba aliyenituma ndiye aliyeniamuru niseme nini na niongee nini .

text: And I know that his commandment is life everlasting : whatsoever I speak therefore , even as the Father said unto me , so I speak .
text2: Nami najua kuwa amri yake huleta uzima wa milele . Basi , mimi nasema tu yale Baba aliyoniagiza niyaseme . "

text: Now before the feast of the passover , when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father , having loved his own which were in the world , he loved them unto the end .
text2: Ilikuwa kabla ya sikukuu ya Pasaka . Yesu alijua kwamba saa yake ya kuondoka ulimwenguni na kwenda kwa Baba ilikuwa imefika . Alikuwa amewapenda daima watu wake walioko duniani ; naam , aliwapenda mpaka mwisho !

text: And supper being ended , the devil having now put into the heart of Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , to betray him ;
text2: Basi , Yesu na wanafunzi wake walikuwa mezani kwa chakula cha jioni . Ibilisi alikwisha mtia Yuda , mwana wa Simoni Iskarioti , nia ya kumsaliti Yesu .

text: Jesus knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands , and that he was come from God , and went to God ;
text2: Yesu alijua kwamba Baba alikuwa amemkabidhi kila kitu , na kwamba alikuwa ametoka kwa Mungu na anarudi kwa Mungu .

text: He riseth from supper , and laid aside his garments ; and took a towel , and girded himself .
text2: Basi , Yesu aliondoka mezani , akaweka kando vazi lake , akachukua kitambaa na kujifunga kiunoni .

text: After that he poureth water into a bason , and began to wash the disciples ' feet , and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded .
text2: Kisha akatia maji katika bakuli , akaanza kuwaosha wanafunzi wake miguu na kuipangusa kwa kile kitambaa alichojifungia .

text: Then cometh he to Simon Peter : and Peter saith unto him , Lord , dost thou wash my feet ?
text2: Basi , akamfikia Simoni Petro ; naye Petro akasema , " Bwana , wewe utaniosha miguu mimi ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , What I do thou knowest not now ; but thou shalt know hereafter .
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Huelewi sasa ninachofanya lakini utaelewa baadaye . "

text: Peter saith unto him , Thou shalt never wash my feet . Jesus answered him , If I wash thee not , thou hast no part with me .
text2: Petro akamwambia , " Wewe hutaniosha miguu kamwe ! " Yesu akamjibu , " Nisipokuosha hutakuwa na uhusiano nami tena . "

text: Simon Peter saith unto him , Lord , not my feet only , but also my hands and my head .
text2: Simoni Petro akamwambia , " Bwana , nioshe , si miguu tu , bali na mikono yangu na kichwa pia . "

text: Jesus saith to him , He that is washed needeth not save to wash his feet , but is clean every whit : and ye are clean , but not all .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Aliyekwisha oga hana lazima ya kunawa isipokuwa miguu , maana amekwisha takata mwili wote . Ninyi mmetakata , lakini si nyote . "

text: For he knew who should betray him ; therefore said he , Ye are not all clean .
text2: ( Yesu alimjua yule ambaye atamsaliti , ndiyo maana alisema : " Ninyi mmetakata , lakini si nyote . " )

text: So after he had washed their feet , and had taken his garments , and was set down again , he said unto them , Know ye what I have done to you ?
text2: Alipokwisha waosha miguu na kuvaa tena vazi lake , aliketi mezani , akawaambia , " Je , mmeelewa hayo niliyowatendeeni ?

text: Ye call me Master and Lord : and ye say well ; for so I am .
text2: Ninyi mwaniita Mwalimu na Bwana , nanyi mwasema vyema , kwa kuwa ndimi .

text: If I then , your Lord and Master , have washed your feet ; ye also ought to wash one another ' s feet .
text2: Basi , ikiwa mimi niliye Bwana na Mwalimu , nimewaosha ninyi miguu , nanyi pia mnapaswa kuoshana miguu .

text: For I have given you an example , that ye should do as I have done to you .
text2: Nimewapeni mfano , ili nanyi pia mfanye kama nilivyowafanyieni .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord ; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him .
text2: Kweli nawaambieni , mtumishi si mkuu zaidi kuliko bwana wake , wala mtume si mkuu zaidi kuliko yule aliyemtuma .

text: If ye know these things , happy are ye if ye do them .
text2: Basi , ikiwa mwayajua hayo , mtakuwa na heri mkiyatekeleza .

text: I speak not of you all : I know whom I have chosen : but that the scripture may be fulfilled , He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me .
text2: " Haya nisemayo hayawahusu ninyi nyote . Mimi nawajua wale niliowachagua . Lakini lazima yatimie Maandiko Matakatifu yasemayo : Yule aliyeshiriki chakula changu amegeuka kunishambulia .

text: Now I tell you before it come , that , when it is come to pass , ye may believe that I am he .
text2: Mimi nimewaambieni mambo haya sasa kabla hayajatokea , ili yatakapotokea mpate kuamini kuwa mimi ndimi .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that receiveth whomsoever I send receiveth me ; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: Kweli nawaambieni anayempokea yule ninayemtuma anaponipokea mimi ; na anayenipokea mimi , anampokea yule aliyenituma . "

text: When Jesus had thus said , he was troubled in spirit , and testified , and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Alipokwisha sema hayo , Yesu alifadhaika sana rohoni , akasema wazi , " Kweli nawaambieni , mmoja wenu atanisaliti ! "

text: Then the disciples looked one on another , doubting of whom he spake .
text2: Wanafunzi wakatazama wasiweze kabisa kujua anasema nani .

text: Now there was leaning on Jesus ' bosom one of his disciples , whom Jesus loved .
text2: Mmoja wa wanafunzi , ambaye Yesu alikuwa anampenda sana , alikuwa ameketi karibu na Yesu .

text: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him , that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake .
text2: Basi , Simoni Petro akamwashiria na kusema : " Mwulize anasema juu ya nani . "

text: He then lying on Jesus ' breast saith unto him , Lord , who is it ?
text2: Mwanafunzi huyo akasogea karibu zaidi na Yesu , akamwuliza , " Bwana , ni nani ? "

text: Jesus answered , He it is , to whom I shall give a sop , when I have dipped it . And when he had dipped the sop , he gave it to Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon .
text2: Yesu akajibu , " Yule nitakayempa kipande cha mkate nilichochovya katika sahani , ndiye . " Basi , akatwaa kipande cha mkate , akakichovya katika sahani , akampa Yuda , mwana wa Simoni Iskarioti .

text: And after the sop Satan entered into him . Then said Jesus unto him , That thou doest , do quickly .
text2: Yuda alipokwisha pokea kipande hicho , Shetani akamwingia . Basi Yesu akamwambia , " Unachotaka kufanya , kifanye haraka ! "

text: Now no man at the table knew for what intent he spake this unto him .
text2: Lakini hakuna hata mmoja wa wale waliokaa pale mezani aliyefahamu kwa nini alikuwa amemwambia hivyo .

text: For some of them thought , because Judas had the bag , that Jesus had said unto him , Buy those things that we have need of against the feast ; or , that he should give something to the poor .
text2: Kwa kuwa Yuda alikuwa na wajibu wa kuutunza mfuko wa fedha , baadhi yao walidhani kwamba Yesu alikuwa amemwambia anunue vilivyohitajiwa kwa sikukuu , au kwamba alikuwa amemwambia akatoe chochote kwa maskini .

text: He then having received the sop went immediately out : and it was night .
text2: Basi , Yuda alipokwisha twaa kile kipande cha mkate , akatoka nje mara . Na ilikuwa usiku .

text: Therefore , when he was gone out , Jesus said , Now is the Son of man glorified , and God is glorified in him .
text2: Baada ya Yuda kuondoka , Yesu akasema , " Sasa Mwana wa Mtu ametukuzwa , naye Mungu ametukuzwa ndani yake .

text: If God be glorified in him , God shall also glorify him in himself , and shall straightway glorify him .
text2: Na kama utukufu wa Mungu umefunuliwa ndani ya Mwana , basi , naye Mungu ataudhihirisha utukufu wa Mwana ndani yake mwenyewe , na atafanya hivyo mara .

text: Little children , yet a little while I am with you . Ye shall seek me : and as I said unto the Jews , Whither I go , ye cannot come ; so now I say to you .
text2: " Watoto wangu , bado niko nanyi kwa muda mfupi tu . Mtanitafuta , lakini sasa nawaambieni yale niliyowaambia viongozi wa Wayahudi : Niendako ninyi hamwezi kwenda !

text: A new commandment I give unto you , That ye love one another ; as I have loved you , that ye also love one another .
text2: Nawapeni amri mpya : pendaneni ; pendaneni kama nilivyowapenda ninyi .

text: By this shall all men know that ye are my disciples , if ye have love one to another .
text2: Mkipendana , watu wote watajua kwamba ninyi ni wanafunzi wangu . "

text: Simon Peter said unto him , Lord , whither goest thou ? Jesus answered him , Whither I go , thou canst not follow me now ; but thou shalt follow me afterwards .
text2: Simoni Petro akamwuliza , " Bwana , unakwenda wapi ? " Yesu akajibu , " Niendako huwezi kunifuata sasa , lakini utanifuata baadaye . "

text: Peter said unto him , Lord , why cannot I follow thee now ? I will lay down my life for thy sake .
text2: Petro akamwambia " Bwana , kwa nini siwezi kukufuata sasa ? Niko tayari kufa kwa ajili yako ! "

text: Jesus answered him , Wilt thou lay down thy life for my sake ? Verily , verily , I say unto thee , The cock shall not crow , till thou hast denied me thrice .
text2: Yesu akajibu , " Je , uko tayari kweli kufa kwa ajili yangu ? Kweli nakwambia , kabla jogoo hajawika utanikana mara tatu ! "

text: Let not your heart be troubled : ye believe in God , believe also in me .
text2: Yesu aliwaambia , " Msifadhaike mioyoni mwenu . Mwaminini Mungu , niaminini na mimi pia .

text: In my Father ' s house are many mansions : if it were not so , I would have told you . I go to prepare a place for you .
text2: Nyumbani mwa Baba yangu mna makao mengi ; la sivyo ningalikwisha waambieni . Sasa nakwenda kuwatayarishieni nafasi .

text: And if I go and prepare a place for you , I will come again , and receive you unto myself ; that where I am , there ye may be also .
text2: Na nikienda na kuwatayarishieni nafasi , nitarudi na kuwachukueni kwangu , ili nanyi muwe pale nilipo mimi .

text: And whither I go ye know , and the way ye know .
text2: Mnajua njia ya kwenda huko ninakokwenda . "

text: Thomas saith unto him , Lord , we know not whither thou goest ; and how can we know the way ?
text2: Thoma akamwuliza , " Bwana , hatujui unakokwenda , tutawezaje basi , kuijua hiyo njia ? "

text: Jesus saith unto him , I am the way , the truth , and the life : no man cometh unto the Father , but by me .
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Mimi ni njia , na ukweli na uzima . Hakuna awezaye kwenda kwa Baba ila kwa kupitia kwangu .

text: If ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also : and from henceforth ye know him , and have seen him .
text2: Ikiwa mnanijua mimi mnamjua na Baba yangu pia . Na tangu sasa , mnamjua , tena mmekwisha mwona . "

text: Philip saith unto him , Lord , shew us the Father , and it sufficeth us .
text2: Filipo akamwambia , " Bwana , tuonyeshe Baba , nasi tutatosheka . "

text: Jesus saith unto him , Have I been so long time with you , and yet hast thou not known me , Philip ? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father ; and how sayest thou then , Shew us the Father ?
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Filipo , nimekaa nanyi muda wote huu , nawe hujanijua ? Aliyekwisha niona mimi amemwona Baba . Unawezaje basi , kusema : Tuonyeshe Baba ?

text: Believest thou not that I am in the Father , and the Father in me ? the words that I speak unto you I speak not of myself : but the Father that dwelleth in me , he doeth the works .
text2: Je , huamini kwamba mimi niko ndani ya Baba , naye Baba yuko ndani yangu ? Maneno ninayowaambieni nyote siyasemi kwa mamlaka yangu ; Baba aliye ndani yangu anafanya kazi yake .

text: Believe me that I am in the Father , and the Father in me : or else believe me for the very works ' sake .
text2: Mnapaswa kuniamini ninaposema kwamba mimi niko ndani ya Baba naye Baba yuko ndani yangu . Ama sivyo , aminini kwa sababu ya mambo ninayofanya .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me , the works that I do shall he do also ; and greater works than these shall he do ; because I go unto my Father .
text2: Kweli nawaambieni , anayeniamini atafanya mambo ninayofanya mimi ; naam , atafanya hata makuu zaidi , maana nakwenda kwa Baba .

text: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name , that will I do , that the Father may be glorified in the Son .
text2: Na chochote mtakachoomba kwa jina langu nitafanya , ili Baba atukuzwe ndani ya Mwana .

text: If ye shall ask any thing in my name , I will do it .
text2: Mkiniomba chochote kwa jina langu , nitawafanyieni .

text: If ye love me , keep my commandments .
text2: " Mkinipenda mtazishika amri zangu .

text: And I will pray the Father , and he shall give you another Comforter , that he may abide with you for ever ;
text2: Nami nitamwomba Baba naye atawapeni Msaidizi mwingine , atakayekaa nanyi milele .

text: Even the Spirit of truth ; whom the world cannot receive , because it seeth him not , neither knoweth him : but ye know him ; for he dwelleth with you , and shall be in you .
text2: Yeye ni Roho wa kweli . Ulimwengu hauwezi kumpokea kwa sababu hauwezi kumwona wala kumjua . Lakini ninyi mnamjua kwa sababu anabaki nanyi na yu ndani yenu .

text: I will not leave you comfortless : I will come to you .
text2: " Sitawaacha ninyi yatima ; nitakuja tena kwenu .

text: Yet a little while , and the world seeth me no more ; but ye see me : because I live , ye shall live also .
text2: Bado kidogo nao ulimwengu hautaniona tena , lakini ninyi mtaniona ; na kwa kuwa mimi ni hai , nanyi pia mtakuwa hai .

text: At that day ye shall know that I am in my Father , and ye in me , and I in you .
text2: Siku ile itakapofika mtajua kwamba mimi niko ndani ya Baba , nanyi mko ndani yangu , nami ndani yenu .

text: He that hath my commandments , and keepeth them , he it is that loveth me : and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father , and I will love him , and will manifest myself to him .
text2: Azipokeaye amri zangu na kuzishika , yeye ndiye anipendaye . Naye anipendaye mimi atapendwa na Baba yangu , nami nitampenda na kujidhihirisha kwake . "

text: Judas saith unto him , not Iscariot , Lord , how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us , and not unto the world ?
text2: Yuda ( si yule Iskarioti ) akamwambia , " Bwana , itawezekanaje wewe kujidhihirisha kwetu na si kwa ulimwengu ? "

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , If a man love me , he will keep my words : and my Father will love him , and we will come unto him , and make our abode with him .
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Mtu akinipenda atashika neno langu , na Baba yangu atampenda , nasi tutakuja kwake na kukaa naye .

text: He that loveth me not keepeth not my sayings : and the word which ye hear is not mine , but the Father ' s which sent me .
text2: Asiyenipenda hashiki maneno yangu . Na neno mlilosikia si langu , bali ni lake Baba aliyenituma .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , being yet present with you .
text2: " Nimewaambieni mambo haya nikiwa bado pamoja nanyi

text: But the Comforter , which is the Holy Ghost , whom the Father will send in my name , he shall teach you all things , and bring all things to your remembrance , whatsoever I have said unto you .
text2: lakini Msaidizi , Roho Mtakatifu , ambaye Baba atamtuma kwa jina langu , atawafundisheni kila kitu na kuwakumbusheni yote niliyowaambieni .

text: Peace I leave with you , my peace I give unto you : not as the world giveth , give I unto you . Let not your heart be troubled , neither let it be afraid .
text2: " Nawaachieni amani ; nawapeni amani yangu . Siwapi ninyi kama vile ulimwengu ufanyavyo . Msiwe na wasiwasi , wala msifadhaike .

text: Ye have heard how I said unto you , I go away , and come again unto you . If ye loved me , ye would rejoice , because I said , I go unto the Father : for my Father is greater than I .
text2: Mlikwisha sikia nikiwaambieni : Ninakwenda zangu , kisha nitarudi tena kwenu . Kama mngalinipenda mngalifurahi kwa sababu ninakwenda kwa Baba , maana yeye ni mkuu kuliko mimi .

text: And now I have told you before it come to pass , that , when it is come to pass , ye might believe .
text2: Nimewaambieni haya sasa kabla hayajatokea , ili yatakapotokea mpate kuamini .

text: Hereafter I will not talk much with you : for the prince of this world cometh , and hath nothing in me .
text2: Sitasema nanyi tena mambo mengi , maana mtawala wa ulimwengu huu anakuja . Kwangu mimi hawezi kitu ;

text: But that the world may know that I love the Father ; and as the Father gave me commandment , even so I do . Arise , let us go hence .
text2: lakini ulimwengu unapaswa kujua kwamba nampenda Baba , na ndiyo maana nafanya kila kitu kama Baba alivyoniamuru . Simameni , tutoke hapa ! "

text: I am the true vine , and my Father is the husbandman .
text2: " Mimi ni mzabibu wa kweli , na Baba yangu ndiye mkulima .

text: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away : and every branch that beareth fruit , he purgeth it , that it may bring forth more fruit .
text2: Yeye huliondoa ndani yangu kila tawi lisilozaa matunda , na kila tawi lizaalo hulisafisha lipate kuzaa zaidi .

text: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you .
text2: Ninyi mmekwisha kuwa safi kwa sababu ya ule ujumbe niliowaambieni .

text: Abide in me , and I in you . As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself , except it abide in the vine ; no more can ye , except ye abide in me .
text2: Kaeni ndani yangu , nami nikae ndani yenu . Tawi haliwezi peke yake kuzaa matunda lisipokaa katika mzabibu hali kadhalika nanyi hamwezi kuzaa matunda msipokaa ndani yangu .

text: I am the vine , ye are the branches : He that abideth in me , and I in him , the same bringeth forth much fruit : for without me ye can do nothing .
text2: " Mimi ni mzabibu , nanyi ni matawi yake . Akaaye ndani yangu , nami ndani yake , huyo atazaa matunda mengi , maana bila mimi hamwezi kufanya chochote .

text: If a man abide not in me , he is cast forth as a branch , and is withered ; and men gather them , and cast them into the fire , and they are burned .
text2: Mtu yeyote asipokaa ndani yangu hutupwa nje kama tawi litupwalo nje hata likakauka . Watu huliokota tawi la namna hiyo na kulitupa motoni liungue .

text: If ye abide in me , and my words abide in you , ye shall ask what ye will , and it shall be done unto you .
text2: Mkikaa ndani yangu na maneno yangu yakikaa ndani yenu , basi , ombeni chochote mtakacho nanyi mtapewa .

text: Herein is my Father glorified , that ye bear much fruit ; so shall ye be my disciples .
text2: Baba yangu hutukuzwa kama mkizaa matunda mengi na kuwa wanafunzi wangu .

text: As the Father hath loved me , so have I loved you : continue ye in my love .
text2: Mimi nimewapenda ninyi kama vile Baba alivyonipenda mimi . Kaeni katika pendo langu .

text: If ye keep my commandments , ye shall abide in my love ; even as I have kept my Father ' s commandments , and abide in his love .
text2: Mkizishika amri zangu mtakaa katika pendo langu , kama vile nami nilivyozishika amri za Baba yangu na kukaa katika pendo lake .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that my joy might remain in you , and that your joy might be full .
text2: Nimewaambieni mambo haya ili furaha yangu ikae ndani yenu , na furaha yenu ikamilike .

text: This is my commandment , That ye love one another , as I have loved you .
text2: Hii ndiyo amri yangu : pendaneni ; pendaneni kama nilivyowapenda ninyi .

text: Greater love hath no man than this , that a man lay down his life for his friends .
text2: Hakuna upendo mkuu zaidi kuliko upendo wa mtu atoaye uhai wake kwa ajili ya rafiki zake .

text: Ye are my friends , if ye do whatsoever I command you .
text2: Ninyi ni rafiki zangu mkifanya ninayowaamuru .

text: Henceforth I call you not servants ; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth : but I have called you friends ; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you .
text2: Ninyi siwaiti tena watumishi , maana mtumishi hajui anachofanya bwana wake . Lakini mimi nimewaita ninyi rafiki , kwa sababu nimewajulisha yote ambayo nimeyasikia kutoka kwa Baba yangu .

text: Ye have not chosen me , but I have chosen you , and ordained you , that ye should go and bring forth fruit , and that your fruit should remain : that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name , he may give it you .
text2: Ninyi hamkunichagua mimi ; mimi niliwachagueni na kuwatuma mwende mkazae matunda , matunda yadumuyo , naye Baba apate kuwapa ninyi chochote mumwombacho kwa jina langu .

text: These things I command you , that ye love one another .
text2: Basi , amri yangu kwenu ndiyo hii : pendaneni .

text: If the world hate you , ye know that it hated me before it hated you .
text2: " Kama ulimwengu ukiwachukia ninyi , kumbukeni kwamba umenichukia mimi kabla haujawachukia ninyi .

text: If ye were of the world , the world would love his own : but because ye are not of the world , but I have chosen you out of the world , therefore the world hateth you .
text2: Kama mngalikuwa watu wa ulimwengu , ulimwengu ungaliwapenda ninyi kama watu wake . Lakini kwa vile ninyi si wa ulimwengu , ila mimi nimewachagueni kutoka ulimwenguni , kwa sababu hiyo ulimwengu unawachukieni .

text: Remember the word that I said unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord . If they have persecuted me , they will also persecute you ; if they have kept my saying , they will keep yours also .
text2: Kumbukeni niliyowaambieni : mtumishi si mkuu zaidi kuliko bwana wake . Ikiwa wamenitesa mimi , watawatesa na ninyi pia ; kama wameshika neno langu , watalishika na lenu pia .

text: But all these things will they do unto you for my name ' s sake , because they know not him that sent me .
text2: Lakini hayo yote watawatendeeni ninyi kwa sababu ya jina langu , kwani hawamjui yeye aliyenituma .

text: If I had not come and spoken unto them , they had not had sin : but now they have no cloke for their sin .
text2: Kama nisingalikuja na kusema nao wasingalikuwa na hatia ; lakini sasa hawawezi kujitetea kwamba hawana dhambi .

text: He that hateth me hateth my Father also .
text2: Anayenichukia mimi , anamchukia na Baba yangu pia .

text: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did , they had not had sin : but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father .
text2: Kama nisingalifanya kwao mambo ambayo hakuna mtu mwingine amekwisha yafanya wasingalikuwa na hatia ; lakini sasa wameona niliyoyafanya wakinichukia mimi , wakamchukia na Baba yangu pia .

text: But this cometh to pass , that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law , They hated me without a cause .
text2: Na hivi ni lazima yatimie yale yaliyoandikwa katika Sheria yao : Wamenichukia bure !

text: But when the Comforter is come , whom I will send unto you from the Father , even the Spirit of truth , which proceedeth from the Father , he shall testify of me :
text2: " Atakapokuja huyo Msaidizi nitakayemtuma kwenu kutoka kwa Baba , huyo Roho wa kweli atokaye kwa Baba , yeye atanishuhudia mimi .

text: And ye also shall bear witness , because ye have been with me from the beginning .
text2: Nanyi pia mtanishuhudia kwa kuwa mmekuwa nami tangu mwanzo .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that ye should not be offended .
text2: " Nimewaambieni hayo kusudi msiiache imani yenu .

text: They shall put you out of the synagogues : yea , the time cometh , that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service .
text2: Watu watawatenga ninyi na masunagogi yao . Tena , wakati unakuja ambapo kila atakayewaua ninyi atadhani anamhudumia Mungu .

text: And these things will they do unto you , because they have not known the Father , nor me .
text2: Watawatendeeni mambo hayo kwa sababu hawamjui Baba , wala hawanijui mimi .

text: But these things have I told you , that when the time shall come , ye may remember that I told you of them . And these things I said not unto you at the beginning , because I was with you .
text2: Basi , nimewaambieni mambo haya ili saa yake itakapofika mkumbuke kwamba niliwaambieni . " Sikuwaambieni mambo haya tangu mwanzo kwa sababu nilikuwa pamoja nanyi .

text: But now I go my way to him that sent me ; and none of you asketh me , Whither goest thou ?
text2: Lakini sasa namwendea yule aliyenituma ; na hakuna hata mmoja wenu anayeniuliza : Unakwenda wapi ?

text: But because I have said these things unto you , sorrow hath filled your heart .
text2: Kwa kuwa nimewaambieni mambo hayo mmejaa huzuni mioyoni mwenu .
