text: Nevertheless I tell you the truth ; It is expedient for you that I go away : for if I go not away , the Comforter will not come unto you ; but if I depart , I will send him unto you .
text2: Lakini , nawaambieni ukweli : afadhali kwenu mimi niende zangu , maana nisipokwenda Msaidizi hatakuja kwenu . Lakini nikienda , basi , nitamtuma kwenu .

text: And when he is come , he will reprove the world of sin , and of righteousness , and of judgment :
text2: Naye atakapokuja atawathibitishia walimwengu kwamba wamekosea kuhusu dhambi , uadilifu na hukumu ya Mungu .

text: Of sin , because they believe not on me ;
text2: Wamekosea kuhusu dhambi kwa sababu hawaniamini ;

text: Of righteousness , because I go to my Father , and ye see me no more ;
text2: kuhusu uadilifu , kwa sababu naenda zangu kwa Baba , nanyi hamtaniona tena ;

text: Of judgment , because the prince of this world is judged .
text2: kuhusu hukumu kwa sababu mkuu wa ulimwengu huu amekwisha hukumiwa .

text: I have yet many things to say unto you , but ye cannot bear them now .
text2: " Ninayo bado mengi ya kuwaambieni , ila kwa sasa hamwezi kuyastahimili .

text: Howbeit when he , the Spirit of truth , is come , he will guide you into all truth : for he shall not speak of himself ; but whatsoever he shall hear , that shall he speak : and he will shew you things to come .
text2: Lakini atakapokuja huyo Roho wa kweli atawaongoza kwenye ukweli wote ; maana hatasema kwa mamlaka yake mwenyewe , bali atawaambieni yote atakayosikia , na atasema mambo yatakayokuwa yanakuja .

text: He shall glorify me : for he shall receive of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Yeye atanitukuza mimi kwa kuwa atawaambieni yale atakayopata kutoka kwangu .

text: All things that the Father hath are mine : therefore said I , that he shall take of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Vyote alivyo navyo Baba ni vyangu ; ndiyo maana nimesema kwamba huyo Roho Mtakatifu atawaambieni yale atakayopata kutoka kwangu .

text: A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me , because I go to the Father .
text2: " Bado kitambo kidogo nanyi hamtaniona ; na baada ya kitambo kidogo tena mtaniona ! "

text: Then said some of his disciples among themselves , What is this that he saith unto us , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me : and , Because I go to the Father ?
text2: Hapo baadhi ya wanafunzi wake wakaulizana , " Ana maana gani anapotwambia : Bado kitambo kidogo nanyi hamtaniona ; na baada ya kitambo kidogo tena mtaniona ? Tena anasema : Kwa kuwa ninakwenda kwa Baba ! "

text: They said therefore , What is this that he saith , A little while ? we cannot tell what he saith .
text2: Basi , wakawa wanaulizana , " Ana maana gani anaposema : Bado kitambo kidogo ? Hatuelewi anaongelea nini . "

text: Now Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him , and said unto them , Do ye inquire among yourselves of that I said , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me ?
text2: Yesu alijua kwamba walitaka kumwuliza , basi akawaambia , " Je , mnaulizana juu ya yale niliyosema : Bado kitambo kidogo nanyi hamtaniona ; na baada ya kitambo kidogo tena mtaniona ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , That ye shall weep and lament , but the world shall rejoice : and ye shall be sorrowful , but your sorrow shall be turned into joy .
text2: Nawaambieni kweli , ninyi mtalia na kuomboleza , lakini ulimwengu utafurahi : mtaona huzuni lakini huzuni yenu itageuka kuwa furaha .

text: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow , because her hour is come : but as soon as she is delivered of the child , she remembereth no more the anguish , for joy that a man is born into the world .
text2: Wakati mama anapojifungua huona huzuni kwa sababu saa ya maumivu imefika ; lakini akisha jifungua hayakumbuki tena maumivu hayo kwa sababu ya furaha kwamba mtu amezaliwa duniani .

text: And ye now therefore have sorrow : but I will see you again , and your heart shall rejoice , and your joy no man taketh from you .
text2: Ninyi pia mna huzuni sasa ; lakini nitawajieni tena , nanyi mtajaa furaha mioyoni mwenu , na furaha hiyo hakuna mtu atakayeiondoa kwenu .

text: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing . Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name , he will give it you .
text2: Siku hiyo hamtaniomba chochote . Kweli nawaambieni , chochote mtakachomwomba Baba kwa jina langu , atawapeni .

text: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name : ask , and ye shall receive , that your joy may be full .
text2: Mpaka sasa hamjaomba chochote kwa jina langu . Ombeni nanyi mtapata ili furaha yenu ikamilike .

text: These things have I spoken unto you in proverbs : but the time cometh , when I shall no more speak unto you in proverbs , but I shall shew you plainly of the Father .
text2: " Nimewaambieni mambo hayo kwa mafumbo . Lakini wakati utakuja ambapo sitasema tena nanyi kwa mafumbo , bali nitawaambieni waziwazi juu ya Baba .

text: At that day ye shall ask in my name : and I say not unto you , that I will pray the Father for you :
text2: Siku hiyo mtaomba kwa jina langu , na siwaambii kwamba nitamwomba Baba kwa niaba yenu ;

text: For the Father himself loveth you , because ye have loved me , and have believed that I came out from God .
text2: maana yeye mwenyewe anawapenda ninyi , kwa sababu ninyi mmenipenda mimi na mmeamini kwamba nimetoka kwa Mungu .

text: I came forth from the Father , and am come into the world : again , I leave the world , and go to the Father .
text2: Mimi nilitoka kwa Baba , nikaja ulimwenguni ; na sasa nauacha ulimwengu na kurudi kwa Baba . "

text: His disciples said unto him , Lo , now speakest thou plainly , and speakest no proverb .
text2: Basi , wanafunzi wake wakamwambia , " Ahaa ! Sasa unasema waziwazi kabisa bila kutumia mafumbo .

text: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things , and needest not that any man should ask thee : by this we believe that thou camest forth from God .
text2: Sasa tunajua kwamba wewe unajua kila kitu , na huna haja ya kuulizwa maswali na mtu yeyote ; kwa hiyo tunaamini kwamba umetoka kwa Mungu . "

text: Jesus answered them , Do ye now believe ?
text2: Yesu akawajibu , " Je , mnaamini sasa ?

text: Behold , the hour cometh , yea , is now come , that ye shall be scattered , every man to his own , and shall leave me alone : and yet I am not alone , because the Father is with me .
text2: Wakati unakuja , tena umekwisha fika , ambapo ninyi nyote mtatawanyika kila mtu kwake , nami nitaachwa peke yangu . Kumbe , lakini mimi siko peke yangu , maana Baba yu pamoja nami .

text: These things I have spoken unto you , that in me ye might have peace . In the world ye shall have tribulation : but be of good cheer ; I have overcome the world .
text2: Nimewaambieni mambo haya ili mpate kuwa na amani katika kuungana nami . Ulimwenguni mtapata masumbuko ; lakini jipeni moyo ! Mimi nimeushinda ulimwengu ! "

text: These words spake Jesus , and lifted up his eyes to heaven , and said , Father , the hour is come ; glorify thy Son , that thy Son also may glorify thee :
text2: Yesu alipokwisha sema hayo , alitazama juu mbinguni , akasema , " Baba , saa imefika ! Mtukuze Mwanao ili naye Mwana apate kukutukuza .

text: As thou hast given him power over all flesh , that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him .
text2: Maana ulimpa Mwanao mamlaka juu ya watu wote ili awape uzima wa milele wote hao uliompa .

text: And this is life eternal , that they might know thee the only true God , and Jesus Christ , whom thou hast sent .
text2: Na uzima wa milele ndio huu : kukujua wewe uliye peke yako Mungu wa kweli , na kumjua Yesu Kristo uliyemtuma .

text: I have glorified thee on the earth : I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do .
text2: Mimi nimekutukuza hapa duniani ; nimeikamilisha ile kazi uliyonipa nifanye .

text: And now , O Father , glorify thou me with thine own self with the glory which I had with thee before the world was .
text2: Sasa , Baba , nitukuze mbele yako kwa ule utukufu niliokuwa nao kabla ya kuumbwa ulimwengu .

text: I have manifested thy name unto the men which thou gavest me out of the world : thine they were , and thou gavest them me ; and they have kept thy word .
text2: " Nimekufanya ujulikane kwa watu wale ulionipa kutoka duniani . Walikuwa watu wako , nawe ukanipa wawe wangu ; nao wamelishika neno lako .

text: Now they have known that all things whatsoever thou hast given me are of thee .
text2: Sasa wanajua kwamba kila ulichonipa kimetoka kwako .

text: For I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me ; and they have received them , and have known surely that I came out from thee , and they have believed that thou didst send me .
text2: Mimi nimewapa ule ujumbe ulionipa nao wameupokea ; wanajua kwamba kweli nimetoka kwako , na wanaamini kwamba wewe ulinituma .

text: I pray for them : I pray not for the world , but for them which thou hast given me ; for they are thine .
text2: " Nawaombea hao ; siuombei ulimwengu , ila nawaombea hao ulionipa , maana ni wako .

text: And all mine are thine , and thine are mine ; and I am glorified in them .
text2: Yote niliyo nayo ni yako , na yako ni yangu ; na utukufu wangu umeonekana ndani yao .

text: And now I am no more in the world , but these are in the world , and I come to thee . Holy Father , keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me , that they may be one , as we are .
text2: Na sasa naja kwako ; simo tena ulimwenguni , lakini wao wamo ulimwenguni . Baba Mtakatifu ! Kwa nguvu ya jina lako ulilonipa , tafadhali uwaweke salama ili wawe kitu kimoja kama sisi tulivyo mmoja .

text: While I was with them in the world , I kept them in thy name : those that thou gavest me I have kept , and none of them is lost , but the son of perdition ; that the scripture might be fulfilled .
text2: Nilipokuwa nao , mimi niliwaweka salama kwa nguvu ya jina lako ulilonipa . Mimi nimewalinda , wala hakuna hata mmoja wao aliyepotea , isipokuwa yule aliyelazimika kupotea ili Maandiko Matakatifu yapate kutimia .

text: And now come I to thee ; and these things I speak in the world , that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves .
text2: Basi , sasa naja kwako , na nimesema mambo haya ulimwenguni , ili waweze kushiriki kikamilifu furaha yangu .

text: I have given them thy word ; and the world hath hated them , because they are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Mimi nimewapa neno lako , nao ulimwengu ukawachukia , kwa sababu wao si wa ulimwengu kama vile nami nisivyo wa ulimwengu .

text: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world , but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil .
text2: Siombi uwatoe ulimwenguni , bali naomba uwakinge na yule Mwovu .

text: They are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Wao si wa ulimwengu , kama vile nami nisivyo wa ulimwengu .

text: Sanctify them through thy truth : thy word is truth .
text2: Waweke wakfu kwa ukweli ; neno lako ni ukweli .

text: As thou hast sent me into the world , even so have I also sent them into the world .
text2: Kama vile ulivyonituma ulimwenguni , nami pia nimewatuma wao ulimwenguni ;

text: And for their sakes I sanctify myself , that they also might be sanctified through the truth .
text2: na kwa ajili yao mimi mwenyewe najiweka wakfu ili nao pia wafanywe wakfu katika ukweli .

text: Neither pray I for these alone , but for them also which shall believe on me through their word ;
text2: " Siwaombei hao tu , bali nawaombea pia wote watakaoamini kutokana na ujumbe wao .

text: That they all may be one ; as thou , Father , art in me , and I in thee , that they also may be one in us : that the world may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Naomba ili wote wawe kitu kimoja . Baba ! Naomba wawe ndani yetu kama vile wewe ulivyo ndani yangu nami ndani yako . Naomba wawe kitu kimoja kusudi ulimwengu upate kuamini kwamba wewe ulinituma .

text: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them ; that they may be one , even as we are one :
text2: Mimi nimewapa utukufu uleule ulionipa mimi , ili wawe kitu kimoja kama nasi tulivyo mmoja ;

text: I in them , and thou in me , that they may be made perfect in one ; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me , and hast loved them , as thou hast loved me .
text2: mimi niwe ndani yao , nawe uwe ndani yangu ; naomba wakamilishwe na kuwa kitu kimoja , ili ulimwengu upate kujua kwamba wewe ulinituma , na kwamba unawapenda wao kama unavyonipenda mimi .

text: Father , I will that they also , whom thou hast given me , be with me where I am ; that they may behold my glory , which thou hast given me : for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world .
text2: " Baba ! Nataka wao ulionipa wawe pamoja nami pale nilipo , ili wauone utukufu wangu ulionipa ; kwa kuwa ulinipenda kabla ya kuumbwa ulimwengu .

text: O righteous Father , the world hath not known thee : but I have known thee , and these have known that thou hast sent me .
text2: Baba Mwema ! Ulimwengu haukujui , lakini mimi nakujua . Hawa nao wanajua kwamba wewe ulinituma .

text: And I have declared unto them thy name , and will declare it : that the love wherewith thou hast loved me may be in them , and I in them .
text2: Nimekufanya ujulikane kwao na nitaendelea kufanya hivyo , ili upendo ulio nao kwangu uwe ndani yao , nami niwe ndani yao . "

text: When Jesus had spoken these words , he went forth with his disciples over the brook Cedron , where was a garden , into the which he entered , and his disciples .
text2: Yesu alipokwisha sema hayo , alikwenda ng ' ambo ya kijito Kedroni , pamoja na wanafunzi wake . Mahali hapo palikuwa na bustani , naye Yesu akaingia humo pamoja na wanafunzi wake .

text: And Judas also , which betrayed him , knew the place : for Jesus ofttimes resorted thither with his disciples .
text2: Yuda , aliyemsaliti Yesu , alipajua mahali hapo kwani mara nyingi Yesu alikutana na wanafunzi wake huko .

text: Judas then , having received a band of men and officers from the chief priests and Pharisees , cometh thither with lanterns and torches and weapons .
text2: Basi , Yuda alichukua kikosi cha askari na walinzi kutoka kwa makuhani wakuu na Mafarisayo , akaja nao bustanini wakiwa na taa , mienge na silaha .

text: Jesus therefore , knowing all things that should come upon him , went forth , and said unto them , Whom seek ye ?
text2: Yesu , hali akijua yote yatakayompata , akatokea , akawauliza , " Mnamtafuta nani ? "

text: They answered him , Jesus of Nazareth . Jesus saith unto them , I am he . And Judas also , which betrayed him , stood with them .
text2: Nao wakamjibu , " Yesu wa Nazareti ! " Yesu akawaambia , " Mimi ndiye . " Msaliti Yuda alikuwa amesimama hapo pamoja nao .

text: As soon then as he had said unto them , I am he , they went backward , and fell to the ground .
text2: Basi , Yesu alipowaambia : " Mimi ndiye " , wakarudi nyuma , wakaanguka chini .

text: Then asked he them again , Whom seek ye ? And they said , Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Yesu akawauliza tena , " Mnamtafuta nani ? " Wakamjibu , " Yesu wa Nazareti ! "

text: Jesus answered , I have told you that I am he : if therefore ye seek me , let these go their way :
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Nimekwisha waambieni kwamba mimi ndiye . Basi , kama mnanitafuta mimi , waacheni hawa waende zao . "

text: That the saying might be fulfilled , which he spake , Of them which thou gavest me have I lost none .
text2: ( Alisema hayo ili yapate kutimia yale aliyosema : " Wale ulionipa sikumpoteza hata mmoja . " )

text: Then Simon Peter having a sword drew it , and smote the high priest ' s servant , and cut off his right ear . The servant ' s name was Malchus .
text2: Simoni Petro alikuwa na upanga ; basi , akauchomoa , akamkata sikio la kulia mtumishi wa Kuhani Mkuu . Mtumishi huyo aliitwa Malko .

text: Then said Jesus unto Peter , Put up thy sword into the sheath : the cup which my Father hath given me , shall I not drink it ?
text2: Basi , Yesu akamwambia Petro , " Rudisha upanga wako alani . Je , nisinywe kikombe alichonipa Baba ? "

text: Then the band and the captain and officers of the Jews took Jesus , and bound him ,
text2: Kile kikosi cha askari , mkuu wake na walinzi wa Wayahudi walimkamata Yesu , wakamfunga

text: And led him away to Annas first ; for he was father in law to Caiaphas , which was the high priest that same year .
text2: na kumpeleka kwanza kwa Anasi ; Anasi alikuwa baba mkwe wa Kayafa ambaye alikuwa Kuhani Mkuu mwaka huo .

text: Now Caiaphas was he , which gave counsel to the Jews , that it was expedient that one man should die for the people .
text2: Huyo Kayafa ndiye aliyekuwa amewashauri Wayahudi kwamba ni afadhali mtu mmoja afe kwa ajili ya taifa .

text: And Simon Peter followed Jesus , and so did another disciple : that disciple was known unto the high priest , and went in with Jesus into the palace of the high priest .
text2: Simoni Petro pamoja na mwanafunzi mwingine walimfuata Yesu . Huyo mwanafunzi mwingine alikuwa anajulikana kwa Kuhani Mkuu , hivyo aliingia pamoja na Yesu ndani ya ukumbi wa Kuhani Mkuu .

text: But Peter stood at the door without . Then went out that other disciple , which was known unto the high priest , and spake unto her that kept the door , and brought in Peter .
text2: Lakini Petro alikuwa amesimama nje , karibu na mlango . Basi , huyo mwanafunzi mwingine aliyekuwa anajulikana kwa Kuhani Mkuu alitoka nje akasema na mjakazi , mngoja mlango , akamwingiza Petro ndani .

text: Then saith the damsel that kept the door unto Peter , Art not thou also one of this man ' s disciples ? He saith , I am not .
text2: Huyo msichana mngoja mlango akamwuliza Petro , " Je , nawe pia ni mmoja wa wanafunzi wa mtu huyu ? " Petro akamwambia , " Si mimi ! "

text: And the servants and officers stood there , who had made a fire of coals ; for it was cold : and they warmed themselves : and Peter stood with them , and warmed himself .
text2: Watumishi na walinzi walikuwa wamewasha moto kwa sababu kulikuwa na baridi , wakawa wanaota moto . Naye Petro alikuwa amesimama pamoja nao akiota moto .

text: The high priest then asked Jesus of his disciples , and of his doctrine .
text2: Basi , Kuhani akamwuliza Yesu juu ya wanafunzi wake na mafundisho yake .

text: Jesus answered him , I spake openly to the world ; I ever taught in the synagogue , and in the temple , whither the Jews always resort ; and in secret have I said nothing .
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Nimesema na kila mtu daima hadharani . Kila mara nimefundisha katika masunagogi na Hekaluni , mahali wakutanikiapo Wayahudi wote ; na wala sijasema chochote kwa siri .

text: Why askest thou me ? ask them which heard me , what I have said unto them : behold , they know what I said .
text2: Kwa nini waniuliza mimi ? Waulize wale waliosikia nini niliwaambia . Wao wanajua nilivyosema . "

text: And when he had thus spoken , one of the officers which stood by struck Jesus with the palm of his hand , saying , Answerest thou the high priest so ?
text2: Alipokwisha sema hayo mlinzi mmoja aliyekuwa amesimama hapo akampiga kofi akisema , " Je , ndivyo unavyomjibu Kuhani Mkuu ? "

text: Jesus answered him , If I have spoken evil , bear witness of the evil : but if well , why smitest thou me ?
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Kama nimesema vibaya , onyesha huo ubaya ; lakini ikiwa nimesema vema , mbona wanipiga ? "

text: Now Annas had sent him bound unto Caiaphas the high priest .
text2: Basi , Anasi akampeleka Yesu akiwa amefungwa , kwa Kuhani Mkuu Kayafa .

text: And Simon Peter stood and warmed himself . They said therefore unto him , Art not thou also one of his disciples ? He denied it , and said , I am not .
text2: Petro alikuwa hapo akiota moto . Basi , wakamwuliza , " Je , nawe pia si mmoja wa wanafunzi wake ? " Yeye akakana na kusema , " Si mimi ! "

text: One of the servants of the high priest , being his kinsman whose ear Peter cut off , saith , Did not I see thee in the garden with him ?
text2: Mmoja wa watumishi wa Kuhani Mkuu , jamaa wa yule aliyekatwa sikio na Petro , akamwuliza , " Je , mimi sikukuona wewe bustanini pamoja naye ? "

text: Peter then denied again : and immediately the cock crew .
text2: Petro akakana tena ; mara jogoo akawika .

text: Then led they Jesus from Caiaphas unto the hall of judgment : and it was early ; and they themselves went not into the judgment hall , lest they should be defiled ; but that they might eat the passover .
text2: Basi , walimchukua Yesu kutoka kwa Kayafa , wakampeleka ikulu . Ilikuwa alfajiri , nao ili waweze kula Pasaka , hawakuingia ndani ya ikulu wasije wakatiwa najisi .

text: Pilate then went out unto them , and said , What accusation bring ye against this man ?
text2: Kwa hiyo , Pilato aliwaendea nje , akasema , " Mna mashtaka gani juu ya mtu huyu ? "

text: They answered and said unto him , If he were not a malefactor , we would not have delivered him up unto thee .
text2: Wakamjibu , " Kama huyu hangalikuwa mwovu hatungalimleta kwako . "

text: Then said Pilate unto them , Take ye him , and judge him according to your law . The Jews therefore said unto him , It is not lawful for us to put any man to death :
text2: Pilato akawaambia , " Haya , mchukueni ninyi wenyewe , mkamhukumu kufuatana na Sheria yenu . " Wayahudi wakamjibu , " Sisi hatuna mamlaka ya kumwua mtu yeyote . "

text: That the saying of Jesus might be fulfilled , which he spake , signifying what death he should die .
text2: ( Ilifanyika hivyo yapate kutimia maneno aliyosema Yesu kuonyesha atakufa kifo gani . )

text: Then Pilate entered into the judgment hall again , and called Jesus , and said unto him , Art thou the King of the Jews ?
text2: Pilato akaingia tena ndani ya ikulu , akamwita Yesu na kumwuliza : " Ati wewe ndiye Mfalme wa Wayahudi ? "

text: Jesus answered him , Sayest thou this thing of thyself , or did others tell it thee of me ?
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Je , hayo ni maneno yako au wengine wamekwambia habari zangu ? "

text: Pilate answered , Am I a Jew ? Thine own nation and the chief priests have delivered thee unto me : what hast thou done ?
text2: Pilato akamjibu , " Je , ni Myahudi mimi ? Taifa lako na makuhani wamekuleta kwangu . Umefanya nini ? "

text: Jesus answered , My kingdom is not of this world : if my kingdom were of this world , then would my servants fight , that I should not be delivered to the Jews : but now is my kingdom not from hence .
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Ufalme wangu si wa ulimwengu huu . Kama ufalme wangu ungekuwa wa ulimwengu huu watumishi wangu wangenipigania nisitiwe mikononi mwa Wayahudi . Lakini sasa ufalme wangu si wa hapa . "

text: Pilate therefore said unto him , Art thou a king then ? Jesus answered , Thou sayest that I am a king . To this end was I born , and for this cause came I into the world , that I should bear witness unto the truth . Every one that is of the truth heareth my voice .
text2: Hapo Pilato akamwambia , " Basi , wewe ni Mfalme ? " Yesu akajibu , " Wewe umesema kwamba mimi ni Mfalme . Mimi nimezaliwa kwa ajili hiyo ; na kwa ajili hiyo nimekuja ulimwenguni kuwaambia watu juu ya ukweli . Kila mtu wa ukweli hunisikiliza . "

text: Pilate saith unto him , What is truth ? And when he had said this , he went out again unto the Jews , and saith unto them , I find in him no fault at all .
text2: Pilato akamwambia , " Ukweli ni kitu gani ? " Pilato alipokwisha sema hayo , aliwaendea tena Wayahudi nje , akawaambia , " Mimi sioni hatia yoyote kwake .

text: But ye have a custom , that I should release unto you one at the passover : will ye therefore that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Lakini , mnayo desturi kwamba mimi niwafungulie mfungwa mmoja wakati wa Pasaka . Basi , mwataka niwafungulieni Mfalme wa Wayahudi ? "

text: Then cried they all again , saying , Not this man , but Barabbas . Now Barabbas was a robber .
text2: Hapo wakapiga kelele : " La ! Si huyu ila Baraba ! " Naye Baraba alikuwa mnyang ' anyi .

text: Then Pilate therefore took Jesus , and scourged him .
text2: Basi , Pilato akaamuru Yesu achukuliwe , apigwe viboko .

text: And the soldiers platted a crown of thorns , and put it on his head , and they put on him a purple robe ,
text2: Nao askari wakasokota taji ya miiba , wakamtia kichwani , wakamvika na joho la rangi ya zambarau .

text: And said , Hail , King of the Jews ! and they smote him with their hands .
text2: Wakawa wanakuja mbele yake na kusema : " Shikamoo , Mfalme wa Wayahudi ! " Wakampiga makofi .

text: Pilate therefore went forth again , and saith unto them , Behold , I bring him forth to you , that ye may know that I find no fault in him .
text2: Pilato akatoka tena nje , akawaambia , " Tazameni , namleta nje kwenu , mpate kujua kwamba mimi sikuona hatia yoyote kwake . "

text: Then came Jesus forth , wearing the crown of thorns , and the purple robe . And Pilate saith unto them , Behold the man !
text2: Basi , Yesu akatoka nje amevaa taji ya miiba na joho la rangi ya zambarau . Pilato akawaambia , " Tazameni ! Mtu mwenyewe ni huyo . "

text: When the chief priests therefore and officers saw him , they cried out , saying , Crucify him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Take ye him , and crucify him : for I find no fault in him .
text2: Makuhani wakuu na walinzi walipomwona wakapaaza sauti : " Msulubishe ! Msulubishe ! " Pilato akawaambia , " Mchukueni basi , ninyi wenyewe mkamsulubishe , kwa maana mimi sikuona hatia yoyote kwake . "

text: The Jews answered him , We have a law , and by our law he ought to die , because he made himself the Son of God .
text2: Wayahudi wakamjibu , " Sisi tunayo Sheria , na kufuatana na Sheria hiyo , ni lazima afe , kwa sababu alijifanya kuwa Mwana wa Mungu . "

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he was the more afraid ;
text2: Pilato aliposikia maneno hayo akazidi kuogopa .

text: And went again into the judgment hall , and saith unto Jesus , Whence art thou ? But Jesus gave him no answer .
text2: Basi , akaingia tena ndani ya ikulu , akamwuliza Yesu , " Umetoka wapi wewe ? " Lakini Yesu hakumjibu neno .

text: Then saith Pilate unto him , Speakest thou not unto me ? knowest thou not that I have power to crucify thee , and have power to release thee ?
text2: Hivyo Pilato akamwambia , " Husemi nami ? Je , hujui kwamba ninayo mamlaka ya kukufungua na mamlaka ya kukusulubisha ? "

text: Jesus answered , Thou couldest have no power at all against me , except it were given thee from above : therefore he that delivered me unto thee hath the greater sin .
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Hungekuwa na mamlaka yoyote juu yangu kama hungepewa na Mungu . Kwa sababu hiyo , yule aliyenikabidhi kwako ana dhambi kubwa zaidi . "

text: And from thenceforth Pilate sought to release him : but the Jews cried out , saying , If thou let this man go , thou art not Caesar ' s friend : whosoever maketh himself a king speaketh against Caesar .
text2: Tangu hapo , Pilato akawa anatafuta njia ya kumwachilia , lakini Wayahudi wakapiga kelele : " Ukimwachilia huyu mtu , wewe si rafiki yake Kaisari ; kila mtu anayejifanya kuwa Mfalme humpinga Kaisari ! "

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he brought Jesus forth , and sat down in the judgment seat in a place that is called the Pavement , but in the Hebrew , Gabbatha .
text2: Basi , Pilato aliposikia maneno hayo akamleta Yesu nje , akaketi juu ya kiti cha hukumu , mahali paitwapo : " Sakafu ya Mawe " ( kwa Kiebrania , Gabatha ) .

text: And it was the preparation of the passover , and about the sixth hour : and he saith unto the Jews , Behold your King !
text2: Ilikuwa yapata saa sita mchana , siku ya maandalio ya Pasaka . Pilato akawaambia Wayahudi , " Tazameni , Mfalme wenu ! "

text: But they cried out , Away with him , away with him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Shall I crucify your King ? The chief priest answered , We have no king but Caesar .
text2: Wao wakapaaza sauti : " Mwondoe ! Mwondoe ! Msulubishe ! " Makuhani wakuu wakajibu , " Sisi hatuna Mfalme isipokuwa Kaisari ! "

text: Then delivered he him therefore unto them to be crucified . And they took Jesus , and led him away .
text2: Basi , hapo Pilato akamtia Yesu mikononi mwao ili asulubiwe . Basi , wakamchukua Yesu .

text: And he bearing his cross went forth into a place called the place of a skull , which is called in the Hebrew Golgotha :
text2: Naye akatoka akiwa amejichukulia msalaba wake kwenda mahali paitwapo " Fuvu la Kichwa " , ( kwa Kiebrania Golgotha ) .

text: Where they crucified him , and two other with him , on either side one , and Jesus in the midst .
text2: Hapo ndipo walipomsulubisha , na pamoja naye waliwasulubisha watu wengine wawili ; mmoja upande wake wa kulia na mwingine upande wake wa kushoto , naye Yesu katikati .

text: And Pilate wrote a title , and put it on the cross . And the writing was , JESUS OF NAZARETH THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Pilato aliandika ilani akaiweka juu ya msalaba . Nayo ilikuwa imeandikwa hivi : " Yesu wa Nazareti , Mfalme wa Wayahudi . "

text: This title then read many of the Jews : for the place where Jesus was crucified was nigh to the city : and it was written in Hebrew , and Greek , and Latin .
text2: Wayahudi wengi waliisoma ilani hiyo , maana mahali hapo aliposulubiwa Yesu palikuwa karibu na mji . Tena ilani hiyo ilikuwa imeandikwa kwa Kiebrania , Kilatini , na Kigiriki .

text: Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate , Write not , The King of the Jews ; but that he said , I am King of the Jews .
text2: Basi , makuhani wakuu wakamwambia Pilato , " Usiandike : Mfalme wa Wayahudi , ila Yeye alisema , Mimi ni Mfalme wa Wayahudi . "

text: Pilate answered , What I have written I have written .
text2: Pilato akajibu , " Niliyoandika , nimeandika ! "

text: Then the soldiers , when they had crucified Jesus , took his garments , and made four parts , to every soldier a part ; and also his coat : now the coat was without seam , woven from the top throughout .
text2: Askari walipokwisha msulubisha Yesu , walizichukua nguo zake , wakazigawa mafungu manne , fungu moja kwa kila askari . Walichukua pia na kanzu yake ; kanzu hiyo ilikuwa imefumwa kwa kipande kimoja tu , bila mshono .

text: They said therefore among themselves , Let us not rend it , but cast lots for it , whose it shall be : that the scripture might be fulfilled , which saith , They parted my raiment among them , and for my vesture they did cast lots . These things therefore the soldiers did .
text2: Basi , hao askari wakashauriana : " Tusiipasue , ila tuipigie kura itakuwa ya nani . " Jambo hilo lilifanyika ili yatimie Maandiko Matakatifu yasemayo : " Waligawana mavazi yangu , na nguo yangu wakaipigia kura . " Basi , ndivyo walivyofanya hao askari .

text: Now there stood by the cross of Jesus his mother , and his mother ' s sister , Mary the wife of Cleophas , and Mary Magdalene .
text2: Karibu na msalaba wake Yesu walikuwa wamesimama mama yake , na dada ya mama yake , Maria mke wa Kleopa , na Maria Magdalene .

text: When Jesus therefore saw his mother , and the disciple standing by , whom he loved , he saith unto his mother , Woman , behold thy son !
text2: Yesu alipomwona mama yake , na karibu naye amesimama yule mwanafunzi aliyempenda , akamwambia mama yake : " Mama ! Tazama , huyo ndiye mwanao . "

text: Then saith he to the disciple , Behold thy mother ! And from that hour that disciple took her unto his own home .
text2: Halafu akamwambia yule mwanafunzi : " Tazama , huyo ndiye mama yako . " Na tangu saa ile huyo mwanafunzi alimchukua akae nyumbani kwake .

text: After this , Jesus knowing that all things were now accomplished , that the scripture might be fulfilled , saith , I thirst .
text2: Yesu alijua kwamba yote yalikuwa yametimia ; na , ili Maandiko Matakatifu yapate kutimia , akasema , " Naona kiu . "

text: Now there was set a vessel full of vinegar : and they filled a spunge with vinegar , and put it upon hyssop , and put it to his mouth .
text2: Hapo palikuwa na bakuli limejaa siki . Basi , wakachovya sifongo katika hiyo siki , wakaitia juu ya ufito wa husopo , wakamwekea mdomoni .

text: When Jesus therefore had received the vinegar , he said , It is finished : and he bowed his head , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Yesu alipokwisha pokea hiyo siki , akasema , " Yametimia ! " Kisha akainama kichwa , akatoa roho .

text: The Jews therefore , because it was the preparation , that the bodies should not remain upon the cross on the sabbath day , ( for that sabbath day was an high day , ) besought Pilate that their legs might be broken , and that they might be taken away .
text2: Ilikuwa Ijumaa , siku ya Maandalio . Kwa hiyo , kusudi miili isikae msalabani siku ya Sabato , maana siku hiyo ya Sabato ilikuwa siku kubwa , Wayahudi walimwomba Pilato miguu ya hao waliosulubiwa ivunjwe na miili yao iondolewe .

text: Then came the soldiers , and brake the legs of the first , and of the other which was crucified with him .
text2: Basi , askari walikwenda , wakaivunja miguu ya yule mtu wa kwanza na yule wa pili ambao walikuwa wamesulubiwa pamoja na Yesu .

text: But when they came to Jesus , and saw that he was dead already , they brake not his legs :
text2: Lakini walipomfikia Yesu waliona kwamba alikwisha kufa , na hivyo hawakumvunja miguu .

text: But one of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side , and forthwith came there out blood and water .
text2: Lakini askari mmoja alimtoboa ubavuni kwa mkuki , na mara ikatoka damu na maji .

text: And he that saw it bare record , and his record is true : and he knoweth that he saith true , that ye might believe .
text2: ( Naye aliyeona tukio hilo ametoa habari zake ili nanyi mpate kuamini . Na hayo aliyosema ni ukweli , tena yeye anajua kwamba anasema ukweli . )

text: For these things were done , that the scripture should be fulfilled , A bone of him shall not be broken .
text2: Jambo hilo lilitendwa ili Maandiko Matakatifu yatimie : " Hapana hata mfupa wake mmoja utakaovunjwa . "

text: And again another scripture saith , They shall look on him whom they pierced .
text2: Tena Maandiko mengine yanasema : " Watamtazama yule waliyemtoboa . "

text: And after this Joseph of Arimathaea , being a disciple of Jesus , but secretly for fear of the Jews , besought Pilate that he might take away the body of Jesus : and Pilate gave him leave . He came therefore , and took the body of Jesus .
text2: Baada ya hayo , Yosefu , mwenyeji wa Armathaya , alimwomba Pilato ruhusa ya kuuchukua mwili wa Yesu . ( Yosefu alikuwa mfuasi wa Yesu , lakini kwa siri , maana aliwaogopa viongozi wa Wayahudi ) . Basi , Pilato akamruhusu . Hivyo Yosefu alikwenda , akauondoa mwili wa Yesu .

text: And there came also Nicodemus , which at the first came to Jesus by night , and brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes , about an hundred pound weight .
text2: Naye Nikodemo ambaye hapo awali alikuwa amemwendea Yesu usiku , akaja akiwa amechukua mchanganyiko wa manemane na ubani kiasi cha kilo thelathini .

text: Then took they the body of Jesus , and wound it in linen clothes with the spices , as the manner of the Jews is to bury .
text2: Basi , waliutwaa mwili wa Yesu , wakaufunga sanda pamoja na manukato kufuatana na desturi ya Wayahudi katika kuzika .

text: Now in the place where he was crucified there was a garden ; and in the garden a new sepulchre , wherein was never man yet laid .
text2: Mahali hapo aliposulubiwa Yesu palikuwa na bustani , na katika bustani hiyo kulikuwa na kaburi jipya ambalo hakutiwa bado mtu yeyote ndani yake .

text: There laid they Jesus therefore because of the Jews ' preparation day ; for the sepulchre was nigh at hand .
text2: Basi , kwa sababu ya shughuli za Wayahudi za maandalio ya Sabato , na kwa vile kaburi hilo lilikuwa karibu , wakamweka Yesu humo .

text: The first day of the week cometh Mary Magdalene early , when it was yet dark , unto the sepulchre , and seeth the stone taken away from the sepulchre .
text2: Alfajiri na mapema Jumapili , kukiwa bado na giza , Maria Magdalene alikwenda kaburini , akaliona lile jiwe limeondolewa mlangoni pa kaburi .

text: Then she runneth , and cometh to Simon Peter , and to the other disciple , whom Jesus loved , and saith unto them , They have taken away the Lord out of the sepulchre , and we know not where they have laid him .
text2: Basi , akaenda mbio hadi kwa Petro na yule mwanafunzi mwingine ambaye Yesu alimpenda , akawaambia , " Wamemwondoa Bwana kaburini , na wala hatujui walikomweka . "

text: Peter therefore went forth , and that other disciple , and came to the sepulchre .
text2: Petro pamoja na yule mwanafunzi mwingine wakaenda kaburini .

text: So they ran both together : and the other disciple did outrun Peter , and came first to the sepulchre .
text2: Wote wawili walikimbia lakini yule mwanafunzi mwingine alikimbia mbio zaidi kuliko Petro , akatangulia kufika kaburini .

text: And he stooping down , and looking in , saw the linen clothes lying ; yet went he not in .
text2: Alipoinama na kuchungulia ndani , aliona sanda , lakini hakuingia ndani .

text: Then cometh Simon Peter following him , and went into the sepulchre , and seeth the linen clothes lie ,
text2: Simoni Petro naye akaja akimfuata , akaingia kaburini ; humo akaona sanda ,

text: And the napkin , that was about his head , not lying with the linen clothes , but wrapped together in a place by itself .
text2: na kile kitambaa alichofungwa Yesu kichwani . Hicho kitambaa hakikuwekwa pamoja na hiyo sanda , bali kilikuwa kimekunjwa na kuwekwa mahali peke yake .

text: Then went in also that other disciple , which came first to the sepulchre , and he saw , and believed .
text2: Kisha yule mwanafunzi mwingine aliyemtangulia kufika kaburini , akaingia pia ndani , akaona , akaaamini .

text: For as yet they knew not the scripture , that he must rise again from the dead .
text2: ( Walikuwa bado hawajaelewa Maandiko Matakatifu yaliyosema kwamba ilikuwa lazima afufuke kutoka wafu ) .

text: Then the disciples went away again unto their own home .
text2: Basi , hao wanafunzi wakarudi nyumbani .

text: But Mary stood without at the sepulchre weeping : and as she wept , she stooped down , and looked into the sepulchre ,
text2: Maria alikuwa amesimama nje ya kaburi , akilia . Huku akiwa bado analia , aliinama na kuchungulia kaburini ,

text: And seeth two angels in white sitting , the one at the head , and the other at the feet , where the body of Jesus had lain .
text2: akawaona malaika wawili waliovaa mavazi meupe , wameketi pale mwili wa Yesu ulipokuwa umelazwa , mmoja kichwani na wa pili miguuni .

text: And they say unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? She saith unto them , Because they have taken away my Lord , and I know not where they have laid him .
text2: Hao malaika wakamwuliza , " Mama , kwa nini unalia ? " Naye akawaambia , " Wamemwondoa Bwana wangu , na wala sijui walikomweka ! "

text: And when she had thus said , she turned herself back , and saw Jesus standing , and knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Baada ya kusema hayo , aligeuka nyuma , akamwona Yesu amesimama hapo , lakini asitambue ya kuwa ni Yesu .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? whom seekest thou ? She , supposing him to be the gardener , saith unto him , Sir , if thou have borne him hence , tell me where thou hast laid him , and I will take him away .
text2: Yesu akamwuliza , " Mama , kwa nini unalia ? Unamtafuta nani ? " Maria , akidhani kwamba huyo ni mtunza bustani , akamwambia , " Mheshimiwa , kama ni wewe umemwondoa , niambie ulikomweka , nami nitamchukua . "

text: Jesus saith unto her , Mary . She turned herself , and saith unto him , Rabboni ; which is to say , Master .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Maria ! " Naye Maria akageuka , akamwambia kwa Kiebrania , " Raboni " ( yaani " Mwalimu " ) .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Touch me not ; for I am not yet ascended to my Father : but go to my brethren , and say unto them , I ascend unto my Father , and your Father ; and to my God , and your God .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Usinishike ; sijakwenda bado juu kwa Baba . Lakini nenda kwa ndugu zangu uwaambie : nakwenda juu kwa Baba yangu na Baba yenu , Mungu wangu na Mungu wenu . "

text: Mary Magdalene came and told the disciples that she had seen the Lord , and that he had spoken these things unto her .
text2: Hivyo Maria Magdalene akaenda akawapa habari wale wanafunzi kuwa amemwona Bwana , na kwamba alikuwa amemwambia hivyo .

text: Then the same day at evening , being the first day of the week , when the doors were shut where the disciples were assembled for fear of the Jews , came Jesus and stood in the midst , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Ilikuwa jioni ya siku hiyo ya Jumapili . Wanafunzi walikuwa wamekutana pamoja ndani ya nyumba , na milango ilikuwa imefungwa kwa sababu waliwaogopa viongozi wa Wayahudi . Basi , Yesu akaja , akasimama kati yao , akawaambia , " Amani kwenu ! "

text: And when he had so said , he shewed unto them his hands and his side . Then were the disciples glad , when they saw the Lord .
text2: Alipokwisha sema hayo , akawaonyesha mikono yake na ubavu wake . Basi , hao wanafunzi wakafurahi mno kumwona Bwana .

text: Then said Jesus to them again , Peace be unto you : as my Father hath sent me , even so send I you .
text2: Yesu akawaambia tena , " Amani kwenu ! Kama vile Baba alivyonituma mimi , nami nawatuma ninyi . "

text: And when he had said this , he breathed on them , and saith unto them , Receive ye the Holy Ghost :
text2: Alipokwisha sema hayo , akawapulizia na kuwaambia , " Pokeeni Roho Mtakatifu .

text: Whose soever sins ye remit , they are remitted unto them ; and whose soever sins ye retain , they are retained .
text2: Mkiwasamehe watu dhambi zao , wamesamehewa ; msipowaondolea , hawasamehewi . "

text: But Thomas , one of the twelve , called Didymus , was not with them when Jesus came .
text2: Thoma mmoja wa wale kumi na wawili ( aitwaye Pacha ) , hakuwa pamoja nao wakati Yesu alipokuja .

text: The other disciples therefore said unto him , We have seen the Lord . But he said unto them , Except I shall see in his hands the print of the nails , and put my finger into the print of the nails , and thrust my hand into his side , I will not believe .
text2: Basi , wale wanafunzi wengine wakamwambia , " Tumemwona Bwana . " Thoma akawaambia , " Nisipoona mikononi mwake alama za misumari , na kutia kidole changu katika kovu hizo , na kutia mkono wangu ubavuni mwake , sitasadiki . "

text: And after eight days again his disciples were within , and Thomas with them : then came Jesus , the doors being shut , and stood in the midst , and said , Peace be unto you .
text2: Basi , baada ya siku nane hao wanafunzi walikuwa tena pamoja mle ndani , na Thoma alikuwa pamoja nao . Milango ilikuwa imefungwa , lakini Yesu akaja , akasimama kati yao , akasema , " Amani kwenu ! "

text: Then saith he to Thomas , reach hither thy finger , and behold my hands ; and reach hither thy hand , and thrust it into my side : and be not faithless , but believing .
text2: Kisha akamwambia Thoma , " Lete kidole chako hapa uitazame mikono yangu ; lete mkono wako ukautie ubavuni mwangu . Usiwe na mashaka , ila amini ! "

text: And Thomas answered and said unto him , My Lord and my God .
text2: Thoma akamjibu , " Bwana wangu na Mungu wangu ! "

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thomas , because thou hast seen me , thou hast believed : blessed are they that have not seen , and yet have believed .
text2: Yesu akamwambia , " Je , unaamini kwa kuwa umeniona ? Heri yao wale ambao hawajaona , lakini wameamini . "

text: And many other signs truly did Jesus in the presence of his disciples , which are not written in this book :
text2: Yesu alifanya mbele ya wanafunzi wake ishara nyingine nyingi ambazo hazikuandikwa katika kitabu hiki .

text: But these are written , that ye might believe that Jesus is the Christ , the Son of God ; and that believing ye might have life through his name .
text2: Lakini hizi zimeandikwa ili mpate kuamini kwamba Yesu ni Kristo , Mwana wa Mungu ; na kwa kuamini mpate kuwa na uzima kwa nguvu ya jina lake .

text: After these things Jesus shewed himself again to the disciples at the sea of Tiberias ; and on this wise shewed he himself .
text2: Baada ya hayo Yesu aliwatokea tena wanafunzi wake kando ya ziwa Tiberia . Aliwatokea hivi :

text: There were together Simon Peter , and Thomas called Didymus , and Nathanael of Cana in Galilee , and the sons of Zebedee , and two other of his disciples .
text2: Simoni Petro , Thoma ( aitwaye Pacha ) , na Nathanieli mwenyeji wa Kana Galilaya , wana wawili wa Zebedayo na wanafunzi wake wengine wawili , walikuwa wote pamoja .

text: Simon Peter saith unto them , I go a fishing . They say unto him , We also go with thee . They went forth , and entered into a ship immediately ; and that night they caught nothing .
text2: Simoni Petro aliwaambia , " Nakwenda kuvua samaki . " Nao wakamwambia , " Nasi tutafuatana nawe . " Basi , wakaenda , wakapanda mashua , lakini usiku huo hawakupata chochote .

text: But when the morning was now come , Jesus stood on the shore : but the disciples knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Kulipoanza kupambazuka , Yesu alisimama kando ya ziwa , lakini wanafunzi hawakujua kwamba alikuwa yeye .

text: Then Jesus saith unto them , Children , have ye any meat ? They answered him , No .
text2: Basi , Yesu akawauliza , " Vijana , hamjapata samaki wowote sio ? " Wao wakamjibu , " La ! Hatujapata kitu . "

text: And he said unto them , Cast the net on the right side of the ship , and ye shall find . They cast therefore , and now they were not able to draw it for the multitude of fishes .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Tupeni wavu upande wa kulia wa mashua nanyi mtapata samaki . " Basi , wakatupa wavu lakini sasa hawakuweza kuuvuta tena kwa wingi wa samaki .

text: Therefore that disciple whom Jesus loved saith unto Peter , It is the Lord . Now when Simon Peter heard that it was the Lord , he girt his fisher ' s coat unto him , ( for he was naked , ) and did cast himself into the sea .
text2: Hapo yule mwanafunzi aliyependwa na Yesu akamwambia Petro , " Ni Bwana ! " Simoni Petro aliposikia ya kuwa ni Bwana , akajifunga vazi lake ( maana hakuwa amelivaa ) , akarukia majini .

text: And the other disciples came in a little ship ; ( for they were not far from land , but as it were two hundred cubits , ) dragging the net with fishes .
text2: Lakini wale wanafunzi wengine walikuja pwani kwa mashua huku wanauvuta wavu uliojaa samaki ; hawakuwa mbali na nchi kavu , ila walikuwa yapata mita mia moja kutoka ukingoni .

text: As soon then as they were come to land , they saw a fire of coals there , and fish laid thereon , and bread .
text2: Walipofika nchi kavu waliona moto wa makaa umewashwa na juu yake pamewekwa samaki na mkate .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Bring of the fish which ye have now caught .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Leteni hapa baadhi ya samaki mliovua . "

text: Simon Peter went up , and drew the net to land full of great fishes , and hundred and fifty and three : and for all there were so many , yet was not the net broken .
text2: Basi , Simoni Petro akapanda mashuani , akavuta hadi nchi kavu ule wavu uliokuwa umejaa samaki wakubwa mia moja na hamsini na watatu . Na ingawa walikuwa wengi hivyo wavu haukukatika .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Come and dine . And none of the disciples durst ask him , Who art thou ? knowing that it was the Lord .
text2: Yesu akawaambia , " Njoni mkafungue kinywa . " Hakuna hata mmoja wao aliyethubutu kumwuliza : " Wewe ni nani ? " Maana walijua alikuwa Bwana .

text: Jesus then cometh , and taketh bread , and giveth them , and fish likewise .
text2: Yesu akaja , akatwaa mkate akawapa ; akafanya vivyo hivyo na wale samaki .

text: This is now the third time that Jesus shewed himself to his disciples , after that he was risen from the dead .
text2: Hii ilikuwa mara ya tatu Yesu kuwatokea wanafunzi wake baada ya kufufuka kutoka wafu .

text: So when they had dined , Jesus saith to Simon Peter , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me more than these ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my lambs .
text2: Walipokwisha kula , Yesu alimwuliza Simoni Petro , " Simoni , mwana wa Yohane ! Je , wanipenda mimi zaidi kuliko hawa ? " Naye akajibu , " Naam , Bwana ; wajua kwamba mimi nakupenda . " Yesu akamwambia , " Tunza wana kondoo wangu . "

text: He saith to him again the second time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Kisha akamwambia mara ya pili , " Simoni mwana wa Yohane ! Je , wanipenda ? " Petro akamjibu , " Naam , Bwana ; wajua kwamba nakupenda . " Yesu akamwambia , " Tunza kondoo wangu . "

text: He saith unto him the third time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? Peter was grieved because he said unto him the third time , Lovest thou me ? And he said unto him , Lord , thou knowest all things ; thou knowest that I love thee . Jesus saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Akamwuliza mara ya tatu , " Simoni mwana wa Yohane ! Je , wanipenda ? " Hapo Petro akahuzunika kwa sababu alimwuliza mara ya tatu : " Wanipenda ? " akamwambia , " Bwana , wewe wajua yote ; wewe wajua kwamba mimi nakupenda . " Yesu akamwambia , " Tunza kondoo wangu !

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , When thou wast young , thou girdedst thyself , and walkedst whither thou wouldest : but when thou shalt be old , thou shalt stretch forth thy hands , and another shall gird thee , and carry thee whither thou wouldest not .
text2: Kweli nakwambia , ulipokuwa kijana ulizoea kujifunga mshipi na kwenda kokote ulikotaka . Lakini utakapokuwa mzee utanyosha mikono yako , na mtu mwingine atakufunga na kukupeleka usikopenda kwenda . "

text: This spake he , signifying by what death he should glorify God . And when he had spoken this , he saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: ( Kwa kusema hivyo , alionyesha jinsi Petro atakavyokufa na kumtukuza Mungu . ) Kisha akamwambia , " Nifuate . "

text: Then Peter , turning about , seeth the disciple whom Jesus loved following ; which also leaned on his breast at supper , and said , Lord , which is he that betrayeth thee ?
text2: Hapo Petro akageuka , akamwona yule mwanafunzi ambaye Yesu alimpenda , anafuata ( Huyu mwanafunzi ndiye yule ambaye wakati wa chakula cha jioni , alikaa karibu sana na Yesu na kumwuliza : " Bwana ni nani atakayekusaliti ? " )

text: Peter seeing him saith to Jesus , Lord , and what shall this man do ?
text2: Basi , Petro alipomwona huyo akamwuliza Yesu , " Bwana , na huyu je ? "

text: Jesus saith unto him , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ? follow thou me .
text2: Yesu akamjibu , " Kama nataka abaki mpaka nitakapokuja , yakuhusu nini ? Wewe nifuate mimi . "

text: Then went this saying abroad among the brethren , that that disciple should not die : yet Jesus said not unto him , He shall not die ; but , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ?
text2: Basi , habari hiyo ikaenea miongoni mwa wale ndugu kwamba mwanafunzi huyo hafi . Lakini Yesu hakumwambia kwamba mwanafunzi huyo hafi , ila , " Kama nataka abaki mpaka nitakapokuja , yakuhusu nini ? "

text: This is the disciple which testifieth of these things , and wrote these things : and we know that his testimony is true .
text2: Huyo ndiye yule aliyeshuhudia mambo haya na kuyaandika . Nasi twajua kwamba aliyoyasema ni kweli .

text: And there are also many other things which Jesus did , the which , if they should be written every one , I suppose that even the world itself could not contain the books that should be written . Amen .
text2: Kuna mambo mengine mengi aliyofanya Yesu , ambayo kama yangeandikwa yote , moja baada ya lingine , nadhani hata ulimwengu wenyewe usingetosha kuviweka vitabu ambavyo vingeandikwa .

text: The former treatise have I made , O Theophilus , of all that Jesus began both to do and teach ,
text2: Ndugu Theofilo , Katika kitabu cha kwanza niliandika juu ya mambo yote Yesu aliyotenda na kufundisha tangu mwanzo wa kazi yake

text: Until the day in which he was taken up , after that he through the Holy Ghost had given commandments unto the apostles whom he had chosen :
text2: mpaka siku ile alipochukuliwa mbinguni . Kabla ya kuchukuliwa mbinguni aliwapa maagizo kwa njia ya Roho Mtakatifu wale mitume aliowachagua .

text: To whom also he shewed himself alive after his passion by many infallible proofs , being seen of them forty days , and speaking of the things pertaining to the kingdom of God :
text2: Kwa muda wa siku arobaini baada ya kifo chake aliwatokea mara nyingi kwa namna ambazo zilithibitisha kabisa kwamba alikuwa hai . Walimwona , naye aliongea nao juu ya ufalme wa Mungu .

text: And , being assembled together with them , commanded them that they should not depart from Jerusalem , but wait for the promise of the Father , which , saith he , ye have heard of me .
text2: Wakati walipokutana pamoja aliwaamuru hivi : " Msiondoke Yerusalemu , bali ngojeeni ile zawadi aliyoahidi Baba , zawadi ambayo mlikwisha nisikia nikiongea juu yake .

text: For John truly baptized with water ; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost not many days hence .
text2: Kwani Yohane alibatiza kwa maji , lakini baada ya siku chache , ninyi mtabatizwa kwa Roho Mtakatifu . "

text: When they therefore were come together , they asked of him , saying , Lord , wilt thou at this time restore again the kingdom to Israel ?
text2: Basi , mitume walipokutana pamoja na Yesu , walimwuliza , " Je Bwana , wakati huu ndipo utakaporudisha ule ufalme kwa Israeli ? "

text: And he said unto them , It is not for you to know the times or the seasons , which the Father hath put in his own power .
text2: Lakini Yesu akawaambia , " Nyakati na majira ya mambo hayo viko chini ya mamlaka ya Baba yangu , wala si shauri lenu kujua yatakuwa lini .

text: But ye shall receive power , after that the Holy Ghost is come upon you : and ye shall be witnesses unto me both in Jerusalem , and in all Judaea , and in Samaria , and unto the uttermost part of the earth .
text2: Lakini wakati Roho Mtakatifu atakapowashukieni ninyi , mtajazwa nguvu na mtakuwa mashahidi wangu katika Yerusalemu , katika nchi yote ya Yudea na Samaria , na hata miisho ya dunia . "

text: And when he had spoken these things , while they beheld , he was taken up ; and a cloud received him out of their sight .
text2: Baada ya kusema hayo , wote wakiwa wanamtazama , alichukuliwa mbinguni ; wingu likamficha wasimwone tena .

text: And while they looked stedfastly toward heaven as he went up , behold , two men stood by them in white apparel ;
text2: Walipokuwa bado wanatazama juu angani , akiwa anakwenda zake , mara watu wawili waliokuwa wamevaa nguo nyeupe walisimama karibu nao ,

text: Which also said , Ye men of Galilee , why stand ye gazing up into heaven ? this same Jesus , which is taken up from you into heaven , shall so come in like manner as ye have seen him go into heaven .
text2: wakasema , " Enyi wananchi wa Galilaya ! Mbona mnasimama mkitazama angani ? Yesu huyu ambaye amechukuliwa kutoka kwenu kwenda mbinguni atakuja tena namna hiyohiyo mliivyomwona akienda mbinguni . "

text: Then returned they unto Jerusalem from the mount called Olivet , which is from Jerusalem a sabbath day ' s journey .
text2: Kisha mitume wakarudi Yerusalemu kutoka mlima wa Mizeituni ulioko karibu kilomita moja kutoka mjini .

text: And when they were come in , they went up into an upper room , where abode both Peter , and James , and John , and Andrew , Philip , and Thomas , Bartholomew , and Matthew , James the son of Alphaeus , and Simon Zelotes , and Judas the brother of James .
text2: Walipofika mjini waliingia katika chumba ghorofani ambamo walikuwa wanakaa ; nao walikuwa Petro , Yohane , Yakobo , Andrea , Filipo na Thoma , Bartholomayo na Mathayo , Yakobo mwana wa Alfayo , Simoni Zelote na Yuda mwana wa Yakobo .

text: These all continued with one accord in prayer and supplication , with the women , and Mary the mother of Jesus , and with his brethren .
text2: Hawa wote walikusanyika pamoja kusali , pamoja na wanawake kadha wa kadha , na Maria mama yake Yesu , na ndugu zake .

text: And in those days Peter stood up in the midst of the disciples , and said , ( the number of names together were about an hundred and twenty , )
text2: Siku chache baadaye , kulikuwa na mkutano wa waumini , karibu watu mia moja na ishirini . Petro alisimama mbele yao ,

text: Men and brethren , this scripture must needs have been fulfilled , which the Holy Ghost by the mouth of David spake before concerning Judas , which was guide to them that took Jesus .
text2: akasema , " Ndugu zangu , ilikuwa lazima ile sehemu ya Maandiko Matakatifu itimie , sehemu ambayo Roho Mtakatifu , kwa maneno ya Daudi , alibashiri habari za Yuda ambaye aliwaongoza wale waliomtia Yesu nguvuni .

text: For he was numbered with us , and had obtained part of this ministry .
text2: Yuda alikuwa mmoja wa kikundi chetu maana alichaguliwa ashiriki huduma yetu .

text: Now this man purchased a field with the reward of iniquity ; and falling headlong , he burst asunder in the midst , and all his bowels gushed out .
text2: ( " Mnajua kwamba yeye alinunua shamba kwa zile fedha alizopata kutokana na kitendo chake kiovu . Akaanguka chini , akapasuka na matumbo yake yakamwagika nje .

text: And it was known unto all the dwellers at Jerusalem ; insomuch as that field is called in their proper tongue , Aceldama , that is to say , The field of blood .
text2: Kila mtu katika Yerusalemu alisikia habari za tukio hilo na hivyo , kwa lugha yao , wakaliita lile shamba Hekeli Dama , maana yake , Shamba la Damu . )

text: For it is written in the book of Psalms , Let his habitation be desolate , and let no man dwell therein : and his bishoprick let another take .
text2: Basi , imeandikwa katika kitabu cha Zaburi : Nyumba yake ibaki mahame ; mtu yeyote asiishi ndani yake . Tena imeandikwa : Mtu mwingine achukue nafasi yake katika huduma hiyo .

text: Wherefore of these men which have companied with us all the time that the Lord Jesus went in and out among us ,
text2: Kwa hiyo , ni lazima mtu mwingine ajiunge nasi kama shahidi wa ufufuo wake Bwana Yesu .

text: Beginning from the baptism of John , unto that same day that he was taken up from us , must one be ordained to be a witness with us of his resurrection .
text2: Anapaswa kuwa mmoja wa wale waliokuwa katika kundi letu wakati wote Bwana alipokuwa anasafiri pamoja nasi , tangu wakati Yohane alipokuwa anabatiza mpaka siku ile Yesu alipochukuliwa kutoka kwetu kwenda mbinguni . "

text: And they appointed two , Joseph called Barsabas , who was surnamed Justus , and Matthias .
text2: Basi , wakataja majina ya watu wawili ; wa kwanza Yosefu aliyeitwa Barsaba ( au pia Yusto ) , na wa pili Mathia .

text: And they prayed , and said , Thou , Lord , which knowest the hearts of all men , shew whether of these two thou hast chosen ,
text2: Kisha wakasali : " Bwana , wewe unajua mioyo ya watu wote . Hivyo , utuonyeshe ni yupi kati ya hawa wawili uliyemchagua

text: That he may take part of this ministry and apostleship , from which Judas by transgression fell , that he might go to his own place .
text2: ili achukue nafasi hii ya huduma ya kitume aliyoacha Yuda akaenda mahali pake mwenyewe . "

text: And they gave forth their lots ; and the lot fell upon Matthias ; and he was numbered with the eleven apostles .
text2: Hapo , wakapiga kura ; kura ikampata Mathia , naye akaongezwa katika idadi ya wale mitume wengine kumi na mmoja .

text: And when the day of Pentecost was fully come , they were all with one accord in one place .
text2: Siku ya Pentekoste ilipofika , waumini wote walikuwa wamekusanyika pamoja .

text: And suddenly there came a sound from heaven as of a rushing mighty wind , and it filled all the house where they were sitting .
text2: Ghafla , sauti ikasikika kutoka angani ; sauti iliyokuwa kama ya upepo mkali , ikajaza ile nyumba yote walimokuwa wamekaa .

text: And there appeared unto them cloven tongues like as of fire , and it sat upon each of them .
text2: Kisha , vikatokea vitu vilivyoonekana kama ndimi za moto , vikagawanyika na kutua juu ya kila mmoja wao .

text: And they were all filled with the Holy Ghost , and began to speak with other tongues , as the Spirit gave them utterance .
text2: Wote wakajazwa Roho Mtakatifu , wakaanza kusema lugha mbalimbali kadiri Roho alivyowawezesha .

text: And there were dwelling at Jerusalem Jews , devout men , out of every nation under heaven .
text2: Na huko Yerusalemu walikuwako Wayahudi , watu wamchao Mungu , waliotoka katika kila nchi duniani .

text: Now when this was noised abroad , the multitude came together , and were confounded , because that every man heard them speak in his own language .
text2: Waliposikia sauti hiyo , kundi kubwa la watu lilikusanyika . Wote walishtuka sana kwani kila mmoja wao aliwasikia hao waumini wakisema kwa lugha yake mwenyewe .

text: And they were all amazed and marvelled , saying one to another , Behold , are not all these which speak Galilaeans ?
text2: Walistaajabu na kushangaa , wakisema , " Je , hawa wote tunaowasikia wakisema hivi , si wenyeji wa Galilaya ?

text: And how hear we every man in our own tongue , wherein we were born ?
text2: Imekuwaje , basi , kwamba kila mmoja wetu anawasikia wakisema kwa lugha yake mwenyewe ?

text: Parthians , and Medes , and Elamites , and the dwellers in Mesopotamia , and in Judaea , and Cappadocia , in Pontus , and Asia ,
text2: Baadhi yetu ni Waparthi , Wamedi na Waelami ; wengine ni wenyeji wa Mesopotamia , Yudea , Kapadokia , Ponto na Asia ,

text: Phrygia , and Pamphylia , in Egypt , and in the parts of Libya about Cyrene , and strangers of Rome , Jews and proselytes ,
text2: Frugia na Pamfulia , Misri na sehemu za Libya karibu na Kurene ; wengine wetu ni wageni kutoka Roma ,

text: Cretes and Arabians , we do hear them speak in our tongues the wonderful works of God .
text2: Wayahudi na watu walioongokea dini ya Kiyahudi ; wengine wametoka Krete na Arabia . Sisi sote tunasikia wakisema kwa lugha zetu wenyewe mambo makuu ya Mungu . "

text: And they were all amazed , and were in doubt , saying one to another , What meaneth this ?
text2: Wote walishangaa na kufadhaika huku wakiulizana , " Hii ina maana gani ? "

text: Others mocking said , These men are full of new wine .
text2: Lakini wengine wakawadhihaki wakisema , " Watu hawa wamelewa divai mpya ! "

text: But Peter , standing up with the eleven , lifted up his voice , and said unto them , Ye men of Judaea , and all ye that dwell at Jerusalem , be this known unto you , and hearken to my words :
text2: Lakini Petro alisimama pamoja na wale kumi na mmoja akaanza kuwahutubia watu kwa sauti kubwa : " Ndugu Wayahudi nanyi nyote mnaokaa hapa Yerusalemu , sikilizeni kwa makini maneno yangu .

text: For these are not drunken , as ye suppose , seeing it is but the third hour of the day .
text2: Watu hawa hawakulewa kama mnavyodhani ; mbona ni saa tatu tu asubuhi ?

text: But this is that which was spoken by the prophet Joel ;
text2: Ukweli ni kwamba jambo hili ni lile alilosema nabii Yoeli :

text: And it shall come to pass in the last days , saith God , I will pour out of my Spirit upon all flesh : and your sons and your daughters shall prophesy , and your young men shall see visions , and your old men shall dream dreams :
text2: Katika siku zile za mwisho , asema Bwana , nitawamiminia binadamu wote Roho wangu . Watoto wenu , wanaume kwa wanawake , watautangaza ujumbe wangu ; vijana wenu wataona maono , na wazee wenu wataota ndoto .

text: And on my servants and on my handmaidens I will pour out in those days of my Spirit ; and they shall prophesy :
text2: Naam , hata watumishi wangu , wanaume kwa wanawake , nitawamiminia Roho wangu , siku zile , nao watautangaza ujumbe wangu .

text: And I will shew wonders in heaven above , and signs in the earth beneath ; blood , and fire , and vapour of smoke :
text2: Nitatenda miujiza juu angani , na ishara chini duniani ; kutakuwa na damu , moto na moshi mzito ;

text: The sun shall be turned into darkness , and the moon into blood , before that great and notable day of the Lord come :
text2: jua litatiwa giza , na mwezi utakuwa mwekundu kama damu , kabla ya kutokea ile siku kuu na tukufu ya Bwana .

text: And it shall come to pass , that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved .
text2: Hapo , yeyote atakayeomba kwa jina la Bwana , ataokolewa .

text: Ye men of Israel , hear these words ; Jesus of Nazareth , a man approved of God among you by miracles and wonders and signs , which God did by him in the midst of you , as ye yourselves also know :
text2: " Wananchi wa Israeli , sikilizeni maneno haya ! Yesu wa Nazareti alikuwa mtu ambaye mamlaka yake ya kimungu yalithibitishwa kwenu kwa miujiza , maajabu na ishara Mungu alizofanya kati yenu kwa njia yake , kama mnavyojua .

text: Him , being delivered by the determinate counsel and foreknowledge of God , ye have taken , and by wicked hands have crucified and slain :
text2: Kufuatana na mpango wake mwenyewe Mungu alikwisha amua kwamba Yesu angetiwa mikononi mwenu ; nanyi mkamuua kwa kuwaachia watu wabaya wamsulubishe .

text: Whom God hath raised up , having loosed the pains of death : because it was not possible that he should be holden of it .
text2: Lakini Mungu alimfufua kutoka wafu akamwokoa katika maumivu ya kifo kwa maana haingewezekana kabisa kifo kimfunge .

text: For David speaketh concerning him , I foresaw the Lord always before my face , for he is on my right hand , that I should not be moved :
text2: Maana Daudi alisema juu yake hivi : Nilimwona Bwana mbele yangu daima ; yuko nami upande wangu wa kulia , na hivyo sitatikisika .

text: Therefore did my heart rejoice , and my tongue was glad ; moreover also my flesh shall rest in hope :
text2: Kwa hiyo , moyo wangu ulifurahi ; tena nilipiga vigelegele vya furaha . Mwili wangu utakaa katika tumaini ;

text: Because thou wilt not leave my soul in hell , neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption .
text2: kwa kuwa hutaiacha roho yangu katika kuzimu , wala kumruhusu mtakatifu wako aoze .

text: Thou hast made known to me the ways of life ; thou shalt make me full of joy with thy countenance .
text2: Umenionyesha njia za kuufikia uzima , kuwako kwako kwanijaza furaha !

text: Men and brethren , let me freely speak unto you of the patriarch David , that he is both dead and buried , and his sepulchre is with us unto this day .
text2: " Ndugu zangu , napenda kuwaambieni waziwazi juu ya mambo yaliyompata Daudi , babu yetu . Yeye alikufa , akazikwa , tena kaburi lake liko papa hapa petu mpaka leo .

text: Therefore being a prophet , and knowing that God had sworn with an oath to him , that of the fruit of his loins , according to the flesh , he would raise up Christ to sit on his throne ;
text2: Lakini kwa vile Daudi alikuwa nabii , alijua kuwa Mungu alimwapia kiapo kwamba atamtawaza mmoja wa uzawa wake kuwa mfalme mahali pake .

text: He seeing this before spake of the resurrection of Christ , that his soul was not left in hell , neither his flesh did see corruption .
text2: Daudi aliona kabla mambo yatakayofanywa na Mungu na hivyo akasema juu ya ufufuo wa Kristo wakati aliposema : Hakuachwa kuzimu , mwili wake haukuoza .

text: This Jesus hath God raised up , whereof we all are witnesses .
text2: Basi , Mungu alimfufua huyo Yesu na sisi sote ni mashahidi wa tukio hilo .

text: Therefore being by the right hand of God exalted , and having received of the Father the promise of the Holy Ghost , he hath shed forth this , which ye now see and hear .
text2: Yesu aliinuliwa juu mpaka upande wa kulia wa Mungu , akapokea kutoka kwa Baba ile zawadi aliyoahidi yaani Roho Mtakatifu ; na mnachoona sasa na kusikia ni mmiminiko wa huyo Roho .

text: For David is not ascended into the heavens : but he saith himself , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Maana Daudi mwenyewe , hakupanda mpaka mbinguni ; ila yeye alisema : Bwana alimwambia Bwana wangu : Keti upande wangu wa kulia ,

text: Until I make thy foes thy footstool .
text2: hadi nitakapowafanya adui zako kibao cha kukanyagia miguu yako .

text: Therefore let all the house of Israel know assuredly , that God hath made that same Jesus , whom ye have crucified , both Lord and Christ .
text2: " Watu wote wa Israeli wanapaswa kufahamu kwa hakika kwamba huyo Yesu mliyemsulubisha ninyi , ndiye huyo ambaye Mungu amemfanya kuwa Bwana na Kristo . "

text: Now when they heard this , they were pricked in their heart , and said unto Peter and to the rest of the apostles , Men and brethren , what shall we do ?
text2: Basi , watu waliposikia hayo , walichomwa moyo , wakawauliza Petro na wale mitume wenzake : " Ndugu zetu , tufanye nini ? "

text: Then Peter said unto them , Repent , and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the remission of sins , and ye shall receive the gift of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Petro akajibu , " Tubuni na kila mmoja wenu abatizwe kwa jina la Yesu Kristo ili mpate kuondolewa dhambi zenu na kupokea ile zawadi ya Roho Mtakatifu .

text: For the promise is unto you , and to your children , and to all that are afar off , even as many as the Lord our God shall call .
text2: Maana , ahadi ile ilikuwa kwa ajili yenu , kwa ajili ya watoto wenu , kwa ajili ya wote wanaokaa mbali ; na kwa ajili ya kila mtu ambaye Bwana Mungu wetu atamwita kwake . "

text: And with many other words did he testify and exhort , saying , Save yourselves from this untoward generation .
text2: Kwa maneno mengine mengi , Petro alisisitiza na kuwahimiza watu akisema , " Jiokoeni katika kizazi hiki kiovu . "

text: Then they that gladly received his word were baptized : and the same day there were added unto them about three thousand souls .
text2: Wengi waliyakubali maneno yake , wakabatizwa . Watu wapatao elfu tatu wakaongezeka katika kile kikundi siku hiyo .

text: And they continued stedfastly in the apostles ' doctrine and fellowship , and in breaking of bread , and in prayers .
text2: Hawa wote waliendelea kujifunza kutoka kwa mitume , kuishi pamoja kidugu , kumega mkate na kusali .

text: And fear came upon every soul : and many wonders and signs were done by the apostles .
text2: Miujiza na maajabu mengi yalifanyika kwa njia ya mitume hata kila mtu akajawa na hofu .

text: And all that believed were together , and had all things common ;
text2: Waumini wote waliendelea kuwa kitu kimoja na mali zao waligawana pamoja .

text: And sold their possessions and goods , and parted them to all men , as every man had need .
text2: Walikuwa wakiuza mali na vitu vyao kisha wakagawana fedha kadiri ya mahitaji ya kila mmoja .

text: And they , continuing daily with one accord in the temple , and breaking bread from house to house , did eat their meat with gladness and singleness of heart ,
text2: Waliendelea kukutana pamoja kila siku Hekaluni . Lakini wakati wa kumega mkate , walikutana katika nyumba zao na wakakishiriki chakula hicho kwa furaha na moyo mkunjufu .

text: Praising God , and having favour with all the people . And the Lord added to the church daily such as should be saved .
text2: Walimtukuza Mungu , wakapendwa na watu wote . Kila siku Bwana aliwaongezea idadi ya watu waliokuwa wakiokolewa .

text: Now Peter and John went up together into the temple at the hour of prayer , being the ninth hour .
text2: Siku moja , saa tisa alasiri , Petro na Yohane walikuwa wanakwenda Hekaluni , wakati wa sala .

text: And a certain man lame from his mother ' s womb was carried , whom they laid daily at the gate of the temple which is called Beautiful , to ask alms of them that entered into the temple ;
text2: Na pale karibu na mlango wa Hekalu uitwao " Mlango Mzuri " , palikuwa na mtu mmoja , kiwete tangu kuzaliwa . Watu walimbeba huyo mtu kila siku na kumweka hapo ili aombe chochote kwa wale waliokuwa wakiingia Hekaluni .

text: Who seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple asked an alms .
text2: Alipowaona Petro na Yohane wakiingia Hekaluni , aliwaomba wampe chochote .

text: And Peter , fastening his eyes upon him with John , said , Look on us .
text2: Petro na Yohane walimkodolea macho , naye Petro akamwambia , " Tutazame ! "

text: And he gave heed unto them , expecting to receive something of them .
text2: Naye akawageukia , akitazamia kupata kitu kutoka kwao .

text: Then Peter said , Silver and gold have I none ; but such as I have give I thee : In the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth rise up and walk .
text2: Kisha Petro akamwambia , " Sina fedha wala dhahabu lakini kile nilicho nacho nitakupa . Kwa jina la Yesu Kristo wa Nazareti , tembea ! "

text: And he took him by the right hand , and lifted him up : and immediately his feet and ancle bones received strength .
text2: Halafu , akamshika mkono wa kulia , akamwinua . Papo hapo miguu na magoti yake yakapata nguvu .

text: And he leaping up stood , and walked , and entered with them into the temple , walking , and leaping , and praising God .
text2: Akaruka , akasimama na kuanza kutembea . Halafu akaingia pamoja nao Hekaluni , akitembea na kurukaruka huku akimtukuza Mungu .

text: And all the people saw him walking and praising God :
text2: Watu wote waliokuwa hapo walimwona akitembea na kumsifu Mungu .

text: And they knew that it was he which sat for alms at the Beautiful gate of the temple : and they were filled with wonder and amazement at that which had happened unto him .
text2: Walipomtambua kuwa ndiye yule aliyekuwa anaombaomba karibu na ule " Mlango Mzuri " wa Hekalu , wakashangaa mno hata wasiweze kuelewa yaliyompata .

text: And as the lame man which was healed held Peter and John , all the people ran together unto them in the porch that is called Solomon ' s , greatly wondering .
text2: Watu wote , wakiwa na mshangao mkubwa wakaanza kukimbilia mahali palipoitwa " Ukumbi wa Solomoni , " ambapo yule mtu alikuwa bado anaandamana na Petro na Yohane .

text: And when Peter saw it , he answered unto the people , Ye men of Israel , why marvel ye at this ? or why look ye so earnestly on us , as though by our own power or holiness we had made this man to walk ?
text2: Basi , Petro alipowaona watu hao akawaambia , " Wananchi wa Israeli , kwa nini mnashangazwa na jambo hili ? Mbona mnatukodolea macho kana kwamba ni kwa nguvu zetu au utakatifu wetu sisi wenyewe tumemfanya mtu huyu aweze kutembea ?

text: The God of Abraham , and of Isaac , and of Jacob , the God of our fathers , hath glorified his Son Jesus ; whom ye delivered up , and denied him in the presence of Pilate , when he was determined to let him go .
text2: Mungu wa Abrahamu , Isaka na Yakobo , Mungu wa baba zetu amemtukuza Yesu mtumishi wake . Yeye ndiye yuleyule mliyemtia mikononi mwa wakuu na kumkataa mbele ya Pilato hata baada ya Pilato kuamua kumwacha huru .

text: But ye denied the Holy One and the Just , and desired a murderer to be granted unto you ;
text2: Alikuwa mtakatifu na mwema ; lakini ninyi mlimkataa , mkataka mtu mwingine aliyekuwa muuaji afunguliwe .

text: And killed the Prince of life , whom God hath raised from the dead ; whereof we are witnesses .
text2: Basi , mlimuua yule ambaye ni chanzo cha uzima . Lakini Mungu alimfufua , na sisi ni mashahidi wa tukio hilo .

text: And his name through faith in his name hath made this man strong , whom ye see and know : yea , the faith which is by him hath given him this perfect soundness in the presence of you all .
text2: Jina la Yesu na imani katika jina hilo ndivyo vilivyompa nguvu mtu huyu mnayemwona na kumfahamu . Imani kwa Yesu ndiyo iliyomponya kabisa mtu huyu kama mnavyoona nyote .

text: And now , brethren , I wot that through ignorance ye did it , as did also your rulers .
text2: " Sasa ndugu zangu , nafahamu kwamba ninyi na wakuu wenu mlitenda hayo kwa sababu ya kutojua kwenu .

text: But those things , which God before had shewed by the mouth of all his prophets , that Christ should suffer , he hath so fulfilled .
text2: Lakini ndivyo Mungu alivyotimiza yale aliyotangaza zamani kwa njia ya manabii wote , kwamba ilikuwa lazima Kristo wake ateseke .

text: Repent ye therefore , and be converted , that your sins may be blotted out , when the times of refreshing shall come from the presence of the Lord ;
text2: Basi , tubuni mkamrudie Mungu ili afute dhambi zenu .

text: And he shall send Jesus Christ , which before was preached unto you :
text2: Fanyeni hivyo ili Bwana awape nyakati za kuburudika rohoni na kuwaletea yule Kristo aliyemteua ambaye ndiye Yesu .

text: Whom the heaven must receive until the times of restitution of all things , which God hath spoken by the mouth of all his holy prophets since the world began .
text2: Ni lazima yeye abaki huko mbinguni mpaka utakapofika wakati wa kurekebishwa vitu vyote , kama Mungu alivyosema kwa njia ya manabii wake watakatifu wa tangu zamani .

text: For Moses truly said unto the fathers , A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren , like unto me ; him shall ye hear in all things whatsoever he shall say unto you .
text2: Kwa maana Mose alisema , Bwana Mungu wenu atawapelekeeni nabii kama mimi kutoka kati yenu ninyi wenyewe .

text: And it shall come to pass , that every soul , which will not hear that prophet , shall be destroyed from among the people .
text2: Yeyote yule ambaye hatamsikiliza nabii huyo atatengwa mbali na watu wa Mungu na kuangamizwa .

text: Yea , and all the prophets from Samuel and those that follow after , as many as have spoken , have likewise foretold of these days .
text2: Manabii wote , kuanzia Samweli na wale waliomfuata , walitangaza habari za mambo haya ambayo yamekuwa yakitendeka siku hizi .

text: Ye are the children of the prophets , and of the covenant which God made with our fathers , saying unto Abraham , And in thy seed shall all the kindreds of the earth be blessed .
text2: Ahadi zile Mungu alizotoa kwa njia ya manabii ni kwa ajili yenu ; na mnashiriki lile agano Mungu alilofanya na babu zenu , kama alivyomwambia Abrahamu : Kwa njia ya wazawa wako , jamaa zote za dunia zitabarikiwa .

text: Unto you first God , having raised up his Son Jesus , sent him to bless you , in turning away every one of you from his iniquities .
text2: Basi , ilikuwa kwa ajili yenu kwanza kwamba Mungu alimfufua mtumishi wake , alimtuma awabariki kwa kumfanya kila mmoja wenu aachane kabisa na maovu yake . "

text: And as they spake unto the people , the priests , and the captain of the temple , and the Sadducees , came upon them ,
text2: Petro na Yohane walipokuwa bado wanawahutubia watu , makuhani na mkuu wa walinzi wa Hekalu pamoja na Masadukayo walifika .

text: Being grieved that they taught the people , and preached through Jesus the resurrection from the dead .
text2: Walikasirika sana , maana hao mitume walikuwa wanawahubiria watu kwamba Yesu alifufuka , jambo ambalo linaonyesha wazi kwamba wafu watafufuka .

text: And they laid hands on them , and put them in hold unto the next day : for it was now eventide .
text2: Basi , waliwatia nguvuni na kwa kuwa usiku ulikuwa umekaribia , wakawaweka chini ya ulinzi mpaka kesho yake .

text: Howbeit many of them which heard the word believed ; and the number of the men was about five thousand .
text2: Lakini wengi kati ya wale waliosikia ujumbe wao waliamini , na idadi ya waumini ikawa imefika karibu elfu tano .

text: And it came to pass on the morrow , that their rulers , and elders , and scribes ,
