text2: Kesho yake , viongozi wa Wayahudi , wazee na walimu wa Sheria , walikusanyika pamoja huko Yerusalemu .

text: And Annas the high priest , and Caiaphas , and John , and Alexander , and as many as were of the kindred of the high priest , were gathered together at Jerusalem .
text2: Walikutana pamoja na Anasi , Kayafa , Yohane , Aleksanda na wengine waliokuwa wa ukoo wa Kuhani Mkuu .

text: And when they had set them in the midst , they asked , By what power , or by what name , have ye done this ?
text2: Waliwasimamisha mitume mbele yao , wakawauliza , " Ninyi mmefanya jambo hili kwa nguvu gani na kwa jina la nani ? "

text: Then Peter , filled with the Holy Ghost , said unto them , Ye rulers of the people , and elders of Israel ,
text2: Hapo , Petro , akiwa amejawa na Roho Mtakatifu , akawaambia , " Viongozi na wazee wa watu !

text: If we this day be examined of the good deed done to the impotent man , by what means he is made whole ;
text2: Ikiwa mnatuuliza leo juu ya kile kitendo chema alichofanyiwa yule mtu aliyekuwa kiwete na jinsi alivyopata kuwa mzima ,

text: Be it known unto you all , and to all the people of Israel , that by the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth , whom ye crucified , whom God raised from the dead , even by him doth this man stand here before you whole .
text2: basi , ninyi na watu wote wa Israeli mnapaswa kujua kwamba mtu huyu anasimama mbele yenu leo , mzima kabisa , kwa nguvu ya jina lake Yesu wa Nazareti ambaye ninyi mlimsulubisha , lakini Mungu akamfufua kutoka wafu .

text: This is the stone which was set at nought of you builders , which is become the head of the corner .
text2: Huyu ndiye ambaye Maandiko Matakatifu yanasema : Jiwe mlilokataa ninyi waashi , sasa limekuwa jiwe kuu la msingi .

text: Neither is there salvation in any other : for there is none other name under heaven given among men , whereby we must be saved .
text2: Wokovu haupatikani kwa mtu mwingine yeyote , kwa maana duniani pote , binadamu hawakupewa jina la mtu mwingine ambaye sisi tunaweza kuokolewa naye . "

text: Now when they saw the boldness of Peter and John , and perceived that they were unlearned and ignorant men , they marvelled ; and they took knowledge of them , that they had been with Jesus .
text2: Hao wazee wa baraza , wakiwa wanajua kwamba Petro na Yohane walikuwa watu wasio na kisomo wala elimu yoyote , walishangaa juu ya jinsi walivyosema kwa uhodari . Wakatambua kwamba walikuwa wamejiunga na Yesu .

text: And beholding the man which was healed standing with them , they could say nothing against it .
text2: Lakini walipomwona yule mtu aliyeponywa amesimama pamoja nao , hawakuweza kusema kitu .

text: But when they had commanded them to go aside out of the council , they conferred among themselves ,
text2: Hivyo , waliwaamuru watoke nje ya baraza , nao wakabaki ndani wakizungumza kwa faragha .

text: Saying , What shall we do to these men ? for that indeed a notable miracle hath been done by them is manifest to all them that dwell in Jerusalem ; and we cannot deny it .
text2: Wakaulizana , " Tufanye nini na watu hawa ? Kila mtu anayeishi Yerusalemu anajua kwamba mwujiza huu wa ajabu umefanyika , nasi hatuwezi kukana jambo hilo .

text: But that it spread no further among the people , let us straitly threaten them , that they speak henceforth to no man in this name .
text2: Lakini ili tupate kuzuia jambo hili lisienee zaidi kati ya watu , tuwaonye wasiongee na mtu yeyote kwa jina la Yesu . "

text: And they called them , and commanded them not to speak at all nor teach in the name of Jesus .
text2: Kwa hiyo wakawaita tena ndani , wakawaonya wasiongee tena hadharani , wala kufundisha kwa jina la Yesu .

text: But Peter and John answered and said unto them , Whether it be right in the sight of God to hearken unto you more than unto God , judge ye .
text2: Lakini Petro na Yohane wakawajibu , " Amueni ninyi wenyewe kama ni haki mbele ya Mungu kuwatii ninyi kuliko kumtii yeye .

text: For we cannot but speak the things which we have seen and heard .
text2: Kwa maana hatuwezi kuacha kusema juu ya mambo yale tuliyoyaona na kuyasikia . "

text: So when they had further threatened them , they let them go , finding nothing how they might punish them , because of the people : for all men glorified God for that which was done .
text2: Basi , hao wazee wa Baraza wakawaonya kwa ukali zaidi , halafu wakawaacha huru . Hawakuweza kuwapa adhabu kwa sababu watu wote walikuwa wakimtukuza Mungu kwa sababu ya tukio hilo .

text: For the man was above forty years old , on whom this miracle of healing was shewed .
text2: Huyo mtu aliyeponywa alikuwa na umri wa miaka zaidi ya arobaini .

text: And being let go , they went to their own company , and reported all that the chief priests and elders had said unto them .
text2: Mara tu walipoachwa huru , Petro na Yohane walirudi kwa wenzao , wakawaeleza yale waliyoambiwa na makuhani wakuu na wazee .

text: And when they heard that , they lifted up their voice to God with one accord , and said , Lord , thou art God , which hast made heaven , and earth , and the sea , and all that in them is :
text2: Waliposikia habari hiyo waliungana pamoja katika kumwomba Mungu wakisema , " Bwana , wewe ni Muumba wa mbingu na nchi , bahari na vyote vilivyomo !

text: Who by the mouth of thy servant David hast said , Why did the heathen rage , and the people imagine vain things ?
text2: Ndiwe uliyemfanya mtumishi wako , babu yetu Daudi , aseme kwa nguvu ya Roho Mtakatifu : Kwa nini mataifa yameghadhibika ? Mbona watu wamefanya mipango ya bure ?

text: The kings of the earth stood up , and the rulers were gathered together against the Lord , and against his Christ .
text2: Wafalme wa dunia walijiweka tayari , na watawala walikutana pamoja , ili kumwasi Bwana na Kristo wake .

text: For of a truth against thy holy child Jesus , whom thou hast anointed , both Herod , and Pontius Pilate , with the Gentiles , and the people of Israel , were gathered together ,
text2: " Maana , kwa hakika , ndivyo Herode , Pontio Pilato , watu wa Israeli na watu wa mataifa walivyokutanika papa hapa mjini , kumpinga Yesu Mtumishi wako Mtakatifu ambaye umemtia mafuta .

text: For to do whatsoever thy hand and thy counsel determined before to be done .
text2: Naam , walikutana ili wafanye yale ambayo ulikusudia na kupanga tangu mwanzo kwa uwezo wako na mapenzi yako .

text: And now , Lord , behold their threatenings : and grant unto thy servants , that with all boldness they may speak thy word ,
text2: Lakini sasa , ee Bwana , angalia vitisho vyao . Utuwezeshe sisi watumishi wako kuhubiri neno lako kwa uhodari .

text: By stretching forth thine hand to heal ; and that signs and wonders may be done by the name of thy holy child Jesus .
text2: Nyosha mkono wako uponye watu . Fanya ishara na maajabu kwa jina la Yesu Mtumishi wako Mtakatifu . "

text: And when they had prayed , the place was shaken where they were assembled together ; and they were all filled with the Holy Ghost , and they spake the word of God with boldness .
text2: Walipomaliza kusali , pale mahali walipokuwa wamekutanika pakatikiswa , nao wote wakajazwa Roho Mtakatifu . Wote wakaanza kuhubiri neno la Mungu bila uoga .

text: And the multitude of them that believed were of one heart and of one soul : neither said any of them that ought of the things which he possessed was his own ; but they had all things common .
text2: Jumuiya yote ya waumini ilikuwa moyo mmoja na roho moja . Hakuna hata mmoja aliyekuwa na kitu chochote akakiweka kuwa mali yake binafsi , ila waligawana vyote walivyokuwa navyo .

text: And with great power gave the apostles witness of the resurrection of the Lord Jesus : and great grace was upon them all .
text2: Mitume walishuhudia kwa nguvu nyingi kufufuka kwa Bwana Yesu , naye Mungu akawapa baraka nyingi .

text: Neither was there any among them that lacked : for as many as were possessors of lands or houses sold them , and brought the prices of the things that were sold ,
text2: Hakuna mtu yeyote aliyetindikiwa kitu , maana waliokuwa na mashamba au nyumba walikuwa wanaviuza

text: And laid them down at the apostles ' feet : and distribution was made unto every man according as he had need .
text2: na kuwakabidhi mitume fedha hizo , zikagawiwa kila mmoja kadiri ya mahitaji yake .

text: And Joses , who by the apostles was surnamed Barnabas , ( which is , being interpreted , The son of consolation , ) a Levite , and of the country of Cyprus ,
text2: Kulikuwa na Mlawi mmoja , mzaliwa wa Kupro , jina lake Yosefu , ambaye mitume walimwita jina Barnaba ( maana yake , " Mtu mwenye kutia moyo " ) .

text: Having land , sold it , and brought the money , and laid it at the apostles ' feet .
text2: Yeye pia alikuwa na shamba lake , akaliuza ; akazichukua zile fedha , akawakabidhi mitume .

text: But a certain man named Ananias , with Sapphira his wife , sold a possession ,
text2: Mtu mmoja aitwaye Anania na mkewe Safira waliuza shamba lao vilevile .

text: And kept back part of the price , his wife also being privy to it , and brought a certain part , and laid it at the apostles ' feet .
text2: Lakini , mkewe akiwa anajua , Anania akajiwekea sehemu ya fedha alizopata na ile sehemu nyingine akawakabidhi mitume .

text: But Peter said , Ananias , why hath Satan filled thine heart to lie to the Holy Ghost , and to keep back part of the price of the land ?
text2: Basi , Petro akamwuliza , " Anania , mbona Shetani ameuingia moyo wako na kukufanya umdanganye Roho Mtakatifu kwa kujiwekea sehemu ya fedha ulizopata kutokana na lile shamba ?

text: Whiles it remained , was it not thine own ? and after it was sold , was it not in thine own power ? why hast thou conceived this thing in thine heart ? thou hast not lied unto men , but unto God .
text2: Kabla ya kuliuza lilikuwa mali yako , na baada ya kuliuza , bado hizo fedha zilikuwa zako uzitumie utakavyo . Kwa nini basi , uliamua moyoni mwako kufanya jambo la namna hii ? Hukumdanganya mtu ; umemdanganya Mungu ! "

text: And Ananias hearing these words fell down , and gave up the ghost : and great fear came on all them that heard these things .
text2: Anania aliposikia hayo , akaanguka chini , akafa . Watu wote waliosikia habari ya tukio hilo waliogopa sana .

text: And the young men arose , wound him up , and carried him out , and buried him .
text2: Vijana wakafika wakaufunika mwili wake , wakamtoa nje , wakamzika .

text: And it was about the space of three hours after , when his wife , not knowing what was done , came in .
text2: Baada ya muda wa saa tatu hivi , mke wake , bila kufahamu mambo yaliyotukia , akaingia mle ndani .

text: And Peter answered unto her , Tell me whether ye sold the land for so much ? And she said , Yea , for so much .
text2: Petro akamwambia , " Niambie ! Je , kiasi hiki cha fedha ndicho mlichopata kwa kuuza lile shamba ? " Yeye akamjibu , " Naam , ni kiasi hicho . "

text: Then Peter said unto her , How is it that ye have agreed together to tempt the Spirit of the Lord ? behold , the feet of them which have buried thy husband are at the door , and shall carry thee out .
text2: Naye Petro akamwambia , " Mbona mmekula njama kumjaribu Roho wa Bwana ? Sikiliza ! Wale watu waliokwenda kumzika mume wako , sasa wako mlangoni na watakuchukua wewe pia . "

text: Then fell she down straightway at his feet , and yielded up the ghost : and the young men came in , and found her dead , and , carrying her forth , buried her by her husband .
text2: Mara Safira akaanguka mbele ya miguu ya Petro , akafa . Wale vijana walipoingia , walimkuta amekwisha kufa ; hivyo wakamtoa nje , wakamzika karibu na mume wake .

text: And great fear came upon all the church , and upon as many as heard these things .
text2: Kanisa lote pamoja na wote waliosikia habari ya tukio hilo , waliogopa sana .

text: And by the hands of the apostles were many signs and wonders wrought among the people ; ( and they were all with one accord in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Mitume walifanya miujiza na maajabu mengi kati ya watu . Waumini walikuwa wakikutana pamoja katika ukumbi wa Solomoni .

text: And of the rest durst no man join himself to them : but the people magnified them .
text2: Mtu yeyote mwingine ambaye hakuwa mwamini hakuthubutu kujiunga nao . Hata hivyo , watu wengine wasiokuwa wa imani hiyo waliwasifu .

text: And believers were the more added to the Lord , multitudes both of men and women . )
text2: Idadi ya watu waliomwamini Bwana , wanaume kwa wanawake , iliongezeka zaidi na zaidi .

text: Insomuch that they brought forth the sick into the streets , and laid them on beds and couches , that at the least the shadow of Peter passing by might overshadow some of them .
text2: Kwa sababu hiyo , watu walikuwa wakipeleka wagonjwa barabarani na kuwalaza juu ya vitanda na mikeka ili Petro akipita , walau kivuli chake kiwaguse baadhi yao .

text: There came also a multitude out of the cities round about unto Jerusalem , bringing sick folks , and them which were vexed with unclean spirits : and they were healed every one .
text2: Watu wengi walifika kutoka katika miji ya kando kando ya Yerusalemu , wakiwaleta wagonjwa wao na wale waliokuwa na pepo wachafu , nao wote wakaponywa .

text: Then the high priest rose up , and all they that were with him , ( which is the sect of the Sadducees , ) and were filled with indignation ,
text2: Kisha , Kuhani Mkuu na wenzake waliokuwa wa kikundi cha Masadukayo wa mahali hapo , wakawaonea mitume wivu .

text: And laid their hands on the apostles , and put them in the common prison .
text2: Basi , wakawatia nguvuni , wakawafunga ndani ya gereza kuu .

text: But the angel of the Lord by night opened the prison doors , and brought them forth , and said ,
text2: Lakini usiku malaika wa Bwana aliifungua milango ya gereza , akawatoa nje , akawaambia ,

text: Go , stand and speak in the temple to the people all the words of this life .
text2: " Nendeni mkasimame Hekaluni na kuwaambia watu kila kitu kuhusu maisha haya mapya . "

text: And when they heard that , they entered into the temple early in the morning , and taught . But the high priest came , and they that were with him , and called the council together , and all the senate of the children of Israel and sent to the prison to have them brought .
text2: Mitume walitii , wakaingia Hekaluni asubuhi na mapema , wakaanza kufundisha . Kuhani Mkuu na wenzake walipofika , waliita mkutano wa Baraza kuu , yaani halmashauri yote ya wazee wa Wayahudi halafu wakawatuma watu gerezani wawalete wale mitume .

text: But when the officers came , and found them not in the prison , they returned , and told ,
text2: Lakini hao watumishi walipofika huko hawakuwakuta mle gerezani . Hivyo walirudi , wakatoa taarifa mkutanoni ,

text: Saying , The prison truly found we shut with all safety , and the keepers standing without before the doors : but when we had opened , we found no man within .
text2: wakisema , " Tulikuta gereza limefungwa kila upande na walinzi wakilinda milango . Lakini tulipofungua hatukumkuta mtu yeyote ndani . "

text: Now when the high priest and the captain of the temple and the chief priests heard these things , they doubted of them whereunto this would grow .
text2: Mkuu wa walinzi wa Hekalu na makuhani wakuu waliposikia habari hiyo wakawa na wasiwasi , wasijue yaliyowapata .

text: Then came one and told them , saying , Behold , the men whom ye put in prison are standing in the temple , and teaching the people .
text2: Akafika mtu mmoja , akawaambia , " Wale watu mliowafunga gerezani , hivi sasa wamo Hekaluni , wanawafundisha watu . "

text: Then went the captain with the officers , and brought them without violence : for they feared the people , lest they should have been stoned .
text2: Hapo mkuu wa walinzi wa Hekalu pamoja na watu wake walikwenda Hekaluni , akawaleta . Lakini hawakuwakamata kwa kutumia nguvu , maana waliogopa kwamba watu wangewapiga mawe .

text: And when they had brought them , they set them before the council : and the high priest asked them ,
text2: Basi , wakawapeleka , wakawasimamisha mbele ya Baraza . Kuhani Mkuu akawaambia ,

text: Saying , Did not we straitly command you that ye should not teach in this name ? and , behold , ye have filled Jerusalem with your doctrine , and intend to bring this man ' s blood upon us .
text2: " Tuliwakatazeni waziwazi kufundisha kwa jina la mtu huyu ; sasa mmeyaeneza mafundisho yenu pote katika Yerusalemu na mnakusudia kutuwekea lawama ya kifo cha mtu huyo . "

text: Then Peter and the other apostles answered and said , We ought to obey God rather than men .
text2: Hapo Petro , akiwa pamoja na wale mitume wengine , akajibu , " Lazima tumtii Mungu , na siyo binadamu .

text: The God of our fathers raised up Jesus , whom ye slew and hanged on a tree .
text2: Mungu wa babu zetu alimfufua Yesu baada ya ninyi kumwua kwa kumtundika msalabani .

text: Him hath God exalted with his right hand to be a Prince and a Saviour , for to give repentance to Israel , and forgiveness of sins .
text2: Huyu ndiye yule aliyekwezwa na Mungu mpaka upande wake wa kulia , akawa kiongozi na Mwokozi , ili awawezeshe watu wa Israeli watubu , wapate kusamehewa dhambi zao .

text: And we are his witnesses of these things ; and so is also the Holy Ghost , whom God hath given to them that obey him .
text2: Sisi ni mashahidi wa tukio hilo , naye Roho Mtakatifu ambaye Mungu amewapa wale wanaomtii , anashuhudia pia tukio hilo . "

text: When they heard that , they were cut to the heart , and took counsel to slay them .
text2: Wajumbe wote wa lile Baraza waliposikia hayo , wakawaka hasira , hata wakaamua kuwaua .

text: Then stood there up one in the council , a Pharisee , named Gamaliel , a doctor of the law , had in reputation among all the people , and commanded to put the apostles forth a little space ;
text2: Lakini Mfarisayo mmoja aitwaye Gamalieli ambaye alikuwa mwalimu wa Sheria na aliyeheshimika sana mbele ya watu wote , alisimama mbele ya lile Baraza , akataka wale mitume watolewe nje kwa muda mfupi .

text: And said unto them , Ye men of Israel , take heed to yourselves what ye intend to do as touching these men .
text2: Kisha akawaambia wale wajumbe wa Baraza , " Wananchi wa Israeli , tahadhari kabla ya kutekeleza hicho mnachotaka kuwatenda watu hawa !

text: For before these days rose up Theudas , boasting himself to be somebody ; to whom a number of men , about four hundred , joined themselves : who was slain ; and all , as many as obeyed him , were scattered , and brought to nought .
text2: Zamani kidogo , kulitokea mtu mmoja jina lake Theuda , akajisema kuwa mtu wa maana na watu karibu mia nne wakajiunga naye . Lakini aliuawa , kisha wafuasi wake wote wakatawanyika na kikundi chake kikafa .

text: After this man rose up Judas of Galilee in the days of the taxing , and drew away much people after him : he also perished ; and all , even as many as obeyed him , were dispersed .
text2: Tena , baadaye , wakati ule wa kuhesabiwa watu , alitokea Yuda wa Galilaya . Huyu naye , aliwavuta watu wakamfuata ; lakini naye pia aliuawa , na wafuasi wake wakatawanyika .

text: And now I say unto you , Refrain from these men , and let them alone : for if this counsel or this work be of men , it will come to nought :
text2: Na sasa pia mimi nawaambieni , msiwachukulie watu hawa hatua yoyote ; waacheni ! Kwa maana , ikiwa mpango huu au shughuli hii yao imeanzishwa na binadamu , itatoweka yenyewe .

text: But if it be of God , ye cannot overthrow it ; lest haply ye be found even to fight against God .
text2: Lakini kama imeanzishwa na Mungu , siyo tu kwamba hamtaweza kuwashinda , bali mtajikuta mnapigana na Mungu . " Basi , wakakubaliana naye .

text: And to him they agreed : and when they had called the apostles , and beaten them , they commanded that they should not speak in the name of Jesus , and let them go .
text2: Hivyo wakawaita wale mitume , wakaamuru wachapwe viboko na kuwaonya wasifundishe tena kwa jina la Yesu ; kisha wakawaacha waende zao .

text: And they departed from the presence of the council , rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer shame for his name .
text2: Basi , mitume wakatoka nje ya ule mkutano wa halmashauri wakiwa wamejaa furaha , kwani walistahili kuaibishwa kwa ajili ya jina la Yesu .

text: And daily in the temple , and in every house , they ceased not to teach and preach Jesus Christ .
text2: Wakaendelea kila siku kufundisha na kuhubiri Habari Njema ya Kristo , Hekaluni na nyumbani mwa watu .

text: And in those days , when the number of the disciples was multiplied , there arose a murmuring of the Grecians against the Hebrews , because their widows were neglected in the daily ministration .
text2: Baadaye , idadi ya wanafunzi ilipokuwa inazidi kuongezeka , kulitokea manung ' uniko kati ya wanafunzi waliosema Kigiriki na wale waliosema Kiebrania . Wale waliosema Kigiriki walinung ' unika kwamba wajane wao walikuwa wanasahauliwa katika ugawaji wa mahitaji ya kila siku .

text: Then the twelve called the multitude of the disciples unto them , and said , It is not reason that we should leave the word of God , and serve tables .
text2: Kwa hiyo , mitume kumi na wawili waliita jumuiya yote ya wanafunzi , wakasema , " Si vizuri sisi tuache kulihubiri neno la Mungu ili tushughulikie ugawaji wa mahitaji .

text: Wherefore , brethren , look ye out among you seven men of honest report , full of the Holy Ghost and wisdom , whom we may appoint over this business .
text2: Hivyo , ndugu zetu , chagueni miongoni mwenu watu saba wenye sifa njema , waliojawa na Roho na wenye hekima ; nasi tutawakabidhi jukumu hilo .

text: But we will give ourselves continually to prayer , and to the ministry of the word .
text2: Sisi , lakini , tutashughulika na sala na kazi ya kuhubiri neno la Mungu . "

text: And the saying pleased the whole multitude : and they chose Stephen , a man full of faith and of the Holy Ghost , and Philip , and Prochorus , and Nicanor , and Timon , and Parmenas , and Nicolas a proselyte of Antioch :
text2: Jambo hilo likaipendeza jumuiya yote ya waumini . Wakawachagua Stefano , mtu mwenye imani kubwa na mwenye kujawa na Roho Mtakatifu , Filipo , Prokoro , Nikanora , Timona , Parmena na Nikolao wa Antiokia ambaye hapo awali alikuwa ameongokea dini ya Kiyahudi .

text: Whom they set before the apostles : and when they had prayed , they laid their hands on them .
text2: Wakawaweka mbele ya mitume , nao wakawaombea na kuwawekea mikono .

text: And the word of God increased ; and the number of the disciples multiplied in Jerusalem greatly ; and a great company of the priests were obedient to the faith .
text2: Neno la Mungu likazidi kuenea na idadi ya waumini huko Yerusalemu ikaongezeka zaidi , na kundi kubwa la makuhani wakaipokea imani .

text: And Stephen , full of faith and power , did great wonders and miracles among the people .
text2: Mungu alimjalia Stefano neema tele , akampa nguvu nyingi hata akawa anatenda miujiza na maajabu kati ya watu .

text: Then there arose certain of the synagogue , which is called the synagogue of the Libertines , and Cyrenians , and Alexandrians , and of them of Cilicia and of Asia , disputing with Stephen .
text2: Lakini watu fulani wakatokea ili wabishane na Stefano . Baadhi ya watu hao walikuwa wa sunagogi moja lililoitwa " Sunagogi la Watu Huru " , nao walitoka Kurene na Aleksandria ; wengine walitoka Kilikia na Asia .

text: And they were not able to resist the wisdom and the spirit by which he spake .
text2: Lakini hawakuweza kumshinda kwa sababu ya hekima yake na kwa sababu ya yule Roho aliyeongoza maneno yake .

text: Then they suborned men , which said , We have heard him speak blasphemous words against Moses , and against God .
text2: Kwa hiyo waliwahonga watu kadhaa waseme : " Tumemsikia Stefano akisema maneno ya kumkashifu Mose na kumkashifu Mungu . "

text: And they stirred up the people , and the elders , and the scribes , and came upon him , and caught him , and brought him to the council ,
text2: Kwa namna hiyo , waliwachochea watu , wazee na walimu wa Sheria . Basi , wakamjia Stefano , wakamkamata na kumleta mbele ya Baraza kuu .

text: And set up false witnesses , which said , This man ceaseth not to speak blasphemous words against this holy place , and the law :
text2: Walileta Barazani mashahidi wa uongo ambao walisema , " Mtu huyu haachi kamwe kusema maneno ya kupakashifu mahali hapa patakatifu na Sheria ya Mose .

text: For we have heard him say , that this Jesus of Nazareth shall destroy this place , and shall change the customs which Moses delivered us .
text2: Kwa maana tulikwisha msikia akisema eti huyo Yesu wa Nazareti atapaharibu kabisa mahali hapa na kufutilia mbali desturi zile tulizopokea kutoka kwa Mose . "

text: And all that sat in the council , looking stedfastly on him , saw his face as it had been the face of an angel .
text2: Wote waliokuwa katika kile kikao cha Baraza walimkodolea macho Stefano , wakauona uso wake umekuwa kama wa malaika .

text: Then said the high priest , Are these things so ?
text2: Basi , Kuhani Mkuu akamwuliza , " Je , mambo haya ni kweli ? "

text: And he said , Men , brethren , and fathers , hearken ; The God of glory appeared unto our father Abraham , when he was in Mesopotamia , before he dwelt in Charran ,
text2: Naye Stefano akasema , " Ndugu zangu na akina baba , nisikilizeni ! Mungu alimtokea baba yetu Abrahamu alipokuwa kule Mesopotamia kabla hajaenda kukaa kule Harani .

text: And said unto him , Get thee out of thy country , and from thy kindred , and come into the land which I shall shew thee .
text2: Mungu alimwambia : Ondoka katika nchi yako ; waache watu wa ukoo wako ; nenda katika nchi nitakayokuonyesha !

text: Then came he out of the land of the Chaldaeans , and dwelt in Charran : and from thence , when his father was dead , he removed him into this land , wherein ye now dwell .
text2: Kwa hivyo , Abrahamu alihama nchi ya Kaldayo , akaenda kukaa Harani . Baada ya kifo cha baba yake , Mungu alimtoa tena Harani akaja kukaa katika nchi hii mnayokaa sasa .

text: And he gave him none inheritance in it , no , not so much as to set his foot on : yet he promised that he would give it to him for a possession , and to his seed after him , when as yet he had no child .
text2: Mungu hakumpa hata sehemu moja ya nchi hii iwe mali yake ; hata hivyo , alimwahidia kumpa nchi hii iwe yake na ya wazawa wake , ingawaje wakati huu hakuwa na mtoto .

text: And God spake on this wise , That his seed should sojourn in a strange land ; and that they should bring them into bondage , and entreat them evil four hundred years .
text2: Mungu alimwambia hivi : Wazao wako watapelekwa katika nchi inayotawaliwa na watu wengine , na huko watafanywa watumwa na kutendewa vibaya kwa muda wa miaka mia nne .

text: And the nation to whom they shall be in bondage will I judge , said God : and after that shall they come forth , and serve me in this place .
text2: Lakini mimi nitalihukumu taifa hilo litakalowafanya watumwa . Kisha nitawatoa katika nchi hiyo ili waje kuniabudu mahali hapa .

text: And he gave him the covenant of circumcision : and so Abraham begat Isaac , and circumcised him the eighth day ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat the twelve patriarchs .
text2: Halafu Mungu aliifanya tohara iwe ishara ya agano . Hivyo , Abrahamu alimtahiri mtoto wake Isaka , siku ya nane baada ya kuzaliwa . Na Isaka , vivyo hivyo , alimtahiri Yakobo . Naye Yakobo aliwatendea wale mababu kumi na wawili vivyo hivyo .

text: And the patriarchs , moved with envy , sold Joseph into Egypt : but God was with him ,
text2: " Wale mababu walimwonea wivu Yosefu , wakamuuza utumwani Misri . Lakini Mungu alikuwa pamoja naye ,

text: And delivered him out of all his afflictions , and gave him favour and wisdom in the sight of Pharaoh king of Egypt ; and he made him governor over Egypt and all his house .
text2: akamwokoa katika taabu zake zote . Mungu alimjalia fadhili na hekima mbele ya Farao , mfalme wa Misri , hata Farao akamweka awe mkuu wa ile nchi na nyumba ya kifalme .

text: Now there came a dearth over all the land of Egypt and Chanaan , and great affliction : and our fathers found no sustenance .
text2: Kisha , kulizuka njaa kubwa katika nchi yote ya Misri na Kanaani , ikasababisha dhiki kubwa . Babu zetu hawakuweza kupata chakula chochote .

text: But when Jacob heard that there was corn in Egypt , he sent out our fathers first .
text2: Basi , Yakobo alipopata habari kwamba huko Misri kulikuwa na nafaka , aliwatuma watoto wake , yaani babu zetu , waende huko Misri mara ya kwanza .

text: And at the second time Joseph was made known to his brethren ; and Joseph ' s kindred was made known unto Pharaoh .
text2: Katika safari yao ya pili , Yosefu alijitambulisha kwa ndugu zake , na Farao akaifahamu jamaa ya Yosefu .

text: Then sent Joseph , and called his father Jacob to him , and all his kindred , threescore and fifteen souls .
text2: Yosefu alituma ujumbe kwa baba yake na jamaa yote , jumla watu sabini na tano , waje Misri .

text: So Jacob went down into Egypt , and died , he , and our fathers ,
text2: Hivyo , Yakobo alikwenda Misri ambako yeye na babu zetu wengine walikufa .

text: And were carried over into Sychem , and laid in the sepulchre that Abraham bought for a sum of money of the sons of Emmor the father of Sychem .
text2: Miili yao ililetwa mpaka Shekemu , ikazikwa katika kaburi Abrahamu alilonunua kutoka kwa kabila la Hamori kwa kiasi fulani cha fedha .

text: But when the time of the promise drew nigh , which God had sworn to Abraham , the people grew and multiplied in Egypt ,
text2: " Wakati ulipotimia Mungu aitimize ahadi aliyompa Abrahamu , idadi ya wale watu kule Misri ilikwisha ongezeka na kuwa kubwa zaidi .

text: Till another king arose , which knew not Joseph .
text2: Mwishowe , mfalme mmoja ambaye hakumtambua Yosefu alianza kutawala huko Misri .

text: The same dealt subtilly with our kindred , and evil entreated our fathers , so that they cast out their young children , to the end they might not live .
text2: Alilifanyia taifa letu ukatili , akawatendea vibaya babu zetu kwa kuwalazimisha waweke nje watoto wao wachanga ili wafe .

text: In which time Moses was born , and was exceeding fair , and nourished up in his father ' s house three months :
text2: Mose alizaliwa wakati huo . Alikuwa mtoto mzuri sana . Alilelewa nyumbani kwa muda wa miezi mitatu ,

text: And when he was cast out , Pharaoh ' s daughter took him up , and nourished him for her own son .
text2: na alipotolewa nje , binti wa Farao alimchukua , akamlea kama mtoto wake .

text: And Moses was learned in all the wisdom of the Egyptians , and was mighty in words and in deeds .
text2: Mose alifundishwa mambo yote ya hekima ya Wamisri akawa mashuhuri kwa maneno na matendo .

text: And when he was full forty years old , it came into his heart to visit his brethren the children of Israel .
text2: " Alipokuwa na umri wa miaka arobaini aliamua kwenda kuwaona ndugu zake Waisraeli .

text: And seeing one of them suffer wrong , he defended him , and avenged him that was oppressed , and smote the Egyptian :
text2: Huko alimwona mmoja wao akitendewa vibaya , akaenda kumwokoa , na kulipiza kisasi , akamuua yule Mmisri .

text: For he supposed his brethren would have understood how that God by his hand would deliver them : but they understood not .
text2: ( Alidhani kwamba Waisraeli wenzake wangeelewa kwamba Mungu angemtumia yeye kuwakomboa , lakini hawakuelewa hivyo . )

text: And the next day he shewed himself unto them as they strove , and would have set them at one again , saying , Sirs , ye are brethren ; why do ye wrong one to another ?
text2: Kesho yake , aliwaona Waisraeli wawili wakipigana , akajaribu kuwapatanisha , akisema : Ninyi ni ndugu ; kwa nini basi , kutendeana vibaya ninyi kwa ninyi ?

text: But he that did his neighbour wrong thrust him away , saying , Who made thee a ruler and a judge over us ?
text2: Yule aliyekuwa anampiga mwenzake alimsukuma Mose kando akisema : Ni nani aliyekuweka wewe kuwa kiongozi na mwamuzi wa watu ?

text: Wilt thou kill me , as thou diddest the Egyptian yesterday ?
text2: Je , unataka kuniua kama ulivyomuua yule Mmisri jana ?

text: Then fled Moses at this saying , and was a stranger in the land of Madian , where he begat two sons .
text2: Baada ya kusikia hayo Mose alikimbia , akaenda kukaa katika nchi ya Midiani na huko akapata watoto wawili .

text: And when forty years were expired , there appeared to him in the wilderness of mount Sina an angel of the Lord in a flame of fire in a bush .
text2: " Miaka arobaini ilipotimia , malaika wa Bwana alimtokea Mose katika kichaka kilichokuwa kinawaka moto kule jangwani karibu na mlima Sinai .

text: When Moses saw it , he wondered at the sight : and as he drew near to behold it , the voice of the Lord came unto him ,
text2: Mose alistaajabu sana kuona jambo hilo hata akasogea karibu ili achungulie ; lakini alisikia sauti ya Bwana :

text: Saying , I am the God of thy fathers , the God of Abrham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob . Then Moses trembled , and durst not behold .
text2: Mimi ni Mungu wa baba zako , Mungu wa Abrahamu , Isaka na Yakobo ! Mose akatetemeka kwa hofu na wala hakuthubutu kutazama zaidi .

text: Then said the Lord to him , Put off thy shoes from thy feet : for the place where thou standest is holy ground .
text2: Bwana akamwambia : Vua viatu vyako maana hapa unaposimama ni mahali patakatifu .

text: I have seen , I have seen the affliction of my people which is in Egypt , and I have heard their groaning , and am come down to deliver them . And now come , I will send thee into Egypt .
text2: Nimeyaona mabaya wanayotendewa watu wangu kule Misri . Nimesikia kilio chao , nami nimekuja kuwaokoa . Basi sasa , nitakutuma Misri .

text: This Moses whom they refused , saying , Who made thee a ruler and a judge ? the same did God send to be a ruler and a deliverer by the hand of the angel which appeared to him in the bush .
text2: " Huyu Mose ndiye yule watu wa Israeli waliyemkataa waliposema : Ni nani aliyekuweka wewe kuwa kiongozi na mwamuzi wetu ? Kwa njia ya yule malaika aliyemtokea katika kichaka kilichokuwa kinawaka moto , Mungu alimtuma Mose huyo awe kiongozi na mkombozi .

text: He brought them out , after that he had shewed wonders and signs in the land of Egypt , and in the Red sea , and in the wilderness forty years .
text2: Ndiye aliyewaongoza wale watu watoke Misri kwa kufanya miujiza na maajabu katika nchi ya Misri , katika bahari ya Shamu na jangwani kwa muda wa miaka arobaini .

text: This is that Moses , which said unto the children of Israel , A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren , like unto me ; him shall ye hear .
text2: Mose ndiye aliyewaambia watu wa Israeli : Mungu atawateulieni nabii kama mimi kutoka katika ndugu zenu ninyi wenyewe .

text: This is he , that was in the church in the wilderness with the angel which spake to him in the mount Sina , and with our fathers : who received the lively oracles to give unto us :
text2: Wakati watu wa Israeli walipokutana pamoja kule jangwani , Mose ndiye aliyekuwako huko pamoja nao . Alikuwa huko pamoja na babu zetu na yule malaika aliyeongea naye mlimani Sinai ; ndiye aliyekabidhiwa yale maneno yaletayo uzima atupe sisi .

text: To whom our fathers would not obey , but thrust him from them , and in their hearts turned back again into Egypt ,
text2: " Lakini yeye ndiye babu zetu waliyemkataa kumsikiliza ; walimsukuma kando , wakatamani kurudi Misri .

text: Saying unto Aaron , Make us gods to go before us : for as for this Moses , which brought us out of the land of Egypt , we wot not what is become of him .
text2: Walimwambia Aroni : Tutengenezee miungu itakayotuongoza njiani , maana hatujui yaliyompata Mose huyu aliyetuongoza kutoka Misri !

text: And they made a calf in those days , and offered sacrifice unto the idol , and rejoiced in the works of their own hands .
text2: Hapo ndipo walipojitengenezea sanamu ya ndama , wakaitambikia na kukifanyia sherehe kitu ambacho ni kazi ya mikono yao wenyewe .

text: Then God turned , and gave them up to worship the host of heaven ; as it is written in the book of the prophets , O ye house of Israel , have ye offered to me slain beasts and sacrifices by the space of forty years in the wilderness ?
text2: Lakini Mungu aliondoka kati yao , akawaacha waabudu nyota za anga , kama ilivyoandikwa katika kitabu cha manabii : Enyi watu wa Israeli ! Si mimi mliyenitolea dhabihu na sadaka kwa muda wa miaka arobaini kule jangwani !

text: Yea , ye took up the tabernacle of Moloch , and the star of your god Remphan , figures which ye made to worship them : and I will carry you away beyond Babylon .
text2: Ninyi mlikibeba kibanda cha mungu Moloki , na sanamu ya nyota ya mungu wenu Refani . Sanamu mlizozifanya ndizo mlizoabudu . Kwa sababu hiyo nitakupeleka mateka mbali kupita Babuloni !

text: Our fathers had the tabernacle of witness in the wilderness , as he had appointed , speaking unto Moses , that he should make it according to the fashion that he had seen .
text2: Kule jangwani babu zetu walikuwa na lile hema lililoshuhudia kuweko kwa Mungu . Lilitengenezwa kama Mungu alivyomwambia Mose alifanye ; nakala kamili ya kile alichoonyeshwa .

text: Which also our fathers that came after brought in with Jesus into the possession of the Gentiles , whom God drave out before the face of our fathers , unto the days of David ;
text2: Kisha babu zetu walilipokezana wao kwa wao mpaka wakati wa Yoshua , walipoinyakua ile nchi kutoka kwa mataifa ambayo Mungu aliyafukuza mbele yao . Hapo lilikaa mpaka nyakati za Daudi .

text: Who found favour before God , and desired to find a tabernacle for the God of Jacob .
text2: Daudi alipata upendeleo kwa Mungu , akamwomba Mungu ruhusa ya kumjengea makao yeye aliye Mungu wa Yakobo .

text: But Solomon built him an house .
text2: Lakini Solomoni ndiye aliyemjengea Mungu nyumba .

text: Howbeit the most High dwelleth not in temples made with hands ; as saith the prophet ,
text2: " Hata hivyo , Mungu Mkuu haishi katika nyumba zilizojengwa na binadamu ; kama nabii asemavyo :

text: Heaven is my throne , and earth is my footstool : what house will ye build me ? saith the Lord : or what is the place of my rest ?
text2: Bwana asema : Mbingu ni kiti changu cha enzi na dunia ni kiti changu cha kuwekea miguu .

text: Hath not my hand made all these things ?
text2: Ni nyumba ya namna gani basi mnayoweza kunijengea , na ni mahali gani nitakapopumzika ? Vitu hivi vyote ni mimi nimevifanya , au sivyo ?

text: Ye stiffnecked and uncircumcised in heart and ears , ye do always resist the Holy Ghost : as your fathers did , so do ye .
text2: " Enyi wakaidi wakuu ! Mioyo na masikio yenu ni kama ya watu wa mataifa . Ninyi ni kama baba zenu . Siku zote mnampinga Roho Mtakatifu .

text: Which of the prophets have not your fathers persecuted ? and they have slain them which shewed before of the coming of the Just One ; of whom ye have been now the betrayers and murderers :
text2: Je , yuko nabii yeyote ambaye baba zenu hawakumtesa ? Waliwaua hao Mungu aliowatuma watangaze kuja kwake yule Mwenye Haki . Na sasa , ninyi mmemsaliti , mkamuua .

text: Who have received the law by the disposition of angels , and have not kept it .
text2: Ninyi mliipokea ile Sheria iliyoletwa kwenu na Malaika , lakini hamkuitii . "

text: When they heard these things , they were cut to the heart , and they gnashed on him with their teeth .
text2: Wale wazee wa Baraza waliposikia hayo , walighadhibika sana , wakamsagia meno kwa hasira .

text: But he , being full of the Holy Ghost , looked up stedfastly into heaven , and saw the glory of God , and Jesus standing on the right hand of God ,
text2: Lakini Stefano akiwa amejawa na Roho Mtakatifu , akatazama juu mbinguni , akauona utukufu wa Mungu na Yesu amekaa upande wa kulia wa Mungu .

text: And said , Behold , I see the heavens opened , and the Son of man standing on the right hand of God .
text2: Akasema , " Tazameni ! Ninaona mbingu zimefunuliwa na Mwana wa Mtu amesimama upande wa kulia wa Mungu . "

text: Then they cried out with a loud voice , and stopped their ears , and ran upon him with one accord ,
text2: Hapo , watu wote katika kile kikao cha Baraza , wakapiga kelele na kuziba masikio yao kwa mikono yao . Kisha wakamrukia wote kwa pamoja ,

text: And cast him out of the city , and stoned him : and the witnesses laid down their clothes at a young man ' s feet , whose name was Saul .
text2: wakamtoa nje ya mji , wakampiga mawe . Wale mashahidi wakayaweka makoti yao chini ya ulinzi wa kijana mmoja jina lake Saulo .

text: And they stoned Stephen , calling upon God , and saying , Lord Jesus , receive my spirit .
text2: Waliendelea kumpiga mawe Stefano , huku akiwa anasali : " Bwana Yesu , ipokee roho yangu ! "

text: And he kneeled down , and cried with a loud voice , Lord , lay not this sin to their charge . And when he had said this , he fell asleep .
text2: Akapiga magoti , akalia kwa sauti kubwa : " Bwana , usiwalaumu kwa sababu ya dhambi hii . " Baada ya kusema hivyo , akafa .

text: And Saul was consenting unto his death . And at that time there was a great persecution against the church which was at Jerusalem ; and they were all scattered abroad throughout the regions of Judaea and Samaria , except the apostles .
text2: Saulo naye alikiona kitendo hicho cha kumwua Stefano kuwa sawa . Siku hiyo kanisa la Yerusalemu lilianza kuteswa vibaya . Waumini wote , isipokuwa tu wale mitume , walilazimika kutawanyika katika sehemu za mashambani za Yudea na Samaria .

text: And devout men carried Stephen to his burial , and made great lamentation over him .
text2: Watu wamchao Mungu , walimzika Stefano na kumfanyia maombolezo makubwa .

text: As for Saul , he made havock of the church , entering into every house , and haling men and women committed them to prison .
text2: Wakati huohuo , Saulo alijaribu kuliangamiza kanisa . Alikwenda katika kila nyumba , akawatoa nje waumini , wanaume kwa wanawake , akawatia gerezani .

text: Therefore they that were scattered abroad went every where preaching the word .
text2: Wale waumini waliotawanyika , walikwenda kila mahali wakihubiri ule ujumbe .

text: Then Philip went down to the city of Samaria , and preached Christ unto them .
text2: Naye Filipo aliingia katika mji wa Samaria na kumhubiri Kristo kwa wenyeji wa hapo .

text: And the people with one accord gave heed unto those things which Philip spake , hearing and seeing the miracles which he did .
text2: Watu walijiunga kusikiliza kwa makini ule ujumbe wa Filipo na kuona ile miujiza aliyoifanya .

text: For unclean spirits , crying with loud voice , came out of many that were possessed with them : and many taken with palsies , and that were lame , were healed .
text2: Maana pepo wachafu waliokuwa wamewapagaa watu wengi waliwatoka wakipiga kelele kubwa ; na pia watu wengi waliokuwa wamepooza viungo na waliolemaa waliponywa .

text: And there was great joy in that city .
text2: Kukawa na furaha kubwa katika mji ule .

text: But there was a certain man , called Simon , which beforetime in the same city used sorcery , and bewitched the people of Samaria , giving out that himself was some great one :
text2: Basi , kulikuwa na mtu mmoja aitwaye Simoni ambaye alikuwa amekwisha fanya uchawi wake katika mji huo kwa muda na kuwashangaza watu wa Samaria , akijiona kuwa yeye ni mtu maarufu .

text: To whom they all gave heed , from the least to the greatest , saying , This man is the great power of God .
text2: Watu wote , wadogo na wakubwa , walimsikiliza kwa makini wakisema , " Simoni ndiye ile nguvu ya kimungu inayoitwa Nguvu Kubwa . "

text: And to him they had regard , because that of long time he had bewitched them with sorceries .
text2: Walivutiwa sana naye kwa vile alikuwa amewashangaza kwa uchawi wake kwa muda mrefu .

text: But when they believed Philip preaching the things concerning the kingdom of God , and the name of Jesus Christ , they were baptized , both men and women .
text2: Lakini walipouamini ujumbe wa Filipo juu ya Habari Njema ya Ufalme wa Mungu na jina la Yesu Kristo , walibatizwa , wanawake na wanaume .

text: Then Simon himself believed also : and when he was baptized , he continued with Philip , and wondered , beholding the miracles and signs which were done .
text2: Hata Simoni aliamini ; baada ya kubatizwa ilikuwa akiandamana na Filipo , akastaajabia maajabu na miujiza iliyokuwa inafanyika .

text: Now when the apostles which were at Jerusalem heard that Samaria had received the word of God , they sent unto them Peter and John :
text2: Wale mitume waliokuwa kule Yerusalemu walipopata habari kwamba wenyeji wa Samaria nao wamelipokea neno la Mungu , waliwatuma kwao Petro na Yohane .

text: Who , when they were come down , prayed for them , that they might receive the Holy Ghost :
text2: Walipofika waliwaombea hao waumini ili wampokee Roho Mtakatifu ;

text: ( For as yet he was fallen upon none of them : only they were baptized in the name of the Lord Jesus . )
text2: maana wakati huo Roho Mtakatifu hakuwa ameshukia yeyote kati yao ; walikuwa wamebatizwa tu kwa jina la Bwana Yesu .

text: Then laid they their hands on them , and they received the Holy Ghost .
text2: Basi , Petro na Yohane wakawawekea mikono hao waumini , nao wakampokea Roho Mtakatifu .

text: And when Simon saw that through laying on of the apostles ' hands the Holy Ghost was given , he offered them money ,
text2: Hapo Simoni aling ' amua kwamba kwa kuwekewa mikono ya mitume waumini walipewa Roho Mtakatifu . Hivyo aliwapa Petro na Yohane fedha akisema ,

text: Saying , Give me also this power , that on whomsoever I lay hands , he may receive the Holy Ghost .
text2: " Nipeni na mimi uwezo huo ili yeyote nitakayemwekea mikono , apokee Roho Mtakatifu . "

text: But Peter said unto him , Thy money perish with thee , because thou hast thought that the gift of God may be purchased with money .
text2: Lakini Petro akamjibu , " Potelea mbali na fedha zako kwa vile unafikiri kwamba unaweza kununua karama ya Mungu kwa fedha !

text: Thou hast neither part nor lot in this matter : for thy heart is not right in the sight of God .
text2: Huna sehemu yoyote wala haki katika kazi hiyo kwa maana moyo wako hauko sawa mbele ya macho ya Mungu .

text: Repent therefore of this thy wickedness , and pray God , if perhaps the thought of thine heart may be forgiven thee .
text2: Kwa hiyo , tubu ubaya wako huu na umwombe Bwana naye anaweza kukusamehe fikira kama hizo .

text: For I perceive that thou art in the gall of bitterness , and in the bond of iniquity .
text2: Ni dhahiri kwangu kwamba umejaa wivu mkali na mfungwa wa dhambi ! "

text: Then answered Simon , and said , Pray ye to the Lord for me , that none of these things which ye have spoken come upon me .
text2: Simoni akajibu , " Tafadhali , niombeeni kwa Bwana lisije likanipata lolote kati ya hayo mliyosema . "

text: And they , when they had testified and preached the word of the Lord , returned to Jerusalem , and preached the gospel in many villages of the Samaritans .
text2: Baada ya Petro na Yohane kutoa ushuhuda wao na kuutangaza ujumbe wa Bwana , walirudi Yerusalemu . Walipokuwa wanarudi walihubiri Habari Njema katika vijiji vingi vya Samaria .

text: And the angel of the Lord spake unto Philip , saying , Arise , and go toward the south unto the way that goeth down from Jerusalem unto Gaza , which is desert .
text2: Malaika wa Bwana alimwambia Filipo , " Jitayarishe uende kusini kupitia njia inayotoka Yerusalemu kwenda Gaza . " ( Njia hiyo hupita jangwani . )

text: And he arose and went : and , behold , a man of Ethiopia , an eunuch of great authority under Candace queen of the Ethiopians , who had the charge of all her treasure , and had come to Jerusalem for to worship ,
text2: Basi , Filipo akajiweka tayari , akaanza safari . Wakati huohuo kulikuwa na Mwethiopia mmoja , towashi , ambaye alikuwa anasafiri kuelekea nyumbani . Huyo mtu alikuwa ofisa maarufu wa hazina ya Kandake , malkia wa Ethiopia . Alikuwa amekwenda huko Yerusalemu kuabudu na wakati huo alikuwa anarudi akiwa amepanda gari la kukokotwa .

text: Was returning , and sitting in his chariot read Esaias the prophet .
text2: Alipokuwa anasafiri , alikuwa akijisomea kitabu cha nabii Isaya .

text: Then the Spirit said unto Philip , Go near , and join thyself to this chariot .
text2: Basi , Roho Mtakatifu akamwambia Filipo , " Nenda karibu na gari hilo ukafuatane nalo . "

text: And Philip ran thither to him , and heard him read the prophet Esaias , and said , Understandest thou what thou readest ?
text2: Filipo akakimbilia karibu na gari , akamsikia huyo mtu akisoma katika kitabu cha nabii Isaya . Hapo Filipo akamwuliza , " Je , unaelewa hayo unayosoma ? "

text: And he said , How can I , except some man should guide me ? And he desired Philip that he would come up and sit with him .
text2: Huyo mtu akamjibu , " Ninawezaje kuelewa bila mtu kunielewesha ? " Hapo akamwalika Filipo apande juu , aketi pamoja naye .

text: The place of the scripture which he read was this , He was led as a sheep to the slaughter ; and like a lamb dumb before his shearer , so opened he not his mouth :
text2: Basi , sehemu ya Maandiko Matakatifu aliyokuwa anasoma ilikuwa hii : " Alikuwa kama kondoo anayepelekwa kuchinjwa ; kimya kama vile mwana kondoo anaponyolewa manyoya , yeye naye hakutoa sauti hata kidogo .

text: In his humiliation his judgment was taken away : and who shall declare his generation ? for his life is taken from the earth .
text2: Alifedheheshwa na kunyimwa haki . Hakuna atakayeweza kuongea juu ya kizazi chake , kwa maana maisha yake yameondolewa duniani . "

text: And the eunuch answered Philip , and said , I pray thee , of whom speaketh the prophet this ? of himself , or of some other man ?
text2: Huyo Mwethiopia akamwambia Filipo , " Niambie , huyu nabii anasema juu ya nani ? Anasema mambo haya juu yake yeye mwenyewe au juu ya mtu mwingine ? "

text: Then Philip opened his mouth , and began at the same scripture , and preached unto him Jesus .
text2: Basi , Filipo akianzia na sehemu hiyo ya Maandiko Matakatifu , akamweleza Habari Njema juu ya Yesu .

text: And as they went on their way , they came unto a certain water : and the eunuch said , See , here is water ; what doth hinder me to be baptized ?
text2: Walipokuwa bado wanaendelea na safari walifika mahali penye maji na huyo ofisa akasema , " Mahali hapa pana maji ; je , kuna chochote cha kunizuia nisibatizwe ? "

text: And Philip said , If thou believest with all thine heart , thou mayest . And he answered and said , I believe that Jesus Christ is the Son of God .
text2: Filipo akasema , " Kama unaamini kwa moyo wako wote unaweza kubatizwa . " Naye akajibu , " Naam , ninaamini kwamba Yesu Kristo ni Mwana wa Mungu . "

text: And he commanded the chariot to stand still : and they went down both into the water , both Philip and the eunuch ; and he baptized him .
text2: Basi , huyo ofisa akaamuru lile gari lisimame ; na wote wawili , Filipo na huyo ofisa wakashuka majini , naye Filipo akambatiza .

text: And when they were come up out of the water , the Spirit of the Lord caught away Philip , that the eunuch saw him no more : and he went on his way rejoicing .
text2: Walipotoka majini Roho wa Bwana akamfanya Filipo atoweke . Na huyo Mwethiopia hakumwona tena ; lakini akaendelea na safari yake akiwa amejaa furaha .

text: But Philip was found at Azotus : and passing through he preached in all the cities , till he came to Caesarea .
text2: Filipo akajikuta yuko Azoto , akapita katika miji yote akihubiri Habari Njema mpaka alipofika Kaisarea .

text: And Saul , yet breathing out threatenings and slaughter against the disciples of the Lord , went unto the high priest ,
text2: Wakati huo Saulo alikuwa akizidisha vitisho vikali vya kuwaua wafuasi wa Bwana . Alikwenda kwa Kuhani Mkuu ,

text: And desired of him letters to Damascus to the synagogues , that if he found any of this way , whether they were men or women , he might bring them bound unto Jerusalem .
text2: akaomba apatiwe barua za utambulisho kwa masunagogi ya Kiyahudi kule Damasko , ili akikuta huko wanaume au wanawake wanaofuata Njia ya Bwana , awakamate na kuwaleta Yerusalemu .

text: And as he journeyed , he came near Damascus : and suddenly there shined round about him a light from heaven :
text2: Lakini alipokuwa njiani karibu kufika Damasko , ghafla mwanga kutoka angani ulimwangazia pande zote .

text: And he fell to the earth , and heard a voice saying unto him , Saul , Saul , why persecutest thou me ?
text2: Akaanguka chini na kusikia sauti ikimwambia : " Saulo , Saulo ! Kwa nini unanitesa ? "

text: And he said , Who art thou , Lord ? And the Lord said , I am Jesus whom thou persecutest : it is hard for thee to kick against the pricks .
text2: Naye Saulo akauliza , " Ni nani wewe Bwana ? " Na ile sauti ikajibu , " Mimi ni Yesu ambaye wewe unamtesa .

text: And he trembling and astonished said , Lord , what wilt thou have me to do ? And the Lord said unto him , Arise , and go into the city , and it shall be told thee what thou must do .
text2: Lakini simama sasa , uingie mjini na huko utaambiwa unachopaswa kufanya . "

text: And the men which journeyed with him stood speechless , hearing a voice , but seeing no man .
text2: Wale watu waliokuwa wanasafiri pamoja na Saulo walisimama pale , wakiwa hawana la kusema ; walisikia ile sauti lakini hawakumwona mtu .

text: And Saul arose from the earth ; and when his eyes were opened , he saw no man : but they led him by the hand , and brought him into Damascus .
text2: Saulo aliinuka , na alipofumbua macho yake hakuweza kuona chochote ; hivyo wale watu wakamwongoza kwa kumshika mkono mpaka mjini Damasko .

text: And he was three days without sight , and neither did eat nor drink .
text2: Saulo alikaa siku tatu bila kuona , na wakati huo hakula au kunywa chochote .

text: And there was a certain disciple at Damascus , named Ananias ; and to him said the Lord in a vision , Ananias . And he said , Behold , I am here , Lord .
text2: Basi , huko Damasko kulikuwa na mfuasi mmoja aitwaye Anania . Bwana akamwambia katika maono , " Anania ! " Anania akaitika , " Niko hapa , Bwana . "

text: And the Lord said unto him , Arise , and go into the street which is called Straight , and inquire in the house of Judas for one called Saul , of Tarsus : for , behold , he prayeth ,
text2: Naye Bwana akamwambia , " Jitayarishe uende kwenye barabara inayoitwa Barabara ya Moja kwa Moja , na katika nyumba ya Yuda umtake mtu mmoja kutoka Tarso aitwaye Saulo . Sasa anasali ;

text: And hath seen in a vision a man named Ananias coming in , and putting his hand on him , that he might receive his sight .
text2: na katika maono ameona mtu aitwaye Anania akiingia ndani na kumwekea mikono ili apate kuona tena . "

text: Then Ananias answered , Lord , I have heard by many of this man , how much evil he hath done to thy saints at Jerusalem :
text2: Lakini Anania akajibu , " Bwana , nimesikia habari za mtu huyu kutoka kwa watu wengi ; nimesikia juu ya mabaya aliyowatendea watu wako huko Yerusalemu .

text: And here he hath authority from the chief priests to bind all that call on thy name .
text2: Na amekuja hapa akiwa na mamlaka kutoka kwa makuhani wakuu kuwatia nguvuni wote wanaoomba kwa jina lako . "

text: But the Lord said unto him , Go thy way : for he is a chosen vessel unto me , to bear my name before the Gentiles , and kings , and the children of Israel :
text2: Lakini Bwana akamwambia , " Nenda tu , kwa maana nimemchagua awe chombo changu , alitangaze jina langu kwa mataifa na wafalme wao na kwa watu wa Israeli .

text: For I will shew him how great things he must suffer for my name ' s sake .
text2: Mimi mwenyewe nitamwonyesha mengi yatakayomlazimu kuteswa kwa ajili ya jina langu . "

text: And Ananias went his way , and entered into the house ; and putting his hands on him said , Brother Saul , the Lord , even Jesus , that appeared unto thee in the way as thou camest , hath sent me , that thou mightest receive thy sight , and be filled with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Basi , Anania akaenda , akaingia katika hiyo nyumba . Kisha akaweka mikono yake juu ya Saulo , akasema , " Ndugu Saulo , Bwana ambaye ndiye Yesu mwenyewe aliyekutokea ulipokuwa njiani kuja hapa , amenituma ili upate kuona tena na kujazwa Roho Mtakatifu . "

text: And immediately there fell from his eyes as it had been scales : and he received sight forthwith , and arose , and was baptized .
text2: Mara vitu kama magamba vikaanguka kutoka macho ya Saulo , akaweza kuona tena . Akasimama , akabatizwa .

text: And when he had received meat , he was strengthened . Then was Saul certain days with the disciples which were at Damascus .
text2: Na baada ya kula chakula , nguvu zake zikamrudia . Saulo alikaa siku chache pamoja na wafuasi huko Damasko .

text: And straightway he preached Christ in the synagogues , that he is the Son of God .
text2: Mara alianza kuhubiri katika masunagogi kwamba Yesu ni Mwana wa Mungu .

text: But all that heard him were amazed , and said ; Is not this he that destroyed them which called on this name in Jerusalem , and came hither for that intent , that he might bring them bound unto the chief priests ?
text2: Watu wote waliomsikia walishangaa , wakasema , " Je , mtu huyu si yuleyule aliyewaua wale waliokuwa wanaomba kwa jina hili kule Yerusalemu ? Tena alikuja hapa akiwa na madhumuni ya kuwatia nguvuni watu hao na kuwapeleka kwa makuhani ! "

text: But Saul increased the more in strength , and confounded the Jews which dwelt at Damascus , proving that this is very Christ .
text2: Saulo alizidi kupata nguvu , na kwa jinsi alivyothibitisha wazi kwamba Yesu ndiye Kristo , Wayahudi wa huko Damasko walivurugika kabisa .

text: And after that many days were fulfilled , the Jews took counsel to kill him :
text2: Baada ya siku nyingi kupita , Wayahudi walikusanyika na kufanya mpango wa kumwua Saulo .

text: But their laying await was known of Saul . And they watched the gates day and night to kill him .
text2: Lakini Saulo alipata habari ya mpango huo . Usiku na mchana walilinda milango ya kuingia mjini ili wapate kumwua .

text: Then the disciples took him by night , and let him down by the wall in a basket .
text2: Lakini wakati wa usiku wanafunzi wake walimchukua , wakamteremsha chini ndani ya kapu kubwa kwa kupitia nafasi iliyokuwako ukutani .

text: And when Saul was come to Jerusalem , he assayed to join himself to the disciples : but they were all afraid of him , and believed not that he was a disciple .
text2: Saulo alipofika Yerusalemu alijaribu kujiunga na wale wanafunzi . Lakini wote walimwogopa , na hawakuweza kuamini kwamba yeye amekuwa mfuasi .

text: But Barnabas took him , and brought him to the apostles , and declared unto them how he had seen the Lord in the way , and that he had spoken to him , and how he had preached boldly at Damascus in the name of Jesus .
text2: Hapo , Barnaba alikuja akamchukua Saulo , akampeleka kwa mitume na kuwaeleza jinsi Saulo alivyomwona Bwana njiani na jinsi Bwana alivyoongea naye . Aliwaambia pia jinsi Saulo alivyokuwa amehubiri bila uoga kule Damasko .

text: And he was with them coming in and going out at Jerusalem .
text2: Basi , Saulo alikaa pamoja nao , akatembelea Yerusalemu yote akihubiri neno la Bwana bila hofu .

text: And he spake boldly in the name of the Lord Jesus , and disputed against the Grecians : but they went about to slay him .
text2: Pia aliongea na kubishana na Wayahudi wasemao Kigiriki , lakini wao walijaribu kumwua .

text: Which when the brethren knew , they brought him down to Caesarea , and sent him forth to Tarsus .
text2: Wale ndugu walipogundua jambo hilo walimchukua Saulo , wakampeleka Kaisarea , wakamwacha aende zake Tarso .

text: Then had the churches rest throughout all Judaea and Galilee and Samaria , and were edified ; and walking in the fear of the Lord , and in the comfort of the Holy Ghost , were multiplied .
text2: Wakati huo kanisa likawa na amani popote katika Yudea , Galilaya , na Samaria . Lilijengwa na kukua katika kumcha Bwana , na kuongezeka likitiwa moyo na Roho Mtakatifu .

text: And it came to pass , as Peter passed throughout all quarters , he came down also to the saints which dwelt at Lydda .
text2: Petro alipokuwa anasafirisafiri kila mahali alifika pia kwa watu wa Mungu waliokuwa wanaishi Luda .

text: And there he found a certain man named Aeneas , which had kept his bed eight years , and was sick of the palsy .
text2: Huko alimkuta mtu mmoja aitwaye Enea ambaye kwa muda wa miaka minane alikuwa amelala kitandani kwa sababu alikuwa amepooza .

text: And Peter said unto him , Aeneas , Jesus Christ maketh thee whole : arise , and make thy bed . And he arose immediately .
text2: Basi , Petro akamwambia , " Enea , Yesu Kristo anakuponya . Amka utandike kitanda chako . " Enea akaamka mara .

text: And all that dwelt at Lydda and Saron saw him , and turned to the Lord .
text2: Wakazi wote wa Luda na Saroni walimwona Enea , na wote wakamgeukia Bwana .

text: Now there was at Joppa a certain disciple named Tabitha , which by interpretation is called Dorcas : this woman was full of good works and almsdeeds which she did .
text2: Kulikuwa na mfuasi mmoja mwanamke mjini Yopa aitwaye Tabitha ( kwa Kigiriki ni Dorka , maana yake , Paa ) . Huyo mwanamke alikuwa akitenda mema na kuwasaidia maskini daima .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that she was sick , and died : whom when they had washed , they laid her in an upper chamber .
text2: Wakati huo ikawa kwamba aliugua , akafa . Watu wakauosha mwili wake , wakauzika katika chumba ghorofani .

text: And forasmuch as Lydda was nigh to Joppa , and the disciples had heard that Peter was there , they sent unto him two men , desiring him that he would not delay to come to them .
text2: Yopa si mbali sana na Luda ; kwa hiyo wafuasi waliposikia kwamba Petro alikuwa Luda , wakawatuma watu wawili kwake na ujumbe : " Njoo kwetu haraka iwezekanavyo . "

text: Then Peter arose and went with them . When he was come , they brought him into the upper chamber : and all the widows stood by him weeping , and shewing the coats and garments which Dorcas made , while she was with them .
text2: Basi , Petro akaenda pamoja nao . Alipofika alipelekwa ghorofani katika kile chumba . Huko wajane wengi walimzunguka Petro wakilia na kumwonyesha makoti na nguo ambazo Dorka alikuwa akitengeneza wakati alipokuwa hai .

text: But Peter put them all forth , and kneeled down , and prayed ; and turning him to the body said , Tabitha , arise . And she opened her eyes : and when she saw Peter , she sat up .
text2: Petro aliwatoa nje wote , akapiga magoti , akasali . Kisha akamgeukia yule maiti , akasema , " Tabitha , amka " Naye akafumbua macho yake na alipomwona Petro , akaketi .

text: And he gave her his hand , and lifted her up , and when he had called the saints and widows , presented her alive .
text2: Petro akamsaidia kusimama , halafu akawaita wale watu wa Mungu na wale wajane , akamkabidhi kwao akiwa mzima .

text: And it was known throughout all Joppa ; and many believed in the Lord .
text2: Habari ya tukio hili ilienea kila mahali huko Yopa , na watu wengi wakamwamini Bwana .

text: And it came to pass , that he tarried many days in Joppa with one Simon a tanner .
text2: Petro alikaa siku kadhaa huko Yopa , akiishi kwa mtu mmoja mtengenezaji wa ngozi aitwaye Simoni .

text: There was a certain man in Caesarea called Cornelius , a centurion of the band called the Italian band ,
text2: Kulikuwa na mtu mmoja huko Kaisarea aitwaye Kornelio , Jemadari wa kikosi kimoja kiitwacho " Kikosi cha Italia . "

text: A devout man , and one that feared God with all his house , which gave much alms to the people , and prayed to God alway .
text2: Alikuwa mtu mwema ; naye pamoja na jamaa yake yote walimcha Mungu ; alikuwa anafanya mengi kusaidia maskini wa Kiyahudi na alikuwa anasali daima .

text: He saw in a vision evidently about the ninth hour of the day an angel of God coming in to him , and saying unto him , Cornelius .
text2: Yapata saa tisa mchana , aliona dhahiri katika maono malaika wa Mungu akiingia ndani na kumwambia , " Kornelio ! "

text: And when he looked on him , he was afraid , and said , What is it , Lord ? And he said unto him , Thy prayers and thine alms are come up for a memorial before God .
text2: Kornelio alimkodolea macho huyo malaika kwa hofu , akamwambia , " Kuna nini Mheshimiwa ? " Huyo malaika akamwambia , " Mungu amezipokea sala na sadaka zako kwa maskini .

text: And now send men to Joppa , and call for one Simon , whose surname is Peter :
text2: Sasa , watume watu Yopa wakamwite mtu mmoja aitwaye Simoni , kwa jina lingine Petro .

text: He lodgeth with one Simon a tanner , whose house is by the sea side : he shall tell thee what thou oughtest to do .
text2: Yeye yumo nyumbani kwa Simoni mtengenezaji wa ngozi ambaye nyumba yake iko karibu na bahari . "

text: And when the angel which spake unto Cornelius was departed , he called two of his household servants , and a devout soldier of them that waited on him continually ;
text2: Huyo malaika aliyesema hayo alipokwisha kwenda zake , Kornelio aliwaita watumishi wawili wa nyumbani na mmoja wa askari zake ambaye alikuwa mcha Mungu ,

text: And when he had declared all these things unto them , he sent them to Joppa .
text2: akawaeleza yote yaliyotukia , akawatuma Yopa .

text: On the morrow , as they went on their journey , and drew nigh unto the city , Peter went up upon the housetop to pray about the sixth hour :
text2: Kesho yake , hao watu watatu wakiwa bado safarini , lakini karibu kufika Yopa , Petro alipanda juu ya paa la nyumba yapata saa sita mchana ili kusali .

text: And he became very hungry , and would have eaten : but while they made ready , he fell into a trance ,
text2: Aliona njaa , akatamani kupata chakula . Chakula kilipokuwa kinatayarishwa , alipatwa na usingizi mzito akaona maono .

text: And saw heaven opened , and a certain vessel descending unto him , as it had been a great sheet knit at the four corners , and let down to the earth :
text2: Aliona mbingu zimefunguliwa na kitu kama shuka kubwa inateremshwa chini ikiwa imeshikwa pembe zake nne .

text: Wherein were all manner of fourfooted beasts of the earth , and wild beasts , and creeping things , and fowls of the air .
text2: Ndani ya shuka hiyo kulikuwa na kila aina ya wanyama : wanyama wenye miguu minne , wanyama watambaao na ndege wa angani .

text: And there came a voice to him , Rise , Peter ; kill , and eat .
text2: Akasikia sauti ikimwambia : " Petro , amka uchinje , ule ! "

text: But Peter said , Not so , Lord ; for I have never eaten any thing that is common or unclean .
text2: Petro akajibu , " La , Bwana ; mimi sijaonja kamwe chochote ambacho ni najisi au kichafu . "

text: And the voice spake unto him again the second time , What God hath cleansed , that call not thou common .
text2: Ile sauti ikasikika tena ikimwambia : " Usiviite najisi vitu ambavyo Mungu amevitakasa ! "

text: This was done thrice : and the vessel was received up again into heaven .
text2: Jambo hili lilifanyika mara tatu , kisha ile shuka ikarudishwa juu mbinguni .

text: Now while Peter doubted in himself what this vision which he had seen should mean , behold , the men which were sent from Cornelius had made inquiry for Simon ' s house , and stood before the gate ,
text2: Petro alipokuwa bado anashangaa juu ya maana ya hilo maono alilokuwa ameliona , wale watu waliotumwa na Kornelio , baada ya kuigundua nyumba ya Simoni , walifika mlangoni ,

text: And called , and asked whether Simon , which was surnamed Peter , were lodged there .
text2: Wakaita kwa sauti : " Je , kuna mgeni humu aitwaye Simoni Petro ? "

text: While Peter thought on the vision , the Spirit said unto him , Behold , three men seek thee .
text2: Petro alikuwa bado anajaribu kuelewa lile maono , na hapo Roho akamwambia , " Sikiliza ! kuna watu watatu hapa , wanakutafuta .

text: Arise therefore , and get thee down , and go with them , doubting nothing : for I have sent them .
text2: Shuka upesi na wala usisite kwenda pamoja nao kwa maana ni mimi niliyewatuma . "

text: Then Peter went down to the men which were sent unto him from Cornelius ; and said , Behold , I am he whom ye seek : what is the cause wherefore ye are come ?
text2: Basi , Petro akateremka chini , akawaambia hao watu , " Mimi ndiye mnayemtafuta . Kwa nini mmekuja ? "

text: And they said , Cornelius the centurion , a just man , and one that feareth God , and of good report among all the nation of the Jews , was warned from God by an holy angel to send for thee into his house , and to hear words of thee .
text2: Wao wakamjibu , " Jemadari Kornelio ambaye ni mtu mwema , mcha Mungu na mwenye kuheshimika mbele ya Wayahudi wote ametutuma . Aliambiwa na malaika mtakatifu akualike nyumbani kwake ili asikilize chochote ulicho nacho cha kusema . "

text: Then called he them in , and lodged them . And on the morrow Peter went away with them , and certain brethren from Joppa accompanied him .
text2: Petro akawaalika ndani , akawapa mahali pa kulala usiku ule . Kesho yake , Petro alianza safari pamoja nao , na baadhi ya ndugu wa huko Yopa walifuatana naye .

text: And the morrow after they entered into Caesarea . And Cornelius waited for them , and had called together his kinsmen and near friends .
text2: Siku ya pili yake , walifika Kaisarea na huko Kornelio alikuwa anawangojea pamoja na jamaa na marafiki aliokuwa amewaalika .

text: And as Peter was coming in , Cornelius met him , and fell down at his feet , and worshipped him .
text2: Petro alipokuwa anaingia , Kornelio alitoka nje kumlaki , akapiga magoti mbele yake na kuinama chini kabisa .

text: But Peter took him up , saying , Stand up ; I myself also am a man .
text2: Lakini Petro alimwinua , akamwambia , " Simama , kwa maana mimi ni binadamu tu . "

text: And as he talked with him , he went in , and found many that were come together .
text2: Petro aliendelea kuongea na Kornelio wakiwa wanaingia nyumbani ambamo aliwakuta watu wengi wamekusanyika .

text: And he said unto them , Ye know how that it is an unlawful thing for a man that is a Jew to keep company , or come unto one of another nation ; but God hath shewed me that I should not call any man common or unclean .
text2: Petro akawaambia , " Ninyi wenyewe mnajua kwamba Myahudi yeyote amekatazwa na Sheria yake ya dini kushirikiana na watu wa mataifa mengine . Lakini Mungu amenijulisha nisimfikirie mtu yeyote kuwa najisi au mchafu .

text: Therefore came I unto you without gainsaying , as soon as I was sent for : I ask therefore for what intent ye have sent for me ?
text2: Kwa sababu hiyo , mliponiita nimekuja bila kusita . Basi , nawaulizeni : kwa nini mmeniita ? "

text: And Cornelius said , Four days ago I was fasting until this hour ; and at the ninth hour I prayed in my house , and , behold , a man stood before me in bright clothing ,
text2: Kornelio akasema , " Siku tatu zilizopita saa kama hii , saa tisa alasiri , nilikuwa nikisali chumbani mwangu . Ghafla , mtu aliyekuwa amevaa mavazi yenye kun ' gaa alisimama mbele yangu ,

text: And said , Cornelius , thy prayer is heard , and thine alms are had in remembrance in the sight of God .
text2: akasema : Kornelio ! Sala yako na sadaka zako kwa maskini vimekubaliwa na Mungu .

text: Send therefore to Joppa , and call hither Simon , whose surname is Peter ; he is lodged in the house of one Simon a tanner by the sea side : who , when he cometh , shall speak unto thee .
text2: Mtume mtu Yopa akamwite mtu mmoja aitwaye Simoni , kwa jina lingine Petroi ; yuko nyumbani kwa Simoni mtengenezaji wa ngozi karibu na bahari .

text: Immediately therefore I sent to thee ; and thou hast well done that thou art come . Now therefore are we all here present before God , to hear all things that are commanded thee of God .
text2: Kwa hiyo nilikutumia ujumbe bila kuchelewa , nawe umefanya vyema kuja . Sasa , sisi tuko mbele ya Mungu , kusikiliza chochote ambacho bwana amekuamuru kusema . "

text: Then Peter opened his mouth , and said , Of a truth I perceive that God is no respecter of persons :
text2: Hapo Petro akaanza kusema : " Sasa nimetambua kwamba hakika Mungu hana ubaguzi .

text: But in every nation he that feareth him , and worketh righteousness , is accepted with him .
text2: Mtu wa taifa lolote anayemcha Mungu na kutenda haki anapokelewa naye .

text: The word which God sent unto the children of Israel , preaching peace by Jesus Christ : ( he is Lord of all : )
text2: Huu ndio ule ujumbe Mungu alioupeleka kwa watu wa Israeli , akitangaza Habari Njema iletayo amani kwa njia ya Yesu Kristo ambaye ni Bwana wa wote .

text: That word , I say , ye know , which was published throughout all Judaea , and began from Galilee , after the baptism which John preached ;
text2: Ninyi mnajua jambo lililotukia katika nchi yote ya Wayahudi kuanzia Galilaya baada ya ule ubatizo aliohubiri Yohane .

text: How God anointed Jesus of Nazareth with the Holy Ghost and with power : who went about doing good , and healing all that were oppressed of the devil ; for God was with him .
text2: Mnajua Yesu wa Nazareti na jinsi Mungu alivyomteua kwa kummiminia Roho Mtakatifu na nguvu . Mungu alikuwa pamoja naye ; yeye alikwenda huko na huko akitenda mema na kuwaponya wote waliokuwa wamevamiwa na Ibilisi .

text: And we are witnesses of all things which he did both in the land of the Jews , and in Jerusalem ; whom they slew and hanged on a tree :
text2: Sisi ni mashahidi wa mambo yote aliyotenda katika nchi ya Wayahudi na katika Yerusalemu . Walimuua kwa kumtundika msalabani ;

text: Him God raised up the third day , and shewed him openly ;
text2: lakini Mungu alimfufua siku ya tatu , akamfanya aonekane

text: Not to all the people , but unto witnesses chosen before of God , even to us , who did eat and drink with him after he rose from the dead .
text2: si kwa watu wote ila kwa wale Mungu aliokwisha wachagua wawe mashahidi wake , yaani sisi tuliokula na kunywa pamoja naye baada ya kufufuka kwake kutoka wafu .

text: And he commanded us to preach unto the people , and to testify that it is he which was ordained of God to be the Judge of quick and dead .
text2: Alituamuru kuihubiri Habari Njema kwa watu wote na kushuhudia kwamba yeye ndiye aliyeteuliwa na Mungu awe Mwamuzi wa wazima na wafu .

text: To him give all the prophets witness , that through his name whosoever believeth in him shall receive remission of sins .
text2: Manabii wote waliongea juu yake kwamba kila mtu atakayemwamini atasamehewa dhambi zake zote kwa jina lake . "

text: While Peter yet spake these words , the Holy Ghost fell on all them which heard the word .
text2: Wakati Petro alipokuwa bado anasema maneno hayo , Roho Mtakatifu aliwashukia wote waliokuwa wanasikiliza ujumbe huo .

text: And they of the circumcision which believed were astonished , as many as came with Peter , because that on the Gentiles also was poured out the gift of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Wale Wayahudi waumini waliokuja pamoja na Petro kutoka Yopa walishangaa kuona kuwa Mungu aliwamiminia zawadi ya Roho Mtakatifu watu wa mataifa mengine pia ;

text: For they heard them speak with tongues , and magnify God . Then answered Peter ,
text2: maana waliwasikia wakiongea kwa lugha mbalimbali wakimtukuza Mungu . Hapo Petro akasema ,

text: Can any man forbid water , that these should not be baptized , which have received the Holy Ghost as well as we ?
text2: " Watu hawa wamempokea Roho Mtakatifu kama sisi wenyewe tulivyompokea . Je , kuna yeyote atakayeweza kuwazuia wasibatizwe kwa maji ? "

text: And he commanded them to be baptized in the name of the Lord . Then prayed they him to tarry certain days .
text2: Basi , akaamuru wabatizwe kwa jina la Yesu Kristo . Kisha wakamwomba akae nao kwa siku chache .

text: And the apostles and brethren that were in Judaea heard that the Gentiles had also received the word of God .
text2: Mitume na ndugu kule Yudea walisikia kwamba watu wa mataifa mengine pia walikuwa wamelipokea neno la Mungu .

text: And when Peter was come up to Jerusalem , they that were of the circumcision contended with him ,
text2: Basi , Petro aliporudi Yerusalemu , wale Wayahudi waumini waliopendelea watu wa mataifa mengine watahiriwe , walimlaumu wakisema :

text: Saying , Thou wentest in to men uncircumcised , and didst eat with them .
text2: " Wewe umekwenda kukaa na watu wasiotahiriwa na hata umekula pamoja nao !

text: But Peter rehearsed the matter from the beginning , and expounded it by order unto them , saying ,
text2: Hapo Petro akawaeleza kinaganaga juu ya yale yaliyotendeka tangu mwanzo :

text: I was in the city of Joppa praying : and in a trance I saw a vision , A certain vessel descend , as it had been a great sheet , let down from heaven by four corners ; and it came even to me :
text2: " Siku moja nikiwa nasali mjini Yopa , niliona maono ; niliona kitu kama shuka kubwa likishushwa chini kutoka mbinguni likiwa limeshikwa pembe zake nne , likawekwa kando yangu .

text: Upon the which when I had fastened mine eyes , I considered , and saw fourfooted beasts of the earth , and wild beasts , and creeping things , and fowls of the air .
text2: Nilichungulia ndani kwa makini nikaona wanyama wenye miguu minne , wanyama wa mwituni , wanyama watambaao na ndege wa angani .

text: And I heard a voice saying unto me , Arise , Peter ; slay and eat .
text2: Kisha nikasikia sauti ikiniambia : Petro amka , chinja , ule .

text: But I said , Not so , Lord : for nothing common or unclean hath at any time entered into my mouth .
text2: Lakini mimi nikasema : La , Bwana ; maana chochote kilicho najisi au kichafu hakijapata kamwe kuingia kinywani mwangu .

text: But the voice answered me again from heaven , What God hath cleansed , that call not thou common .
text2: Ile sauti ikasikika tena kutoka mbinguni : Usiviite najisi vitu ambavyo Mungu amevitakasa .

text: And this was done three times : and all were drawn up again into heaven .
text2: Jambo hilo lilifanyika mara tatu , na mwishowe vyote vilirudishwa juu mbinguni .

text: And , behold , immediately there were three men already come unto the house where I was , sent from Caesarea unto me .
text2: Ghafla , watu watatu waliokuwa wametumwa kwangu kutoka Kaisarea waliwasili kwenye nyumba niliyokuwa nakaa .

text: And the spirit bade me go with them , nothing doubting . Moreover these six brethren accompanied me , and we entered into the man ' s house :
text2: Roho aliniambia niende pamoja nao bila kusita . Hawa ndugu sita waliandamana nami pia kwenda Kaisarea na huko tuliingia nyumbani mwa Kornelio .

text: And he shewed us how he had seen an angel in his house , which stood and said unto him , Send men to Joppa , and call for Simon , whose surname is Peter ;
text2: Yeye alitueleza jinsi alivyokuwa amemwona malaika amesimama nyumbani mwake na kumwambia : Mtume mtu Yopa akamwite mtu mmoja aitwaye Simoni , kwa jina lingine Petro .

text: Who shall tell thee words , whereby thou and all thy house shall be saved .
text2: Yeye atakuambia maneno ambayo kwayo wewe na jamaa yako yote mtaokolewa .

text: And as I began to speak , the Holy Ghost fell on them , as on us at the beginning .
text2: Na nilipoanza tu kuongea , Roho Mtakatifu aliwashukia kama alivyotushukia sisi pale awali .

text: Then remembered I the word of the Lord , how that he said , John indeed baptized with water ; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Hapo nilikumbuka yale maneno Bwana aliyosema : Yohane alibatiza kwa maji , lakini ninyi mtabatizwa kwa Roho Mtakatifu .
