text: Forasmuch then as God gave them the like gift as he did unto us , who believed on the Lord Jesus Christ ; what was I , that I could withstand God ?
text2: Basi , kama Mungu amewapa pia watu wa mataifa mengine zawadi ileile aliyotupa sisi tulipomwamini Bwana Yesu Kristo , je , mimi ni nani hata nijaribu kumpinga Mungu ? "

text: When they heard these things , they held their peace , and glorified God , saying , Then hath God also to the Gentiles granted repentance unto life .
text2: Waliposikia hayo , waliacha ubishi , wakamtukuza Mungu wakisema , " Mungu amewapa watu wa mataifa mengine nafasi ya kutubu na kuwa na uzima ! "

text: Now they which were scattered abroad upon the persecution that arose about Stephen travelled as far as Phenice , and Cyprus , and Antioch , preaching the word to none but unto the Jews only .
text2: Kutokana na mateso yaliyotokea wakati Stefano alipouawa , waumini walitawanyika . Wengine walikwenda mpaka Foinike , Kupro na Antiokia wakihubiri ule ujumbe kwa Wayahudi tu .

text: And some of them were men of Cyprus and Cyrene , which , when they were come to Antioch , spake unto the Grecians , preaching the Lord Jesus .
text2: Lakini baadhi ya waumini waliotoka Kupro na Kurene , walikwenda Antiokia wakautangaza huo ujumbe kwa watu wa mataifa mengine wakiwahubiria ile Habari Njema juu ya Bwana Yesu .

text: And the hand of the Lord was with them : and a great number believed , and turned unto the Lord .
text2: Bwana aliwasaidia na idadi kubwa ya watu iliamini na kumgeukia Bwana .

text: Then tidings of these things came unto the ears of the church which was in Jerusalem : and they sent forth Barnabas , that he should go as far as Antioch .
text2: Habari ya jambo hilo ikasikika kwa lile kanisa la Yerusalemu . Hivyo wakamtuma Barnaba aende Antiokia .

text: Who , when he came , and had seen the grace of God , was glad , and exhorted them all , that with purpose of heart they would cleave unto the Lord .
text2: Alipofika huko na kuona jinsi Mungu alivyowaneemesha wale watu , alifurahi na kuwahimiza wote wadumu katika uaminifu wao kwa Bwana .

text: For he was a good man , and full of the Holy Ghost and of faith : and much people was added unto the Lord .
text2: Barnaba alikuwa mtu mwema na mwenye kujaa Roho Mtakatifu na imani . Kundi kubwa la watu lilivutwa kwa Bwana .

text: Then departed Barnabas to Tarsus , for to seek Saul :
text2: Kisha , Barnaba alikwenda Tarso kumtafuta Saulo

text: And when he had found him , he brought him unto Antioch . And it came to pass , that a whole year they assembled themselves with the church , and taught much people . And the disciples were called Christians first in Antioch .
text2: Alipompata , alimleta Antiokia . Nao wote wawili walikaa na lile kanisa kwa mwaka wote mzima wakifundisha kundi kubwa la watu . Huko Antiokia , ndiko , kwa mara ya kwanza , wafuasi waliitwa Wakristo .

text: And in these days came prophets from Jerusalem unto Antioch .
text2: Wakati huohuo , manabii kadhaa walikuja Antiokia kutoka Yerusalemu .

text: And there stood up one of them named Agabus , and signified by the spirit that there should be great dearth throughout all the world : which came to pass in the days of Claudius Caesar .
text2: Basi , mmoja wao aitwaye Agabo alisimama , na kwa uwezo wa Roho akabashiri kwamba kutakuwa na njaa kubwa katika nchi yote ( Njaa hiyo ilitokea wakati Klaudio alipokuwa akitawala ) .

text: Then the disciples , every man according to his ability , determined to send relief unto the brethren which dwelt in Judaea :
text2: Wale wanafunzi waliamua kila mmoja kwa kadiri ya uwezo wake apeleke chochote ili kuwasaidia wale ndugu waliokuwa wanaishi Yudea .

text: Which also they did , and sent it to the elders by the hands of Barnabas and Saul .
text2: Basi , wakafanya hivyo na kupeleka mchango wao kwa wazee wa kanisa kwa mikono ya Barnaba na Saulo .

text: Now about that time Herod the king stretched forth his hands to vex certain of the church .
text2: Karibu wakati huohuo , mfalme Herode alianza kuwatesa baadhi ya Wakristo .

text: And he killed James the brother of John with the sword .
text2: Alimwua kwa upanga Yakobo ndugu yake Yohane .

text: And because he saw it pleased the Jews , he proceeded further to take Peter also . ( Then were the days of unleavened bread . )
text2: Alipoona kuwa kitendo hiki kiliwapendeza Wayahudi , aliendelea , akamkamata Petro . ( Hiyo ilifanyika wakati wa sikukuu ya Mikate Isiyotiwa chachu . )

text: And when he had apprehended him , he put him in prison , and delivered him to four quaternions of soldiers to keep him ; intending after Easter to bring him forth to the people .
text2: Baada ya kutiwa nguvuni , Petro alifungwa gerezani , akawekwa chini ya ulinzi wa vikundi vinne vya askari wannewanne . Herode alikusudia kumtoa hadharani baada ya sikukuu ya Pasaka .

text: Peter therefore was kept in prison : but prayer was made without ceasing of the church unto God for him .
text2: Basi , Petro alipokuwa gerezani , kanisa lilikuwa linamwombea kwa Mungu kwa moyo .

text: And when Herod would have brought him forth , the same night Peter was sleeping between two soldiers , bound with two chains : and the keepers before the door kept the prison .
text2: Usiku , kabla ya siku ile ambayo Herode angemtoa Petro hadharani , Petro alikuwa amelala kati ya askari wawili . Alikuwa amefungwa minyororo miwili , na walinzi walikuwa wanalinda lango la gereza .

text: And , behold , the angel of the Lord came upon him , and a light shined in the prison : and he smote Peter on the side , and raised him up , saying , Arise up quickly . And his chains fell off from his hands .
text2: Ghafla , malaika wa Bwana akasimama karibu naye na mwanga ukaangaza kile chumba cha gereza . Malaika akamgusa akisema , " Amka upesi ! " Mara ile minyororo ikaanguka kutoka katika mikono yake .

text: And the angel said unto him , Gird thyself , and bind on thy sandals . And so he did . And he saith unto him , Cast thy garment about thee , and follow me .
text2: Malaika akamwambia , " Jifunge mshipi wako , vaa viatu vyako . " Akafanya hivyo . Kisha huyo malaika akamwambia , " Vaa koti lako , unifuate . "

text: And he went out , and followed him ; and wist not that it was true which was done by the angel ; but thought he saw a vision .
text2: Petro akamfuata nje lakini hakujua kama hayo yaliyofanywa na huyo malaika yalikuwa ya kweli ; alidhani alikuwa anaota ndoto .

text: When they were past the first and the second ward , they came unto the iron gate that leadeth unto the city ; which opened to them of his own accord : and they went out , and passed on through one street ; and forthwith the angel departed from him .
text2: Walipita kituo cha kwanza cha ulinzi na cha pili , halafu wakafika kwenye mlango wa chuma wa kuingilia mjini . Huo mlango ukawafungukia wenyewe , nao wakatoka nje . Wakawa wanatembea katika barabara moja na mara yule malaika akamwacha Petro peke yake .

text: And when Peter was come to himself , he said , Now I know of a surety , that the Lord hath sent his angel , and hath delivered me out of the hand of Herod , and from all the expectation of the people of the Jews .
text2: Hapo ndipo Petro alipotambua yaliyotukia , akasema , " Sasa najua kwa hakika kwamba Bwana amemtuma malaika wake akaniokoa kutoka katika mkono wa Herode na kutoka katika mambo yale yote watu wa Israeli waliyotazamia . "

text: And when he had considered the thing , he came to the house of Mary the mother of John , whose surname was Mark ; where many were gathered together praying .
text2: Alipotambua hivyo alikwenda moja kwa moja mpaka nyumbani kwa Maria mama yake Yohane aitwaye Marko . Humo watu wengi walikuwa wamekusanyika wakisali .

text: And as Peter knocked at the door of the gate , a damsel came to hearken , named Rhoda .
text2: Petro alibisha mlango wa nje na mtumishi mmoja msichana aitwaye Roda , akaenda mlangoni kuitikia .

text: And when she knew Peter ' s voice , she opened not the gate for gladness , but ran in , and told how Peter stood before the gate .
text2: Huyo msichana aliitambua sauti ya Petro akafurahi mno , hata badala ya kuufungua ule mlango , akakimbilia ndani na kuwaambia kwamba Petro alikuwa amesimama nje mlangoni .

text: And they said unto her , Thou art mad . But she constantly affirmed that it was even so . Then said they , It is his angel .
text2: Wakamwambia yule msichana , " Una wazimu ! " Lakini yeye akasisitiza kwamba ilikuwa kweli . Nao wakamwambia , " Huyo ni malaika wake . "

text: But Peter continued knocking : and when they had opened the door , and saw him , they were astonished .
text2: Wakati huo Petro alikuwa anaendelea kupiga hodi . Mwishowe walifungua mlango , wakamwona , wakashangaa .

text: But he , beckoning unto them with the hand to hold their peace , declared unto them how the Lord had brought him out of the prison . And he said , Go shew these things unto James , and to the brethren . And he departed , and went into another place .
text2: Petro aliwaashiria kwa mkono wakae kimya , akawaeleza jinsi Bwana alivyomtoa gerezani . Kisha akawaambia watoe taarifa ya jambo hilo kwa Yakobo na wale ndugu wengine , halafu akatoka akaenda mahali pengine .

text: Now as soon as it was day , there was no small stir among the soldiers , what was become of Peter .
text2: Kulipokucha , ulitokea wasiwasi mkubwa kati ya wale askari kuhusu yaliyokuwa yamempata Petro .

text: And when Herod had sought for him , and found him not , he examined the keepers , and commanded that they should be put to death . And he went down from Judaea to Caesarea , and there abode .
text2: Herode aliamuru ufanywe msako lakini hawakuweza kumpata . Hivyo aliamuru wale askari wahojiwe , akatoa amri wauawe . Halafu akatoka huko Yudea akaenda Kaisarea ambako alikaa .

text: And Herod was highly displeased with them of Tyre and Sidon : but they came with one accord to him , and , having made Blastus the king ' s chamberlain their friend , desired peace ; because their country was nourished by the king ' s country .
text2: Herode alikasirishwa sana na watu wa Tiro na Sidoni . Lakini wao walimpelekea wajumbe . Nao wakafaulu kwanza kumpata Blasto awe upande wao . Blasto alikuwa msimamizi mkuu wa ikulu ya mfalme . Kisha , wakamwendea Herode wakamwomba kuwe na amani , kwa maana nchi yao ilitegemea nchi ya mfalme kwa chakula .

text: And upon a set day Herod , arrayed in royal apparel , sat upon his throne , and made an oration unto them .
text2: Siku moja iliyochaguliwa , Herode akiwa amevaa mavazi rasmi na kuketi katika kiti cha kifalme aliwahutubia watu .

text: And the people gave a shout , saying , It is the voice of a god , and not of a man .
text2: Wale watu walimpigia kelele za shangwe wakisema , " Hii ni sauti ya mungu , si ya mtu . "

text: And immediately the angel of the Lord smote him , because he gave not God the glory : and he was eaten of worms , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Papo hapo malaika wa Bwana akamwangusha Herode chini kwa sababu hakumpa Mungu hizo sifa . Akaliwa na wadudu , akafa .

text: But the word of God grew and multiplied .
text2: Neno la Mungu likazidi kuenea na kukua .

text: And Barnabas and Saul returned from Jerusalem , when they had fulfilled their ministry , and took with them John , whose surname was Mark .
text2: Baada ya Barnaba na Saulo kutekeleza shughuli zao , walitoka tena Yerusalemu wakamchukua Yohane aitwaye pia Marko .

text: Now there were in the church that was at Antioch certain prophets and teachers ; as Barnabas , and Simeon that was called Niger , and Lucius of Cyrene , and Manaen , which had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch , and Saul .
text2: Katika kanisa la Antiokia kulikuwa na watu wengine waliokuwa manabii na walimu ; miongoni mwao akiwa Barnaba , Simoni aitwaye pia Mweusi , Lukio wa Kurene , Manaeni ambaye alikuwa amelelewa pamoja na mfalme Herode , na Saulo .

text: As they ministered to the Lord , and fasted , the Holy Ghost said , Separate me Barnabas and Saul for the work whereunto I have called them .
text2: Walipokuwa wanafanya ibada yao kwa Bwana na kufunga , Roho Mtakatifu alisema : " Niteulieni Barnaba na Saulo kwa ajili ya kazi niliyowaitia . "

text: And when they had fasted and prayed , and laid their hands on them , they sent them away .
text2: Basi , baada ya kusali na kufunga zaidi , wakawawekea mikono , wakawaacha waende zao .

text: So they , being sent forth by the Holy Ghost , departed unto Seleucia ; and from thence they sailed to Cyprus .
text2: Basi , Barnaba na Saulo walipokwisha tumwa na Roho Mtakatifu , walishuka hadi Seleukia , na kutoka huko walipanda meli hadi kisiwa cha Kupro .

text: And when they were at Salamis , they preached the word of God in the synagogues of the Jews : and they had also John to their minister .
text2: Walipofika Salami walihubiri neno la Mungu katika masunagogi ya Kiyahudi . Yohane ( Marko ) alikuwa msaidizi wao .

text: And when they had gone through the isle unto Paphos , they found a certain sorcerer , a false prophet , a Jew , whose name was Bar - jesus :
text2: Walitembea toka upande mmoja wa kisiwa mpaka Pafo upande wa pili , na huko walimkuta mchawi mmoja Myahudi aitwaye Baryesu ambaye alijisingizia kuwa nabii .

text: Which was with the deputy of the country , Sergius Paulus , a prudent man ; who called for Barnabas and Saul , and desired to hear the word of God .
text2: Huyu alikuwa pamoja na Sergio Paulo , mkuu wa kile kisiwa , ambaye alikuwa mtu mwelewa sana . Sergio Paulo aliwaita Barnaba na Saulo ili asikie neno la Mungu .

text: But Elymas the sorcerer ( for so is his name by interpretation ) withstood them , seeking to turn away the deputy from the faith .
text2: Lakini huyo mchawi Elima ( kama alivyokuwa anaitwa kwa Kigiriki ) , alijaribu kuwapinga ili kumzuia huyo mkuu wa kisiwa asije akaigeukia imani ya Kikristo .

text: Then Saul , ( who also is called Paul , ) filled with the Holy Ghost , set his eyes on him ,
text2: Basi , Saulo ambaye aliitwa pia Paulo , akiwa amejaa Roho Mtakatifu , alimkodolea macho huyo mchawi ,

text: And said , O full of all subtilty and all mischief , thou child of the devil , thou enemy of all righteousness , wilt thou not cease to pervert the right ways of the Lord ?
text2: akasema , " Mdanganyifu wa kupindukia na mlaghai wewe ! Wewe ni mtoto wa Ibilisi ! Wewe ni adui wa chochote kile kilicho cha kweli ; hukomi hata mara moja kujaribu kuzipotosha njia za Bwana zilizonyoka .

text: And now , behold , the hand of the Lord is upon thee , and thou shalt be blind , not seeing the sun for a season . And immediately there fell on him a mist and a darkness ; and he went about seeking some to lead him by the hand .
text2: Sasa , mkono wa Bwana utakuadhibu : utakuwa kipofu na hutaweza kuuona mwanga wa jua kwa kitambo . " Mara kila kitu kikawa kama ukungu na giza kwake , akaanza kwenda huku na huku akitafuta mtu wa kumshika mkono amwongoze .

text: Then the deputy , when he saw what was done , believed , being astonished at the doctrine of the Lord .
text2: Yule mkuu wa kisiwa alipoona hayo , aliongoka akawa muumini ; akastaajabia sana mafundisho aliyosikia juu ya Bwana .

text: Now when Paul and his company loosed from Paphos , they came to Perga in Pamphylia : and John departing from them returned to Jerusalem .
text2: Kutoka Pafo , Paulo na wenzake walipanda meli wakaenda hadi Perga katika Pamfulia ; lakini Yohane ( Marko ) aliwaacha , akarudi Yerusalemu .

text: But when they departed from Perga , they came to Antioch in Pisidia , and went into the synagogue on the sabbath day , and sat down .
text2: Lakini wao waliendelea na safari toka Pisga hadi mjini Antiokia Pisidia . Siku ya Sabato waliingia ndani ya Sunagogi , wakakaa .

text: And after the reading of the law and the prophets the rulers of the synagogue sent unto them , saying , Ye men and brethren , if ye have any word of exhortation for the people , say on .
text2: Baada ya masomo katika kitabu cha Sheria ya Mose na katika maandiko ya manabii , wakuu wa lile sunagogi waliwapelekea ujumbe huu : " Ndugu , kama mnalo jambo la kuwaambia watu ili kuwapa moyo , semeni . "

text: Then Paul stood up , and beckoning with his hand said , Men of Israel , and ye that fear God , give audience .
text2: Basi , Paulo alisimama , akatoa ishara kwa mkono , akaanza kuongea : " Wananchi wa Israeli na wengine wote mnaomcha Mungu , sikilizeni !

text: The God of this people of Israel chose our fathers , and exalted the people when they dwelt as strangers in the land of Egypt , and with an high arm brought he them out of it .
text2: Mungu wa taifa hili la Israeli aliwateua babu zetu na kuwafanya wawe taifa kubwa walipokuwa ugenini kule Misri . Mungu aliwatoa huko kwa uwezo wake mkuu .

text: And about the time of forty years suffered he their manners in the wilderness .
text2: Aliwavumilia kwa muda wa miaka arobaini kule jangwani .

text: And when he had destroyed seven nations in the land of Chanaan , he divided their land to them by lot .
text2: Aliyaangamiza mataifa ya nchi ya Kanaani akawapa hao watu wake ile nchi kuwa mali yao .

text: And after that he gave unto them judges about the space of four hundred and fifty years , until Samuel the prophet .
text2: Miaka mia nne na hamsini ilipita , halafu akawapatia waamuzi wawaongoze mpaka wakati wa nabii Samweli .

text: And afterward they desired a king : and God gave unto them Saul the son of Cis , a man of the tribe of Benjamin , by the space of forty years .
text2: Hapo wakapendelea kuwa na mfalme , na Mungu akawapa Saulo , mtoto wa Kishi wa kabila la Benyamini , awe mfalme wao kwa muda wa miaka arobaini .

text: And when he had removed him , he raised up unto them David to be their king ; to whom also he gave testimony , and said , I have found David the son of Jesse , a man after mine own heart , which shall fulfil all my will .
text2: Baada ya kumwondoa Saulo , Mungu alimteua Daudi kuwa mfalme wao . Mungu alionyesha kibali chake kwake akisema : Nimemwona Daudi mtoto wa Yese ; ni mtu anayepatana na moyo wangu ; mtu ambaye atatimiza yale yote ninayotaka kuyatenda .

text: Of this man ' s seed hath God according to his promise raised unto Israel a Saviour , Jesus :
text2: Kutokana na ukoo wake mtu huyu , Mungu , kama alivyoahidi , amewapelekea watu wa Israeli Mwokozi , ndiye Yesu .

text: When John had first preached before his coming the baptism of repentance to all the people of Israel .
text2: Kabla ya kuja kwake Yesu , Yohane alimtangulia akiwahubiria watu wote wa Israeli kwamba ni lazima watubu na kubatizwa .

text: And as John fulfilled his course , he said , Whom think ye that I am ? I am not he . But , behold , there cometh one after me , whose shoes of his feet I am not worthy to loose .
text2: Yohane alipokuwa anamaliza ujumbe wake aliwaambia watu : Mnadhani mimi ni nani ? Mimi si yule mnayemtazamia . Huyo anakuja baada yangu na mimi sistahili hata kuzifungua kamba za viatu vyake .

text: Men and brethren , children of the stock of Abraham , and whosoever among you feareth God , to you is the word of this salvation sent .
text2: " Ndugu , ninyi mlio watoto wa ukoo wa Abrahamu , na wengine wote mnaomcha Mungu ! Ujumbe huu wa wokovu umeletwa kwetu .

text: For they that dwell at Jerusalem , and their rulers , because they knew him not , nor yet the voices of the prophets which are read every sabbath day , they have fulfilled them in condemning him .
text2: Kwa maana wenyeji wa Yerusalemu na wakuu wao hawakumtambua yeye kuwa Mwokozi . Wala hawakuelewa maneno ya manabii yanayosomwa kila Sabato . Hata hivyo , waliyafanya maneno ya manabii yatimie kwa kumhukumu Yesu adhabu ya kifo .

text: And though they found no cause of death in him , yet desired they Pilate that he should be slain .
text2: Ingawa hawakumpata na hatia inayostahili auawe , walimwomba Pilato amhukumu auawe .

text: And when they had fulfilled all that was written of him , they took him down from the tree , and laid him in a sepulchre .
text2: Na baada ya kutekeleza yote yaliyokuwa yameandikwa kumhusu yeye , walimshusha kutoka msalabani , wakamweka kaburini .

text: But God raised him from the dead :
text2: Lakini Mungu alimfufua kutoka wafu .

text: And he was seen many days of them which came up with him from Galilee to Jerusalem , who are his witnesses unto the people .
text2: Naye , kwa siku nyingi aliwatokea wale waliofuatana naye kutoka Galilaya mpaka Yerusalemu . Hao ndio walio sasa mashahidi wake kwa watu wa Israeli .

text: And we declare unto you glad tidings , how that the promise which was made unto the fathers ,
text2: Sisi tumekuja hapa kuwaleteeni Habari Njema : jambo lile Mungu alilowaahidia babu zetu amelitimiza sasa kwa ajili yetu sisi tulio wajukuu wao kwa kumfufua Yesu kutoka wafu .

text: God hath fulfilled the same unto us their children , in that he hath raised up Jesus again ; as it is also written in the second psalm , Thou art my Son , this day have I begotten thee .
text2: Kama ilivyoandikwa katika zaburi ya pili : Wewe ni Mwanangu , mimi leo nimekuwa baba yako .

text: And as concerning that he raised him up from the dead , now no more to return to corruption , he said on this wise , I will give you the sure mercies of David .
text2: Na juu ya kumfufua kutoka wafu , asipate tena kurudi huko na kuoza , Mungu alisema hivi : Nitakupa baraka takatifu na za kweli nilizomwahidia Daudi .

text: Wherefore he saith also in another psalm , Thou shalt not suffer thine Holy One to see corruption .
text2: Naam , na katika sehemu nyingine za zaburi asema : Hutamwacha Mtakatifu wako aoze .

text: For David , after he had served his own generation by the will of God , fell on sleep , and was laid unto his fathers , and saw corruption :
text2: Sasa , Daudi mwenyewe alitimiza mapenzi ya Mungu wakati wake ; kisha akafa na kuzikwa karibu na wazee wake , na mwili wake ukaoza .

text: But he , whom God raised again , saw no corruption .
text2: Lakini yule ambaye Mungu alimfufua kutoka wafu hakupata kuoza .

text: Be it known unto you therefore , men and brethren , that through this man is preached unto you the forgiveness of sins :
text2: Jueni wazi , ndugu zangu , kwamba ujumbe kuhusu kusamehewa dhambi unahubiriwa kwenu kwa njia ya Yesu Kristo ;

text: And by him all that believe are justified from all things , from which ye could not be justified by the law of Moses .
text2: na ya kwamba kila mmoja anayemwamini Yesu anasamehewa dhambi zote , jambo ambalo halingewezekana kwa njia ya Sheria ya Mose .

text: Beware therefore , lest that come upon you , which is spoken of in the prophets ;
text2: Jihadharini basi , msije mkapatwa na yale yaliyosemwa na manabii :

text: Behold , ye despisers , and wonder , and perish : for I work a work in your days , a work which ye shall in no wise believe , though a man declare it unto you .
text2: Sikilizeni enyi wenye madharau , shangaeni mpotee ! Kwa maana kitu ninachofanya sasa , nyakati zenu , ni kitu ambacho hamtakiamini hata kama mtu akiwaelezeni . "

text: And when the Jews were gone out of the synagogue , the Gentiles besought that these words might be preached to them the next sabbath .
text2: Paulo na Barnaba walipokuwa wanatoka katika ile sunagogi , wale watu waliwaalika waje tena siku ya Sabato iliyofuata , waongee zaidi juu ya mambo hayo .

text: Now when the congregation was broken up , many of the Jews and religious proselytes followed Paul and Barnabas : who , speaking to them , persuaded them to continue in the grace of God .
text2: Mkutano huo ulipomalizika , Wayahudi wengi na watu wa mataifa mengine waliokuwa wameongokea dini ya Kiyahudi waliwafuata Paulo na Barnaba . Hao mitume waliongea nao , wakawatia moyo waendelee kuishi wakitegemea neema ya Mungu .

text: And the next sabbath day came almost the whole city together to hear the word of God .
text2: Siku ya Sabato iliyofuata , karibu kila mtu katika ule mji alikuja kusikiliza neno la Bwana .

text: But when the Jews saw the multitudes , they were filled with envy , and spake against those things which were spoken by Paul , contradicting and blaspheming .
text2: Lakini Wayahudi walipoliona hilo kundi la watu walijaa wivu , wakapinga alichokuwa anasema Paulo na kumtukana .

text: Then Paul and Barnabas waxed bold , and said , It was necessary that the word of God should first have been spoken to you : but seeing ye put it from you , and judge yourselves unworthy of everlasting life , lo , we turn to the Gentiles .
text2: Hata hivyo , Paulo na Barnaba waliongea kwa uhodari zaidi , wakasema , " Ilikuwa ni lazima neno la Mungu liwafikieni ninyi kwanza ; lakini kwa kuwa mmelikataa na kujiona hamstahili uzima wa milele , basi , tunawaacheni na kuwaendea watu wa mataifa mengine .

text: For so hath the Lord commanded us , saying , I have set thee to be a light of the Gentiles , that thou shouldest be for salvation unto the ends of the earth .
text2: Maana Bwana alituagiza hivi : Nimekuteua wewe uwe mwanga kwa mataifa , uwe njia ya wokovu kwa ulimwengu wote . "

text: And when the Gentiles heard this , they were glad , and glorified the word of the Lord : and as many as were ordained to eternal life believed .
text2: Watu wa mataifa mengine waliposikia jambo hilo walifurahi , wakausifu ujumbe wa Mungu ; na wale waliokuwa wamechaguliwa kupata uzima wa milele , wakawa waumini .

text: And the word of the Lord was published throughout all the region .
text2: Neno la Bwana likaenea kila mahali katika sehemu ile .

text: But the Jews stirred up the devout and honourable women , and the chief men of the city , and raised persecution against Paul and Barnabas , and expelled them out of their coasts .
text2: Lakini Wayahudi waliwachochea wanawake wa tabaka ya juu wa mataifa mengine ambao walikuwa wacha Mungu , na wanaume maarufu wa mji huo . Wakaanza kuwatesa Paulo na Barnaba , wakawafukuza kutoka katika eneo lao .

text: But they shook off the dust of their feet against them , and came unto Iconium .
text2: Basi , mitume wakayakung ' uta mavumbi yaliyokuwa katika miguu yao kama onyo , kisha wakaenda Ikonio .

text: And the disciples were filled with joy , and with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Lakini hao wafuasi walikuwa wamejaa furaha na Roho Mtakatifu .

text: And it came to pass in Iconium , that they went both together into the synagogue of the Jews , and so spake , that a great multitude both of the Jews and also of the Greeks believed .
text2: Kule Ikonio , mambo yalikuwa kama yalivyokuwa kule Antiokia ; Paulo na Barnaba walikwenda katika sunagogi la Wayahudi wakaongea kwa uhodari hata Wayahudi wengi na Wagiriki wakawa waumini .

text: But the unbelieving Jews stirred up the Gentiles , and made their minds evil affected against the brethren .
text2: Lakini Wayahudi wengine waliokataa kuwa waumini walichochea na kutia chuki katika mioyo ya watu wa mataifa mengine ili wawapinge hao ndugu .

text: Long time therefore abode they speaking boldly in the Lord , which gave testimony unto the word of his grace , and granted signs and wonders to be done by their hands .
text2: Paulo na Barnaba waliendelea kukaa huko kwa muda mrefu . Waliongea kwa uhodari juu ya Bwana , naye Bwana akathibitisha ukweli wa ujumbe walioutoa juu ya neema yake , kwa kuwawezesha kutenda miujiza na maajabu .

text: But the multitude of the city was divided : and part held with the Jews , and part with the apostles .
text2: Watu wa mji huo waligawanyika : wengine waliwaunga mkono Wayahudi , na wengine walikuwa upande wa mitume .

text: And when there was an assault made both of the Gentiles , and also of the Jews with their rulers , to use them despitefully , and to stone them ,
text2: Mwishowe , baadhi ya watu wa mataifa mengine na Wayahudi , wakishirikiana na wakuu wao , waliazimu kuwatendea vibaya hao mitume na kuwapiga mawe .

text: They were ware of it , and fled unto Lystra and Derbe , cities of Lycaonia , and unto the region that lieth round about :
text2: Mitume walipogundua jambo hilo , walikimbilia Lustra na Derbe , miji ya Lukaonia , na katika sehemu za jirani ,

text: And there they preached the gospel .
text2: wakawa wanahubiri Habari Njema huko .

text: And there sat a certain man at Lystra , impotent in his feet , being a cripple from his mother ' s womb , who never had walked :
text2: Kulikuwa na mtu mmoja huko Lustra ambaye alikuwa amelemaa miguu tangu kuzaliwa , na alikuwa hajapata kutembea kamwe .

text: The same heard Paul speak : who stedfastly beholding him , and perceiving that he had faith to be healed ,
text2: Mtu huyo alikuwa anamsikiliza Paulo alipokuwa anahubiri . Paulo alimtazama kwa makini , na alipoona kuwa alikuwa na imani ya kuweza kuponywa ,

text: Said with a loud voice , Stand upright on thy feet . And he leaped and walked .
text2: akasema kwa sauti kubwa , " Simama wima kwa miguu yako ! " Huyo mtu aliyelemaa akainuka ghafla , akaanza kutembea .

text: And when the people saw what Paul had done , they lifted up their voices , saying in the speech of Lycaonia , The gods are come down to us in the likeness of men .
text2: Umati wa watu walipoona alichofanya Paulo , ulianza kupiga kelele kwa lugha ya Kilukaonia : " Miungu imetujia katika sura za binadamu ! "

text: And they called Barnabas , Jupiter ; and Paul , Mercurius , because he was the chief speaker .
text2: Barnaba akaitwa Zeu , na Paulo , kwa vile yeye ndiye aliyekuwa anaongea , akaitwa Herme .

text: Then the priest of Jupiter , which was before their city , brought oxen and garlands unto the gates , and would have done sacrifice with the people .
text2: Naye kuhani wa hekalu la Zeu lililokuwa nje ya mji akaleta fahali na shada za maua mbele ya mlango mkuu wa mji , na pamoja na ule umati wa watu akataka kuwatambikia mitume .

text: Which when the apostles , Barnabas and Paul , heard of , they rent their clothes , and ran in among the people , crying out ,
text2: Barnaba na Paulo walipopata habari hiyo waliyararua mavazi yao na kukimbilia katika lile kundi la watu wakisema kwa sauti kubwa :

text: And saying , Sirs , why do ye these things ? We also are men of like passions with you , and preach unto you that ye should turn from these vanities unto the living God , which made heaven , and earth , and the sea , and all things that are therein :
text2: " Ndugu , kwa nini mnafanya mambo hayo ? Sisi pia ni binadamu kama ninyi . Na , tuko hapa kuwahubirieni Habari Njema , mpate kuziacha hizi sanamu tupu , mkamgeukie Mungu aliye hai , Mungu aliyeumba mbingu na nchi , bahari na vyote vilivyomo .

text: Who in times past suffered all nations to walk in their own ways .
text2: Zamani Mungu aliruhusu kila taifa lifanye lilivyopenda .

text: Nevertheless he left not himself without witness , in that he did good , and gave us rain from heaven , and fruitful seasons , filling our hearts with food and gladness .
text2: Hata hivyo , Mungu hakuacha kujidhihirisha kwa mambo mema anayowatendea : huwanyeshea mvua toka angani , huwapa mavuno kwa wakati wake , huwapa chakula na kuijaza mioyo yenu furaha . "

text: And with these sayings scarce restrained they the people , that they had not done sacrifice unto them .
text2: Ingawa walisema hivyo haikuwa rahisi kuwazuia wale watu wasiwatambikie .

text: And there came thither certain Jews from Antioch and Iconium , who persuaded the people , and , having stoned Paul , drew him out of the city , supposing he had been dead .
text2: Lakini Wayahudi kadhaa walikuja kutoka Antiokia na Ikonio , wakawafanya watu wajiunge nao , wakampiga mawe Paulo na kumburuta hadi nje ya mji wakidhani amekwisha kufa .

text: Howbeit , as the disciples stood round about him , he rose up , and came into the city : and the next day he departed with Barnabas to Derbe .
text2: Lakini waumini walipokusanyika na kumzunguka , aliamka akarudi mjini . Kesho yake , yeye pamoja na Barnaba walikwenda Derbe .

text: And when they had preached the gospel to that city , and had taught many , they returned again to Lystra , and to Iconium , and Antioch ,
text2: Baada ya Paulo na Barnabas kuhubiri Habari Njema huko Derbe na kupata wafuasi wengi , walifunga safari kwenda Antiokia kwa kupitia Lustra na Ikonio .

text: Confirming the souls of the disciples , and exhorting them to continue in the faith , and that we must through much tribulation enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Waliwaimarisha waumini wa miji hiyo na kuwatia moyo wabaki imara katika imani . Wakawaambia , " Ni lazima sisi sote tupitie katika taabu nyingi ili tuingie katika ufalme wa Mungu . "

text: And when they had ordained them elders in every church , and had prayed with fasting , they commended them to the Lord , on whom they believed .
text2: Waliteua wazee katika kila kanisa kwa ajili ya waumini , na baada ya kusali na kufunga , wakawaweka chini ya ulinzi wa Bwana ambaye walikuwa wanamwamini .

text: And after they had passed throughout Pisidia , they came to Pamphylia .
text2: Baada ya kupitia katika nchi ya Pisidia , walifika Pamfulia .

text: And when they had preached the word in Perga , they went down into Attalia :
text2: Baada ya kuhubiri ule ujumbe huko Perga , walikwenda Atalia .

text: And thence sailed to Antioch , from whence they had been recommended to the grace of God for the work which they fulfilled .
text2: Kutoka huko walisafiri kwa meli wakarudi Antiokia ambako hapo awali walikuwa wamewekwa chini ya ulinzi wa neema ya Mungu kwa ajili ya kazi ambayo sasa walikuwa wameitimiza .

text: And when they were come , and had gathered the church together , they rehearsed all that God had done with them , and how he had opened the door of faith unto the Gentiles .
text2: Walipofika huko Antiokia walifanya mkutano wa kanisa la mahali hapo , wakawapa taarifa juu ya mambo Mungu aliyofanya pamoja nao , na jinsi alivyowafungulia mlango watu wa mataifa mengine mlango wa kuingia katika imani .

text: And there they abode long time with the disciples .
text2: Wakakaa pamoja na wale waumini kwa muda mrefu .

text: And certain men which came down from Judaea taught the brethren , and said , Except ye be circumcised after the manner of Moses , ye cannot be saved .
text2: Basi , watu wengine walifika Antiokia kutoka Yudea wakaanza kuwafundisha wale ndugu wakisema , " Kama hamtatahiriwa kufuatana na mapokeo ya Sheria ya Mose , hamtaweza kuokolewa . "

text: When therefore Paul and Barnabas had no small dissension and disputation with them , they determined that Paul and Barnabas , and certain other of them , should go up to Jerusalem unto the apostles and elders about this question .
text2: Jambo hili lilisababisha ubishi mkubwa , na baada ya Paulo na Barnaba kujadiliana nao , ikaamuliwa Paulo na Barnaba pamoja na waumini kadhaa wa lile kanisa la Antiokia waende Yerusalemu kuwaona wale mitume na wazee kuhusu jambo hilo .

text: And being brought on their way by the church , they passed through Phenice and Samaria , declaring the conversion of the Gentiles : and they caused great joy unto all the brethren .
text2: Basi , kanisa liliwaaga , nao walipokuwa wanapitia Foinike na Samaria waliwaeleza watu jinsi mataifa mengine yalivyomgeukia Mungu . Habari hizo zikawafurahisha sana ndugu hao wote .

text: And when they were come to Jerusalem , they were received of the church , and of the apostles and elders , and they declared all things that God had done with them .
text2: Walipofika Yerusalemu walikaribishwa na kanisa , mitume na wazee ; nao wakawapa taarifa juu ya yote Mungu aliyoyafanya pamoja nao .

text: But there rose up certain of the sect of the Pharisees which believed , saying , That it was needful to circumcise them , and to command them to keep the law of Moses .
text2: Lakini waumini wengine waliokuwa wa kikundi cha Mafarisayo walisimama , wakasema , " Ni lazima watu wa mataifa mengine watahiriwe na kufundishwa kuifuata Sheria ya Mose . "

text: And the apostles and elders came together for to consider of this matter .
text2: Basi , mitume na wazee walifanya mkutano maalum wa kuchunguza jambo hilo .

text: And when there had been much disputing , Peter rose up , and said unto them , Men and brethren , ye know how that a good while ago God made choice among us , that the Gentiles by my mouth should hear the word of the gospel , and believe .
text2: Baada ya majadiliano marefu , Petro alisimama , akasema , " Ndugu zangu , ninyi mnafahamu kwamba hapo awali Mungu alipenda kunichagua mimi miongoni mwenu niihubiri Habari Njema , ili watu wa mataifa wapate kusikia na kuamini .

text: And God , which knoweth the hearts , bare them witness , giving them the Holy Ghost , even as he did unto us ;
text2: Naye Mungu anayejua mioyo ya watu , alithibitisha kwamba amewakubali kwa kuwapa nao Roho Mtakatifu kama alivyotupa sisi .

text: And put no difference between us and them , purifying their hearts by faith .
text2: Hakufanya ubaguzi wowote kati yetu na wao ; aliitakasa mioyo yao kwa imani .

text: Now therefore why tempt ye God , to put a yoke upon the neck of the disciples , which neither our fathers nor we were able to bear ?
text2: Sasa basi , kwa nini kumjaribu Mungu kwa kuwatwika hao waumini mzigo ambao wala babu zetu , wala sisi hatukuweza kuubeba ?

text: But we believe that through the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ we shall be saved , even as they .
text2: Isiwe hivyo , ila tunaamini kwamba , sisi kama vile wao , tunaokolewa kwa njia ya neema ya Bwana Yesu . "

text: Then all the multitude kept silence , and gave audience to Barnabas and Paul , declaring what miracles and wonders God had wrought among the Gentiles by them .
text2: Kikundi chote kilikaa kimya , kikawasikiliza Barnaba na Paulo wakieleza miujiza na maajabu ambayo Mungu alitenda kwa mikono yao kati ya watu wa mataifa mengine .

text: And after they had held their peace , James answered , saying , Men and brethren , hearken unto me :
text2: Walipomaliza kuongea , Yakobo alianza kusema : " Ndugu zangu , nisikilizeni !

text: Simeon hath declared how God at the first did visit the Gentiles , to take out of them a people for his name .
text2: Simoni ameeleza jinsi Mungu hapo awali alivyojishughulisha na watu wa mataifa mengine , akachagua baadhi yao wawe watu wake .

text: And to this agree the words of the prophets ; as it is written ,
text2: Jambo hili ni sawa kabisa na maneno ya manabii , kama Maandiko Matakatifu yasemavyo :

text: After this I will return , and will build again the tabernacle of David , which is fallen down ; and I will build again the ruins thereof , and I will set it up :
text2: Baada ya mambo haya nitarudi . Nitaijenga tena ile nyumba ya Daudi iliyoanguka ; nitayatengeneza magofu yake na kuijenga tena .

text: That the residue of men might seek after the Lord , and all the Gentiles , upon whom my name is called , saith the Lord , who doeth all these things .
text2: Hapo watu wengine wote , watu wa mataifa yote niliowaita wawe wangu , watamtafuta Bwana .

text: Known unto God are all his works from the beginning of the world .
text2: Ndivyo asemavyo Bwana , aliyefanya jambo hili lijulikane tangu kale .

text: Wherefore my sentence is , that we trouble not them , which from among the Gentiles are turned to God :
text2: " Kwa hiyo , uamuzi wangu ni huu : tusiwataabishe watu wa mataifa wanomgeukia Mungu .

text: But that we write unto them , that they abstain from pollutions of idols , and from fornication , and from things strangled , and from blood .
text2: Bali tuwapelekee barua kuwaambia wasile vyakula vilivyotiwa najisi kwa kutambikiwa sanamu za miungu ; wajiepushe na uasherati ; wasile mnyama yeyote aliyenyongwa , na wasinywe damu .

text: For Moses of old time hath in every city them that preach him , being read in the synagogues every sabbath day .
text2: Kwa maana kwa muda mrefu maneno ya Mose yamekuwa yakihubiriwa katika kila mji na kusomwa katika masunagogi yote kila siku ya Sabato . "

text: Then pleased it the apostles and elders , with the whole church , to send chosen men of their own company to Antioch with Paul and Barnabas ; namely , Judas surnamed Barsabas , and Silas , chief men among the brethren :
text2: Mitume , wazee na kanisa lote waliamua kuwachagua watu fulani miongoni mwao na kuwatuma Antiokia pamoja na Paulo na Barnaba . Basi , wakamchagua Yuda aitwaye pia Barsaba , na Sila ambao wote walikuwa wanajulikana zaidi kati ya ndugu .

text: And they wrote letters by them after this manner ; The apostles and elders and brethren send greeting unto the brethren which are of the Gentiles in Antioch and Syria and Cilicia :
text2: Wakawapa barua hii : " Sisi mitume na wazee , ndugu zenu , tunawasalimuni ninyi ndugu wa mataifa mengine mlioko huko Antiokia , Siria na Kilikia .

text: Forasmuch as we have heard , that certain which went out from us have troubled you with words , subverting your souls , saying , Ye must be circumcised , and keep the law : to whom we gave no such commandment :
text2: Tumesikia kwamba watu wengine kutoka huku kwetu waliwavurugeni kwa maneno yao , wakaitia mioyo yenu katika wasiwasi . Lakini wamefanya hivyo bila ya idhini yoyote kutoka kwetu .

text: It seemed good unto us , being assembled with one accord , to send chosen men unto you with our beloved Barnabas and Paul ,
text2: Hivyo , tumeamua kwa pamoja kuwachagua watu kadhaa na kuwatuma kwenu pamoja na wapenzi wetu Barnaba na Paulo ,

text: Men that have hazarded their lives for the name of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: ambao wamehatarisha maisha yao kwa ajili ya jina la Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo .

text: We have sent therefore Judas and Silas , who shall also tell you the same things by mouth .
text2: Kwa hiyo , tunawatuma Yuda na Sila kwenu ; hawa watawaambieni wao wenyewe haya tuliyoandika .

text: For it seemed good to the Holy Ghost , and to us , to lay upon you no greater burden than these necessary things ;
text2: Basi , Roho Mtakatifu na sisi tumekubali tusiwatwike mzigo zaidi ya mambo haya muhimu :

text: That ye abstain from meats offered to idols , and from blood , and from things strangled , and from fornication : from which if ye keep yourselves , ye shall do well . Fare ye well .
text2: Msile vyakula vilivyotambikiwa sanamu ; msinywe damu ; msile nyama ya mnyama aliyenyongwa ; na mjiepushe na uasherati . Mtakuwa mmefanya vema kama mkiepa kufanya mambo hayo . Wasalaam ! "

text: So when they were dismissed , they came to Antioch : and when they had gathered the multitude together , they delivered the epistle :
text2: Baada ya kuwaaga , hao wajumbe walielekea Antiokia ambako waliita mkutano wa waumini , wakawapa hiyo barua .

text: Which when they had read , they rejoiced for the consolation .
text2: Walipoisoma hiyo barua , maneno yake yaliwatia moyo , wakafurahi sana .

text: And Judas and Silas , being prophets also themselves , exhorted the brethren with many words , and confirmed them .
text2: Yuda na Sila , ambao nao walikuwa manabii , walizungumza na hao ndugu kwa muda mrefu wakiwatia moyo na kuwaimarisha .

text: And after they had tarried there a space , they were let go in peace from the brethren unto the apostles .
text2: Baada ya kukaa huko kwa muda fulani , ndugu wa Antiokia waliwaaga wakiwatakia amani , kisha wakarudi kwa wale waliokuwa wamewatuma .

text: Notwithstanding it pleased Silas to abide there still .
text2: Lakini Sila aliamua kubaki .

text: Paul also and Barnabas continued in Antioch , teaching and preaching the word of the Lord , with many others also .
text2: Paulo na Barnaba walibaki huko Antiokia kwa muda ; wakafundisha na kuhubiri neno la Bwana , pamoja na watu wengine wengi .

text: And some days after Paul said unto Barnabas , Let us go again and visit our brethren in every city where we have preached the word of the Lord , and see how they do .
text2: Baada ya siku kadhaa , Paulo alimwambia Barnaba , " Turudi tukawatembelee wale ndugu katika kila mji tulikolihubiri neno la Bwana tukajionee jinsi wanavyoendelea . "

text: And Barnabas determined to take with them John , whose surname was Mark .
text2: Barnaba alitaka wamchukue pia Yohane aitwaye Marko .

text: But Paul thought not good to take him with them , who departed from them from Pamphylia , and went not with them to the work .
text2: Lakini Paulo hakupendelea kumchukua Marko , ambaye awali aliwaacha kule Pamfulia na kukataa kushiriki katika kazi yao .

text: And the contention was so sharp between them , that they departed asunder one from the other : and so Barnabas took Mark , and sailed unto Cyprus ;
text2: Basi kukatokea ubishi mkali kati yao , na wakaachana . Barnaba akamchukua Marko , wakapanda meli kwenda Kupro .

text: And Paul chose Silas , and departed , being recommended by the brethren unto the grace of God .
text2: Naye Paulo akamchagua Sila , na baada ya ndugu wa mahali hapo kumweka chini ya ulinzi wa neema ya Bwana , akaondoka .

text: And he went through Syria and Cilicia , confirming the churches .
text2: Katika safari hiyo alipitia Siria na Kilikia akiyaimarisha makanisa .

text: Then came he to Derbe and Lystra : and , behold , a certain disciple was there , named Timotheus , the son of a certain woman , which was a Jewess , and believed ; but his father was a Greek :
text2: Paulo alifika Derbe na Lustra , ambako aliishi mfuasi mmoja aitwaye Timotheo . Mama yake ambaye pia alikuwa mfuasi , alikuwa Myahudi ; lakini baba yake alikuwa Mgiriki .

text: Which was well reported of by the brethren that were at Lystra and Iconium .
text2: Timotheo alikuwa na sifa kubwa kati ya wale ndugu wa Lustra na Ikonio .

text: Him would Paul have to go forth with him ; and took and circumcised him because of the Jews which were in those quarters : for they knew all that his father was a Greek .
text2: Paulo alitaka Timotheo aandamane naye safarini , kwa hiyo alimtahiri . Alifanya hivyo kwa sababu Wayahudi wote walioishi sehemu hizo walijua kwamba baba yake Timotheo alikuwa Mgiriki .

text: And as they went through the cities , they delivered them the decrees for to keep , that were ordained of the apostles and elders which were at Jerusalem .
text2: Walipokuwa wanapita katika ile miji waliwapa watu yale maagizo yaliyotolewa na mitume na wazee kule Yerusalemu , wakawaambia wayazingatie .

text: And so were the churches established in the faith , and increased in number daily .
text2: Hivyo , yale makanisa yalizidi kuwa imara katika imani , na idadi ya waumini ikaongezeka kila siku .

text: Now when they had gone throughout Phrygia and the region of Galatia , and were forbidden of the Holy Ghost to preach the word in Asia ,
text2: Walipitia sehemu za Frugia na Galatia kwani Roho Mtakatifu hakuwaruhusu kuhubiri huo ujumbe mkoani Asia .

text: After they were come to Mysia , they assayed to go into Bithynia : but the Spirit suffered them not .
text2: Walipofika kwenye mipaka ya Musia , walijaribu kuingia mkoani Bithunia , lakini Roho wa Yesu hakuwaruhusu .

text: And they passing by Mysia came down to Troas .
text2: Basi , walipitia Musia , wakaenda moja kwa moja mpaka Troa .

text: And a vision appeared to Paul in the night ; There stood a man of Macedonia , and prayed him , saying , Come over into Macedonia , and help us .
text2: Usiku huo , Paulo aliona ono ambalo alimwona mtu mmoja wa Makedonia amesimama pale na kumwomba : " Vuka , uje Makedonia ukatusaidie . "

text: And after he had seen the vision , immediately we endeavored to go into Macedonia , assuredly gathering that the Lord had called us for to preach the gospel unto them .
text2: Mara baada ya Paulo kuona ono hilo , tulijitayarisha kwenda Makedonia bila kukawia , tukiwa na hakika kwamba Mungu ametuita tuwapelekee Habari Njema .

text: Therefore loosing from Troas , we came with a straight course to Samothracia , and the next day to Neapolis ;
text2: Kutoka Troa , tulisafiri kwa meli moja kwa moja mpaka Samothrake , na kesho yake tukatia nanga Neapoli .

text: And from thence to Philippi , which is the chief city of that part of Macedonia , and a colony : and we were in that city abiding certain days .
text2: Kutoka huko , tulikwenda mpaka Filipi , mji wa wilaya ya kwanza ya Makedonia , na ambao pia ni koloni la Waroma . Tulikaa katika mji huo siku kadhaa .

text: And on the sabbath we went out of the city by a river side , where prayer was wont to be made ; and we sat down , and spake unto the women which resorted thither .
text2: Siku ya Sabato tulitoka nje ya mji , tukaenda kando ya mto ambapo tulidhani ya kuwa ni mahali pa kusali . Tuliketi , tukaongea na wanawake waliokusanyika mahali hapo .

text: And a certain woman named Lydia , a seller of purple , of the city of Thyatira , which worshipped God , heard us : whose heart the Lord opened , that she attended unto the things which were spoken of Paul .
text2: Miongoni mwa wale waliotusikiliza alikuwa mwanamke mmoja mcha Mungu aitwaye Ludia mwenyeji wa Thuatira , ambaye alikuwa mfanyabiashara ya nguo za kitani za rangi ya zambarau . Bwana aliufungua moyo wake hata akayapokea yale maneno Paulo aliyokuwa anasema .

text: And when she was baptized , and her household , she besought us , saying , If ye have judged me to be faithful to the Lord , come into my house , and abide there . And she constrained us .
text2: Baada ya huyo mama pamoja na jamaa yake kubatizwa , alitualika akisema , " Kama kweli mmeona kwamba mimi namwamini Bwana , karibuni nyumbani kwangu mkakae . " Akatuhimiza twende .

text: And it came to pass , as we went to prayer , a certain damsel possessed with a spirit of divination met us , which brought her masters much gain by soothsaying :
text2: Siku moja , tulipokuwa tunakwenda mahali pa kusali , msichana mmoja aliyekuwa na pepo mwenye uwezo wa kuagua alikutana nasi . Msichana huyo alikuwa anawapatia matajiri wake fedha nyingi kwa uaguzi wake .

text: The same followed Paul and us , and cried , saying , These men are the servants of the most high God , which shew unto us the way of salvation .
text2: Basi , huyo msichana alimfuata Paulo na sisi , akipiga kelele na kusema , " Hawa watu ni watumishi wa Mungu Mkuu . Wanawatangazieni njia ya wokovu . "

text: And this did she many days . But Paul , being grieved , turned and said to the spirit , I command thee in the name of Jesus Christ to come out of her . And he came out the same hour .
text2: Akawa anafanya hivyo kwa siku nyingi hata siku moja Paulo alikasirika , akamgeukia na kumwambia huyo pepo , " Nakuamuru kwa jina la Yesu Kristo , mtoke huyu ! " Mara huyo pepo akamtoka .

text: And when her masters saw that the hope of their gains was gone , they caught Paul and Silas , and drew them into the marketplace unto the rulers ,
text2: Matajiri wa yule msichana walipoona kwamba tumaini lao la kupata mali limekwisha , waliwakamata Paulo na Sila , wakawaburuta mpaka hadharani , mbele ya wakuu .

text: And brought them to the magistrates , saying , These men , being Jews , do exceedingly trouble our city ,
text2: Wakawashtaki kwa mahakimu wakisema , " Watu hawa ni Wayahudi na wanafanya fujo katika mji wetu .

text: And teach customs , which are not lawful for us to receive , neither to observe , being Romans .
text2: Wanafundisha desturi ambazo sisi raia wa Roma haturuhusiwi kuzikubali wala kuzifuata . "

text: And the multitude rose up together against them : and the magistrates rent off their clothes , and commanded to beat them .
text2: Kundi la watu likajiunga nao , likawashambulia . Wale mahakimu wakawatatulia Paulo na Sila mavazi yao , wakaamuru wapigwe viboko .

text: And when they had laid many stripes upon them , they cast them into prison , charging the jailor to keep them safely :
text2: Baada ya kupigwa sana wakatiwa ndani , na askari wa gereza akaamriwa kuwaweka chini ya ulinzi mkali .

text: Who , having received such a charge , thrust them into the inner prison , and made their feet fast in the stocks .
text2: Kutokana na maagizo hayo , huyo askari aliwaweka katika chumba cha ndani kabisa cha gereza na kuifunga miguu yao kwenye nguzo .

text: And at midnight Paul and Silas prayed , and sang praises unto God : and the prisoners heard them .
text2: Karibu na usiku wa manane Paulo na Sila walikuwa wakisali na kuimba nyimbo za kumsifu Mungu , huku wafungwa wengine wakiwa wanasikiliza .

text: And suddenly there was a great earthquake , so that the foundations of the prison were shaken : and immediately all the doors were opened , and every one ' s bands were loosed .
text2: Ghafla , kulitokea mtetemeko mkuu wa ardhi ambao uliitikisa misingi ya gereza . Mara , milango yote ikafunguka na minyororo iliyowafunga hao wafungwa ikaachana .

text: And the keeper of the prison awaking out of his sleep , and seeing the prison doors open , he drew out his sword , and would have killed himself , supposing that the prisoners had been fled .
text2: Askari wa gereza alipoamka na kuiona milango ya gereza imefunguliwa , alidhani kwamba wafungwa wote walikuwa wametoroka na hivyo akauchomoa upanga wake , akataka kujiua .

text: But Paul cried with a loud voice , saying , Do thyself no harm : for we are all here .
text2: Lakini Paulo akaita kwa sauti kubwa : " Usijidhuru mwenyewe kwa maana sisi sote tuko hapa . "

text: Then he called for a light , and sprang in , and came trembling , and fell down before Paul and Silas ,
text2: Baada ya kumwita mtu alete taa , huyo askari wa gereza alikimbilia ndani , akajitupa mbele ya miguu ya Paulo na Sila huku akitetemeka kwa hofu .

text: And brought them out , and said , Sirs , what must I do to be saved ?
text2: Halafu aliwaongoza nje , akawauliza , " Waheshimiwa , nifanye nini nipate kuokoka ? "

text: And they said , Believe on the Lord Jesus Christ , and thou shalt be saved , and thy house .
text2: Wao wakamjibu , " Mwamini Bwana Yesu nawe utaokolewa pamoja na jamaa yako yote . "

text: And they spake unto him the word of the Lord , and to all that were in his house .
text2: Basi , wakamhubiria neno la Bwana yeye pamoja na jamaa yake .

text: And he took them the same hour of the night , and washed their stripes ; and was baptized , he and all his , straightway .
text2: Yule askari aliwachukua saa ileile ya usiku akawasafisha majeraha yao , kisha yeye na jamaa yake wakabatizwa papo hapo .

text: And when he had brought them into his house , he set meat before them , and rejoiced , believing in God with all his house .
text2: Halafu akawachukua Paulo na Sila nyumbani kwake , akawapa chakula . Yeye na jamaa yake yote wakafanya sherehe kwa vile sasa walikuwa wanamwamini Mungu .

text: And when it was day , the magistrates sent the serjeants , saying , Let those men go .
text2: Kesho yake asubuhi , mahakimu waliwatuma maofisa wao wakisema , " Wafungueni wale watu . "

text: And the keeper of the prison told this saying to Paul , The magistrates have sent to let you go : now therefore depart , and go in peace .
text2: Yule askari wa gereza alimpasha habari Paulo : " Mahakimu wametuma ujumbe ili mfunguliwe . Sasa mnaweza kutoka na kwenda zenu kwa amani . "

text: But Paul said unto them , They have beaten us openly uncondemned , being Romans , and have cast us into prison ; and now do they thrust us out privily ? nay verily ; but let them come themselves and fetch us out .
text2: Lakini Paulo alimjibu , " Ati nini ? Ingawa hatukuwa na kosa , walitupiga viboko hadharani hali sisi ni raia wa Roma . Tena , walitutia ndani na sasa wanataka kutufungulia kwa siri ! Hata kidogo ! Ni lazima wao wenyewe waje hapa watufungulie . "

text: And the serjeants told these words unto the magistrates : and they feared , when they heard that they were Romans .
text2: Hao maofisa waliwapasha habari mahakimu juu ya jambo hilo , nao waliposikia kwamba Paulo na Sila walikuwa raia wa Roma , waliogopa .

text: And they came and besought them , and brought them out , and desired them to depart out of the city .
text2: Hivyo , walikwenda kuwataka radhi na baada ya kuwatoa ndani waliwaomba watoke katika mji ule .

text: And they went out of the prison , and entered into the house of Lydia and when they had seen the brethren , they comforted them , and departed .
text2: Paulo na Sila walitoka gerezani , wakaenda nyumbani kwa Ludia . Huko walionana na ndugu waumini na baada ya kuwatia moyo wakaondoka .

text: Now when they had passed through Amphipolis and Apollonia , they came to Thessalonica , where was a synagogue of the Jews :
text2: Kwa kupitia Amfipoli na Apolonia , walisafiri mpaka Thesalonika ambako kulikuwa na sunagogi la Wayahudi .

text: And Paul , as his manner was , went in unto them , and three sabbath days reasoned with them out of the scriptures ,
text2: Paulo alijiunga nao kama ilivyokuwa desturi yake akajadiliana nao Sabato tatu mfululizo , akatumia Maandiko Matakatifu .

text: Opening and alleging , that Christ must needs have suffered , and risen again from the dead ; and that this Jesus , whom I preach unto you , is Christ .
text2: Aliyaeleza na kuonyesha kwamba ilimbidi Kristo kuteswa na kufufuka kutoka wafu . Akawaambia , " Yesu ambaye mimi namhubiri kwenu ndiye Kristo . "

text: And some of them believed , and consorted with Paul and Silas ; and of the devout Greeks a great multitude , and of the chief women not a few .
text2: Baadhi yao walikubali wakajiunga na Paulo na Sila . Kadhalika , idadi kubwa ya Wagiriki waliomcha Mungu pamoja na wanawake wengi wa tabaka la juu , walijiunga nao .

text: But the Jews which believed not , moved with envy , took unto them certain lewd fellows of the baser sort , and gathered a company , and set all the city on an uproar , and assaulted the house of Jason , and sought to bring them out to the people .
text2: Lakini Wayahudi wakaona wivu ; wakawakodi wafidhuli sokoni , wakafanya kikundi na kuzusha fujo mjini kote . Wakaivamia nyumba ya Yasoni wakitumaini kuwapata humo Paulo na Sila ili wawalete hadharani .

text: And when they found them not , they drew Jason and certain brethren unto the rulers of the city , crying , These that have turned the world upside down are come hither also ;
text2: Lakini hawakuwapata na hivyo walimburuta Yasoni pamoja na ndugu wengine mpaka kwa wakuu wa mji , wakapiga kelele : " Watu hawa wamekuwa wakivuruga dunia yote na sasa wako hapa mjini .

text: Whom Jason hath received : and these all do contrary to the decrees of Caesar , saying that there is another king , one Jesus .
text2: Yasoni amewakaribisha nyumbani kwake . Wote wanafanya kinyume cha amri ya Kaisari wakisema eti Kuna mfalme mwingine aitwaye Yesu . "

text: And they troubled the people and the rulers of the city , when they heard these things .
text2: Kwa maneno hayo waliwatia wasiwasi wakuu wa mji na kundi la watu .

text: And when they had taken security of Jason , and of the other , they let them go .
text2: Wakawafanya Yasoni na wenzake watoe dhamana , kisha wakawaacha waende zao .

text: And the brethren immediately sent away Paul and Silas by night unto Berea : who coming thither went into the synagogue of the Jews .
text2: Usiku , wale ndugu waliwahimiza Paulo na Sila waende Berea . Mara tu walipofika huko , walikwenda katika sunagogi la Wayahudi .

text: These were more noble than those in Thessalonica , in that they received the word with all readiness of mind , and searched the scriptures daily , whether those things were so .
text2: Watu wa huko walikuwa wasikivu zaidi kuliko wale wa Thesalonika . Waliupokea ule ujumbe kwa hamu kubwa , wakawa wanayachunguza Maandiko Matakatifu kila siku , ili kuona kama yale waliyosema Paulo na Sila yalikuwa kweli .

text: Therefore many of them believed ; also of honourable women which were Greeks , and of men , not a few .
text2: Wengi wao waliamini na pia wanawake wa Kigiriki wa tabaka la juu na wanaume pia .

text: But when the Jews of Thessalonica had knowledge that the word of God was preached of Paul at Berea , they came thither also , and stirred up the people .
text2: Lakini , Wayahudi wa Thesalonika walipogundua kwamba Paulo alikuwa anahubiri neno la Mungu huko Berea , walikwenda huko , wakaanza kufanya fujo na kuchochea makundi ya watu .

text: And then immediately the brethren sent away Paul to go as it were to the sea : but Silas and Timotheus abode there still .
text2: Wale ndugu wakamsindikiza haraka aende pwani lakini Sila na Timotheo walibaki Berea .

text: And they that conducted Paul brought him unto Athens : and receiving a commandment unto Silas and Timotheus for to come to him with all speed , they departed .
text2: Wale ndugu waliomsindikiza Paulo walikwenda pamoja naye mpaka Athene . Kisha , wakarudi pamoja na maagizo kutoka kwa Paulo kwamba Sila na Timotheo wamfuate upesi iwezekanavyo .

text: Now while Paul waited for them at Athens , his spirit was stirred in him , when he saw the city wholly given to idolatry .
text2: Paulo alipokuwa anawasubiri Sila na Timotheo huko Athene , moyo wake ulighadhibika sana alipoona jinsi mji huo ulivyokuwa umejaa sanamu za miungu .

text: Therefore disputed he in the synagogue with the Jews , and with the devout persons , and in the market daily with them that met with him .
text2: Alijadiliana na Wayahudi na watu wengine waliomcha Mungu katika sunagogi ; na kila siku alikuwa na majadiliano sokoni pamoja na wowote wale waliojitokeza .

text: Then certain philosophers of the Epicureans , and of the Stoicks , encountered him . And some said , What will this babbler say ? other some , He seemeth to be a setter forth of strange gods : because he preached unto them Jesus , and the resurrection .
text2: Wengine waliofuata falsafa ya Epikuro na Stoiki walibishana naye . Wengine walisema , " Anataka kusema nini huyu bwanamaneno ? " Kwa kuwa Paulo alikuwa anahubiri juu ya Yesu na juu ya ufufuo , wengine walisema , " Inaonekana kama anahubiri juu ya miungu ya kigeni . "

text: And they took him , and brought him unto Areopagus , saying , May we know what this new doctrine , whereof thou speakest , is ?
text2: Hivyo walimchukua Paulo , wakampeleka Areopago , wakasema , " Tunataka kujua jambo hili jipya ulilokuwa unazungumzia .

text: For thou bringest certain strange things to our ears : we would know therefore what these things mean .
text2: Vitu vingine tulivyosikia kwa masikio yetu vinaonekana kuwa viroja kwetu . Tungependa kujua mambo haya yana maana gani . "

text: ( For all the Athenians and strangers which were there spent their time in nothing else , but either to tell , or to hear some new thing . )
text2: Wananchi wa Athene na wakazi wengine wa huko walikuwa wanatumia wakati wao wote kuhadithiana na kusikiliza habari mpyampya .

text: Then Paul stood in the midst of Mars ' hill , and said , Ye men of Athens , I perceive that in all things ye are too superstitious .
text2: Basi , Paulo alisimama mbele ya baraza la Areopago , akasema , " Wananchi wa Athene ! Ninaona kwamba ninyi , kwa vyovyote , ni watu wa dini sana .

text: For as I passed by , and beheld your devotions , I found an altar with this inscription , TO THE UNKNOWN GOD . Whom therefore ye ignorantly worship , him declare I unto you .
text2: Sababu yenyewe ni kwamba katika pitapita yangu niliangalia sanamu zenu za ibada nikakuta madhabahu moja ambayo imeandikwa : Kwa ajili ya Mungu yule Asiyejulikana . Basi , huyo mnayemwabudu bila kujua , ndiye ninayemhubiri kwenu .

text: God that made the world and all things therein , seeing that he is Lord of heaven and earth , dwelleth not in temples made with hands ;
text2: Mungu , aliyeumba ulimwengu na vyote vilivyomo , ni Bwana wa mbingu na nchi ; yeye hakai katika hekalu zilizojengwa na watu .

text: Neither is worshipped with men ' s hands , as though he needed any thing , seeing he giveth to all life , and breath , and all things ;
text2: Wala hatumikiwi kwa mikono ya watu kana kwamba anahitaji chochote kile , kwa maana yeye mwenyewe ndiye anayewapa watu uhai , anawawezesha kupumua na anawapa kila kitu .

text: And hath made of one blood all nations of men for to dwell on all the face of the earth , and hath determined the times before appointed , and the bounds of their habitation ;
text2: Kutokana na mtu mmoja aliumba mataifa yote na kuyawezesha kuishi duniani kote . Aliamua na kupanga kabla kabisa lini na wapi mataifa hayo yangeishi .

text: That they should seek the Lord , if haply they might feel after him , and find him , though he be not far from every one of us :
text2: Alifanya hivyo , ili mataifa hayo yapate kumfuata , na kama vile kwa kupapasapapasa , yapate kumfikia . Hata hivyo lakini , Mungu hayuko mbali na kila mmoja wetu .

text: For in him we live , and move , and have our being ; as certain also of your own poets have said , For we are also his offspring .
text2: Kama alivyosema mtu mmoja : Ndani yake yeye sisi tunaishi , tunajimudu , na tuko ! Ni kama washairi wenu wengine walivyosema : Sisi ni watoto wake .

text: Forasmuch then as we are the offspring of God , we ought not to think that the Godhead is like unto gold , or silver , or stone , graven by art and man ' s device .
text2: Ikiwa basi , sisi ni watoto wa Mungu , haifai kumfikiria Mungu kuwa kama dhahabu , fedha au hata jiwe lililochongwa na kutiwa nakshi na binadamu .

text: And the times of this ignorance God winked at ; but now commandeth all men every where to repent :
text2: Mungu alifanya kama kwamba haoni nyakati zile watu walipokuwa wajinga . Lakini sasa , anaamuru watu wote kila mahali watubu .

text: Because he hath appointed a day , in the which he will judge the world in righteousness by that man whom he hath ordained ; whereof he hath given assurance unto all men , in that he hath raised him from the dead .
text2: Kwa maana amekwisha weka siku ambayo atauhukumu ulimwengu kwa haki kwa njia ya mtu mmoja aliyemteua . Mungu amewathibitishia wote jambo hili kwa kumfufua mtu huyo kutoka wafu ! "

text: And when they heard of the resurrection of the dead , some mocked : and others said , We will hear thee again of this matter .
text2: Walipomsikia Paulo anasema juu ya jambo la kufufuka kwa wafu , wengine wao waliangua kicheko ; lakini wengine walisema , " Tunataka kukusikia tena juu ya jambo hili ! "

text: So Paul departed from among them .
text2: Hivyo , Paulo aliwaacha , akatoka barazani .

text: Howbeit certain men clave unto him , and believed : among the which was Dionysius the Areopagite , and a woman named Damaris , and others with them .
text2: Lakini watu kadhaa waliandamana naye , wakawa waumini . Miongoni mwao walikuwa Dionisio wa Areopago , mwanamke mmoja aitwaye Damari na wengineo .

text: After these things Paul departed from Athens , and came to Corinth ;
text2: Baada ya hayo , Paulo aliondoka Athene , akaenda Korintho .

text: And found a certain Jew named Aquila , born in Pontus , lately come from Italy , with his wife Priscilla ; ( because that Claudius had commanded all Jews to depart from Rome : ) and came unto them .
text2: Huko Korintho , alimkuta Myahudi mmoja aitwaye Akula , mzaliwa wa Ponto . Akula pamoja na mkewe aitwaye Priskila , walikuwa wamerudi kutoka Italia siku hizohizo kwa sababu Kaisari Klaudio alikuwa ameamuru Wayahudi wote waondoke Roma . Paulo alikwenda kuwaona ,

text: And because he was of the same craft , he abode with them , and wrought : for by their occupation they were tentmakers .
text2: na kwa vile wao walikuwa mafundi wa kushona mahema kama alivyokuwa yeye , Paulo alikaa nao akafanya kazi .

text: And he reasoned in the synagogue every sabbath , and persuaded the Jews and the Greeks .
text2: Kila Sabato alifanya majadiliano katika sunagogi akijaribu kuwavuta Wayahudi na Wagiriki .

text: And when Silas and Timotheus were come from Macedonia , Paul was pressed in the spirit , and testified to the Jews that Jesus was Christ .
text2: Baada ya Sila na Timotheo kuwasili kutoka Makedonia , Paulo alianza kutumia wakati wake wote kwa ajili ya kuhubiri , akawathibitishia Wayahudi kwamba Yesu ndiye Kristo .

text: And when they opposed themselves , and blasphemed , he shook his raiment , and said unto them , Your blood be upon your own heads ; I am clean : from henceforth I will go unto the Gentiles .
text2: Walipompinga na kuanza kumtukana , aliyakung ' uta mavazi yake mbele yao akisema , " Mkipotea ni shauri lenu wenyewe ; mimi sina lawama yoyote juu ya jambo hilo . Na tangu sasa nitawaendea watu na mataifa mengine . "

text: And he departed thence , and entered into a certain man ' s house , named Justus , one that worshipped God , whose house joined hard to the synagogue .
text2: Basi , akatoka hapo akaenda kukaa nyumbani kwa mtu mmoja mcha Mungu aitwaye Tito Yusto . Nyumba yake Tito ilikuwa karibu na lile sunagogi .

text: And Crispus , the chief ruler of the synagogue , believed on the Lord with all his house ; and many of the Corinthians hearing believed , and were baptized .
text2: Lakini Krispo , mkuu wa sunagogi , alimwamini Bwana yeye pamoja na jamaa yake yote . Wakorintho wengi waliusikiliza ujumbe huo , wakaamini na kubatizwa .

text: Then spake the Lord to Paul in the night by a vision , Be not afraid , but speak , and hold not thy peace :
text2: Siku moja usiku , Bwana alimwambia Paulo katika maono : " Usiogope , endelea kuhubiri tu bila kufa moyo ,

text: For I am with thee , and no man shall set on thee to hurt thee : for I have much people in this city .
text2: maana mimi niko pamoja nawe . Hakuna mtu atakayejaribu kukudhuru maana hapa mjini pana watu wengi walio upande wangu . "

text: And he continued there a year and six months , teaching the word of God among them .
text2: Basi , Paulo alikaa huko akifundisha neno la Mungu kati yao kwa muda wa mwaka mmoja na nusu .

text: And when Gallio was the deputy of Achaia , the Jews made insurrection with one accord against Paul , and brought him to the judgment seat ,
text2: Lakini wakati Galio alipokuwa mkuu wa mkoa wa Akaya , Wayahudi walimvamia Paulo kwa pamoja na kumpeleka mahakamani .

text: Saying , This fellow persuadeth men to worship God contrary to the law .
text2: Wakasema , " Tunamshtaki mtu huyu kwa sababu ya kuwashawishi watu wamwabudu Mungu kwa namna inayopingana na Sheria . "

text: And when Paul was now about to open his mouth , Gallio said unto the Jews , If it were a matter of wrong or wicked lewdness , O ye Jews , reason would that I should bear with you :
text2: Kabla tu Paulo hajaanza kusema , Galio aliwaambia Wayahudi , " Sikilizeni enyi Wayahudi ! Kama kweli jambo hili lingekuwa juu ya uhalifu au uovu ningekuwa tayari kuwasikilizeni .

text: But if it be a question of words and names , and of your law , look ye to it ; for I will be no judge of such matters .
text2: Lakini kama ni shauri la ubishi kuhusu maneno na majina ya Sheria yenu , amueni ninyi wenyewe . Mimi sitaki kuwa hakimu wa mambo haya ! "

text: And he drave them from the judgment seat .
text2: Basi , akawafukuza kutoka mahakamani .

text: Then all the Greeks took Sosthenes , the chief ruler of the synagogue , and beat him before the judgment seat . And Gallio cared for none of those things .
text2: Nao wote wakamkamata Sosthene ambaye alikuwa kiongozi wa sunagogi , wakampiga palepale mbele ya mahakama . Lakini Galio hakujali kitendo hicho hata kidogo .

text: And Paul after this tarried there yet a good while , and then took his leave of the brethren , and sailed thence into Syria , and with him Priscilla and Aquila ; having shorn his head in Cenchrea : for he had a vow .
text2: Paulo alikaa bado na wale ndugu huko Korintho kwa siku nyingi . Kisha aliwaaga , akapanda meli kwenda Siria pamoja na Priskila na Akula . Huko Kenkrea , alinyoa nywele zake kwa sababu ya nadhiri aliyokuwa ameweka .

text: And he came to Ephesus , and left them there : but he himself entered into the synagogue , and reasoned with the Jews .
text2: Walifika Efeso na hapo Paulo aliwaacha Priskila na Akula , akaenda katika sunagogi , akajadiliana na Wayahudi .

text: When they desired him to tarry longer time with them , he consented not ;
text2: Walimwomba akae nao muda mrefu zaidi , lakini hakupenda .

text: But bade them farewell , saying , I must by all means keep this feast that cometh in Jerusalem : but I will return again unto you , if God will . And he sailed from Ephesus .
text2: Bali alipokuwa anaondoka , alisema , " Mungu akipenda nitakuja kwenu tena . " Akaondoka Efeso kwa meli .

text: And when he had landed at Caesarea , and gone up , and saluted the church , he went down to Antioch .
text2: Meli ilitia nanga Kaisarea , naye Paulo akaenda Yerusalemu kulisalimia lile kanisa , kisha akaenda Antiokia .

text: And after he had spent some time there , he departed , and went over all the country of Galatia and Phrygia in order , strengthening all the disciples .
text2: Alikaa huko muda mfupi , halafu akaendelea na safari kwa kupitia sehemu za Galatia na Frugia akiwatia moyo wafuasi wote .

text: And a certain Jew named Apollos , born at Alexandria , an eloquent man , and mighty in the scriptures , came to Ephesus .
text2: Myahudi mmoja aitwaye Apolo , mzaliwa wa Aleksandria , alifika Efeso . Alikuwa mtu mwenye ufasaha wa kuongea na mwenye ujuzi mkubwa wa Maandiko Matakatifu .

text: This man was instructed in the way of the Lord ; and being fervent in the spirit , he spake and taught diligently the things of the Lord , knowing only the baptism of John .
text2: Alikuwa amefundishwa juu ya hiyo njia ya Bwana , na akiwa motomoto , aliongea juu ya habari za Yesu . Akafundisha kwa usahihi ingawa alikuwa amepata ubatizo wa Yohane tu .

text: And he began to speak boldly in the synagogue : whom when Aquila and Priscilla had heard , they took him unto them , and expounded unto him the way of God more perfectly .
text2: Priskila na Akula walipomsikia akiongea kwa uhodari ndani ya sunagogi , walimchukua kwao wakamfundisha hiyo Njia ya Mungu kwa usahihi zaidi .

text: And when he was disposed to pass into Achaia , the brethren wrote , exhorting the disciples to receive him : who , when he was come , helped them much which had believed through grace :
text2: Apolo alipoamua kwenda Akaya , wale ndugu walimtia moyo kwa kuwaandikia wafuasi kule Akaya wampokee . Alipofika huko , aliweza kwa msaada wa neema ya Mungu , kuwasaidia sana wale ndugu waliopata kuwa waumini ;

text: For he mightily convinced the Jews , and that publickly , shewing by the scriptures that Jesus was Christ .
text2: kwa maana aliendelea kwa uhodari kuwashinda Wayahudi hadharani akithibitisha kwa Maandiko Matakatifu kuwa Yesu ni Kristo .

text: And it came to pass , that , while Apollos was at Corinth , Paul having passed through the upper coasts came to Ephesus : and finding certain disciples ,
text2: Wakati Apolo alipokuwa Korintho , Paulo alisafiri sehemu za bara , akafika Efeso ambako aliwakuta wanafunzi kadhaa .

text: He said unto them , Have ye received the Holy Ghost since ye believed ? And they said unto him , We have not so much as heard whether there be any Holy Ghost .
text2: Akauliza , " Je , mlipopata kuwa waumini mlipokea Roho Mtakatifu ? " Nao wakamjibu , " La ! Hata kusikia kwamba kuna Roho Mtakatifu hatujasikia . "

text: And he said unto them , Unto what then were ye baptized ? And they said , Unto John ' s baptism .
text2: Naye akasema , " Sasa mlipata ubatizo wa namna gani ? " Wakamjibu , " Ubatizo wa Yohane . "

text: Then said Paul , John verily baptized with the baptism of repentance , saying unto the people , that they should believe on him which should come after him , that is , on Christ Jesus .
text2: Naye Paulo akasema , " Ubatizo wa Yohane ulikuwa wa kuonyesha kwamba watu wametubu . Yohane aliwaambia watu wamwamini yule ambaye alikuwa anakuja baada yake , yaani Yesu . "

text: When they heard this , they were baptized in the name of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Baada ya kusikia hayo , walibatizwa kwa jina la Bwana Yesu .

text: And when Paul had laid his hands upon them , the Holy Ghost came on them ; and they spake with tongues , and prophesied .
text2: Basi , Paulo akawawekea mikono , na Roho Mtakatifu akawashukia , wakaanza kusema lugha mbalimbali na kutangaza ujumbe wa Mungu .

text: And all the men were about twelve .
text2: Wote jumla , walikuwa watu wapatao kumi na wawili .

text: And he went into the synagogue , and spake boldly for the space of three months , disputing and persuading the things concerning the kingdom of God .
text2: Kwa muda wa miezi mitatu Paulo alikuwa akienda katika sunagogi , akawa na majadiliano ya kuvutia sana juu ya Ufalme wa Mungu .

text: But when divers were hardened , and believed not , but spake evil of that way before the multitude , he departed from them , and separated the disciples , disputing daily in the school of one Tyrannus .
text2: Lakini wengine walikuwa wakaidi , wakakataa kuamini , wakaanza kuongea vibaya hadharani juu ya Njia ya Bwana . Hapo Paulo alivunja uhusiano nao , akawachukua pembeni wale wanafunzi wake , akawa anazungumza nao kila siku katika jumba la masomo la Turano .

text: And this continued by the space of two years ; so that all they which dwelt in Asia heard the word of the Lord Jesus , both Jews and Greeks .
text2: Aliendelea kufanya hivyo kwa muda wa miaka miwili hata wakazi wote wa Asia , Wayahudi na watu wa mataifa mengine , wakaweza kusikia neno la Bwana .

text: And God wrought special miracles by the hands of Paul :
text2: Mungu alifanya miujiza ya ajabu kwa mikono ya Paulo .

text: So that from his body were brought unto the sick handkerchiefs or aprons , and the diseases departed from them , and the evil spirits went out of them .
text2: Watu walikuwa wakichukua leso na nguo nyingine za kazi ambazo Paulo alikuwa amezitumia , wakazipeleka kwa wagonjwa , nao wakaponywa magonjwa yao ; na wale waliokuwa na pepo wabaya wakatokwa na pepo hao .

text: Then certain of the vagabond Jews , exorcists , took upon them to call over them which had evil spirits the name of the Lord Jesus , saying , We adjure you by Jesus whom Paul preacheth .
text2: Wayahudi kadhaa wenye kupunga pepo wabaya , walisafiri huko na huko , wakijaribu kulitumia jina la Bwana Yesu kwa wale waliokuwa wamepagawa na pepo wabaya . Walikuwa wakisema : " Ninawaamuru kwa jina la Yesu ambaye Paulo anamhubiri . "

text: And there were seven sons of one Sceva , a Jew , and chief of the priests , which did so .
text2: Watoto saba wa Skewa , Kuhani Mkuu wa Kiyahudi , walikuwa miongoni mwa hao waliokuwa wanafanya hivyo .

text: And the evil spirit answered and said , Jesus I know , and Paul I know ; but who are ye ?
text2: Lakini pepo mbaya aliwajibu , " Ninamfahamu Yesu , ninamjua pia Paulo , lakini ninyi ni nani ? "

text: And the man in whom the evil spirit was leaped on them , and overcame them , and prevailed against them , so that they fled out of that house naked and wounded .
text2: Kisha yule mtu aliyepagawa aliwarukia wote kwa kishindo , akawashinda nguvu . Na hao watoto wa Skewa wakakimbia kutoka ile nyumba wakiwa uchi na wamejaa majeraha .

text: And this was known to all the Jews and Greeks also dwelling at Ephesus ; and fear fell on them all , and the name of the Lord Jesus was magnified .
text2: Kila mtu huko Efeso , Myahudi na asiye Myahudi , alisikia juu ya tukio hilo . Wote waliingiwa na hofu , wakalitukuza jina la Bwana Yesu .

text: And many that believed came , and confessed , and shewed their deeds .
text2: Waumini wengi walijitokeza wakakiri hadharani mambo waliyokuwa wametenda .

text: Many of them also which used curious arts brought their books together , and burned them before all men : and they counted the price of them , and found it fifty thousand pieces of silver .
text2: Wengine waliokuwa wameshughulikia mambo ya uchawi hapo awali , walikusanya vitabu vyao , wakavichoma mbele ya wote . Walikisia gharama ya vitabu hivyo , wakaona yafikia vipande vya fedha elfu hamsini .

text: So mightily grew the word of God and prevailed .
text2: Kwa namna hiyo , neno la Bwana lilizidi kuenea na kuwa na nguvu zaidi .

text: After these things were ended , Paul purposed in the spirit , when he had passed through Macedonia and Achaia , to go to Jerusalem , saying , After I have been there , I must also see Rome .
