text2: Baada ya mambo hayo , Paulo aliamua kwenda Yerusalemu kwa kupitia Makedonia na Akaya . Alisema , " Baada ya kufika huko , itanilazimu kuona Roma pia . "

text: So he sent into Macedonia two of them that ministered unto him , Timotheus and Erastus ; but he himself stayed in Asia for a season .
text2: Hivyo , aliwatuma wawili wa wasaidizi wake , Timotheo na Erasto , wamtangulie kwenda Makedonia , naye akabaki kwa muda huko Asia .

text: And the same time there arose no small stir about that way .
text2: Wakati huo ndipo kulipotokea ghasia kubwa huko Efeso kwa sababu ya hiyo Njia ya Bwana .

text: For a certain man named Demetrius , a silversmith , which made silver shrines for Diana , brought no small gain unto the craftsmen ;
text2: Kulikuwa na mfua fedha mmoja aitwaye Demetrio , ambaye alikuwa na kazi ya kutengeneza sanamu za nyumba ya mungu wa kike aitwaye Artemi . Shughuli hiyo iliwapatia mafundi faida kubwa .

text: Whom he called together with the workmen of like occupation , and said , Sirs , ye know that by this craft we have our wealth .
text2: Demetrio aliwakusanya hao wafanyakazi pamoja na wengine waliokuwa na kazi kama hiyo , akawaambia , " Wananchi , mnafahamu kwamba kipato chetu kinatokana na biashara hii .

text: Moreover ye see and hear , that not alone at Ephesus , but almost throughout all Asia , this Paul hath persuaded and turned away much people , saying that they be no gods , which are made with hands :
text2: Sasa , mnaweza kusikia na kujionea wenyewe mambo Paulo anayofanya , si tu hapa Efeso , ila pia kote katika Asia . Yeye amewashawishi na kuwageuza watu wakakubali kwamba miungu ile iliyotengenezwa na watu si miungu hata kidogo .

text: So that not only this our craft is in danger to be set at nought ; but also that the temple of the great goddess Diana should be despised , and her magnificence should be destroyed , whom all Asia and the world worshippeth .
text2: Hivyo iko hatari kwamba biashara yetu itakuwa na jina baya . Si hivyo tu , bali pia jambo hilo linaweza kuifanya nyumba ya mungu Artemi kuwa si kitu cha maana . Hatimaye sifa zake huyo ambaye Asia na dunia yote inamwabudu , zitakwisha . "

text: And when they heard these sayings , they were full of wrath , and cried out , saying , Great is Diana of the Ephesians .
text2: Waliposikia hayo , waliwaka hasira , wakaanza kupiga kelele : " Mkuu ni Artemi , wa Efeso ! "

text: And the whole city was filled with confusion : and having caught Gaius and Aristarchus , men of Macedonia , Paul ' s companions in travel , they rushed with one accord into the theatre .
text2: Mji wote ukajaa ghasia . Wakawavamia Gayo na Aristarko , wenyeji wa Makedonia , ambao walikuwa wasafiri wenzake Paulo , wakakimbia nao mpaka kwenye ukumbi wa michezo .

text: And when Paul would have entered in unto the people , the disciples suffered him not .
text2: Paulo mwenyewe alitaka kuukabili huo umati wa watu , lakini wale waumini walimzuia .

text: And certain of the chief of Asia , which were his friends , sent unto him , desiring him that he would not adventure himself into the theatre .
text2: Maofisa wengine wa huo mkoa wa Asia , waliokuwa rafiki zake , walimtumia Paulo ujumbe wakimsihi asijihatarishe kwa kwenda kwenye ukumbi wa michezo .

text: Some therefore cried one thing , and some another : for the assembly was confused ; and the more part knew not wherefore they were come together .
text2: Wakati huo , kila mtu alikuwa anapayuka ; wengine hili na wengine lile , mpaka hata ule mkutano ukavurugika . Wengi hawakujua hata sababu ya kukutana kwao .

text: And they drew Alexander out of the multitude , the Jews putting him forward . And Alexander beckoned with the hand , and would have made his defence unto the people .
text2: Kwa vile Wayahudi walimfanya Aleksanda ajitokeze mbele , baadhi ya watu katika ule umati walidhani kuwa ndiye . Basi , Aleksanda aliwaashiria watu kwa mkono akitaka kujitetea mbele ya ule umati wa watu .

text: But when they knew that he was a Jew , all with one voice about the space of two hours cried out , Great is Diana of the Ephesians .
text2: Lakini walipotambua kuwa yeye ni Myahudi , wote kwa sauti moja walipiga kelele : " Mkuu ni Artemi wa Efeso ! " Wakaendelea kupayukapayuka hivyo kwa muda wa saa mbili .

text: And when the townclerk had appeased the people , he said , Ye men of Ephesus , what man is there that knoweth not how that the city of the Ephesians is a worshipper of the great goddess Diana , and of the image which fell down from Jupiter ?
text2: Hatimaye karani wa mji alifaulu kuwanyamazisha , akawaambia , " Wananchi wa Efeso , kila mtu anajua kwamba mji huu wa Efeso ni mlinzi wa nyumba ya mungu Artemi na mlinzi wa ile sanamu iliyoanguka kutoka mbinguni .

text: Seeing then that these things cannot be spoken against , ye ought to be quiet , and to do nothing rashly .
text2: Hakuna anayeweza kukana mambo haya . Hivyo basi , tulieni ; msifanye chochote bila hadhari .

text: For ye have brought hither these men , which are neither robbers of churches , nor yet blasphemers of your goddess .
text2: Mmewaita watu hawa hapa ingawaje hawakuikufuru nyumba ya mungu wala kumtukana mungu wetu wa kike .

text: Wherefore if Demetrius , and the craftsmen which are with him , have a matter against any man , the law is open , and there are deputies : let them implead one another .
text2: Kama , basi Demetrio na wafanyakazi wake wana mashtaka yao kuhusu watu hawa , yapo mahakama na wakuu wa mikoa ; wanaweza kushtakiana huko .

text: But if ye inquire any thing concerning other matters , it shall be determined in a lawful assembly .
text2: Kama mna matatizo mengine , yapelekeni katika kikao halali .

text: For we are in danger to be called in question for this day ' s uproar , there being no cause whereby we may give an account of this concourse .
text2: Kwa maana tungaliweza kushtakiwa kwa kusababisha ghasia kutokana na vituko vya leo . Ghasia hii haina msingi halali na hatungeweza kutoa sababu za kuridhisha za ghasia hiyo . "

text: And when he had thus spoken , he dismissed the assembly .
text2: Baada ya kusema hayo aliuvunja mkutano .

text: And after the uproar was ceased , Paul called unto him the disciples , and embraced them , and departed for to go into Macedonia .
text2: Ile ghasia ya Efeso ilipokwisha tulia Paulo aliwaita pamoja wale waumini , akawatia moyo . Kisha akawaaga , akasafiri kwenda Makedonia .

text: And when he had gone over those parts , and had given them much exhortation , he came into Greece ,
text2: Alipitia sehemu za nchi zile akiwatia watu moyo kwa maneno mengi . Halafu akafika Ugiriki .

text: And there abode three months . And when the Jews laid wait for him , as he was about to sail into Syria , he purposed to return through Macedonia .
text2: ambako alikaa kwa miezi mitatu . Alipokuwa anajitayarisha kwenda Siria , aligundua kwamba Wayahudi walikuwa wanamfanyia mpango mbaya ; hivyo aliamua kurudi kwa kupitia Makedonia .

text: And there accompanied him into Asia Sopater of Berea ; and of the Thessalonians , Aristarchus and Secundus ; and Gaius of Derbe , and Timotheus ; and of Asia , Tychicus and Trophimus .
text2: Sopatro , mwana wa Pirho kutoka Berea , aliandamana naye ; pia Aristarko na Sekundo kutoka Thesalonika , Gayo kutoka Derbe , Timotheo , Tukiko na Trofimo wa mkoa wa Asia .

text: These going before tarried for us at Troas .
text2: Hao walitutangulia na kutungojea kule Troa .

text: And we sailed away from Philippi after the days of unleavened bread , and came unto them to Troas in five days ; where we abode seven days .
text2: Sisi , baada ya sikukuu ya Mikate Isiyotiwa chachu , tulipanda meli kutoka Filipi na baada ya siku tatu tukawafikia kule Troa . Huko tulikaa kwa muda wa juma moja .

text: And upon the first day of the week , when the disciples came together to break bread , Paul preached unto them , ready to depart on the morrow ; and continued his speech until midnight .
text2: Jumamosi jioni , tulikutana ili kumega mkate . Kwa vile Paulo alikuwa amekusudia kuondoka kesho yake , aliwahutubia watu na kuendelea kuongea nao hadi usiku wa manane .

text: And there were many lights in the upper chamber , where they were gathered together .
text2: Katika chumba tulimokuwa , ghorofani , kulikuwa na taa nyingi zinawaka .

text: And there sat in a window a certain young man named Eutychus , being fallen into a deep sleep : and as Paul was long preaching , he sunk down with sleep , and fell down from the third loft , and was taken up dead .
text2: Kijana mmoja aitwaye Eutuko alikuwa ameketi dirishani wakati Paulo alipokuwa anaendelea kuhutubu . Eutuko alianza kusinzia kidogokidogo na hatimaye usingizi ukambana , akaanguka chini kutoka ghorofa ya tatu . Wakamwokota amekwisha kufa .

text: And Paul went down , and fell on him , and embracing him said , Trouble not yourselves ; for his life is in him .
text2: Lakini Paulo alishuka chini , akainama , akamkumbatia na kusema , " Msiwe na wasiwasi maana kuna uhai bado ndani yake . "

text: When he therefore was come up again , and had broken bread , and eaten , and talked a long while , even till break of day , so he departed .
text2: Kisha akapanda tena ghorofani , akamega mkate , akala . Aliendelea kuhubiri kwa muda mrefu hadi alfajiri , halafu akaondoka .

text: And they brought the young man alive , and were not a little comforted .
text2: Wale watu walimchukua yule kijana nyumbani akiwa mzima kabisa , wakapata kitulizo kikubwa .

text: And we went before to ship , and sailed unto Assos , there intending to take in Paul : for so had he appointed , minding himself to go afoot .
text2: Sisi tulipanda meli tukatangulia kwenda Aso ambako tungemchukua Paulo . Ndivyo alivyopanga ; maana alitaka kufika huko kwa kupitia nchi kavu .

text: And when he met with us at Assos , we took him in , and came to Mitylene .
text2: Basi , alitukuta kule Aso , tukampandisha melini , tukaenda Mitulene .

text: And we sailed thence , and came the next day over against Chios ; and the next day we arrived at Samos , and tarried at Trogyllium ; and the next day we came to Miletus .
text2: Kutoka huko tulisafiri tukafika Kio kesho yake . Siku ya pili , tulitia nanga Samo na kesho yake tukafika Mileto .

text: For Paul had determined to sail by Ephesus , because he would not spend the time in Asia : for he hasted , if it were possible for him , to be at Jerusalem the day of Pentecost .
text2: Paulo alikuwa amekusudia kuendelea na safari kwa meli bila kupitia Efeso ili asikawie zaidi huko Asia . Alikuwa na haraka ya kufika Yerusalemu kwa sikukuu ya Pentekoste kama ingewezekana .

text: And from Miletus he sent to Ephesus , and called the elders of the church .
text2: Kutoka Mileto Paulo alituma ujumbe kwa wazee wa Efeso wakutane naye .

text: And when they were come to him , he said unto them , Ye know , from the first day that I came into Asia , after what manner I have been with you at all seasons ,
text2: Walipofika kwake aliwaambia , " Mnajua jinsi nilivyotumia wakati wote pamoja nanyi tangu siku ile ya kwanza nilipofika Asia .

text: Serving the Lord with all humility of mind , and with many tears , and temptations , which befell me by the lying in wait of the Jews :
text2: Mnajua jinsi nilivyomtumikia Bwana kwa unyenyekevu wote , kwa machozi na matatizo yaliyonipata kutokana na mipango ya hila ya Wayahudi .

text: And how I kept back nothing that was profitable unto you , but have shewed you , and have taught you publickly , and from house to house ,
text2: Mnajua kwamba sikusita hata kidogo kuwahubiria hadharani na nyumbani mwenu na kuwafundisha chochote ambacho kingewasaidieni .

text: Testifying both to the Jews , and also to the Greeks , repentance toward God , and faith toward our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Niliwaonya wote - - Wayahudi kadhalika na watu wa mataifa , wamgeukie Mungu na kumwamini Bwana wetu Yesu .

text: And now , behold , I go bound in the spirit unto Jerusalem , not knowing the things that shall befall me there :
text2: Sasa , sikilizeni ! Mimi , nikiwa ninamtii Roho , nakwenda Yerusalemu bila kufahamu yatakayonipata huko .

text: Save that the Holy Ghost witnesseth in every city , saying that bonds and afflictions abide me .
text2: Ninachojua tu ni kwamba Roho Mtakatifu ananithibitishia katika kila mji kwamba vifungo na mateso ndivyo vinavyoningojea .

text: But none of these things move me , neither count I my life dear unto myself , so that I might finish my course with joy , and the ministry , which I have received of the Lord Jesus , to testify the gospel of the grace of God .
text2: Lakini , siuthamini uhai wangu kuwa ni kitu sana kwangu . Nataka tu nikamilishe ule utume wangu na kumaliza ile kazi aliyonipa Bwana Yesu niifanye , yaani nitangaze Habari Njema ya neema ya Mungu .

text: And now , behold , I know that ye all , among whom I have gone preaching the kingdom of God , shall see my face no more .
text2: " Nimekuwa nikienda huko na huko kati yenu nikiuhubiri Ufalme wa Mungu . Sasa lakini , najua hakuna hata mmoja wenu atakayeniona tena .

text: Wherefore I take you to record this day , that I am pure from the blood of all men .
text2: Hivyo , leo hii ninawathibitishieni rasmi kwamba ikijatokea akapotea mmoja wenu , mimi sina lawama yoyote .

text: For I have not shunned to declare unto you all the counsel of God .
text2: Kwa maana sikusita hata kidogo kuwatangazieni azimio lote la Mungu .

text: Take heed therefore unto yourselves , and to all the flock , over the which the Holy Ghost hath made you overseers , to feed the church of God , which he hath purchased with his own blood .
text2: Jihadharini wenyewe ; lilindeni lile kundi ambalo Roho Mtakatifu amewaweka ninyi muwe walezi wake . Lichungeni kanisa la Mungu ambalo amejipatia kwa damu ya Mwanae .

text: For I know this , that after my departing shall grievous wolves enter in among you , not sparing the flock .
text2: Nafahamu vizuri sana kwamba baada ya kuondoka kwangu mbwa mwitu wakali watawavamieni , na hawatakuwa na huruma kwa kundi hilo .

text: Also of your own selves shall men arise , speaking perverse things , to draw away disciples after them .
text2: Hata kutoka miongoni mwenu watatokea watu ambao watasema mambo ya uongo ili kuwapotosha watu na kuwafanya wawafuate wao tu .

text: Therefore watch , and remember , that by the space of three years I ceased not to warn every one night and day with tears .
text2: Kwa hiyo , muwe macho mkikumbuka kwamba kwa muda wa miaka mitatu , usiku na mchana , sikuchoka kumwonya kila mmoja wenu kwa machozi .

text: And now , brethren , I commend you to God , and to the word of his grace , which is able to build you up , and to give you an inheritance among all them which are sanctified .
text2: " Na sasa basi , ninawaweka ninyi chini ya ulinzi wa Mungu na ujumbe wa neema yake . Yeye anao uwezo wa kuwajenga ninyi na kuwawezesha mzipate zile baraka alizowawekea watu wake .

text: I have coveted no man ' s silver , or gold , or apparel .
text2: Mimi sikutamani hata mara moja fedha , wala dhahabu , wala nguo za mtu yeyote .

text: Yea , ye yourselves know , that these hands have ministered unto my necessities , and to them that were with me .
text2: Mnajua ninyi wenyewe kwamba nimefanya kazi kwa mikono yangu mwenyewe , ili kujipatia mahitaji yangu na ya wenzangu .

text: I have shewed you all things , how that so labouring ye ought to support the weak , and to remember the words of the Lord Jesus , how he said , It is more blessed to give than to receive .
text2: Nimekuwa nikiwapeni daima mfano kwamba kwa kufanya kazi mithili hiyo tunapaswa kuwasaidia walio dhaifu , tukikumbuka maneno ya Bwana Yesu mwenyewe : Heri zaidi kutoa kuliko kupokea . "

text: And when he had thus spoken , he kneeled down , and prayed with them all .
text2: Baada ya kusema hayo , Paulo alipiga magoti pamoja nao wote , akasali .

text: And they all wept sore , and fell on Paul ' s neck , and kissed him ,
text2: Wote walikuwa wanalia ; wakamwaga kwa kumkumbatia na kumbusu .

text: Sorrowing most of all for the words which he spake , that they should see his face no more . And they accompanied him unto the ship .
text2: Jambo lililowahuzunisha zaidi lilikuwa neno alilosema kwamba hawangemwona tena . Basi , wakamsindikiza hadi melini .

text: And it came to pass , that after we were gotten from them , and had launched , we came with a straight course unto Coos , and the day following unto Rhodes , and from thence unto Patara :
text2: Tulipokwisha agana nao , tulipanda meli tukaenda moja kwa moja mpaka Kosi . Kesho yake tulifika Rodo , na kutoka huko tulikwenda Patara .

text: And finding a ship sailing over unto Phenicia , we went aboard , and set forth .
text2: Huko , tulikuta meli iliyokuwa inakwenda Foinike , hivyo tulipanda , tukasafiri .

text: Now when we had discovered Cyprus , we left it on the left hand , and sailed into Syria , and landed at Tyre : for there the ship was to unlade her burden .
text2: Baada ya kufika mahali ambapo tuliweza kuona Kupro , tulipitia upande wake wa kusini tukaelekea Siria . Tulitia nanga katika mji wa Tiro ambapo ile meli ilikuwa ipakuliwe shehena yake .

text: And finding disciples , we tarried there seven days : who said to Paul through the Spirit , that he should not go up to Jerusalem .
text2: Tulikuta waumini huko , tukakaa pamoja nao kwa muda wa juma moja . Waumini hao wakawa waongea kwa nguvu ya Roho , wakamwambia Paulo asiende Yerusalemu .

text: And when we had accomplished those days , we departed and went our way ; and they all brought us on our way , with wives and children , till we were out of the city : and we kneeled down on the shore , and prayed .
text2: Lakini muda wetu ulipokwisha tuliondoka . Wote pamoja na wanawake na watoto wao walitusindikiza mpaka nje ya mji . Tulipofika pwani , sote tulipiga magoti tukasali .

text: And when we had taken our leave one of another , we took ship ; and they returned home again .
text2: Kisha tuliagana ; sisi tukapanda meli nao wakarudi makwao .

text: And when we had finished our course from Tyre , we came to Ptolemais , and saluted the brethren , and abode with them one day .
text2: Sisi tuliendelea na safari yetu kutoka Tiro tukafika Tolemai ambapo tuliwasalimu ndugu zetu , tukakaa nao siku moja .

text: And the next day we that were of Paul ' s company departed , and came unto Caesarea : and we entered into the house of Philip the evangelist , which was one of the seven ; and abode with him .
text2: Kesho yake tuliondoka tukaenda Kaisarea . Huko Kaisarea tulikwenda nyumbani kwa mhubiri Filipo . Yeye alikuwa mmoja wa wale saba waliochaguliwa kule Yerusalemu .

text: And the same man had four daughters , virgins , which did prophesy .
text2: Alikuwa na binti watatu ambao walikuwa na kipaji cha unabii .

text: And as we tarried there many days , there came down from Judaea a certain prophet , named Agabus .
text2: Baada ya kukaa huko siku kadhaa , nabii mmoja aitwaye Agabo alifika kutoka Yudea .

text: And when he was come unto us , he took Paul ' s girdle , and bound his own hands and feet , and said , Thus saith the Holy Ghost , So shall the Jews at Jerusalem bind the man that owneth this girdle , and shall deliver him into the hands of the Gentiles .
text2: Alitujia , akachukua mkanda wa Paulo , akajifunga mikono na miguu , akasema " Roho Mtakatifu asema hivi : Wayahudi kule Yerusalemu watamfunga namna hii mtu mwenye ukanda na kumtia mikononi mwa watu wa mataifa . "

text: And when we heard these things , both we , and they of that place , besought him not to go up to Jerusalem .
text2: Tuliposikia hayo , sisi na wale watu wengine waliokuwa hapo tulimsihi Paulo asiende Yerusalemu .

text: Then Paul answered , What mean ye to weep and to break mine heart ? for I am ready not to be bound only , but also to die at Jerusalem for the name of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Lakini yeye alijibu , " Mnataka kufanya nini ? Mnataka kuvunja moyo wangu kwa machozi ? Niko tayari siyo tu kutiwa ndani kule Yerusalemu , ila hata kufa kwa ajili ya Bwana Yesu . "

text: And when he would not be persuaded , we ceased , saying , The will of the Lord be done .
text2: Tuliposhindwa kumshawishi tulinyamaza , tukasema tu : " Mapenzi ya Bwana yafanyike "

text: And after those days we took up our carriages , and went up to Jerusalem .
text2: Baada ya kukaa pale kwa muda , tulifunga mizigo yetu , tukaendelea na safari kwenda Yerusalemu .

text: There went with us also certain of the disciples of Caesarea , and brought with them one Mnason of Cyprus , an old disciple , with whom we should lodge .
text2: Wengine kati ya wale wafuasi wa Kaisarea walienda pamoja nasi , wakatupeleka nyumbani kwa Mnasoni ambaye tulikuwa tunakwenda kukaa naye kwa muda . Mnasoni alikuwa mwenyeji wa Kupro na alikuwa amekuwa muumini kwa siku nyingi .

text: And when we were come to Jerusalem , the brethren received us gladly .
text2: Tulipofika Yerusalemu , ndugu waumini walitupokea vizuri sana .

text: And the day following Paul went in with us unto James ; and all the elders were present .
text2: Kesho yake Paulo alikwenda pamoja nasi kumwamkia Yakobo , na wazee wote wa kanisa walikuwako pia .

text: And when he had saluted them , he declared particularly what things God had wrought among the Gentiles by his ministry .
text2: Baada ya kuwasalimu , Paulo aliwapa taarifa kamili kuhusu yote Mungu aliyokuwa ametenda kati ya mataifa kwa njia ya utumishi wake .

text: And when they heard it , they glorified the Lord , and said unto him , Thou seest , brother , how many thousands of Jews there are which believe ; and they are all zealous of the law :
text2: Waliposikia hayo , walimtukuza Mungu . Kisha wakamwambia Paulo , " Ndugu , unaweza kuona kwamba kuna maelfu ya Wayahudi ambao sasa wamekuwa waumini na wote hao wanashika kwa makini Sheria ya Mose .

text: And they are informed of thee , that thou teachest all the Jews which are among the Gentiles to forsake Moses , saying that they ought not to circumcise their children , neither to walk after the customs .
text2: Wamepata habari zako kwamba umekuwa ukiwafundisha Wayahudi wanaoishi kati ya mataifa mengine kuwa wasiijali Sheria ya Mose , wasiwatahiri watoto wao na kwamba wasizifuate mila za Wayahudi .

text: What is it therefore ? the multitude must needs come together : for they will hear that thou art come .
text2: Sasa , mambo yatakuwaje ? Ni dhahiri kuwa watapata habari kwamba umekwisha wasili hapa .

text: Do therefore this that we say to thee : We have four men which have a vow on them ;
text2: Basi , fanya kama tunavyokushauri . Tunao hapa watu wanne ambao wameweka nadhiri .

text: Them take , and purify thyself with them , and be at charges with them , that they may shave their heads : and all may know that those things , whereof they were informed concerning thee , are nothing ; but that thou thyself also walkest orderly , and keepest the law .
text2: Jiunge nao katika ibada ya kujitakasa , ukalipe na gharama zinazohusika , kisha wanyolewe nywele zao . Hivyo watu wote watatambua kwamba habari zile walizoambiwa juu yako hazina msingi wowote , na kwamba wewe binafsi bado unaishi kufuatana na maagizo ya Sheria za Mose .

text: As touching the Gentiles which believe , we have written and concluded that they observe no such thing , save only that they keep themselves from things offered to idols , and from blood , and from strangled , and from fornication .
text2: Kuhusu wale watu wa mataifa mengine ambao wamekuwa waumini , tumekwisha wapelekea barua tukiwaambia mambo tuliyoamua : wasile chochote kilichotambikiwa miungu ya uongo , wasinywe damu , wasile nyama ya mnyama aliyenyongwa , na wajiepushe na uasherati . "

text: Then Paul took the men , and the next day purifying himself with them entered into the temple , to signify the accomplishment of the days of purifcation , until that an offering should be offered for every one of them .
text2: Basi , kesho yake Paulo aliwachukua wale watu akafanya ibada ya kujitakasa pamoja nao . Kisha akaingia Hekaluni kutoa taarifa kuhusu mwisho wa siku za kujitakasa na kuhusu dhabihu itakayotolewa kwa ajili ya kila mmoja wao .

text: And when the seven days were almost ended , the Jews which were of Asia , when they saw him in the temple , stirred up all the people , and laid hands on him ,
text2: Wakati siku hizo saba zilipokaribia kuisha , Wayahudi waliokuwa wametoka katika mkoa wa Asia walimwona Paulo Hekaluni . Wakachochea hasira kati ya kundi lote la watu , wakamtia nguvuni

text: Crying out , Men of Israel , help : This is the man , that teacheth all men every where against the people , and the law , and this place : and further brought Greeks also into the temple , and hath polluted this holy place .
text2: wakipiga kelele : " Wananchi wa Israeli , msaada , msaada ! Huyu ndiye yule mtu anayewafundisha watu kila mahali mambo yanayopinga watu wa Israeli , yanayopinga Sheria ya Mose na mahali hapa patakatifu . Hata sasa amewaingiza watu wa mataifa mengine Hekaluni na kupatia najisi mahali hapa patakatifu . "

text: ( For they had seen before with him in the city Trophimus an Ephesian , whom they supposed that Paul had brought into the temple . )
text2: Sababu ya kusema hivyo ni kwamba walikuwa wamemwona Trofimo mwenyeji , wa Efeso , akiwa pamoja na Paulo mjini , wakadhani kwamba Paulo alikuwa amemwingiza Hekaluni .

text: And all the city was moved , and the people ran together : and they took Paul , and drew him out of the temple : and forthwith the doors were shut .
text2: Mji wote ulienea ghasia ; watu wakaja kutoka pande zote , wakamkamata Paulo , wakamburuta , wakamtoa nje ya Hekalu na papo hapo milango ya Hekalu ikafungwa .

text: And as they went about to kill him , tidings came unto the chief captain of the band , that all Jerusalem was in an uproar .
text2: Walikuwa tayari kumuua , lakini habari zilimfikia mkuu wa jeshi la Kiroma kuwa Yerusalemu yote ilikuwa imejaa ghasia .

text: Who immediately took soldiers and centurions , and ran down unto them : and when they saw the chief captain and the soldiers , they left beating of Paul .
text2: Mara , mkuu wa jeshi akawachukua askari na jemadari , akalikabili lile kundi la watu . Nao walipomwona mkuu wa jeshi na askari , wakaacha kumpiga Paulo .

text: Then the chief captain came near , and took him , and commanded him to be bound with two chains ; and demanded who he was , and what he had done .
text2: Mkuu wa jeshi alimwendea Paulo , akamtia nguvuni na kuamuru afungwe minyororo miwili . Kisha akauliza , " Ni mtu gani huyu , na amefanya nini ? "

text: And some cried one thing , some another , among the multitude : and when he could not know the certainty for the tumult , he commanded him to be carried into the castle .
text2: Wengine katika lile kundi la watu walikuwa wanapayuka kitu hiki na wengine kitu kingine . Kwa sababu ya ghasia hiyo , mkuu wa jeshi hakufaulu kujua kisa kamili . Hivyo , aliamuru watu wake wampeleke Paulo ndani ya ngome .

text: And when he came upon the stairs , so it was , that he was borne of the soldiers for the violence of the people .
text2: Paulo alipofika kwenye ngazi , askari walilazimika kumbeba kwa sababu ya fujo za watu .

text: For the multitude of the people followed after , crying , Away with him .
text2: Kwa maana kundi kubwa la watu walimfuata wakipiga kelele , " Muulie mbali ! "

text: And as Paul was to be led into the castle , he said unto the chief captain , May I speak unto thee ? Who said , Canst thou speak Greek ?
text2: Walipokuwa wanamwingiza ndani ya ngome , Paulo alimwomba mkuu wa jeshi akisema , " Naweza kukwambia kitu ? " Yule mkuu wa jeshi akamjibu , " Je unajua Kigiriki ?

text: Art not thou that Egyptian , which before these days madest an uproar , and leddest out into the wilderness four thousand men that were murderers ?
text2: Kwani wewe si yule Mmisri ambaye hivi majuzi alianzisha uasi na kuwaongoza majahili elfu nne hadi jangwani ? "

text: But Paul said , I am a man which am a Jew of Tarsus , a city in Cilicia , a citizen of no mean city : and , I beseech thee , suffer me to speak unto the people .
text2: Paulo akajibu , " Mimi ni Myahudi , mzaliwa wa Tarso katika Kilikia ; mimi ni raia wa mji maarufu . Tafadhali , niruhusu niongee na watu .

text: And when he had given him licence , Paul stood on the stairs , and beckoned with the hand unto the people . And when there was made a great silence , he spake unto them in the Hebrew tongue , saying ,
text2: Yule mkuu wa jeshi akamruhusu . Hivyo Paulo alisimama juu ya ngazi , akawapungia mkono wale watu na walipokaa kimya , akaanza kuongea nao kwa Kiebrania .

text: Men , brethren , and fathers , hear ye my defence which I make now unto you .
text2: " Ndugu zangu na akina baba , nisikilizeni sasa nikijitetea mbele yenu ! "

text: ( And when they heard that he spake in the Hebrew tongue to them , they kept the more silence : and he saith , )
text2: Waliposikia akiongea nao kwa Kiebrania wakazidi kukaa kimya zaidi kuliko hapo awali . Naye Paulo akaendelea kusema ,

text: I am verily a man which am a Jew , born in Tarsus , a city in Cilicia , yet brought up in this city at the feet of Gamaliel , and taught according to the perfect manner of the law of the fathers , and was zealous toward God , as ye all are this day .
text2: " Mimi ni Myahudi , mzaliwa wa Tarso katika Kilikia . Lakini nililelewa papa hapa mjini Yerusalemu chini ya mkufunzi Gamalieli . Nilifundishwa kufuata kwa uthabiti Sheria ya wazee wetu . Nilijitolea kwa moyo wote kwa Mungu kama ninyi wenyewe mlivyo hivi leo .

text: And I persecuted this way unto the death , binding and delivering into prisons both men and women .
text2: Niliwatesa hata kuwaua wale watu waliofuata Njia hii . Niliwatia nguvuni wanaume kwa wanawake na kuwafunga gerezani .

text: As also the high priest doth bear me witness , and all the estate of the elders : from whom also I received letters unto the brethren , and went to Damascus , to bring them which were there bound unto Jerusalem , for to be punished .
text2: Kuhani Mkuu na baraza lote la wazee wanaweza kushuhudia jambo hilo . Kutoka kwao nilipokea barua walioandikiwa wale ndugu Wayahudi waliokuwa huko Damasko . Nilikwenda Damasko ili niwatie nguvuni watu hao na kuwaleta wamefungwa mpaka Yerusalemu ili waadhibiwe .

text: And it came to pass , that , as I made my journey , and was come nigh unto Damascus about noon , suddenly there shone from heaven a great light round about me .
text2: " Basi , nilipokuwa njiani karibu kufika Damasko , yapata saa sita mchana , mwangu mkubwa kutoka mbinguni ulitokea ghafla ukaniangazia pande zote .

text: And I fell unto the ground , and heard a voice saying unto me , Saul , Saul , why persecutest thou me ?
text2: Hapo nilianguka chini , nikasikia sauti ikiniambia : Saulo , Saulo ! Kwa nini unanitesa ?

text: And I answered , Who art thou , Lord ? And he said unto me , I am Jesus of Nazareth , whom thou persecutest .
text2: Nami nikauliza : Nani wewe , Bwana ? Naye akaniambia : Mimi ni Yesu wa Nazareti ambaye wewe unamtesa .

text: And they that were with me saw indeed the light , and were afraid ; but they heard not the voice of him that spake to me .
text2: Wale wenzangu waliuona ule mwanga lakini hawakusikia sauti ya yule aliyeongea nami .

text: And I said , What shall I do , Lord ? And the Lord said unto me , Arise , and go into Damascus ; and there it shall be told thee of all things which are appointed for thee to do .
text2: Basi , mimi nikauliza : Nifanye nini Bwana ? Naye Bwana akaniambia : Simama , nenda Damasko na huko utaambiwa yote ambayo umepangiwa kufanya .

text: And when I could not see for the glory of that light , being led by the hand of them that were with me , I came into Damascus .
text2: Kutokana na ule mwanga mkali sikuweza kuona na hivyo iliwabidi wale wenzangu kuniongoza kwa kunishika mkono mpaka nikafika Damasko .

text: And one Ananias , a devout man according to the law , having a good report of all the Jews which dwelt there ,
text2: " Huko kulikuwa na mtu mmoja aitwaye Anania , mtu mcha Mungu , mwenye kuitii Sheria yetu na aliyeheshimika sana mbele ya Wayahudi waliokuwa wanaishi Damasko .

text: Came unto me , and stood , and said unto me , Brother Saul , receive thy sight . And the same hour I looked up upon him .
text2: Yeye alikuja kuniona , akasimama karibu nami , akasema : Ndugu Saulo ! Ona tena . Papo hapo nikaona tena , nikamwangalia .

text: And he said , The God of our fathers hath chosen thee , that thou shouldest know his will , and see that Just One , and shouldest hear the voice of his mouth .
text2: Halafu Anania akasema : Mungu wa babu zetu amekuchagua upate kujua matakwa yake na kumwona yule mtumishi wake mwadilifu na kumsikia yeye mwenyewe akiongea .

text: For thou shalt be his witness unto all men of what thou hast seen and heard .
text2: Kwa maana utamshuhudia kwa watu wote ukiwaambia yale uliyoyaona na kuyasikia .

text: And now why tarriest thou ? arise , and be baptized , and wash away thy sins , calling on the name of the Lord .
text2: Sasa basi , ya nini kukawia zaidi ? Simama ubatizwe na uondolewe dhambi zako kwa kuliungama jina lake .

text: And it came to pass , that , when I was come again to Jerusalem , even while I prayed in the temple , I was in a trance ;
text2: " Basi , nilirudi Yerusalemu , na nilipokuwa nikisali Hekaluni , niliona maono .

text: And saw him saying unto me , Make haste , and get thee quickly out of Jerusalem : for they will not receive thy testimony concerning me .
text2: Nilimwona Bwana akiniambia : Haraka ! Ondoka Yerusalemu upesi kwa maana watu wa hapa binadamu hawataukubali ushuhuda wako juu yangu .

text: And I said , Lord , they know that I imprisoned and beat in every synagogue them that believed on thee :
text2: Nami nikamjibu : Bwana , wao wanajua wazi kwamba mimi ni yule aliyekuwa anapitapita katika masunagogi na kuwatia nguvuni na kuwapiga wale waliokuwa wanakuamini .

text: And when the blood of thy martyr Stephen was shed , I also was standing by , and consenting unto his death , and kept the raiment of them that slew him .
text2: Na kwamba wakati shahidi wako Stefano alipouawa , mimi binafsi nilikuwako pale nikakubaliana na kitendo hicho na kuyalinda makoti ya wale waliokuwa wanamuua .

text: And he said unto me , Depart : for I will send thee far hence unto the Gentiles .
text2: Naye Bwana akaniambia : Nenda ; ninakutuma mbali kwa mataifa mengine . "

text: And they gave him audience unto this word , and then lifted up their voices , and said , Away with such a fellow from the earth : for it is not fit that he should live .
text2: Mpaka hapa , wale watu walikuwa wanamsikiza , lakini aliposema maneno haya , walianza kusema kwa sauti kubwa , " Mwondoe duniani ! Mtu wa namna hiyo hastahili kuishi . "

text: And as they cried out , and cast off their clothes , and threw dust into the air ,
text2: Waliendelea kupayukapayuka huku wakitikisa makoti yao na kurusha vumbi angani .

text: The chief captain commanded him to be brought into the castle , and bade that he should be examined by scourging ; that he might know wherefore they cried so against him .
text2: Mkuu wa jeshi aliwaamuru watu wake wampeleke Paulo ndani ya ngome , akawaambia wamchape viboko ili wapate kujua kisa cha Wayahudi kumpigia kelele .

text: And as they bound him with thongs , Paul said unto the centurion that stood by , Is it lawful for you to scourge a man that is a Roman , and uncondemned ?
text2: Lakini walipokwisha mfunga ili wamchape viboko , Paulo alimwuliza jemadari mmoja aliyesimama hapo , " Je , ni halali kwenu kumpiga viboko raia wa Roma kabla hajahukumiwa ? "

text: When the centurion heard that , he went and told the chief captain , saying , Take heed what thou doest : for this man is a Roman .
text2: Yule jemadari aliposikia hayo , alimpasha habari mkuu wa jeshi akisema , " Unataka kufanya nini ? Mtu huyu ni raia wa Roma ! "

text: Then the chief captain came , and said unto him , Tell me , art thou a Roman ? He said , Yea .
text2: Basi , mkuu wa jeshi alimwendea Paulo , akamwambia , " Niambie ; je , wewe ni raia wa Roma ? " Paulo akamjibu , " Naam . "

text: And the chief captain answered , With a great sum obtained I this freedom . And Paul said , But I was free born .
text2: Mkuu wa jeshi akasema , " Mimi nami nimekuwa raia wa Roma kwa kulipa gharama kubwa . " Paulo akasema , " Lakini mimi ni raia wa Roma kwa kuzaliwa . "

text: Then straightway they departed from him which should have examined him : and the chief captain also was afraid , after he knew that he was a Roman , and because he had bound him .
text2: Wale watu ambao walikuwa tayari kumchunguza Paulo walitoweka mara . Hata yule mkuu wa jeshi aliogopa alipojua kwamba Paulo ni raia wa Roma na kwamba alikuwa amekwisha mfunga minyororo .

text: On the morrow , because he would have known the certainty wherefore he was accused of the Jews , he loosed him from his bands , and commanded the chief priests and all their council to appear , and brought Paul down , and set him before them .
text2: Kesho yake , mkuu wa jeshi alitaka kujua mashtaka kamili ambayo Wayahudi walikuwa wamemwekea Paulo . Hivyo , alimfungua Paulo minyororo , akaamuru makuhani wakuu na Baraza lote wafanye kikao . Kisha alimleta Paulo , akamsimamisha mbele ya Baraza .

text: And Paul , earnestly beholding the council , said , Men and brethren , I have lived in all good conscience before God until this day .
text2: Paulo aliwakodolea macho wale wanabaraza , halafu akaanza kusema , " Ndugu zangu , mpaka hivi leo nimekuwa nikiishi na dhamiri njema mbele ya Mungu . "

text: And the high priest Ananias commanded them that stood by him to smite him on the mouth .
text2: Hapo Kuhani Mkuu Anania akaamuru wale waliokuwa wamesimama karibu na Paulo wampige kofi mdomoni .

text: Then said Paul unto him , God shall smite thee , thou whited wall : for sittest thou to judge me after the law , and commandest me to be smitten contrary to the law ?
text2: Basi , Paulo akamwambia , " Mungu mwenyewe atakupiga kofi wewe uliye kama ukuta uliopakwa chokaa ! Unawezaje kukaa hapo ili unihukumu kisheria na huku wewe mwenyewe unaivunja Sheria kwa kuamuru nipigwe ? "

text: And they that stood by said , Revilest thou God ' s high priest ?
text2: Watu waliokuwa wamesimama pale wakamwambia Paulo , " Unamtukana Kuhani Mkuu wa Mungu ! "

text: Then said Paul , I wist not , brethren , that he was the high priest : for it is written , Thou shalt not speak evil of the ruler of thy people .
text2: Paulo akajibu , " Ndugu zangu , sikujua kama yeye ni Kuhani Mkuu . Maana Maandiko yasema hivi : Usiseme vibaya juu ya mtawala wa watu wako . "

text: But when Paul perceived that the one part were Sadducees , and the other Pharisees , he cried out in the council , Men and brethren , I am a Pharisee , the son of a Pharisee : of the hope and resurrection of the dead I am called in question .
text2: Wakati huo Paulo alikwisha tambua kwamba sehemu moja ya wanabaraza wale ilikuwa ni Masadukayo na nyingine Mafarisayo . Basi , alipaaza sauti yake mbele ya Baraza : " Ndugu zangu , mimi ni Mfarisayo , mwana wa Mfarisayo . Mimi nimeletwa mahakamani kwa kuwa ninatumaini kwamba wafu watafufuka . "

text: And when he had so said , there arose a dissension between the Pharisees and the Sadducees : and the multitude was divided .
text2: Baada ya kusema hivyo , mzozo mkali ulitokea kati ya Mafarisayo na Masadukayo na mkutano ukagawanyika sehemu mbili .

text: For the Sadducees say that there is no resurrection , neither angel , nor spirit : but the Pharisees confess both .
text2: Kisa chenyewe kilikuwa hiki : Masadukayo hushikilia kwamba wafu hawafufuki , hakuna malaika , na roho nazo hazipo . Lakini Mafarisayo husadiki hayo yote matatu .

text: And there arose a great cry : and the scribes that were of the Pharisees ' part arose , and strove , saying , We find no evil in this man : but if a spirit or an angel hath spoken to him , let us not fight against God .
text2: Kelele ziliongezeka na baadhi ya walimu wa Sheria wa kikundi cha Mafarisayo walisimama na kutoa malalamiko yao kwa nguvu : " Hatuoni chochote kilicho kiovu katika mtu huyu ; huenda ikawa kwamba roho au malaika ameongea naye . "

text: And when there arose a great dissension , the chief captain , fearing lest Paul should have been pulled in pieces of them , commanded the soldiers to go down , and to take him by force from among them , and to bring him into the castle .
text2: Mzozo ulizidi kuwa mwingi hata mkuu wa jeshi akaogopa kwamba Paulo angeraruliwa vipandevipande . Kwa hiyo , aliwaamuru askari wake kuingia kati ya lile kundi , wamtoe Paulo na kumrudisha ndani ya ngome .

text: And the night following the Lord stood by him , and said , Be of good cheer , Paul : for as thou hast testified of me in Jerusalem , so must thou bear witness also at Rome .
text2: Usiku uliofuata , Bwana alisimama karibu na Paulo , akamwambia , " Jipe moyo ! Umenishuhudia katika Yerusalemu , utafanya vivyo hivyo mjini Roma . "

text: And when it was day , certain of the Jews banded together , and bound themselves under a curse , saying that they would neither eat nor drink till they had killed Paul .
text2: Kulipokucha , Wayahudi walifanya kikao cha faragha . Wakala kiapo : " Hatutakula wala kunywa mpaka tutakapokuwa tumekwisha muua Paulo . "

text: And they were more than forty which had made this conspiracy .
text2: Watu zaidi ya arobaini ndio waliokula njama kufanya hivyo .

text: And they came to the chief priests and elders , and said , We have bound ourselves under a great curse , that we will eat nothing until we have slain Paul .
text2: Basi , walikwenda kwa makuhani wakuu na wazee , wakasema , " Sisi tumeapa kwamba hatutaonja chochote kwa vinywa vyetu mpaka hapo tutakapokuwa tumemuua Paulo .

text: Now therefore ye with the council signify to the chief captain that he bring him down unto you to morrow , as though ye would inquire something more perfectly concerning him : and we , or ever he come near , are ready to kill him .
text2: Sasa basi , ninyi pamoja na Baraza tumeni ujumbe kwa mkuu wa jeshi ili amlete Paulo kwenu mkijisingizia kwamba mnataka kupata habari kamili zaidi juu yake . Tuko tayari kumuua hata kabla hajafika karibu . "

text: And when Paul ' s sister ' s son heard of their lying in wait , he went and entered into the castle , and told Paul .
text2: Lakini mtoto wa kiume wa dada yake Paulo alisikia juu ya mpango huo ; hivyo akaenda ndani ya ngome , akamjulisha Paulo juu ya njama hiyo .

text: Then Paul called one of the centurions unto him , and said , Bring this young man unto the chief captain : for he hath a certain thing to tell him .
text2: Hapo Paulo akamwita mmoja wa askari , akamwambia , " Mchukue kijana huyu kwa mkuu wa jeshi ; ana kitu cha kumwambia . "

text: So he took him , and brought him to the chief captain , and said , Paul the prisoner called me unto him , and prayed me to bring this young man unto thee , who hath something to say unto thee .
text2: Askari akamchukua huyo kijana , akamwongoza mpaka kwa mkuu wa jeshi , akasema , " Yule mfungwa Paulo ameniita akaniomba nimlete kijana huyu kwako kwa maana ana jambo la kukwambia . "

text: Then the chief captain took him by the hand , and went with him aside privately , and asked him , What is that thou hast to tell me ?
text2: Mkuu wa jeshi alimshika huyo kijana mkono , akampeleka mahali pa faragha , akamwuliza , " Una nini cha kuniambia ? "

text: And he said , The Jews have agreed to desire thee that thou wouldest bring down Paul to morrow into the council , as though they would inquire somewhat of him more perfectly .
text2: Yeye akasema , " Wayahudi wamepatana wakuombe umpeleke Paulo Barazani wakijisingizia kwamba Baraza lingependa kupata habari kamili zaidi juu yake .

text: But do not thou yield unto them : for there lie in wait for him of them more than forty men , which have bound themselves with an oath , that they will neither eat nor drink till they have killed him : and now are they ready , looking for a promise from thee .
text2: Lakini wewe usikubali kwa maana kuna watu zaidi ya arobaini walio tayari kumvamia . Wameapa kutokula wala kunywa mpaka watakapokuwa wamemuua . Sasa wako tayari , wanangojea tu uamuzi wako . "

text: So the chief captain then let the young man depart , and charged him , See thou tell no man that thou hast shewed these things to me .
text2: Mkuu wa jeshi alimwacha aende zake akimwonya asimwambie mtu yeyote kwamba amemletea habari hizo .

text: And he called unto him two centurions , saying , Make ready two hundred soldiers to go to Caesarea , and horsemen threescore and ten , and spearmen two hundred , at the third hour of the night ;
text2: Basi , mkuu wa jeshi aliwaita askari wawili akawaambia , " Wekeni tayari askari mia mbili , wapanda farasi sabini na askari mia mbili wa mikuki , waende Kaisarea ; muwe tayari kuondoka kabla ya saa tatu leo usiku .

text: And provide them beasts , that they may set Paul on , and bring him safe unto Felix the governor .
text2: Wekeni farasi kadhaa kwa ajili ya Paulo ; mfikisheni salama kwa Felisi , mkuu wa mkoa . "

text: And he wrote a letter after this manner :
text2: Halafu mkuu huyo wa jeshi akaandika barua hivi :

text: Claudius Lysias unto the most excellent governor Felix sendeth greeting .
text2: " Mimi Klaudio Lusia ninakuandikia wewe Mheshimiwa Felisi , mkuu wa mkoa . Salamu !

text: This man was taken of the Jews , and should have been killed of them : then came I with an army , and rescued him , having understood that he was a Roman .
text2: " Wayahudi walimkamata mtu huyu na karibu wangemuua kama nisingalifahamishwa kwamba yeye ni raia wa Roma na hivyo nikaenda pamoja na askari nikamwokoa .

text: And when I would have known the cause wherefore they accused him , I brought him forth into their council :
text2: Nilimpeleka mbele ya Baraza lao kuu nikitaka kujua kisa cha mashtaka yao .

text: Whom I perceived to be accused of questions of their law , but to have nothing laid to his charge worthy of death or of bonds .
text2: Niligundua kwamba mashtaka yenyewe yalihusu ubishi juu ya sehemu kadha wa kadha za Sheria yao na hivyo sikuona kwamba amefanya chochote kinachostahili auawe au afungwe gerezani .

text: And when it was told me how that the Jews laid wait for the man , I sent straightway to thee , and gave commandment to his accusers also to say before thee what they had against him . Farewell .
text2: Nilipofahamishwa kwamba Wayahudi walikuwa wamefanya njama za kumuua , niliamua kumleta kwako . Nikamwambia washtaki wake walete mashtaka yao mbele yako . "

text: Then the soldiers , as it was commanded them , took Paul , and brought him by night to Antipatris .
text2: Basi , hao askari walimchukua Paulo kama walivyoamriwa ; wakampeleka usiku uleule mpaka Antipatri .

text: On the morrow they left the horsemen to go with him , and returned to the castle :
text2: Kesho yake askari wa miguu walirudi ngomeni , wakawaacha wale askari wapanda farasi waendelee na safari pamoja na Paulo .

text: Who , when they came to Caesarea , and delivered the epistle to the governor , presented Paul also before him .
text2: Walipofika Kaisarea walimpa mkuu wa mkoa ile barua na kumweka Paulo chini ya mamlaka yake .

text: And when the governor had read the letter , he asked of what province he was . And when he understood that he was of Cilicia ;
text2: Felisi alipoisoma hiyo barua aliwauliza Paulo ametoka mkoa gani . Alipofahamishwa kwamba alikuwa ametoka mkoa wa Kilikia ,

text: I will hear thee , said he , when thine accusers are also come . And he commanded him to be kept in Herod ' s judgment hall .
text2: akasema , " Nitasikiliza kesi yako baada ya washtaki wako kufika . " Kisha akaamuru Paulo awekwe chini ya ulinzi ndani ya ukumbi wa Herode .

text: And after five days Ananias the high priest descended with the elders , and with a certain orator named Tertullus , who informed the governor against Paul .
text2: Baada ya siku tano , Kuhani Mkuu Anania aliwasili Kaisarea pamoja na wazee kadhaa na wakili mmoja wa sheria aitwaye Tertulo . Walimwendea yule mkuu wa mkoa wakamweleza mashtaka yao juu ya Paulo .

text: And when he was called forth , Tertullus began to accuse him , saying , Seeing that by thee we enjoy great quietness , and that very worthy deeds are done unto this nation by thy providence ,
text2: Paulo aliitwa na Tertulo akafungua mashtaka hivi : " Mheshimiwa Felisi , uongozi wako bora umeleta amani kubwa na marekebisho ya lazima yanafanywa kwa manufaa ya taifa letu .

text: We accept it always , and in all places , most noble Felix , with all thankfulness .
text2: Tunalipokea jambo hili kwa furaha daima na kutoa shukrani nyingi kwako kila mahali .

text: Notwithstanding , that I be not further tedious unto thee , I pray thee that thou wouldest hear us of thy clemency a few words .
text2: Lakini , bila kupoteza wakati wako zaidi , tunakusihi kwa wema wako , usikilize taarifa yetu fupi .

text: For we have found this man a pestilent fellow , and a mover of sedition among all the Jews throughout the world , and a ringleader of the sect of the Nazarenes :
text2: Tumegundua kwamba mtu huyu ni wa hatari mno . Yeye huanzisha ghasia kati ya Wayahudi kila mahali duniani na pia ni kiongozi wa kile chama cha Wanazareti .

text: Who also hath gone about to profane the temple : whom we took , and would have judged according to our law .
text2: Tena alijaribu kulikufuru Hekalu nasi tukamtia nguvuni . Kama ukimhoji wewe mwenyewe , utaweza kubainisha mambo haya yote tunayomshtaki kwayo . " Tulitaka kumhukumu kufuatana na Sheria yetu .

text: But the chief captain Lysias came upon us , and with great violence took him away out of our hands ,
text2: Lakini Lusia , mkuu wa jeshi , aliingilia kati , akamchukua kwa nguvu kutoka mikononi mwetu .

text: Commanding his accusers to come unto thee : by examining of whom thyself mayest take knowledge of all these things , whereof we accuse him .
text2: Kisha akaamuru washtaki wake waje mbele yako .

text: And the Jews also assented , saying that these things were so .
text2: Nao Wayahudi waliunga mkono mashtaka hayo wakisema kwamba hayo yote yalikuwa kweli .

text: Then Paul , after that the governor had beckoned unto him to speak , answered , Forasmuch as I know that thou hast been of many years a judge unto this nation , I do the more cheerfully answer for myself :
text2: Basi , mkuu wa mkoa alimwashiria Paulo aseme . Naye Paulo akasema , " Nafurahi kujitetea mbele yako nikijua kwamba umekuwa hakimu wa taifa hili kwa miaka mingi .

text: Because that thou mayest understand , that there are yet but twelve days since I went up to Jerusalem for to worship .
text2: Unaweza kujihakikishia kwamba si zaidi ya siku kumi na mbili tu zimepita tangu nilipokwenda kuabudu Yerusalemu .

text: And they neither found me in the temple disputing with any man , neither raising up the people , neither in the synagogues , nor in the city :
text2: Wayahudi hawakunikuta nikijadiliana na mtu yeyote . Hawakunikuta nikichochea watu Hekaluni wala katika masunagogi yao , wala mahali pengine popote katika mji huo .

text: Neither can they prove the things whereof they now accuse me .
text2: Wala hawawezi kuthibitisha mashtaka waliyotoa juu yangu .

text: But this I confess unto thee , that after the way which they call heresy , so worship I the God of my fathers , believing all things which are written in the law and in the prophets :
text2: Ninachokubali mbele yako ni hiki : Mimi ninamwabudu Mungu na wazee wetu nikiishi kufuatana na Njia ile ambayo wao wanaiita chama cha uzushi . Ninaamini mambo yote yaliyoandikwa katika vitabu vya Sheria na manabii .

text: And have hope toward God , which they themselves also allow , that there shall be a resurrection of the dead , both of the just and unjust .
text2: Mimi namtumainia Mungu , na wao wanalo tumaini hilo , kwamba watu , wema na wabaya , watafufuka .

text: And herein do I exercise myself , to have always a conscience void of offence toward God , and toward men .
text2: Kwa hiyo ninajitahidi daima kuwa na dhamiri njema mbele ya Mungu na mbele ya watu .

text: Now after many years I came to bring alms to my nation , and offerings .
text2: " Baada ya kukaa mbali kwa miaka kadhaa , nilirudi Yerusalemu ili kuwapelekea wananchi wenzangu msaada na kutoa dhabihu .

text: Whereupon certain Jews from Asia found me purified in the temple , neither with multitude , nor with tumult .
text2: Wakati nilipokuwa nikifanya hayo ndipo waliponikuta Hekaluni , nilipokuwa nimekwisha fanya ile ibada ya kujitakasa . Hakukuwako kundi la watu wala ghasia .

text: Who ought to have been here before thee , and object , if they had ought against me .
text2: Lakini kulikuwa na Wayahudi wengine kutoka mkoa wa Asia ; hao ndio wangepaswa kuwa hapa mbele yako na kutoa mashtaka yao kama wana chochote cha kusema dhidi yangu .

text: Or else let these same here say , if they have found any evil doing in me , while I stood before the council ,
text2: Au , waache hawa walio hapa waseme kosa waliloliona kwangu wakati niliposimama mbele ya Baraza lao kuu ,

text: Except it be for this one voice , that I cried standing among them , Touching the resurrection of the dead I am called in question by you this day .
text2: isipokuwa tu maneno haya niliyosema niliposimama mbele yao : Mnanihukumu leo hii kwa sababu ya kushikilia kwamba wafu watafufuliwa ! "

text: And when Felix heard these things , having more perfect knowledge of that way , he deferred them , and said , When Lysias the chief captain shall come down , I will know the uttermost of your matter .
text2: Hapo , Felisi , ambaye mwenyewe alikuwa anaifahamu hiyo Njia vizuri , aliahirisha kesi hiyo . Akawaambia , " Nitatoa hukumu juu ya kesi hiyo wakati Luisa , mkuu wa jeshi , atakapokuja hapa . "

text: And he commanded a centurion to keep Paul , and to let him have liberty , and that he should forbid none of his acquaintance to minister or come unto him .
text2: Kisha akamwamuru yule jemadari amweke Paulo kizuizini , lakini awe na uhuru kiasi , na rafiki zake wasizuiwe kumpatia mahitaji yake .

text: And after certain days , when Felix came with his wife Drusilla , which was a Jewess , he sent for Paul , and heard him concerning the faith in Christ .
text2: Baada ya siku chache , Felisi alifika pamoja na mkewe Drusila ambaye alikuwa Myahudi . Aliamuru Paulo aletwe , akamsikiliza akiongea juu ya kumwamini Yesu Kristo .

text: And as he reasoned of righteousness , temperance , and judgment to come Felix trembled , and answered , Go thy way for this time ; when I have a convenient season , I will call for thee .
text2: Lakini wakati Paulo alipoanza kuongea juu ya uadilifu , juu ya kuwa na kiasi na juu ya siku ya hukumu inayokuja , Felisi aliogopa , akasema , " Kwa sasa unaweza kwenda ; nitakuita tena nitakapopata nafasi . "

text: He hoped also that money should have been given him of Paul , that he might loose him : wherefore he sent for him the oftener , and communed with him .
text2: Wakati huohuo alikuwa anatumaini kwamba Paulo angempa fedha . Kwa sababu hii alimwita Paulo mara kwa mara na kuzungumza naye .

text: But after two years Porcius Festus came into Felix ' room : and Felix , willing to shew the Jews a pleasure , left Paul bound .
text2: Baada ya miaka miwili , Porkio Festo alichukua nafasi ya Felisi , akawa mkuu wa Mkoa . Kwa kuwa alitaka kujipendekeza kwa Wayahudi , Felisi alimwacha Paulo kizuizini .

text: Now when Festus was come into the province , after three days he ascended from Caesarea to Jerusalem .
text2: Siku tatu baada ya kufika mkoani , Festo alitoka Kaisarea , akaenda Yerusalemu .

text: Then the high priest and the chief of the Jews informed him against Paul , and besought him ,
text2: Makuhani wakuu pamoja na viongozi wa Wayahudi walimpa habari kuhusu mashtaka yaliyokuwa yanamkabili Paulo . Walimsihi Festo

text: And desired favour against him , that he would send for him to Jerusalem , laying wait in the way to kill him .
text2: awafanyie fadhili kwa kumleta Paulo Yerusalemu ; walikuwa wamekula njama wamuue akiwa njiani .

text: But Festus answered , that Paul should be kept at Caesarea , and that he himself would depart shortly thither .
text2: Lakini Festo alijibu , " Paulo atabaki kizuizini kule Kaisarea na mimi nitakwenda huko karibuni .

text: Let them therefore , said he , which among you are able , go down with me , and accuse this man , if there be any wickedness in him .
text2: Waacheni viongozi wenu waende huko pamoja nami wakatoe mashtaka yao juu yake kama amefanya chochote kiovu . "

text: And when he had tarried among them more than ten days , he went down unto Caesarea ; and the next day sitting on the judgment seat commanded Paul to be brought .
text2: Festo alikaa nao kwa muda wa siku nane au kumi hivi , kisha akarudi Kaisarea . Kesho yake alikwenda barazani , akaamuru Paulo aletwe ndani .

text: And when he was come , the Jews which came down from Jerusalem stood round about , and laid many and grievous complaints against Paul , which they could not prove .
text2: Wakati Paulo alipofika , Wayahudi waliokuwa wametoka Yerusalemu walimzunguka wakaanza kutoa mashtaka mengi mazitomazito ambayo hawakuweza kuthibitisha .

text: While he answered for himself , Neither against the law of the Jews , neither against the temple , nor yet against Caesar , have I offended any thing at all .
text2: Kwa kujitetea , Paulo alisema , " Mimi sikufanya kosa lolote kuhusu Sheria ya Wayahudi , wala kuhusu Hekalu , wala kumhusu Kaisari . "

text: But Festus , willing to do the Jews a pleasure , answered Paul , and said , Wilt thou go up to Jerusalem , and there be judged of these things before me ?
text2: Festo alitaka kujipendekeza kwa Wayahudi na hivyo akamwuliza Paulo , " Je , ungependa kwenda Yerusalemu na huko ukahukumiwe mbele yangu kuhusu mashtaka haya ? "

text: Then said Paul , I stand at Caesar ' s judgment seat , where I ought to be judged : to the Jews have I done no wrong , as thou very well knowest .
text2: Paulo akajibu , " Nasimama mbele ya mahakama ya Kaisari na papa hapa ndipo ninapopaswa kupewa hukumu . Kama unavyojua vizuri , sikuwatendea Wayahudi ubaya wowote .

text: For if I be an offender , or have committed any thing worthy of death , I refuse not to die : but if there be none of these things whereof these accuse me , no man may deliver me unto them . I appeal unto Caesar .
text2: Basi , ikiwa nimepatikana na kosa linalostahili adhabu ya kifo , siombi kusamehewa adhabu hiyo . Lakini kama hakuna ukweli katika mashtaka waliyotoa watu hawa , hakuna awezaye kunikabidhi kwao . Nakata rufani kwa Kaisari ! "

text: Then Festus , when he had conferred with the council , answered , Hast thou appealed unto Caesar ? unto Caesar shalt thou go .
text2: Basi , baada ya Festo kuzungumza na washauri wake , akamwambia Paulo , " Umekata rufani kwa Kaisari , basi , utakwenda kwa Kaisari . "

text: And after certain days king Agrippa and Bernice came unto Caesarea to salute Festus .
text2: Siku chache baadaye , mfalme Agripa na Bernike walifika Kaisarea ili kutoa heshima zao kwa Festo .

text: And when they had been there many days , Festus declared Paul ' s cause unto the king , saying , There is a certain man left in bonds by Felix :
text2: Walikuwa huko siku kadhaa naye Festo akamweleza mfalme kesi ya Paulo : " Kuna mtu mmoja hapa ambaye Felisi alimwacha kizuizini .

text: About whom , when I was at Jerusalem , the chief priests and the elders of the Jews informed me , desiring to have judgment against him .
text2: Nilipokwenda Yerusalemu makuhani wakuu na wazee wa Wayahudi walimshtaki na kuniomba nimhukumu .

text: To whom I answered , It is not the manner of the Romans to deliver any man to die , before that he which is accused have the accusers face to face , and have licence to answer for himself concerning the crime laid against him .
text2: Lakini mimi niliwajibu kwamba si desturi ya Waroma kumtoa mtu aadhibiwe kabla mshtakiwa hajakutana na washtaki wake ana kwa ana na kupewa fursa ya kujitetea kuhusu hayo mashtaka .

text: Therefore , when they were come hither , without any delay on the morrow I sat on the judgment seat , and commanded the man to be brought forth .
text2: Basi , walipofika hapa sikukawia , ila nilifanya kikao mahakamani kesho yake , nikaamuru mtu huyo aletwe .

text: Against whom when the accusers stood up , they brought none accusation of such things as I supposed :
text2: Washtaki wake walisimama lakini hawakutoa mashtaka maovu kama nilivyokuwa ninatazamia .

text: But had certain questions against him of their own superstition , and of one Jesus , which was dead , whom Paul affirmed to be alive .
text2: Ila tu walikuwa na mabishano kadhaa pamoja naye kuhusu dini yao na kuhusu mtu mmoja aitwaye Yesu ambaye alikufa , lakini Paulo anashikilia kwamba yu hai .

text: And because I doubted of such manner of questions , I asked him whether he would go to Jerusalem , and there be judged of these matters .
text2: Sikujua la kufanya kuhusu shauri hilo . Basi , nilimwuliza Paulo kama angependa kwenda mahakamani kule Yerusalemu kwa ajili ya mashtaka hayo .

text: But when Paul had appealed to be reserved unto the hearing of Augustus , I commanded him to be kept till I might send him to Caesar .
text2: Lakini Paulo alikata rufani , akaomba aachwe kizuizini mpaka uamuzi wa shauri hilo ufanywe na Kaisari . Kwa hiyo niliamua akae kizuizini mpaka nitakapoweza kumpeleka kwa Kaisari . "

text: Then Agrippa said unto Festus , I would also hear the man myself . To morrow , said he , thou shalt hear him .
text2: Basi Agripa akamwambia Festo , " Ningependa kumsikia mtu huyu mimi mwenyewe . " Festo akamwambia , " Utamsikia kesho . "

text: And on the morrow , when Agrippa was come , and Bernice , with great pomp , and was entered into the place of hearing , with the chief captains , and principal men of the city , at Festus ' commandment Paul was brought forth .
text2: Hivyo , kesho yake , Agripa na Bernike walifika kwa shangwe katika ukumbi wa mkutano wakiwa wameandamana na wakuu wa majeshi na viongozi wa mji . Festo aliamuru Paulo aletwe ndani ,

text: And Festus said , King Agrippa , and all men which are here present with us , ye see this man , about whom all the multitude of the Jews have dealt with me , both at Jerusalem , and also here , crying that he ought not to live any longer .
text2: Kisha akasema , " Mfalme Agripa na wote mlioko hapa pamoja nasi ! Hapa mbele yenu yuko mtu ambaye jumuiya yote ya Wayahudi hapa na kule Yerusalemu walinilalamikia wakipiga kelele kwamba hastahili kuishi tena .

text: But when I found that he had committed nothing worthy of death , and that he himself hath appealed to Augustus , I have determined to send him .
text2: Lakini mimi sikuona kuwa alikuwa ametenda chochote kibaya hata astahili kupewa adhabu ya kifo . Lakini , kwa vile Paulo mwenyewe alikata rufani kwa Kaisari , niliamua kumpeleka .

text: Of whom I have no certain thing to write unto my lord . Wherefore I have brought him forth before you , and specially before thee , O king Agrippa , that , after examination had , I might have somewhat to write .
text2: Kwa upande wangu sina habari kamili ambayo naweza kumwandikia Kaisari juu yake . Ndiyo maana nimemleta hapa mbele yenu na mbele yako mfalme Agripa , ili baada ya kumchunguza , niweze kuwa na la kuandika .

text: For it seemeth to me unreasonable to send a prisoner , and not withal to signify the crimes laid against him .
text2: Kwa maana nadhani itakuwa kichekesho kumpeleka mfungwa bila kutaja wazi mashtaka yanayomkabili . "

text: Then Agrippa said unto Paul , Thou art permitted to speak for thyself . Then Paul stretched forth the hand , and answered for himself :
text2: Basi , Agripa akamwambia Paulo , " Unaruhusiwa kujitetea . " Hapo Paulo alinyosha mkono wake akajitetea hivi :

text: I think myself happy , king Agrippa , because I shall answer for myself this day before thee touching all the things whereof I am accused of the Jews :
text2: " Mfalme Agripa , ninajiona mwenye bahati leo kujitetea mbele yako kuhusu yale mashtaka yote ambayo Wayahudi walikuwa wamesema juu yangu .

text: Especially because I know thee to be expert in all customs and questions which are among the Jews : wherefore I beseech thee to hear me patiently .
text2: Hasa kwa vile wewe mwenyewe ni mtaalamu wa desturi za Wayahudi na migogoro yao , ninakuomba basi unisikilize kwa uvumilivu .

text: My manner of life from my youth , which was at the first among mine own nation at Jerusalem , know all the Jews ;
text2: " Wayahudi wanajua habari za maisha yangu tangu utoto , jinsi nilivyoishi tangu mwanzo kati ya taifa langu huko Yerusalemu .

text: Which knew me from the beginning , if they would testify , that after the most straitest sect of our religion I lived a Pharisee .
text2: Wananifahamu kwa muda mrefu , na wanaweza kushuhudia , kama wakipenda , kwamba tangu mwanzo niliishi kama mmoja wa kikundi chenye siasa kali zaidi katika dini yetu , yaani kikundi cha Mafarisayo .

text: And now I stand and am judged for the hope of the promise made of God unto our fathers :
text2: Na sasa niko hapa nihukumiwe kwa sababu ninaitumainia ile ahadi ambayo Mungu aliwaahidia babu zetu .

text: Unto which promise our twelve tribes , instantly serving God day and night , hope to come . For which hope ' s sake , king Agrippa , I am accused of the Jews .
text2: Ahadi hiyo ndiyo ileile inayotumainiwa na makabila kumi na mawili ya taifa letu , wakimtumikia Mungu kwa dhati mchana na usiku . Mheshimiwa mfalme , Wayahudi wananishtaki kwa sababu ya tumaini hilo !

text: Why should it be thought a thing incredible with you , that God should raise the dead ?
text2: Kwa nini ninyi mnaona shida sana kuamini kwamba Mungu huwafufua wafu ?

text: I verily thought with myself , that I ought to do many things contrary to the name of Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Kwa kweli mimi mwenyewe niliamini kwamba ni wajibu wangu kufanya mambo mengi kulipinga jina la Yesu wa Nazareti .

text: Which thing I also did in Jerusalem : and many of the saints did I shut up in prison , having received authority from the chief priests ; and when they were put to death , I gave my voice against them .
text2: Mambo hayo ndiyo niliyoyafanya huko Yerusalemu . Mimi binafsi , nikiwa nimepewa mamlaka kutoka kwa makuhani wakuu , nilipata kuwatia gerezani wengi wa watu wa Mungu . Nao walipohukumiwa kuuawa , nilipiga kura ya kukubali .

text: And I punished them oft in every synagogue , and compelled them to blaspheme ; and being exceedingly mad against them , I persecuted them even unto strange cities .
text2: Mara nyingi niliwafanya waadhibiwe katika masunagogi yote nikiwashurutisha waikane imani yao . Hasira yangu kwao ilikuwa kubwa hata nikawasaka mpaka miji ya mbali .

text: Whereupon as I went to Damascus with authority and commission from the chief priests ,
text2: " Kwa mujibu huohuo , nilikwenda Damasko wakati mmoja , nikiwa na mamlaka na maagizo kutoka kwa makuhani wakuu .

text: At midday , O king , I saw in the way a light from heaven , above the brightness of the sun , shining round about me and them which journeyed with me .
text2: Mheshimiwa , wakati nilipokuwa njiani , saa sita mchana , niliona mwanga mkubwa kuliko wa jua ukiangaza kutoka mbinguni , ukanizunguka mimi na wale wasafiri wenzangu .

text: And when we were all fallen to the earth , I heard a voice speaking unto me , and saying in the Hebrew tongue , Saul , Saul , why persecutest thou me ? it is hard for thee to kick against the pricks .
text2: Sisi sote tulianguka chini , nami nikasikia sauti ikiniambia kwa Kiebrania : Saulo , Saulo ! Kwa nini unanitesa ? Unajiumiza bure kama punda anayepiga teke fimbo ya bwana wake .

text: And I said , Who art thou , Lord ? And he said , I am Jesus whom thou persecutest .
text2: Mimi nikauliza : Ni nani wewe Bwana ? Naye Bwana akajibu : Mimi ni Yesu ambaye wewe unamtesa .

text: But rise , and stand upon thy feet : for I have appeared unto thee for this purpose , to make thee a minister and a witness both of these things which thou hast seen , and of those things in the which I will appear unto thee ;
text2: Haidhuru , inuka sasa ; simama wima . Nimekutokea ili nikuweke rasmi kuwa mtumishi wangu . Utawathibitishia watu wengine mambo uliyoyaona leo na yale ambayo bado nitakuonyesha .

text: Delivering thee from the people , and from the Gentiles , unto whom now I send thee ,
text2: Nitakuokoa na watu wa Israeli na watu wa mataifa mengine ambao mimi ninakutuma kwao .

text: To open their eyes , and to turn them from darkness to light , and from the power of Satan unto God , that they may receive forgiveness of sins , and inheritance among them which are sanctified by faith that is in me .
text2: Utayafumbua macho yao na kuwawezesha watoke gizani na kuingia katika mwanga ; watoke katika utawala wa Shetani , wamgeukie Mungu ; ili kwa kuamini , wapate kusamehewa dhambi na kuchukua nafasi yao kati ya wale ambao wamepata kuwa watu wa Mungu .

text: Whereupon , O king Agrippa , I was not disobedient unto the heavenly vision :
text2: " Hivyo , mfalme Agripa , sikuweza kuwa mkaidi kwa maono hilo la mbinguni .

text: But shewed first unto them of Damascus , and at Jerusalem , and throughout all the coasts of Judaea , and then to the Gentiles , that they should repent and turn to God , and do works meet for repentance .
text2: Ila nilianza kuhubiri kwanza kwa watu wa Damasko , halafu kwa wale wa Yerusalemu na nchi yote ya Yudea , na pia kwa watu wa mataifa mengine . Niliwahimiza wamgeukie Mungu na kuonyesha kwa vitendo kwamba wamebadilisha mioyo yao .

text: For these causes the Jews caught me in the temple , and went about to kill me .
text2: Kwa sababu hiyo , Wayahudi walinikamata nikiwa Hekaluni , wakajaribu kuniua .

text: Having therefore obtained help of God , I continue unto this day , witnessing both to small and great , saying none other things than those which the prophets and Moses did say should come :
text2: Lakini Mungu alinisaidia ; na hivyo mpaka siku ya leo nimesimama imara nikitoa ushuhuda kwa wote , wakubwa na wadogo . Ninayosema ni yale ambayo manabii na Mose walisema yatatukia ;

text: That Christ should suffer , and that he should be the first that should rise from the dead , and should shew light unto the people , and to the Gentiles .
text2: yaani ilimpasa Kristo ateseke na kuwa wa kwanza kufufuka kutoka wafu , ili atangaze kwamba mwanga wa ukombozi unawaangazia sasa watu wote , Wayahudi na pia watu wa mataifa mengine . "

text: And as he thus spake for himself , Festus said with a loud voice , Paul , thou art beside thyself ; much learning doth make thee mad .
text2: Paulo alipofika hapa katika kujitetea kwake , Festo alisema kwa sauti kubwa , " Paulo ! Una wazimu ! Kusoma kwako kwingi kunakutia wazimu ! "

text: But he said , I am not mad , most noble Festus ; but speak forth the words of truth and soberness .
text2: Lakini Paulo akasema , " Sina wazimu mheshimiwa Festo : Ninachosema ni ukweli mtupu .

text: For the king knoweth of these things , before whom also I speak freely : for I am persuaded that none of these things are hidden from him ; for this thing was not done in a corner .
text2: Wewe Mfalme unayafahamu mambo haya , kwa hiyo ninaweza kuongea bila uoga mbele yako . Sina mashaka kwamba matukio hayo yanajulikana kwako maana jambo hili halikutendeka mafichoni .

text: King Agrippa , believest thou the prophets ? I know that thou believest .
text2: Mfalme Agripa , je , una imani na manabii ? Najua kwamba unaamini . "

text: Then Agrippa said unto Paul , Almost thou persuadest me to be a Christian .
text2: Agripa akamjibu Paulo , " Kidogo tu utanifanya Mkristo ! "

text: And Paul said , I would to God , that not only thou , but also all that hear me this day , were both almost , and altogether such as I am , except these bonds .
text2: Paulo akamjibu , " Namwomba Mungu kwamba , kwa muda mfupi au mrefu , si wewe tu bali wote wanaonisikia leo wapate kuwa kama nilivyo mimi , lakini bila hii minyororo . "

text: And when he had thus spoken , the king rose up , and the governor , and Bernice , and they that sat with them :
text2: Hapo mfalme Agripa , mkuu wa mkoa , Bernike na wale wote waliokuwa pamoja nao , walisimama .

text: And when they were gone aside , they talked between themselves , saying , This man doeth nothing worthy of death or of bonds .
text2: Walipokwisha ondoka , waliambiana , " Mtu huyu hakufanya chochote kinachostahili adhabu ya kifo au kifungo . "

text: Then said Agrippa unto Festus , This man might have been set at liberty , if he had not appealed unto Caesar .
text2: Naye Agripa akamwambia Festo , " Mtu huyu angeweza kufunguliwa kama asingalikuwa amekata rufani kwa Kaisari . "

text: And when it was determined that we should sail into Italy , they delivered Paul and certain other prisoners unto one named Julius , a centurion of Augustus ' band .
text2: Walipokwisha amua tusafiri mpaka Italia , walimweka Paulo pamoja na wafungwa wengine chini ya ulinzi wa Yulio aliyekuwa ofisa wa jeshi katika kikosi kiitwacho " Kikosi cha Augusto . "

text: And entering into a ship of Adramyttium , we launched , meaning to sail by the coasts of Asia ; one Aristarchus , a Macedonian of Thessalonica , being with us .
text2: Tulipanda meli ya Adiramito iliyokuwa inasafiri na kupitia bandari kadhaa za mkoa wa Asia , tukaanza safari . Aristarko , mwenyeji wa Makedonia kutoka Thesalonika , alikuwa pamoja nasi .

text: And the next day we touched at Sidon . And Julius courteously entreated Paul , and gave him liberty to go unto his friends to refresh himself .
text2: Kesho yake tulitia nanga katika bandari ya Sidoni . Yulio alimtendea Paulo vizuri kwa kumruhusu awaone rafiki zake na kupata mahitaji yake .

text: And when we had launched from thence , we sailed under Cyprus , because the winds were contrary .
text2: Kutoka huko tuliendelea na safari , lakini kwa kuwa upepo ulikuwa unavuma kwa kasi kutujia kwa mbele , tulipitia upande wa kisiwa cha Kupro ambapo upepo haukuwa mwingi .

text: And when we had sailed over the sea of Cilicia and Pamphylia , we came to Myra , a city of Lycia .
text2: Halafu tulivuka bahari ya Kilikia na Pamfulia , tukatia nanga Mura , mji wa Lukia .

text: And there the centurion found a ship of Alexandria sailing into Italy ; and he put us therein .
text2: Hapo yule ofisa alikuta meli moja ya Aleksandria iliyokuwa inakwenda Italia , na hivyo akatupandisha ndani .

text: And when we had sailed slowly many days , and scarce were come over against Cnidus , the wind not suffering us , we sailed under Crete , over against Salmone ;
text2: Kwa muda wa siku nyingi tulisafiri polepole , na kwa shida tulifika karibu na Nido . Kwa sababu upepo ulikuwa bado unatupinga , tuliendelea mbele moja kwa moja tukapitia upande wa Krete karibu na rasi Salmone ambapo upepo haukuwa mwingi .

text: And , hardly passing it , came unto a place which is called The fair havens ; nigh whereunto was the city of Lasea .
text2: Tulipita kando yake polepole tukafika mahali paitwapo " Bandari Nzuri " , karibu na mji wa Lasea .

text: Now when much time was spent , and when sailing was now dangerous , because the fast was now already past , Paul admonished them ,
text2: Muda mrefu ulikuwa umepita , na hata siku ya kufunga ilikuwa imekwisha pita . Sasa ilikuwa hatari sana kusafiri kwa meli . Basi , Paulo aliwapa onyo :

text: And said unto them , Sirs , I perceive that this voyage will be with hurt and much damage , not only of the lading and ship , but also of our lives .
text2: " Waheshimiwa , nahisi kwamba safari hii itakuwa ya shida na hasara nyingi si kwa shehena na meli tu , bali pia kwa maisha yetu . "

text: Nevertheless the centurion believed the master and the owner of the ship , more than those things which were spoken by Paul .
text2: Lakini yule ofisa alivutiwa zaidi na maoni ya nahodha na ya mwenye meli kuliko yale aliyosema Paulo .

text: And because the haven was not commodious to winter in , the more part advised to depart thence also , if by any means they might attain to Phenice , and there to winter ; which is an haven of Crete , and lieth toward the south west and north west .
text2: Kwa kuwa bandari hiyo haikuwa mahali pazuri pa kukaa wakati wa baridi , wengi walipendelea kuendelea na safari , ikiwezekana mpaka Foinike . Foinike ni bandari ya Krete inayoelekea kusini - magharibi na kaskazini - magharibi ; na huko wangeweza kukaa wakati wa baridi .

text: And when the south wind blew softly , supposing that they had obtained their purpose , loosing thence , they sailed close by Crete .
text2: Basi , upepo mzuri wa kusi ulianza kuvuma , nao wakadhani wamefanikiwa lengo lao ; hivyo wakang ' oa nanga , wakaiendesha meli karibu sana na pwani ya Krete .

text: But not long after there arose against it a tempestuous wind , called Euroclydon .
text2: Lakini haukupita muda , upepo mkali uitwao " Upepo wa Kaskazi " ulianza kuvuma kutoka kisiwani .

text: And when the ship was caught , and could not bear up into the wind , we let her drive .
text2: Upepo uliipiga ile meli , na kwa kuwa hatukuweza kuukabili , tukaiacha ikokotwe na huo upepo .

text: And running under a certain island which is called Clauda , we had much work to come by the boat :
text2: Kisiwa kimoja kiitwacho Kanda kilitukinga kidogo na ule upepo ; na tulipopita kusini mwake tulifaulu , ingawa kwa shida , kuusalimisha ule mtumbwi wa meli .

text: Which when they had taken up , they used helps , undergirding the ship ; and , fearing lest they should fall into the quicksands , strake sail , and so were driven .
text2: Wale wanamaji waliuvuta mtumbwi ndani , kisha wakaizungushia meli kamba na kuifunga kwa nguvu . Waliogopa kwamba wangeweza kukwama kwenye ufuko wa bahari , pwani ya Libya . Kwa hiyo walishusha matanga na kuiacha meli ikokotwe na upepo .

text: And we being exceedingly tossed with a tempest , the next day they lightened the ship ;
text2: Dhoruba iliendelea kuvuma na kesho yake wakaanza kutupa nje shehena ya meli .

text: And the third day we cast out with our own hands the tackling of the ship .
text2: Siku ya tatu , wakaanza pia kutupa majini vifaa vya meli kwa mikono yao wenyewe .

text: And when neither sun nor stars in many days appeared , and no small tempest lay on us , all hope that we should be saved was then taken away .
text2: Kwa muda wa siku nyingi hatukuweza kuona jua wala nyota ; dhoruba iliendelea kuvuma sana , hata matumaini yote ya kuokoka yakatuishia .

text: But after long abstinence Paul stood forth in the midst of them , and said , Sirs , ye should have hearkened unto me , and not have loosed from Crete , and to have gained this harm and loss .
text2: Baada ya kukaa muda mrefu bila kula chakula , Paulo alisimama kati yao , akasema , " Waheshimiwa , ingalikuwa afadhali kama mngalinisikiliza na kuacha kusafiri kutoka Krete . Kama mngalifanya hivyo tungaliiepuka shida hii na hasara hizi zote .

text: And now I exhort you to be of good cheer : for there shall be no loss of any man ' s life among you , but of the ship .
text2: Lakini sasa ninawaombeni muwe na moyo ; hakuna hata mmoja wenu atakayepoteza maisha yake ; meli tu ndiyo itakayopotea .

text: For there stood by me this night the angel of God , whose I am , and whom I serve ,
text2: Kwa maana jana usiku malaika wa yule Mungu ambaye mimi ni wake na ambaye mimi ninamwabudu alinitokea ,

text: Saying , Fear not , Paul ; thou must be brought before Caesar : and , lo , God hath given thee all them that sail with thee .
text2: akaniambia : Paulo usiogope ! Ni lazima utasimama mbele ya Kaisari ; naye Mungu , kwa wema wake , amekufadhili kwa kuwaokoa wote wanaosafiri nawe wasiangamie .

text: Wherefore , sirs , be of good cheer : for I believe God , that it shall be even as it was told me .
