text2: Hivyo , waheshimiwa , jipeni moyo ! Maana ninamwamini Mungu kwamba itakuwa sawa kama nilivyoambiwa .

text: Howbeit we must be cast upon a certain island .
text2: Lakini ni lazima tutatupwa ufukoni mwa kisiwa fulani . "

text: But when the fourteenth night was come , as we were driven up and down in Adria , about midnight the shipmen deemed that they drew near to some country ;
text2: Usiku wa siku ya kumi na nne , tulikuwa tunakokotwa huku na huku katika bahari ya Adria . Karibu na usiku wa manane wanamaji walijihisi kuwa karibu na nchi kavu .

text: And sounded , and found it twenty fathoms : and when they had gone a little further , they sounded again , and found it fifteen fathoms .
text2: Hivyo walitafuta kina cha bahari kwa kuteremsha kamba iliyokuwa imefungiwa kitu kizito , wakapata kina cha mita arobaini . Baadaye wakapima tena wakapata mita thelathini .

text: Then fearing lest we should have fallen upon rocks , they cast four anchors out of the stern , and wished for the day .
text2: Kwa sababu ya kuogopa kukwama kwenye miamba , waliteremsha nanga nne nyuma ya meli ; wakaomba kuche upesi .

text: And as the shipmen were about to flee out of the ship , when they had let down the boat into the sea , under colour as though they would have cast anchors out of the foreship ,
text2: Wanamaji walitaka kutoroka , na walikwisha kuteremsha ule mtumbwi majini , wakijisingizia kwamba wanakwenda kuteremsha nanga upande wa mbele wa meli .

text: Paul said to the centurion and to the soldiers , Except these abide in the ship , ye cannot be saved .
text2: Lakini Paulo alimwambia yule ofisa wa jeshi na askari wake , " Kama wanamaji hawa hawabaki ndani ya meli , hamtaokoka . "

text: Then the soldiers cut off the ropes of the boat , and let her fall off .
text2: Hapo wale askari walizikata kamba zilizokuwa zimeshikilia ule mtumbwi , wakauacha uchukuliwe na maji .

text: And while the day was coming on , Paul besought them all to take meat , saying , This day is the fourteenth day that ye have tarried and continued fasting , having taken nothing .
text2: Karibu na alfajiri , Paulo aliwahimiza wote wale chakula : " Kwa siku kumi na nne sasa mmekuwa katika mashaka na bila kula ; hamjala kitu chochote .

text: Wherefore I pray you to take some meat : for this is for your health : for there shall not an hair fall from the head of any of you .
text2: Basi , ninawasihi mle chakula kwa maana mnakihitaji ili mweze kuendelea kuishi . Maana hata unywele mmoja wa vichwa vyenu hautapotea . "

text: And when he had thus spoken , he took bread , and gave thanks to God in presence of them all : and when he had broken it , he began to eat .
text2: Baada ya kusema hivyo , Paulo alichukua mkate , akamshukuru Mungu mbele yao wote , akaumega , akaanza kula .

text: Then were they all of good cheer , and they also took some meat .
text2: Hapo wote wakapata moyo , nao pia wakala chakula .

text: And we were in all in the ship two hundred threescore and sixteen souls .
text2: Jumla tulikuwa watu mia mbili na sabini na sita katika meli .

text: And when they had eaten enough , they lightened the ship , and cast out the wheat into the sea .
text2: Baada ya kila mmoja kula chakula cha kutosha , walipunguza uzito wa meli kwa kutupa nafaka baharini .

text: And when it was day , they knew not the land : but they discovered a certain creek with a shore , into the which they were minded , if it were possible , to thrust in the ship .
text2: Kulipokucha , wanamaji hawakuweza kuitambua nchi ile , ila waliona ghuba moja yenye ufuko ; wakaamua kutia nanga huko kama ikiwezekana .

text: And when they had taken up the anchors , they committed themselves unto the sea , and loosed the rudder bands , and hoised up the mainsail to the wind , and made toward shore .
text2: Hivyo walikata nanga na kuziacha baharini , na wakati huohuo wakazifungua kamba zilizokuwa zimeufunga usukani , kisha wakatweka tanga moja mbele kushika upepo , wakaelekea ufukoni .

text: And falling into a place where two seas met , they ran the ship aground ; and the forepart stuck fast , and remained unmoveable , but the hinder part was broken with the violence of the waves .
text2: Lakini walifika mahali ambapo mikondo miwili ya bahari hukutana , na meli ikakwama . Sehemu ya mbele ilikuwa imezama mchangani bila kutikisika . Sehemu ya nyuma ya meli ilianza kuvunjika vipandevipande kwa mapigo ya nguvu ya mawimbi .

text: And the soldiers ' counsel was to kill the prisoners , lest any of them should swim out , and escape .
text2: Askari walitaka kuwaua wafungwa wote kwa kuogopa kwamba wangeogelea hadi pwani na kutoroka .

text: But the centurion , willing to save Paul , kept them from their purpose ; and commanded that they which could swim should cast themselves first into the sea , and get to land :
text2: Lakini kwa vile yule ofisajeshi alitaka kumwokoa Paulo , aliwazuia wasifanye hivyo . Aliamuru wale waliojua kuogelea waruke kutoka melini na kuogelea hadi pwani ,

text: And the rest , some on boards , and some on broken pieces of the ship . And so it came to pass , that they escaped all safe to land .
text2: na wengine wafuate wakijishikilia kwenye mbao au kwenye vipande vya meli iliyovunjika . Ndivyo sisi sote tulivyofika salama pwani .

text: And when they were escaped , then they knew that the island was called Melita .
text2: Tulipokwisha fika salama kwenye nchi kavu , tuligundua kwamba kile kisiwa kinaitwa Malta .

text: And the barbarous people shewed us no little kindness : for they kindled a fire , and received us every one , because of the present rain , and because of the cold .
text2: Wenyeji wa hapo walikuwa wema sana kwetu . Mvua ilikuwa inaanza kunyesha na kulikuwa na baridi , hivyo waliwasha moto , wakatukaribisha .

text: And when Paul had gathered a bundle of sticks , and laid them on the fire , there came a viper out of the heat , and fastened on his hand .
text2: Paulo aliokota mzigo mdogo wa kuni akawa anazitia motoni . Hapo , kwa sababu ya lile joto la moto , nyoka akatoka katika kuni akamnasa Paulo mkononi na kujishikilia hapo .

text: And when the barbarians saw the venomous beast hang on his hand , they said among themselves , No doubt this man is a murderer , whom , though he hath escaped the sea , yet vengeance suffereth not to live .
text2: Wenyeji wa pale walipokiona kile kiumbe kinaning ' inia kwenye mkono wake waliambiana , " Bila shaka mtu huyu amekwisha ua mtu , na ingawa ameokoka kuangamia baharini , Haki haitamwacha aendelee kuishi ! "

text: And he shook off the beast into the fire , and felt no harm .
text2: Lakini Paulo alikikung ' utia kile kiumbe motoni na hakuumizwa hata kidogo .

text: Howbeit they looked when he should have swollen , or fallen down dead suddenly : but after they had looked a great while , and saw no harm come to him , they changed their minds , and said that he was a god .
text2: Wale watu walikuwa wakitazamia kwamba angevimba au hapohapo angeanguka chini na kufa . Baada ya kungojea kwa muda mrefu bila kuona kwamba Paulo amepatwa na jambo lolote lisilo la kawaida , walibadilisha fikira zao juu yake , wakasema kuwa ni mungu .

text: In the same quarters were possessions of the chief man of the island , whose name was Publius ; who received us , and lodged us three days courteously .
text2: Karibu na mahali pale palikuwa na mashamba ya Publio , mkuu wa kile kisiwa . Publio alitukaribisha kirafiki , tukawa wageni wake kwa siku tatu .

text: And it came to pass , that the father of Publius lay sick of a fever and of a bloody flux : to whom Paul entered in , and prayed , and laid his hands on him , and healed him .
text2: Basi , ikawa kwamba baba yake Publio alikuwa amelala kitandani , mgonjwa , ana homa na kuhara . Paulo alikwenda kumwona na baada ya kusali , akaweka mikono yake juu ya mgonjwa , akamponya .

text: So when this was done , others also , which had diseases in the island , came , and were healed :
text2: Kutokana na tukio hilo , wagonjwa wote katika kile kisiwa walikuja wakaponywa .

text: Who also honoured us with many honours ; and when we departed , they laded us with such things as were necessary .
text2: Watu walitupatia zawadi mbalimbali na wakati tulipoanza tena safari , walitia ndani ya meli masurufu tuliyohitaji .

text: And after three months we departed in a ship of Alexandria , which had wintered in the isle , whose sign was Castor and Pollux .
text2: Baada ya miezi mitatu tulianza tena safari yetu kwa meli moja ya Aleksandria iitwayo " Miungu Pacha " . Meli hiyo ilikuwa imetia nanga kisiwani wakati wote wa baridi .

text: And landing at Syracuse , we tarried there three days .
text2: Tulifika katika mji wa Sirakusa , tukakaa hapo kwa siku tatu .

text: And from thence we fetched a compass , and came to Rhegium : and after one day the south wind blew , and we came the next day to Puteoli :
text2: Toka huko tuling ' oa nanga , tukazunguka na kufika Regio . Baada ya siku moja , upepo ulianza kuvuma kutoka kusini , na baada ya siku mbili tulifika bandari ya Potioli .

text: Where we found brethren , and were desired to tarry with them seven days : and so we went toward Rome .
text2: Huko tuliwakuta ndugu kadhaa ambao walituomba tukae nao kwa juma moja . Hivi ndivyo tulivyopata kufika Roma .

text: And from thence , when the brethren heard of us , they came to meet us as far as Appiiforum , and The three taverns : whom when Paul saw , he thanked God , and took courage .
text2: Ndugu wa kule Roma walipopata habari zetu , wakaja kutulaki kwenye soko la Apio na Mikahawa Mitatu . Paulo alipowaona alimshukuru Mungu , akapata moyo .

text: And when we came to Rome , the centurion delivered the prisoners to the captain of the guard : but Paul was suffered to dwell by himself with a soldier that kept him .
text2: Tulipofika Roma , Paulo aliruhusiwa kukaa peke yake pamoja na askari mmoja wa kumlinda .

text: And it came to pass , that after three days Paul called the chief of the Jews together : and when they were come together , he said unto them , Men and brethren , though I have committed nothing against the people , or customs of our fathers , yet was I delivered prisoner from Jerusalem into the hands of the Romans .
text2: Baada ya siku tatu , Paulo aliwaita pamoja viongozi wa Kiyahudi wa mahali hapo . Walipokusanyika , Paulo aliwaambia , " Wananchi wenzangu , mimi , ingawa sikufanya chochote kibaya wala kupinga desturi za wazee wetu , nilitiwa nguvuni kule Yerusalemu na kutiwa mikononi mwa Waroma .

text: Who , when they had examined me , would have let me go , because there was no cause of death in me .
text2: Waliponihoji na kuona kwamba sikuwa na hatia yeyote , walitaka kuniacha .

text: But when the Jews spake against it , I was constrained to appeal unto Caesar ; not that I had ought to accuse my nation of .
text2: Lakini Wayahudi wengine walipinga jambo hilo , nami nikalazimika kukata rufani kwa Kaisari , ingawa sikuwa na chochote cha kuwashtaki wananchi wenzangu .

text: For this cause therefore have I called for you , to see you , and to speak with you : because that for the hope of Israel I am bound with this chain .
text2: Ni kwa sababu hiyo nimeomba kuonana na kuongea nanyi , maana nimefungwa minyororo hii kwa sababu ya tumaini lile la Israeli . "

text: And they said unto him , We neither received letters out of Judaea concerning thee , neither any of the brethren that came shewed or spake any harm of thee .
text2: Wao wakamwambia , " Sisi hatujapokea barua yoyote kutoka Yudea , wala hakuna ndugu yeyote aliyefika hapa na kutoa habari rasmi au kusema chochote kibaya juu yako .

text: But we desire to hear of thee what thou thinkest : for as concerning this sect , we know that every where it is spoken against .
text2: Lakini tunafikiri inafaa tusikie kutoka kwako mwenyewe mambo yaliyo kichwani mwako . Kwa maana tujualo sisi kuhusu hicho kikundi ni kwamba kinapingwa kila mahali . "

text: And when they had appointed him a day , there came many to him into his lodging ; to whom he expounded and testified the kingdom of God , persuading them concerning Jesus , both out of the law of Moses , and out of the prophets , from morning till evening .
text2: Basi , walipanga naye siku kamili ya kukutana , na wengi wakafika huko alikokuwa anakaa . Tangu asubuhi mpaka jioni Paulo aliwaeleza na kuwafafanulia juu ya Ufalme wa Mungu akijaribu kuwafanya wakubali habari juu ya Yesu kwa kutumia Sheria ya Mose na maandiko ya manabii .

text: And some believed the things which were spoken , and some believed not .
text2: Baadhi yao walikubali maneno yake , lakini wengine hawakuamini .

text: And when they agreed not among themselves , they departed , after that Paul had spoken one word , Well spake the Holy Ghost by Esaias the prophet unto our fathers ,
text2: Basi , kukawa na mtengano wa fikira kati yao . Walipokuwa wanakwenda zao , Paulo alisema jambo hili , " Kweli ni sawa yale aliyoyanena Roho Mtakatifu kwa wazee wenu kwa njia ya nabii Isaya

text: Saying , Go unto this people , and say , Hearing ye shall hear , and shall not understand ; and seeing ye shall see , and not perceive :
text2: akisema : Nenda kwa watu hawa ukawaambie : kusikia mtasikia , lakini hamtaelewa ; kutazama mtatazama , lakini hamtaona .

text: For the heart of this people is waxed gross , and their ears are dull of hearing , and their eyes have they closed ; lest they should see with their eyes , and hear with their ears , and understand with their heart , and should be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Maana akili za watu hawa zimepumbaa , wameziba masikio yao , wamefumba macho yao . La sivyo , wangeona kwa macho yao , wangesikia kwa masikio yao . Wangeelewa kwa akili zao , na kunigeukia , asema Bwana , nami ningewaponya . "

text: Be it known therefore unto you , that the salvation of God is sent unto the Gentiles , and that they will hear it .
text2: Halafu Paulo akamaliza na kusema , " Jueni basi , kwamba ujumbe wa Mungu juu ya wokovu umepelekwa kwa watu wa mataifa . Wao watasikiliza ! "

text: And when he had said these words , the Jews departed , and had great reasoning among themselves .
text2: Paulo alipokwisha sema hayo , Wayahudi walijiondokea huku wakiwa wanabishana vikali wao kwa wao .

text: And Paul dwelt two whole years in his own hired house , and received all that came in unto him ,
text2: Kwa muda wa miaka miwili mizima Paulo aliishi katika nyumba aliyoipanga yeye mwenyewe ; akawa anawakaribisha wote waliofika kumsalimu .

text: Preaching the kingdom of God , and teaching those things which concern the Lord Jesus Christ , with all confidence , no man forbidding him .
text2: Alikuwa akihubiri Ufalme wa Mungu na kufundisha juu ya Bwana Yesu Kristo kwa uhodari , bila kizuizi .

text: Paul , a servant of Jesus Christ , called to be an apostle , separated unto the gospel of God ,
text2: Kutoka kwangu mimi Paulo , mtumishi wa Kristo Yesu , na mtume niliyeteuliwa na kuitwa kwa ajili ya kuhubiri Habari Njema ya Mungu .

text: ( Which he had promised afore by his prophets in the holy scriptures , )
text2: Hapo kale , Mungu aliwaahidia watu hii Habari Njema kwa njia ya manabii wake katika Maandiko Matakatifu .

text: Concerning his Son Jesus Christ our Lord , which was made of the seed of David according to the flesh ;
text2: Hii Habari Njema inamhusu Mwana wa Mungu , Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo , ambaye mintarafu ubinadamu wake , alikuwa mzawa wa Daudi ;

text: And declared to be the Son of God with power , according to the spirit of holiness , by the resurrection from the dead :
text2: mintarafu utakatifu wake wa kimungu , alithibitishwa kwa uwezo mkuu kwamba ni Mwana wa Mungu kwa kufufuliwa kutoka wafu .

text: By whom we have received grace and apostleship , for obedience to the faith among all nations , for his name :
text2: Kwa njia yake , mimi nimepewa neema ya kuwa mtume , ili kwa ajili yake niwaongoze watu wa mataifa yote wapate kuamini na kutii .

text: Among whom are ye also the called of Jesus Christ :
text2: Ninyi ni miongoni mwa watu hao ; mmeitwa muwe watu wake Yesu Kristo .

text: To all that be in Rome , beloved of God , called to be saints : Grace to you and peace from God our Father , and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Basi , ninawaandikia ninyi nyote mlioko Roma ambao Mungu anawapenda , akawateua muwe watu wake . Nawatakieni neema na amani kutoka kwa Mungu Baba yetu na Bwana Yesu Kristo .

text: First , I thank my God through Jesus Christ for you all , that your faith is spoken of throughout the whole world .
text2: Awali ya yote , namshukuru Mungu wangu kwa njia ya Yesu Kristo kwa ajili yenu nyote , kwa sababu imani yenu inasikika duniani kote .

text: For God is my witness , whom I serve with my spirit in the gospel of his Son , that without ceasing I make mention of you always in my prayers ;
text2: Mungu , ambaye ninamtumikia kwa moyo wangu wote katika kuhubiri Habari Njema ya Mwanae , ni shahidi wangu kwamba ninawakumbukeni

text: Making request , if by any means now at length I might have a prosperous journey by the will of God to come unto you .
text2: daima katika sala zangu . Namwomba Mungu akipenda , anipatie nafasi nzuri ya kuja kwenu sasa .

text: For I long to see you , that I may impart unto you some spiritual gift , to the end ye may be established ;
text2: Kwa maana ninatamani sana kuwaoneni ili nipate kuwagawieni zawadi ya kiroho na kuwaimarisha .

text: That is , that I may be comforted together with you by the mutual faith both of you and me .
text2: Ndiyo kusema , tutaimarishana : imani yenu itaniimarisha mimi , na yangu itawaimarisha ninyi .

text: Now I would not have you ignorant , brethren , that oftentimes I purposed to come unto you , ( but was let hitherto , ) that I might have some fruit among you also , even as among other Gentiles .
text2: Ndugu zangu , nataka mjue kwamba mara nyingi nilikusudia kuwatembeleeni , lakini mpaka sasa nimezuiwa . Ningependa kupata mafanikio mema kati yenu kama nilivyopata kati ya watu wa mataifa mengine .

text: I am debtor both to the Greeks , and to the Barbarians ; both to the wise , and to the unwise .
text2: Ninalo jukumu kwa watu wote , waliostaarabika na wasiostaarabika , wenye elimu na wasio na elimu .

text: So , as much as in me is , I am ready to preach the gospel to you that are at Rome also .
text2: Ndiyo maana ninatamani pia kuihubiri Habari Njema kwenu ninyi mlioko huko Roma .

text: For I am not ashamed of the gospel of Christ : for it is the power of God unto salvation to every one that believeth ; to the Jew first , and also to the Greek .
text2: Sioni aibu kutangaza Habari Njema ; yenyewe ni nguvu ya Mungu inayowaokoa wote wanaoamini : Wayahudi kwanza , na wasio Wayahudi pia .

text: For therein is the righteousness of God revealed from faith to faith : as it is written , The just shall live by faith .
text2: Kwa maana Habari Njema inaonyesha wazi jinsi Mungu anavyowakubali watu kuwa waadilifu ; jambo hili hufanyika kwa imani , tangu mwanzo mpaka mwisho . Kama ilivyoandikwa : " Mwadilifu kwa imani ataishi . "

text: For the wrath of God is revealed from heaven against all ungodliness and unrighteousness of men , who hold the truth in unrighteousness ;
text2: Ghadhabu ya Mungu imedhihirishwa kutoka mbinguni dhidi ya uasi na uovu wote wa binadamu ambao kwa njia zao mbaya wanaupinga ukweli usijulikane .

text: Because that which may be known of God is manifest in them ; for God hath shewed it unto them .
text2: Kwa maana , yote yanayoweza kujulikana juu ya Mungu ni wazi kwao ; maana Mungu mwenyewe ameyadhirisha .

text: For the invisible things of him from the creation of the world are clearly seen , being understood by the things that are made , even his eternal power and Godhead ; so that they are without excuse :
text2: Tangu Mungu alipoumba ulimwengu , uwezo wake wa milele na uungu wake , ingawa havionekani kwa macho , vinafahamika wazi . Watu wanaweza kuyajua mambo hayo kutokana na vitu hivyo alivyoumba Mungu . Kwa hiyo hawana njia yoyote ya kujitetea !

text: Because that , when they knew God , they glorified him not as God , neither were thankful ; but became vain in their imaginations , and their foolish heart was darkened .
text2: Ingawa wanajua kuna Mungu , lakini hawampi heshima anayostahili , wala hawamshukuru . Badala yake , fikira zao zimekuwa batili na akili zao tupu zimejaa giza .

text: Professing themselves to be wise , they became fools ,
text2: Wanajidai kuwa wenye hekima , kumbe ni wapumbavu .

text: And changed the glory of the uncorruptible God into an image made like to corruptible man , and to birds , and fourfooted beasts , and creeping things .
text2: Wanaacha kumwabudu Mungu aishiye milele , na badala yake , wanaabudu sanamu zilizo mfano wa binadamu ambaye hufa , mfano wa wanyama , ndege , au wanyama watambaao .

text: Wherefore God also gave them up to uncleanness through the lusts of their own hearts , to dishonour their own bodies between themselves :
text2: Kwa sababu hiyo , Mungu amewaacha wafuate tamaa mbaya za mioyo yao na kufanyiana mambo ya aibu kwa miili yao .

text: Who changed the truth of God into a lie , and worshipped and served the creature more than the Creator , who is blessed for ever . Amen .
text2: Wanaubadili ukweli juu ya Mungu kwa uongo ; wanaheshimu na kuabudu kiumbe badala ya Muumba mwenyewe , ambaye ndiye astahiliye sifa milele ! Amina .

text: For this cause God gave them up unto vile affections : for even their women did change the natural use into that which is against nature :
text2: Kwa hiyo , Mungu amewaacha wafuate tamaa mbaya . Hata wanawake wanabadili matumizi yanayopatana na maumbile .

text: And likewise also the men , leaving the natural use of the woman , burned in their lust one toward another ; men with men working that which is unseemly , and receiving in themselves that recompence of their error which was meet .
text2: Nao wanaume hali kadhalika , wanaacha kufuata matumizi ya maumbile ya mume na mke wakawakiana tamaa wao kwa wao . Wanaume wanafanyiana mambo ya aibu , na hivyo wanajiletea wenyewe adhabu wanayostahili kwa vitendo vyao viovu .

text: And even as they did not like to retain God in their knowledge , God gave them over to a reprobate mind , to do those things which are not convenient ;
text2: Kwa vile watu walikataa kumtambua Mungu , Mungu amewaacha katika fikira zao potovu , wakafanya yale ambayo hawangestahili kufanya .

text: Being filled with all unrighteousness , fornication , wickedness , covetousness , maliciousness ; full of envy , murder , debate , deceit , malignity ; whisperers ,
text2: Wamejaa kila aina ya uovu , dhuluma , ulafi na ufisadi . Wamejaa wivu , uuaji , ugomvi , udanganyifu na nia mbaya ; husengenya ,

text: Backbiters , haters of God , despiteful , proud , boasters , inventors of evil things , disobedient to parents ,
text2: na kusingiziana ; ni watu wa kuchukiza kwa Mungu , wafidhuli , wenye kiburi na majivuno ; hodari sana katika kutenda mabaya , na hawawatii wazazi wao ;

text: Without understanding , covenantbreakers , without natural affection , implacable , unmerciful :
text2: hawana dhamiri , hawatimizi ahadi zao , hawana wema wala huruma kwa wengine .

text: Who knowing the judgment of God , that they which commit such things are worthy of death , not only do the same , but have pleasure in them that do them .
text2: Wanajua kwamba Sheria ya Mungu yasema kwamba watu wanaoishi mithili hiyo , wanastahili kifo . Zaidi ya hayo , siyo tu kwamba wanafanya mambo hayo wao wenyewe , bali hata huwapongeza wale wanaofanya mambo hayohayo .

text: Therefore thou art inexcusable , O man , whosoever thou art that judgest : for wherein thou judgest another , thou condemnest thyself ; for thou that judgest doest the same things .
text2: Basi , rafiki , kama unawahukumu wengine , huwezi kamwe kujitetea haidhuru wewe ni nani . Kwa maana , kwa kuwahukumu wengine , unajilaani wewe mwenyewe kwa vile nawe unayafanya mambo yaleyale unayohukumu .

text: But we are sure that the judgment of God is according to truth against them which commit such things .
text2: Tunajua kwamba hukumu ya Mungu kwa wale wanaofanya mambo kama hayo ni hukumu ya haki .

text: And thinkest thou this , O man , that judgest them which do such things , and doest the same , that thou shalt escape the judgment of God ?
text2: Lakini wewe , rafiki , unayewahukumu wale wanaofanya mambo kama hayo bali wewe pia unayafanya , je unadhani utaiepa hukumu ya Mungu ?

text: Or despisest thou the riches of his goodness and forbearance and longsuffering ; not knowing that the goodness of God leadeth thee to repentance ?
text2: Au labda unaudharau wema wake mkuu , uvumilivu wake na saburi yake , bila kutambua kwamba wema wake huo una shabaha ya kukuongoza upate kutubu ?

text: But after thy hardness and impenitent heart treasurest up unto thyself wrath against the day of wrath and revelation of the righteous judgment of God ;
text2: Lakini unao ugumu na ukaidi wa moyo , na hivyo unajilundikia adhabu kwa Siku ile ambayo ghadhabu ya Mungu na hukumu zake za haki vitadhihirishwa .

text: Who will render to every man according to his deeds :
text2: Siku hiyo Mungu atamlipa kila mmoja kufuatana na matendo yake .

text: To them who by patient continuance in well doing seek for glory and honour and immortality , eternal life :
text2: Wale wanaozingatia kutenda mema , kutafuta utukufu na heshima ya Mungu na kutokufa , watapata uzima wa milele .

text: But unto them that are contentious , and do not obey the truth , but obey unrighteousness , indignation and wrath ,
text2: Lakini wale wengine wenye ubinafsi , wenye kukataa mambo ya haki na kufuata uovu , wataangukiwa na ghadhabu na hasira ya Mungu .

text: Tribulation and anguish , upon every soul of man that doeth evil , of the Jew first , and also of the Gentile ;
text2: Mateso na maumivu yatampata binadamu yeyote atendaye uovu . Yatawapata Wayahudi kwanza , na watu wa mataifa mengine pia .

text: But glory , honour , and peace , to every man that worketh good , to the Jew first , and also to the Gentile :
text2: Lakini Mungu atawapa utukufu , heshima na amani wale wanaotenda mema ; Wayahudi kwanza , na watu wa mataifa mengine pia .

text: For there is no respect of persons with God .
text2: Maana Mungu hambagui mtu yeyote .

text: For as many as have sinned without law shall also perish without law : and as many as have sinned in the law shall be judged by the law ;
text2: Wale wanaotenda dhambi bila kuijua Sheria ya Mose wataangamia ingawaje hawajui Sheria . Na wale wanaotenda dhambi wakiwa wanaijua Sheria watahukumiwa kisheria .

text: ( For not the hearers of the law are just before God , but the doers of the law shall be justified .
text2: Mtu hafanywi kuwa mwadilifu mbele yake Mungu kwa kuisikia Sheria , bali kwa kuitii Sheria .

text: For when the Gentiles , which have not the law , do by nature the things contained in the law , these , having not the law , are a law unto themselves :
text2: Mathalan : watu wa mataifa mengine hawana Sheria ya Mose ; lakini kila wanapotimiza matakwa ya Sheria wakiongozwa na dhamiri zao , wao wenyewe wanakuwa kipimo cha Sheria ingawa hawaijui Sheria .

text: Which shew the work of the law written in their hearts , their conscience also bearing witness , and their thoughts the mean while accusing or else excusing one another ; )
text2: Mwenendo wao unaonyesha kwamba matakwa ya Sheria yameandikwa mioyoni mwao . Dhamiri zao zinashuhudia pia jambo hilo , maana fikira zao mara nyingine huwashtaki , na mara nyingine huwatetea .

text: In the day when God shall judge the secrets of men by Jesus Christ according to my gospel .
text2: Hivyo , kufuatana na hii Habari Njema ninayohubiri , ndivyo itakavyokuwa wakati Mungu atakapohukumu mambo ya siri ya binadamu kwa njia ya Yesu Kristo .

text: Behold , thou art called a Jew , and restest in the law , and makest thy boast of God ,
text2: Na wewe , je ? Wewe mwenyewe unajiita Myahudi ; unaitumainia Sheria na kujivunia kuwa wa Mungu ;

text: And knowest his will , and approvest the things that are more excellent , being instructed out of the law ;
text2: kwa njia ya Sheria unajua matakwa ya Mungu na unaweza kuchagua jambo jema ;

text: And art confident that thou thyself art a guide of the blind , a light of them which are in darkness ,
text2: wewe unajiona kuwa kiongozi wa vipofu na mwanga kwa wale walio gizani ;

text: An instructor of the foolish , a teacher of babes , which hast the form of knowledge and of the truth in the law .
text2: unajiona kuwa mkufunzi wa wajinga na mwalimu wa wale wasiokomaa bado . Unayo katika Sheria picha kamili ya elimu na ukweli .

text: Thou therefore which teachest another , teachest thou not thyself ? thou that preachest a man should not steal , dost thou steal ?
text2: Basi , wewe unawafundisha wengine ; kwa nini hujifundishi wewe mwenyewe ? Unawahubiria wengine wasiibe , lakini kumbe wewe mwenyewe unaiba .

text: Thou that sayest a man should not commit adultery , dost thou commit adultery ? thou that abhorrest idols , dost thou commit sacrilege ?
text2: Unasema : " Msizini , " na huku wewe unazini ; unachukia sanamu za miungu hali wewe unajitajirisha kwa kuiba katika nyumba za miungu .

text: Thou that makest thy boast of the law , through breaking the law dishonourest thou God ?
text2: Kwa kujigamba ati unayo Sheria ya Mungu , je huoni kwamba kwa kuivunja Sheria unamdharau Mungu ?

text: For the name of God is blasphemed among the Gentiles through you , as it is written .
text2: Kama vile Maandiko Matakatifu yasemavyo : " Watu wa mataifa mengine wamelikufuru jina la Mungu kwa sababu yenu ninyi Wayahudi ! "

text: For circumcision verily profiteth , if thou keep the law : but if thou be a breaker of the law , thy circumcision is made uncircumcision .
text2: Kutahiriwa kwako kutakuwa na maana kama ukiitii Sheria . Lakini kama unaivunja Sheria , basi , ni afadhali ungalibaki bila kutahiriwa .

text: Therefore if the uncircumcision keep the righteousness of the law , shall not his uncircumcision be counted for circumcision ?
text2: Kama mtu wa mataifa mengine ambaye hakutahiriwa akitimiza matakwa ya Sheria , hakika atafikiriwa kana kwamba ametahiriwa .

text: And shall not uncircumcision which is by nature , if it fulfil the law , judge thee , who by the letter and circumcision dost transgress the law ?
text2: Watu wa mataifa mengine watakuhukumu wewe Myahudi kama ukiivunja Sheria , ingawaje unayo maandishi ya Sheria na umetahiriwa , hali wao wanaitii Sheria ingawa hawakutahiriwa .

text: For he is not a Jew , which is one outwardly ; neither is that circumcision , which is outward in the flesh :
text2: Ndiyo kusema , si kila anayeonekana kwa nje kuwa Myahudi ni Myahudi wa kweli , wala mtu hawi Myahudi wa kweli ati kwa kuwa ametahiriwa kimwili .

text: But he is a Jew , which is one inwardly ; and circumcision is that of the heart , in the spirit , and not in the letter ; whose praise is not of men , but of God .
text2: Myahudi wa kweli ni yule aliye Myahudi kwa ndani , yaani yule ambaye ametahiriwa moyoni . Hili ni jambo la Roho , na si jambo la maandishi ya Sheria . Mtu wa namna hiyo anapata sifa , si kutoka kwa watu , bali kutoka kwa Mungu .

text: What advantage then hath the Jew ? or what profit is there of circumcision ?
text2: Basi , Myahudi ana nini zaidi kuliko watu wengine ? Au kutahiriwa kuna faida gani ?

text: Much every way : chiefly , because that unto them were committed the oracles of God .
text2: Naam , iko faida kwa kila upande . Kwanza , Mungu aliwakabidhi Wayahudi ujumbe wake .

text: For what if some did not believe ? shall their unbelief make the faith of God without effect ?
text2: Lakini itakuwaje iwapo baadhi yao hawakuwa waaminifu ? Je , jambo hilo litaondoa uaminifu wa Mungu ?

text: God forbid : yea , let God be true , but every man a liar ; as it is written , That thou mightest be justified in thy sayings , and mightest overcome when thou art judged .
text2: Hata kidogo ! Mungu hubaki mwaminifu daima , ingawaje kila binadamu ni mwongo . Kama Maandiko Matakatifu yasemavyo : " Kila usemapo , maneno yako ni ya haki ; na katika hukumu , wewe hushinda . "

text: But if our unrighteousness commend the righteousness of God , what shall we say ? Is God unrighteous who taketh vengeance ? ( I speak as a man )
text2: Lakini , ikiwa uovu wetu unathibitisha kwamba Mungu anatenda kwa haki , tutasema nini ? Je , tutasema kwamba anakosa haki akituadhibu ? ( Hapa naongea kibinadamu ) .

text: God forbid : for then how shall God judge the world ?
text2: Hata kidogo ! Ingekuwa hivyo , Mungu angewezaje kuuhukumu ulimwengu ?

text: For if the truth of God hath more abounded through my lie unto his glory ; why yet am I also judged as a sinner ?
text2: Labda utasema : " Ikiwa ukosefu wa uaminifu kwa upande wangu unamdhihirisha Mungu kuwa mwaminifu zaidi na hivyo kumpatia utukufu , basi singepaswa kuhukumiwa kuwa mwenye dhambi ! "

text: And not rather , ( as we be slanderously reported , and as some affirm that we say , ) Let us do evil , that good may come ? whose damnation is just .
text2: Ni sawa na kusema : tufanye maovu ili tupate mema ! Ndivyo wengine walivyotukashifu kwa kutushtaki kwamba tumefundisha hivyo . Watahukumiwa wanavyostahili !

text: What then ? are we better than they ? No , in no wise : for we have before proved both Jews and Gentiles , that they are all under sin ;
text2: Tuseme nini , basi ? Je , sisi Wayahudi ni bora zaidi kuliko wengine ? Hata kidogo ! Kwa maana nimekwisha bainisha hapo mwanzoni kwamba Wayahudi na watu wa mataifa mengine wote wako chini ya utawala wa dhambi .

text: As it is written , There is none righteous , no , not one :
text2: Kama Maandiko Matakatifu yasemavyo : " Hakuna hata mmoja aliye mwadilifu !

text: There is none that understandeth , there is none that seeketh after God .
text2: Hakuna mtu anayeelewa , wala anayemtafuta Mungu .

text: They are all gone out of the way , they are together become unprofitable ; there is none that doeth good , no , not one .
text2: Wote wamepotoka wote wamekosa ; hakuna atendaye mema , hakuna hata mmoja .

text: Their throat is an open sepulchre ; with their tongues they have used deceit ; the poison of asps is under their lips :
text2: Makoo yao ni kama kaburi wazi , ndimi zao zimejaa udanganyifu , midomoni mwao mwatoka maneno yenye sumu kama ya nyoka .

text: Whose mouth is full of cursing and bitterness :
text2: Vinywa vyao vimejaa laana chungu .

text: Their feet are swift to shed blood :
text2: Miguu yao iko mbioni kumwaga damu ,

text: Destruction and misery are in their ways :
text2: popote waendapo husababisha maafa na mateso ;

text: And the way of peace have they not known :
text2: njia ya amani hawaijui .

text: There is no fear of God before their eyes .
text2: Hawajali kabisa kumcha Mungu . "

text: Now we know that what things soever the law saith , it saith to them who are under the law : that every mouth may be stopped , and all the world may become guilty before God .
text2: Tunajua kwamba Sheria huwahusu walio chini ya Sheria hiyo , hata hawawezi kuwa na kisingizio chochote , na ulimwengu wote uko chini ya hukumu ya Mungu .

text: Therefore by the deeds of the law there shall no flesh be justified in his sight : for by the law is the knowledge of sin .
text2: Maana hakuna binadamu yeyote anayekubaliwa kuwa mwadilifu mbele yake Mungu kwa kuishika Sheria ; kazi ya Sheria ni kumwonyesha tu mtu kwamba ametenda dhambi .

text: But now the righteousness of God without the law is manifested , being witnessed by the law and the prophets ;
text2: Lakini sasa , njia ya Mungu ya kuwakubali watu kuwa waadilifu imekwisha dhihirishwa , tena bila kutegemea Sheria . Sheria na manabii hushuhudia jambo hili .

text: Even the righteousness of God which is by faith of Jesus Christ unto all and upon all them that believe : for there is no difference :
text2: Mungu huwakubali watu kuwa waadilifu kwa njia ya imani yao kwa Yesu Kristo ; Mungu hufanya hivyo kwa wote wanaoamini ; hakuna ubaguzi wowote .

text: For all have sinned , and come short of the glory of God ;
text2: Watu wote wametenda dhambi na wametindikiwa utukufu wa Mungu .

text: Being justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus :
text2: Lakini kwa zawadi ya neema ya Mungu , watu wote hukubaliwa kuwa waadilifu kwa njia ya Yesu Kristo anayewakomboa .

text: Whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood , to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins that are past , through the forbearance of God ;
text2: Mungu alimtoa Yesu kusudi , kwa damu yake , awe njia ya kuwaondolea watu dhambi zao kwa imani yao kwake . Alifanya hivyo ili apate kuonyesha kwamba yeye ni mwadilifu . Hapo zamani Mungu alikuwa mvumilivu bila kuzijali dhambi za watu ;

text: To declare , I say , at this time his righteousness : that he might be just , and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus .
text2: lakini sasa , wakati huu , anazikabili dhambi za watu apate kuonyesha uadilifu wake . Kwa namna hiyo Mungu mwenyewe huonyesha kwamba yeye ni mwadilifu na kwamba humkubali kuwa mwadilifu mtu yeyote anayemwamini Yesu .

text: Where is boasting then ? It is excluded . By what law ? of works ? Nay : but by the law of faith .
text2: Basi , tunaweza kujivunia nini ? Hakuna ! Kwa nini ? Je , kwa sababu ya kutimiza Sheria ? La ! Bali kwa sababu tunaamini .

text: Therefore we conclude that a man is justified by faith without the deeds of the law .
text2: Maana mtu hukubaliwa kuwa mwadilifu kwa imani , wala si kwa kutimiza matakwa ya Sheria .

text: Is he the God of the Jews only ? is he not also of the Gentiles ? Yes , of the Gentiles also :
text2: Au je , Mungu nu Mungu wa Wayahudi tu , ama pia wa watu wa mataifa mengine ? Naam , wa mataifa mengine pia .

text: Seeing it is one God , which shall justify the circumcision by faith , and uncircumcision through faith .
text2: Mungu ni mmoja , naye atawakubali Wayahudi kuwa waadilifu kwa imani yao , na watu wa mataifa mengine pia kwa imani yao .

text: Do we then make void the law through faith ? God forbid : yea , we establish the law .
text2: Je , tunaitumia imani kuibatilisha Sheria ? Hata kidogo ; bali tunaipa Sheria thamani yake kamili .

text: What shall we say then that Abraham our father , as pertaining to the flesh , hath found ?
text2: Tuseme nini basi , juu ya Abrahamu baba yetu ?

text: For if Abraham were justified by works , he hath whereof to glory ; but not before God .
text2: Kama Abrahamu alikubaliwa kuwa mwadilifu kutokana na matendo yake , basi , anacho kitu cha kujivunia mbele ya Mungu .

text: For what saith the scripture ? Abraham believed God , and it was counted unto him for righteousness .
text2: Kwa maana , Maandiko Matakatifu yasema : " Abrahamu alimwamini Mungu , naye Mungu akamkubali kuwa mwadilifu . "

text: Now to him that worketh is the reward not reckoned of grace , but of debt .
text2: Mfanyakazi hulipwa mshahara ; mshahara wake si zawadi bali ni haki yake .

text: But to him that worketh not , but believeth on him that justifieth the ungodly , his faith is counted for righteousness .
text2: Lakini mtu asiyetegemea matendo yake mwenyewe , bali anamwamini Mungu ambaye huwasamehe waovu , basi , Mungu huijali imani ya mtu huyo , na hivi humkubali kuwa mwadilifu .

text: Even as David also describeth the blessedness of the man , unto whom God imputeth righteousness without works ,
text2: Naye Daudi asema hivi juu ya furaha ya mtu ambaye Mungu amemkubali kuwa mwadilifu bila kuyajali matendo yake :

text: Saying , Blessed are they whose iniquities are forgiven , and whose sins are covered .
text2: " Heri wale waliosamehewa makosa yao ambao makosa yao yamefutwa .

text: Blessed is the man to whom the Lord will not impute sin .
text2: Heri mtu yule ambaye Bwana hataziweka dhambi zake katika kumbukumbu . "

text: Cometh this blessedness then upon the circumcision only , or upon the uncircumcision also ? for we say that faith was reckoned to Abraham for righteousness .
text2: Je , hiyo ni kwa wale waliotahiriwa tu , ama pia kwa wale wasiotahiriwa ? Ni kwa wale wasiotahiriwa pia . Kwa maana tumekwisha sema : " Abrahamu aliamini , naye Mungu akamkubali kuwa mwadilifu . "

text: How was it then reckoned ? when he was in circumcision , or in uncircumcision ? Not in circumcision , but in uncircumcision .
text2: Je , Abrahamu alikubaliwa kabla ya kutahiriwa ama baada ya kutahiriwa ? Kabla ya kutahiriwa , na si baada ya kutahiriwa .

text: And he received the sign of circumcision , a seal of the righteousness of the faith which he had yet being uncircumcised : that he might be the father of all them that believe , though they be not circumcised ; that righteousness might be imputed unto them also :
text2: Abrahamu alitahiriwa baadaye , na kutahiriwa huko kulikuwa alama iliyothibitisha kwamba Mungu alimkubali kuwa mwadilifu kwa sababu ya imani yake aliyokuwa nayo kabla ya kutahiriwa . Kwa hiyo , Abrahamu amekuwa baba wa wale wote ambao , ingawa hawakutahiriwa , wamemwamini Mungu , wakafanywa waadilifu .

text: And the father of circumcision to them who are not of the circumcision only , but who also walk in the steps of that faith of our father Abraham , which he had being yet uncircumcised .
text2: Vilevile yeye ni baba wa wale waliotahiriwa ; lakini si kwa kuwa wametahiriwa , bali kwa sababu wanafuata njia ileile ya imani baba yetu Abrahamu aliyofuata kabla ya kutahiriwa .

text: For the promise , that he should be the heir of the world , was not to Abraham , or to his seed , through the law , but through the righteousness of faith .
text2: Mungu alimwahidi Abrahamu na wazawa wake kwamba ulimwengu ungekuwa mali yao . Ahadi hiyo haikufanywa kwa sababu Abrahamu aliitii Sheria , bali kwa kuwa aliamini , akakubaliwa kuwa mwadilifu .

text: For if they which are of the law be heirs , faith is made void , and the promise made of none effect :
text2: Maana kama watakaopewa hayo aliyoahidi Mungu ni wale tu wanaoitii Sheria , basi , imani haina maana yoyote , nayo ahadi ya Mungu si kitu .

text: Because the law worketh wrath : for where no law is , there is no transgression .
text2: Sheria husababisha ghadhabu ; lakini kama hakuna Sheria , haiwezekani kuivunja .

text: Therefore it is of faith , that it might be by grace ; to the end the promise might be sure to all the seed ; not to that only which is of the law , but to that also which is of the faith of Abraham ; who is the father of us all ,
text2: Kwa sababu hiyo , jambo hili lategemea imani , hivyo kwamba ahadi hiyo yatokana na neema ya Mungu , na kwamba ni hakika kuwa ahadi hiyo ni kwa ajili ya wote : si kwa wale tu wanaoishika Sheria , bali pia kwa wale waishio kwa imani kama Abrahamu . Yeye ni baba yetu sisi sote .

text: ( As it is written , I have made thee a father of many nations , ) before him whom he believed , even God , who quickeneth the dead , and calleth those things which be not as though they were .
text2: Kama Maandiko Matakatifu yasemavyo : " Nimekuweka uwe baba wa mataifa mengi . " Ahadi hiyo ni kweli mbele ya Mungu ambaye Abrahamu alimwamini - - Mungu ambaye huwapa wafu uzima , na kwa amri yake , vitu ambavyo havikuwapo huwa .

text: Who against hope believed in hope , that he might become the father of many nations ; according to that which was spoken , So shall thy seed be .
text2: Abrahamu aliamini na kutumaini ingawa hali yenyewe ilikuwa bila matumaini , na hivyo amekuwa baba wa mataifa mengi kama Maandiko Matakatifu yasemavyo : " Wazao wako watakuwa wengi kama nyota ! "

text: And being not weak in faith , he considered not his own body now dead , when he was about an hundred years old , neither yet the deadness of Sara ' s womb :
text2: Alikuwa mzee wa karibu miaka mia moja , lakini imani yake haikufifia ingawa alijua kwamba mwili wake ulikuwa kama umekufa , na pia mkewe , Sara , alikuwa tasa .

text: He staggered not at the promise of God through unbelief ; but was strong in faith , giving glory to God ;
text2: Abrahamu hakuionea mashaka ile ahadi ya Mungu ; alipata nguvu kutokana na imani , akamtukuza Mungu .

text: And being fully persuaded that , what he had promised , he was able also to perform .
text2: Alijua kwamba Mungu anaweza kuyatekeleza yale aliyoahidi .

text: And therefore it was imputed to him for righteousness .
text2: Ndiyo maana Mungu alimkubali kuwa mwadilifu .

text: Now it was not written for his sake alone , that it was imputed to him ;
text2: Inaposemwa , " Alimkubali , " haisemwi kwa ajili yake mwenyewe tu .

text: But for us also , to whom it shall be imputed , if we believe on him that raised up Jesus our Lord from the dead ;
text2: Jambo hili linatuhusu sisi pia ambao tunamwamini Mungu aliyemfufua Yesu , Bwana wetu , kutoka wafu .

text: Who was delivered for our offences , and was raised again for our justification .
text2: Yeye alitolewa auawe kwa ajili ya dhambi zetu , akafufuka ili tupate kukubaliwa kuwa waadilifu na Mungu .

text: Therefore being justified by faith , we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Sasa , kwa vile tumekubaliwa kuwa wadilifu kwa imani , basi , tunayo amani na Mungu kwa ajili ya Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo .

text: By whom also we have access by faith into this grace wherein we stand , and rejoice in hope of the glory of God .
text2: Kwa imani yetu , yeye ametuleta katika hali hii ya neema ya Mungu ambamo sasa tunaishi . Basi , tunajivunia tumaini tulilo nalo la kushiriki utukufu wa Mungu .

text: And not only so , but we glory in tribulations also : knowing that tribulation worketh patience ;
text2: Naam , si hayo tu , bali tunafurahi pia katika taabu tukijua kwamba taabu huleta saburi ,

text: And patience , experience ; and experience , hope :
text2: nayo saburi huleta uthabiti , na uthabiti huleta tumaini .

text: And hope maketh not ashamed ; because the love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us .
text2: Tumaini hilo haliwezi kutuhadaa , maana Mungu amekwisha miminia mioyoni mwetu upendo wake kwa njia ya Roho Mtakatifu aliyetujalia .

text: For when we were yet without strength , in due time Christ died for the ungodly .
text2: Tulipokuwa bado wanyonge , Kristo , wakati ulipotimia , alikufa kwa ajili yetu sisi waovu .

text: For scarcely for a righteous man will one die : yet peradventure for a good man some would even dare to die .
text2: Si rahisi mtu kufa kwa ajili ya mtu mwadilifu ; labda mtu anaweza kuthubutu kufa kwa ajili ya mtu mwema .

text: But God commendeth his love toward us , in that , while we were yet sinners , Christ died for us .
text2: Lakini Mungu amethibitisha kwamba anatupenda , maana wakati tulipokuwa bado wenye dhambi , Kristo alikufa kwa ajili yetu .

text: Much more then , being now justified by his blood , we shall be saved from wrath through him .
text2: Kwa kuwa sasa tumekubaliwa kuwa waadilifu kwa damu ya Kristo , ni dhahiri zaidi kwamba atatuokoa katika ghadhabu ya Mungu .

text: For if , when we were enemies , we were reconciled to God by the death of his Son , much more , being reconciled , we shall be saved by his life .
text2: Maana , tulipokuwa bado adui zake , Mungu alitupatanisha naye kwa kifo cha Mwanae . Na kwa vile sasa tumepatanishwa naye , ni dhahiri zaidi kwamba tutaokolewa kwa uzima wa Kristo .

text: And not only so , but we also joy in God through our Lord Jesus Christ , by whom we have now received the atonement .
text2: Wala si hayo tu , ila tunafurahi pia katika Mungu kwa njia ya Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo ambaye ametupatanisha na Mungu .

text: Wherefore , as by one man sin entered into the world , and death by sin ; and so death passed upon all men , for that all have sinned :
text2: Kwa njia ya mtu mmoja dhambi iliingia ulimwenguni , nayo ikasababisha kifo . Hivyo kifo kimeenea katika jumuiya yote ya binadamu , kwa maana wote wametenda dhambi .

text: ( For until the law sin was in the world : but sin is not imputed when there is no law .
text2: Kabla ya Sheria kuwako , dhambi ilikuwako ulimwenguni ; lakini dhambi haiwekwi katika kumbukumbu bila sheria .

text: Nevertheless death reigned from Adam to Moses , even over them that had not sinned after the similitude of Adam ' s transgression , who is the figure of him that was to come .
text2: Lakini tangu wakati wa Adamu mpaka wakati wa Mose , kifo kiliwatawala hata wale ambao hawakutenda dhambi kama ile ya Adamu , ya kumwasi Mungu . Adamu alikuwa kielelezo cha yule ambaye atakuja baadaye .

text: But not as the offence , so also is the free gift . For if through the offence of one many be dead , much more the grace of God , and the gift by grace , which is by one man , Jesus Christ , hath abounded unto many .
text2: Lakini ipo tofauti : neema ya Mungu si kama dhambi ya Adamu . Maana , ingawa dhambi ya mtu mmoja ilisababisha kifo kwa wote , kwa fadhili ya mtu mmoja , yaani Yesu Kristo , Mungu amewazidishia wote neema na zawadi zake .

text: And not as it was by one that sinned , so is the gift : for the judgment was by one to condemnation , but the free gift is of many offences unto justification .
text2: Kuna tofauti baina ya zawadi ya Mungu , na dhambi ya mtu yule mmoja . Maana , baada ya kosa la mtu mmoja , Mungu alitoa hukumu ; lakini baada ya makosa ya watu wengi , Mungu aliwapa zawadi yake kwa kuwasamehe .

text: For if by one man ' s offence death reigned by one ; much more they which receive abundance of grace and of the gift of righteousness shall reign in life by one , Jesus Christ . )
text2: Kweli , kwa dhambi ya mtu mmoja kifo kilianza kutawala kwa sababu ya huyo mtu mmoja ; lakini , ni dhahiri zaidi kwamba alichokifanya yule mtu mmoja , yaani Yesu Kristo , ni bora zaidi . Wote wanaopokea neema na zawadi hiyo ya kukubaliwa kuwa waadilifu , watatawala katika uzima kwa njia ya huyo mmoja , yaani Yesu Kristo .

text: Therefore as by the offence of one judgment came upon all men to condemnation ; even so by the righteousness of one the free gift came upon all men unto justification of life .
text2: Basi , kama vile kosa la mtu mmoja lilivyoleta hukumu kwa binadamu wote , kadhalika kitendo kimoja kiadilifu kinawapa uhuru na uzima .

text: For as by one man ' s disobedience many were made sinners , so by the obedience of one shall many be made righteous .
text2: Na kama kwa kutotii kwa mtu mmoja watu wengi walifanywa wenye dhambi , kadhalika kutii kwa mtu mmoja kutawafanya wengi wakubaliwe kuwa waadilifu .

text: Moreover the law entered , that the offence might abound . But where sin abounded , grace did much more abound :
text2: Sheria ilitokea , ikasababisha kuongezeka kwa uhalifu ; lakini pale dhambi ilipoongezeka , neema iliongezeka zaidi .

text: That as sin hath reigned unto death , even so might grace reign through righteousness unto eternal life by Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Kama vile dhambi ilivyotawala kwa kifo , kadhalika neema inatawala kwa njia ya uadilifu , na kuleta uzima wa milele kwa njia ya Yesu Kristo Bwana wetu .

text: What shall we say then ? Shall we continue in sin , that grace may abound ?
text2: Tuseme nini basi ? Je , twendelee kubaki katika dhambi ili neema ya Mungu iongezeke ?

text: God forbid . How shall we , that are dead to sin , live any longer therein ?
text2: Hata kidogo ! Kuhusu dhambi sisi tumekufa - - tutaendeleaje kuishi tena katika dhambi ?

text: Know ye not , that so many of us as were baptized into Jesus Christ were baptized into his death ?
text2: Maana , mnajua kwamba sisi tuliobatizwa tukaungana na Kristo Yesu , tulibatizwa na kuungana na kifo chake .

text: Therefore we are buried with him by baptism into death : that like as Christ was raised up from the dead by the glory of the Father , even so we also should walk in newness of life .
text2: Tulipobatizwa tuliungana na kifo chake , tukazikwa pamoja naye , ili kama vile Kristo alivyofufuliwa kutoka wafu kwa kitendo kitukufu cha Baba , sisi pia tuweze kuishi maisha mapya .

text: For if we have been planted together in the likeness of his death , we shall be also in the likeness of his resurrection :
text2: Maana , kama sisi tumeungana naye katika kufa kama yeye , vivyo hivyo tutaungana naye kwa kufufuliwa kutoka wafu kama yeye .

text: Knowing this , that our old man is crucified with him , that the body of sin might be destroyed , that henceforth we should not serve sin .
text2: Tunajua kwamba utu wetu wa kale ulisulubiwa pamoja na Kristo , ili hali ya dhambi iharibiwe , tusiwe tena watumwa wa dhambi .

text: For he that is dead is freed from sin .
text2: Kwa maana , mtu aliyekufa , amenasuliwa kutoka katika nguvu ya dhambi .

text: Now if we be dead with Christ , we believe that we shall also live with him :
text2: Basi , ikiwa tumekufa pamoja na Kristo , tunaamini kwamba tutaishi pia pamoja naye .

text: Knowing that Christ being raised from the dead dieth no more ; death hath no more dominion over him .
text2: Maana , tunajua kwamba Kristo amekwisha fufuliwa kutoka wafu na hafi tena ; kifo hakimtawali tena .

text: For in that he died , he died unto sin once : but in that he liveth , he liveth unto God .
text2: Hivyo , kwa kuwa alikufa - - mara moja tu - - dhambi haina nguvu tena juu yake ; na sasa anaishi maisha yake katika umoja na Mungu .

text: Likewise reckon ye also yourselves to be dead indeed unto sin , but alive unto God through Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Hali kadhalika nanyi lazima mjione kuwa mmekufa kuhusu dhambi , lakini kama mnaoishi katika umoja na Mungu kwa njia ya Kristo Yesu .

text: Let not sin therefore reign in your mortal body , that ye should obey it in the lusts thereof .
text2: Kwa hiyo , dhambi isiitawale tena miili yenu ambayo hufa , na hivyo kuzitii tamaa zake .

text: Neither yield ye your members as instruments of unrighteousness unto sin : but yield yourselves unto God , as those that are alive from the dead , and your members as instruments of righteousness unto God .
text2: Wala msitoe hata sehemu moja ya miili yenu iwe chombo cha kutenda uovu na dhambi . Badala yake , jitoleeni ninyi wenyewe kwa Mungu kama watu waliofufuliwa kutoka wafu ; toeni nafsi zenu zote kwa Mungu kwa ajili ya uadilifu .

text: For sin shall not have dominion over you : for ye are not under the law , but under grace .
text2: Maana , dhambi haitawatawala ninyi tena , kwani hamko chini ya Sheria , bali chini ya neema .

text: What then ? shall we sin , because we are not under the law , but under grace ? God forbid .
text2: Basi , tuseme nini ? Je , tutende dhambi ati kwa sababu hatuko chini ya Sheria bali chini ya neema ? Hata kidogo !

text: Know ye not , that to whom ye yield yourselves servants to obey , his servants ye are to whom ye obey ; whether of sin unto death , or of obedience unto righteousness ?
text2: Mnajua kwamba mkijitolea ninyi wenyewe kama watumwa na kumtii fulani , mnakuwa kweli watumwa wake mtu huyo - - au watumwa wa dhambi , na matokeo yake ni kifo , au wa utii , na matokeo yake ni kukubaliwa kuwa waadilifu .

text: But God be thanked , that ye were the servants of sin , but ye have obeyed from the heart that form of doctrine which was delivered you .
text2: Ingawa mlikuwa watumwa wa dhambi zamani , sasa lakini - - namshukuru Mungu - - mmetii kwa moyo wote yale maazimio na mafundisho mliyopokea .

text: Being then made free from sin , ye became the servants of righteousness .
text2: Mlikombolewa kutoka utumwa wa dhambi , mkawa watumwa wa uadilifu .

text: I speak after the manner of men because of the infirmity of your flesh : for as ye have yielded your members servants to uncleanness and to iniquity unto iniquity ; even so now yield your members servants to righteousness unto holiness .
text2: ( Hapa natumia lugha ya kawaida ya watu kwa sababu ya udhaifu wenu wenyewe . ) Kama vile wakati fulani mlivyojitolea ninyi wenyewe kutumikia uchafu na uhalifu kwa ajili ya uovu , vivyo hivyo sasa jitoleeni nafsi zenu wenyewe kutumikia uadilifu kwa ajili ya utakatifu .

text: For when ye were the servants of sin , ye were free from righteousness .
text2: Mlipokuwa watumwa wa dhambi , mlikuwa huru mbali na uadilifu .

text: What fruit had ye then in those things whereof ye are now ashamed ? for the end of those things is death .
text2: Sasa , mlipata faida gani siku zile kutokana na mambo yale ambayo mnayaonea aibu sasa ? Maana , matokeo ya mambo haya ni kifo !

text: But now being made free from sin , and become servants to God , ye have your fruit unto holiness , and the end everlasting life .
text2: Lakini sasa , mmekwisha kombolewa kutoka utumwa wa dhambi na mmekuwa watumishi wa Mungu ; faida mliyo nayo sasa ni utakatifu , na matokeo yake ni uzima wa milele .

text: For the wages of sin is death ; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Kwa maana mshahara wa dhambi ni kifo ; lakini zawadi anayotoa Mungu ni uzima wa milele katika kuungana na Kristo Yesu , Bwana wetu .

text: Know ye not , brethren , ( for I speak to them that know the law , ) how that the law hath dominion over a man as long as he liveth ?
text2: Ndugu zangu , bila shaka mtaelewa yafuatayo , maana ninawazungumzia watu wanaojua Sheria . Sheria humtawala mtu wakati akiwa hai .

text: For the woman which hath an husband is bound by the law to her husband so long as he liveth ; but if the husband be dead , she is loosed from the law of her husband .
text2: Mathalan : mwanamke aliyeolewa anafungwa na sheria muda wote mumewe anapokuw hai ; lakini mumewe akifa , hiyo sheria haimtawali tena huyo mwanamke .

text: So then if , while her husband liveth , she be married to another man , she shall be called an adulteress : but if her husband be dead , she is free from that law ; so that she is no adulteress , though she be married to another man .
text2: Hivyo mwanamke huyo akiishi na mwanamume mwingine wakati mumewe yungali hai , ataitwa mzinzi ; lakini mumewe akifa , mwanamke huyo yu huru kisheria , na akiolewa na mwanamume mwingine , yeye si mzinzi .

text: Wherefore , my brethren , ye also are become dead to the law by the body of Christ ; that ye should be married to another , even to him who is raised from the dead , that we should bring forth fruit unto God .
text2: Hali kadhalika ninyi ndugu zangu : ninyi pia mmekufa kuhusu Sheria kwa kuwa ninyi ni sehemu ya mwili wa Kristo ; sasa mmekuwa wake yeye aliyefufuliwa kutoka wafu ili tupate kuzaa matunda mema kwa ajili ya Mungu .

text: For when we were in the flesh , the motions of sins , which were by the law , did work in our members to bring forth fruit unto death .
text2: Maana , tulipokuwa tukiishi kimaumbile tu , tamaa mbaya zikichochewa na Sheria , zilifanya kazi katika miili yetu , na kuchuma pato la kifo .

text: But now we are delivered from the law , that being dead wherein we were held ; that we should serve in newness of spirit , and not in the oldness of the letter .
text2: Lakini sasa tumekuwa huru kutoka vifungo vya Sheria , kwa sababu tumekufa kuhusu lile jambo lililotufanya sisi watumwa . Sasa tunatumikia kufuatana na maisha mapya ya Roho , na si kufuatana na hali ile ya kale ya Sheria iliyoandikwa .

text: What shall we say then ? Is the law sin ? God forbid . Nay , I had not known sin , but by the law : for I had not known lust , except the law had said , Thou shalt not covet .
text2: Je , tuseme basi , kwamba Sheria ni dhambi ? Hata kidogo ! Lakini bila Sheria , mimi nisingalijua dhambi ni kitu gani . Maana , nisingalijua ni nini hasa kutamani mabaya , kama Sheria isingalikuwa imesema : " Usitamani . "

text: But sin , taking occasion by the commandment , wrought in me all manner of concupiscence . For without the law sin was dead .
text2: Kwa kuitumia hiyo amri , dhambi ilipata fursa ya kuamsha kila aina ya tamaa mbaya ndani yangu . Maana , bila Sheria dhambi ni kitu kilichokufa .

text: For I was alive without the law once : but when the commandment came , sin revived , and I died .
text2: Wakati mmoja mimi nilikuwa hai mbali na Sheria ; lakini amri ilipokuja , dhambi ilifufuka ,

text: And the commandment , which was ordained to life , I found to be unto death .
text2: nami nikafa . Hiyo amri ambayo shabaha yake ilikuwa kuleta uhai , kwangu imeleta kifo .

text: For sin , taking occasion by the commandment , deceived me , and by it slew me .
text2: Maana , dhambi ilichukua fursa iliyopatiwa na amri hiyo , ikanidanganya na kuniua .

text: Wherefore the law is holy , and the commandment holy , and just , and good .
text2: Basi , Sheria yenyewe ni takatifu , na amri yenyewe ni takatifu , ni ya haki na nzuri .

text: Was then that which is good made death unto me ? God forbid . But sin , that it might appear sin , working death in me by that which is good ; that sin by the commandment might become exceeding sinful .
text2: Je , hii inamaanisha kwamba kile kilicho kizuri kimesababisha kifo changu ? Hata kidogo ! Iliyo ni kwamba , dhambi , ili ionekane dhahiri kuwa ni dhambi , imekitumia kile kilicho kizuri na kusababisha kifo changu . Hivyo dhambi , kwa njia ya ile amri , ilijionyesha kikamilifu jinsi ilivyo mbaya mno .

text: For we know that the law is spiritual : but I am carnal , sold under sin .
text2: Tunajua kwamba Sheria ni ya kiroho , lakini mimi ni wa kidunia , mimi nimeuzwa kuwa mtumwa wa dhambi .

text: For that which I do I allow not : for what I would , that do I not ; but what I hate , that do I .
text2: Sielewi nifanyacho , maana kile ninachotaka sikifanyi , bali kile ninachochukia ndicho nikifanyacho .

text: If then I do that which I would not , I consent unto the law that it is good .
text2: Ikiwa basi , ninatenda kinyume cha matakwa yangu , hii inamaanisha kwamba nakubali kuwa ile Sheria ni nzuri .

text: Now then it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: Basi , si mimi hasa ninayefanya kitu hicho , bali ile dhambi iliyo ndani yangu .

text: For I know that in me ( that is , in my flesh , ) dwelleth no good thing : for to will is present with me ; but how to perform that which is good I find not .
text2: Najua kwamba hamna jema lolote ndani yangu mimi , kadiri ya ubinadamu wangu . Kwa maana , ingawa nataka kufanya jambo jema , siwezi kulitekeleza .

text: For the good that I would I do not : but the evil which I would not , that I do .
text2: Yaani , badala ya kufanya lile jambo jema ninalotaka , nafanya lile baya nisilotaka .

text: Now if I do that I would not , it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: Basi , kama ninafanya kinyume cha matakwa yangu , hii inamaanisha kwamba si mimi ninayefanya hayo , bali ni ile dhambi iliyo ndani yangu .

text: I find then a law , that , when I would do good , evil is present with me .
text2: Basi , nimegundua kanuni hii : ninataka kufanya jema , lakini najikuta kwamba lile lililo baya ndilo ninalochagua .

text: For I delight in the law of God after the inward man :
text2: Ndani kabisa katika moyo wangu naifurahia sheria ya Mungu .

text: But I see another law in my members , warring against the law of my mind , and bringing me into captivity to the law of sin which is in my members .
text2: Lakini naona kwamba kuna sheria nyingine inayofanya kazi mwilini mwangu , sheria ambayo inapingana na ile inayokubaliwa na akili yangu . Hiyo inanifanya niwe mtumwa wa sheria ya dhambi ifanyayo kazi mwilini mwangu .

text: O wretched man that I am ! who shall deliver me from the body of this death ?
text2: Maskini miye ! Nani atakayeniokoa kutoka katika mwili huu unaonipeleka kifoni ?

text: I thank God through Jesus Christ our Lord . So then with the mind I myself serve the law of God ; but with the flesh the law of sin .
text2: Shukrani kwa Mungu afanyaye hayo kwa njia ya Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo ! Hii basi , ndiyo hali yangu : mimi binafsi , kwa akili yangu , ninaitumikia sheria ya dhambi .

text: There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Kwa hiyo , sasa hakuna hukumu kwa wale ambao katika maisha yao wameungana na Kristo .

text: For the law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus hath made me free from the law of sin and death .
text2: Maana , sheria ya Roho iletayo uzima kwa kuungana na Kristo Yesu imenikomboa kutoka katika sheria ya dhambi na kifo .

text: For what the law could not do , in that it was weak through the flesh , God sending his own Son in the likeness of sinful flesh , and for sin , condemned sin in the flesh :
text2: Mungu ametekeleza jambo lile ambalo Sheria haikuweza kutekeleza kwa sababu ya udhaifu w binadamu . Mungu alimtuma Mwanae akiwa mwenye mwili sawa na miili yetu sisi wenye dhambi , ili aikabili dhambi , na kwa mwili huo akaiangamiza dhambi .

text: That the righteousness of the law might be fulfilled in us , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Mungu alifanya hivyo kusudi matakwa ya haki ya Sheria yatekelezwe kikamilifu ndani yetu sisi ambao tunaishi , si kwa nguvu za kibinadamu , bali kwa nguvu ya Roho .

text: For they that are after the flesh do mind the things of the flesh ; but they that are after the Spirit the things of the Spirit .
text2: Maana , wale wanaoishi kufuatana na matakwa ya mwili , hutawaliwa na fikira za mwili . Lakini wale wanaoishi kufuatana na matakwa ya Roho Mtakatifu , hutawaliwa na fikira za Roho .

text: For to be carnally minded is death ; but to be spiritually minded is life and peace .
text2: Fikira za mwili huleta kifo ; fikira za Roho huleta uzima na amani .

text: Because the carnal mind is enmity against God : for it is not subject to the law of God , neither indeed can be .
text2: Maana , mwenye kutawaliwa na fikira za mwili ni adui wa Mungu ; haitii sheria ya Mungu , wala hawezi kuitii .

text: So then they that are in the flesh cannot please God .
text2: Watu wanaotii matakwa ya mwili hawawezi kumpendeza Mungu .

text: But ye are not in the flesh , but in the Spirit , if so be that the Spirit of God dwell in you . Now if any man have not the Spirit of Christ , he is none of his .
text2: Lakini ninyi hamuishi kufuatana na matakwa ya mwili , bali kufuatana na matakwa ya Roho , ikiwa Roho wa Mungu anaishi ndani yenu . Yeyote asiye na Roho wa Kristo , huyo si wake Kristo .

text: And if Christ be in you , the body is dead because of sin ; but the Spirit is life because of righteousness .
text2: Lakini kama Kristo yumo ndani yenu , ingawa miili yenu itakufa kwa sababu ya dhambi , kwenu Roho ndiye uhai kwa sababu mmekubaliwa kuwa waadilifu .

text: But if the Spirit of him that raised up Jesus from the dead dwell in you , he that raised up Christ from the dead shall also quicken your mortal bodies by his Spirit that dwelleth in you .
text2: Ikiwa Roho wa Mungu aliyemfufua Kristo kutoka wafu anaishi ndani yenu , basi huyo aliyemfufua Kristo kutoka wafu ataipa uzima miili yenu yenye hali ya kufa ; atafanya hivyo kwa njia ya Roho wake akaaye ndani yenu .

text: Therefore , brethren , we are debtors , not to the flesh , to live after the flesh .
text2: Hivyo basi , ndugu zangu , tunalo jukumu , lakini si la kuishi kufuatana na maumbile ya kibinadamu .

text: For if ye live after the flesh , ye shall die : but if ye through the Spirit do mortify the deeds of the body , ye shall live .
text2: Kwa maana , kama mkiishi kufuatana na matakwa ya maumbile ya kibinadamu , hakika mtakufa . Lakini , kama kwa njia ya Roho mnayaua matendo yenu maovu , basi , mtaishi .

text: For as many as are led by the Spirit of God , they are the sons of God .
text2: Wote wanaoongozwa na Roho wa Mungu ni watoto wa Mungu .

text: For ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear ; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption , whereby we cry , Abba , Father .
text2: Kwa maana , Roho mliyempokea si Roho mwenye kuwafanya ninyi watumwa na kuwatia tena hofu ; sivyo , bali mmempokea Roho mwenye kuwafanya ninyi watoto wa Mungu , na kwa nguvu ya huyo Roho , sisi tunaweza kumwita Mungu , " Aba , " yaani " Baba ! "

text: The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit , that we are the children of God :
text2: Naye Roho mwenyewe anajiunga na roho zetu na kuthibitisha kwamba sisi ni watoto wa Mungu .

text: And if children , then heirs ; heirs of God , and joint - heirs with Christ ; if so be that we suffer with him , that we may be also glorified together .
text2: Basi , kwa vile sisi ni watoto wa Mungu , tutapokea baraka zote Mungu alizowawekea watu wake , na tutashiriki urithi huo pamoja na Kristo ; maana , tukiyashiriki mateso yake Kristo , tutaushiriki pia utukufu wake .

text: For I reckon that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us .
text2: Naona kuwa mateso ya wakati huu wa sasa si kitu kamwe kama tukiyafananisha na ule utukufu utakaodhihirishwa kwetu .

text: For the earnest expectation of the creature waiteth for the manifestation of the sons of God .
text2: Viumbe vyote vinatazamia kwa hamu Mungu awadhihirishe watoto wake .

text: For the creature was made subject to vanity , not willingly , but by reason of him who hath subjected the same in hope ,
text2: Kwa maana , viumbe viliwekwa katika hali ya kutojiweza kabisa , si kwa hiari yao , ila vilifanywa hivyo kwa mapenzi ya Mungu . Hata hivyo yapo matumaini ,

text: Because the creature itself also shall be delivered from the bondage of corruption into the glorious liberty of the children of God .
text2: maana hivyo viumbe navyo vitaokolewa kutoka katika utumwa wa uharibifu , vishiriki uhuru mtukufu wa watoto wa Mungu .

text: For we know that the whole creation groaneth and travaileth in pain together until now .
text2: Kwa maana tunajua kwamba mpaka hivi sasa , viumbe vyote vinalia kwa maumivu kama ya kujifungua mtoto .

text: And not only they , but ourselves also , which have the firstfruits of the Spirit , even we ourselves groan within ourselves , waiting for the adoption , to wit , the redemption of our body .
text2: Wala si hivyo viumbe peke yake , bali hata sisi tulio na huyo Roho , aliye wa kwanza wa zawadi za Mungu ; sisi pia tunalalamika ndani yetu , tukitazamia kufanywa watoto wa Mungu , nazo nafsi zenu zikombolewe .

text: For we are saved by hope : but hope that is seen is not hope : for what a man seeth , why doth he yet hope for ?
text2: Maana kwa matumaini hayo sisi tumekombolewa ; lakini tumaini halina maana ikiwa tunakiona kile tunachotumainia . Maana ni nani anayetumaini kile ambacho tayari anakiona ?

text: But if we hope for that we see not , then do we with patience wait for it .
text2: Kama tunakitumaini kile ambacho hatujakiona bado , basi , tunakingojea kwa uvumilivu .

text: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities : for we know not what we should pray for as we ought : but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered .
text2: Hali kadhalika , naye Roho anatusaidia katika udhaifu wetu . Maana hatujui inavyotupasa kuomba ; lakini Roho mwenyewe anatuombea kwa Mungu kwa mlio wa huzuni usioelezeka .

text: And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit , because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God .
text2: Naye Mungu aonaye mpaka ndani ya mioyo ya watu , anajua fikira ya huyo Roho ; kwani huyo Roho huwaombea watu wa Mungu kufuatana na mapenzi ya Mungu .

text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God , to them who are the called according to his purpose .
text2: Tunajua kwamba , katika mambo yote , Mungu hufanya kazi na kuifanikisha pamoja na wote wampendao , yaani wale aliowaita kufuatana na kusudi lake .

text: For whom he did foreknow , he also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his Son , that he might be the firstborn among many brethren .
text2: Maana hao aliowachagua tangu mwanzo , ndio aliowateua wapate kufanana na Mwanae , ili Mwana awe wa kwanza miongoni mwa ndugu wengi .

text: Moreover whom he did predestinate , them he also called : and whom he called , them he also justified : and whom he justified , them he also glorified .
text2: Basi , Mungu aliwaita wale aliokuwa amewateua ; na hao aliowaita aliwakubali kuwa waadilifu ; na hao aliowakubali kuwa waadilifu aliwashirikisha pia utukufu wake .

text: What shall we then say to these things ? If God be for us , who can be against us ?
text2: Kutokana na hayo , tuseme nini zaidi ? Ikiwa Mungu yuko upande wetu , nani awezaye kutupinga ?

text: He that spared not his own Son , but delivered him up for us all , how shall he not with him also freely give us all things ?
text2: Mungu hakumhurumia hata mwanae wa pekee , bali alimtoa kwa ajili yetu sisi sote . Ikiwa amefanya hivyo , je , hatatujalia pia mema yote ?

text: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God ' s elect ? It is God that justifieth .
text2: Ni nani atakayewashtaki wateule wa Mungu ? Mungu mwenyewe huwaondolea hatia !

text: Who is he that condemneth ? It is Christ that died , yea rather , that is risen again , who is even at the right hand of God , who also maketh intercession for us .
text2: Ni nani atakayewahukumu ? Hakuna ! Maana Kristo ndiye aliyekufa , tena alifufuka kutoka wafu na anakaa upande wa kulia wa Mungu . Yeye anatuombea !

text: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ ? shall tribulation , or distress , or persecution , or famine , or nakedness , or peril , or sword ?
text2: Ni nani awezaye kututenga na mapendo ya Kristo ? Je , ni taabu , au dhiki , au mateso , au njaa , au ukosefu wa nguo , au hatari , au kuuawa ?

text: As it is written , For thy sake we are killed all the day long ; we are accounted as sheep for the slaughter .
text2: Kama Maandiko Matakatifu yasemavyo : " Kwa ajili yako , twakikabili kifo kutwa kucha : tunatendewa kama kondoo wa kuchinjwa . "

text: Nay , in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us .
text2: Lakini , katika mambo haya yote , tumepata ushindi mkubwa kwa msaada wake yeye aliyetupenda .

text: For I am persuaded , that neither death , nor life , nor angels , nor principalities , nor powers , nor things present , nor things to come ,
text2: Maana ninajua hakika kwamba hakuna kitu kiwezacho kututenganisha na upendo wake : wala kifo , wala uhai ; wala malaika , au nguvu nyingine za mbinguni ; wala yanayotokea sasa , wala yatakayotokea baadaye ; wala mamlaka ;

text: Nor height , nor depth , nor any other creature , shall be able to separate us from the love of God , which is in Christ Jesus our Lord .
text2: Wala ulimwengu wa juu , wala wa chini kabisa . Hakuna kiumbe chochote kitakachoweza kututenga na upendo wa Mungu kwetu kwa njia ya Kristo Yesu Bwana wetu .

text: I say the truth in Christ , I lie not , my conscience also bearing me witness in the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Nasema ukweli mtupu ; nimeungana na Kristo nami sisemi uongo . Dhamiri yangu ikiongozwa na Roho Mtakatifu inanithibitishia jambo hili pia .

text: That I have great heaviness and continual sorrow in my heart .
text2: Nataka kusema hivi : nina huzuni kubwa na maumivu yasiyopimika moyoni mwangu

text: For I could wish that myself were accursed from Christ for my brethren , my kinsmen according to the flesh :
text2: kwa ajili ya watu wangu , walio damu moja nami ! Kama ingekuwa kwa faida yao , ningekuwa radhi kulaaniwa na kutengwa na Kristo .

text: Who are Israelites ; to whom pertaineth the adoption , and the glory , and the covenants , and the giving of the law , and the service of God , and the promises ;
text2: Hao ndio watu wa Israeli ambao Mungu aliwateua wawe watoto wake , akawashirikisha utukufu wake ; aliagana nao , akawapa Sheria yake , imani ya kweli na ahadi zake .

text: Whose are the fathers , and of whom as concerning the flesh Christ came , who is over all , God blessed for ever . Amen .
text2: Wao ni wajukuu wa mababu , naye Kristo , kadiri ya ubinadamu wake , ametoka katika ukoo wao . Mungu atawalaye juu ya yote , na atukuzwe milele ! Amina .

text: Not as though the word of God hath taken none effect . For they are not all Israel , which are of Israel :
text2: Sisemi kwamba ahadi ya Mungu imebatilika ; maana si watu wote wa Israeli ni wateule wa Mungu .

text: Neither , because they are the seed of Abraham , are they all children : but , In Isaac shall thy seed be called .
text2: Wala , si wazawa wote wa Abrahamu ni watoto wake wa kweli . Ila , kama yasemavyo Maandiko Matakatifu : " Wazao wake watatokana na Isaka . "

text: That is , They which are the children of the flesh , these are not the children of God : but the children of the promise are counted for the seed .
text2: Nido kusema , wale waliozaliwa kimaumbile ndio watoto wa Mungu , bali wale waliozaliwa kutokana na ahadi ya Mungu ndio watakaoitwa watoto wake .

text: For this is the word of promise , At this time will I come , and Sara shall have a son .
text2: Maana ahadi yenyewe ni hii : " Nitakujia wakati maalum , naye Sara atapata mtoto . "

text: And not only this ; but when Rebecca also had conceived by one , even by our father Isaac ;
text2: Tena si hayo tu ila pia Rebeka naye alipata mapacha kwa baba mmoja , yaani Isaka , babu yetu .

text: ( For the children being not yet born , neither having done any good or evil , that the purpose of God according to election might stand , not of works , but of him that calleth ; )
text2: Lakini , ili Mungu aonekane kwamba anao uhuru wa kuchagua , hata kabla wale ndugu hawajazaliwa na kabla hawajaweza kupambanua jema na baya ,

text: It was said unto her , The elder shall serve the younger .
text2: Rebeka aliambiwa kwamba yule mtoto wa kwanza atamtumikia yule wa nyuma . Hivyo uchaguzi wa Mungu unategemea jinsi anavyoita mwenyewe , na si matendo ya binadamu .

text: As it is written , Jacob have I loved , but Esau have I hated .
text2: Kama Maandiko Matakatifu yasemavyo : " Yakobo nilimpenda , lakini Esau nilimchukia . "

text: What shall we say then ? Is there unrighteousness with God ? God forbid .
text2: Basi , tuseme nini ? Je , Mungu amekosa haki ? Hata kidogo !

text: For he saith to Moses , I will have mercy on whom I will have mercy , and I will have compassion on whom I will have compassion .
text2: Maana alimwambia Mose : " Nitamhurumia mtu yeyote ninayetaka kumhurumia ; nitamwonea huruma mtu yeyote ninayetaka . "

text: So then it is not of him that willeth , nor of him that runneth , but of God that sheweth mercy .
text2: Kwa hiyo , yote hutegemea huruma ya Mungu , na si bidii au mapenzi ya mtu .

text: For the scripture saith unto Pharaoh , Even for this same purpose have I raised thee up , that I might shew my power in thee , and that my name might be declared throughout all the earth .
text2: Maana Maandiko Matakatifu yasema hivi kwa Farao : " Nilikufanya mfalme ili kwa njia yako , uwezo wangu ujulikane , na jina langu litangazwe popote duniani . "

text: Therefore hath he mercy on whom he will have mercy , and whom he will he hardeneth .
text2: Ni wazi , basi , kwamba Mungu humhurumia yeyote anayetaka kumhurumia , na akipenda kumfanya mtu awe mkaidi , hufanya hivyo .

text: Thou wilt say then unto me , Why doth he yet find fault ? For who hath resisted his will ?
text2: Labda utaniuliza : " Ikiwa mambo yako hivyo , Mungu anawezaje kumlaumu mtu ? Nani awezaye kuyapinga mapenzi yake ? "

text: Nay but , O man , who art thou that repliest against God ? Shall the thing formed say to him that formed it , Why hast thou made me thus ?
text2: Lakini , ewe binadamu , u nani hata uthubutu kumhoji Mungu ? Je , chungu chaweza kumwuliza mfinyanzi wake : " Kwa nini umenitengeneza namna hii ? "

text: Hath not the potter power over the clay , of the same lump to make one vessel unto honour , and another unto dishonour ?
text2: Mfinyanzi anaweza kuutumia udongo apendavyo na kufinyanga vyungu viwili kwa udongo uleule ; kimoja kwa matumizi ya heshima , na kingine kwa matumizi ya kawaida .
