text: And such were some of you : but ye are washed , but ye are sanctified , but ye are justified in the name of the Lord Jesus , and by the Spirit of our God .
text2: Baadhi yenu mlikuwa hivyo ; lakini sasa mmeoshwa , mkafanywa watakatifu , na kupatanishwa na Mungu kwa jina la Bwana Yesu Kristo na kwa Roho wa Mungu wetu .

text: All things are lawful unto me , but all things are not expedient : all things are lawful for me , but I will not be brought under the power of any .
text2: Mtu anaweza kusema : " Kwangu mimi kila kitu ni halali . " Sawa ; lakini si kila kitu kinafaa . Nakubali kwamba kila kitu ni halali kwangu lakini sitaki kutawaliwa na kitu chochote .

text: Meats for the belly , and the belly for meats : but God shall destroy both it and them . Now the body is not for fornication , but for the Lord ; and the Lord for the body .
text2: Unaweza kusema : " Chakula ni kwa ajili ya tumbo , na tumbo ni kwa ajili ya chakula . " Sawa ; lakini Mungu ataviharibu vyote viwili . Mwili wa mtu si kwa ajili ya uzinzi bali ni kwa ajili ya kumtumikia Bwana , naye Bwana ni kwa ajili ya mwili .

text: And God hath both raised up the Lord , and will also raise up us by his own power .
text2: Basi , Mungu aliyemfufua Bwana kutoka wafu atatufufua nasi pia kwa nguvu yake .

text: Know ye not that your bodies are the members of Christ ? shall I then take the members of Christ , and make them the members of an harlot ? God forbid .
text2: Je , hamjui kwamba miili yenu ni viungo vya mwili wa Kristo ? Je , mnadhani naweza kuchukua sehemu ya mwili wa Kristo na kuifanya kuwa sehemu ya mwili wa kahaba ? Hata kidogo !

text: What ? know ye not that he which is joined to an harlot is one body ? for two , saith he , shall be one flesh .
text2: Maana , kama mjuavyo , anayeungana na kahaba huwa mwili mmoja naye - - kama ilivyoandikwa : " Nao wawili watakuwa mwili mmoja . "

text: But he that is joined unto the Lord is one spirit .
text2: Lakini aliyejiunga na Bwana huwa roho moja naye .

text: Flee fornication . Every sin that a man doeth is without the body ; but he that commiteth fornication sinneth against his own body .
text2: Jiepusheni kabisa na uzinzi . Dhambi nyingine zote hutendwa nje ya mwili lakini mzinzi hutenda dhambi dhidi ya mwili wake mwenyewe .

text: What ? know ye not that your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost which is in you , which ye have of God , and ye are not your own ?
text2: Je , hamjui kwamba miili yenu ni hekalu la Roho Mtakatifu aliye ndani yenu , ambaye mlimpokea kutoka kwa Mungu ? Ninyi basi , si mali yenu wenyewe .

text: For ye are bought with a price : therefore glorify God in your body , and in your spirit , which are God ' s .
text2: Mlinunuliwa kwa bei kubwa . Kwa hiyo , itumieni miili yenu kwa ajili ya kumtukuza Mungu .

text: Now concerning the things whereof ye wrote unto me : It is good for a man not to touch a woman .
text2: Yahusu sasa mambo yale mliyoandika : naam , ni vizuri kama mtu haoi ;

text: Nevertheless , to avoid fornication , let every man have his own wife , and let every woman have her own husband .
text2: lakini kwa sababu ya hatari ya uzinzi , basi , kila mwanamume na awe na mke wake mwenyewe , na kila mwanamke awe na mume wake mwenyewe .

text: Let the husband render unto the wife due benevolence : and likewise also the wife unto the husband .
text2: Mume atimize wajibu alio nao kwa mkewe , naye mke atimize wajibu alio nao kwa mumewe .

text: The wife hath not power of her own body , but the husband : and likewise also the husband hath not power of his own body , but the wife .
text2: Mke hana mamlaka juu ya mwili wake , bali mumewe anayo ; hali kadhalika naye mume , hana mamlaka juu ya mwili wake , bali mkewe anayo .

text: Defraud ye not one the other , except it be with consent for a time , that ye may give yourselves to fasting and prayer ; and come together again , that Satan tempt you not for your incontinency .
text2: Msinyimane haki zenu , isipokuwa kama mnaafikiana kufanya hivyo kwa kitambo tu , ili mpate nafasi nzuri ya kusali . Kisha rudianeni tena mara , ili Shetani asije akawajaribu kwa sababu ya udhaifu wenu .

text: But I speak this by permission , and not of commandment .
text2: Ninayowaambieni sasa ni mawaidha , si amri .

text: For I would that all men were even as I myself . But every man hath his proper gift of God , one after this manner , and another after that .
text2: Ningependa watu wote wawe kama mimi nilivyo ; lakini kila mmoja anacho kipaji chake kutoka kwa Mungu ; mmoja kipaji hiki na mwingine kile .

text: I say therefore to the unmarried and widows , It is good for them if they abide even as I .
text2: Basi , wale ambao hawajaoana na wale walio wajane nawaambia kwamba ni vema kuendelea kuwa kama mimi nilivyo .

text: But if they cannot contain , let them marry : for it is better to marry than to burn .
text2: Hata hivyo , kama mtu hawezi kujizuia basi , na aoe ; maana ni afadhali zaidi kuoa kuliko kuwaka tamaa .

text: And unto the married I command , yet not I , but the Lord , Let not the wife depart from her husband :
text2: Kwa wale waliooa ninayo amri , tena si yangu , ila ni ya Bwana : mke asiachane na mumewe ;

text: But and if she depart , let her remain unmarried , or be reconciled to her husband : and let not the husband put away his wife .
text2: lakini kama akiachana naye , basi abaki bila kuolewa ; ama la , apatanishwe na mume wake . Mume naye asimpe talaka mkewe .

text: But to the rest speak I , not the Lord : If any brother hath a wife that believeth not , and she be pleased to dwell with him , let him not put her away .
text2: Kwa wale wengine , ( mimi binafsi , si Bwana ) nasema hivi : Ikiwa mwanamume Mkristo anaye mke asiyeamini , na huyo mwanamke akakubali kuendelea kuishi naye , asimpe talaka .

text: And the woman which hath an husband that believeth not , and if he be pleased to dwell with her , let her not leave him .
text2: Na , kama mwanamke Mkristo anaye mume asiyeamini , na huyo mwanamume akakubali kuendelea kuishi naye , basi , asimpe talaka mumewe .

text: For the unbelieving husband is sanctified by the wife , and the unbelieving wife is sanctified by the husband : else were your children unclean ; but now are they holy .
text2: Kwa maana huyo mume asiyeamini hupokelewa kwa Mungu kwa kuungana na mkewe ; na huyo mke asiyeamini hupokelewa kwa Mungu kwa kuungana na mumewe . Vinginevyo watoto wao wangekuwa si wa Mungu ; kumbe sasa ni watoto wake Mungu .

text: But if the unbelieving depart , let him depart . A brother or a sister is not under bondage in such cases : but God hath called us to peace .
text2: Hata hivyo , ikiwa yule asiyeamini anataka kumwacha mwenzake aliye Mkristo , basi , na amwache tu . Hapo huyo Mkristo , mume au mke , atakuwa huru . Maana Mungu amewaiteni ninyi muishi kwa amani .

text: For what knowest thou , O wife , whether thou shalt save thy husband ? or how knowest thou , O man , whether thou shalt save thy wife ?
text2: Wewe mama Mkristo , unawezaje kuwa na hakika kwamba hutaweza kumwokoa mume wako ? Au wewe mume Mkristo , unawezaje kuwa na hakika kwamba hutaweza kumwokoa mkeo ?

text: But as God hath distributed to every man , as the Lord hath called every one , so let him walk . And so ordain I in all churches .
text2: Kwa vyovyote kila mmoja na aishi kufuatana na vipaji alivyogawiwa na Bwana , na kama alivyoitwa na Mungu . Hili ndilo agizo langu kwa makanisa yote .

text: Is any man called being circumcised ? let him not become uncircumcised . Is any called in uncircumcision ? let him not be circumcised .
text2: Kama mtu aliitwa akiwa ametahiriwa , basi asijisingizie kwamba hakutahiriwa ; na kama alipoitwa hakuwa ametahiriwa , basi na asitahiriwe .

text: Circumcision is nothing , and uncircumcision is nothing , but the keeping of the commandments of God .
text2: Maana kutahiriwa au kutotahiriwa si kitu ; kilicho muhimu ni kuzishika amri za Mungu .

text: Let every man abide in the same calling wherein he was called .
text2: Basi , kila mmoja na abaki kama alivyokuwa wakati alipoitwa .

text: Art thou called being a servant ? care not for it : but if thou mayest be made free , use it rather .
text2: Je , wewe ulikuwa mtumwa wakati ulipoitwa ? Sawa , usijali ; lakini ukipata fursa ya kuwa huru , itumie .

text: For he that is called in the Lord , being a servant , is the Lord ' s freeman : likewise also he that is called , being free , is Christ ' s servant .
text2: Maana yeye aliyeitwa na Bwana akiwa mtumwa huyo huwa mtu huru wa Bwana . Hali kadhalika naye aliyeitwa akiwa mtu huru , huwa mtumwa wa Kristo .

text: Ye are bought with a price ; be not ye the servants of men .
text2: Nyote mmenunuliwa kwa bei ; kwa hiyo msiwe tena watumwa wa watu .

text: Brethren , let every man , wherein he is called , therein abide with God .
text2: Ndugu zangu , kila mmoja wenu basi , na abaki na Mungu kama alivyokuwa wakati alipoitwa .

text: Now concerning virgins I have no commandment of the Lord : yet I give my judgment , as one that hath obtained mercy of the Lord to be faithful .
text2: Sasa , kuhusu mabikira na waseja , sina amri kutoka kwa Bwana ; lakini natoa maoni yangu mimi ambaye kwa huruma yake Bwana nastahili kuaminiwa .

text: I suppose therefore that this is good for the present distress , I say , that it is good for a man so to be .
text2: Basi , kutokana na shida iliyopo sasa nadhani ingefaa mtu abaki kama alivyo .

text: Art thou bound unto a wife ? seek not to be loosed . Art thou loosed from a wife ? seek not a wife .
text2: Je , umeoa ? Basi , usitake kuachana na mkeo . Wewe hukuoa ? Basi , usitake kuoa .

text: But and if thou marry , thou hast not sinned ; and if a virgin marry , she hath not sinned . Nevertheless such shall have trouble in the flesh : but I spare you .
text2: Lakini ikiwa utaoa hutakuwa umetenda dhambi ; na msichana akiolewa hatakuwa ametenda dhambi . Hao watakaooana watapatwa na matatizo ya dunia hii , lakini mimi ningependa hayo yasiwapate ninyi .

text: But this I say , brethren , the time is short : it remaineth , that both they that have wives be as though they had none ;
text2: Ndugu , nataka kusema hivi : muda uliobaki ni mfupi . Na tangu sasa wale waliooa na waishi kama vile hawakuoa ;

text: And they that weep , as though they wept not ; and they that rejoice , as though they rejoiced not ; and they that buy , as though they possessed not ;
text2: wenye kulia wawe kama hawalii , na wenye kufurahi wawe kama hawafurahi ; wanaonunua wawe kama hawana kitu ;

text: And they that use this world , as not abusing it : for the fashion of this world passeth away .
text2: nao wenye shughuli na dunia hii wawe kama vile hawana shughuli sana nayo . Maana ulimwengu huu , kama tuujuavyo , unapita .

text: But I would have you without carefulness . He that is unmarried careth for the things that belong to the Lord , how he may please the Lord :
text2: Ningependa ninyi msiwe na wasiwasi . Mtu asiye na mke hujishughulisha na kazi ya Bwana jinsi atakavyompendeza Bwana .

text: But he that is married careth for the things that are of the world , how he may please his wife .
text2: Mtu aliyeoa hujishughulisha na mambo ya dunia jinsi atakavyompendeza mkewe ,

text: There is difference also between a wife and a virgin . The unmarried woman careth for the things of the Lord , that she may be holy both in body and in spirit : but she that is married careth for the things of the world , how she may please her husband .
text2: naye amegawanyika . Mwanamke asiyeolewa au bikira hujishughulisha na mambo ya Bwana apate kujitolea mwili na roho kwa Bwana . Lakini mwanamke aliyeolewa hujishughulisha na mambo ya dunia hii jinsi atakavyompendeza mumewe .

text: And this I speak for your own profit ; not that I may cast a snare upon you , but for that which is comely , and that ye may attend upon the Lord without distraction .
text2: Nawaambieni haya kwa faida yenu , na si kwa kuwawekeeni kizuio . Nataka tu muwe na mpango unaofaa , mpate kumtumikia Bwana kwa moyo na nia moja .

text: But if any man think that he behaveth himself uncomely toward his virgin , if she pass the flower of her age , and need so require , let him do what he will , he sinneth not : let them marry .
text2: Kama mtu anaona kwamba hamtendei vyema mchumba wake asipomwoa , na kama tamaa zake zinamshinda , na afanye atakavyo ; waoane tu ; hatakuwa ametenda dhambi .

text: Nevertheless he that standeth stedfast in his heart , having no necessity , but hath power over his own will , and hath so decreed in his heart that he will keep his virgin , doeth well .
text2: Lakini kama huyo mwanamume akiamua kwa hiari moyoni mwake kutooa na kama anaweza kuzitawala tamaa zake na kuamua namna ya kufanya , basi , anafanya vizuri zaidi asipomwoa huyo mwenzake bikira .

text: So then he that giveth her in marriage doeth well ; but he that giveth her not in marriage doeth better .
text2: Kwa maneno mengine : yule anayeamua kumwoa huyo mchumba wake anafanya vema ; naye anayeamua kutomwoa anafanya vema zaidi .

text: The wife is bound by the law as long as her husband liveth ; but if her husband be dead , she is at liberty to be married to whom she will ; only in the Lord .
text2: Mwanamke huwa amefungwa na mumewe kwa muda wote mumewe aishipo . Lakini mumewe akifa , mama huyo yuko huru , na akipenda anaweza kuolewa na mtu yeyote , mradi tu iwe Kikristo .

text: But she is happier if she so abide , after my judgment : and I think also that I have the Spirit of God .
text2: Lakini , nionavyo mimi , atakuwa na heri zaidi kama akibaki hivyo alivyo . Hayo ni maoni yangu , na nafikiri mimi pia ninaye Roho wa Mungu .

text: Now as touching things offered unto idols , we know that we all have knowledge . Knowledge puffeth up , but charity edifieth .
text2: Yahusu sasa vyakula vilivyotambikiwa sanamu : Tunajua kwamba sisi sote tuna ujuzi , lakini ujuzi huo huwafanya watu wawe na majivuno ; lakini mapendo hujenga .

text: And if any man think that he knoweth anything , he knoweth nothing yet as he ought to know .
text2: Anayefikiri kwamba anajua kitu , kwa kweli hajui chochote kama inavyompasa .

text: But if any man love God , the same is known of him .
text2: Lakini anayempenda Mungu huyo anajulikana naye .

text: As concerning therefore the eating of those things that are offered in sacrifice unto idols , we know that an idol is nothing in the world , and that there is none other God but one .
text2: Kwa hiyo , kuhusu vyakula vilivyotambikiwa sanamu , twajua kwamba sanamu si kitu duniani ; twajua kwamba Mungu ni mmoja tu .

text: For though there be that are called gods , whether in heaven or in earth , ( as there be gods many , and lords many , )
text2: Hata kama viko vitu viitwavyo miungu duniani au mbinguni , na hata kama wako miungu na mabwana wengi ,

text: But to us there is but one God , the Father , of whom are all things , and we in him ; and one Lord Jesus Christ , by whom are all things , and we by him .
text2: hata hivyo , kwetu sisi yuko Mungu mmoja tu : Baba , Muumba wa vyote , ambaye kwa ajili yake sisi tuko . Pia yuko Bwana mmoja tu , Yesu Kristo , ambaye kwa njia yake vitu vyote viliumbwa , na sisi twaishi kwa njia yake .

text: Howbeit there is not in every man that knowledge : for some with conscience of the idol unto this hour eat it as a thing offered unto an idol ; and their conscience being weak is defiled .
text2: Lakini , si kila mtu anao ujuzi huu . Maana wako watu wengine waliokwisha zoea sanamu , watu ambao mpaka hivi sasa wanapokula vyakula huviona bado kama vyakula vilivyotambikiwa sanamu . Na kwa vile dhamiri zao ni dhaifu , hutiwa unajisi .

text: But meat commendeth us not to God : for neither , if we eat , are we the better ; neither , if we eat not , are we the worse .
text2: Lakini chakula hakiwezi kutupeleka karibu zaidi na Mungu . Tukiacha kukila hatupungukiwi kitu , tukikila hatuongezewi kitu .

text: But take heed lest by any means this liberty of yours become a stumblingblock to them that are weak .
text2: Lakini , jihadharini : huu uhuru wenu usiwafanye walio na imani dhaifu waanguke katika dhambi .

text: For if any man see thee which hast knowledge sit at meat in the idol ' s temple , shall not the conscience of him which is weak be emboldened to eat those things which are offered to idols ;
text2: Maana , mtu ambaye dhamiri yake ni dhaifu , akikuona wewe mwenye ujuzi unakula vyakula hivyo ndani ya hekalu la sanamu , je , hatatiwa moyo wa kula vyakula vilivyotambikiwa sanamu ?

text: And through thy knowledge shall the weak brother perish , for whom Christ died ?
text2: Hivyo , huyo ndugu yako dhaifu ambaye Kristo alikufa kwa ajili yake , atapotea kwa sababu ya ujuzi wako .

text: But when ye sin so against the brethren , and wound their weak conscience , ye sin against Christ .
text2: Kama mkiwakosesha ndugu zenu jinsi hiyo na kuzijeruhi dhamiri zao dhaifu , mtakuwa mmemkosea Kristo .

text: Wherefore , if meat make my brother to offend , I will eat no flesh while the world standeth , lest I make my brother to offend .
text2: Kwa hiyo , ikiwa chakula husababisha kuanguka kwa ndugu yangu , sitakula nyama kamwe , nisije nikamfanya ndugu yangu aanguke katika dhambi .

text: Am I not an apostle ? am I not free ? have I not seen Jesus Christ our Lord ? are not ye my work in the Lord ?
text2: Je , mimi si mtu huru ? Je , mimi si mtume ? Je , mimi sikumwona Yesu Bwana wetu ? Je , ninyi si matokeo ya kazi yangu kwa ajili ya Bwana ?

text: If I be not an apostle unto others , yet doubtless I am to you : for the seal of mine apostleship are ye in the Lord .
text2: Hata kama kwa watu wengine mimi si mtume , lakini walau kwenu ninyi mimi ni mtume . Ninyi ni uthibitisho wa mtume wangu kwa sababu ya kuungana kwenu na Bwana .

text: Mine answer to them that do examine me is this ,
text2: Hoja yangu kwa wale wanaonipinga ndiyo hii :

text: Have we not power to eat and to drink ?
text2: Je , hatuna haki ya kula na kunywa ?

text: Have we not power to lead about a sister , a wife , as well as other apostles , and as the brethren of the Lord , and Cephas ?
text2: Je , hatuna ruhusa kumchukua mke Mkristo katika ziara zetu , kama vile wafanyavyo mitume wengine , ndugu zake Bwana , na pia Kefa ?

text: Or I only and Barnabas , have not we power to forbear working ?
text2: Au ni mimi tu na Barnaba ambao tunapaswa kujipatia maslahi yetu kwa kufanya kazi ?

text: Who goeth a warfare any time at his own charges ? who planteth a vineyard , and eateth not of the fruit thereof ? or who feedeth a flock , and eateth not of the milk of the flock ?
text2: Je , mwanajeshi gani anayelipia utumishi wake jeshini ? Mkulima gani asiyekula matunda ya shamba lake la mizabibu ? Mchungaji gani asiyekunywa maziwa ya mifugo yake ?

text: Say I these things as a man ? or saith not the law the same also ?
text2: Je , nasema mambo haya kibinadamu tu ? Je , Sheria nayo haisemi hivyo ?

text: For it is written in the law of Moses , Thou shalt not muzzle the mouth of the ox that treadeth out the corn . Doth God take care for oxen ?
text2: Imeandikwa katika Sheria ya Mose : " Usimfunge kinywa ng ' ombe anapoliwata nafaka . " Je , ndio kusema Mungu anajishughulisha na ng ' ombe ?

text: Or saith he it altogether for our sakes ? For our sakes , no doubt , this is written : that he that ploweth should plow in hope ; and that he that thresheth in hope should be partaker of his hope .
text2: Je , hakuwa anatufikiria sisi aliposema hivyo ? Naam , haya yaliandikwa kwa ajili yetu ; kwani yule anayelima na yule anayevuna , wote wawili wana haki ya kutumaini kupata sehemu ya mavuno .

text: If we have sown unto you spiritual things , is it a great thing if we shall reap your carnal things ?
text2: Ikiwa sisi tumepanda mbegu ya kiroho kati yenu , je , ni jambo kubwa tukichuma kwenu faida ya kidunia ?

text: If others be partakers of this power over you , are not we rather ? Nevertheless we have not used this power ; but suffer all things , lest we should hinder the gospel of Christ .
text2: Ikiwa wengine wanayo haki ya kutazamia hayo kutoka kwenu , je , sisi hatuna haki zaidi kuliko hao ? Lakini , sisi hatukuitumia haki hiyo , Badala yake , tumestahimili kila kitu ili tusiiwekee kizuizi chochote Habari Njema ya Kristo .

text: Do ye not know that they which minister about holy things live of the things of the temple ? and they which wait at the alter are partakers with the alter ?
text2: Je , hamjui kwamba wanaotumikia Hekaluni hupata chakula chao Hekaluni , na kwamba wanaotolea sadaka madhabahuni hupata sehemu ya hiyo sadaka ?

text: Even so hath the Lord ordained that they which preach the gospel should live of the gospel .
text2: Bwana aliagiza vivyo hivyo ; wahubiri wa Habari Njema wapate riziki zao kutokana nayo .

text: But I have used none of these things : neither have I written these things , that it should be so done unto me : for it were better for me to die , than that any man should make my glorying void .
text2: Lakini , mimi sikutumia hata mojawapo ya haki hizo . Na wala siandiki nijipatie haki hizo ; kwangu mimi ni afadhali kufa kuliko kumfanya yeyote aone kwamba najisifu bure .

text: For though I preach the gospel , I have nothing to glory of : for necessity is laid upon me ; yea , woe is unto me , if I preach not the gospel !
text2: Ikiwa ninaihubiri Habari Njema , hilo si jambo la kujivunia ; hilo ni jukumu nililopewa . Na , ole wangu kama sitaihubiri Habari Njema !

text: For if I do this thing willingly , I have a reward : but if against my will , a dispensation of the gospel is committed unto me .
text2: Ningekuwa nimeichagua kazi hii kwa hiari , basi , ningetazamia malipo ; lakini maadam naifanya ikiwa ni wajibu , hiyo ina maana kwamba ni jukumu nililopewa nitekeleze .

text: What is my reward then ? Verily that , when I preach the gospel , I may make the gospel of Christ without charge , that I abuse not my power in the gospel .
text2: Mshahara wangu ni kitu gani , basi ? Mshahara wangu ni fursa ya kuihubiri Habari Njema bure , bila kudai haki ninazostahili kwa kuihubiri .

text: For though I be free from all men , yet have I made myself servant unto all , that I might gain the more .
text2: Kwa hiyo , ingawa mimi si mtumwa wa mtu yeyote , nimejifanya mtumwa wa kila mtu ili nimpatie Kristo watu wengi iwezekanavyo .

text: And unto the Jews I became as a Jew , that I might gain the Jews ; to them that are under the law , as under the law , that I might gain them that are under the law ;
text2: Kwa Wayahudi nimeishi kama Myahudi ili niwapate Wayahudi ; yaani , ingawa mimi siko chini ya Sheria , nimejiweka chini ya Sheria kwao , ili niwapate hao walio chini ya Sheria .

text: To them that are without law , as without law , ( being not without law to God , but under the law to Christ , ) that I might gain them that are without law .
text2: Na kwa wale walio nje ya Sheria , naishi kama wao , nje ya Sheria , ili niwapate hao walio nje ya Sheria . Hii haimaanishi kwamba mimi niko nje ya sheria ya Mungu , maana nabanwa na sheria ya Kristo .

text: To the weak became I as weak , that I might gain the weak : I am made all things to all men , that I might by all means save some .
text2: Kwao walio dhaifu nimejifanya dhaifu ili niwapate hao walio dhaifu . Nimejifanya kila kitu kwa wote ili nipate kuwaokoa baadhi yao kwa kila njia .

text: And this I do for the gospel ' s sake , that I might be partaker thereof with you .
text2: Nafanya haya yote kwa ajili ya Habari Njema , nipate kushiriki baraka zake .

text: Know ye not that they which run in a race run all , but one receiveth the prize ? So run , that ye may obtain .
text2: Je , hamjui kwamba katika uwanja wa michezo , ingawa wapiga mbio wote hukimbia , ni mmoja tu anayejinyakulia zawadi ?

text: And every man that striveth for the mastery is temperate in all things . Now they do it to obtain a corruptible crown ; but we an incorruptible .
text2: Wanariadha hujipa mazoezi na nidhamu kali ; hufanya hivyo ili wajipatie taji iharibikayo ! Lakini sisi twafanya hivyo tupate taji ya kudumu daima .

text: I therefore so run , not as uncertainly ; so fight I , not as one that beateth the air :
text2: Ndivyo basi , ninavyopiga mbio nikiwa na nia ya kushinda ; ndivyo ninavyopigana , na si kama bondia anayetupa ngumi zake hewani .

text: But I keep under my body , and bring it into subjection : lest that by any means , when I have preached to others , I myself should be a castaway .
text2: Naupa mwili wangu mazoezi magumu na kuutia katika nidhamu kamili , nisije mimi mwenyewe nikakataliwa baada ya kuwahubiria wengine .

text: Moreover , brethren , I would not that ye should be ignorant , how that all our fathers were under the cloud , and all passed through the sea ;
text2: Ndugu , nataka mjue kwamba babu zetu wote walikuwa chini ya ulinzi wa lile wingu , na kwamba wote walivuka salama ile bahari .

text: And were all baptized unto Moses in the cloud and in the sea ;
text2: Wote walibatizwa katika umoja na Mose kwa lile wingu na ile bahari .

text: And did all eat the same spiritual meat ;
text2: Wote walikula chakula kilekile cha kiroho ,

text: And did all drink the same spiritual drink : for they drank of that spiritual Rock that followed them : and that Rock was Christ .
text2: wakanywa pia kinywaji kilekile cha kiroho , maana walikunywa kutoka ule mwamba wa kiroho uliowafuata ; mwamba huo ulikuwa Kristo mwenyewe .

text: But with many of them God was not well pleased : for they were overthrown in the wilderness .
text2: Hata hivyo , wengi wao hawakumpendeza Mungu , na maiti zao zilisambazwa jangwani .

text: Now these things were our examples , to the intent we should not lust after evil things , as they also lusted .
text2: Sasa , mambo hayo yote ni mfano tu kwetu ; yanatuonya sisi tusitamani ubaya kama wao walivyotamani .

text: Neither be ye idolaters , as were some of them ; as it is written , The people sat down to eat and drink , and rose up to play .
text2: Msiwe waabudu sanamu kama baadhi yao walivyokuwa ; kama yasemavyo Maandiko : " Watu waliketi kula na kunywa , wakasimama kucheza . "

text: Neither let us commit fornication , as some of them committed , and fell in one day three and twenty thousand .
text2: Wala tusizini kama baadhi yao walivyozini , wakaangamia siku moja watu ishirini na tatu elfu .

text: Neither let us tempt Christ , as some of them also tempted , and were destroyed of serpents .
text2: Tusimjaribu Bwana kama baadhi yao walivyomjaribu , wakauawa na nyoka .

text: Neither murmur ye , as some of them also murmured , and were destroyed of the destroyer .
text2: Wala msinung ' unike kama baadhi yao walivyonung ' unika , wakaangamizwa na Mwangamizi !

text: Now all these things happened unto them for ensamples : and they are written for our admonition , upon whom the ends of the world are come .
text2: Basi , mambo hayo yaliyowapata wao ni kielelezo kwa wengine , na yaliandikwa ili kutuonya sisi , ambao mwisho wa nyakati unatukabili .

text: Wherefore let him that thinketh he standeth take heed lest he fall .
text2: Anayedhani amesimama imara ajihadhari asianguke .

text: There hath no temptation taken you but such as is common to man : but God is faithful , who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able ; but will with the temptation also make a way to escape , that ye may be able to bear it .
text2: Majaribu mliyokwisha pata ni ya kawaida kwa binadamu . Mungu ni mwaminifu , naye hataruhusu mjaribiwe kupita nguvu zenu , ila pamoja na majaribu , yeye atawapeni pia nguvu ya kustahimili na njia ya kutoka humo salama .

text: Wherefore , my dearly beloved , flee from idolatry .
text2: Kwa hiyo , wapenzi wangu , epeni ibada za sanamu .

text: I speak as to wise men ; judge ye what I say .
text2: Naongea nanyi , watu wenye busara ; jiamulieni wenyewe hayo nisemayo .

text: The cup of blessing which we bless , is it not the communion of the blood of Christ ? The bread which we break , is it not the communion of the body of Christ ?
text2: Tunapomshukuru Mungu kwa kikombe kile cha baraka , je , huwa hatushiriki damu ya Kristo ? Na tunapoumega mkate , je , huwa hatushiriki mwili wa Kristo ?

text: For we being many are one bread , and one body : for we are all partakers of that one bread .
text2: Kwa kuwa mkate huo ni mmoja , sisi , ingawa ni wengi , tu mwili mmoja ; maana sote twashiriki mkate huohuo .

text: Behold Israel after the flesh : are not they which eat of the sacrifices partakers of the alter ?
text2: Chukueni , kwa mfano , Wayahudi wenyewe : kwao , wenye kula vilivyotambikiwa madhabahuni waliungana na hiyo madhabahu .

text: What say I then ? that the idol is any thing , or that which is offered in sacrifice to idols is any thing ?
text2: Nataka kusema nini , basi ? Kwamba chakula kilichotambikiwa sanamu ni kitu zaidi ya chakula ? Na hizo sanamu , je , ni kitu kweli zaidi ya sanamu ?

text: But I say , that the things which the Gentiles sacrifice , they sacrifice to devils , and not to God : and I would not that ye should have fellowship with devils .
text2: Hata kidogo ! Ninachosema ni kwamba tambiko wanazotoa watu wasiomjua Mungu wanawatolea pepo , sio Mungu . Sipendi kamwe ninyi muwe na ushirika na pepo .

text: Ye cannot drink the cup of the Lord , and the cup of devils : ye cannot be partakers of the Lord ' s table , and of the table of devils .
text2: Hamwezi kunywa kikombe cha Bwana na kikombe cha pepo ; hamwezi kushiriki katika meza ya Bwana na katika meza ya pepo .

text: Do we provoke the Lord to jealousy ? are we stronger than he ?
text2: Au je , tunataka kumfanya Bwana awe na wivu ? Mnadhani tuna nguvu zaidi kuliko yeye ?

text: All things are lawful for me , but all things are not expedient : all things are lawful for me , but all things edify not .
text2: Vitu vyote ni halali , lakini si vyote vinafaa . Vitu vyote ni halali lakini si vyote vinajenga .

text: Let no man seek his own , but every man another ' s wealth .
text2: Mtu asitafute faida yake mwenyewe , ila faida ya mwenzake .

text: Whatsoever is sold in the shambles , that eat , asking no question for conscience sake :
text2: Kuleni chochote kile kiuzwacho sokoni bila ya kuulizauliza kwa sababu ya dhamiri zenu ;

text: For the earth is the Lord ' s , and the fulness thereof .
text2: maana Maandiko yasema : " Dunia na vyote vilivyomo ni mali ya Bwana . "

text: If any of them that believe not bid you to a feast , and ye be disposed to go ; whatsoever is set before you , eat , asking no question for conscience sake .
text2: Kama mtu ambaye si muumini akiwaalikeni nanyi mkakubali kwenda , basi , kuleni vyote atakavyowaandalieni bila kuulizauliza kwa sababu ya dhamiri zenu .

text: But if any man say unto you , This is offered in sacrifice unto idols , eat not for his sake that shewed it , and for conscience sake : for the earth is the Lord ' s , and the fulness thereof :
text2: Lakini mtu akiwaambieni : " Chakula hiki kimetambikiwa sanamu , " basi , kwa ajili ya huyo aliyewaambieni hivyo na kwa ajili ya dhamiri , msile .

text: Conscience , I say , not thine own , but of the other : for why is my liberty judged of another man ' s conscience ?
text2: Nasema , " kwa ajili ya dhamiri , " si dhamiri yenu , bali dhamiri yake huyo aliyewaambieni . Mtaniuliza : " Kwa nini uhuru wangu utegemee dhamiri ya mtu mwingine ?

text: For if I by grace be a partaker , why am I evil spoken of for that for which I give thanks ?
text2: Ikiwa mimi nashiriki chakula hicho huku namshukuru Mungu , kwa nini nilaumiwe kwa chakula ambacho kwa ajili yake nimemshukuru Mungu ? "

text: Whether therefore ye eat , or drink , or whatsoever ye do , do all to the glory of God .
text2: Basi , chochote mfanyacho iwe ni kula au kunywa , fanyeni yote kwa ajili ya utukufu wa Mungu .

text: Give none offence , neither to the Jews , nor to the Gentiles , nor to the church of God :
text2: Msiwe kikwazo kwa Wayahudi au kwa Wagiriki au kwa kanisa la Mungu .

text: Even as I please all men in all things , not seeking mine own profit , but the profit of many , that they may be saved .
text2: Muwe kama mimi ; najaribu kuwapendeza wote kwa kila njia , bila kutafuta faida yangu mwenyewe ila faida ya wote , wapate kuokolewa .

text: Be ye followers of me , even as I also am of Christ .
text2: Niigeni mimi kama ninavyomwiga Kristo .

text: Now I praise you , brethren , that ye remember me in all things , and keep the ordinances , as I delivered them to you .
text2: Nawapeni hongera kwa sababu mnanikumbuka na kwa sababu mnayashikilia yale maagizo niliyowapeni .

text: But I would have you know , that the head of every man is Christ ; and the head of the woman is the man ; and the head of Christ is God .
text2: Lakini napenda pia mjue kwamba Kristo ni kichwa cha kila mwanamume , na mwanamume ni kichwa cha mkewe , na Mungu ni kichwa cha Kristo .

text: Every man praying or prophesying , having his head covered , dishonoureth his head .
text2: Basi , kila mwanamume anayesali au anayetangaza ujumbe wa Mungu huku amefunika kichwa chake , huyo anamdharau Kristo .

text: But every woman that prayeth or prophesieth with her head uncovered dishonoureth her head : for that is even all one as if she were shaven .
text2: Na mwanamke akisali au kutangaza ujumbe wa Mungu bila kufunika kichwa chake , anamdharau mumewe ; anayefanya hivyo ni sawa tu na mwanamke aliyenyoa kichwa chake .

text: For if the woman be not covered , let her also be shorn : but if it be a shame for a woman to be shorn or shaven , let her be covered .
text2: Mwanamke asiyefunika kichwa chake , afadhali anyoe nywele zake . Lakini ni aibu kwa mwanamke kukatwa nywele zake au kunyolewa ; basi , afadhali afunike kichwa chake .

text: For a man indeed ought not to cover his head , forasmuch as he is the image and glory of God : but the woman is the glory of the man .
text2: Haifai mwanamume kufunika kichwa chake , kwa kuwa yeye ni mfano wa Mungu na kioo cha utukufu wake Mungu ; lakini mwanamke ni kioo cha utukufu wa mwanamume .

text: For the man is not of the woman ; but the woman of the man .
text2: Mwanamume hakutoka kwa mwanamke , ila mwanamke alitoka kwa mwanamume .

text: Neither was the man created for the woman ; but the woman for the man .
text2: Mwanamume hakuumbwa kwa ajili ya mwanamke , ila mwanamke aliumbwa kwa ajili ya mwanamume .

text: For this cause ought the woman to have power on her head because of the angels .
text2: Ndiyo maana mwanamke hufunika kichwa chake , iwe ishara ya mamlaka yaliyo juu yake , na pia kwa sababu ya malaika .

text: Nevertheless neither is the man without the woman , neither the woman without the man , in the Lord .
text2: Hata hivyo , mbele ya Bwana mwanamke si kitu bila mwanamume , naye mwanamume si kitu bila mwanamke .

text: For as the woman is of the man , even so is the man also by the woman ; but all things of god .
text2: Kama vile mwanamke alivyotokana na mwanamume , vivyo hivyo mwanamume huzaliwa na mwanamke ; kila kitu hutoka kwa Mungu .

text: Judge in yourselves : is it comely that a woman pray unto God uncovered ?
text2: Amueni wenyewe : Je , inafaa mwanamke kumwomba Mungu bila kuvaa kitu kichwani ?

text: Doth not even nature itself teach you , that , if a man have long hair , it is a shame unto him ?
text2: Hata maumbile yenyewe huonyesha wazi kwamba kwa mwanamume kuwa na nywele ndefu ni aibu kwake mwenyewe ;

text: But if a woman have long hair , it is a glory to her : for her hair is given her for a covering .
text2: lakini kwa mwanamke kuwa na nywele ni heshima kwake ; nywele zake ndefu amepewa ili zimfunike .

text: But if any man seem to be contentious , we have no such custom , neither the churches of God .
text2: Kama mtu anataka kuleta ubishi juu ya jambo hili , basi , na ajue kwamba sisi hatuna desturi nyingine , wala makanisa ya Mungu hayana desturi nyingine .

text: Now in this that I declare unto you I praise you not , that ye come together not for the better , but for the worse .
text2: Nikiwa bado nawapeni maagizo haya , siwezi hata kidogo kuwapa ninyi hongera kuhusu haya yafuatayo : mikutano yenu ninyi waumini yaleta hasara zaidi kuliko faida .

text: For first of all , when ye come together in the church , I hear that there be divisions among you ; and I partly believe it .
text2: Awali ya yote , nasikia kwamba mnapokutana pamoja hutokea mafarakano kati yenu . Nami naamini kiasi ,

text: For there must be also heresies among you , that they which are approved may be made manifest among you .
text2: maana ni lazima fikira tofauti ziweko miongoni mwenu , ili wale walio thabiti wapate kutambulikana .

text: When ye come together therefore into one place , this is not to eat the Lord ' s supper .
text2: Kweli mnakutana , lakini si kwa ajili ya kula chakula cha Bwana !

text: For in eating every one taketh before other his own supper : and one is hungry , and another is drunken .
text2: Maana mnapokula kila mmoja hukikalia chakula chake mwenyewe , hata hutokea kwamba baadhi yenu wana njaa , na wengine wamelewa !

text: What ? have ye not houses to eat and to drink in ? or despise ye the church of God , and shame them that have not ? What shall I say to you ? shall I praise you in this ? I praise you not .
text2: Je , hamwezi kula na kunywa nyumbani kwenu ! Au je , mnalidharau kanisa la Mungu na kuwaaibisha hao wasio na kitu ? Niwaambie nini ? Niwasifu ? La hasha ! Si kuhusu jambo hili .

text: For I have received of the Lord that which also I delivered unto you , That the Lord Jesus the same night in which he was betrayed took bread :
text2: Maana mimi nilipokea kwa Bwana yale maagizo niliyowaachieni : kwamba , usiku ule Bwana Yesu aliotolewa , alitwaa mkate ,

text: And when he had given thanks , he brake it , and said , Take , eat : this is my body , which is broken for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: akamshukuru Mungu , akaumega , akasema : " Huu ndio mwili wangu ulio kwa ajili yenu ; fanyeni hivi kwa kunikumbuka . "

text: After the same manner also he took the cup , when he had supped , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood : this do ye , as oft as ye drink it , in remembrance of me .
text2: Vivyo hivyo , baada ya kula , akatwaa kikombe akasema : " Hiki ni kikombe cha agano jipya linalothibitishwa kwa damu yangu . Fanyeni hivi , kila mnapokunywa , kwa kunikumbuka . "

text: For as often as ye eat this bread , and drink this cup , ye do shew the Lord ' s death till he come .
text2: Maana kila mnapokula mkate huu na kunywa kikombe hiki , mwatangaza kifo cha Bwana , mpaka atakapokuja .

text: Wherefore whosoever shall eat this bread , and drink this cup of the Lord , unworthily , shall be guilty of the body and blood of the Lord .
text2: Kwa hiyo , kila aulaye mkate huo au kunywa kikombe cha Bwana bila kustahili , atakuwa na hatia dhidi ya mwili na damu ya Bwana .

text: But let a man examine himself , and so let him eat of that bread , and drink of that cup .
text2: Basi , kila mtu ajichunguze mwenyewe kwanza , ndipo ale mkate huo na anywe kikombe hicho ;

text: For he that eateth and drinketh unworthily , eateth and drinketh damnation to himself , not discerning the Lord ' s body .
text2: maana anayekula na kunywa bila kutambua maana ya mwili wa Bwana , anakula na kunywa hukumu yake yeye mwenyewe .

text: For this cause many are weak and sickly among you , and many sleep .
text2: Ndiyo maana wengi kati yenu ni dhaifu na wagonjwa , na wengine kadhaa wamekufa .

text: For if we would judge ourselves , we should not be judged .
text2: Kama tungejichunguza wenyewe vizuri hatungeadhibiwa hivyo .

text: But when we are judged , we are chastened of the Lord , that we should not be condemned with the world .
text2: Lakini tunapohukumiwa na Bwana , tunafunzwa tuwe na nidhamu , ili tusije tukahukumiwa pamoja na ulimwengu .

text: Wherefore , my brethren , when ye come together to eat , tarry one for another .
text2: Kwa hiyo , ndugu zangu , mnapokutana kula chakula cha Bwana , kila mmoja amngoje mwenzake .

text: And if any man hunger , let him eat at home ; that ye come not together unto condemnation . And the rest will I set in order when I come .
text2: Na kama kuna yeyote aliye na njaa , na ale nyumbani kwake , ili kukutana kwenu kusisababishe hukumu . Lakini , kuhusu yale mambo mengine , nitawapeni maelezo nitakapokuja .

text: Now concerning spiritual gifts , brethren , I would not have you ignorant .
text2: Ndugu , kuhusu vipaji vya kiroho , napenda mfahamu vizuri mambo haya :

text: Ye know that ye were Gentiles , carried away unto these dumb idols , even as ye were led .
text2: Mnajua kwamba , kabla ya kuongoka kwenu , mlitawaliwa na kupotoshwa na sanamu tupu .

text: Wherefore I give you to understand , that no man speaking by the Spirit of God calleth Jesus accursed : and that no man can say that Jesus is the Lord , but by the Holy Ghost .
text2: Basi , jueni kwamba mtu yeyote anayeongozwa na Roho wa Mungu hawezi kusema : " Yesu alaaniwe ! " Hali kadhalika , mtu yeyote hawezi kusema : " Yesu ni Bwana , " asipoongozwa na Roho Mtakatifu .

text: Now there are diversities of gifts , but the same Spirit .
text2: Vipaji vya kiroho ni vya namna nyingi , lakini Roho avitoaye ni mmoja .

text: And there are differences of administrations , but the same Lord .
text2: Kuna namna nyingi za kutumikia , lakini Bwana anayetumikiwa ni mmoja .

text: And there are diversities of operations , but it is the same God which worketh all in all .
text2: Kuna namna mbalimbali za kufanya kazi ya huduma , lakini Mungu ni mmoja , anayewezesha kazi zote katika wote .

text: But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal .
text2: Kila mtu hupewa mwangaza wa Roho kwa faida ya wote .

text: For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom ; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit ;
text2: Roho humpa mmoja ujumbe wa hekima , na mwingine ujumbe wa elimu apendavyo Roho huyohuyo .

text: To another faith by the same Spirit ; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit ;
text2: Roho huyohuyo humpa mmoja imani , na humpa mwingine kipaji cha kuponya ;

text: To another the working of miracles ; to another prophecy ; to another discerning of spirits ; to another divers kinds of tongues ; to another the interpretation of tongues :
text2: humpa mmoja kipaji cha kufanya miujiza , mwingine kipaji cha kusema ujumbe wa Mungu , mwingine kipaji cha kubainisha vipaji vitokavyo kwa Roho na visivyo vya Roho ; humpa mmoja kipaji cha kusema lugha ngeni , na mwingine kipaji cha kuzifafanua .

text: But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit , dividing to every man severally as he will .
text2: Hizo zote ni kazi za Roho huyohuyo mmoja , ambaye humpa kila mtu kipaji tofauti , kama apendavyo mwenyewe .

text: For as the body is one , and hath many members , and all the members of that one body , being many , are one body : so also is Christ .
text2: Kama vile mwili ulivyo mmoja wenye viungo vingi , na viungo hivyo vyote - - ingawaje ni vingi - - hufanya mwili mmoja , ndivyo ilivyo pia kwa Kristo .

text: For by one Spirit are we all baptized into one body , whether we be Jews or Gentiles , whether we be bond or free ; and have been all made to drink into one Spirit .
text2: Maana sisi , tukiwa Wayahudi au watu wa mataifa mengine , watumwa au watu huru , sote tumebatizwa kwa Roho mmoja katika mwili huo mmoja ; na sote tukanyweshwa Roho huyo mmoja .

text: For the body is not one member , but many .
text2: Mwili hauna kiungo kimoja tu , bali una viungo vingi .

text: If the foot shall say , Because I am not the hand , I am not of the body ; is it therefore not of the body ?
text2: Kama mguu ungejisemea : " Kwa kuwa mimi si mkono , basi mimi si mali ya mwili " , je , ungekoma kuwa sehemu ya mwili ? La hasha !

text: And if the ear shall say , Because I am not the eye , I am not of the body ; is it therefore not of the body ?
text2: Kama sikio lingejisemea : " Kwa vile mimi si jicho , basi mimi si mali ya mwili " , je , kwa hoja hiyo lingekoma kuwa sehemu ya mwili ? La !

text: If the whole body were an eye , where were the hearing ? If the whole were hearing , where were the smelling ?
text2: Kama mwili wote ungekuwa jicho , sikio lingekuwa wapi ? Na kama mwili wote ungekuwa sikio , mtu angewezaje kunusa ?

text: But now hath God set the members every one of them in the body , as it hath pleased him .
text2: Lakini kama ilivyo , Mungu alizipanga sehemu hizo tofauti katika mwili kama alivyopenda .

text: And if they were all one member , where were the body ?
text2: Kama sehemu zote zingekuwa kiungo kimoja , mwili ungekuwa wapi ?

text: But now are they many members , yet but one body .
text2: Ukweli ni kwamba , sehemu za mwili ni nyingi , lakini mwili ni mmoja .

text: And the eye cannot say unto the hand , I have no need of thee : nor again the head to the feet , I have no need of you .
text2: Basi , jicho haliwezi kuuambia mkono : " Sikuhitaji wewe " , wala kichwa hakiwezi kuiambia miguu : " Siwahitaji ninyi . "

text: Nay , much more those members of the body , which seem to be more feeble , are necessary :
text2: Zaidi ya hayo , inaonekana kwamba sehemu zile za mwili zinazoonekana kuwa ni dhaifu ndizo zilizo muhimu zaidi .

text: And those members of the body , which we think to be less honourable , upon these we bestow more abundant honour ; and our uncomely parts have more abundant comeliness .
text2: Tena , viungo vile tunavyovifikiria kuwa havistahili heshima kubwa , ndivyo tunavyovitunza kwa uangalifu zaidi ; viungo vya mwili ambavyo havionekani kuwa vizuri sana , huhifadhiwa zaidi ,

text: For our comely parts have no need : but God hath tempered the body together , having given more abundant honour to that part which lacked :
text2: ambapo viungo vingine havihitaji kushughulikiwa . Mungu mwenyewe ameuweka mwili katika mpango , akakipa heshima zaidi kiungo kile kilichopungukiwa heshima ,

text: That there should be no schism in the body ; but that the members should have the same care one for another .
text2: ili kusiweko na utengano katika mwili bali viungo vyote vishughulikiane .

text: And whether one member suffer , all the members suffer with it ; or one member be honoured , all the members rejoice with it .
text2: Kama kiungo kimoja kinaumia viungo vyote huumia pamoja nacho . Kiungo kimoja kikisifiwa viungo vingine vyote hufurahi pamoja nacho .

text: Now ye are the body of Christ , and members in particular .
text2: Basi , ninyi nyote ni mwili wa Kristo ; kila mmoja wenu ni kiungo cha mwili huo .

text: And God hath set some in the church , first apostles , secondarily prophets , thirdly teachers , after that miracles , then gifts of healings , helps , governments , diversities of tongues .
text2: Mungu ameweka katika kanisa : kwanza mitume , pili manabii , tatu walimu ; kisha ameweka wale wenye kipaji cha kufanya miujiza , kuponya , kusaidia ; viongozi na wenye kusema lugha ngeni .

text: Are all apostles ? are all prophets ? are all teachers ? are all workers of miracles ?
text2: Je , wote ni mitume ? Wote ni manabii ? Wote ni walimu ? Wote ni wenye kipaji cha kufanya miujiza ?

text: Have all the gifts of healing ? do all speak with tongues ? do all interpret ?
text2: Je , wote ni wenye kipaji cha kuponya ? Wote ni wenye kipaji cha kusema lugha ngeni ? Je , wote hufafanua lugha ?

text: But covet earnestly the best gifts : and yet shew I unto you a more excellent way .
text2: Muwe basi , na tamaa ya kupata vipaji muhimu zaidi . Nami sasa nitawaonyesheni njia bora zaidi kuliko hizi zote .

text: Though I speak with the tongues of men and of angels , and have not charity , I am become as sounding brass , or a tinkling cymbal .
text2: Hata kama nikinena lugha za watu na hata za malaika , lakini kama sina upendo mimi nimekuwa tu kama sauti ya debe tupu au kengele .

text: And though I have the gift of prophecy , and understand all mysteries , and all knowledge ; and though I have all faith , so that I could remove mountains , and have not charity , I am nothing .
text2: Tena , naweza kuwa na kipaji cha kutangaza ujumbe wa Mungu , nikafahamu siri zote na kujua kila kitu ; naweza kuwa na imani yote hata nikaweza kuihamisha milima , lakini kama sina upendo mimi si kitu .

text: And though I bestow all my goods to feed the poor , and though I give my body to be burned , and have not charity , it profiteth me nothing .
text2: Nikitoa mali yangu yote na kuwapa maskini , na tena nikiutoa mwili wangu uchomwe , kama sina upendo hiyo hainifai chochote .

text: Charity suffereth long , and is kind ; charity envieth not ; charity vaunteth not itself , is not puffed up ,
text2: Mwenye upendo huvumilia , hufadhili ; mwenye upendo hana wivu , hajidai , wala hajivuni .

text: Doth not behave itself unseemly , seeketh not her own , is not easily provoked , thinketh no evil ;
text2: Mwenye upendo hakosi adabu , hatafuti faida yake binafsi , wala hana wepesi wa hasira ; haweki kumbukumbu ya mabaya ,

text: Rejoiceth not in iniquity , but rejoiceth in the truth ;
text2: hafurahii uovu , bali hufurahia ukweli .

text: Beareth all things , believeth all things , hopeth all things , endureth all things .
text2: Mwenye upendo huvumilia yote , huamini yote , na hustahimili yote .

text: Charity never faileth : but whether there be prophecies , they shall fail ; whether there be tongues , they shall cease ; whether there be knowledge , it shall vanish away .
text2: Upendo hauna kikomo kamwe . Kama kuna vipaji vya kutangaza ujumbe wa Mungu , hivyo vitatoweka siku moja ; kama ni vipaji vya kusema lugha ngeni , vitakoma ; kama kuna elimu , nayo itapita .

text: For we know in part , and we prophesy in part .
text2: Maana ujuzi wetu si kamili , na kipaji chetu cha kutangaza neno la Mungu si kamili .

text: But when that which is perfect is come , then that which is in part shall be done away .
text2: Lakini kile kilicho kikamilifu kitakapofika , vyote visivyo vikamilifu vitatoweka .

text: When I was a child , I spake as a child , I understood as a child , I thought as a child : but when I became a man , I put away childish things .
text2: Nilipokuwa mtoto mchanga nilisema kitoto , nilifahamu kitoto , nilifikiri kitoto . Lakini sasa , maadam mimi ni mtu mzima , mambo ya kitoto nimeyaacha .

text: For now we see through a glass , darkly ; but then face to face : now I know in part ; but then shall I know even as also I am known .
text2: Tunachoona sasa ni kama tu sura hafifu katika kioo , lakini hapo baadaye tutaona uso kwa uso . Sasa ninajua kiasi fulani tu , lakini hapo baadaye nitajua yote kikamilifu , kama vile Mungu anavyonijua mimi .

text: And now abideth faith , hope , charity , these three ; but the greatest of these is charity .
text2: Sasa yanadumu haya matatu : imani , tumaini na upendo ; lakini lililo kuu kupita yote ni upendo .

text: Follow after charity , and desire spiritual gifts , but rather that ye may prophesy .
text2: Jitahidini kuwa na upendo . Vilevile fanyeni bidii ya kupata vipaji vingine vya kiroho , hasa kipaji cha kutangaza ujumbe wa Mungu .

text: For he that speaketh in an unknown tongue speaketh not unto men , but unto God : for no man understandeth him ; howbeit in the spirit he speaketh mysteries .
text2: Mwenye kunena lugha ngeni hasemi na watu bali anasema na Mungu . Yeye hunena kwa nguvu ya Roho mambo yaliyofichika .

text: But he that prophesieth speaketh unto men to edification , and exhortation , and comfort .
text2: Lakini mwenye kipaji cha kutangaza ujumbe wa Mungu , husema na watu kwa ajili ya kuwajenga , kuwafariji na kuwatia moyo .

text: He that speaketh in an unknown tongue edifieth himself ; but he that prophesieth edifieth the church .
text2: Mwenye kunena lugha ngeni anajijenga mwenyewe . Lakini mwenye kipaji cha kutangaza ujumbe wa Mungu , analijenga kanisa .

text: I would that ye all spake with tongues , but rather that ye prophesied : for greater is he that prophesieth than he that speaketh with tongues , except he interpret , that the church may receive edifying .
text2: Basi , ningependa ninyi nyote mseme kwa lugha ngeni lakini ningependelea hasa muwe na kipaji cha kutangaza ujumbe wa Mungu , maana mtu mwenye kipaji cha kutangaza ujumbe wa Mungu , ni wa maana zaidi kuliko yule mwenye kusema lugha ngeni , isipokuwa tu kama yupo hapo mtu awezaye kuyafafanua hayo mambo asemayo , ili kanisa lipate kujengwa .

text: Now , brethren , if I come unto you speaking with tongues , what shall I profit you , except I shall speak to you either by revelation , or by knowledge , or by prophesying , or by doctrine ?
text2: Hivyo , ndugu zangu , kama nikija kwenu na kusema nanyi kwa lugha ngeni itawafaa nini ? Haitawafaa chochote , isipokuwa tu kama nitawaelezeni ufunuo wa Mungu au ujuzi fulani au ujumbe wa Mungu au mafundisho fulani .

text: And even things without life giving sound , whether pipe or harp , except they give a distinction in the sounds , how shall it be known what is piped or harped ?
text2: Ndivyo ilivyo kwa vyombo visivyo na uhai vyenye kutoa sauti kama vile filimbi au kinanda . Je , mtu anawezaje kuutambua wimbo unaochezwa kama vyombo hivyo havitoi sauti waziwazi vinapopigwa ?

text: For if the trumpet give an uncertain sound , who shall prepare himself to the battle ?
text2: La mgambo likilia bila kufuata taratibu zake , nani atajiweka tayari kwa vita ?

text: So likewise ye , except ye utter by the tongue words easy to be understood , how shall it be known what is spoken ? for ye shall speak into the air .
text2: Hali kadhalika na ninyi , kama ulimi wenu hausemi kitu chenye kueleweka , nani ataweza kufahamu mnayosema ? Maneno yenu yatapotea hewani .

text: There are , it may be , so many kinds of voices in the world , and none of them is without signification .
text2: Zipo lugha mbalimbali ulimwenguni , na hakuna hata mojawapo isiyo na maana .

text: Therefore if I know not the meaning of the voice , I shall be unto him that speaketh a barbarian , and he that speaketh shall be a barbarian unto me .
text2: Lakini ikiwa mimi sifahamu maana ya lugha asemayo mtu fulani , mimi ni mgeni kwake mtu huyo naye pia ni mgeni kwangu .

text: Even so ye , forasmuch as ye are zealous of spiritual gifts , seek that ye may excel to the edifying of the church .
text2: Hali kadhalika na ninyi , maadam mna hamu ya kupata vipaji vya Roho , jitahidini hasa kujipatia vile vinavyosaidia kulijenga kanisa .

text: Wherefore let him that speaketh in an unknown tongue pray that he may interpret .
text2: Kwa hiyo , mwenye kunena lugha ngeni na aombe apate uwezo wa kuzifafanua .

text: For if I pray in an unknown tongue , my spirit prayeth , but my understanding is unfruitful .
text2: Maana , nikisali kwa lugha ngeni roho yangu ndiyo inayosali , lakini akili yangu hubaki bure .

text: What is it then ? I will pray with the spirit , and I will pray with the understanding also : I will sing with the spirit , and I will sing with the understanding also .
text2: Nifanye nini , basi ? Nitasali kwa roho yangu , nitasali pia kwa akili yangu ; nitaimba kwa roho yangu , nitaimba pia kwa akili yangu .

text: Else when thou shalt bless with the spirit , how shall he that occupieth the room of the unlearned say Amen at thy giving of thanks , seeing he understandeth not what thou sayest ?
text2: Ukimsifu Mungu kwa roho yako tu , atawezaje mtu wa kawaida aliye katika mkutano kuitikia sala yako ya shukrani kwa kusema : " Amina , " kama haelewi unachosema ?

text: For thou verily givest thanks well , but the other is not edified .
text2: Sala yako ya shukrani yaweza kweli kuwa bora , lakini huyo mwingine haitamfaidia .

text: I thank my God , I speak with tongues more than ye all :
text2: Namshukuru Mungu kwamba mimi nasema kwa lugha ngeni zaidi kuliko ninyi nyote .

text: Yet in the church I had rather speak five words with my understanding , that by my voice I might teach others also , than ten thousand words in an unknown tongue .
text2: Lakini katika mikutano ya waumini napendelea zaidi kusema maneno matano yenye kueleweka ili niwafundishe wengine , kuliko kusema maneno elfu ya lugha ngeni .

text: Brethren , be not children in understanding : howbeit in malice be ye children , but in understanding be men .
text2: Ndugu , msiwe kama watoto katika fikira zenu . Kuhusu uovu muwe kama watoto wachanga lakini katika kufikiri ni lazima muwe kama watu waliokomaa .

text: In the law it is written , With men of other tongues and other lips will I speak unto this people ; and yet for all that will they not hear me , saith the Lord .
text2: Imeandikwa katika Sheria : " Bwana asema hivi : Kwa njia ya wenye kunena lugha ngeni , na kwa midomo ya wageni , nitasema na watu hawa , hata hivyo , hawatanisikiliza . "

text: Wherefore tongues are for a sign , not to them that believe , but to them that believe not : but prophesying serveth not for them that believe not , but for them which believe .
text2: Hivyo basi , kipaji cha kusema lugha ngeni ni ishara , si kwa ajili ya watu wenye imani , bali kwa ajili ya wale wasioamini ; lakini kipaji cha kutangaza ujumbe wa Mungu ni kwa ajili ya wale wanaoamini na si kwa ajili ya wasioamini .

text: If therefore the whole church be come together into one place , and all speak with tongues , and there come in those that are unlearned , or unbelievers , will they not say that ye are mad ?
text2: Basi , kanisa lote linapokutana pamoja , na wote wakaanza kusema kwa lugha ngeni , kama wakija watu wa kawaida au wasioamini , je , hawatasema kwamba ninyi mna wazimu ?

text: But if all prophesy , and there come in one that believeth not , or one unlearned , he is convinced of all , he is judged of all :
text2: Lakini , wote wakiwa wanautangaza ujumbe wa Mungu , akija mtu wa kawaida au asiyeamini , yote atakayosikia yatamhakikishia ubaya wake mwenyewe ; yote atakayosikia yatamhukumu .

text: And thus are the secrets of his heart made manifest ; and so falling down on his face he will worship God , and report that God is in you of a truth .
text2: Siri za moyo wake zitafichuliwa , naye atapiga magoti na kumwabudu Mungu akisema : " Kweli Mungu yupo pamoja nanyi . "

text: How is it then , brethren ? when ye come together , everyone of you hath a psalm , hath a doctrine , hath a tongue , hath a revelation , hath an interpretation . Let all things be done unto edifying .
text2: Ndugu , tuseme nini , basi ? Mnapokutana pamoja , mmoja aimbe wimbo , mwingine atoe mafundisho , mwingine awe na ufunuo kutoka kwa Mungu , mwingine atumie kipaji cha kusema kwa lugha ngeni na mwingine afafanue yanayosemwa . Yote yawe kwa ajili ya kulijenga kanisa .

text: If any man speak in an unknown tongue , let it be by two , or at the most by three , and that by course ; and let one interpret .
text2: Wakiwepo watu wenye vipaji vya kusema kwa lugha ngeni , waseme wawili au watatu , si zaidi , tena mmojammoja ; na aweko mtu wa kufafanua yanayosemwa .

text: But if there be no interpreter , let him keep silence in the church ; and let him speak to himself , and to God .
text2: Lakini kama hakuna awezaye kufafanua , basi , mwenye kusema lugha ngeni anyamaze mkutanoni , aseme na nafsi yake mwenyewe na Mungu .

text: Let the prophets speak two or three , and let the other judge .
text2: Kuhusu wale wenye kipaji cha kutangaza ujumbe wa Mungu , waseme wawili au watatu , na wengine wayapime maneno yao .

text: If any thing be revealed to another that sitteth by , let the first hold his peace .
text2: Ikiwa mmoja anaposema mwingine wa wasikilizaji amepata ufunuo kutoka kwa Mungu , basi , yule anayesema anyamaze .

text: For ye may all prophesy one by one , that all may learn , and all may be comforted .
text2: Maana nyote mwaweza kutangaza ujumbe wa Mungu , mmoja baada ya mwingine , ili nyote mpate kujifunza na kutiwa moyo .

text: And the spirits of the prophets are subject to the prophets .
text2: Kipaji cha kutangaza ujumbe wa Mungu ni lazima kitawaliwe na huyo mwenye hicho kipaji .

text: For God is not the author of confusion , but of peace , as in all churches of the saints .
text2: Maana Mungu si Mungu wa fujo , ila wa amani .

text: Let your women keep silence in the churches : for it is not permitted unto them to speak ; but they are commanded to be under obedience , as also saith the law .
text2: Kama ilivyo desturi katika makanisa yote ya watu wa Mungu , wanawake wakae kimya katika mikutano ya waumini . Hawana ruhusa kusema ; ila wawe watii kama isemavyo Sheria .

text: And if they will learn any thing , let them ask their husbands at home : for it is a shame for women to speak in the church .
text2: Ikiwa wanayo maswali ya kuuliza , wawaulize waume zao nyumbani , maana ni aibu kwa mwanamke kusema katika mikutano ya waumini .

text: What ? came the word of God out from you ? or came it unto you only ?
text2: Je , mnadhani neno la Mungu limetoka kwenu ninyi au kwamba limewajieni ninyi peke yenu ?

text: If any man think himself to be a prophet , or spiritual , let him acknowledge that the things that I write unto you are the commandments of the Lord .
text2: Kama mtu yeyote anadhani kwamba yeye ni mjumbe wa Mungu au kwamba anacho kipaji cha Roho , na ajue kwamba haya ninayowaandikia ninyi ni amri ya Bwana .

text: But if any man be ignorant , let him be ignorant .
text2: Lakini mtu asiyetambua hayo , basi , mtu asimjali mtu huyo .

text: Wherefore , brethren , covet to prophesy , and forbid not to speak with tongues .
text2: Hivyo basi , ndugu zangu , mnapaswa kuwa na hamu ya kutangaza ujumbe wa Mungu ; lakini msimkataze mtu kusema kwa lugha ngeni .

text: Let all things be done decently and in order .
text2: Lakini yote yafanyike kwa heshima na kwa utaratibu .

text: Moreover , brethren , I declare unto you the gospel which I preached unto you , which also ye have received , and wherein ye stand ;
text2: Sasa ndugu , napenda kuwakumbusha ile Habari Njema niliyowahubirieni nanyi mkaipokea na kusimama imara ndani yake .

text: By which also ye are saved , if ye keep in memory what I preached unto you , unless ye have believed in vain .
text2: Kwa njia yake mnaokolewa , ikiwa mnayazingatia maneno niliyowahubirieni , na kama kuamini kwenu hakukuwa bure .

text: For I delivered unto you first of all that which I also received , how that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures ;
text2: Mimi niliwakabidhi ninyi mambo muhimu sana ambayo mimi niliyapokea : kwamba Kristo alikufa kwa ajili ya dhambi zetu kufuatana na Maandiko Matakatifu ;

text: And that he was buried , and that he rose again the third day according to the scriptures :
text2: kwamba alizikwa , akafufuka siku ya tatu kama ilivyoandikwa ;

text: And that he was seen of Cephas , then of the twelve :
text2: kwamba alimtokea Kefa , na baadaye aliwatokea wale kumi na wawili .

text: After that , he was seen of above five hundred brethren at once ; of whom the greater part remain unto this present , but some are fallen asleep .
text2: Kisha aliwatokea ndugu zaidi ya mia tano kwa mara moja ; wengi wao wanaishi bado , lakini baadhi yao wamekwisha kufa .

text: After that , he was seen of James ; then of all the apostles .
text2: Baadaye alimtokea Yakobo kisha akawatokea mitume wote .

text: And last of all he was seen of me also , as of one born out of due time .
text2: Baada ya wote , akanitokea hata mimi , mimi niliyekuwa kama mtu aliyezaliwa kabla ya wakati .

text: For I am the least of the apostles , that am not meet to be called an apostle , because I persecuted the church of God .
text2: Maana mimi ni mdogo kabisa miongoni mwa mitume na wala sistahili kuitwa mtume , kwa sababu nililidhulumu kanisa la Mungu .

text: But by the grace of God I am what I am : and his grace which was bestowed upon me was not in vain ; but I laboured more abundantly than they all : yet not I , but the grace of God which was with me .
text2: Lakini , kwa neema yake Mungu , nimekuwa kama nilivyo . Na neema yake kwangu haikuwa bure . Mimi nimefanya kazi kuliko wote ; si mimi hasa , ila ni neema ya Mungu ifanyayo kazi pamoja nami .

text: Therefore whether it were I or they , so we preach , and so ye believed .
text2: Lakini hata hivyo , iwe wao ndio wahubirio au mimi nihubiriye , haidhuru , hiki ndicho tunachuhubiri , na hiki ndicho mnachoamini .

text: Now if Christ be preached that he rose from the dead , how say some among you that there is no resurrection of the dead ?
text2: Sasa , maadam inahubiriwa kwamba Kristo amefufuliwa kutoka wafu , baadhi yenu wanawezaje kusema kwamba hakuna ufufuo wa wafu ?

text: But if there be no resurrection of the dead , then is Christ not risen :
text2: Kama hakuna ufufuo wa wafu , basi , Kristo naye hakufufuka ;

text: And if Christ be not risen , then is our preaching vain , and your faith is also vain .
text2: na kama Kristo hakufufuka , basi mahubiri yetu hayana maana na imani yenu haina maana .

text: Yea , and we are found false witnesses of God ; because we have testified of God that he raised up Christ : whom he raised not up , if so be that the dead rise not .
text2: Zaidi ya hayo sisi tungekuwa mashahidi wa uongo mbele ya Mungu , maana tulisema kwamba Mungu alimfufua Kristo kutoka wafu na kumbe yeye hakumfufua - - kama ni kweli kwamba wafu hawafufuliwi .

text: For if the dead rise not , then is not Christ raised :
text2: Maana , ikiwa ni kweli kwamba wafu hawafufuki , basi naye Kristo hakufufuka .

text: And if Christ be not raised , your faith is vain ; ye are yet in your sins .
text2: Na kama Kristo hakufufuliwa , basi , imani yenu ni ya bure ; mngali bado katika dhambi zenu .

text: Then they also which are fallen asleep in Christ are perished .
text2: Zaidi ya hayo , wale wote waliokufa wakiwa wameungana na Kristo wamepotea kabisa .

text: If in this life only we have hope in Christ , we are of all men most miserable .
text2: Kama matumaini yetu katika Kristo yanahusu tu maisha haya ya sasa , basi , sisi ni watu wa kusikitikiwa zaidi kuliko wengine wote duniani .

text: But now is Christ risen from the dead , and become the firstfruits of them that slept .
text2: Lakini ukweli ni kwamba Kristo amefufuliwa kutoka wafu , limbuko lao wale waliolala katika kifo .

text: For since by man came death , by man came also the resurrection of the dead .
text2: Maana kama vile kifo kilivyoletwa duniani na mtu mmoja , vivyo hivyo nako kufufuka kutoka wafu kumesababishwa na mtu mmoja .

text: For as in Adam all die , even so in Christ shall all be made alive .
text2: Kama vile watu wote wanavyokufa kwa kujiunga na Adamu , vivyo hivyo wote watafufuliwa kwa kuungana na Kristo .

text: But every man in his own order : Christ the firstfruits ; afterward they that are Christ ' s at his coming .
text2: Lakini kila mmoja kwa mpango wake : Kristo kwanza , halafu wale walio wake Kristo wakati Kristo atakapokuja .

text: Then cometh the end , when he shall have delivered up the kingdom to God , even the Father ; when he shall have put down all rule and all authority and power .
text2: Baada ya hayo , mwisho utafika wakati ambapo Kristo atamkabidhi Mungu Baba Utawala , baada ya kufutilia mbali kila tawala na mamlaka na nguvu .

text: For he must reign , till he hath put all enemies under his feet .
text2: Maana Kristo sharti atawale mpaka Mungu atakapowashinda adui zake na kuwaweka chini ya miguu yake .

text: The last enemy that shall be destroyed is death .
text2: Adui wa mwisho atakayeangamizwa ni kifo .

text: For he hath put all things under his feet . But when he saith , all things are put under him , it is manifest that he is excepted , which did put all things under him .
text2: Maana , Maandiko yasema : " Mungu ameweka vitu vyote chini ya miguu yake . " Lakini , Maandiko yanaposema : " Vitu vyote vimewekwa chini ya miguu yake avitawale " ni dhahiri kwamba Mungu haingii katika kundi hilo la vitu , maana yeye ndiye anayeviweka vitu hivyo chini ya Kristo .

text: And when all things shall be subdued unto him , then shall the Son also himself be subject unto him that put all things under him , that God may be all in all .
text2: Lakini vitu vyote vitakapowekwa chini ya Utawala wa Kristo , ndipo naye Mwana atakapojiweka chini ya Mungu , aliyeweka vyote chini ya Utawala wake ; ili Mungu atawale juu ya vyote .

text: Else what shall they do which are baptized for the dead , if the dead rise not at all ? why are they then baptized for the dead ?
text2: Kama hakuna ufufuo , je watu wale wanaobatizwa kwa ajili ya wafu wanatumainia kupata nini ? Kama wafu hawafufuliwi , ya nini kubatizwa kwa ajili yao ?

text: And why stand we in jeopardy every hour ?
text2: Na sisi , ya nini kujitia hatarini kila saa ?

text: I protest by your rejoicing which I have in Christ Jesus our Lord , I die daily .
text2: Ndugu , mimi nakikabili kifo kila siku ! Fahari niliyo nayo juu yenu katika kuungana na Kristo Yesu Bwana wetu inanifanya nitangaze jambo hili .

text: If after the manner of men I have fought with beasts at Ephesus , what advantageth it me , if the dead rise not ? let us eat and drink ; for to morrow we die .
text2: Kama kusudi langu lingalikuwa la kibinadamu tu , kule kupigana kwangu na wanyama wakali hapa Efeso kungalinifaa kitu gani ? Kama wafu hawafufuki , basi , " Tule na tunywe , maana kesho tutakufa . "

text: Be not deceived : evil communications corrupt good manners .
text2: Msidanganyike ! Urafiki mbaya huharibu tabia njema .

text: Awake to righteousness , and sin not ; for some have not the knowledge of God : I speak this to your shame .
text2: Amkeni ! Anzeni kuishi vema , na acheni kutenda dhambi . Baadhi yenu hawamjui Mungu kabisa . Hii nawaambieni , ni aibu kubwa kwenu !

text: But some man will say , How are the dead raised up ? and with what body do they come ?
text2: Lakini mtu anaweza kuuliza : " Wafu watafufuliwaje ? Watakuwa na mwili wa namna gani wakati watakapokuja tena ? "

text: Thou fool , that which thou sowest is not quickened , except it die :
text2: Hayo ni maswali ya kijinga ! Ukipanda mbegu , isipokufa kwanza haitaota .

text: And that which thou sowest , thou sowest not that body that shall be , but bare grain , it may chance of wheat , or of some other grain :
text2: Unachopanda ni mbegu tu , labda ya ngano au nafaka nyingine , na si mmea mzima ambao hutokea baadaye .

text: But God giveth it a body as it hath pleased him , and to every seed his own body .
text2: Mungu huipa hiyo mbegu mwili anaoutaka mwenyewe ; kila mbegu hupata mwili wake wa pekee .

text: All flesh is not the same flesh : but there is one kind of flesh of men , another flesh of beasts , another of fishes , and another of birds .
text2: Miili ya viumbe vyote si sawa . Miili ya binadamu ni ya namna moja , ya wanyama ni ya namna nyingine , ya ndege ni ya namna nyingine na miili ya samaki pia ni ya namna nyingine .

text: There are also celestial bodies , and bodies terrestrial : but the glory of the celestial is one , and the glory of the terrestrial is another .
text2: Iko miili ya mbinguni na miili ya duniani ; uzuri wa miili ya mbinguni ni mwingine , na na uzuri wa miili ya duniani ni mwingine .

text: There is one glory of the sun , and another glory of the moon , and another glory of the stars : for one star differeth from another star in glory .
text2: Uko uzuri wa jua , wa mwezi na wa nyota ; hata nyota nazo huhitilafiana kwa uzuri .

text: So also is the resurrection of the dead . It is sown in corruption ; it is raised in incorruption :
text2: Ndivyo ilivyo kuhusu ufufuo wa wafu . Kama vile mbegu , mwili huzikwa ardhini ukiwa katika hali ya kuharibika , lakini hufufuliwa katika hali ya kutoharibika .

text: It is sown in dishonour ; it is raised in glory : it is sown in weakness ; it is raised in power :
text2: Huzikwa katika hali duni , hufufuliwa katika hali tukufu ; huzikwa katika hali dhaifu , hufufuliwa ukiwa wenye nguvu .

text: It is sown a natural body ; it is raised a spiritual body . There is a natural body , and there is a spiritual body .
text2: Unapozikwa ni mwili wa kawaida , unapofufuliwa ni mwili wa kiroho . Kuna mwili wa kawaida na kutakuwa na mwili wa kiroho .

text: And so it is written , The first man Adam was made a living soul ; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit .
text2: Maana Maandiko yasema : " Mtu wa kwanza , Adamu , alikuwa kiumbe mwenye uhai ; " lakini adamu wa mwisho ni Roho awapaye watu uzima .

text: Howbeit that was not first which is spiritual , but that which is natural ; and afterward that which is spiritual .
text2: Lakini unaotangulia kuwako si ule mwili wa kiroho , ila ule mwili wa kawaida kisha ule mwili wa kiroho .

text: The first man is of the earth , earthy : the second man is the Lord from heaven .
text2: Adamu wa kwanza aliumbwa kwa udongo , alitoka ardhini ; mtu wa pili alitoka mbinguni .

text: As is the earthy , such are they also that are earthy : and as is the heavenly , such are they also that are heavenly .
text2: Wote walio wa dunia wako kama huyo mtu aliyeumbwa kwa udongo ; wale walio wa mbinguni wako kama yule aliyetoka mbinguni .

text: And as we have borne the image of the earthy , we shall also bear the image of the heavenly .
text2: Kama vile tulivyofanana na yule aliyeumbwa kwa udongo , vivyo hivyo tutafanana na huyohuyo aliyetoka mbinguni .

text: Now this I say , brethren , that flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of God ; neither doth corruption inherit incorruption .
text2: Basi , ndugu , nasema hivi : kile kilichofanywa kwa mwili na damu hakiwezi kuushiriki Ufalme wa Mungu ; na chenye kuharibika hakiwezi kuwa na hali ya kutoharibika .

text: Behold , I shew you a mystery ; We shall not all sleep , but we shall all be changed ,
text2: Sikilizeni , nawaambieni siri : sisi hatutakufa sote , ila sote tutageuzwa

text: In a moment , in the twinkling of an eye , at the last trump : for the trumpet shall sound , and the dead shall be raised incorruptible , and we shall be changed .
text2: wakati wa mbiu ya mwisho , kwa nukta moja , kufumba na kufumbua . Maana mbiu itakapolia , wafu watafufuliwa katika hali ya kutoweza kufa tena , na sisi tutageuzwa .

text: For this corruptible must put on incorruption , and this mortal must put on immortality .
text2: Maana ni lazima kila kiharibikacho kijivalie hali ya kutoharibika , mwili uwezao kufa ujivalie hali ya kutokufa .

text: So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption , and this mortal shall have put on immortality , then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written , Death is swallowed up in victory .
text2: Basi , mwili huu wenye kuharibika utakapojivalia hali ya kutoharibika , na kile chenye kufa kitakapojivalia hali ya kutokufa , hapo ndipo litakapotimia lile neno lililoandikwa : " Kifo kimeangamizwa ushindi umekamilika ! "

text: O death , where is thy sting ? O grave , where is thy victory ?
text2: " Kifo , ushindi wako uko wapi ? Uwezo wako wa kuumiza uko wapi ? "

text: The sting of death is sin ; and the strength of sin is the law .
text2: Ukali wa kifo hutokana na dhambi , nayo dhambi hupata nguvu yake katika Sheria .

text: But thanks be to God , which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Lakini tumshukuru Mungu anayetupatia ushindi kwa njia ya Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo .

text: Therefore , my beloved brethren , be ye stedfast , unmoveable , always abounding in the work of the Lord , forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord .
text2: Basi , ndugu zangu wapenzi , simameni imara na thabiti . Endeleeni daima kuwa na bidii katika kazi ya Bwana , mkijua kwamba kazi mnayofanya katika utumishi wa Bwana haitapotea bure .

text: Now concerning the collection for the saints , as I have given order to the churches of Galatia , even so do ye .
text2: Sasa , yahusu ule mchango kwa ajili ya watu wa Mungu : fanyeni kama nilivyoyaagiza makanisa ya Galatia .

text: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store , as God hath prospered him , that there be no gatherings when I come .
text2: Kila Jumapili kila mmoja wenu atenge kiasi cha fedha kadiri ya mapato yake , ili kusiwe na haja ya kufanya mchango wakati nitakapokuja .

text: And when I come , whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters , them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem .
text2: Wakati nitakapokuja kwenu , nitawatuma wale mtakaowachagua miongoni mwenu wapeleke barua na zawadi zenu Yerusalemu .

text: And if it be meet that I go also , they shall go with me .
text2: Kama itafaa nami niende , basi , watakwenda pamoja nami .

text: Now I will come unto you , when I shall pass through Macedonia : for I do pass through Macedonia .
text2: Nitakuja kwenu , baada ya kupitia Makedonia - - maana nataraji kupitia Makedonia .

text: And it may be that I will abide , yea , and winter with you , that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go .
text2: Labda nitakaa kwenu kwa muda fulani , au huenda nitakaa pamoja nanyi wakati wote wa baridi , ili mpate kunisaidia niendelee na safari yangu kokote nitakakokwenda .

text: For I will not see you now by the way ; but I trust to tarry a while with you , if the Lord permit .
text2: Sipendi kupita kwenu harakaharaka na kuendelea na safari . Natumaini kukaa kwenu kwa kitambo fulani , Bwana akiniruhusu .

text: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost .
text2: Lakini nitabaki hapa Efeso mpaka siku ya Pentekoste .

text: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me , and there are many adversaries .
text2: Mlango uko wazi kabisa kwa ajili ya kazi yangu muhimu hapa , ingawa wapinzani nao ni wengi .

text: Now if Timotheus come , see that he may be with you without fear : for he worketh the work of the Lord , as I also do .
text2: Timotheo akija , angalieni asiwe na hofu yoyote wakati yupo kati yenu , kwani anafanya kazi ya Bwana kama mimi .

text: Let no man therefore despise him : but conduct him forth in peace , that he may come unto me : for I look for him with the brethren .
text2: Kwa hiyo mtu yeyote asimdharau , ila msaidieni aendelee na safari yake kwa amani ili aweze kurudi kwangu , maana mimi namngojea pamoja na ndugu zetu .

text: As touching our brother Apollos , I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren : but his will was not at all to come at this time ; but he will come when he shall have convenient time .
text2: Kuhusu ndugu Apolo , nimemsihi sana aje kwenu pamoja na ndugu wengine , lakini hapendelei kabisa kuja sasa ila atakuja mara itakapowezekana .

text: Watch ye , stand fast in the faith , quit you like men , be strong .
text2: Kesheni , simameni imara katika imani , muwe hodari na wenye nguvu .

text: Let all your things be done with charity .
text2: Kila mfanyacho kifanyike kwa upendo .

text: I beseech you , brethren , ( ye know the house of Stephanas , that it is the firstfruits of Achaia , and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints , )
text2: Ndugu , mnaifahamu jamaa ya Stefana ; wao ni watu wa kwanza kabisa kuipokea imani ya Kikristo katika Akaya , na wamejitolea kuwatumikia watu wa Mungu . Ninawasihi ninyi ndugu zangu ,

text: That ye submit yourselves unto such , and to every one that helpeth with us , and laboureth .
text2: muufuate uongozi wa watu kama hao , na uongozi wa kila mtu afanyaye kazi na kutumikia pamoja nao .

text: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus : for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied .
text2: Nafurahi sana kwamba Stefana , Fortunato na Akaiko wamefika ; wamelijaza pengo lililokuwako kwa kutokuwako kwenu .

text: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours : therefore acknowledge ye them that are such .
text2: Wameiburudisha roho yangu na yenu pia . Kwa hiyo inafaa kuwakumbuka watu wa namna hii .

text: The churches of Asia salute you . Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord , with the church that is in their house .
text2: Makanisa yote ya Asia yanawasalimuni . Akula na Priskila pamoja na watu wote wa Mungu walio nyumbani mwao wanawasalimuni sana katika Bwana .
