text: All the brethren greet you . Greet ye one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Ndugu wote wanawasalimuni . Nanyi salimianeni kwa ishara ya mapendo ya Mungu .

text: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand .
text2: Mimi Paulo nawasalimuni , nikiandika kwa mkono wangu mwenyewe .

text: If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ , let him be Anathema Maranatha .
text2: Yeyote asiyempenda Bwana , na alaaniwe . MARANA THA - - BWANA , njoo !

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
text2: Neema ya Bwana Yesu iwe nanyi .

text: My love be with you all in Christ Jesus . Amen .
text2: Mapendo yangu yawe kwenu katika kuungana na Kristo Yesu .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timothy our brother , unto the church of God which is at Corinth , with all the saints which are in all Achaia :
text2: Mimi Paulo , mtume wa Kristo Yesu kwa mapenzi ya Mungu , na ndugu Timotheo , tunawaandikia ninyi mlio kanisa la Mungu huko Korintho , na watu wote wa Mungu kila mahali katika Akaya .

text: Grace be to you and peace from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Tunawatakieni neema na amani kutoka kwa Mungu Baba yetu na Bwana Yesu Kristo .

text: Blessed be God , even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of mercies , and the God of all comfort ;
text2: Atukuzwe Mungu na Baba wa Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo , Baba mwenye huruma na Mungu mwenye kuleta faraja yote .

text: Who comforteth us in all our tribulation , that we may be able to comfort them which are in any trouble , by the comfort wherewith we ourselves are comforted of God .
text2: Yeye hutufariji sisi katika taabu zetu zote , ili nasi tupate kuwafariji wengine katika kila taabu kwa faraja hiyohiyo tunayopokea kutoka kwa Mungu .

text: For as the sufferings of Christ abound in us , so our consolation also aboundeth by Christ .
text2: Naam , kadiri mateso ya Kristo yanavyozidi ndani yetu , ni kadiri hiyohiyo tunazidi kufarijiwa naye .

text: And whether we be afflicted , it is for your consolation and salvation , which is effectual in the enduring of the same sufferings which we also suffer : or whether we be comforted , it is for your consolation and salvation .
text2: Ikiwa tunapata taabu , basi ni kwa ajili ya faraja na wokovu wenu . Tukifarijika , ni kwa ajili ya kuwafariji ninyi na kuwaunga mkono mpate nguvu ya kustahimili mateso yaleyale tunayoteseka sisi .

text: And our hope of you is stedfast , knowing , that as ye are partakers of the sufferings , so shall ye be also of the consolation .
text2: Tena , matumaini tuliyo nayo kwa ajili yenu ni imara ; tunajua kwamba mkishiriki mateso yetu , mtashiriki pia faraja yetu .

text: For we would not , brethren , have you ignorant of our trouble which came to us in Asia , that we were pressed out of measure , above strength , insomuch that we despaired even of life :
text2: Ndugu , tunataka kuwajulisheni taabu zilizotupata kule Asia ; taabu hizo zilitulemea kupita kiasi , hata tukakata matumaini yote ya kuendelea kuishi .

text: But we had the sentence of death in ourselves , that we should not trust in ourselves , but in God which raiseth the dead :
text2: Naam , tulikuwa kama watu waliohukumiwa kuuawa , ili tufundishwe kumtegemea Mungu mwenye kuwafufua wafu , badala ya kutegemea nguvu zetu sisi wenyewe .

text: Who delivered us from so great a death , and doth deliver : in whom we trust that he will yet deliver us ;
text2: Yeye alituokoa katika hatari kubwa ya kifo , na anaendelea kutuokoa ; sisi tumemwekea tumaini letu kwamba atatuokoa tena ,

text: Ye also helping together by prayer for us , that for the gift bestowed upon us by the means of many persons thanks may be given by many on our behalf .
text2: ninyi mkiwa mnatuunga mkono kwa kutuombea . Hivyo neema tutakazokuwa tumepata kutokana na maombi ya watu wengi hivyo , ziwe sababu ya watu wengi zaidi kumshukuru Mungu kwa ajili yetu .

text: For our rejoicing is this , the testimony of our conscience , that in simplicity and godly sincerity , not with fleshly wisdom , but by the grace of God , we have had our conversation in the world , and more abundantly to you - ward .
text2: Sisi tunajivunia kitu kimoja : dhamiri yetu inatuhakikishia kwamba tumeishi ulimwenguni hapa , na hasa kati yenu , kwa unyenyekevu na unyofu tuliojaliwa na Mungu ; hatukuongozwa na hekima ya kibinadamu bali neema ya Mungu .

text: For we write none other things unto you , than what ye read or acknowledge ; and I trust ye shall acknowledge even to the end ;
text2: Tunawaandikia ninyi mambo mnayoweza kuyasoma na kuyaelewa . Ninatumaini kwamba mtaelewa vizuri kabisa ,

text: As also ye have acknowledged us in part , that we are your rejoicing , even as ye also are ours in the day of the Lord Jesus .
text2: maana mpaka sasa mmenielewa kiasi fulani tu . Tunajua kwamba katika ile Siku ya Bwana Yesu mtaweza kutuonea sisi fahari kama nasi tunavyowaonea ninyi fahari .

text: And in this confidence I was minded to come unto you before , that ye might have a second benefit ;
text2: Nikiwa na matumaini hayo , nilikusudia kuja kwenu hapo awali ili mpate baraka maradufu .

text: And to pass by you into Macedonia , and to come again out of Macedonia unto you , and of you to be brought on my way toward Judaea .
text2: Nilikusudia kupita kwenu nikiwa safarini kwenda Makedonia , na wakati wa kurudi pia , ili nipate msaada wenu kwa safari yangu kwenda Yudea .

text: When I therefore was thus minded , did I use lightness ? or the things that I purpose , do I purpose according to the flesh , that with me there should be yea yea , and nay nay ?
text2: Je , mnadhani nilipopanga hivyo nimekuwa kama mtu asiye na msimamo ? Je , mnadhani kwamba ninafanya uamuzi wangu kwa fikira za kibinadamu na kwamba nasema " Ndiyo " na " Siyo " papo hapo ?

text: But as God is true , our word toward you was not yea and nay .
text2: Mungu ni ukweli mtupu ; basi , kile tulichowaambia ninyi si jambo la " Ndiyo " na " Siyo " .

text: For the Son of God , Jesus Christ , who was preached among you by us , even by me and Silvanus and Timotheus , was not yea and nay , but in him was yea .
text2: Maana Kristo Yesu , Mwana wa Mungu , ambaye mimi , Silwano na Timotheo , tulimhubiri kwenu , hakuwa mtu wa " Ndiyo " na " Siyo " ; bali yeye daima ni " Ndiyo " ya Mungu .

text: For all the promises of God in him are yea , and in him Amen , unto the glory of God by us .
text2: Maana ndani yake ahadi zote za Mungu zimekuwa " Ndiyo " . Kwa sababu hiyo , " Amina " yetu husemwa kwa njia ya Kristo kwa ajili ya kumtukuza Mungu .

text: Now he which stablisheth us with you in Christ , and hath anointed us , is God ;
text2: Mungu mwenyewe ndiye mwenye kutuimarisha sisi na ninyi pia katika Kristo , na ndiye anayetuweka wakfu ;

text: Who hath also sealed us , and given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts .
text2: ndiye aliyetutia mhuri wa kuwa mali yake yeye na kutujalia Roho mioyoni mwetu kama dhamana ya mambo yote ambayo ametuwekea .

text: Moreover I call God for a record upon my soul , that to spare you I came not as yet unto Corinth .
text2: Mungu ndiye shahidi wangu - - yeye anajua moyo wangu ! Mimi sikuja tena Korintho , kwa sababu tu ya kuwahurumieni .

text: Not for that we have dominion over your faith , but are helpers of your joy : for by faith ye stand .
text2: Hatutaki kutumia mabavu juu ya imani yenu ; ninyi mko imara katika imani yenu . Wajibu wetu ni kufanya kazi pamoja kwa ajili ya furaha yenu .

text: But I determined this with myself , that I would not come again to you in heaviness .
text2: Basi nimeamua nisiwatembelee tena kuwatia huzuni .

text: For if I make you sorry , who is he then that maketh me glad , but the same which is made sorry by me ?
text2: Maana nikiwahuzunisha ninyi , basi , ni nani atakayenifariji ? Ni walewale niliowahuzunisha !

text: And I wrote this same unto you , lest , when I came , I should have sorrow from them of whom I ought to rejoice ; having confidence in you all , that my joy is the joy of you all .
text2: Ndiyo maana niliwaandikia - - sikutaka kuja kwenu na kuhuzunishwa na ninyi ambao ndio mngepaswa kuwa furaha yangu . Nina hakika kwamba , mimi nikifurahi , ninyi nyote pia mnafurahi .

text: For out of much affliction and anguish of heart I wrote unto you with many tears ; not that ye should be grieved , but that ye might know the love which I have more abundantly unto you .
text2: Nilipowaandikia hapo awali katika hali ya huzuni na sikitiko moyoni na kwa machozi mengi , haikuwa kwa ajili ya kuwahuzunisha ninyi , bali kwa ajili ya kuwaonyesheni kwamba nawapenda mno .

text: But if any have caused grief , he hath not grieved me , but in part : that I may not overcharge you all .
text2: Ikiwa kuna mtu aliyemhuzunisha mwingine , hakunihuzunisha mimi - - ila amewahuzunisha ninyi nyote , na sipendi kuwa mkali zaidi .

text: Sufficient to such a man is this punishment , which was inflicted of many .
text2: Adhabu aliyokwisha pata kutoka kwa wengi wenu inamtosha .

text: So that contrariwise ye ought rather to forgive him , and comfort him , lest perhaps such a one should be swallowed up with overmuch sorrow .
text2: Iliyobakia ni afadhali kwenu kumsamehe mtu huyo na kumpa moyo ili asije akahuzunika mno na kukata tamaa kabisa .

text: Wherefore I beseech you that ye would confirm your love toward him .
text2: Kwa hiyo nawasihi : mwonyesheni kwamba mnampenda .

text: For to this end also did I write , that I might know the proof of you , whether ye be obedient in all things .
text2: Madhumuni yangu kuandika ile barua yalikuwa kutaka kujua kama mko tayari kutii katika kila jambo .

text: To whom ye forgive any thing , I forgive also : for if I forgave any thing , to whom I forgave it , for your sakes forgave I it in the person of Christ ;
text2: Mkimsamehe mtu , nami pia ninamsamehe . Maana ninaposamehe - - kama kweli ninacho cha kusamehe - - nasamehe mbele ya Kristo kwa ajili yenu ,

text: Lest Satan should get an advantage of us : for we are not ignorant of his devices .
text2: ili tusimpe nafasi Shetani atudanganye ; maana twaijua mipango yake ilivyo .

text: Furthermore , when I came to Troas to preach Christ ' s gospel , and a door was opened unto me of the Lord ,
text2: Nilipofika Troa kuhubiri Habari Njema ya Kristo , nilikuta mlango u wazi kwa ajili ya kazi ya Bwana .

text: I had no rest in my spirit , because I found not Titus my brother : but taking my leave of them , I went from thence into Macedonia .
text2: Lakini nilifadhaika sana kwa kutomkuta ndugu yetu Tito . Ndiyo maana niliwaaga wote pale nikaenda Makedonia .

text: Now thanks be unto God , which always causeth us to triumph in Christ , and maketh manifest the savour of his knowledge by us in every place .
text2: Lakini , shukrani kwa Mungu anayetuongoza daima katika msafara wa ushindi wa Kristo . Yeye hutufanya tuueneze ukweli wa Kristo kama harufu nzuri , kila mahali .

text: For we are unto God a sweet savour of Christ , in them that are saved , and in them that perish :
text2: Maana sisi ni kama harufu nzuri ya ubani ambayo Kristo anamtolea Mungu , harufu nzuri inayofikia wote wanaookolewa na wanaopotea .

text: To the one we are the savour of death unto death ; and to the other the savour of life unto life . And who is sufficient for these things ?
text2: Kwa wale wanaopotea , harufu hiyo ni kifo ; lakini kwa wale wanaookolewa , harufu hiyo ni uhai . Nani basi , awezaye kushiriki katika kazi ya namna hiyo ?

text: For we are not as many , which corrupt the word of God : but as of sincerity , but as of God , in the sight of God speak we in Christ .
text2: Sisi si kama wengine ambao hufanya biashara na ujumbe wa Mungu ; sisi tunahubiri kwa unyofu mbele ya Mungu , kama watu tuliotumwa na Mungu , tukiwa tumeungana na Kristo .

text: Do we begin again to commend ourselves ? or need we , as some others , epistles of commendation to you , or letters of commendation from you ?
text2: Je , tunaanza tena kujipendekeza ? Je , tunahitaji barua ya utambulisho kwenu , au kutoka kwenu , kama watu wengine ?

text: Ye are our epistle written in our hearts , known and read of all men :
text2: Ninyi wenyewe ni barua yetu ; barua iliyoandikwa mioyoni mwetu kila mtu aione na kuisoma .

text: Forasmuch as ye are manifestly declared to be the epistle of Christ ministered by us , written not with ink , but with the Spirit of the living God ; not in tables of stone , but in fleshy tables of the heart .
text2: Ni dhahiri kwamba ninyi ni barua ya Kristo aliyoipeleka kwa mikono yetu . Barua yenyewe imeandikwa si kwa wino , bali kwa Roho wa Mungu hai ; imeandikwa si juu ya kipande cha jiwe , bali juu ya mioyo ya watu .

text: And such trust have we through Christ to God - ward :
text2: Tunaweza kusema hayo kwa sababu ya tumaini letu tulilo nalo kwa Mungu kwa njia ya Kristo .

text: Not that we are sufficient of ourselves to think any thing as of ourselves ; but our sufficiency is of God ;
text2: Si kwamba sisi tunaweza kufanya chochote kwa nguvu zetu wenyewe , ila uwezo wetu wote hutoka kwa Mungu :

text: Who also hath made us able ministers of the new testament ; not of the letter , but of the spirit : for the letter killeth , but the spirit giveth life .
text2: maana yeye ndiye aliyetuwezesha kulihudumia Agano Jipya ambalo si agano la sheria iliyoandikwa , bali Agano la Roho . Maana sheria iliyoandikwa huleta kifo , lakini Roho huleta uzima .

text: But if the ministration of death , written and engraven in stones , was glorious , so that the children of Israel could not stedfastly behold the face of Moses for the glory of his countenance ; which glory was to be done away :
text2: Sheria iliwekwa kwa kuandikwa juu ya vipande vya mawe . Ingawaje mwisho wake umekuwa kifo , utukufu wake ulikuwa mkuu mno hata wana wa Israeli wasiweze kuutazama uso wa Mose kwa sababu ya mng ' ao wake . Tena mng ' ao huo ulikuwa wa muda tu . Basi , ikiwa huduma ya kile ambacho kimesababisha kifo imefanyika kwa utukufu mwingi kiasi hicho ,

text: How shall not the ministration of the spirit be rather glorious ?
text2: basi , huduma ya Roho ina utukufu mkuu zaidi .

text: For if the ministration of condemnation be glory , much more doth the ministration of righteousness exceed in glory .
text2: Ikiwa basi , kulikuwa na utukufu katika huduma ile iliyoleta hukumu , ni wazi kwamba huduma ile iletayo kukubaliwa kuwa waadilifu itakuwa na utukufu mkuu zaidi .

text: For even that which was made glorious had no glory in this respect , by reason of the glory that excelleth .
text2: Sasa utukufu mkuu zaidi umechukua nafasi ya ule utukufu uliokuja hapo awali , ambao fahari yake imekwisha toweka .

text: For if that which is done away was glorious , much more that which remaineth is glorious .
text2: Maana ikiwa kile kilichokuwa cha muda tu kilikuwa na utukufu wake , bila shaka kile chenye kudumu milele kitakuwa na utukufu mkuu zaidi .

text: Seeing then that we have such hope , we use great plainness of speech :
text2: Kwa vile hili ndilo tumaini letu , sisi twasema kwa uhodari mkuu .

text: And not as Moses , which put a vail over his face , that the children of Israel could not stedfastly look to the end of that which is abolished :
text2: Sisi hatufanyi kama Mose ambaye alilazimika kuufunika uso wake kwa kitambaa ili watu wa Israeli wasiuone ule mwisho wa mng ' ao uliokuwa unafifia .

text: But their minds were blinded : for until this day remaineth the same vail untaken away in the reading of the old testament ; which vail is done away in Christ .
text2: Lakini akili zao zilipumbazwa . Mpaka leo hii lisomwapo Agano la Kale , kifuniko hicho bado kipo . Kifuniko hicho kitaondolewa tu mtu anapoungana na Kristo .

text: But even unto this day , when Moses is read , the vail is upon their heart .
text2: Naam , mpaka hivi leo kila isomwapo Sheria ya Mose akili zao huwa zimefunikwa .

text: Nevertheless when it shall turn to the Lord , the vail shall be taken away .
text2: Lakini , wakati mtu amgeukiapo Bwana , kifuniko hicho huondolewa .

text: Now the Lord is that Spirit : and where the Spirit of the Lord is , there is liberty .
text2: Hapa " Bwana " ni Roho ; na pale alipo Roho wa Bwana ndipo ulipo uhuru .

text: But we all , with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord , are changed into the same image from glory to glory , even as by the Spirit of the Lord .
text2: Basi , sisi sote ambao nyuso zetu hazikufunikwa , twaonyesha kama katika kioo , utukufu wa Bwana ; tunabadilishwa tufanane zaidi na huo mfano wake kwa utukufu mwingi zaidi . Hiyo ni kazi yake Roho wa Bwana .

text: Therefore seeing we have this ministry , as we have received mercy , we faint not ;
text2: Basi , Mungu , kwa huruma yake , ametukabidhi kazi hii na hivyo hatufi moyo .

text: But have renounced the hidden things of dishonesty , not walking in craftiness , nor handling the word of God deceitfully ; but by manifestation of the truth commending ourselves to every man ' s conscience in the sight of God .
text2: Tumeyaacha kabisa mambo yote ya aibu na ya kisirisiri . Hatuishi tena kwa udanganyifu , wala kwa kulipotosha neno la Mungu ; bali tunaudhihirisha ukweli kwa kuufanya ukweli , na hivyo kujiweka chini ya uamuzi wa dhamiri za watu mbele ya Mungu .

text: But if our gospel be hid , it is hid to them that are lost :
text2: Maana , kama Habari Njema tunayohubiri imefichika , imefichika tu kwa wale wanaopotea .

text: In whom the god of this world hath blinded the minds of them which believe not , lest the light of the glorious gospel of Christ , who is the image of God , should shine unto them .
text2: Hao hawaamini kwa sababu yule mungu wa ulimwengu huu amezitia giza akili zao wasipate kuuona wazi mwanga wa Habari Njema ya utukufu wa Kristo , ambaye ni mfano kamili wa Mungu .

text: For we preach not ourselves , but Christ Jesus the Lord ; and ourselves your servants for Jesus ' sake .
text2: Maana hatujitangazi sisi wenyewe , ila tunamhubiri Yesu Kristo aliye Bwana , sisi wenyewe tukiwa watumishi wenu kwa ajili ya Yesu .

text: For God , who commanded the light to shine out of darkness , hath shined in our hearts , to give the light of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Jesus Christ .
text2: Mungu ambaye alisema , " Mwanga na uangaze kutoka gizani , " ndiye mwenye kuiangaza mioyo yetu , na kutupatia mwanga wa ujuzi wa utukufu wa Mungu uangazao katika uso wa Kristo .

text: But we have this treasure in earthen vessels , that the excellency of the power may be of God , and not of us .
text2: Basi , sisi tulio na hazina hii tuko tu kama vyombo vya udongo , ili ionekane wazi kwamba nguvu hiyo kuu yatoka kwa Mungu wala si kwetu sisi wenyewe .

text: We are troubled on every side , yet not distressed ; we are perplexed , but not in despair ;
text2: Daima twapata taabu , lakini hatugandamizwi ; twapata mashaka , lakini hatukati tamaa ;

text: Persecuted , but not forsaken ; cast down , but not destroyed ;
text2: twateseka , lakini hatuachwi bila msaada ; na ingawa tumeangushwa chini , hatukuangamizwa .

text: Always bearing about in the body the dying of the Lord Jesus , that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our body .
text2: Kila wakati tumekuwa tukichukua mwilini mwetu kifo cha Kristo , ili uhai wake Yesu pia udhihirike katika miili yetu .

text: For we which live are alway delivered unto death for Jesus ' sake , that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our mortal flesh .
text2: Naam , katika maisha yetu yote tunakabiliwa na kifo daima kwa ajili ya Yesu , ili uzima wake Yesu udhihirike katika miili yetu inayokufa .

text: So then death worketh in us , but life in you .
text2: Hii ina maana kwamba ndani yetu kifo kinafanya kazi , lakini ndani yenu uhai unafanya kazi .

text: We having the same spirit of faith , according as it is written , I believed , and therefore have I spoken ; we also believe , and therefore speak ;
text2: Maandiko Matakatifu yasema : " Niliamini , ndiyo maana nilinena . " Nasi pia , tukiwa na moyo huohuo wa imani , tunaamini , na kwa sababu hiyo twanena .

text: Knowing that he which raised up the Lord Jesus shall raise up us also by Jesus , and shall present us with you .
text2: Tunajua kwamba yule aliyemfufua Bwana Yesu atatufufua sisi pia pamoja na Yesu na kutuweka mbele yake pamoja nanyi .

text: For all things are for your sakes , that the abundant grace might through the thanksgiving of many redound to the glory of God .
text2: Yote haya ni kwa faida yenu ; ili kama vile neema ya Mungu inavyoenea kwa watu wengi zaidi na zaidi vivyo hivyo watu wengi zaidi watoe shukrani nyingi kwa utukufu wa Mungu .

text: For which cause we faint not ; but though our outward man perish , yet the inward man is renewed day by day .
text2: Kwa sababu hiyo hatufi moyo ; na hata kama maumbile yetu ya nje yataoza , lakini kwa ndani tunafanywa wapya siku kwa siku .

text: For our light affliction , which is but for a moment , worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory ;
text2: Taabu tunayopata ni kidogo , tena ya muda tu : lakini itatupatia utukufu upitao matazamio yote , utukufu ambao hauna mwisho .

text: While we look not at the things which are seen , but at the things which are not seen : for the things which are seen are temporal ; but the things which are not seen are eternal .
text2: Hivyo tunatazamia kwa makini si vitu vinavyoonekana , bali visivyoonekana . Maana vinavyoonekana ni vya muda tu ; lakini vile visivyoonekana ni vya milele .

text: For we know that if our earthly house of this tabernacle were dissolved , we have a building of God , an house not made with hands , eternal in the heavens .
text2: Maana tunajua kwamba hema hii ambayo ndani yake tunaishi sasa hapa duniani , yaani mwili wetu , itakapong ' olewa , Mungu atatupa makao mengine mbinguni , nyumba ya milele isiyotengenezwa kwa mikono .

text: For in this we groan , earnestly desiring to be clothed upon with our house which is from heaven :
text2: Na sasa , katika hali hii , tunaugua , tukitazamia kwa hamu kubwa kuvikwa makao yetu yaliyo mbinguni .

text: If so be that being clothed we shall not be found naked .
text2: Naam , tunapaswa kuvikwa namna hiyo ili tusije tukasimama mbele ya Mungu bila vazi .

text: For we that are in this tabernacle do groan , being burdened : not for that we would be unclothed , but clothed upon , that mortality might be swallowed up of life .
text2: Tukiwa bado katika hema hii ya duniani , tunalia kwa kukandamizwa ; si kwamba tunataka kuuvua mwili huu wa kufa , ila tuna hamu ya kuvalishwa ule usiokufa , ili kile chenye kufa kimezwe kabisa na uhai .

text: Now he that hath wrought us for the selfsame thing is God , who also hath given unto us the earnest of the Spirit .
text2: Mungu mwenyewe alitutayarishia mabadiliko hayo , naye ametupa Roho wake awe dhamana ya yote aliyotuwekea .

text: Therefore we are always confident , knowing that , whilst we are at home in the body , we are absent from the Lord :
text2: Tuko imara daima . Tunajua kwamba kuishi katika mwili huu tu ni kukaa mbali na Bwana .

text: ( For we walk by faith , not by sight : )
text2: Maana tunaishi kwa imani , na si kwa kuona .

text: We are confident , I say , and willing rather to be absent from the body , and to be present with the Lord .
text2: Lakini tuko imara na tungependelea hata kuyahama makao haya , tukahamie kwa Bwana .

text: Wherefore we labour , that , whether present or absent , we may be accepted of him .
text2: Lakini jambo la maana zaidi , tunataka kumpendeza , iwe tunaishi hapa duniani au huko .

text: For we must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ ; that every one may receive the things done in his body , according to that he hath done , whether it be good or bad .
text2: Maana sote ni lazima tusimame mbele ya kiti cha hukumu cha Kristo , ili kila mmoja apokee anayostahili kwa matendo aliyoyafanya wakati alipokuwa anaishi duniani , mema au mabaya .

text: Knowing therefore the terror of the Lord , we persuade men ; but we are made manifest unto God ; and I trust also are made manifest in your consciences .
text2: Basi , sisi tunajua umuhimu wa kumcha Bwana , na hivyo tunajitahidi kuwavuta watu . Mungu anatujua waziwazi , nami natumaini kwamba nanyi pia mnatujua kinaganaga .

text: For we commend not ourselves again unto you , but give you occasion to glory on our behalf , that ye may have somewhat to answer them which glory in appearance , and not in heart .
text2: Si kwamba tunajaribu tena kujipendekeza kwenu , ila tunataka kuwapa ninyi sababu zetu za kuona fahari juu yenu , ili mpate kuwajibu wale wanaojivunia hali yao ya nje zaidi kuliko jinsi walivyo moyoni .

text: For whether we be beside ourselves , it is to God : or whether we be sober , it is for your cause .
text2: Ikiwa tumeonekana kuwa wendawazimu , hiyo ni kwa ajili ya Mungu ; na ikiwa tunazo akili zetu timamu , hiyo ni kwa faida yenu .

text: For the love of Christ constraineth us ; because we thus judge , that if one died for all , then were all dead :
text2: Maana mapendo ya Kristo yanatumiliki sisi ambao tunatambua ya kwamba mtu mmoja tu amekufa kwa ajili ya wote , na hiyo ina maana kwamba wote wanashiriki kifo chake .

text: And that he died for all , that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves , but unto him which died for them , and rose again .
text2: Alikufa kwa ajili ya watu wote , ili wanaoishi wasiishi kwa ajili yao wenyewe , bali kwa ajili yake yeye aliyekufa , akafufuliwa kwa ajili yao .

text: Wherefore henceforth know we no man after the flesh : yea , though we have known Christ after the flesh , yet now henceforth know we him no more .
text2: Basi , tangu sasa , sisi hatumpimi mtu yeyote kibinadamu . Hata kama kwa wakati mmoja tulimpima Kristo kibinadamu , sasa si hivyo tena .

text: Therefore if any man be in Christ , he is a new creature : old things are passed away ; behold , all things are become new .
text2: Mtu yeyote akiungana na Kristo huwa kiumbe kipya , mambo ya kale yamepita , hali mpya imefika .

text: And all things are of God , who hath reconciled us to himself by Jesus Christ , and hath given to us the ministry of reconciliation ;
text2: Yote ni kazi ya Mungu mwenye kutupatanisha sisi naye kwa njia ya Kristo , akatupa nasi jukumu la kuwapatanisha watu naye .

text: To wit , that God was in Christ , reconciling the world unto himself , not imputing their trespasses unto them ; and hath committed unto us the word of reconciliation .
text2: Ndiyo kusema : Mungu , amekuwa akiupatanisha ulimwengu naye kwa njia ya Kristo , bila kutia maanani dhambi zao binadamu . Yeye ametupa ujumbe kuhusu kuwapatanisha watu naye .

text: Now then we are ambassadors for Christ , as though God did beseech you by us : we pray you in Christ ' s stead , be ye reconciled to God .
text2: Basi , sisi tunamwakilisha Kristo , naye Mungu mwenyewe anatutumia sisi kuwasihi ninyi . Tunawaombeni kwa niaba ya Kristo , mpatanishwe na Mungu .

text: For he hath made him to be sin for us , who knew no sin ; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him .
text2: Kristo hakuwa na dhambi , lakini Mungu alimfanya ahusike na dhambi kwa ajili yetu , ili sisi kwa kuungana naye , tupate kuushiriki uadilifu wake Mungu .

text: We then , as workers together with him , beseech you also that ye receive not the grace of God in vain .
text2: Basi , tukiwa wafanyakazi pamoja na Mungu , tunawasihi msikubali ile neema mliyopokea kutoka kwa Mungu ipotee bure .

text: ( For he saith , I have heard thee in a time accepted , and in the day of salvation have I succoured thee : behold , now is the accepted time ; behold , now is the day of salvation . )
text2: Mungu asema hivi : " Wakati wa kufaa nimekusikiliza , wakati wa wokovu nikakusaidia . " Basi , sasa ndio wakati wa kufaa , sasa ndiyo siku ya wokovu !

text: Giving no offence in any thing , that the ministry be not blamed :
text2: Kusudi tusiwe na lawama yoyote katika utumishi wetu , hatupendi kumwekea mtu yeyote kizuio chochote .

text: But in all things approving ourselves as the ministers of God , in much patience , in afflictions , in necessities , in distresses ,
text2: Badala yake , tunajionyesha kuwa kweli watumishi wa Mungu kwa kila kitu : kwa uvumilivu mwingi wakati wa mateso , shida na taabu .

text: In stripes , in imprisonments , in tumults , in labours , in watchings , in fastings ;
text2: Tumepigwa , tumetiwa gerezani na kuzomewa hadharani ; tumefanya kazi tukachoka ; tumekesha na kukaa bila kula .

text: By pureness , by knowledge , by longsuffering , by kindness , by the Holy Ghost , by love unfeigned ,
text2: Tunajionyesha kuwa watumishi wa Mungu kwa usafi wa moyo , elimu , uvumilivu na wema ; kwa Roho Mtakatifu , kwa upendo usio na unafiki ,

text: By the word of truth , by the power of God , by the armour of righteousness on the right hand and on the left ,
text2: kwa ujumbe wa kweli na kwa nguvu ya Mungu . Uadilifu ndiyo silaha yetu upande wa kulia na upande wa kushoto .

text: By honour and dishonour , by evil report and good report : as deceivers , and yet true ;
text2: Tuko tayari kupata heshima na kudharauliwa , kulaumiwa na kusifiwa . Twadhaniwa kuwa waongo , kumbe twasema kweli ;

text: As unknown , and yet well known ; as dying , and , behold , we live ; as chastened , and not killed ;
text2: kama wasiojulikana , kumbe twajulikana kwa wote , kama waliokufa , lakini mwonavyo , sisi ni wazima kabisa .

text: As sorrowful , yet alway rejoicing ; as poor , yet making many rich ; as having nothing , and yet possessing all things .
text2: Ingawa tumeadhibiwa , hatukuuawa ; ingawa tunayo huzuni , twafurahi daima ; ingawa tu maskini hohehahe , lakini twatajirisha watu wengi ; twaonekana kuwa watu tusio na chochote , kumbe tuna kila kitu .

text: O ye Corinthians , our mouth is open unto you , our heart is enlarged .
text2: Ndugu Wakorintho , tumezungumza nanyi kwa unyofu ; mioyo yetu iko wazi kabisa .

text: Ye are not straitened in us , but ye are straitened in your own bowels .
text2: Kama mnaona kuna kizuizi chochote kile , kizuizi hicho kiko kwenu ninyi wenyewe , na si kwa upande wetu .

text: Now for a recompence in the same , ( I speak as unto my children , ) be ye also enlarged .
text2: Sasa nasema nanyi kama watoto wangu , wekeni mioyo yenu wazi kama nasi tulivyofanya .

text: Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers : for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness ? and what communion hath light with darkness ?
text2: Msiambatane na watu wasioamini . Je , wema na uovu vyapatana kweli ? Mwanga na giza vyawezaje kukaa pamoja ?

text: And what concord hath Christ with Belial ? or what part hath he that believeth with an infidel ?
text2: Kristo anawezaje kupatana na Shetani ? Muumini ana uhusiano gani na asiyeamini ?

text: And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols ? for ye are the temple of the living God ; as God hath said , I will dwell in them , and walk in them ; and I will be their God , and they shall be my people .
text2: Hekalu la Mungu lina uhusiano gani na sanamu za uongo ? Maana sisi ni hekalu la Mungu aliye hai . Kama Mungu mwenyewe alivyosema : " Nitafanya makao yangu kwao , na kuishi kati yao ; Nitakuwa Mungu wao , nao watakuwa watu wangu . "

text: Wherefore come out from among them , and be ye separate , saith the Lord , and touch not the unclean thing ; and I will receive you ,
text2: Kwa hiyo Bwana asema pia : " Ondokeni kati yao , mkajitenge nao , msiguse kitu najisi , nami nitawapokea .

text: And will be a Father unto you , and ye shall be my sons and daughters , saith the Lord Almighty .
text2: Mimi nitakuwa Baba yenu , nanyi mtakuwa watoto wangu , waume kwa wake , asema Bwana Mwenye Uwezo . "

text: Having therefore these promises , dearly beloved , let us cleanse ourselves from all filthiness of the flesh and spirit , perfecting holiness in the fear of God .
text2: Basi , wapenzi wangu , tukiwa tumepewa ahadi hizi zote , na tujitakase na chochote kiwezacho kuchafua miili na roho zetu , tuwe watakatifu kabisa , na tuishi kwa kumcha Mungu .

text: Receive us ; we have wronged no man , we have corrupted no man , we have defrauded no man .
text2: Tunaomba mtupe nafasi mioyoni mwenu ! Hatujamkosea mtu yeyote , hatujamdhuru wala kumdanganya mtu yeyote .

text: I speak not this to condemn you : for I have said before , that ye are in our hearts to die and live with you .
text2: Sisemi mambo haya kwa ajili ya kumhukumu mtu ; maana , kama nilivyokwisha sema , ninyi mko mioyoni mwetu , tufe pamoja , tuishi pamoja .

text: Great is my boldness of speech toward you , great is my glorying of you : I am filled with comfort , I am exceeding joyful in all our tribulation .
text2: Nina imani kubwa sana ninaposema nanyi ; naona fahari kubwa juu yenu ! Katika taabu zetu nimepata kitulizo kikubwa na kufurahi mno .

text: For , when we were come into Macedonia , our flesh had no rest , but we were troubled on every side ; without were fightings , within were fears .
text2: Hata baada ya kufika Makedonia hatukuweza kupumzika . Kila upande tulikabiliwa na taabu : nje ugomvi ; ndani hofu .

text: Nevertheless God , that comforteth those that are cast down , comforted us by the coming of Titus ;
text2: Lakini Mungu , mwenye kuwapa shime wanyonge alitupa moyo sisi pia kwa kuja kwake Tito .

text: And not by his coming only , but by the consolation wherewith he was comforted in you , when he told us your earnest desire , your mourning , your fervent mind toward me ; so that I rejoiced the more .
text2: Si tu kwa kule kuja kwake Tito , bali pia kwa sababu ya moyo mliompa ninyi . Yeye ametuarifu jinsi mnavyotamani kuniona , jinsi mlivyo na huzuni , na mnavyotaka kunitetea . Jambo hili linanifurahisha sana .

text: For though I made you sorry with a letter , I do not repent , though I did repent : for I perceive that the same epistle hath made you sorry , though it were but for a season .
text2: Maana , hata kama kwa barua ile yangu nimewahuzunisha , sioni sababu ya kujuta . Naam , naona kwamba barua hiyo iliwatia huzuni lakini kwa muda .

text: Now I rejoice , not that ye were made sorry , but that ye sorrowed to repentance : for ye were made sorry after a godly manner , that ye might receive damage by us in nothing .
text2: Sasa nafurahi , si kwa sababu mmehuzunika , ila kwa kuwa huzuni yenu imewafanya mbadili nia zenu na kutubu . Mmehuzunishwa kadiri ya mpango wa Mungu , na kwa sababu hiyo hatukuwadhuru ninyi kwa vyovyote .

text: For godly sorrow worketh repentance to salvation not to be repented of : but the sorrow of the world worketh death .
text2: Kuwa na huzuni jinsi atakavyo Mungu , husababisha badiliko la moyo , badiliko lenye kuleta wokovu ; hivyo hakuna sababu ya kujuta . Lakini huzuni ya kidunia huleta kifo .

text: For behold this selfsame thing , that ye sorrowed after a godly sort , what carefulness it wrought in you , yea , what clearing of yourselves , yea , what indignation , yea , what fear , yea , what vehement desire , yea , what zeal , yea , what revenge ! In all things ye have approved yourselves to be clear in this matter .
text2: Sasa mnaweza kuona matokeo ya kuona huzuni jinsi Mungu atakavyo : ninyi mmepata kuwa sasa watu wenye jitihada , wenye hoja , mnashtuka na kuogopa , mna bidii na mko tayari kuona kwamba haki yatekelezwa . Ninyi mmethibitisha kwa kila njia kwamba hamna hatia kuhusu jambo hili .

text: Wherefore , though I wrote unto you , I did it not for his cause that had done the wrong , nor for his cause that suffered wrong , but that our care for you in the sight of God might appear unto you .
text2: Hivyo , ingawa niliandika ile barua , haikuwa kwa ajili ya yule aliyekosa , au kwa ajili ya yule aliyekosewa . Niliandika kusudi ionekane wazi mbele ya Mungu jinsi mlivyo na bidii kwa ajili yetu .

text: Therefore we were comforted in your comfort : yea , and exceedingly the more joyed we for the joy of Titus , because his spirit was refreshed by you all .
text2: Ndiyo maana sisi tulifarijika sana . Siyo kwamba tulifarijika tu , ila pia Tito alitufurahisha kwa furaha aliyokuwa nayo kutokana na jinsi mlivyomchangamsha moyo .

text: For if I have boasted any thing to him of you , I am not ashamed ; but as we spake all things to you in truth , even so our boasting , which I made before Titus , is found a truth .
text2: Mimi nimewasifu sana mbele yake , na katika jambo hilo sikudanganyika . Tumewaambieni ukweli daima , na kule kuwasifia ninyi mbele ya Tito kumekuwa jambo la ukweli mtupu .

text: And his inward affection is more abundant toward you , whilst he remembereth the obedience of you all , how with fear and trembling ye received him .
text2: Hivyo upendo wake wa moyo kwenu unaongezeka zaidi akikumbuka jinsi ninyi nyote mlivyo tayari kutii , na jinsi mlivyomkaribisha kwa hofu nyingi na kutetemeka .

text: I rejoice therefore that I have confidence in you in all things .
text2: Nafurahi sana kwamba naweza kuwategemea ninyi kabisa katika kila jambo .

text: Moreover , brethren , we do you to wit of the grace of God bestowed on the churches of Macedonia ;
text2: Ndugu , tunapenda kuwapa habari juu ya neema ambazo Mungu ameyajalia makanisa ya Makedonia .

text: How that in a great trial of affliction the abundance of their joy and their deep poverty abounded unto the riches of their liberality .
text2: Waumini wa huko walijaribiwa sana kwa taabu ; lakini furaha yao ilikuwa kubwa hivi hata wakawa wakarimu kupita kiasi , ingawaje walikuwa maskini sana .

text: For to their power , I bear record , yea , and beyond their power they were willing of themselves ;
text2: Naweza kushuhudia kwamba walikuwa wakarimu kadiri ya nguvu zao na hata zaidi . Kwa hiari yao wenyewe ,

text: Praying us with much intreaty that we would receive the gift , and take upon us the fellowship of the ministering to the saints .
text2: walitusihi sana wapewe nafasi ya kushiriki katika huduma hii ya kuwasaidia watu wa Mungu .

text: And this they did , not as we hoped , but first gave their own selves to the Lord , and unto us by the will of God .
text2: Hilo lilikuwa jambo ambalo hatukulitazamia kabisa ! Kwanza walijitolea wao wenyewe kwa Bwana , kisha wakajitolea wenyewe kwetu pia , kufuatana na mapenzi ya Mungu .

text: Insomuch that we desired Titus , that as he had begun , so he would also finish in you the same grace also .
text2: Kwa sababu hiyo , tulimsihi Tito aliyeianza kazi hiyo awasaidieni pia muitekeleze huduma hii ya upendo miongoni mwenu .

text: Therefore , as ye abound in every thing , in faith , and utterance , and knowledge , and in all diligence , and in your love to us , see that ye abound in this grace also .
text2: Ninyi mna kila kitu : imani , uwezo wa kusema , elimu ; bidii yote ya kutenda mema , na upendo wenu kwetu . Hivyo , tunatazamia muwe wakarimu katika huduma hii ya upendo .

text: I speak not by commandment , but by occasion of the forwardness of others , and to prove the sincerity of your love .
text2: Siwapi ninyi amri , lakini nataka tu kuonyesha jinsi wengine walivyo na bidii ya kusaidia ili nipate kujua jinsi upendo wenu ulivyo wa kweli .

text: For ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ , that , though he was rich , yet for your sakes he became poor , that ye through his poverty might be rich .
text2: Maana , ninyi mnajua neema ya Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo : yeye , ingawa alikuwa na kila kitu , alijifanya maskini kwa ajili yenu , ili kutokana na umaskini wake , awatajirishe .

text: And herein I give my advice : for this is expedient for you , who have begun before , not only to do , but also to be forward a year ago .
text2: Kuhusu jambo hili , basi , nawapeni shauri hili : inafaa kwenu kutekeleza sasa yale mliyoanza mwaka jana . Ninyi mlikuwa wa kwanza kuchukua hatua na kuamua kufanya hivyo .

text: Now therefore perform the doing of it ; that as there was a readiness to will , so there may be a performance also out of that which ye have .
text2: Basi , kamilisheni shughuli hiyo ; na kama vile mlivyokuwa na hamu kubwa ya kusaidia , basi , fanyeni bidii vivyo hivyo , kadiri ya uwezo wenu , kuikamilisha .

text: For if there be first a willing mind , it is accepted according to that a man hath , and not according to that he hath not .
text2: Maana ikiwa mtu ana moyo wa kusaidia , Mungu hupokea kila anachoweza kutoa : hadai zaidi .

text: For I mean not that other men be eased , and ye burdened :
text2: Ninyi hampaswi kuongezewa taabu kusudi wengine wapunguziwe mzigo wao ; sivyo , ila ni lazima tujali usawa na haki .

text: But by an equality , that now at this time your abundance may be a supply for their want , that their abundance also may be a supply for your want : that there may be equality :
text2: Kila mlicho nacho sasa cha ziada kiwasaidie wale wanaohitaji , ili nao wakati watakapokuwa na ziada , wawasaidie ninyi katika mahitaji yenu , na hivyo kuwe na usawa .

text: As it is written , He that had gathered much had nothing over ; and he that had gathered little had no lack .
text2: Kama Maandiko yasemavyo : " Aliyekusanya kwa wingi hakuwa na ziada , na yule aliyekusanya kidogo hakupungukiwa . "

text: But thanks be to God , which put the same earnest care into the heart of Titus for you .
text2: Namshukuru Mungu aliyeweka ndani ya moyo wa Tito hamu hiyo niliyo nayo mimi ya kuwasaidia .

text: For indeed he accepted the exhortation ; but being more forward , of his own accord he went unto you .
text2: Si tu kwamba alikubali ombi letu , ila pia alikuwa na hamu kubwa ya kusaidia , hata akaamua kwa hiari yake mwenyewe kuja kwenu .

text: And we have sent with him the brother , whose praise is in the gospel throughout all the churches ;
text2: Pamoja naye , tunamtuma ndugu mmoja ambaye sifa zake katika kueneza Habari Njema zimeenea katika makanisa yote .

text: And not that only , but who was also chosen of the churches to travel with us with this grace , which is administered by us to the glory of the same Lord , and declaration of your ready mind :
text2: Zaidi ya hayo , yeye amechaguliwa na makanisa awe mwenzetu safarini wakati tunapopeleka huduma hii yetu ya upendo , huduma tunayoifanya kwa ajili ya utukufu wa Bwana na uthibitisho wa nia yetu njema .

text: Avoiding this , that no man should blame us in this abundance which is administered by us :
text2: Tunataka kuepa lawama zinazoweza kutokea kuhusu usimamizi wetu juu ya zawadi hii karimu .

text: Providing for honest things , not only in the sight of the Lord , but also in the sight of men .
text2: Nia yetu ni kufanya vema , si tu mbele ya Bwana , lakini pia mbele ya watu .

text: And we have sent with them our brother , whom we have oftentimes proved diligent in many things , but now much more diligent , upon the great confidence which I have in you .
text2: Basi , pamoja na ndugu hao , tumemtuma ndugu yetu mwingine ambaye mara nyingi tumempa majaribio mbalimbali , tukamwona kuwa ni mwenye hamu kubwa ya kusaidia ; hata sasa amekuwa na moyo zaidi kwa sababu ana imani sana nanyi .

text: Whether any do inquire of Titus , he is my partner and fellowhelper concerning you : or our brethren be inquired of , they are the messengers of the churches , and the glory of Christ .
text2: Tito ni mwenzangu ; tunafanya kazi pamoja kwa ajili yenu ; lakini kuhusu hawa ndugu zetu wengine , wanaokuja pamoja nao , hao ni wajumbe wa makanisa , na utukufu kwa Kristo .

text: Wherefore shew ye to them , and before the churches , the proof of your love , and of our boasting on your behalf .
text2: Basi , waonyesheni uthabiti wa upendo wenu , makanisa yapate kuona kweli kwamba fahari ninayoona juu yenu ni ya halali .

text: For as touching the ministering to the saints , it is superfluous for me to write to you :
text2: Si lazima kuandika zaidi kuhusu huduma hiyo yenu kwa ajili ya watu wa Mungu .

text: For I know the forwardness of your mind , for which I boast of you to them of Macedonia , that Achaia was ready a year ago ; and your zeal hath provoked very many .
text2: Ninajua jinsi mlivyo na moyo wa kusaidia , na nilijivuna juu yenu kuhusu jambo hilo mbele ya watu wa Makedonia . Niliwaambia : " Ndugu zetu wa Akaya wako tayari tangu mwaka jana . " Hivyo , moto wenu umekwisha wahimiza watu wengi zaidi .

text: Yet have I sent the brethren , lest our boasting of you should be in vain in this behalf ; that , as I said , ye may be ready :
text2: Basi , nimewatuma ndugu zetu hao , ili fahari yetu juu yenu ionekane kwamba si maneno matupu , na kwamba mko tayari kabisa na msaada wenu kama nilivyosema .

text: Lest haply if they of Macedonia come with me , and find you unprepared , we ( that we say not , ye ) should be ashamed in this same confident boasting .
text2: Isije ikawa kwamba watu wa Makedonia watakapokuja pamoja nami tukawakuta hamko tayari , hapo sisi tutaaibika - - bila kutaja aibu mtakayopata ninyi wenyewe - - kwa sababu tutakuwa tumewatumainia kupita kiasi .

text: Therefore I thought it necessary to exhort the brethren , that they would go before unto you , and make up beforehand your bounty , whereof ye had notice before , that the same might be ready , as a matter of bounty , and not as of covetousness .
text2: Kwa hiyo , nimeona ni lazima kuwaomba hawa ndugu watutangulie kuja kwenu , wapate kuweka tayari zawadi yenu kubwa mliyoahidi ; nayo ionyeshe kweli kwamba ni zawadi iliyotolewa kwa hiari na si kwa kulazimishwa .

text: But this I say , He which soweth sparingly shall reap also sparingly ; and he which soweth bountifully shall reap also bountifully .
text2: Kumbukeni : " Apandaye kidogo huvuna kidogo ; apandaye kwa wingi huvuna kwa wingi . "

text: Every man according as he purposeth in his heart , so let him give ; not grudgingly , or of necessity : for God loveth a cheerful giver .
text2: Kila mmoja , basi , na atoe kadiri alivyoamua , kwa moyo na wala si kwa huzuni au kwa kulazimishwa , maana Mungu humpenda yule mwenye kutoa kwa furaha .

text: And God is able to make all grace abound toward you ; that ye , always having all sufficiency in all things , may abound to every good work :
text2: Mungu anaweza kuwapeni ninyi zaidi ya yale mnayoyahitaji , mpate daima kuwa na kila kitu mnachohitaji , na hivyo mzidi kusaidia katika kila kazi njema .

text: ( As it is written , He hath dispersed abroad ; he hath given to the poor : his righteousness remaineth for ever .
text2: Kama yasemavyo Maandiko Matakatifu : " Yeye hutoa kwa ukarimu , huwapa maskini , wema wahudumu milele . "

text: Now he that ministereth seed to the sower both minister bread for your food , and multiply your seed sown , and increase the fruits of your righteousness ; )
text2: Na Mungu ampaye mkulima mbegu na mkate kwa chakula , atawapa ninyi pia mbegu mnazohitaji , na atazifanya ziote , ziwe na kuwapa mavuno mengi ya ukarimu wenu .

text: Being enriched in every thing to all bountifulness , which causeth through us thanksgiving to God .
text2: Yeye atawatajirisha ninyi daima kwa kila kitu , ili watu wapate kumshukuru Mungu kwa ajili ya zawadi zenu wanazozipokea kwa mikono yetu .

text: For the administration of this service not only supplieth the want of the saints , but is abundant also by many thanksgivings unto God ;
text2: Maana huduma hii takatifu mnayoifanya si tu kwamba itasaidia mahitaji ya watu wa Mungu , bali pia itasababisha watu wengi wamshukuru Mungu .

text: Whiles by the experiment of this ministration they glorify God for your professed subjection unto the gospel of Christ , and for your liberal distribution unto them , and unto all men ;
text2: Kutokana na uthibitisho unaoonyeshwa kwa huduma hii yetu , watu watamtukuza Mungu kwa sababu ya uaminifu wenu kwa Habari Njema ya Kristo mnayoiungama , na pia kwa sababu ya ukarimu mnaowapa wao na watu wote .

text: And by their prayer for you , which long after you for the exceeding grace of God in you .
text2: Kwa hiyo watawaombea ninyi kwa moyo kwa sababu ya neema ya pekee aliyowajalieni Mungu .

text: Thanks be unto God for his unspeakable gift .
text2: Tumshukuru Mungu kwa ajili ya zawadi yake isiyo na kifani !

text: Now I Paul myself beseech you by the meekness and gentleness of Christ , who in presence am base among you , but being absent am bold toward you :
text2: Mimi Paulo mwenyewe ambaye naonekana kuwa mpole nikiwa pamoja nanyi , lakini mkali wakati nikiwa mbali nanyi , nawasihini kwa huruma na wema wake Kristo .

text: But I beseech you , that I may not be bold when I am present with that confidence , wherewith I think to be bold against some , which think of us as if we walked according to the flesh .
text2: Nawaombeni msinisababishe kuwa mkali wakati nitakapokuja , maana nina hakika naweza kuwa mkali kwa wote wale wanaotudhania kwamba tunaishi kidunia .

text: For though we walk in the flesh , we do not war after the flesh :
text2: Kweli tunaishi duniani , lakini hatupigani vita kidunia .

text: ( For the weapons of our warfare are not carnal , but mighty through God to the pulling down of strong holds ; )
text2: Maana , silaha tunazotumia katika vita vyetu si silaha za kidunia , ila ni nguvu za Mungu zenye kuharibu ngome zote . Tunaharibu hoja zote za uongo ,

text: Casting down imaginations , and every high thing that exalteth itself against the knowledge of God , and bringing into captivity every thought to the obedience of Christ ;
text2: na kubomoa kila kizuizi cha majivuno kilichowekwa kuipinga elimu ya Mungu ; tunaziteka fikira zote na kuzifanya zimtii Kristo .

text: And having in a readiness to revenge all disobedience , when your obedience is fulfilled .
text2: Mkisha kuwa wakamilifu katika kutii , sisi tuko tayari kuadhibu kila namna ya kutotii .

text: Do ye look on things after the outward appearance ? If any man trust to himself that he is Christ ' s , let him of himself think this again , that , as he is Christ ' s , even so are we Christ ' s .
text2: Ninyi hutazama mambo kwa nje tu . Je , yupo mtu yeyote anayedhani kwamba yeye ni wa Kristo ? Sawa ! Basi , afikirie vilevile kwamba sisi pia ni wa Kristo kama yeye alivyo wa Kristo .

text: For though I should boast somewhat more of our authority , which the Lord hath given us for edification , and not for your destruction , I should not be ashamed :
text2: Hata kama nimezidi katika kujivuna kwangu juu ya ule uwezo aliotupa - - uwezo wa kuwajenga na sio wa kubomoa - - hata hivyo sijutii hata kidogo .

text: That I may not seem as if I would terrify you by letters .
text2: Sipendi mfikiri kwamba nataka kuwatisha ninyi kwa barua zangu .

text: For his letters , say they , are weighty and powerful ; but his bodily presence is weak , and his speech contemptible .
text2: Mtu anaweza kusema : " Barua za Paulo ni kali na zenye maneno mazito , lakini yeye mwenyewe anapokuwa pamoja nasi ni mtu dhaifu , na hata anapoongea maneno yake ni kama si kitu . "

text: Let such an one think this , that , such as we are in word by letters when we are absent , such will we be also in deed when we are present .
text2: Mtu asemaye hivyo heri akumbuke kwamba hakuna tofauti ya yale tunayoandika katika barua wakati tuko mbali , na yale tutakayofanya wakati tutakapokuwa nanyi .

text: For we dare not make ourselves of the number , or compare ourselves with some that commend themselves : but they measuring themselves by themselves , and comparing themselves among themselves , are not wise .
text2: Kwa vyovyote hatungethubutu kujiweka au kujilinganisha na wale watu wanaojisifia wenyewe . Watu wenye kujifanya wao kuwa kipimo cha kujipimia , na watu wanaojilinganisha wenyewe kwa wenyewe , ni wapumbavu .

text: But we will not boast of things without our measure , but according to the measure of the rule which God hath distributed to us , a measure to reach even unto you .
text2: Lakini sisi hatutajivuna kupita kiasi ; kujivuna huko kutabaki katika kile kipimo cha kazi aliyotukabidhi Mungu , kazi ambayo tunaifanya pia kwenu .

text: For we stretch not ourselves beyond our measure , as though we reached not unto you : for we are come as far as to you also in preaching the gospel of Christ :
text2: Na kwa vile ninyi mu katika mipaka hiyo , hatukuipita tulipokuja kwenu , tukiwaleteeni Habari Njema juu ya Kristo .

text: Not boasting of things without our measure , that is , of other men ' s labours ; but having hope , when your faith is increased , that we shall be enlarged by you according to our rule abundantly ,
text2: Basi , hatujivunii kazi waliyofanya wengine zaidi ya kipimo tulichopewa ; ila tunatumaini kwamba imani yenu itazidi miongoni mwenu kufuatana na kipimo alichotuwekea Mungu .

text: To preach the gospel in the regions beyond you , and not to boast in another man ' s line of things made ready to our hand .
text2: Hapo tutaweza kuihubiri Habari Njema katika nchi nyingine , mbali nanyi ; na haitakuwa shauri la kujivunia kazi waliyofanya watu wengine mahali pengine .

text: But he that glorieth , let him glory in the Lord .
text2: Lakini kama yasemavyo Maandiko : " Mwenye kuona fahari na aone fahari juu ya alichofanya Bwana . "

text: For not he that commendeth himself is approved , but whom the Lord commendeth .
text2: Anayekubaliwa si yule anayejisifu mwenyewe , bali yule anayesifiwa na Bwana .

text: Would to God ye could bear with me a little in my folly : and indeed bear with me .
text2: Laiti mngenivumilia kidogo , hata kama mimi ni mjinga kiasi fulani ! Naam , nivumilieni kidogo .

text: For I am jealous over you with godly jealousy : for I have espoused you to one husband , that I may present you as a chaste virgin to Christ .
text2: Ninawaoneeni wivu lakini ni wivu wa Mungu ; maana ninyi ni kama bikira safi niliyemposa kwa mwanamume mmoja tu ambaye ndiye Kristo .

text: But I fear , lest by any means , as the serpent beguiled Eve through his subtilty , so your minds should be corrupted from the simplicity that is in Christ .
text2: Lakini naogopa kwamba , kama vile yule nyoka kwa hila zake za uongo alimdanganya Hawa , fikira zenu zaweza kupotoshwa , mkauacha uaminifu wenu wa kweli kwa Kristo .

text: For if he that cometh preacheth another Jesus , whom we have not preached , or if ye receive another spirit , which ye have not received , or another gospel , which ye have not accepted , ye might well bear with him .
text2: Maana mtu yeyote ajaye na kumhubiri Yesu aliye tofauti na yule tuliyemhubiri , ninyi mwampokea kwa mikono miwili ; au mnakubali roho au habari njema tofauti kabisa na ile mliyopokea kutoka kwetu !

text: For I suppose I was not a whit behind the very chiefest apostles .
text2: Sidhani kwamba mimi ni mdogo kuliko hao " mitume wakuu . "

text: But though I be rude in speech , yet not in knowledge ; but we have been throughly made manifest among you in all things .
text2: Labda sina ufasaha wa lugha , lakini elimu ninayo ; jambo hili tumelionyesha wazi kwenu , kila mahali na kila wakati .

text: Have I committed an offence in abasing myself that ye might be exalted , because I have preached to you the gospel of God freely ?
text2: Mimi niliihubiri kwenu Habari Njema ya Mungu bila kudai mshahara ; nilijinyenyekeza ili nipate kuwakweza ninyi . Je , nilifanya vibaya ?

text: I robbed other churches , taking wages of them , to do you service .
text2: Nilipofanya kazi kati yenu , mahitaji yangu yaligharimiwa na makanisa mengine . Kwa namna moja au nyingine niliwapokonya wao mali yao nipate kuwatumikia ninyi .

text: And when I was present with you , and wanted , I was chargeable to no man : for that which was lacking to me the brethren which came from Macedonia supplied : and in all things I have kept myself from being burdensome unto you , and so will I keep myself .
text2: Nilipokuwa nanyi sikumsumbua mtu yeyote nilipohitaji fedha ; ndugu waliotoka Makedonia waliniletea kila kitu nilichohitaji . Nilikuwa mwangalifu sana nisiwe mzigo kwa namna yoyote ile , na nitaendelea kufanya hivyo .

text: As the truth of Christ is in me , no man shall stop me of this boasting in the regions of Achaia .
text2: Naahidi kwa ule ukweli wa Kristo ulio ndani yangu , kwamba hakuna kitakachoweza kunizuia kujivunia jambo hilo popote katika Akaya .

text: Wherefore ? because I love you not ? God knoweth .
text2: Kwa nini nasema hivyo ? Kwa sababu eti siwapendi ninyi ? Mungu anajua kwamba nawapenda !

text: But what I do , that I will do , that I may cut off occasion from them which desire occasion ; that wherein they glory , they may be found even as we .
text2: Nitaendelea kufanya kama ninavyofanya sasa , ili nisiwape nafasi wale wanaotafuta nafasi , nafasi ya kujivuna kwamba eti wanafanya kazi kama sisi .

text: For such are false apostles , deceitful workers , transforming themselves into the apostles of Christ .
text2: Maana , hao ni mitume wa uongo , wafanyakazi wadanganyifu wanojisingizia kuwa mitume wa Kristo .

text: And no marvel ; for Satan himself is transformed into an angel of light .
text2: Wala si ajabu , maana hata Shetani mwenyewe hujisingizia kuwa malaika wa mwanga !

text: Therefore it is no great thing if his ministers also be transformed as the ministers of righteousness ; whose end shall be according to their works .
text2: Kwa hiyo si jambo la kushangaza ikiwa na hao watumishi wake wanajisingizia kuwa watumishi wa haki . Mwisho wao watapata kile wanachostahili kufuatana na matendo yao .

text: I say again , Let no man think me a fool ; if otherwise , yet as a fool receive me , that I may boast myself a little .
text2: Tena nasema : Mtu asinifikirie kuwa mpumbavu . Lakini kama mkifikiri hivyo , basi , nichukueni kama mpumbavu ili nami nipate kuwa na cha kujivunia angaa kidogo .

text: That which I speak , I speak it not after the Lord , but as it were foolishly , in this confidence of boasting .
text2: Ninachosema sasa si kile alichoniagiza Bwana ; kuhusu jambo hili la kujivuna , nasema tu kama mtu mpumbavu .

text: Seeing that many glory after the flesh , I will glory also .
text2: Maadam wengi hujivuna kwa sababu za kidunia , nami pia nitajivuna .

text: For ye suffer fools gladly , seeing ye yourselves are wise .
text2: Ninyi ni wenye busara , ndiyo maana hata mnawavumilia wapumbavu !

text: For ye suffer , if a man bring you into bondage , if a man devour you , if a man take of you , if a man exalt himself , if a man smite you on the face .
text2: Mnamvumilia hata mtu anayewafanya ninyi watumwa , mtu mwenye kuwanyonya , mwenye kuwakandamiza , mwenye kuwadharau na kuwapiga usoni !

text: I speak as concerning reproach , as though we had been weak . Howbeit whereinsoever any is bold , ( I speak foolishly , ) I am bold also .
text2: Kwa aibu nakubali kwamba sisi tulikuwa dhaifu . Iwe iwavyo , lakini kama kuna mtu yeyote anayethubutu kujivunia kitu - - nasema kama mtu mpumbavu - - mimi nathubutu pia .

text: Are they Hebrews ? so am I . Are they Israelites ? so am I . Are they the seed of Abraham ? so am I .
text2: Je , wao ni Waebrania ? Hata mimi . Je , wao ni Waisraeli ? Hata mimi . Wao ni wazawa wa Abrahamu ? Hata mimi .

text: Are they ministers of Christ ? ( I speak as a fool ) I am more ; in labours more abundant , in stripes above measure , in prisons more frequent , in deaths oft .
text2: Wao ni watumishi wa Kristo ? Hata mimi - - nanena hayo kiwazimu - - ni mtumishi wa Kristo zaidi kuliko wao . Mimi nimefanya kazi ngumu zaidi , nimekaa gerezani mara nyingi zaidi , nimepigwa mara nyingi zaidi na nimekaribia kifo mara nyingi .

text: Of the Jews five times received I forty stripes save one .
text2: Mara tano nilichapwa vile viboko thelathini na tisa vya Wayahudi .

text: Thrice was I beaten with rods , once was I stoned , thrice I suffered shipwreck , a night and a day I have been in the deep ;
text2: Nilipigwa viboko mara tatu , nilipigwa mawe mara moja ; mara tatu nilivunjikiwa meli baharini , na humo nikakesha usiku kucha na kushinda mchana kutwa .

text: In journeyings often , in perils of waters , in perils of robbers , in perils by mine own countrymen , in perils by the heathen , in perils in the city , in perils in the wilderness , in perils in the sea , in perils among false brethren ;
text2: Kila mara safarini nimekabiliwa na hatari za mafuriko ya mito , na hatari za wanyama ; hatari kutoka kwa wananchi wenzangu na kutoka kwa watu wa mataifa mengine ; hatari za mjini , hatari za porini , hatari za baharini , hatari kutoka kwa ndugu wa uongo

text: In weariness and painfulness , in watchings often , in hunger and thirst , in fastings often , in cold and nakedness .
text2: Nimefanya kazi na kutaabika , nimekesha bila usingizi mara nyingi ; nimekuwa na njaa na kiu ; mara nyingi nimefunga na kukaa katika baridi bila nguo .

text: Beside those things that are without , that which cometh upon me daily , the care of all the churches .
text2: Na , licha ya mengine mengi , kila siku nakabiliwa na shughuli za makanisa yote .

text: Who is weak , and I am not weak ? who is offended , and I burn not ?
text2: Kama mtu yeyote ni dhaifu , nami pia ni dhaifu ; mtu yeyote akikwazwa , nami pia huwa na wasiwasi .

text: If I must needs glory , I will glory of the things which concern mine infirmities .
text2: Ikinilazimu kujivuna , basi , nitajivunia udhaifu wangu .

text: The God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , which is blessed for evermore , knoweth that I lie not .
text2: Mungu na Baba wa Bwana Yesu - - jina lake litukuzwe milele - - yeye anajua kwamba sisemi uongo .

text: In Damascus the governor under Aretas the king kept the city of the Damascenes with a garrison , desirous to apprehend me :
text2: Nilipokuwa Damasko , mkuu wa mkoa , aliyekuwa chini ya mfalme Areta , alikuwa akiulinda mji wa Damasko ili apate kunikamata .

text: And through a window in a basket was I let down by the wall , and escaped his hands .
text2: Lakini , ndani ya kapu kubwa , niliteremshwa nje kupitia katika nafasi ukutani , nikachopoka mikononi mwake .

text: It is not expedient for me doubtless to glory . I will come to visions and revelations of the Lord .
text2: Nitajivuna basi , ingawa haifai ! Lakini sasa nitasema juu ya maono na ufunuo alivyonijalia Bwana .

text: I knew a man in Christ above fourteen years ago , ( whether in the body , I cannot tell ; or whether out of the body , I cannot tell : God knoweth ; ) such an one caught up to the third heaven .
text2: Namjua mtu mmoja Mkristo , ambaye miaka kumi na minne iliyopita alinyakuliwa mpaka katika mbingu ya tatu . ( Sijui kama alikuwa huko kwa mwili au kwa roho ; Mungu ajua . )

text: And I knew such a man , ( whether in the body , or out of the body , I cannot tell : God knoweth ; )
text2: Narudia : najua kwamba mtu huyo alinyakuliwa mpaka peponi . ( Lakini sijui kama alikuwa huko kwa mwili au kwa roho ; Mungu ajua . )

text: How that he was caught up into paradise , and heard unspeakable words , which it is not lawful for a man to utter .
text2: Huko akasikia mambo ya siri ambayo binadamu hastahili kuyatamka .

text: Of such an one will I glory : yet of myself I will not glory , but in mine infirmities .
text2: Basi , nitajivunia juu ya mtu wa namna hiyo , na si juu yangu mimi binafsi , isipokuwa tu juu ya udhaifu wangu .

text: For though I would desire to glory , I shall not be a fool ; for I will say the truth : but now I forbear , lest any man should think of me above that which he seeth me to be , or that he heareth of me .
text2: Kama ningetaka kujivuna singekuwa mpumbavu hata kidogo , maana ningekuwa nasema ukweli mtupu . Lakini sitajivuna ; sipendi mtu anifikirie zaidi ya vile anavyoona na kusikia kutoka kwangu .

text: And lest I should be exalted above measure through the abundance of the revelations , there was given to me a thorn in the flesh , the messenger of Satan to buffet me , lest I should be exalted above measure .
text2: Lakini , kusudi mambo haya makuu niliyofunuliwa yasinifanye nilewe majivuno , nilipewa maumivu mwilini kama mwiba , mjumbe wa Shetani mwenye kunipiga nisijivune kupita kiasi .

text: For this thing I besought the Lord thrice , that it might depart from me .
text2: Nilimsihi Bwana mara tatu kuhusu jambo hili ili linitoke .

text: And he said unto me , My grace is sufficient for thee : for my strength is made perfect in weakness . Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities , that the power of Christ may rest upon me .
text2: Lakini akaniambia : " Neema yangu inatosha kwa ajili yako ; maana uwezo wangu hukamilishwa zaidi katika udhaifu . " Basi , ni radhi kabisa kujivunia udhaifu wangu ili uwezo wake Kristo ukae juu yangu .

text: Therefore I take pleasure in infirmities , in reproaches , in necessities , in persecutions , in distresses for Christ ' s sake : for when I am weak , then am I strong .
text2: Kwa hiyo nakubali kwa radhi udhaifu , madharau , taabu , udhalimu na mateso , kwa ajili ya Kristo ; maana ninapokuwa dhaifu , ndipo ninapokuwa na nguvu .

text: I am become a fool in glorying ; ye have compelled me : for I ought to have been commended of you : for in nothing am I behind the very chiefest apostles , though I be nothing .
text2: Nimekuwa kama mpumbavu , lakini , ninyi mmenilazimisha kuwa hivyo . Ninyi ndio mngalipaswa kunisifu . Maana , ingawa mimi si kitu , kwa vyovyote , mimi si mdogo zaidi kuliko hao " mitume wakuu . "

text: Truly the signs of an apostle were wrought among you in all patience , in signs , and wonders , and mighty deeds .
text2: Miujiza na maajabu yaonyeshayo wazi kwamba mimi ni mtume yalifanyika miongoni mwenu kwa uvumilivu wote .

text: For what is it wherein ye were inferior to other churches , except it be that I myself was not burdensome to you ? forgive me this wrong .
text2: Je , mlipungukiwa nini zaidi kuliko makanisa mengine , isipokuwa tu kwamba mimi kwa upande wangu sikuwasumbueni kupata msaada wenu ? Samahani kwa kuwakoseeni haki hiyo !

text: Behold , the third time I am ready to come to you ; and I will not be burdensome to you : for I seek not yours , but you : for the children ought not to lay up for the parents , but the parents for the children .
text2: Sasa niko tayari kabisa kuja kwenu mara ya tatu , na sitawasumbua . Maana ninachotafuta si mali zenu , bali ni ninyi wenyewe . Ni kawaida ya wazazi kuwawekea watoto wao akiba , na si watoto kuwawekea wazazi wao .

text: And I will very gladly spend and be spent for you ; though the more abundantly I love you , the less I be loved .
text2: Mimi ni radhi kabisa kutumia nilicho nacho , na hata kujitolea mimi mwenyewe kabisa , kwa faida ya roho zenu . Je , mtanipenda kidogo ati kwa kuwa mimi nawapenda ninyi mno ?

text: But be it so , I did not burden you : nevertheless , being crafty , I caught you with guile .
text2: Basi , mtakubali kwamba sikuwa mzigo kwenu . Lakini labda mtu mwingine atasema : " Kwa vile Paulo ni mwerevu , amewafanyieni ulaghai . "

text: Did I make a gain of you by any of them whom I sent unto you ?
text2: Je , mimi niliwanyonyeni kwa njia ya mjumbe yeyote niliyemtuma kwenu ?

text: I desired Titus , and with him I sent a brother . Did Titus make a gain of you ? walked we not in the same spirit ? walked we not in the same steps ?
text2: Mimi nilimwita Tito , nikamtuma kwenu na ndugu yetu mwingine . Je , Tito aliwanyonyeni ? Je , hamjui kwamba sisi tumekuwa tukiongozwa na roho yuleyule , na mwenendo wetu ni mmoja ?

text: Again , think ye that we excuse ourselves unto you ? we speak before God in Christ : but we do all things , dearly beloved , for your edifying .
text2: Labda mnafikiri kwamba mpaka sasa tumekuwa tukijitetea wenyewe mbele yenu ! Lakini , tunasema mambo haya mbele ya Mungu , tukiwa tumeungana na Kristo . Mambo hayo , yote , wapenzi wangu , ni kwa ajili ya kuwajenga ninyi .

text: For I fear , lest , when I come , I shall not find you such as I would , and that I shall be found unto you such as ye would not : lest there be debates , envyings , wraths , strifes , backbitings , whisperings , swellings , tumults :
text2: Naogopa , huenda nitakapokuja kwenu nitawakuta katika hali nisiyopenda , nami itanilazimu kuwa katika hali msiyoipenda . Naogopa huenda kukawa na ugomvi , wivu , uhasama , ubishi , masengenyano , kunong ' ona , majivuno na fujo kati yenu .

text: And lest , when I come again , my God will humble me among you , and that I shall bewail many which have sinned already , and have not repented of the uncleanness and fornication and lasciviousness which they have committed .
text2: Naogopa huenda hapo nitakapokuja safari ijayo Mungu wangu atanifanya niaibike mbele yenu , nami nitaomboleza kwa ajili ya wengi wa wale waliotenda dhambi lakini hawakujutia huo uchafu , tamaa zao mbaya na uzinzi waliokuwa wamefanya .

text: This is the third time I am coming to you . In the mouth of two or three witnesses shall every word be established .
text2: Hii ni mara yangu ya tatu kuja kwenu . " Kila tatizo litatatuliwa kwa ushahidi wa watu wawili au watatu , " yasema Maandiko .

text: I told you before , and foretell you , as if I were present , the second time ; and being absent now I write to them which heretofore have sinned , and to all other , that , if I come again , I will not spare :
text2: Nilikwisha sema , na kama ilivyokuwa safari ya pili , sasa nasema tena nikiwa mbali : wale wote waliotenda uovu bila kutubu , na pia wale wengine , nitakapokuja , watakiona cha mtema kuni .

text: Since ye seek a proof of Christ speaking in me , which to you - ward is not weak , but is mighty in you .
text2: Mtajionea wenyewe kwamba Kristo anasema ndani yangu . Kwenu Kristo si dhaifu ; bali nguvu yake yafanya kazi miongoni mwenu .

text: For though he was crucified through weakness , yet he liveth by the power of God . For we also are weak in him , but we shall live with him by the power of God toward you .
text2: Maana hata kama alisulubiwa kwa sababu ya udhaifu , lakini sasa anaishi kwa uwezo wa Mungu . Sisi pia tu dhaifu kwa kuungana naye lakini tutaishi naye kwa uwezo wa Mungu kwa ajili yenu .

text: Examine yourselves , whether ye be in the faith ; prove your own selves . Know ye not your own selves , how that Jesus Christ is in you , except ye be reprobates ?
text2: Jichunguzeni ninyi wenyewe mpate kujua kama kweli mnayo imani . Jichunguzeni ninyi wenyewe . Je , hamjui kwamba Kristo Yesu yumo ndani yenu ? Kama sivyo , basi ninyi mmeshindwa .

text: But I trust that ye shall know that we are not reprobates .
text2: Lakini natumaini kwamba ninyi mnajua kuwa sisi hatukushindwa .

text: Now I pray to God that ye do no evil ; not that we should appear approved , but that ye should do that which is honest , though we be as reprobates .
text2: Tunamwomba Mungu msifanye uovu wowote , lakini si kusudi tuonekane kama watu waliokwisha faulu , bali mpate kutenda mema , hata kama sisi tunaonekana kuwa tumeshindwa .

text: For we can do nothing against the truth , but for the truth .
text2: Maana hatuwezi kuupinga ukweli ; uwezo tulio nao ni wa kuuendeleza ukweli .

text: For we are glad , when we are weak , and ye are strong : and this also we wish , even your perfection .
text2: Tunafurahi kwamba sisi tu dhaifu , lakini ninyi mna nguvu ; kwa hiyo tunaomba mpate kuwa wakamilifu .

text: Therefore I write these things being absent , lest being present I should use sharpness , according to the power which the Lord hath given me to edification , and not to destruction .
text2: Basi , ninaandika barua hii nikiwa mbali , ili nitakapofika kwenu nisilazimike kuwa mkali kwenu kwa kutumia ule uwezo alionipa Bwana ; naam , uwezo wa kujenga na si wa kubomoa .

text: Finally , brethren , farewell . Be perfect , be of good comfort , be of one mind , live in peace ; and the God of love and peace shall be with you .
text2: Kwa sasa , ndugu , kwaherini ! Muwe na ukamilifu , shikeni mashauri yangu , muwe na nia moja ; kaeni kwa amani . Naye Mungu wa mapendo na amani atakuwa pamoja nanyi .

text: Greet one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Salimianeni kwa ishara ya upendo .

text: All the saints salute you .
text2: ( G13 - 12 ) Watu wote wa Mungu huku wanawasalimuni .

text: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ , and the love of God , and the communion of the Holy Ghost , be with you all . Amen .
text2: ( G13 - 13 ) Neema ya Bwana Yesu Kristo na upendo wa Mungu na umoja wa Roho Mtakatifu , viwe nanyi nyote .

text: Paul , an apostle , ( not of men , neither by man , but by Jesus Christ , and God the Father , who raised him from the dead ; )
text2: Mimi Paulo mtume ,

text: And all the brethren which are with me , unto the churches of Galatia :
text2: na ndugu wote walio pamoja nami , tunayaandikia makanisa yaliyoko Galatia . Mimi nimepata kuwa mtume si kutokana na mamlaka ya binadamu , wala si kwa nguvu ya mtu , bali kwa uwezo wa Yesu Kristo na wa Mungu Baba aliyemfufua Yesu kutoka wafu .

text: Grace be to you and peace from God the Father , and from our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Tunawatakieni neema na amani kutoka kwa Mungu Baba yetu na kutoka kwa Bwana Yesu Kristo .

text: Who gave himself for our sins , that he might deliver us from this present evil world , according to the will of God and our Father :
text2: Kristo alijitoa mwenyewe kwa ajili ya dhambi zetu kufuatana na mapenzi ya Mungu wetu na Baba , ili apate kutuokoa katika ulimwengu huu mbaya wa sasa .

text: To whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Kwake yeye uwe utukufu milele ! Amina .

text: I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel :
text2: Nashangaa kwamba muda mfupi tu umepita , nanyi mnamwasi yule aliyewaita kwa neema ya Kristo , mkafuata Habari Njema ya namna nyingine .

text: Which is not another ; but there be some that trouble you , and would pervert the gospel of Christ .
text2: Lakini hakuna " Habari Njema " nyingine . Ukweli ni kwamba wako watu wanaowavurugeni , watu wanaotaka kuipotosha Habari Njema ya Kristo .

text: But though we , or an angel from heaven , preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you , let him be accursed .
text2: Lakini , hata kama mmoja wetu au malaika kutoka mbinguni , atawahubirieni Habari Njema tofauti na ile tuliyowahubirieni sisi , basi huyo na alaaniwe !

text: As we said before , so say I now again , If any man preach any other gospel unto you than that ye have received , let him be accursed .
text2: Tulikwisha sema , na sasa nasema tena : kama mtu yeyote anawahubirieni Habari Njema ya aina nyingine , tofauti na ile mliyokwisha pokea , huyo na alaaniwe !

text: For do I now persuade men , or God ? or do I seek to please men ? for if I yet pleased men , I should not be the servant of Christ .
text2: Sasa nataka kibali cha nani : cha binadamu , ama cha Mungu ? Au je , nataka kuwapendeza watu ? Kama ningefanya hivyo , mimi singekuwa kamwe mtumishi wa Kristo .

text: But I certify you , brethren , that the gospel which was preached of me is not after man .
text2: Ndugu , napenda mfahamu kwamba ile Habari Njema niliyoihubiri si ujumbe wa kibinadamu .

text: For I neither received it of man , neither was I taught it , but by the revelation of Jesus Christ .
text2: Wala mimi sikuipokea kutoka kwa binadamu , wala sikufundishwa na mtu . Yesu Kristo mwenyewe ndiye aliyenifunulia .

text: For ye have heard of my conversation in time past in the Jews ' religion , how that beyond measure I persecuted the church of God , and wasted it :
text2: Bila shaka mlikwisha sikia jinsi nilivyokuwa ninaishi zamani kwa kuzingatia dini ya Kiyahudi , na jinsi nilivyolitesa kanisa la Mungu kupita kiasi na kutaka kuliharibu kabisa .

text: And profited in the Jews ' religion above many my equals in mine own nation , being more exceedingly zealous of the traditions of my fathers .
text2: Naam , mimi niliwashinda wengi wa wananchi wenzangu wa rika langu katika kuizingatia dini ya Kiyahudi , nikajitahidi sana kuyashika mapokeo ya wazee wetu .

text: But when it pleased God , who separated me from my mother ' s womb , and called me by his grace ,
text2: Lakini Mungu , kwa neema yake , alikuwa ameniteua hata kabla sijazaliwa , akaniita nimtumikie .

text: To reveal his Son in me , that I might preach him among the heathen ; immediately I conferred not with flesh and blood :
text2: Mara tu alipoamua kunifunulia Mwanae kusudi niihubiri Habari Njema yake kwa watu wa mataifa mengine , bila kutafuta maoni ya binadamu ,

text: Neither went I up to Jerusalem to them which were apostles before me ; but I went into Arabia , and returned again unto Damascus .
text2: na bila kwenda kwanza Yerusalemu kwa wale waliopata kuwa mitume kabla yangu , nilikwenda kwanza Arabia , kisha nikarudi tena Damasko .

text: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter , and abode with him fifteen days .
text2: Ilikuwa tu baada ya miaka mitatu , ndipo nilipokwenda Yerusalemu kuonana na Kefa ; nilikaa kwake siku kumi na tano .

text: But other of the apostles saw I none , save James the Lord ' s brother .
text2: Lakini sikuwaona mitume wengine isipokuwa Yakobo , ndugu yake Bwana .

text: Now the things which I write unto you , behold , before God , I lie not .
text2: Haya ninayowaandikieni , Mungu anajua ; sisemi uongo .

text: Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia ;
text2: Baadaye nilikwenda katika tarafa za Siria na Kilikia .

text: And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judaea which were in Christ :
text2: Wakati huo , mimi binafsi sikujulikana kwa jumuiya za Wakristo kule Yudea .

text: But they had heard only , That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed .
text2: Walichokuwa wanajua ni kile tu walichosikia : " Mtu yule aliyekuwa akitutesa hapo awali , sasa anaihubiri imani ileile aliyokuwa anajaribu kuiangamiza . "

text: And they glorified God in me .
text2: Basi , wakamtukuza Mungu kwa sababu yangu .

text: Then fourteen years after I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas , and took Titus with me also .
text2: Baada ya miaka kumi na minne , nilikwenda tena Yerusalemu pamoja na Barnaba ; nilimchukua pia Tito pamoja nami .

text: And I went up by revelation , and communicated unto them that gospel which I preach among the Gentiles , but privately to them which were of reputation , lest by any means I should run , or had run , in vain .
text2: Kwenda kwangu kulitokana na ufunuo alionipa Mungu . Katika kikao cha faragha niliwaeleza hao viongozi ujumbe wa Habari Njema niliohubiri kwa watu wa mataifa . Nilifanya hivyo kusudi kazi yangu niliyokuwa nimefanya , na ile ninayofanya sasa isije ikawa bure .

text: But neither Titus , who was with me , being a Greek , was compelled to be circumcised :
text2: Lakini , hata mwenzangu Tito , ambaye ni Mgiriki , hakulazimika kutahiriwa ,

text: And that because of false brethren unawares brought in , who came in privily to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus , that they might bring us into bondage :
text2: ingawa kulikuwa na ndugu wengine wa uongo waliotaka atahiriwe . Watu hawa walijiingiza kwa ujanja na kupeleleza uhuru wetu tulio nao katika kuungana na Kristo Yesu , ili wapate kutufanya watumwa .

text: To whom we gave place by subjection , no , not for an hour ; that the truth of the gospel might continue with you .
text2: Hatukukubaliana nao hata kidogo ili ukweli wa Habari Njema ubaki nanyi daima .

text: But of these who seemed to be somewhat , ( whatsoever they were , it maketh no matter to me : God accepteth no man ' s person : ) for they who seemed to be somewhat in conference added nothing to me :
text2: Lakini watu hawa wanaosemekana kuwa ni viongozi - - kama kweli walikuwa hivyo au sivyo , kwangu si kitu , maana Mungu hahukumu kwa kuangalia mambo ya nje - - watu hawa hawakuwa na kitu cha kuongeza katika Habari hii Njema kama niihubirivyo .

text: But contrariwise , when they saw that the gospel of the uncircumcision was committed unto me , as the gospel of the circumcision was unto Peter ;
