text2: Badala yake , walitambua kwamba Mungu alikuwa amenituma kuhubiri Habari Njema kwa watu wa mataifa mengine kama vile Petro alivyokuwa ametumwa kuihubiri kwa Wayahudi .

text: ( For he that wrought effectually in Peter to the apostleship of the circumcision , the same was mighty in me toward the Gentiles : )
text2: Maana , yule aliyemwezesha Petro kuwa mtume kwa Wayahudi , ndiye aliyeniwezesha nami pia kuwa mtume kwa watu wa mataifa mengine .

text: And when James , Cephas , and John , who seemed to be pillars , perceived the grace that was given unto me , they gave to me and Barnabas the right hands of fellowship ; that we should go unto the heathen , and they unto the circumcision .
text2: Basi , Yakobo , Kefa na Yohane , ambao waonekana kuwa viongozi wakuu , walitambua kwamba Mungu alinijalia neema hiyo , wakatushika sisi mkono , yaani Barnaba na mimi , iwe ishara ya ushirikiano . Sisi ilitupasa tukafanye kazi kati ya watu wa mataifa mengine , na wao kati ya Wayahudi .

text: Only they would that we should remember the poor ; the same which I also was forward to do .
text2: Wakatuomba lakini kitu kimoja : tuwakumbuke maskini ; jambo ambalo nimekuwa nikijitahidi kutekeleza .

text: But when Peter was come to Antioch , I withstood him to the face , because he was to be blamed .
text2: Lakini Kefa alipofika Antiokia nilimpinga waziwazi maana alikuwa amekosea .

text: For before that certain came from James , he did eat with the Gentiles : but when they were come , he withdrew and separated himself , fearing them which were of the circumcision .
text2: Awali , kabla ya watu kadhaa waliokuwa wametumwa na Yakobo kuwasili hapo , Petro alikuwa akila pamoja na watu wa mataifa mengine . Lakini , baada ya hao watu kufika , aliacha kabisa kula pamoja na watu wa mataifa mengine , kwa kuogopa kikundi cha waliosisitiza tohara .

text: And the other Jews dissembled likewise with him ; insomuch that Barnabas also was carried away with their dissimulation .
text2: Hata ndugu wengine Wayahudi walimuunga mkono Petro katika kitendo hiki cha unafiki , naye Barnaba akakumbwa na huo unafiki wao .

text: But when I saw that they walked not uprightly according to the truth of the gospel , I said unto Peter before them all , If thou , being a Jew , livest after the manner of Gentiles , and not as do the Jews , why compellest thou the Gentiles to live as do the Jews ?
text2: Basi , nilipoona kuwa msimamo wao kuhusu ukweli wa Habari Njema haukuwa umenyooka , nikamwambia Kefa mbele ya watu wote : " Ingawa wewe ni Myahudi , unaishi kama watu wa mataifa mengine na si kama Myahudi ! Unawezaje , basi kujaribu kuwalazimisha watu wa mataifa mengine kuishi kama Wayahudi ? "

text: We who are Jews by nature , and not sinners of the Gentiles ,
text2: Kweli , sisi kwa asili ni Wayahudi , na si watu wa mataifa mengine hao wenye dhambi !

text: Knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law , but by the faith of Jesus Christ , even we have believed in Jesus Christ , that we might be justified by the faith of Christ , and not by the works of the law : for by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified .
text2: Lakini , tunajua kwa hakika kwamba mtu hawezi kukubaliwa kuwa mwadilifu kwa kuitii Sheria , bali tu kwa kumwamini Yesu Kristo . Na sisi pia tumemwamini Yesu Kristo ili tupate kukubaliwa kuwa waadilifu kwa njia ya imani yetu kwa Kristo , na si kwa kuitii Sheria .

text: But if , while we seek to be justified by Christ , we ourselves also are found sinners , is therefore Christ the minister of sin ? God forbid .
text2: Sasa , ikiwa katika kutafuta kukubaliwa kuwa waadilifu kwa kuungana na Kristo sisi tunaonekana kuwa wenye dhambi , je , jambo hili lina maana kwamba Kristo anasaidia utendaji wa dhambi ? Hata kidogo !

text: For if I build again the things which I destroyed , I make myself a transgressor .
text2: Lakini ikiwa ninajenga tena kile nilichokwisha bomoa , basi nahakikisha kwamba mimi ni mhalifu .

text: For I through the law am dead to the law , that I might live unto God .
text2: Maana , kuhusu Sheria hiyo , mimi nimekufa ; Sheria yenyewe iliniua , nipate kuishi kwa ajili ya Mungu . Mimi nimeuawa pamoja na Kristo msalabani ,

text: I am crucified with Christ : nevertheless I live ; yet not I , but Christ liveth in me : and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God , who loved me , and gave himself for me .
text2: na sasa naishi , lakini si mimi tena , bali Kristo anaishi ndani yangu . Maisha haya ninayoishi sasa naishi kwa imani , imani katika Mwana wa Mungu aliyenipenda hata akayatoa maisha yake kwa ajili yangu .

text: I do not frustrate the grace of God : for if righteousness come by the law , then Christ is dead in vain .
text2: Sipendi kuikataa neema ya Mungu . Kama mtu huweza kukubaliwa kuwa mwadilifu kwa njia ya Sheria , basi , Kristo alikufa bure !

text: O foolish Galatians , who hath bewitched you , that ye should not obey the truth , before whose eyes Jesus Christ hath been evidently set forth , crucified among you ?
text2: Enyi Wagalatia , mmekuwa wajinga kweli ! Ni nani aliyewaloga ? Habari juu ya kusulubiwa kwake Yesu Kristo ilielezwa waziwazi mbele ya macho yenu .

text: This only would I learn of you , Received ye the Spirit by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Napenda kujua tu kitu kimoja kutoka kwenu : Je , mlipokea Roho wa Mungu kwa sababu ya kutimiza matakwa ya Sheria ama kwa sababu ya kuisikia na kuiamini Habari Njema ?

text: Are ye so foolish ? having begun in the Spirit , are ye now made perfect by the flesh ?
text2: Je , mu wajinga kiasi hicho ? Ninyi mlianza yote kwa msaada wa Roho je , mnataka sasa kumaliza kwa nguvu zenu wenyewe ?

text: Have ye suffered so many things in vain ? if it be yet in vain .
text2: Je , mambo yale yote yaliyowapata ninyi yamekuwa bure tu ? Haiwezekani !

text: He therefore that ministereth to you the Spirit , and worketh miracles among you , doeth he it by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Je , Mungu huwajalia Roho na kutenda miujiza kati yenu ati kwa sababu mnatimiza yanayotakiwa na sheria , ama kwa sababu mnasikia Habari Njema na kuiamini ?

text: Even as Abraham believed God , and it was accounted to him for righteousness .
text2: Chukueni kwa mfano habari za Abrahamu : yeye alimwamini Mungu , naye Mungu akamkubali kuwa mwadilifu .

text: Know ye therefore that they which are of faith , the same are the children of Abraham .
text2: Sasa basi jueni kwamba watu wenye kumwamini ndio walio watoto halisi wa Abrahamu .

text: And the scripture , foreseeing that God would justify the heathen through faith , preached before the gospel unto Abraham , saying , In thee shall all nations be blessed .
text2: Maandiko Matakatifu yalionyesha kabla kwamba Mungu atawakubali watu wa mataifa kuwa waadilifu kwa njia ya imani . Hivyo Maandiko Matakatifu yalitangulia kumtangazia Abrahamu Habari Njema : " Katika wewe mataifa yote yatabarikiwa . "

text: So then they which be of faith are blessed with faithful Abraham .
text2: Basi , wale walio na imani wanabarikiwa pamoja na Abrahamu aliyeamini .

text: For as many as are of the works of the law are under the curse : for it is written , Cursed is every one that continueth not in all things which are written in the book of the law to do them .
text2: Lakini wote wanaotegemea tu kutimiza yanayotakiwa na Sheria , wako chini ya laana . Maana , Maandiko Matakatifu yasema : " Yeyote asiyeshika na kutimiza yote yaliyoandikwa katika kitabu cha Sheria , yuko chini ya laana . "

text: But that no man is justified by the law in the sight of God , it is evident : for , The just shall live by faith .
text2: Ni dhahiri kwamba Sheria haiwezi kumfanya mtu akubaliwe kuwa mwadilifu ; maana Maandiko Matakatifu yasema : " Mwadilifu kwa imani ataishi . "

text: And the law is not of faith : but , The man that doeth them shall live in them .
text2: Lakini Sheria haitegemei imani , ila Maandiko yasema : " Mwenye kutimiza yanayotakiwa na Sheria ataishi . "

text: Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law , being made a curse for us : for it is written , Cursed is every one that hangeth on a tree :
text2: Kristo alitukomboa kutoka katika laana ya Sheria kwa kujitwalia laana hiyo kwa ajili yetu ; maana Maandiko yanasema : " Yeyote aliyetundikwa msalabani amelaaniwa . "

text: That the blessing of Abraham might come on the Gentiles through Jesus Christ ; that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith .
text2: Jambo hili lilifanyika kusudi ile baraka aliyopewa Abrahamu iwashukie watu wa mataifa mengine kwa njia ya Kristo , na ili kwa imani , tumpokee yule Roho ambaye Mungu alituahidia .

text: Brethren , I speak after the manner of men ; Though it be but a man ' s covenant , yet if it be confirmed , no man disannulleth , or addeth thereto .
text2: Ndugu , nitawapeni mfano kutoka maisha yetu ya kila siku . Fikirini juu ya mkataba kati ya watu wawili . Mkataba ukisha fanyika na kutiwa sahihi hapana mtu anayeuweka kando au kuuongezea kitu .

text: Now to Abraham and his seed were the promises made . He saith not , And to seeds , as of many ; but as of one , And to thy seed , which is Christ .
text2: Basi , Abrahamu alipewa ahadi , yeye pamoja na mzawa wake . Maandiko hayasemi : " Na wazawa wake , " yaani wengi , bali yasema , " Na mzawa wake , " yaani mmoja , naye ndiye Kristo .

text: And this I say , that the covenant , that was confirmed before of God in Christ , the law , which was four hundred and thirty years after , cannot disannul , that it should make the promise of none effect .
text2: Ninachotaka kusema ni hiki : Mungu alifanya agano lake akalithibitisha ; Sheria ambayo ilitokea miaka mia nne na thelathini baadaye , haiwezi kulitangua hilo agano wala kuibatilisha hiyo ahadi .

text: For if the inheritance be of the law , it is no more of promise : but God gave it to Abraham by promise .
text2: Maana , kama urithi ya Mungu inategemea Sheria , basi , haiwezi kutegemea tena ahadi ya Mungu . Kumbe , lakini Mungu alimkirimia Abrahamu kwa sababu aliahidi .

text: Wherefore then serveth the law ? It was added because of transgressions , till the seed should come to whom the promise was made ; and it was ordained by angels in the hand of a mediator .
text2: Ya nini basi , Sheria ? Iliongezwa hapo ili kuonyesha uhalifu ni kitu gani , mpaka atakapokuja yule mzawa wa Abrahamu aliyepewa ile ahadi . Sheria ililetwa na malaika kwa mkono wa mpatanishi .

text: Now a mediator is not a mediator of one , but God is one .
text2: Ama hakika , mpatanishi hahitajiwi ikiwa jambo lenyewe lamhusu mtu mmoja ; na Mungu ni mmoja .

text: Is the law then against the promises of God ? God forbid : for if there had been a law given which could have given life , verily righteousness should have been by the law .
text2: Je , Sheria inapingana na ahadi za Mungu ? Hata kidogo ! Maana , kama kungalitolewa sheria ambayo ingeweza kuwapa watu uzima , basi , tungeweza kukubaliwa kuwa waadilifu kwa njia ya Sheria .

text: But the scripture hath concluded all under sin , that the promise by faith of Jesus Christ might be given to them that believe .
text2: Lakini sivyo ; Maandiko Matakatifu yamekwisha sema kwamba ulimwengu wote upo chini ya utawala wa dhambi ; na hivyo , kwa kumwamini Yesu Kristo , wenye kuamini watimiziwe ile ahadi .

text: But before faith came , we were kept under the law , shut up unto the faith which should afterwards be revealed .
text2: Kabla ya kujaliwa imani , Sheria ilitufanya wafungwa mpaka imani hiyo iliyokuwa inakuja ifunuliwe .

text: Wherefore the law was our schoolmaster to bring us unto Christ , that we might be justified by faith .
text2: Basi , hiyo Sheria ilikuwa kama mlezi wetu mpaka alipokuja Kristo , ili kwa njia ya imani , tukubaliwe kuwa waadilifu .

text: But after that faith is come , we are no longer under a schoolmaster .
text2: Tangu kufika kwa hiyo imani , Sheria si mlezi wetu tena .

text: For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus .
text2: Kwa njia ya imani , ninyi nyote mmekuwa watoto wa Mungu katika kuungana na Kristo .

text: For as many of you as have been baptized into Christ have put on Christ .
text2: Ninyi nyote mliobatizwa mkaungana na Kristo ni kama vile mmemvaa Kristo .

text: There is neither Jew nor Greek , there is neither bond nor free , there is neither male nor female : for ye are all one in Christ Jesus .
text2: Hivyo , hakuna tena tofauti kati ya Myahudi na Mgiriki , mtumwa na mtu huru , mwanamume na mwanamke . Nyote ni kitu kimoja katika kuungana na Kristo Yesu .

text: And if ye be Christ ' s , then are ye Abraham ' s seed , and heirs according to the promise .
text2: Ikiwa ninyi ni wa Kristo , basi ni wazawa wa Abrahamu , na mtapokea yale aliyoahidi Mungu .

text: Now I say , That the heir , as long as he is a child , differeth nothing from a servant , though he be lord of all ;
text2: Basi , nasema hivi : mrithi , akiwa bado mtoto , hawi tofauti na mtumwa ingawaje mali yote ni yake .

text: But is under tutors and governors until the time appointed of the father .
text2: Wakati huo wote yuko chini ya walezi na wadhamini mpaka wakati ule uliowekwa na baba yake .

text: Even so we , when we were children , were in bondage under the elements of the world :
text2: Hali kadhalika na sisi tulipokuwa bado watoto , tulikuwa watumwa wa pepo watawala wa ulimwengu .

text: But when the fulness of the time was come , God sent forth his Son , made of a woman , made under the law ,
text2: Lakini wakati ule maalumu ulipotimia , Mungu alimtuma Mwanawe aliyezaliwa na mwanamke , akaishi chini ya Sheria

text: To redeem them that were under the law , that we might receive the adoption of sons .
text2: apate kuwakomboa wale waliokuwa chini ya Sheria ili sisi tufanywe wana wa Mungu .

text: And because ye are sons , God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts , crying , Abba , Father .
text2: Kwa vile sasa ninyi ni wana , Mungu amemtuma Roho wa Mwanae mioyoni mwenu , Roho ambaye hulia " Aba , " yaani " Baba . "

text: Wherefore thou art no more a servant , but a son ; and if a son , then an heir of God through Christ .
text2: Basi , wewe si mtumwa tena , bali mwana . Na ikiwa ni mwana , basi , wewe utapokea yote Mungu aliyowawekea watoto wake .

text: Howbeit then , when ye knew not God , ye did service unto them which by nature are no gods .
text2: Zamani hamkumjua Mungu na hivyo mkatumikia miungu isiyo miungu kweli .

text: But now , after that ye have known God , or rather are known of God , how turn ye again to the weak and beggarly elements , whereunto ye desire again to be in bondage ?
text2: Lakini sasa , kwa vile mnamjua Mungu , au tuseme mnajulikana na Mungu , mnawezaje tena kurudi kwa wale pepo maskini na dhaifu hata kutaka kuwatumikia tena ?

text: Ye observe days , and months , and times , and years .
text2: Bado mnaadhimisha siku , miezi na miaka !

text: I am afraid of you , lest I have bestowed upon you labour in vain .
text2: Nahofu kwamba labda kazi niliyoifanya kwa ajili yenu imepotea bure !

text: Brethren , I beseech you , be as I am ; for I am as ye are : ye have not injured me at all .
text2: Ndugu , nawasihi muwe kama mimi , kwa vile hata mimi nimekuwa kama ninyi . Hamkunitendea ubaya wowote .

text: Ye know how through infirmity of the flesh I preached the gospel unto you at the first .
text2: Mnajua kwamba ugonjwa wangu ndio ulionipatia fursa ya kuwahubirieni Habari Njema kwa mara ya kwanza .

text: And my temptation which was in my flesh ye despised not , nor rejected ; but received me as an angel of God , even as Christ Jesus .
text2: Hata hivyo , wakati ule hamkunidharau wala kunikataa kwa sababu ya udhaifu wangu ingawa mlishawishiwa kufanya hivyo ; lakini mlinipokea kama malaika wa Mungu , kama vile ningekuwa Kristo Yesu mwenyewe .

text: Where is then the blessedness ye spake of ? for I bear you record , that , if it had been possible , ye would have plucked out your own eyes , and have given them to me .
text2: Mlikuwa wenye furaha ; sasa kumetokea nini ? Naapa kwamba wakati ule mngaliweza hata kuyang ' oa macho yenu na kunipa mimi .

text: Am I therefore become your enemy , because I tell you the truth ?
text2: Je , sasa nimekuwa adui yenu kwa sababu ya kuwaambieni ukweli ?

text: They zealously affect you , but not well ; yea , they would exclude you , that ye might affect them .
text2: Hao watu wengine wanawahangaikia ninyi , lakini nia zao si njema . Wanataka kuwatenganisha nami ili ninyi muwahangaikie wao .

text: But it is good to be zealously affected always in a good thing , and not only when I am present with you .
text2: Kwa kweli ni jambo jema daima kuwahangaikia wengine katika mambo mema , na si tu wakati mimi nipo pamoja nanyi .

text: My little children , of whom I travail in birth again until Christ be formed in you ,
text2: Watoto wangu , kama vile mama mja mzito anavyotaabika wakati wa kujifungua , mimi nataabika tena kwa ajili yenu mpaka hapo hali yake Kristo itakapoundwa ndani yenu .

text: I desire to be present with you now , and to change my voice ; for I stand in doubt of you .
text2: Laiti ningekuwa pamoja nanyi sasa , maana ningalipata msimamo ufaao juu yenu ! Nina wasiwasi sana nanyi !

text: Tell me , ye that desire to be under the law , do ye not hear the law ?
text2: Niambieni , enyi mnaopenda kutawaliwa na sheria : Je , mnasikia isemavyo Sheria ?

text: For it is written , that Abraham had two sons , the one by a bondmaid , the other by a freewoman .
text2: Imeandikwa katika Maandiko Matakatifu kwamba Abrahamu alikuwa na watoto wawili : mmoja kwa mwanamke mtumwa , na wa pili kwa mwanamke huru .

text: But he who was of the bondwoman was born after the flesh ; but he of the freewoman was by promise .
text2: Yule wa mwanamke mtumwa alizaliwa kama kawaida , lakini yule wa mwanamke huru alizaliwa kutokana na ahadi ya Mungu .

text: Which things are an allegory : for these are the two covenants ; the one from the mount Sinai , which gendereth to bondage , which is Agar .
text2: Mambo hayo yamekuwa mfano ; mama hao wawili ni mfano wa maagano mawili ; la kwanza ni lile lililofanyika mlimani Sinai , mwakilishi wake ni Hagari , na watoto wake wanazaliwa utumwani .

text: For this Agar is mount Sinai in Arabia , and answereth to Jerusalem which now is , and is in bondage with her children .
text2: Hagari anawakilisha mlima Sinai ulioko Arabia , na ni mfano wa Yerusalemu ya sasa , ulio mtumwa pamoja na watoto wake .

text: But Jerusalem which is above is free , which is the mother of us all .
text2: Lakini Yerusalemu ya juu mbinguni ni mji ulio huru , nao ni mama yetu .

text: For it is written , Rejoice , thou barren that bearest not ; break forth and cry , thou that travailest not : for the desolate hath many more children than she which hath an husband .
text2: Maana imeandikwa : " Furahi , ewe uliye tasa usiyezaa ; paaza sauti wewe usiyepata kujifungua mtoto ; maana watoto wa yule aliyeachwa ni wengi zaidi kuliko wa yule aliye na mume . "

text: Now we , brethren , as Isaac was , are the children of promise .
text2: Sasa , basi , ndugu zangu , ninyi ni watoto wa Mungu kutokana na ahadi yake kama alivyokuwa Isaka .

text: But as then he that was born after the flesh persecuted him that was born after the Spirit , even so it is now .
text2: Lakini kama vile siku zile yule mtoto aliyezaliwa kwa njia ya kawaida alimdhulumu yule aliyezaliwa kwa uwezo wa Roho wa Mungu , vivyo hivyo na siku hizi .

text: Nevertheless what saith the scripture ? Cast out the bondwoman and her son : for the son of the bondwoman shall not be heir with the son of the freewoman .
text2: Lakini Maandiko Matakatifu yasemaje ? Yasema : " Mfukuze mama mtumwa pamoja na mwanawe ; maana mtoto wa mtumwa hatarithi pamoja na mtoto wa mama huru . "

text: So then , brethren , we are not children of the bondwoman , but of the free .
text2: Kwa hiyo , basi , ndugu , sisi si watoto wa mtumwa bali wa mama huru .

text: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free , and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage .
text2: Kristo alitupa uhuru akataka tubaki huru . Basi , simameni imara wala msikubali tena kuwa chini ya nira ya utumwa .

text: Behold , I Paul say unto you , that if ye be circumcised , Christ shall profit you nothing .
text2: Sikilizeni ! Ni mimi Paulo ninayesema nanyi ! Kama mkikubali kutahiriwa , Kristo hatawafaidia chochote .

text: For I testify again to every man that is circumcised , that he is a debtor to do the whole law .
text2: Nasema tena wazi : kila anayekubali kutahiriwa itambidi kuishika Sheria yote .

text: Christ is become of no effect unto you , whosoever of you are justified by the law ; ye are fallen from grace .
text2: Kama mnatazamia kukubaliwa kuwa waadilifu kwa njia ya Sheria , basi , mmejitenga mbali na Kristo ; mko nje ya neema ya Mungu .

text: For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith .
text2: Kwa upande wetu , lakini , sisi tunatumaini kwamba kwa nguvu ya Roho tunakubaliwa kuwa waadilifu kwa njia ya imani .

text: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision ; but faith which worketh by love .
text2: Maana ikiwa tumeungana na Kristo Yesu , kutahiriwa au kutotahiriwa hakuna maana ; cha maana ni imani ifanyayo kazi kwa mapendo .

text: Ye did run well ; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth ?
text2: Mwenendo wenu ulikuwa mzuri ! Nani , basi aliyewazuia kuuzingatia ukweli ?

text: This persuasion cometh not of him that calleth you .
text2: Aliyesababisha hali hiyo si Mungu ambaye amewaiteni .

text: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump .
text2: " chachu kidogo tu huchachusha donge lote la unga ! "

text: I have confidence in you through the Lord , that ye will be none otherwise minded : but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment , whosoever he be .
text2: Kutokana na kuungana kwetu na Bwana , nina tumaini kubwa kwamba ninyi hamtakuwa na msimamo tofauti nami . Tena yeyote huyo anayewavurugeni - - awe nani au nani - - hakika ataadhibiwa .

text: And I , brethren , if I yet preach circumcision , why do I yet suffer persecution ? then is the offence of the cross ceased .
text2: Na kwa upande wangu , ndugu zangu , kama bado ninahubiri kwamba kutahiriwa ni lazima , kwa nini basi , bado ninadhulumiwa ? Kama ingalikuwa hivyo , mahubiri yangu juu ya msalaba wa Kristo yasingalileta aibu yoyote .

text: I would they were even cut off which trouble you .
text2: Laiti hao wanaowavurugeni wangejikatakata wenyewe !

text: For , brethren , ye have been called unto liberty ; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh , but by love serve one another .
text2: Ninyi , ndugu , mliitwa muwe watu huru . Lakini uhuru huo usiwe kisingizio cha kutawaliwa na tamaa za kidunia ; ila mnapaswa kutumikiana kwa upendo .

text: For all the law is fulfilled in one word , even in this ; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Maana Sheria yote hutimizwa katika kushika amri hii moja : " Mpende jirani yako kama unavyojipenda mwenyewe . "

text: But if ye bite and devour one another , take heed that ye be not consumed one of another .
text2: Lakini ikiwa mtaumana na kutafunana kama wanyama , jihadharini msije mkaangamizana wenyewe kwa wenyewe !

text: This I say then , Walk in the Spirit , and ye shall not fulful the lust of the flesh .
text2: Basi , nasema hivi : mwenendo wenu na uongozwe na Roho , nanyi hamtafuata tena tamaa za kidunia .

text: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit , and the Spirit against the flesh : and these are contrary the one to the other : so that ye cannot do the things that ye would .
text2: Maana , tamaa za kidunia hupingana na matakwa ya Roho ; na matakwa ya Roho hupingana na tamaa za kidunia . Mambo hayo mawili hayaafikiani ; kwa sababu hiyo hamwezi kufanya yale mnayotaka ninyi wenyewe .

text: But if ye be led of the Spirit , ye are not under the law .
text2: Kama mkiongozwa na Roho , basi , hamko tena chini ya Sheria .

text: Now the works of the flesh are manifest , which are these ; Adultery , fornication , uncleanness , lasciviousness ,
text2: Basi , matendo ya kidunia yanajulikana : uzinzi , uasherati , ufisadi ;

text: Idolatry , witchcraft , hatred , variance , emulations , wrath , strife , seditions , heresies ,
text2: kuabudu sanamu , uchawi , uadui , ugomvi , wivu , hasira , choyo , mabishano , mafarakano ;

text: Envyings , murders , drunkenness , revellings , and such like : of the which I tell you before , as I have also told you in time past , that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God .
text2: husuda , ulevi , ulafi na mambo mengine kama hayo . Nawaambieni tena kama nilivyokwisha sema : watu wanaotenda mambo hayo hawatakuwa na nafasi yao katika ufalme wa Mungu .

text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love , joy , peace , longsuffering , gentleness , goodness , faith ,
text2: Lakini matokeo ya kuongozwa na Roho ni mapendo , furaha , amani , uvumilivu , wema , fadhili , uaminifu ,

text: Meekness , temperance : against such there is no law .
text2: upole na kuwa na kiasi . Hakuna Sheria inayoweza kupinga mambo hayo .

text: And they that are Christ ' s have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts .
text2: Wale walio wa Kristo wameisulubisha hali yao ya kidunia pamoja na mawazo yake mabaya na tamaa zake .

text: If we live in the Spirit , let us also walk in the Spirit .
text2: Tukiishi kwa msaada wa Roho , na tuufuate mwongozo wake .

text: Let us not be desirous of vain glory , provoking one another , envying one another .
text2: Basi , tusijivune , tusichokozane wala kuoneana wivu .

text: Brethren , if a man be overtaken in a fault , ye which are spiritual , restore such an one in the spirit of meekness ; considering thyself , lest thou also be tempted .
text2: Ndugu , kama mkimwona mtu fulani amekosea , basi , ninyi mnaoongozwa na Roho mwonyeni mtu huyo ajirekebishe ; lakini fanyeni hivyo kwa upole , mkiwa na tahadhari msije nanyi wenyewe mkajaribiwa .

text: Bear ye one another ' s burdens , and so fulfil the law of Christ .
text2: Saidianeni kubeba mizigo yenu na hivyo mtatimiza sheria ya Kristo .

text: For if a man think himself to be something , when he is nothing , he deceiveth himself .
text2: Mtu akijiona kuwa ni kitu , na kumbe si kitu , huyo anajidanganya mwenyewe .

text: But let every man prove his own work , and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone , and not in another .
text2: Lakini kila mmoja na aupime vizuri mwenendo wake mwenyewe . Ukiwa mwema , basi , anaweza kuona fahari juu ya alichofanya bila kuwa na sababu ya kujilinganisha na mtu mwingine .

text: For every man shall bear his own burden .
text2: Maana kila mmoja anao mzigo wake mwenyewe wa kubeba .

text: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things .
text2: Mwenye kufundishwa neno la Mungu na amshirikishe mwalimu wake riziki zake .

text: Be not deceived ; God is not mocked : for whatsoever a man soweth , that shall he also reap .
text2: Msidanganyike ; Mungu hafanyiwi dhihaka . Alichopanda mtu ndicho atakachovuna .

text: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption ; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting .
text2: Apandaye katika tamaa za kidunia , atavuna humo uharibifu ; lakini akipanda katika Roho , atavuna kutoka kwa Roho uzima wa milele .

text: And let us not be weary in well doing : for in due season we shall reap , if we faint not .
text2: Basi , tusichoke kutenda mema ; maana tusipolegea tutavuna mavuno kwa wakati wake .

text: As we have therefore opportunity , let us do good unto all men , especially unto them who are of the household of faith .
text2: Kwa hiyo , tukiwa bado na wakati , tuwatendee watu wote mema , na hasa ndugu wa imani yetu .

text: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand .
text2: Tazameni jinsi nilivyoandika kwa herufi kubwa , kwa mkono wangu mwenyewe .

text: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh , they constrain you to be circumcised ; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ .
text2: Wale wanaotaka kuonekana wazuri kwa mambo ya mwili ndio wanaotaka kuwalazimisha ninyi mtahiriwe . Wanafanya hivyo kwa sababu moja tu : kusudi wao wenyewe wasije wakadhulumiwa kwa sababu ya msalaba wa Kristo .

text: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law ; but desire to have you circumcised , that they may glory in your flesh .
text2: Maana , hao wenyewe waliotahiriwa hawaishiki Sheria ; huwataka ninyi mtahiriwe wapate kujivunia alama hiyo mwilini mwenu .

text: But God forbid that I should glory , save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ , by whom the world is crucified unto me , and I unto the world .
text2: Lakini mimi sitajivunia kamwe chochote isipokuwa msalaba wa Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo ; maana kwa njia ya msalaba huo ulimwengu umesulubiwa kwangu , nami nimesulubiwa kwa ulimwengu .

text: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision , but a new creature .
text2: Kutahiriwa au kutotahiriwa si kitu ; cha maana ni kuwa kiumbe kipya .

text: And as many as walk according to this rule , peace be on them , and mercy , and upon the Israel of God .
text2: Wanaoufuata mwongozo huo nawatakia amani na huruma ; amani na huruma kwa Israeli - - Wateule wa Mungu .

text: From henceforth let no man trouble me : for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Basi , sasa mtu yeyote asinisumbue tena , maana alama nilizo nazo mwilini mwangu ni zile za Yesu .

text: Brethren , the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: Ndugu , nawatakieni ninyi nyote neema ya Bwana wetu Kristo . Amina .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , to the saints which are at Ephesus , and to the faithful in Christ Jesus :
text2: Mimi Paulo , mtume wa Kristo Yesu kwa mapenzi ya Mungu , nawaandikia ninyi watu wa Mungu huko Efeso , mlio waaminifu katika kuungana na Kristo Yesu .

text: Grace be to you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Nawatakieni neema na amani kutoka kwa Mungu Baba yetu na kwa Bwana Yesu Kristo .

text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ :
text2: Atukuzwe Mungu na Baba wa Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo ! Maana , katika kuungana na Kristo ametubariki kwa kutujalia zawadi zote za kiroho mbinguni .

text: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world , that we should be holy and without blame before him in love :
text2: Kabla ya kuumbwa ulimwengu , Mungu alituteua tuwe wake katika kuungana na Kristo ili tuwe watakatifu na bila hitilafu mbele yake . Kwa sababu ya upendo wake ,

text: Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself , according to the good pleasure of his will ,
text2: Mungu alikuwa ameazimia tangu zamani kutuleta kwake kama watoto wake kwa njia ya Yesu Kristo . Ndivyo alivyopenda na kunuia .

text: To the praise of the glory of his grace , wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved .
text2: Basi , tumsifu Mungu kwa sababu ya neema yake tukufu katika Mwanae mpenzi !

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , the forgiveness of sins , according to the riches of his grace ;
text2: Maana kwa damu yake Kristo sisi tunakombolewa , yaani dhambi zetu zinaondolewa . Ndivyo ulivyo ukuu wa neema yake

text: Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence ;
text2: aliotukirimia bila kipimo ! Kwa hekima na ujuzi wake wote

text: Having made known unto us the mystery of his will , according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself :
text2: Mungu alitekeleza kile alichonuia , akatujulisha mpango wake uliofichika , ambao alikuwa ameazimia kuutekeleza kwa njia ya Kristo .

text: That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ , both which are in heaven , and which are on earth ; even in him :
text2: Mpango huo ambao angeutimiza wakati utimiapo ni kukusanya pamoja viumbe vyote , kila kitu mbinguni na duniani , chini ya Kristo .

text: In whom also we have obtained an inheritance , being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will :
text2: Kila kitu hufanywa kufuatana na mpango na uamuzi wa Mungu ; naye Mungu ametuteua sisi tuwe watu wake kwa mapenzi yake katika kuungana na Kristo , kufuatana na azimio alilofanya tangu mwanzo .

text: That we should be to the praise of his glory , who first trusted in Christ .
text2: Basi , sisi tuliotangulia kumtumainia Kristo tunapaswa kuusifu utukufu wa Mungu !

text: In whom ye also trusted , after that ye heard the word of truth , the gospel of your salvation : in whom also after that ye believed , ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise ,
text2: Nanyi pia watu wa mataifa mengine , mliusikia ujumbe wa kweli yaani Habari Njema iliyowaletea wokovu , mkamwamini Kristo ; naye Mungu , ili kuonyesha kuwa ninyi ni wake , akawapiga mhuri kwa kuwapeni yule Roho Mtakatifu aliyetuahidia .

text: Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession , unto the praise of his glory .
text2: Huyu Roho ni dhamana ya kurithi yote yale Mungu aliyowaahidia watu wake , na jambo hili latuhakikishia kwamba Mungu atawakomboa kabisa wote walio wake . Tuusifu utukufu wake !

text: Wherefore I also , after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus , and love unto all the saints ,
text2: Kwa sababu hiyo , tangu niliposikia juu ya imani yenu kwa Bwana Yesu na mapendo yenu kwa watu wa Mungu ,

text: Cease not to give thanks for you , making mention of you in my prayers ;
text2: sijaacha kamwe kumshukuru Mungu kwa ajili yenu . Ninawakumbuka katika sala zangu

text: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of glory , may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him :
text2: ili Mungu wa Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo Baba mtukufu , awajalieni Roho wake atakayewapa hekima na kuwafunulieni Mungu mpate kumjua .

text: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened ; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling , and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints ,
text2: Namwomba Mungu aifunue mioyo yenu iweze kuuona mwanga wake , mpate kutambua lile tumaini alilowaitieni na utukufu mkuu wa zawadi alizowawekea watu wake ,

text: And what is the exceeding greatness of his power to usward who believe , according to the working of his mighty power ,
text2: mpate kutambua jinsi uwezo wake ulivyo mkuu mno kwa ajili yetu sisi tunaoamini . Uwezo huo unaofanya kazi ndani yetu , ni sawa na nguvu ile kuu mno

text: Which he wrought in Christ , when he raised him from the dead , and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places ,
text2: aliyomfufua nayo Kristo kutoka wafu , akamketisha kulia kwake mbinguni .

text: Far above all principality , and power , and might , and dominion , and every name that is named , not only in this world , but also in that which is to come :
text2: Huko , Kristo anatawala juu ya kila tawala , mamlaka , enzi na ukuu ; anatawala juu ya kila cheo kiwezacho kutajwa katika ulimwengu huu na katika ulimwengu ujao .

text: And hath put all things under his feet , and gave him to be the head over all things to the church ,
text2: Mungu ameweka vitu vyote chini ya miguu yake , akamkabidhi kwa kanisa akiwa mkuu wa vitu vyote .

text: Which is his body , the fulness of him that filleth all in all .
text2: Kanisa ni mwili wa Kristo , na ukamilifu wake yeye anayekamilisha vitu vyote kila mahali .

text: And you hath he quickened , who were dead in trespasses and sins ;
text2: Ninyi mlikuwa mmekufa kwa sababu ya makosa na dhambi zenu .

text: Wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world , according to the prince of the power of the air , the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience :
text2: Wakati ule mliishi kufuatana na mtindo mbaya wa ulimwengu huu , mkawa mnamtii mtawala wa pepo wenye nguvu wa anga , pepo ambao huwatawala sasa watu wasiomtii Mungu .

text: Among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh , fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind ; and were by nature the children of wrath , even as others .
text2: Na hata sisi sote tulikuwa kama wao ; tuliishi kufuatana na tamaa zetu za kidunia na kufanya tu mambo yale yaliyoipendeza miili na akili zetu . Kidunia , sisi kama vile pia wao , tulistahili ghadhabu ya Mungu .

text: But God , who is rich in mercy , for his great love wherewith he loved us ,
text2: Lakini Mungu ni mwenye huruma nyingi . Alitupenda kwa mapendo yasiyopimika ,

text: Even when we were dead in sins , hath quickened us together with Christ , ( by grace ye are saved ; )
text2: hata , ingawa tulikuwa tumekufa kwa sababu ya dhambi , alitufanya hai pamoja na Kristo . Kwa neema ya Mungu ninyi mmeokolewa .

text: And hath raised us up together , and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus :
text2: Kwa kuungana na Kristo Yesu , Mungu alitufufua pamoja naye , tukatawale pamoja naye mbinguni .

text: That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus .
text2: Ndivyo alivyopenda kuonyesha kwa watu wa nyakati za baadaye , ukuu wa neema yake aliyotujalia kwa ukarimu katika kuungana kwetu na Kristo Yesu .

text: For by grace are ye saved through faith ; and that not of yourselves : it is the gift of God :
text2: Maana , kwa neema ya Mungu mmekombolewa kwa njia ya imani . Jambo hili si matokeo ya juhudi zenu , bali ni zawadi ya Mungu .

text: Not of works , lest any man should boast .
text2: Wala halitokani na matendo yenu wenyewe , asije mtu akajivunia kitu .

text: For we are his workmanship , created in Christ Jesus unto good works , which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them .
text2: Sisi ni viumbe vyake Mungu , na kwa kuungana na Kristo Yesu , alituumba kwa ajili ya kuishi maisha ya matendo mema aliyotutayarishia tuyatende .

text: Wherefore remember , that ye being in time past Gentiles in the flesh , who are called Uncircumcision by that which is called the Circumcision in the flesh made by hands ;
text2: Ninyi mlio kwa asili watu wa mataifa mengine - - mnaoitwa , " wasiotahiriwa " na Wayahudi ambao hujiita , " Waliotahiriwa , " ( kwa sababu ya kile wanachoifanyia miili yao ) - - kumbukeni mlivyokuwa zamani .

text: That at that time ye were without Christ , being aliens from the commonwealth of Israel , and strangers from the covenants of promise , having no hope , and without God in the world :
text2: Wakati ule ninyi mlikuwa bila Kristo ; mlikuwa nje ya jamii ya Israeli ; mlikuwa wageni na hamkuwa na sehemu yoyote katika lile agano la zile ahadi . Mlikuwa bila matumaini Mungu hapa duniani .

text: But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ .
text2: Lakini sasa , kwa kuungana na Kristo Yesu , ninyi ambao hapo awali mlikuwa mbali , mmekaribishwa kwa njia ya damu yake Kristo .

text: For he is our peace , who hath made both one , and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us ;
text2: Maana Kristo mwenyewe ametuletea amani kwa kuwafanya Wayahudi na watu wa mataifa mengine kuwa jamii moja . Kwa mwili wake yeye mwenyewe aliubomoa ule ukuta uliowatenganisha na kuwafanya maadui .

text: Having abolished in his flesh the enmity , even the law of commandments contained in ordinances ; for to make in himself of twain one new man , so making peace ;
text2: Aliiondoa ile Sheria ya Wayahudi pamoja na amri zake na kanuni zake , ili kutokana na jamii hizo mbili aumbe jamii moja mpya katika umoja naye na hivyo kuleta amani .

text: And that he might reconcile both unto God in one body by the cross , having slain the enmity thereby :
text2: Kwa mwili wake , Kristo aliuangamiza uadui wao ; kwa msalaba wake aliziunganisha jamii hizo kuwa moja na kuzipatanisha na Mungu .

text: And came and preached peace to you which were afar off , and to them that were nigh .
text2: Basi , Kristo alikuja akahubiri Habari Njema ya amani kwenu ninyi watu wa mataifa mengine mliokuwa mbali na Mungu , na pia kwa Wayahudi ambao walikuwa karibu na Mungu .

text: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father .
text2: Hivyo , kwa njia yake , sisi sote , Wayahudi na watu wa mataifa mengine , tunaweza kumwendea Baba katika Roho mmoja .

text: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners , but fellowcitizens with the saints , and of the household of God ;
text2: Basi , ninyi si wageni tena , wala si watu wa nje ; ninyi ni raia pamoja na watu wa Mungu , na ni watu wa jamaa ya Mungu .

text: And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets , Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone ;
text2: Mmejengwa juu ya msingi uliowekwa na mitume na manabii , naye Kristo mwenyewe ndiye jiwe kuu la msingi .

text: In whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord :
text2: Yeye ndiye mwenye kulitengeneza jengo lote na kulikuza hata liwe hekalu takatifu kwa ajili ya B wana .

text: In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit .
text2: Katika kuungana naye , ninyi pia mnajengwa pamoja na wote wengine , muwe makao ya Mungu kwa njia ya Roho wake .

text: For this cause I Paul , the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles ,
text2: Kutokana na hayo , mimi Paulo , mfungwa wa Kristo Yesu kwa ajili yenu , namwomba Mungu .

text: If ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me to youward :
text2: Bila shaka mmekwisha sikia kwamba Mungu , kwa neema yake , alinikabidhi kazi hii niifanye kwa faida yenu .

text: How that by revelation he made known unto me the mystery ; ( as I wrote afore in few words ,
text2: Mimi nilijulishwa kwa njia ya ufunuo mpango wake uliofichika . ( Nimeandika kwa ufupi juu ya jambo hili ,

text: Whereby , when ye read , ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ )
text2: nanyi mkiyasoma maneno yangu mtaweza kujua jinsi ninavyoielewa siri hiyo ya Kristo . )

text: Which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men , as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit ;
text2: Zamani watu hawakujulishwa siri hiyo ; lakini sasa Mungu amewajulisha mitume na manabii wake watakatifu kwa njia ya Roho .

text: That the Gentiles should be fellowheirs , and of the same body , and partakers of his promise in Christ by the gospel :
text2: Siri yenyewe ni hii : kwa njia ya Habari Njema watu wa mataifa mengine wanapata sehemu yao pamoja na Wayahudi katika zile baraka za Mungu ; wao ni viungo vya mwili uleule , na wanashiriki ahadi ileile aliyofanya Mungu kwa njia ya Kristo Yesu .

text: Whereof I was made a minister , according to the gift of the grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his power .
text2: Mimi nimefanywa kuwa mtumishi wa Habari Njema kwa neema ya pekee aliyonijalia Mungu kwa uwezo wake mkuu .

text: Unto me , who am less than the least of all saints , is this grace given , that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ ;
text2: Mimi ni mdogo kuliko watu wote wa Mungu ; lakini amenijalia neema yake , ili niwahubirie watu wa mataifa utajiri wake Kristo usiopimika ,

text: And to make all men see what is the fellowship of the mystery , which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God , who created all things by Jesus Christ :
text2: tena niwaangazie watu wote waone jinsi mpango wa Mungu uliofichika unavyotekelezwa . Mungu aliye Muumba wa vitu vyote alificha siri hiyo yake tangu milele ,

text: To the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenly places might be known by the church the manifold wisdom of God ,
text2: kusudi , sasa kwa njia ya kanisa , wakuu na wenye enzi wa mbinguni wapate kuitambua hekima ya Mungu iliyo ya namna nyingi .

text: According to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord :
text2: Mungu alifanya jambo hilo kufuatana na azimio lake la milele ambalo amelifanya kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu .

text: In whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him .
text2: Basi , katika kuungana na Kristo , na kwa njia ya imani katika Kristo , sisi tunathubutu kumkaribia Mungu kwa uhodari .

text: Wherefore I desire that ye faint not at my tribulations for you , which is your glory .
text2: Kwa hiyo , nawaombeni msife moyo kwa sababu ya mateso ninayopata kwa ajili yenu , maana hayo ni kwa ajili ya utukufu wenu .

text: For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Kwa sababu hiyo , nampigia magoti Baba ,

text: Of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named ,
text2: aliye asili ya jamaa zote duniani na mbinguni .

text: That he would grant you , according to the riches of his glory , to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man ;
text2: Namwomba Mungu , kadiri ya utajiri wa utukufu wake , awajalieni kwa uwezo wa Roho wake , nguvu ya kuwa imara ndani yenu ,

text: That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith ; that ye , being rooted and grounded in love ,
text2: naye Kristo akae mioyoni mwenu kwa imani . Namwomba mpate kuwa na mzizi na msingi katika mapendo

text: May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth , and length , and depth , and height ;
text2: kusudi muweze kufahamu pamoja na watu wote wa Mungu jinsi upendo wa Kristo ueneavyo kwa mapana na marefu , kwa kimo na kina .

text: And to know the love of Christ , which passeth knowledge , that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God .
text2: Naam , mpate kujua upendo wa Kristo upitao elimu yote , mjazwe kabisa utimilifu wote wa Mungu .

text: Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think , according to the power that worketh in us ,
text2: Kwake yeye ambaye kwa nguvu yake ifanyayo kazi ndani yetu , aweza kufanya mambo makuu zaidi ya yale tuwezayo kuomba au kufikiria ;

text: Unto him be glory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all ages , world without end . Amen .
text2: kwake Mungu uwe utukufu katika kanisa na katika Kristo Yesu , nyakati zote , milele na milele ! Amina .

text: I therefore , the prisoner of the Lord , beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called ,
text2: Basi , mimi niliye mfungwa kwa kuwa namtumikia Bwana , nawasihi muishi maisha yanayostahili wito mlioitiwa .

text: With all lowliness and meekness , with longsuffering , forbearing one another in love ;
text2: Muwe daima wanyenyekevu , wapole na wenye saburi ; vumilianeni ninyi kwa ninyi kwa mapendo .

text: Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace .
text2: Fanyeni bidii ya kuhifadhi umoja uletwao na Roho kwa kuzingatia amani iliyo kati yenu .

text: There is one body , and one Spirit , even as ye are called in one hope of your calling ;
text2: Kuna mwili mmoja na Roho mmoja , kama vile tumaini mliloitiwa na Mungu ni moja .

text: One Lord , one faith , one baptism ,
text2: Kuna Bwana mmoja , imani moja na ubatizo mmoja ;

text: One God and Father of all , who is above all , and through all , and in you all .
text2: kuna Mungu mmoja na Baba wa wote , ambaye yuko juu ya wote , afanya kazi katika yote na yuko katika yote .

text: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ .
text2: Kila mmoja wetu amepewa neema kadiri ya kipimo alichojaliwa na Kristo .

text: Wherefore he saith , When he ascended up on high , he led captivity captive , and gave gifts unto men .
text2: Kama yasemavyo Maandiko : " Alipopaa mbinguni juu kabisa , alichukua mateka ; aliwapa watu zawadi . "

text: ( Now that he ascended , what is it but that he also descended first into the lower parts of the earth ?
text2: Basi , inaposemwa : " alipaa juu , " ina maana gani ? Maana yake ni kwamba , kwanza alishuka mpaka chini kabisa duniani .

text: He that descended is the same also that ascended up far above all heavens , that he might fill all things . )
text2: Basi , huyo aliyeshuka hapa duniani , ndiye aliyepaa juu ya mbingu zote apate kuujaza ulimwengu .

text: And he gave some , apostles ; and some , prophets ; and some , evangelists ; and some , pastors and teachers ;
text2: Ndiye aliyewapa watu zawadi : wengine aliwajalia wawe mitume , wengine manabii , wengine wawe waeneza Habari Njema , wengine wachungaji na walimu .

text: For the perfecting of the saints , for the work of the ministry , for the edifying of the body of Christ :
text2: Alifanya hivyo apate kuwatayarisha watu wote wa Mungu kwa ajili ya kazi ya huduma ya Kikristo ili kuujenga mwili wa Kristo ,

text: Till we all come in the unity of the faith , and of the knowledge of the Son of God , unto a perfect man , unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ :
text2: na hivyo sote tuufikie umoja wa imani na kumjua Mwana wa Mungu ; tuwe watu waliokomaa na kuufikia utimilifu wake Kristo mwenyewe .

text: That we henceforth be no more children , tossed to and fro , and carried about with every wind of doctrine , by the sleight of men , and cunning craftiness , whereby they lie in wait to deceive ;
text2: Basi , hatutakuwa tena kama watoto , tukitupwa na kupeperushwa huko na huko kwa kila upepo wa mafundisho wanayozua watu wadanganyifu , ili wawapotoshe wengine kwa hila .

text: But speaking the truth in love , may grow up into him in all things , which is the head , even Christ :
text2: Ila , sisi tukisema ukweli kwa moyo wa mapendo tutakua zidi katika kila jambo kulingana na Kristo ambaye ndiye kichwa ;

text: From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth , according to the effectual working in the measure of every part , maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love .
text2: chini ya uongozi wake , viungo vyote vya mwili hushikamana pamoja , na mwili wote hutegemezwa kwa msaada wa viungo vyake . Basi , kila kiungo kikitekeleza kazi yake ipasavyo , mwili wote hukua na kujijenga katika upendo .

text: This I say therefore , and testify in the Lord , that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk , in the vanity of their mind ,
text2: Basi , kwa jina la Bwana , nawaonyeni : msiishi tena kama watu wasiomjua Mungu , ambao fikira zao zimekuwa upuuzi mtupu ,

text: Having the understanding darkened , being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them , because of the blindness of their heart :
text2: na akili zao zimo gizani . Wako mbali na uzima wa Mungu , kwa sababu ya upumbavu ulio ndani yao na ukaidi wao .

text: Who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness , to work all uncleanness with greediness .
text2: Wamepotoka na hawana aibu , wamejitosa katika ufisadi ; hufanya kwa pupa kila aina ya mambo ya aibu .

text: But ye have not so learned Christ ;
text2: Lakini ninyi hamkujifunza hivyo juu ya Kristo .

text: If so be that ye have heard him , and have been taught by him , as the truth is in Jesus :
text2: Ni dhahiri kwamba mlisikia barabara habari zake , na mkiwa wafuasi wake mkafundishwa ukweli ulivyo katika Yesu .

text: That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man , which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts ;
text2: Basi , acheni mwenendo wenu wa awali , yaani ule utu wenu wa kale uliokuwa unaangamizwa kwa tamaa zake danganyifu .

text: And be renewed in the spirit of your mind ;
text2: Jirekebisheni upya rohoni na katika fikira zenu .

text: And that ye put on the new man , which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness .
text2: Vaeni hali mpya ya utu ambayo imeumbwa kwa mfano wa Mungu na ambayo hujionyesha katika maisha ya kweli ya uadilifu na utakatifu .

text: Wherefore putting away lying , speak every man truth with his neighbour : for we are members one of another .
text2: Kwa hiyo , acheni uongo . Kila mmoja anapaswa kumwambia mwenzake ukweli , maana kila mmoja wetu ni kiungo cha mwili wa Kristo .

text: Be ye angry , and sin not : let not the sun go down upon your wrath :
text2: Kama mkikasirika , msikubali hasira yenu iwafanye mtende dhambi , na wala msikae na hasira kutwa nzima .

text: Neither give place to the devil .
text2: Msimpe Ibilisi nafasi .

text: Let him that stole steal no more : but rather let him labour , working with his hands the thing which is good , that he may have to give to him that needeth .
text2: Aliyekuwa akiiba , asiibe tena , bali na aanze kufanya kazi njema kwa mikono yake , apate kuwa na kitu cha kumsaidia mtu aliye maskini .

text: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth , but that which is good to the use of edifying , that it may minister grace unto the hearers .
text2: Maneno mabaya hata yasisikike kamwe miongoni mwenu ; kila mara maneno yenu yawe ya kufaa na ambayo hujenga na kuwasaidia wengine , ili yawaneemeshe wasikilizaji wenu .

text: And grieve not the holy Spirit of God , whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption .
text2: Msimhuzunishe Roho Mtakatifu wa Mungu maana Roho huyo ni alama ya Mungu kwenu kwamba ninyi ni watu wake , na thibitisho kwamba siku itakuja ambapo Mungu atawakomboeni .

text: Let all bitterness , and wrath , and anger , and clamour , and evil speaking , be put away from you , with all malice :
text2: Basi , achaneni na uhasama , chuki , hasira , kelele , matusi ! Achaneni na kila uovu !

text: And be ye kind one to another , tenderhearted , forgiving one another , even as God for Christ ' s sake hath forgiven you .
text2: Muwe na moyo mwema na wenye kuhurumiana ; kila mmoja na amsamehe mwenzake kama naye Mungu alivyowasamehe ninyi kwa njia ya Kristo .

text: Be ye therefore followers of God , as dear children ;
text2: Kwa hiyo , mwigeni Mungu , maana ninyi ni watoto wake wapenzi .

text: And walk in love , as Christ also hath loved us , and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour .
text2: Upendo uongoze maisha yenu , kama vile Kristo alivyotupenda , na kwa ajili yetu akajitoa mwenyewe kama dhabihu yenye harufu nzuri na tambiko impendezayo Mungu .

text: But fornication , and all uncleanness , or covetousness , let it not be once named among you , as becometh saints ;
text2: Kwa vile ninyi ni watu wa Mungu , basi uasherati , uchafu wowote ule au choyo visitajwe kamwe miongoni mwenu .

text: Neither filthiness , nor foolish talking , nor jesting , which are not convenient : but rather giving of thanks .
text2: Tena maneno ya aibu , ya upuuzi au ubishi , yote hayo hayafai kwenu ; maneno ya kumshukuru Mungu ndiyo yanayofaa .

text: For this ye know , that no whoremonger , nor unclean person , nor covetous man , who is an idolater , hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God .
text2: Jueni wazi kwamba mwasherati yeyote au mchafu au mfisadi , ( ufisadi ni sawa na kuabudu sanamu ) , au mtu yeyote wa aina hiyo hataambulia chochote katika Utawala wa Kristo na wa Mungu .

text: Let no man deceive you with vain words : for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience .
text2: Msikubali kudanganywa na mtu kwa maneno matupu ; maana , kwa sababu ya mambo kama hayo ghadhabu ya Mungu huwajia wote wasiomtii .

text: Be not ye therefore partakers with them .
text2: Basi , msishirikiane nao .

text: For ye were sometimes darkness , but now are ye light in the Lord : walk as children of light :
text2: Zamani ninyi mlikuwa gizani , lakini sasa ninyi mko katika mwanga kwa kuungana na Bwana . Ishini kama watoto wa mwanga :

text: ( For the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth ; )
text2: maana matokeo ya mwanga ni wema kamili , uadilifu na ukweli .

text: Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord .
text2: Jaribuni kujua yale yanayompendeza Bwana .

text: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness , but rather reprove them .
text2: Msishiriki katika matendo yasiyofaa , ya giza bali yafichueni .

text: For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret .
text2: Mambo yanayotendwa kwa siri ni aibu hata kuyataja .

text: But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light : for whatsoever doth make manifest is light .
text2: Lakini mambo yale yanayotendwa katika mwanga , ukweli wake hudhihirishwa ;

text: Wherefore he saith , Awake thou that sleepest , and arise from the dead , and Christ shall give thee light .
text2: na kila kilichodhihirishwa huwa mwanga . Ndiyo maana Maandiko yasema : " Amka wewe uliyelala , fufuka kutoka wafu , naye Kristo atakuangaza . "

text: See then that ye walk circumspectly , not as fools , but as wise ,
text2: Basi , muwe waangalifu jinsi mnavyoishi : Msiishi kama wapumbavu , bali kama wenye hekima .

text: Redeeming the time , because the days are evil .
text2: Tumieni vizuri muda mlio nao maana siku hizi ni mbaya .

text: Wherefore be ye not unwise , but understanding what the will of the Lord is .
text2: Kwa hiyo , msiwe wapumbavu , bali jaribuni kujua matakwa ya Bwana .

text: And be not drunk with wine , wherein is excess ; but be filled with the Spirit ;
text2: Acheni kulewa divai maana hiyo itawaangamiza , bali mjazwe Roho Mtakatifu .

text: Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord ;
text2: Zungumzeni kwa maneno ya Zaburi , nyimbo na tenzi za kiroho ; mwimbieni Bwana nyimbo na zaburi kwa shukrani mioyoni mwenu .

text: Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ ;
text2: Mshukuruni Mungu Baba daima kwa ajili ya yote , kwa jina la Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo .

text: Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God .
text2: Kila mmoja amstahi mwenzake kwa sababu ya kumcha Kristo .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as unto the Lord .
text2: Wake wawatii waume zao kama kumtii Bwana .

text: For the husband is the head of the wife , even as Christ is the head of the church : and he is the saviour of the body .
text2: Maana mume anayo mamlaka juu ya mkewe , kama vile Kristo alivyo na mamlaka juu ya kanisa ; naye Kristo mwenyewe hulikomboa kanisa , mwili wake .

text: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ , so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing .
text2: Kama vile kanisa linavyomtii Kristo , vivyo hivyo , wake wawatii waume zao katika mambo yote .

text: Husbands , love your wives , even as Christ also loved the church , and gave himself for it ;
text2: Nanyi waume , wapendeni wake zenu kama Kristo alivyolipenda kanisa , akajitoa mwenyewe sadaka kwa ajili yake .

text: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word ,
text2: Alifanya hivyo , ili kwa neno lake , aliweke wakfu kwa Mungu , baada ya kulifanya safi kwa kuliosha katika maji ,

text: That he might present it to himself a glorious church , not having spot , or wrinkle , or any such thing ; but that it should be holy and without blemish .
text2: kusudi ajipatie kanisa lililo takatifu na safu kabisa , kanisa lisilo na doa , kasoro au chochote cha namna hiyo .

text: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies . He that loveth his wife loveth himself .
text2: Basi , waume wanapaswa kuwapenda wake zao kama miili yao wenyewe .

text: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh ; but nourisheth and cherisheth it , even as the Lord the church :
text2: ( Hakuna mtu yeyote auchukiaye mwili wake ; badala ya kuuchukia , huulisha na kuuvika . Ndivyo naye Kristo anavyolitunza kanisa ,

text: For we are members of his body , of his flesh , and of his bones .
text2: maana sisi ni viungo vya mwili wake . )

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and shall be joined unto his wife , and they two shall be one flesh .
text2: Kama yasemavyo Maandiko Matakatifu : " Kwa hiyo , mwanamume atawaacha baba na mama yake , ataungana na mkewe , nao wawili watakuwa mwili mmoja . "

text: This is a great mystery : but I speak concerning Christ and the church .
text2: Kuna ukweli uliofichika katika maneno haya , nami naona kwamba yamhusu Kristo na kanisa lake .

text: Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself ; and the wife see that she reverence her husband .
text2: Lakini yanawahusu ninyi pia : kila mume lazima ampende mkewe kama nafsi yake mwenyewe , naye mke anapaswa kumstahi mumewe .

text: Children , obey your parents in the Lord : for this is right .
text2: Enyi watoto , watiini wazazi wenu Kikristo maana hili ni jambo jema .

text: Honour thy father and mother ; ( which is the first commandment with promise ; )
text2: " Waheshimu Baba na mama yako , " hii ndiyo amri ya kwanza ambayo imeongezewa ahadi , yaani ,

text: That it may be well with thee , and thou mayest live long on the earth .
text2: " Upate fanaka na miaka mingi duniani . "

text: And , ye fathers , provoke not your children to wrath : but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord .
text2: Nanyi akina baba , msiwachukize watoto wenu ila waleeni katika nidhamu na mafundisho ya Kikristo .

text: Servants , be obedient to them that are your masters according to the flesh , with fear and trembling , in singleness of your heart , as unto Christ ;
text2: Enyi watumwa , watiini mabwana zenu hapa duniani kwa hofu na tetemeko ; fanyeni hivyo kwa unyofu wa moyo kana kwamba mnamtumikia Kristo .

text: Not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but as the servants of Christ , doing the will of God from the heart ;
text2: Fanyeni hivyo si tu wakati wanapowatazama ili mjipendekeze kwao , bali tumikieni kwa moyo kama atakavyo Mungu kwa sababu ninyi ni watumishi wa Kristo .

text: With good will doing service , as to the Lord , and not to men :
text2: Muwe radhi kutumikia kwa ajili ya Bwana na si kwa ajili ya watu .

text: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth , the same shall he receive of the Lord , whether he be bond or free .
text2: Kumbukeni kwamba kila mtu mwenye kutenda mema , awe mtumwa au mtu huru , atapokea tuzo lake kutoka kwa Bwana .

text: And , ye masters , do the same things unto them , forbearing threatening : knowing that your Master also is in heaven ; neither is there respect of persons with him .
text2: Nanyi mnaotumikiwa , watendeeni vivyo hivyo watumwa wenu , na acheni kutumia vitisho . Kumbukeni kwamba ninyi pia kama vile wao , mnaye Bwana yuleyule mbinguni , kwake cheo cha mtu si kitu .

text: Finally , my brethren , be strong in the Lord , and in the power of his might .
text2: Hatimaye , nawatakeni muwe imara katika kuungana na Bwana na kwa msaada wa nguvu yake kuu .

text: Put on the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil .
text2: Vaeni silaha anazowapeni Mungu mpate kuzipinga mbinu mbaya za Ibilisi .

text: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood , but against principalities , against powers , against the rulers of the darkness of this world , against spiritual wickedness in high places .
text2: Maana vita vyenu si vita kati yetu na binadamu , bali ni vita dhidi ya jeshi ovu la ulimwengu wa roho ; tunapigana na watawala , wakuu na wenye nguvu wanaomiliki ulimwengu huu wa giza .

text: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day , and having done all , to stand .
text2: Kwa sababu hiyo , vaeni silaha za Mungu ili siku ile itakapofika muweze kuyapinga mashambulio ya adui ; na mkisha pigana mpaka mwisho , muwe bado thabiti .

text: Stand therefore , having your loins girt about with truth , and having on the breastplate of righteousness ;
text2: Basi , simameni imara ! Ukweli uwe kama ukanda kiunoni mwenu , uadilifu uwe kama vazi la kujikinga kifuani ,

text: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace ;
text2: na hamu ya kutangaza Habari Njema ya amani iwe kama viatu miguuni mwenu .

text: Above all , taking the shield of faith , wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked .
text2: Zaidi ya hayo yote , imani iwe daima kama ngao mikononi mwenu , iwawezeshe kuizima mishale ya moto ya yule Mwovu .

text: And take the helmet of salvation , and the sword of the Spirit , which is the word of God :
text2: Upokeeni wokovu kama kofia yenu ya chuma , na neno la Mungu kama upanga mnaopewa na Roho Mtakatifu .

text: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit , and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints ;
text2: Salini daima , mkiomba msaada wa Mungu . Salini kila wakati kwa nguvu ya Roho . Kesheni bila kuchoka mkisali kwa ajili ya watu wote wa Mungu .

text: And for me , that utterance may be given unto me , that I may open my mouth boldly , to make known the mystery of the gospel ,
text2: Niombeeni nami pia ili niongeapo Mungu anijalie cha kusema , niweze kuwajulisha watu fumbo la Habari Njema kwa uthabiti .

text: For which I am an ambassador in bonds : that therein I may speak boldly , as I ought to speak .
text2: Mimi ni balozi kwa ajili ya Habari Njema hiyo ingawa sasa niko kifungoni . Ombeni , basi , ili niweze kuwa hodari katika kuitangaza kama inipasavyo .

text: But that ye also may know my affairs , and how I do , Tychicus , a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord , shall make known to you all things :
text2: Tukiko , ndugu yetu mpenzi na mtumishi mwaminifu wa Bwana , atawapeni habari zangu zote mpate kujua ninachofanya .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that ye might know our affairs , and that he might comfort your hearts .
text2: Namtuma kwenu awapeni habari zetu mpate kuwa na moyo .

text: Peace be to the brethren , and love with faith , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Ninawatakieni ninyi ndugu amani , upendo na imani kutoka kwa Mungu Baba na kutoka kwa Bwana Yesu Kristo .

text: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity . Amen .
text2: Nawatakia neema ya Mungu wote wanaompenda Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo kwa mapendo yasiyo na mwisho .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timotheus our brother ,
text2: Mimi Paulo , mtume wa Kristo Yesu kwa mapenzi ya Mungu , na ndugu Timotheo ,

text: To the saints and faithful brethren in Christ which are at Colosse : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: tunawaandikia ninyi watu wa Mungu huko Kolosai , ndugu zetu waaminifu katika kuungana na Kristo . Tunawatakieni neema na amani kutoka kwa Mungu Baba yetu .

text: We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , praying always for you ,
text2: Daima tunamshukuru Mungu , Baba wa Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo , wakati tunapowaombea .

text: Since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus , and of the love which ye have to all the saints ,
text2: Maana tumesikia juu ya imani yenu katika Kristo Yesu na juu ya upendo wenu kwa watu wote wa Mungu .

text: For the hope which is laid up for you in heaven , whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel ;
text2: Wakati ujumbe ule wa kweli , yaani Habari Njema , ilipowafikieni kwa mara ya kwanza , mlipata kusikia juu ya lile tumaini linalopatikana kwake . Kwa sababu hiyo imani na upendo wenu vinategemea jambo lile mnalotumainia ambalo mmewekewa salama mbinguni .

text: Which is come unto you , as it is in all the world ; and bringeth forth fruit , as it doth also in you , since the day ye heard of it , and knew the grace of God in truth :
text2: Habari Njema inazidi kuzaa matunda na kuenea ulimwenguni kote kama vile ilivyofanya kwenu ninyi tangu siku ile mliposikia juu ya neema ya Mungu na kuitambua ilivyo kweli .

text: As ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellowservant , who is for you a faithful minister of Christ ;
text2: Mlijifunza juu ya neema ya Mungu kutoka kwa Epafra , mtumishi mwenzetu , ambaye ni mfanyakazi mwaminifu wa Kristo kwa niaba yetu .

text: Who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit .
text2: Yeye alitupa habari za upendo wenu mliojaliwa na Roho .

text: For this cause we also , since the day we heard it , do not cease to pray for you , and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding ;
text2: Kwa sababu hiyo tumekuwa tukiwaombeeni daima tangu tulipopata habari zenu . Tunamwomba Mungu awajazeni ujuzi kamili wa mapenzi yake , awajazeni hekima yote na elimu iletwayo na Roho wake .

text: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing , being fruitful in every good work , and increasing in the knowledge of God ;
text2: Hapo mtaweza kuishi kama anavyotaka Bwana na kutenda daima yanayompendeza . Maisha yenu yatakuwa yenye matunda ya kila namna ya matendo mema na mtazidi kukua katika kumjua Mungu .

text: Strengthened with all might , according to his glorious power , unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness ;
text2: Mungu awajalieni nguvu kwa uwezo wake mtukufu ili mweze kustahimili kila kitu kwa uvumilivu .

text: Giving thanks unto the Father , which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light :
text2: Na kwa furaha , mshukuruni Baba aliyewawezesha ninyi kuwa na sehemu yenu katika mambo yale Mungu aliyowawekea watu wake katika utawala wa mwanga .

text: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness , and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son :
text2: Yeye alituokoa katika nguvu ya giza , akatuleta salama katika ufalme wa Mwanae mpenzi ,

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , even the forgiveness of sins :
text2: ambaye kwa njia yake tunakombolewa , yaani dhambi zetu zinaondolewa .

text: Who is the image of the invisible God , the firstborn of every creature :
text2: Kristo ni mfano wa Mungu asiyeonekana ; ni mzaliwa wa kwanza wa viumbe vyote .

text: For by him were all things created , that are in heaven , and that are in earth , visible and invisible , whether they be thrones , or dominions , or principalities , or powers : all things were created by him , and for him :
text2: Maana kwa njia yake vitu vyote viliumbwa duniani na mbinguni , vitu vinavyoonekana na visivyoonekana : wenye enzi , watawala , wakuu na wenye mamlaka . Vyote viliumbwa kwa njia yake na kwa ajili yake .

text: And he is before all things , and by him all things consist .
text2: Kristo alikuwako kabla ya vitu vyote ; kwa kuungana naye , vyote vyadumu mahali pake .

text: And he is the head of the body , the church : who is the beginning , the firstborn from the dead ; that in all things he might have the preeminence .
text2: Yeye ni kichwa cha mwili wake , yaani kanisa ; yeye ni chanzo cha uhai wa huo mwili . Yeye ndiye mwanzo , mzaliwa wa kwanza aliyefufuliwa kutoka wafu , ili awe na nafasi ya kwanza katika vitu vyote .

text: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell ;
text2: Maana Mungu alipenda utimilifu wote uwe ndani yake .

text: And , having made peace through the blood of his cross , by him to reconcile all things unto himself ; by him , I say , whether they be things in earth , or things in heaven .
text2: Kwa njia yake Mungu alivipatanisha naye vitu vyote naam , viumbe vyote mbinguni na duniania ; alileta amani kwa damu ya Kristo msalabani .

text: And you , that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works , yet now hath he reconciled
text2: Hapo kwanza ninyi pia mlikuwa mbali na Mungu na mlikuwa adui zake kwa sababu ya fikira zenu na matendo yenu maovu .

text: In the body of his flesh through death , to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight :
text2: Lakini sasa , kwa kifo cha Mwanae aliyeishi hapa duniani , Mungu amewapatanisha naye , kusudi awalete mbele yake mkiwa watakatifu , safi na bila lawama .

text: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled , and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel , which ye have heard , and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven ; whereof I Paul am made a minister ;
text2: Mnapaswa , lakini kuendelea kuwa imara na thabiti katika imani hiyo , na msikubali kusukumwa mbali na tumaini lile mlilopata wakati mlipoisikia Habari Njema . Mimi Paulo nimekuwa mtumishi wa hiyo Habari Njema ambayo imekwisha hubiriwa kila kiumbe duniani .

text: Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you , and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body ' s sake , which is the church :
text2: Na sasa nafurahi kuteseka kwa ajili yenu , maana kwa mateso yangu hapa duniani , nasaidia kukamilisha kile kilichopungua bado katika mateso ya Kristo kwa ajili ya mwili wake , yaani kanisa .

text: Whereof I am made a minister , according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you , to fulfil the word of God ;
text2: Nami nimefanywa kuwa mtumishi wa kanisa kufuatana na mpango wake Mungu ambao alinikabidhi kwa faida yenu . Mpango wenyewe ni kuutangaza kwa ukamilifu ujumbe wake ,

text: Even the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations , but now is made manifest to his saints :
text2: ambao ni siri aliyowaficha binadamu wote tangu milele , lakini sasa amewajulisha watu wake .

text: To whom God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles ; which is Christ in you , the hope of glory :
text2: Mpango wa Mungu ni kuwajulisha watu wake siri hii kuu na tukufu ambayo ni kwa ajili ya watu wote . Na , siri yenyewe ndiyo hii : Kristo yuko ndani yenu , na jambo hilo lamaanisha kwamba ninyi mtaushiriki utukufu wa Mungu .

text: Whom we preach , warning every man , and teaching every man in all wisdom ; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus :
text2: Kwa sababu hiyo tunamhubiri Kristo kwa watu wote ; tunawaonya na kuwafundisha wote kwa hekima yote , ili tuweze kumleta kila mmoja mbele ya Mungu akiwa amekomaa katika kuungana na Kristo .

text: Whereunto I also labour , striving according to his working , which worketh in me mightily .
text2: Kwa madhumuni hayo mimi nafanya kazi na kujitahidi nikiitumia nguvu kuu ya Kristo ifanyayo kazi ndani yangu .

text: For I would that ye knew what great conflict I have for you , and for them at Laodicea , and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh ;
text2: Napenda mjue jinsi ninavyofanya kazi kwa bidii kwa ajili yenu , kwa ajili ya watu wa Laodikea na kwa ajili ya wote ambao hawajapata kuniona kwa macho .

text: That their hearts might be comforted , being knit together in love , and unto all riches of the full assurance of understanding , to the acknowledgement of the mystery of God , and of the Father , and of Christ ;
text2: Nafanya hivi kusudi mioyo yao ifarijiwe na kuvutwa pamoja katika upendo , ili wajazwe uthabiti mwingi uletwao na elimu ya kweli . Hapo wataijua siri ya Mungu ambayo ni Kristo mwenyewe .

text: In whom are hid all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge .
text2: Ndani yake zimefichika hazina zote za hekima na elimu .

text: And this I say , lest any man should beguile you with enticing words .
text2: Basi , nawaambieni , msikubali kudanganywa na mtu yeyote kwa maneno ya uongo hata kama ni ya kuvutia sana .

text: For though I be absent in the flesh , yet am I with you in the spirit , joying and beholding your order , and the stedfastness of your faith in Christ .
text2: Maana , ingawa mimi niko mbali nanyi kwa mwili , lakini niko pamoja nanyi kwa roho , na ninafurahi kuona uthabiti kamili mnaosimama nao pamoja katika imani yenu kwa Kristo .

text: As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord , so walk ye in him :
text2: Maadamu ninyi mmemkubali Kristo Yesu kuwa Bwana , basi , ishini katika muungano naye .

text: Rooted and built up in him , and stablished in the faith , as ye have been taught , abounding therein with thanksgiving .
text2: Mnapaswa kuwa na mizizi ndani yake , kujijenga juu yake na kuwa imara katika imani yenu kama mlivyofundishwa . Muwe na shukrani tele .

text: Beware lest any man spoil you through philosophy and vain deceit , after the tradition of men , after the rudiments of the world , and not after Christ .
text2: Angalieni basi , mtu asiwapotoshe kwa udanganyifu mtupu wa hekima ya kibinadamu , ambayo chanzo chake ni mafundisho ya mapokeo ya watu na ya pepo watawala , na wala si Kristo mwenyewe !

text: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily .
text2: Maana , ndani yake Kristo katika ubinadamu wake , umo ukamilifu wote wa Mungu ,

text: And ye are complete in him , which is the head of all principality and power :
text2: nanyi mmepewa uzima kamili katika kuungana naye . Yeye yuko juu ya pepo watawala wote na wakuu wote .

text: In whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands , in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ :
text2: Katika kuungana na Kristo ninyi mlitahiriwa , lakini si kwa tohara ifanywayo na watu , bali inayofanywa na Kristo mwenyewe , na ambayo inahusikana na kukombolewa kutoka katika utu wa dhambi .

text: Buried with him in baptism , wherein also ye are risen with him through the faith of the operation of God , who hath raised him from the dead .
text2: Maana , mlipobatizwa mlizikwa pamoja na Kristo , na katika ubatizo , mlifufuliwa pia pamoja naye kwa imani yenu katika nguvu ya Mungu ambaye alimfufua Kristo kutoka wafu .

text: And you , being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh , hath he quickened together with him , having forgiven you all trespasses ;
text2: Wakati mmoja nanyi mlikuwa mmekufa kwa sababu ya makosa yenu na kwa sababu ninyi mlikuwa watu wa mataifa mengine . Lakini Mungu amewapa ninyi uzima pamoja na Kristo . Mungu ametusamehe dhambi zetu zote ;

text: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us , which was contrary to us , and took it out of the way , nailing it to his cross ;
text2: alifutilia mbali ile hati ya deni iliyokuwa inatukabili na masharti yake , na kuifuta kabisa kwa kuipigilia msalabani .

text: And having spoiled principalities and powers , he made a shew of them openly , triumphing over them in it .
text2: Juu ya msalaba Kristo aliwapokonya nguvu zao hao pepo watawala na wakuu ; aliwafanya kuwa kitu cha fedheha hadharani kwa kuwaburuta kama mateka katika msafara wa ushindi wake .

text: Let no man therefore judge you in meat , or in drink , or in respect of an holyday , or of the new moon , or of the sabbath days :
text2: Kwa hiyo , basi , msikubali kupewa masharti na mtu yeyote kuhusu vyakula au vinywaji , siku za sherehe , sikukuu ya Mwezi mpya au Sabato .

text: Which are a shadow of things to come ; but the body is of Christ .
text2: Mambo ya aina hiyo ni kivuli tu cha yale yatakayokuja ; ukweli wenyewe ndiye Kristo .

text: Let no man beguile you of your reward in a voluntary humility and worshipping of angels , intruding into those things which he hath not seen , vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind ,
text2: Msikubali kuhukumiwa na mtu yeyote anayejitakia kuwa wa maana kwa sababu ya maono ya pekee na ambaye anasisitiza juu ya unyenyekevu wa uongo na ibada kwa malaika . Mtu wa namna hiyo amepumbazika kwa fikira danganifu za kidunia

text: And not holding the Head , from which all the body by joints and bands having nourishment ministered , and knit together , increaseth with the increase of God .
text2: na amejitenga na Kristo aliye kichwa cha huo mwili . Chini ya uongozi wa Kristo , mwili wote unalishwa na kuunganishwa pamoja kwa viungo na mishipa yake , nao hukua kama atakavyo Mungu .

text: Wherefore if ye be dead with Christ from the rudiments of the world , why , as though living in the world , are ye subject to ordinances ,
