text2: Ninyi mmekufa pamoja na Kristo na kukombolewa kutoka nguvu za pepo watawala wa ulimwengu . Kwa nini , basi , kuishi tena kama vile mngekuwa wa ulimwengu huu ? Ya nini kuwekewa masharti :

text: ( Touch not ; taste not ; handle not ;
text2: " Msishike hiki , " " Msionje kile , " " Msiguse kile ! "

text: Which all are to perish with the using ; ) after the commandments and doctrines of men ?
text2: Mambo hayo yote yanahusika na vitu vyenye kuharibika mara tu vinapotumiwa ; hayo ni maagizo na mafundisho ya kibinadamu tu .

text: Which things have indeed a shew of wisdom in will worship , and humility , and neglecting of the body ; not in any honour to the satisfying of the flesh .
text2: Kweli , masharti hayo yaonekana kuwa ya hekima katika namna ya ibada ya kujitakia wenyewe , unyenyekevu wa uongo na kuutendea mwili kwa ukali ; lakini kwa kweli , haifai chochote kuzuia tamaa za mwili .

text: If ye then be risen with Christ , seek those things which are above , where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God .
text2: Basi , ikiwa mmefufuka pamoja na Kristo , panieni mambo ya juu , kule Kristo aliko , ameketi upande wa kulia wa Mungu .

text: Set your affection on things above , not on things on the earth .
text2: Muwe na hamu ya mambo ya huko juu , na siyo mambo ya hapa duniani .

text: For ye are dead , and your life is hid with Christ in God .
text2: Maana ninyi mmekufa na uzima wenu umefichwa pamoja na Kristo katika Mungu .

text: When Christ , who is our life , shall appear , then shall ye also appear with him in glory .
text2: Uzima wenu halisi ni Kristo , na wakati atakapotokea ndipo nanyi pia mtakapotokea pamoja naye katika utukufu .

text: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth ; fornication , uncleanness , inordinate affection , evil concupiscence , and covetousness , which is idolatry :
text2: Basi , komesheni kabisa kila kitu kilicho ndani yenu ambacho chahusika na mambo ya kidunia : uasherati , uchafu , shauku , tamaa mbaya na uchu ( ambao ni sawa na kuabudu sanamu ) .

text: For which things ' sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience :
text2: Kwa sababu ya mambo hayo hasira ya Mungu huwajia wote wanaomwasi .

text: In the which ye also walked some time , when ye lived in them .
text2: Wakati mmoja ninyi pia mliishi kufuatana na mambo hayo , mlipotawaliwa nayo .

text: But now ye also put off all these ; anger , wrath , malice , blasphemy , filthy communication out of your mouth .
text2: Lakini sasa mnapaswa kuachana na mambo haya yote : hasira , tamaa , uovu ; kufuru au maneno yasiyofaa yasitoke kamwe vinywani mwenu .

text: Lie not one to another , seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds ;
text2: Msiambiane uongo , kwani ninyi mmekwisha vua ule utu wa kale pamoja na matendo yake yote ,

text: And have put on the new man , which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him :
text2: mkavaa utu mpya . Huu unaendelea kurekebishwa na Mungu , Muumba wake , kadiri ya mfano wake , ili mpate kumjua Mungu kwa ukamilifu .

text: Where there is neither Greek nor Jew , circumcision nor uncircumcision , Barbarian , Scythian , bond nor free : but Christ is all , and in all .
text2: Katika hali hii , hakuna tena tofauti kati ya Mgiriki na Myahudi , aliyetahiriwa na asiyetahiriwa , msomi na asiye msomi , mtumwa na mtu aliye huru . Kristo ni kila kitu , na yumo katika yote .

text: Put on therefore , as the elect of God , holy and beloved , bowels of mercies , kindness , humbleness of mind , meekness , longsuffering ;
text2: Ninyi ni watu wake Mungu ; yeye aliwapenda na kuwateua . Kwa hiyo basi , vaeni moyo wa huruma , wema , unyenyekevu , upole na uvumilivu .

text: Forbearing one another , and forgiving one another , if any man have a quarrel against any : even as Christ forgave you , so also do ye .
text2: Vumilianeni na kusameheana iwapo mmoja wenu analo jambo lolote dhidi ya mwenzake . Mnapaswa kusameheana kama Bwana alivyowasamehe ninyi .

text: And above all these things put on charity , which is the bond of perfectness .
text2: Zaidi ya hayo yote , zingatieni upendo kwani upendo huunganisha kila kitu katika umoja ulio kamili .

text: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts , to the which also ye are called in one body ; and be ye thankful .
text2: Nayo amani ya Kristo itawale mioyoni mwenu ; maana kwa ajili hiyo ninyi mmeitwa katika mwili huo mmoja . Tena muwe na shukrani !

text: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom ; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord .
text2: Ujumbe wa Kristo ukae ndani yenu pamoja na utajiri wake wote . Fundishaneni na kushauriana kwa hekima yote . Imbeni zaburi , nyimbo na tenzi za kiroho ; mwimbieni Mungu mioyoni mwenu kwa shukrani .

text: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed , do all in the name of the Lord Jesus , giving thanks to God and the Father by him .
text2: Na , kila mfanyacho kwa neno au tendo , fanyeni vyote kwa jina la Bwana Yesu na kumshukuru Mungu Baba kwa njia yake .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as it is fit in the Lord .
text2: Enyi akina mama , watiini waume zenu , kwani ndivyo apendavyo Bwana .

text: Husbands , love your wives , and be not bitter against them .
text2: Nanyi waume , wapendeni wake zenu , na msiwe wakali kwao .

text: Children , obey your parents in all things : for this is well pleasing unto the Lord .
text2: Enyi watoto , watiini wazazi wenu daima maana hiyo humpendeza Bwana .

text: Fathers , provoke not your children to anger , lest they be discouraged .
text2: Nanyi wazazi , msiwachukize watoto wenu , la sivyo watakata tamaa .

text: Servants , obey in all things your masters according to the flesh ; not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but in singleness of heart , fearing God :
text2: Enyi watumwa , watiini wakuu wenu wa kidunia katika mambo yote , na si tu wakati wanapowatazama kwa kuwa mnataka kujipendekeza kwao ; ila fanyeni hivyo kwa moyo wote , kwa sababu ya kumcha Bwana .

text: And whatsoever ye do , do it heartily , as to the Lord , and not unto men ;
text2: Kila mfanyalo , fanyeni kwa moyo wote , kwa sababu ya Bwana na si kwa ajili ya mtu .

text: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance : for ye serve the Lord Christ .
text2: Kumbukeni kwamba atawapeni tuzo lile alilowawekea watu wake . Mtumikieni Kristo Bwana !

text: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done : and there is no respect of persons .
text2: Atendaye mabaya atalipwa kufuatana na ubaya wake ; Mungu hana ubaguzi .

text: Masters , give unto your servants that which is just and equal ; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven .
text2: Nanyi wakuu , watendeeni watumwa wenu kwa uadilifu na haki , mkikumbuka kwamba nanyi pia mnaye Bwana mbinguni .

text: Continue in prayer , and watch in the same with thanksgiving ;
text2: Dumuni katika sala , na mnaposali muwe waangalifu , mkimshukuru Mungu .

text: Withal praying also for us , that God would open unto us a door of utterance , to speak the mystery of Christ , for which I am also in bonds :
text2: Vilevile , mtuombee sisi pia ili Mungu atupe fursa ya kuuhubiri ujumbe wake kuhusu siri ya Kristo . Kwa ajili hiyo mimi niko sasa kifungoni .

text: That I may make it manifest , as I ought to speak .
text2: Basi , ombeni ili niweze kusema kama inavyonipasa na kwa namna itakayodhihirisha siri hiyo .

text: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without , redeeming the time .
text2: Muwe na hekima katika uhusiano wenu na watu wasioamini , mkitumia vizuri kila nafasi mliyo nayo .

text: Let your speech be alway with grace , seasoned with salt , that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man .
text2: Mazungumzo yenu yanapaswa kuwa daima mema na ya kuvutia , na mnapaswa kujua jinsi ya kumjibu vizuri kila mmoja .

text: All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you , who is a beloved brother , and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord :
text2: Ndugu yetu mpenzi Tukiko , mfanyakazi mwaminifu na mtumishi mwenzetu katika kazi ya Bwana , atawapeni habari zangu zote .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that he might know your estate , and comfort your hearts ;
text2: Ndiyo maana namtuma , ili aichangamshe mioyo yenu kwa kuwaambieni habari zetu .

text: With Onesimus , a faithful and beloved brother , who is one of you . They shall make known unto you all things which are done here .
text2: Anakuja pamoja na Onesimo , ndugu yetu mpenzi na mwaminifu , ambaye ni mwananchi mwenzenu . Watawapeni habari za mambo yote yanayofanyika hapa .

text: Aristarchus my fellowprisoner saluteth you , and Marcus , sister ' s son to Barnabas , ( touching whom ye received commandments : if he come unto you , receive him ; )
text2: Aristarko , ambaye yuko kifungoni pamoja nami , anawasalimuni ; hali kadhalika Marko , binamu yake Barnaba , ( mmekwisha pata maagizo juu yake ; akifika kwenu mkaribisheni ) .

text: And Jesus , which is called Justus , who are of the circumcision . These only are my fellowworkers unto the kingdom of God , which have been a comfort unto me .
text2: Naye Yoshua aitwaye Yusto , anawasalimuni . Miongoni mwa Wayahudi waliokwisha pokea imani , hawa tu peke yao , ndio wanaofanya kazi pamoja nami kwa ajili ya Utawala wa Mungu ; nao wamekuwa msaada mkubwa kwangu .

text: Epaphras , who is one of you , a servant of Christ , saluteth you , always labouring fervently for you in prayers , that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God .
text2: Epafra , mwananchi mwenzenu na mtumishi wa Kristo Yesu anawasalimuni . Daima anawaombeeni ninyi kwa bidii ili mpate kusimama imara , mkomae na kuwa thabiti kabisa katika mambo yote anayotaka Mungu .

text: For I bear him record , that he hath a great zeal for you , and them that are in Laodicea , and them in Hierapolis .
text2: Naweza kushuhudia kwamba anafanya kazi kwa bidii kwa ajili yenu na kwa ajili ya watu wa Laodikea na Hierapoli .

text: Luke , the beloved physician , and Demas , greet you .
text2: Luka , daktari wetu mpenzi , na Dema , wanawasalimuni .

text: Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea , and Nymphas , and the church which is in his house .
text2: Salamu zetu kwa ndugu zetu wa Laodikea ; msalimuni dada Nimfa pamoja na jumuiya yote ya waumini inayokutana nyumbani kwake .

text: And when this epistle is read among you , cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans ; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea .
text2: Mkisha soma barua hii , hakikisheni kwamba inasomwa na Wakristo wa Laodikea ; na ninyi fanyeni mpango mpate kuisoma barua waliyoipata kwao .

text: And say to Archippus , Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord , that thou fulfil it .
text2: Mwambieni Arkipo aitekeleze vizuri ile huduma aliyokabidhiwa na Bwana .

text: The salutation by the hand of me Paul . Remember my bonds . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: Naandika haya kwa mkono wangu mwenyewe : Salamu kutoka kwangu , mimi Paulo . Kumbukeni kwamba niko kifungoni . Neema ya Mungu iwe nanyi .

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians which is in God the Father and in the Lord Jesus Christ : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Mimi Paulo , Silwano na Timotheo tunawaandikia ninyi jumuiya ya kanisa la Thesalonike , ambao ni watu wake Mungu Baba , na wa Bwana Yesu Kristo .

text: We give thanks to God always for you all , making mention of you in our prayers ;
text2: Tunamshukuru Mungu daima kwa ajili yenu ninyi nyote na kuwakumbukeni daima katika sala zetu .

text: Remembering without ceasing your work of faith , and labour of love , and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ , in the sight of God and our Father ;
text2: Maana , mbele ya Mungu Baba yetu , twakumbuka jinsi mnavyoonyesha imani yenu kwa matendo , jinsi upendo wenu unavyowawezesha kufanya kazi kwa bidii , na jinsi tumaini lenu katika Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo lilivyo thabiti .

text: Knowing , brethren beloved , your election of God .
text2: Ndugu , twajua kwamba Mungu anawapenda na kwamba amewateua muwe watu wake ,

text: For our gospel came not unto you in word only , but also in power , and in the Holy Ghost , and in much assurance ; as ye know what manner of men we were among you for your sake .
text2: maana wakati tulipowahubirieni ile Habari Njema haikuwa kwa maneno tu , bali pia kwa nguvu na kwa Roho Mtakatifu , tukiwa na hakika kwamba ujumbe huo ulikuwa wa kweli . Mnajua jinsi tulivyoishi pamoja nanyi ; tuliishi kwa manufaa yenu .

text: And ye became followers of us , and of the Lord , having received the word in much affliction , with joy of the Holy Ghost :
text2: Ninyi mlifuata mfano wetu , na kumwiga Bwana . Ingawa mliteswa sana , mliupokea ujumbe huo kwa furaha itokayo kwa Roho Mtakatifu .

text: So that ye were ensamples to all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia .
text2: Kwa hiyo ninyi mmekuwa mfano mzuri kwa waumini wote wa Makedonia na Akaya .

text: For from you sounded out the word of the Lord not only in Macedonia and Achaia , but also in every place your faith to God - ward is spread abroad ; so that we need not to speak any thing .
text2: Maana , kutokana na bidii yenu ujumbe wa Bwana umesikika si tu huko Makedonia na Akaya , bali imani yenu kwa Mungu imeenea popote . Tena hatuhitaji kusema zaidi .

text: For they themselves shew of us what manner of entering in we had unto you , and how ye turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God ;
text2: Watu hao wanazungumza juu ya ziara yetu kwenu : jinsi mlivyotukaribisha , jinsi mlivyoziacha sanamu mkamgeukia Mungu aliye hai na wa kweli ,

text: And to wait for his Son from heaven , whom he raised from the dead , even Jesus , which delivered us from the wrath to come .
text2: na sasa mwamngojea Mwanae ashuke kutoka mbinguni , Yesu , ambaye Mungu alimfufua kutoka wafu , na ambaye anatuokoa katika ghadhabu ya Mungu inayokuja .

text: For yourselves , brethren , know our entrance in unto you , that it was not in vain :
text2: Ndugu , ninyi wenyewe mnafahamu kwamba ziara yetu kwenu haikuwa bure .

text: But even after that we had suffered before , and were shamefully entreated , as ye know , at Philippi , we were bold in our God to speak unto you the gospel of God with much contention .
text2: Mnajua jinsi tulivyodhulumiwa na kutukanwa kule Filipi kabla ya kufika kwenu Thesalonike . Ingawa kulikuwa na upinzani mwingi , Mungu wetu alitujalia uhodari wa kuwahubirieni Habari Njema yake .

text: For our exhortation was not of deceit , nor of uncleanness , nor in guile :
text2: Jambo tunalosisitiza kwenu si jambo linalotegemea uongo au nia mbaya ; wala hatupendi kumdanganya mtu yeyote .

text: But as we were allowed of God to be put in trust with the gospel , even so we speak ; not as pleasing men , but God , which trieth our hearts .
text2: Sisi twanena daima kama atakavyo Mungu kwani yeye alituona kwamba tunafaa , akatukabidhi hii Habari Njema . Si nia yetu kuwapendeza watu hata kidogo , bali twataka kumpendeza Mungu ambaye anajua mioyo yetu mpaka ndani .

text: For neither at any time used we flattering words , as ye know , nor a cloke of covetousness ; God is witness :
text2: Ninyi mnajua kwamba sisi hatukuja kwenu na maneno matamu ya kubembeleza wala hatukutumia maneno ya kijanja ya kuficha ubinafsi fulani ; Mungu ni shahidi !

text: Nor of men sought we glory , neither of you , nor yet of others , when we might have been burdensome , as the apostles of Christ .
text2: Hatukutafuta sifa kutoka kwa watu , wala kutoka kwenu , wala kutoka kwa mtu yeyote ,

text: But we were gentle among you , even as a nurse cherisheth her children :
text2: ingawa sisi tukiwa mitume wa Kristo , tungeweza kudai mambo fulani kwenu . Lakini sisi tulikuwa Wapole kati yenu kama alivyo mama kwa watoto wake .

text: So being affectionately desirous of you , we were willing to have imparted unto you , not the gospel of God only , but also our own souls , because ye were dear unto us .
text2: Tuliwapenda ninyi sana hata tukawa tayari kuwashirikisha si tu Habari Njema ya Mungu , bali pia na maisha yetu . Ndivyo mlivyokuwa wapenzi wetu !

text: For ye remember , brethren , our labour and travail : for labouring night and day , because we would not be chargeable unto any of you , we preached unto you the gospel of God .
text2: Ndugu , mnakumbuka jinsi tulivyofanya kazi na kutaabika . Tulipowaleteeni Habari Njema ya Mungu tulifanya kazi mchana na usiku kusudi tusiwe mzigo kwa mtu yeyote miongoni mwenu .

text: Ye are witnesses , and God also , how holily and justly and unblameably we behaved ourselves among you that believe :
text2: Ninyi mnaweza kushuhudia , na Mungu pia ni shahidi , jinsi mwenendo wetu kati yenu ninyi mnaoamini ulivyokuwa mzuri , mwadilifu na usio na lawama .

text: As ye know how we exhorted and comforted and charged every one of you , as a father doth his children ,
text2: Mnajua kwamba sisi tulimtendea kila mmoja wenu kama vile baba anavyowatendea watoto wake mwenyewe .

text: That ye would walk worthy of God , who hath called you unto his kingdom and glory .
text2: Tuliwapeni moyo , tuliwafarijini na kuwahimiza ili mpate kuishi maisha yampendezayo Mungu ambaye aliwaiteni mshiriki Utawala na utukufu wake .

text: For this cause also thank we God without ceasing , because , when ye received the word of God which ye heard of us , ye received it not as the word of men , but as it is in truth , the word of God , which effectually worketh also in you that believe .
text2: Tena tunayo sababu nyingine ya kumshukuru Mungu : tulipowaleteeni ujumbe wa Mungu , ninyi mliusikia mkaupokea , si kama vile ujumbe wa binadamu , bali kama ujumbe wa Mungu , na kweli ndivyo ulivyo . Maana Mungu anafanya kazi ndani yenu ninyi mnaoamini .

text: For ye , brethren , became followers of the churches of God which in Judaea are in Christ Jesus : for ye also have suffered like things of your own countrymen , even as they have of the Jews :
text2: Ndugu , ninyi mmepatwa na mambo yaleyale yaliyoyapata makanisa ya Mungu kule Yudea , mambo yaliyowapata watu walio wake Kristo Yesu . Ninyi mlidhulumiwa na wananchi wenzenu kama vile wao walivyodhulumiwa na wenzao Wayahudi ,

text: Who both killed the Lord Jesus , and their own prophets , and have persecuted us ; and they please not God , and are contrary to all men :
text2: ambao walimuua Bwana Yesu na manabii , wakatutesa na sisi pia . Watu hao wanamchukiza Mungu , tena ni adui za kila mtu !

text: Forbidding us to speak to the Gentiles that they might be saved , to fill up their sins alway : for the wrath is come upon them to the uttermost .
text2: Hata walijaribu kutuzuia kuwahubiria watu wa mataifa mengine ujumbe utakaowaletea wokovu . Ndivyo walivyokamilisha orodha ya dhambi zote walizotenda siku zote . Lakini sasa hasira ya Mungu imewaangukia .

text: But we , brethren , being taken from you for a short time in presence , not in heart , endeavoured the more abundantly to see your face with great desire .
text2: Ndugu , kuachana kwetu nanyi kulikuwa kwa muda tu , tena kuachana huko kulikuwa kwa mwili tu na si kwa roho . Kitambo kifupi baadaye , tulishikwa na hamu kubwa ya kuwaoneni tena !

text: Wherefore we would have come unto you , even I Paul , once and again ; but Satan hindered us .
text2: Kwa hiyo tuliamua kuwatembeleeni tena . Nami , Paulo , nilijaribu kuja kwenu zaidi ya mara moja , lakini Shetani alituzuia .

text: For what is our hope , or joy , or crown of rejoicing ? Are not even ye in the presence of our Lord Jesus Christ at his coming ?
text2: Je , tutakaposimama mbele ya Bwana Yesu wakati atakapokuja , fahari ya ushindi wetu itakuwa nini ? Itakuwa ni ninyi wenyewe ; ninyi ndio tumaini letu na furaha yetu .

text: For ye are our glory and joy .
text2: Naam , ninyi ni utukufu wetu na furaha yetu !

text: Wherefore when we could no longer forbear , we thought it good to be left at Athens alone ;
text2: Mwishowe hatukuweza kuvumilia zaidi . Basi , tuliamua kubaki kule Athene peke yetu ,

text: And sent Timotheus , our brother , and minister of God , and our fellowlabourer in the gospel of Christ , to establish you , and to comfort you concerning your faith :
text2: na kumtuma kwenu ndugu yetu Timotheo , ambaye ni mfanyakazi mwenzetu kwa ajili ya Mungu katika kuhubiri Habari Njema ya Kristo . Tulimtuma ili awaimarisheni na kuwafarijini ,

text: That no man should be moved by these afflictions : for yourselves know that we are appointed thereunto .
text2: kusudi imani ya mtu yeyote miongoni mwenu isije ikafifia kwa sababu ya taabu hizo . Ninyi mnajua kwamba tunapaswa kupata mateso .

text: For verily , when we were with you , we told you before that we should suffer tribulation ; even as it came to pass , and ye know .
text2: Maana , tulipokuwa pamoja nanyi , tuliwaambieni kwamba tutateswa ; na kama mjuavyo ndivyo ilivyotukia .

text: For this cause , when I could no longer forbear , I sent to know your faith , lest by some means the tempter have tempted you , and our labour be in vain .
text2: Ndio maana nilimtuma Timotheo kwenu . Sikuweza kungoja zaidi , na hivyo nilimtuma nipate habari za imani yenu . Isije ikawa labda Mshawishi aliwajaribuni na kazi yote tuliyofanya miongoni mwenu imepotea bure !

text: But now when Timotheus came from you unto us , and brought us good tidings of your faith and charity , and that ye have good remembrance of us always , desiring greatly to see us , as we also to see you :
text2: Sasa Timotheo amekwisha rudi , naye ametupa habari za kufurahisha kuhusu imani na upendo wenu . Ametuarifu kwamba mnatukumbuka daima , na kwamba mna hamu ya kutuona sisi kama nasi tulivyo na hamu ya kuwaoneni .

text: Therefore , brethren , we were comforted over you in all our affliction and distress by your faith :
text2: Basi , habari za imani yenu zimetutia moyo katika taabu na mateso yetu yote ,

text: For now we live , if ye stand fast in the Lord .
text2: kwani sasa tunaishi kweli ikiwa ninyi mnasimama imara katika kuungana na Bwana .

text: For what thanks can we render to God again for you , for all the joy wherewith we joy for your sakes before our God ;
text2: Sasa twaweza kumshukuru Mungu wetu kwa ajili yenu . Tunamshukuru kwa furaha tuliyo nayo mbele yake kwa sababu yenu .

text: Night and day praying exceedingly that we might see your face , and might perfect that which is lacking in your faith ?
text2: Tunazidi kumwomba Mungu usiku na mchana kwa moyo wetu wote ili atupatie fursa ya kuwaoneni uso kwa uso ili tuweze kurekebisha chochote kilichopungua katika imani yenu .

text: Now God himself and our Father , and our Lord Jesus Christ , direct our way unto you .
text2: Tunamwomba Mungu , Baba yetu mwenyewe , na Bwana wetu Yesu atutayarishie njia ya kuja kwenu .

text: And the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another , and toward all men , even as we do toward you :
text2: Bwana awawezeshe ninyi kupendana na kuwapenda watu wote zaidi na zaidi , kama vile sisi tunavyowapenda ninyi .

text: To the end he may stablish your hearts unblameable in holiness before God , even our Father , at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ with all his saints .
text2: Hivyo ataiimarisha mioyo yenu , nanyi mtakuwa wakamilifu na watakatifu mbele ya Mungu na Baba yetu wakati Bwana wetu Yesu atakapokuja pamoja na wote walio wake .

text: Furthermore then we beseech you , brethren , and exhort you by the Lord Jesus , that as ye have received of us how ye ought to walk and to please God , so ye would abound more and more .
text2: Hatimaye , ndugu zangu , mmejifunza kutoka kwetu namna mnavyopaswa kuishi ili kumpendeza Mungu . Na kweli mmekuwa mnaishi hivyo . Sasa tunawaombeni na kuwasihi kwa jina la Bwana Yesu mfanye vema zaidi .

text: For ye know what commandments we gave you by the Lord Jesus .
text2: Maana mnayajua yale maagizo tuliyowapeni kwa mamlaka ya Bwana Yesu .

text: For this is the will of God , even your sanctification , that ye should abstain from fornication :
text2: Mungu anataka ninyi muwe watakatifu na mjiepushe kabisa na maisha ya zinaa .

text: That every one of you should know how to possess his vessel in sanctification and honour ;
text2: Kila mwanamume anapaswa kujua namna ya kuishi na mkewe kwa utakatifu na heshima ,

text: Not in the lust of concupiscence , even as the Gentiles which know not God :
text2: na si kwa tamaa mbaya kama watu wa mataifa mengine wasiomjua Mungu .

text: That no man go beyond and defraud his brother in any matter : because that the Lord is the avenger of all such , as we also have forewarned you and testified .
text2: Basi , mtu yeyote asimkosee au kumpunja mwenzake kuhusu jambo hili . Tulikwisha waambieni hayo na kuwaonya kwamba Bwana atawaadhibu wanaofanya mambo hayo .

text: For God hath not called us unto uncleanness , but unto holiness .
text2: Mungu hakutuita tuishi maisha ya zinaa , bali tuishi katika utakatifu .

text: He therefore that despiseth , despiseth not man , but God , who hath also given unto us his holy Spirit .
text2: Kwa hiyo basi , anayedharau mafundisho hayo hamdharau mtu , bali amdharau Mungu mwenyewe anayewapeni Roho wake Mtakatifu .

text: But as touching brotherly love ye need not that I write unto you : for ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another .
text2: Hakuna haja ya kuwaandikieni juu ya kuwapenda ndugu zenu waumini . Ninyi wenyewe mmefundishwa na Mungu namna mnavyopaswa kupendana .

text: And indeed ye do it toward all the brethren which are in all Macedonia : but we beseech you , brethren , that ye increase more and more ;
text2: Na mmekuwa mkiwatendea hivyo ndugu zenu wote kila mahali katika Makedonia . Basi , ndugu tunawaombeni mfanye hata zaidi .

text: And that ye study to be quiet , and to do your own business , and to work with your own hands , as we commanded you ;
text2: Muwe na nia ya kuishi maisha ya utulivu , kila mmoja ashughulikie mambo yake mwenyewe na afanye kazi kwa mikono yake mwenyewe kama tulivyowaagiza pale awali .

text: That ye may walk honestly toward them that are without , and that ye may have lack of nothing .
text2: Kwa namna hiyo mtajipatia sifa nzuri kutoka kwa wale wasio Wakristo , na hamtakuwa na lazima ya kuwategemea wengine kwa mahitaji yenu .

text: But I would not have you to be ignorant , brethren , concerning them which are asleep , that ye sorrow not , even as others which have no hope .
text2: Ndugu , twataka mjue ukweli kuhusu wale ambao wamekwisha fariki dunia , ili msipatwe na huzuni kama watu wengine wasio na matumaini .

text: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again , even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him .
text2: Sisi tunaamini kwamba Yesu alikufa , akafufuka ; na hivyo sisi tunaamini kwamba Mungu atawaleta pamoja na Yesu wale wote waliofariki wakiwa wanamwamini .

text: For this we say unto you by the word of the Lord , that we which are alive and remain unto the coming of the Lord shall not prevent them which are asleep .
text2: Hili tunalowaambieni ni fundisho la Bwana ; sisi tulio hai , ambao tutakuwa tumebaki , wakati Bwana atakapokuja , hakika hatutawatangulia wale waliokwisha fariki dunia .

text: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout , with the voice of the archangel , and with the trump of God : and the dead in Christ shall rise first :
text2: Maana patatolewa amri , sauti ya malaika mkuu , sauti ya tarumbeta ya Mungu , naye Bwana mwenyewe atashuka kutoka mbinguni . Ndipo wale waliokufa wakiwa wanamwamini Kristo watafufuliwa kwanza .

text: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds , to meet the Lord in the air : and so shall we ever be with the Lord .
text2: Kisha sisi tulio hai wakati huo tutakusanywa pamoja nao katika mawingu kumlaki Bwana hewani . Na hivyo tutakuwa daima pamoja na Bwana .

text: Wherefore comfort one another with these words .
text2: Basi , farijianeni kwa maneno haya .

text: But of the times and the seasons , brethren , ye have no need that I write unto you .
text2: Ndugu , hakuna haja ya kuwaandikieni juu ya nyakati na majira yatakapotukia mambo haya .

text: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night .
text2: Maana ninyi wenyewe mwajua kwamba Siku ya Bwana itakuja kama mwizi ajavyo usiku .

text: For when they shall say , Peace and safety ; then sudden destruction cometh upon them , as travail upon a woman with child ; and they shall not escape .
text2: Watu watakapokuwa wanasema : " Kila kitu ni shwari na salama " ndipo uharibifu utakapowaangukia ghafla ! Mambo hayo yatatukia ghafla kama uchungu wa uzazi unavyomjia mama anayejifungua , wala watu hawataweza kuepukana nayo .

text: But ye , brethren , are not in darkness , that that day should overtake you as a thief .
text2: Lakini ninyi ndugu , hamko gizani , na siku hiyo haipaswi kuwajieni ghafla kama vile mwizi .

text: Ye are all the children of light , and the children of the day : we are not of the night , nor of darkness .
text2: Ninyi nyote ni watu mnaoishi katika mwanga , watu wa mchana . Sisi si watu wa usiku , wala wa giza .

text: Therefore let us not sleep , as do others ; but let us watch and be sober .
text2: Basi , tusilale usingizi kama wengine ; tunapaswa kukesha na kuwa na kiasi .

text: For they that sleep sleep in the night ; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night .
text2: Wanaolala hulala usiku , na walevi hulewa usiku .

text: But let us , who are of the day , be sober , putting on the breastplate of faith and love ; and for an helmet , the hope of salvation .
text2: Lakini sisi ni watu wa mchana na tunapaswa kuwa na kiasi . Tunapaswa kuvaa imani na upendo kama vazi la kujikinga kifuani , na tumaini letu la wokovu kama kofia ya chuma .

text: For God hath not appointed us to wrath , but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Maana Mungu hakututeua ili tuangamizwe na ghadhabu yake , bali tuupate wokovu kwa njia ya Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo ,

text: Who died for us , that , whether we wake or sleep , we should live together with him .
text2: ambaye alikufa kwa ajili yetu , ili tuishi pamoja naye , iwe tu hai au tumekufa .

text: Wherefore comfort yourselves together , and edify one another , even as also ye do .
text2: Kwa hiyo farijianeni na kusaidiana ninyi kwa ninyi kama mnavyofanya sasa .

text: And we beseech you , brethren , to know them which labour among you , and are over you in the Lord , and admonish you ;
text2: Ndugu , tunawaombeni muwastahi wale wanaofanya kazi kati yenu , wale wanaowaongoza na kuwafundisheni kuhusu maisha ya Kikristo .

text: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work ' s sake . And be at peace among yourselves .
text2: Wapeni heshima kubwa na kuwapenda kwa sababu ya kazi wanayofanya . Muwe na amani kati yenu .

text: Now we exhort you , brethren , warn them that are unruly , comfort the feebleminded , support the weak , be patient toward all men .
text2: Ndugu , tunawahimizeni muwaonye watu walio wavivu , muwatie moyo watu wanyonge , muwasaidie watu dhaifu , muwe na subira kwa wote .

text: See that none render evil for evil unto any man ; but ever follow that which is good , both among yourselves , and to all men .
text2: Angalieni mtu yeyote asimlipe mwingine maovu kwa maovu , ila nia yenu iwe kutendeana mema daima na kuwatendea mema watu wote .

text: Rejoice evermore .
text2: Furahini daima ,

text: Pray without ceasing .
text2: salini kila wakati

text: In every thing give thanks : for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you .
text2: na muwe na shukrani katika kila hali . Hayo ndiyo anayotaka Mungu kwenu katika kuungana kwenu na Kristo Yesu .

text: Quench not the Spirit .
text2: Msimpinge Roho Mtakatifu ;

text: Despise not prophesyings .
text2: msidharau unabii .

text: Prove all things ; hold fast that which is good .
text2: Pimeni kila kitu : zingatieni kilicho chema ,

text: Abstain from all appearance of evil .
text2: na epukeni kila aina ya uovu .

text: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly ; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Mungu anayetupatia amani awafanye ninyi watakatifu kwa kila namna na kuzilinda nafsi zenu - - roho , mioyo na miili yenu - - mbali na hatia yoyote wakati wa kuja kwake Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo .

text: Faithful is he that calleth you , who also will do it .
text2: Yeye anayewaita ninyi atafanya hivyo kwani ni mwaminifu .

text: Brethren , pray for us .
text2: Ndugu , tuombeeni na sisi pia .

text: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss .
text2: Wasalimuni ndugu wote kwa ishara ya upendo .

text: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren .
text2: Nawahimizeni kwa jina la Bwana muwasomee ndugu zetu wote barua hii .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you . Amen .
text2: Tunawatakieni neema ya Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo .

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Mimi Paulo , Silwano na Timotheo tunawaandikia ninyi jumuiya ya kanisa la Thesalonike , ambao ni watu wake Mungu Baba yetu na wa Bwana Yesu Kristo .

text: Grace unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Tunawatakieni neema na amani kutoka kwa Mungu Baba yetu na kwa Bwana Yesu Kristo .

text: We are bound to thank God always for you , brethren , as it is meet , because that your faith groweth exceedingly , and the charity of every one of you all toward each other aboundeth ;
text2: Ndugu , tunapaswa kushukuru Mungu daima kwa ajili yenu . Inafaa kwetu kufanya hivyo kwani imani yenu inakua sana na kupendana kwenu kunaongezeka sana .

text: So that we ourselves glory in you in the churches of God for your patience and faith in all your persecutions and tribulations that ye endure :
text2: Ndio maana sisi tunajivunia ninyi katika makanisa ya Mungu . Tunaona fahari juu ya jinsi mnavyoendelea kuamini na kustahimili katika udhalimu wote na mateso mnayopata .

text: Which is a manifest token of the righteous judgment of God , that ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God , for which ye also suffer :
text2: Hayo yote yanathibitisha kwamba hukumu ya Mungu ni ya haki , na matokeo yake ninyi mtastahili Utawala wake ambao kwa ajili yake mnateseka .

text: Seeing it is a righteous thing with God to recompense tribulation to them that trouble you ;
text2: Mungu atafanya jambo la haki : atawalipa mateso wale wanaowatesa ninyi ,

text: And to you who are troubled rest with us , when the Lord Jesus shall be revealed from heaven with his mighty angels ,
text2: na kuwapeni nafuu ninyi mnaoteseka , na sisi pia . Atafanya jambo hilo wakati Bwana atakapotokea kutoka mbinguni pamoja na malaika wake na wakuu

text: In flaming fire taking vengeance on them that know not God , and that obey not the gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: na miali ya moto , kuwaadhibu wale wanaomkataa Mungu na wale wasiotii Habari Njema ya Bwana wetu Yesu .

text: Who shall be punished with everlasting destruction from the presence of the Lord , and from the glory of his power ;
text2: Adhabu yao itakuwa kuangamizwa milele na kutengwa mbali na utukufu wake mkuu ,

text: When he shall come to be glorified in his saints , and to be admired in all them that believe ( because our testimony among you was believed ) in that day .
text2: wakati atakapokuja Siku ile kupokea utukufu kutoka kwa watu wake na heshima kutoka kwa wote wanaoamini . Ninyi pia mtakuwa miongoni mwao , kwani mmeuamini ule ujumbe tuliowaletea .

text: Wherefore also we pray always for you , that our God would count you worthy of this calling , and fulfil all the good pleasure of his goodness , and the work of faith with power :
text2: Ndiyo maana tunawaombeeni daima . Tunamwomba Mungu wetu awawezeshe muyastahili maisha aliyowaitia myaishi . Tunamwomba , kwa uwezo wake , atimize nia yenu ya kutenda mema na kukamilisha kazi yenu ya imani .

text: That the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in you , and ye in him , according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Kwa namna hiyo , jina la Bwana wetu Yesu litapata utukufu kutoka kwenu , nanyi mtapata utukufu kutoka kwake kwa neema ya Mungu wetu na ya Bwana Yesu Kristo .

text: Now we beseech you , brethren , by the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , and by our gathering together unto him ,
text2: Sasa yahusu kuja kwake Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo na kukusanywa kwetu pamoja tukae naye . Ndugu , tunawaombeni sana

text: That ye be not soon shaken in mind , or be troubled , neither by spirit , nor by word , nor by letter as from us , as that the day of Christ is at hand .
text2: msifadhaike upesi moyoni , na wala msitiwe wasiwasi kwa sababu ya madai kwamba Siku ya Bwana imekwisha fika . Labda inadhaniwa kwamba jambo hili limetokana na uaguzi fulani , mahubiri au barua inayosemekana kuwa imetoka kwetu .

text: Let no man deceive you by any means : for that day shall not come , except there come a falling away first , and that man of sin be revealed , the son of perdition ;
text2: Msikubali kudanganywa na mtu yeyote kwa namna yoyote ile . Maana Siku hiyo haitakuja mpaka kwanza ule Uasi Mkuu utokee na yule Mwovu aonekane ambaye mwisho wake ni kuangamizwa kabisa .

text: Who opposeth and exalteth himself above all that is called God , or that is worshipped ; so that he as God sitteth in the temple of God , shewing himself that he is God .
text2: Yeye atapinga kila kitu wanachokiona watu kuwa ni mungu , au wanachokiabudu . Naam , hata ataingia na kuketi ndani ya Hekalu la Mungu akijidai kuwa Mungu .

text: Remember ye not , that , when I was yet with you , I told you these things ?
text2: Je , hamkumbuki kwamba niliwaambieni haya yote wakati nilipokuwa pamoja nanyi ?

text: And now ye know what withholdeth that he might be revealed in his time .
text2: Lakini kuna kitu kinachomzuia sasa , nanyi mwakijua kitu hicho . Basi , huyo Mwovu ataonekana wakati wake ufaao .

text: For the mystery of iniquity doth already work : only he who now letteth will let , until he be taken out of the way .
text2: Hata hivyo , Mwovu huyo aliyefichika anafanya kazi sasa , lakini hataonekana mpaka yule anayemzuia aondolewe .

text: And then shall that Wicked be revealed , whom the Lord shall consume with the spirit of his mouth , and shall destroy with the brightness of his coming :
text2: Hapo ndipo Mwovu atakapotokea ; lakini Bwana Yesu anapokuja atamuua kwa pumzi ya kinywa chake na kumwangamiza kwa mng ' ao wa kuja kwake .

text: Even him , whose coming is after the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders ,
text2: Huyo Mwovu atakuja na nguvu za Shetani na kufanya kila namna ya miujiza na maajabu ya uongo ,

text: And with all deceivableness of unrighteousness in them that perish ; because they received not the love of the truth , that they might be saved .
text2: na kutumia udanganyifu wa kila namna kwa wale walio katika mkumbo wa kupotea . Hao watapotea kwa sababu hawakuupokea na kuupenda ule ukweli ili waokolewe .

text: And for this cause God shall send them strong delusion , that they should believe a lie :
text2: Ndiyo maana Mungu amewaweka chini ya nguvu ya upotovu , wauamini uongo .

text: That they all might be damned who believed not the truth , but had pleasure in unrighteousness .
text2: Matokeo yake ni kwamba wote wasioamini ukweli , ila wafurahia dhambi , watahukumiwa .

text: But we are bound to give thanks alway to God for you , brethren beloved of the Lord , because God hath from the beginning chosen you to salvation through sanctification of the Spirit and belief of the truth :
text2: Tunapaswa kumshukuru Mungu daima kwa ajili yenu ninyi ndugu , ninyi mnaopendwa na Bwana , kwa maana Mungu amewateua tangu mwanzo mpate kuokolewa kwa nguvu ya Roho mfanywe watu wake watakatifu kwa imani yenu katika ukweli .

text: Whereunto he called you by our gospel , to the obtaining of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Mungu aliwaitieni jambo hili kwa njia ya Habari Njema tuliyowahubirieni ; aliwaiteni mpate kupokea sehemu yenu katika utukufu wa Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo .

text: Therefore , brethren , stand fast , and hold the traditions which ye have been taught , whether by word , or our epistle .
text2: Basi , ndugu , simameni imara na zingatieni yale mafundisho tuliyowafundisheni kwa mahubiri yetu na barua zetu .

text: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself , and God , even our Father , which hath loved us , and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace ,
text2: Tunamwomba Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo mwenyewe na Mungu Baba yetu ambaye alitupenda , na kwa neema yake akatujalia faraja ya milele na tumaini jema ,

text: Comfort your hearts , and stablish you in every good word and work .
text2: aifariji mioyo yenu na kuwaimarisheni ili mweze daima kutenda na kusema yaliyo mema .

text: Finally , brethren , pray for us , that the word of the Lord may have free course , and be glorified , even as it is with you :
text2: Hatimaye , ndugu , tuombeeni ili ujumbe wa Bwana uzidi kuenea upesi na kupokelewa kwa heshima kama vile ulivyo kati yenu .

text: And that we may be delivered from unreasonable and wicked men : for all men have not faith .
text2: Ombeni pia ili Mungu atuokoe na watu wapotovu na waovu , maana si wote wanaoamini ujumbe huu .

text: But the Lord is faithful , who shall stablish you , and keep you from evil .
text2: Lakini Bwana ni mwaminifu . Yeye atawaimarisheni na kuwalinda salama na yule Mwovu .

text: And we have confidence in the Lord touching you , that ye both do and will do the things which we command you .
text2: Naye Bwana anatupatia tumaini kubwa juu yenu , na hatuna shaka kwamba mnafanya na mtaendelea kufanya yale tuliyowaambieni .

text: And the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God , and into the patient waiting for Christ .
text2: Bwana aiongoze mioyo yenu katika upendo wa Mungu na katika uvumilivu tunaopewa na Kristo .

text: Now we command you , brethren , in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , that ye withdraw yourselves from every brother that walketh disorderly , and not after the tradition which he received of us .
text2: Ndugu , tunawaamuru kwa jina la Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo , mjiepushe na ndugu wote walio wavivu na ambao hawafuati maagizo tuliyowapa .

text: For yourselves know how ye ought to follow us : for we behaved not ourselves disorderly among you ;
text2: Ninyi wenyewe mnajua kwamba mnapaswa kufuata mfano wetu . Sisi tulipokuwa nanyi hatukuwa wavivu ;

text: Neither did we eat any man ' s bread for nought ; but wrought with labour and travail night and day , that we might not be chargeable to any of you :
text2: hatukula chakula kwa mtu yeyote bila ya kumlipa . Tulifanya kazi kwa bidii na taabu mchana na usiku ili tusiwe mzigo kwa mtu yeyote kati yenu .

text: Not because we have not power , but to make ourselves an ensample unto you to follow us .
text2: Tulifanya hivyo si kwa kuwa hatuna haki ya kutaka msaada wenu , ila kwa sababu tunataka kuwapeni mfano .

text: For even when we were with you , this we commanded you , that if any would not work , neither should he eat .
text2: Tulipokuwa pamoja nanyi tulikuwa tukiwaambieni , " Mtu asiyefanya kazi , asile . "

text: For we hear that there are some which walk among you disorderly , working not at all , but are busybodies .
text2: Tunasema mambo hayo kwa sababu tumesikia kwamba wako baadhi yenu ambao ni wavivu na ambao hawafanyi chochote , isipokuwa tu kujiingiza katika mambo ya watu wengine .

text: Now them that are such we command and exhort by our Lord Jesus Christ , that with quietness they work , and eat their own bread .
text2: Kwa jina la Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo tunawaamuru na kuwaonya watu hao wawe na nidhamu na kufanya kazi ili wajipatie maslahi yao wenyewe .

text: But ye , brethren , be not weary in well doing .
text2: Lakini ninyi ndugu , msichoke kutenda mema .

text: And if any man obey not our word by this epistle , note that man , and have no company with him , that he may be ashamed .
text2: Huenda kwamba huko kuna mtu ambaye hatautii huu ujumbe tunaowapelekeeni katika barua hii . Ikiwa hivyo , basi , mfichueni mtu huyo na msiwe na uhusiano wowote naye kusudi aone aibu .

text: Yet count him not as an enemy , but admonish him as a brother .
text2: Lakini msimtendee mtu huyo kama adui , bali mwonyeni kama ndugu .

text: Now the Lord of peace himself give you peace always by all means . The Lord be with you all .
text2: Bwana mwenyewe ndiye chanzo cha amani , awajalieni amani siku zote kwa kila namna . Bwana awe nanyi nyote .

text: The salutation of Paul with mine own hand , which is the token in every epistle : so I write .
text2: Kwa mkono wangu mwenyewe naandika hivi : Salamu kutoka kwa Paulo ! Hivi ndivyo ninavyotia sahihi kila barua ; ndivyo ninavyoandika .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Tunawatakieni nyote neema ya Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour , and Lord Jesus Christ , which is our hope ;
text2: Mimi Paulo , mtume wa Yesu Kristo kwa amri ya Mungu Mwokozi wetu na Yesu Kristo tumaini letu ,

text: Unto Timothy , my own son in the faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: nakuandikia Timotheo mwanangu halisi katika imani . Nakutakia neema , huruma na amani kutoka kwa Mungu Baba yetu na Kristo Yesu Bwana wetu .

text: As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus , when I went into Macedonia , that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine ,
text2: Napenda ukae huko Efeso , kama nilivyokuomba nilipokuwa ninakwenda Makedonia . Wako watu fulani huko wanaofundisha mafundisho ya uongo . Wakomeshe watu hao .

text: Neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies , which minister questions , rather than godly edifying which is in faith : so do .
text2: Waambie waachane na zile hadithi tupu na orodha ndefu za mababu , ambazo huleta tu ubishi , wala haviwajengi watu katika mpango ujulikanao kwa imani .

text: Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart , and of a good conscience , and of faith unfeigned :
text2: Shabaha ya amri hii ni kuhimiza mapendo yatokayo katika moyo safi , dhamiri njema , na imani ya kweli .

text: From which some having swerved have turned aside unto vain jangling ;
text2: Watu wengine wamepotoka na kugeukia majadiliano yasiyo na maana .

text: Desiring to be teachers of the law ; understanding neither what they say , nor whereof they affirm .
text2: Wanapenda kuwa walimu wa Sheria , lakini hawaelewi maneno yao wenyewe au mambo wanayosisitiza .

text: But we know that the law is good , if a man use it lawfully ;
text2: Twajua kwamba Sheria ni njema , kama ikitumiwa ipasavyo .

text: Knowing this , that the law is not made for a righteous man , but for the lawless and disobedient , for the ungodly and for sinners , for unholy and profane , for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers , for manslayers ,
text2: Lakini tunapaswa kukumbuka kwamba sheria haziwekwi kwa ajili ya watu wema , bali kwa ajili ya wahalifu na wasiotii , wasiomcha Mungu na wenye dhambi , watu wasio na dini na wa kidunia . Watu wanaowaua baba na mama zao , au wauaji wowote wale ;

text: For whoremongers , for them that defile themselves with mankind , for menstealers , for liars , for perjured persons , and if there be any other thing that is contrary to sound doctrine ;
text2: sheria imewekwa kwa ajili ya waasherati , wafiraji , wanaowaiba watu , waongo , na wanaoapa uongo au wanaofanya chochote ambacho ni kinyume cha mafundisho ya kweli .

text: According to the glorious gospel of the blessed God , which was committed to my trust .
text2: Mafundisho hayo hupatikana katika Habari Njema ambayo mimi nimekabidhiwa niihubiri , Habari Njema ya Mungu mtukufu na mwenye heri .

text: And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord , who hath enabled me , for that he counted me faithful , putting me into the ministry ;
text2: Namshukuru Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo aliyenipa nguvu kwa ajili ya kazi yangu . Namshukuru kwa kuniona mimi kuwa ni mwaminifu , akaniteua nimtumikie ,

text: Who was before a blasphemer , and a persecutor , and injurious : but I obtained mercy , because I did it ignorantly in unbelief .
text2: ingawa pale awali mimi nilimtukana na kumtesa na kumdhulumu . Lakini Mungu alinionea huruma , kwa sababu sikuwa na imani bado , na hivyo sikujua nilichokuwa ninafanya .

text: And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Lakini Bwana wetu alinijalia neema yake kwa wingi , akanipa imani na upendo katika kuungana na Kristo Yesu .

text: This is a faithful saying , and worthy of all acceptation , that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners ; of whom I am chief .
text2: Usemi huu ni wa kuaminika , na tena unafaa kukubaliwa kabisa : Kristo Yesu alikuja ulimwenguni kuwaokoa wenye dhambi . Nami ni mkosefu zaidi kuliko hao wote ,

text: Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy , that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering , for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting .
text2: lakini Mungu alinionea huruma , ili Kristo aonyeshe uvumilivu wake wote kwangu mimi , kama mfano kwa wale wote ambao baadaye watamwamini na kupokea uzima wa milele .

text: Now unto the King eternal , immortal , invisible , the only wise God , be honour and glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Kwake yeye aliye Mfalme wa milele na asiyekufa , yeye aliye Mungu pekee - - kwake viwe heshima na utukufu milele na milele ! Amina .

text: This charge I commit unto thee , son Timothy , according to the prophecies which went before on thee , that thou by them mightest war a good warfare ;
text2: Mwanangu Timotheo , nakukabidhi amri hii kufuatana na maneno ya unabii yaliyosemwa zamani juu yako . Yatumie maneno hayo yawe silaha yako katika kupigana vita vizuri ,

text: Holding faith , and a good conscience ; which some having put away concerning faith have made shipwreck :
text2: na ushike imani yako na dhamiri njema . Watu wengine hawakusikiliza dhamiri zao na hivyo wakaiharibu imani yao .

text: Of whom is Hymenaeus and Alexander ; whom I have delivered unto Satan , that they may learn not to blaspheme .
text2: Miongoni mwao ni Humenayo na Aleksanda ambao nimewakabidhi kwa Shetani , ili wafundishwe wasimtukane Mungu .

text: I exhort therefore , that , first of all , supplications , prayers , intercessions , and giving of thanks , be made for all men ;
text2: Kwanza kabisa , basi naomba dua , sala , maombi na sala za shukrani zitolewe kwa Mungu kwa ajili ya watu wote ,

text: For kings , and for all that are in authority ; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty .
text2: kwa ajili ya wafalme na wote wenye mamlaka , ili tupate kuishi maisha ya utulivu na amani pamoja na uchaji wa Mungu na mwenendo mwema .

text: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour ;
text2: Jambo hili ni jema na lampendeza Mungu Mwokozi wetu ,

text: Who will have all men to be saved , and to come unto the knowledge of the truth .
text2: ambaye anataka watu wote waokolewe na wapate kuujua ukweli .

text: For there is one God , and one mediator between God and men , the man Christ Jesus ;
text2: Maana yuko Mungu mmoja , na pia yuko mmoja anayewapatanisha watu na Mungu , binadamu Kristo Yesu ,

text: Who gave himself a ransom for all , to be testified in due time .
text2: ambaye alijitoa mwenyewe kuwakomboa watu wote . Huo ulikuwa uthibitisho , wakati ufaao ulipowadia .

text: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher , and an apostle , ( I speak the truth in Christ , and lie not ; ) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity .
text2: Kwa sababu hiyo mimi nilitumwa niwe mtume na mwalimu wa watu wa mataifa , niutangaze ujumbe wa imani na ukweli . Nasema ukweli ; sisemi uongo !

text: I will therefore that men pray every where , lifting up holy hands , without wrath and doubting .
text2: Basi , popote mnapokutana kufanya ibada nataka wanaume wasali , watu waliojitolea kweli na ambao wanaweza kuinua mikono yao wakisali bila hasira wala ubishi .

text: In like manner also , that women adorn themselves in modest apparel , with shamefacedness and sobriety ; not with broided hair , or gold , or pearls , or costly array ;
text2: Hali kadhalika , nawataka wanawake wawe wanyofu na wenye busara kuhusu mavazi yao ; wavae sawasawa na si kwa urembo wa mitindo ya kusuka nywele , kujipamba kwa dhahabu , lulu au mavazi ya gharama kubwa ,

text: But ( which becometh women professing godliness ) with good works .
text2: bali kwa matendo mema kama iwapasavyo wanawake wamchao Mungu .

text: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection .
text2: Wanawake wanapaswa kukaa kimya na kuwa wanyenyekevu wakati wa kujifunza .

text: But I suffer not a woman to teach , nor to usurp authority over the man , but to be in silence .
text2: Mimi simruhusu mwanamke amfundishe au amtawale mwanamume ; anapaswa kukaa kimya .

text: For Adam was first formed , then Eve .
text2: Maana Adamu aliumbwa kwanza , halafu Hawa .

text: And Adam was not deceived , but the woman being deceived was in the transgression .
text2: Na wala si Adamu aliyedanganywa ; bali mwanamke ndiye aliyedanganywa , akaivunja sheria ya Mungu .

text: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing , if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety .
text2: Hata hivyo , mwanamke ataokolewa kwa kupata watoto , kama akidumu katika imani , upendo , utakatifu na unyofu .

text: This is a true saying , If a man desire the office of a bishop , he desireth a good work .
text2: Msemo huu ni wa kweli : mtu akitaka kuwa kiongozi katika kanisa , huyo anatamani kazi nzuri .

text: A bishop then must be blameless , the husband of one wife , vigilant , sober , of good behaviour , given to hospitality , apt to teach ;
text2: Basi , kiongozi wa kanisa anapaswa awe mtu asiye na lawama ; anapaswa awe na mke mmoja tu , awe mwenye kiasi , nidhamu na utaratibu ; ni lazima awe mkarimu na anayeweza kufundisha ;

text: Not given to wine , no striker , not greedy of filthy lucre ; but patient , not a brawler , not covetous ;
text2: asiwe mlevi au mtu wa matata , bali awe mpole , apendaye amani ; asiwe mtu wa kupenda fedha ;

text: One that ruleth well his own house , having his children in subjection with all gravity ;
text2: anapaswa awe mtu awezaye kuongoza vema nyumba yake , na kuwafanya watoto wake wawe watii kwa heshima yote .

text: ( For if a man know not how to rule his own house , how shall he take care of the church of God ? )
text2: Maana kama mtu hawezi kuongoza vema nyumba yake , atawezaje kulitunza kanisa la Mungu ?

text: Not a novice , lest being lifted up with pride he fall into the condemnation of the devil .
text2: Mtu ambaye hajakomaa bado katika imani asifanywe kuwa kiongozi katika kanisa , asije akajaa majivuno na kuhukumiwa kama vile Ibilisi alivyohukumiwa .

text: Moreover he must have a good report of them which are without ; lest he fall into reproach and the snare of the devil .
text2: Anapaswa awe mwenye sifa njema kati ya watu walio nje ya kanisa , ili asije akalaumiwa na kuanguka katika mtego wa Ibilisi .

text: Likewise must the deacons be grave , not doubletongued , not given to much wine , not greedy of filthy lucre ;
text2: Wasaidizi katika kanisa wanapaswa pia kuwa watu wenye tabia njema na wanyofu ; wasiwe wanywaji mno wa divai au wenye tamaa ya fedha ;

text: Holding the mystery of the faith in a pure conscience .
text2: wanapaswa kuzingatia kwa dhamiri njema ukweli wa ndani wa imani .

text: And let these also first be proved ; then let them use the office of a deacon , being found blameless .
text2: Ni lazima kwanza wathibitishwe , na wakionekana kuwa wanafaa , basi , watoe huduma yao .

text: Even so must their wives be grave , not slanderers , sober , faithful in all things .
text2: Wake zao wanapaswa pia kuwa na tabia njema , wasiowasengenya watu , wenye kiasi na waaminifu katika mambo yote .

text: Let the deacons be the husbands of one wife , ruling their children and their own houses well .
text2: Msaidizi katika kanisa lazima awe na mke moja tu , na awezaye kuongoza vema watoto wake na nyumba yake .

text: For they that have used the office of a deacon well purchase to themselves a good degree , and great boldness in the faith which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Maana wasaidizi wanaofanya kazi yao vizuri hujipatia msimamo mzuri , na wanaweza kusema bila hofu juu ya imani yao katika Kristo Yesu .

text: These things write I unto thee , hoping to come unto thee shortly :
text2: Ninakuandikia barua hii nikiwa na matumaini ya kuja kwako hivi karibuni .

text: But if I tarry long , that thou mayest know how thou oughtest to behave thyself in the house of God , which is the church of the living God , the pillar and ground of the truth .
text2: Lakini kama nikicheleweshwa , basi , barua hii itakufahamisha mwenendo tunaopaswa kuwa nao katika nyumba ya Mungu , ambayo ni kanisa la Mungu aliye hai , na ambalo ni nguzo na msingi wa ukweli .

text: And without controversy great is the mystery of godliness : God was manifest in the flesh , justified in the Spirit , seen of angels , preached unto the Gentiles , believed on in the world , received up into glory .
text2: Hakuna mashaka yoyote juu ya ukuu wa siri ya dini yetu : Alionekana katika umbo la kibinadamu alithibitishwa na Roho kuwa ni mwadilifu , akaonekana na malaika . Alihubiriwa kati ya mataifa , aliaminiwa popote ulimwenguni , akachukuliwa juu mbinguni katika utukufu .

text: Now the Spirit speaketh expressly , that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith , giving heed to seducing spirits , and doctrines of devils ;
text2: Roho asema waziwazi kwamba siku za baadaye watu wengine wataitupilia mbali imani ; watazitii roho danganyifu na kufuata mafundisho ya pepo .

text: Speaking lies in hypocrisy ; having their conscience seared with a hot iron ;
text2: Mafundisho ya namna hiyo yanaenezwa na watu waongo wadanganyifu , ambao dhamiri zao ziko kama zimechomwa kwa chuma cha moto .

text: Forbidding to marry , and commanding to abstain from meats , which God hath created to be received with thanksgiving of them which believe and know the truth .
text2: Watu hao hufundisha kwamba ni makosa kuona na pia kula vyakula fulani . Lakini Mungu aliviumba vyakula hivyo , ili wale walio waumini na ambao wanapata kuujua ukweli , wavitumie kwa shukrani .

text: For every creature of God is good , and nothing to be refused , if it be received with thanksgiving :
text2: Kila kitu alichoumba Mungu ni chema , wala hakuna kinachohitaji kukataliwa , bali vyote vipokelewe kwa sala ya shukrani ,

text: For it is sanctified by the word of God and prayer .
text2: kwa sababu neno la Mungu na sala hukifanya kitu hicho kikubalike kwa Mungu .

text: If thou put the brethren in remembrance of these things , thou shalt be a good minister of Jesus Christ , nourished up in the words of faith and of good doctrine , whereunto thou hast attained .
text2: Kama ukiwapa ndugu wote maagizo haya , utakuwa mtumishi mwema wa Kristo Yesu , ukijiendeleza kiroho kwa maneno ya imani na mafundisho ya kweli , ambayo wewe umeyafuata .

text: But refuse profane and old wives ' fables , and exercise thyself rather unto godliness .
text2: Lakini achana na hadithi zile zisizo za kidini na ambazo hazina maana . Jizoeshe kuishi maisha ya uchaji wa Mungu .

text: For bodily exercise profiteth little : but godliness is profitable unto all things , having promise of the life that now is , and of that which is to come .
text2: Mazoezi ya mwili yana faida yake , lakini mazoezi ya kiroho yana faida za kila namna , maana yanatuahidia uzima katika maisha ya sasa , na pia hayo yanayokuja .

text: This is a faithful saying and worthy of all acceptation .
text2: Usemi huo ni wa kusadikika kabisa na unastahili kukubaliwa .

text: For therefore we both labour and suffer reproach , because we trust in the living God , who is the Saviour of all men , specially of those that believe .
text2: Sisi tunajitahidi na kufanya kazi kwa bidii kwani tumemwekea tumaini letu Mungu aliye hai ambaye ni Mwokozi wa watu wote , na hasa wale wanaoamini .

text: These things command and teach .
text2: Wape maagizo hayo na mafundisho hayo .

text: Let no man despise thy youth ; but be thou an example of the believers , in word , in conversation , in charity , in spirit , in faith , in purity .
text2: Usikubali mtu yeyote akudharau kwa sababu wewe ni kijana , lakini jitahidi uwe mfano kwa wanaoamini : katika usemi wako , mwenendo wako , upendo , imani na maisha safi .

text: Till I come , give attendance to reading , to exhortation , to doctrine .
text2: Tumia wakati wako na juhudi yako katika kusoma hadharani Maandiko Matakatifu , kuhubiri na kufundisha , mpaka nitakapokuja .

text: Neglect not the gift that is in thee , which was given thee by prophecy , with the laying on of the hands of the presbytery .
text2: Usiache kukitumia kile kipaji cha Kristo ndani yako ulichopewa kwa maneno ya manabii na kwa kuwekewa mikono na wazee .

text: Meditate upon these things ; give thyself wholly to them ; that thy profiting may appear to all .
text2: Fikiri kwa makini juu ya hayo yote na kuyatekeleza kusudi maendeleo yako yaonekane na wote .

text: Take heed unto thyself , and unto the doctrine ; continue in them : for in doing this thou shalt both save thyself , and them that hear thee .
text2: Angalia sana mambo yako mwenyewe , na mafundisho yako . Endelea kufanya hayo maana ukifanya hivyo utajiokoa mwenyewe na wale wanaokusikiliza .

text: Rebuke not an elder , but intreat him as a father ; and the younger men as brethren ;
text2: Usimkemee mtu mzee , bali msihi kama vile angekuwa baba yako . Watendee vijana kama ndugu zako ,

text: The elder women as mothers ; the younger as sisters , with all purity .
text2: wanawake wazee kama mama yako , na wasichana kama dada zako , kwa usafi wote .

text: Honour widows that are widows indeed .
text2: Waheshimu wanawake wajane walio wajane kweli .

text: But if any widow have children or nephews , let them learn first to shew piety at home , and to requite their parents : for that is good and acceptable before God .
text2: Lakini mjane aliye na watoto au wajukuu , hao wanapaswa kujifunza kutimiza wajibu wao wa kidini kwa jamaa zao wenyewe na hivyo kuwalipa wazazi wao na wazee wao , kwani hilo ni jambo la kupendeza mbele ya Mungu .

text: Now she that is a widow indeed , and desolate , trusteth in God , and continueth in supplications and prayers night and day .
text2: Mwanamke mjane kweli , asiye na mtu wa kumsaidia , amemwekea Mungu tumaini lake na huendelea kusali na kumwomba msaada usiku na mchana .

text: But she that liveth in pleasure is dead while she liveth .
text2: Lakini mwanamke ambaye huishi maisha ya anasa , huyo amekufa , ingawa yu hai .

text: And these things give in charge , that they may be blameless .
text2: Wape maagizo haya , wasije wakawa na lawama .

text: But if any provide not for his own , and specially for those of his own house , he hath denied the faith , and is worse than an infidel .
text2: Lakini kama mtu hawatunzi watu wa jamaa yake , hasa wale wa nyumbani kwake , basi , mtu huyo ameikana imani , na ni mbaya zaidi kuliko mtu asiyeamini .

text: Let not a widow be taken into the number under threescore years old , having been the wife of one man ,
text2: Usimtie katika orodha ya wajane , mjane yeyote ambaye hajatimiza miaka sitini . Tena awe amepata kuolewa mara moja tu ,

text: Well reported of for good works ; if she have brought up children , if she have lodged strangers , if she have washed the saints ' feet , if she have relieved the afflicted , if she have diligently followed every good work .
text2: na awe mwenye sifa nzuri : aliyewalea watoto wake vizuri , aliyewakaribisha wageni nyumbani kwake , aliyewaosha miguu watu wa Mungu , aliyewasaidia watu wenye taabu , na aliyejitolea kufanya mambo mema .

text: But the younger widows refuse : for when they have begun to wax wanton against Christ , they will marry ;
text2: Usiwaandikishe wajane vijana , kwani kama tamaa zao za maumbile zikizidi kuwa na nguvu zaidi kuliko kujitolea kwao kwa Kristo watataka kuolewa tena ,

text: Having damnation , because they have cast off their first faith .
text2: na wataonekana kukosa uaminifu kuhusu ahadi yao ya pale awali .

text: And withal they learn to be idle , wandering about from house to house ; and not only idle , but tattlers also and busybodies , speaking things which they ought not .
text2: Wajane kama hao huanza kupoteza wakati wao wakizurura nyumba hata nyumba ; tena ubaya zaidi ni kwamba huanza kuwasengenya watu , na kujitia katika mambo ya watu wengine , huku wakisema mambo ambayo hawangepaswa kusema .

text: I will therefore that the younger women marry , bear children , guide the house , give none occasion to the adversary to speak reproachfully .
text2: Kwa hiyo ningependelea wajane vijana waolewe , wapate watoto na kutunza nyumba zao ili adui zetu wasipewe nafasi ya kusema mambo maovu juu yetu .

text: For some are already turned aside after Satan .
text2: Kwa maana wajane wengine wamekwisha potoka na kumfuata Shetani .

text: If any man or woman that believeth have widows , let them relieve them , and let not the church be charged ; that it may relieve them that are widows indeed .
text2: Lakini kama mama Mkristo anao wajane katika jamaa yake , yeye anapaswa kuwatunza na si kuliachilia kanisa mzigo huo , ili kanisa liweze kuwatunza wajane wale waliobaki peke yao kabisa .

text: Let the elders that rule well be counted worthy of double honour , especially they who labour in the word and doctrine .
text2: Wazee wanaowaongoza watu vizuri wanastahili kupata riziki maradufu , hasa wale wanaofanya bidii katika kuhubiri na kufundisha .

text: For the scripture saith , Thou shalt not muzzle the ox that treadeth out the corn . And , The labourer is worthy of his reward .
text2: Maana Maandiko Matakatifu yasema : " Usimfunge ng ' ombe kinywa anapopura nafaka . " na tena " Mfanyakazi astahili malipo yake . "

text: Against an elder receive not an accusation , but before two or three witnesses .
text2: Usikubali kupokea mashtaka dhidi ya mzee yasipowakilishwa na mashahidi wawili au watatu .

text: Them that sin rebuke before all , that others also may fear .
text2: Wale wanaotenda dhambi waonye hadharani , ili wengine wapate kuogopa .

text: I charge thee before God , and the Lord Jesus Christ , and the elect angels , that thou observe these things without preferring one before another , doing nothing by partiality .
text2: Nakuamuru mbele ya Mungu , mbele ya Kristo Yesu , na mbele ya malaika watakatifu uyazingatie maagizo haya bila kuacha hata moja , wala kumpendelea mtu yeyote katika kila unachotenda .

text: Lay hands suddenly on no man , neither be partaker of other men ' s sins : keep thyself pure .
text2: Usiharakishe kumwekea mtu yeyote mikono kwa ajili ya kumtumikia Bwana . Usishiriki dhambi za wengine ; jiweke katika hali safi .

text: Drink no longer water , but use a little wine for thy stomach ' s sake and thine often infirmities .
text2: Usinywe maji tu , bali unywe divai kidogo kwa ajili ya tumbo lako , kwani unaugua mara kwa mara .

text: Some men ' s sins are open beforehand , going before to judgment ; and some men they follow after .
text2: Dhambi za watu wengine huonekana waziwazi , nazo zawatangulia kwenye hukumu ; lakini dhambi za wengine huonekana tu baadaye .

text: Likewise also the good works of some are manifest beforehand ; and they that are otherwise cannot be hid .
text2: Vivyo hivyo , matendo mema huonekana waziwazi , na hata yale ambayo si dhahiri hayawezi kufichika .

text: Let as many servants as are under the yoke count their own masters worthy of all honour , that the name of God and his doctrine be not blasphemed .
text2: Watumwa wote wanapaswa kuwaheshimu wakuu wao ili kusiwe na sababu ya watu kulitukana jina la Mungu na mafundisho yetu .

text: And they that have believing masters , let them not despise them , because they are brethren ; but rather do them service , because they are faithful and beloved , partakers of the benefit . These things teach and exhort .
text2: Watumwa ambao wakuu wao ni Wakristo wasiwadharau kwani ni ndugu zao . Badala yake , wanapaswa kuwatumikia hata vizuri zaidi , maana hao wanaopata faida kutokana na kazi yao ni waumini ambao wanawapenda . Unapaswa kufundisha na kuhubiri mambo haya .

text: If any man teach otherwise , and consent not to wholesome words , even the words of our Lord Jesus Christ , and to the doctrine which is according to godliness ;
text2: Mtu yeyote anayefundisha kinyume cha mambo haya , na ambaye hakubaliani na maneno ya kweli ya Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo na mafundisho ya dini ,

text: He is proud , knowing nothing , but doting about questions and strifes of words , whereof cometh envy , strife , railings , evil surmisings ,
text2: huyo amejaa majivuno na wala hajui chochote . Ni mtu wa kupenda ubishi na magombano juu ya maneno matupu , na hiyo husababisha wivu , ugomvi , matusi , shuku mbaya ,

text: Perverse disputings of men of corrupt minds , and destitute of the truth , supposing that gain is godliness : from such withdraw thyself .
text2: na ubishi usio na kikomo kutoka kwa watu ambao akili zao zimeharibika , na ambao hawana tena ukweli . Wanadhani dini ni njia ya kujipatia utajiri .

text: But godliness with contentment is great gain .
text2: Kweli dini humfanya mtu awe tajiri sana , ikiwa anatosheka na vitu alivyo navyo .

text: For we brought nothing into this world , and it is certain we can carry nothing out .
text2: Maana hatukuleta kitu chochote hapa duniani , wala hatutachukua chochote .

text: And having food and raiment let us be therewith content .
text2: Kwa hiyo basi , kama tunacho chakula na mavazi , tunapaswa kuridhika navyo .

text: But they that will be rich fall into temptation and a snare , and into many foolish and hurtful lusts , which drown men in destruction and perdition .
text2: Lakini wale wanaotaka kutajirika huanguka katika majaribu , na kunaswa katika mtego wa tamaa nyingi mbaya za kipumbavu , ambazo huwavuta mpaka kwenye uharibifu na maangamizi .

text: For the love of money is the root of all evil : which while some coveted after , they have erred from the faith , and pierced themselves through with many sorrows .
text2: Kwa maana kupenda sana fedha ni chanzo cha uovu wote . Watu wengine wametamani sana kupata fedha hata wakatangatanga mbali na imani , na wameivunja mioyo yao kwa huzuni nyingi .

text: But thou , O man of God , flee these things ; and follow after righteousness , godliness , faith , love , patience , meekness .
text2: Lakini wewe , mtu wa Mungu , jiepushe na mambo hayo . Zingatia uadilifu , uchaji wa Mungu , imani , mapendo , subira na unyenyekevu .

text: Fight the good fight of faith , lay hold on eternal life , whereunto thou art also called , and hast professed a good profession before many witnesses .
text2: Piga mbio kadiri uwezavyo katika shindano la mbio za imani , ukajipatie tuzo la uzima wa milele , uliloitiwa wakati ulipokiri imani yako mbele ya mashahidi wengi .

text: I give thee charge in the sight of God , who quickeneth all things , and before Christ Jesus , who before Pontius Pilate witnessed a good confession ;
text2: Mbele ya Mungu anayevipa vitu vyote uhai , na mbele ya Yesu Kristo aliyetoa ushahidi na kukiri ukweli mbele ya Pontio Pilato ,

text: That thou keep this commandment without spot , unrebukeable , until the appearing of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: nakuamuru ushike maagizo yako na kuyatii kwa uaminifu mpaka Siku ile atakapotokea Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo .

text: Which in his times he shall shew , who is the blessed and only Potentate , the King of kings , and Lord of lords ;
text2: Kutokea kwake kutafanyika wakati ufaao uliopangwa na Mungu mwenye heri na aliye Mtawala pekee , Mfalme wa wafalme , na Bwana wa mabwana .

text: Who only hath immortality , dwelling in the light which no man can approach unto ; whom no man hath seen , nor can see : to whom be honour and power everlasting . Amen .
text2: Yeye peke yake anaishi milele , katika mwanga usioweza kukaribiwa na mtu . Hakuna mtu aliyepata kumwona au awezaye kumwona . Kwake iwe heshima na uwezo wa milele ! Amina .

text: Charge them that are rich in this world , that they be not highminded , nor trust in uncertain riches , but in the living God , who giveth us richly all things to enjoy ;
text2: Waamuru watu walio matajiri katika mambo ya maisha ya sasa , wasijivune , wasiweke tumaini lao katika mali isiyoweza kutegemewa ; bali wamtegemee Mungu , ambaye kwa ukarimu hutupatia vitu vyote tuvifurahie .

text: That they do good , that they be rich in good works , ready to distribute , willing to communicate ;
text2: Waamuru watende mema , wawe matajiri katika matendo mema , na wawe wakarimu na walio tayari kuwashirikisha wengine mali zao .

text: Laying up in store for themselves a good foundation against the time to come , that they may lay hold on eternal life .
text2: Kwa namna hiyo watajiwekea hazina ambayo itakuwa kwao msingi imara kwa wakati ujao . Hapo wataweza kujipatia uzima ambao ni uzima wa kweli .

text: O Timothy , keep that which is committed to thy trust , avoiding profane and vain babblings , and oppositions of science falsely so called :
text2: Timotheo , tunza salama yote yale uliyokabidhiwa . Jiepushe na majadiliano ya kidunia na ubishi wa kipumbavu juu ya kile wanachokiita watu wengine : " Elimu " .

text: Which some professing have erred concerning the faith . Grace be with thee . Amen .
text2: Maana wengine wamejidai kuwa na hiyo elimu , na matokeo yake wamepoteza imani . Nawatakieni nyote neema !

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , according to the promise of life which is in Christ Jesus ,
text2: Mimi Paulo , ambaye Mungu alitaka niwe mtume wa Kristo Yesu ili niutangaze ule uzima tulioahidiwa katika kuungana na Kristo Yesu ,

text: To Timothy , my dearly beloved son : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord .
text2: nakuandikia wewe mwanangu mpenzi Timotheo . Nakutakia neema , huruma na amani kutoka kwa Mungu Baba na Kristo Yesu Bwana wetu .

text: I thank God , whom I serve from my forefathers with pure conscience , that without ceasing I have remembrance of thee in my prayers night and day ;
text2: Ninamshukuru Mungu ambaye ninamtumikia kwa dhamiri safi kama walivyofanya wazee wangu ; namshukuru kila ninapokukumbuka daima katika sala zangu .

text: Greatly desiring to see thee , being mindful of thy tears , that I may be filled with joy ;
text2: Nakumbuka machozi yako na ninatamani usiku na mchana kukuona , ili nijazwe furaha .

text: When I call to remembrance the unfeigned faith that is in thee , which dwelt first in thy grandmother Lois , and thy mother Eunice ; and I am persuaded that in thee also .
text2: Naikumbuka imani yako ya kweli , imani aliyokuwa nayo nyanya yako Loisi , na pia mama yako Eunike . Nina hakika kwamba wewe pia unayo .

text: Wherefore I put thee in remembrance that thou stir up the gift of God , which is in thee by the putting on of my hands .
text2: Ndio maana nakukumbusha ukiweke motomoto kile kipaji ulichopewa na Mungu wakati nilipokuwekea mikono yangu .

text: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear ; but of power , and of love , and of a sound mind .
text2: Kwa maana Mungu hakutupa Roho wa kutufanya tuwe waoga , bali alitupa Roho wa kutujalia nguvu , upendo na nidhamu .

text: Be not thou therefore ashamed of the testimony of our Lord , nor of me his prisoner : but be thou partaker of the afflictions of the gospel according to the power of God ;
text2: Basi , usione haya kumshuhudia Bwana wetu , wala usione haya kwa sababu yangu mimi niliye mfungwa kwa ajili yake . Lakini shiriki katika mateso kwa ajili ya Habari Njema , kadiri ya nguvu unazopewa na Mungu .

text: Who hath saved us , and called us with an holy calling , not according to our works , but according to his own purpose and grace , which was given us in Christ Jesus before the world began ,
text2: Yeye alituokoa , akatuita tuwe watu wake yeye mwenyewe , si kwa sababu ya matendo yetu wenyewe bali kwa sababu ya kusudi lake na neema yake . Alitujalia neema hiyo katika Kristo Yesu kabla mwanzo wa nyakati ;

text: But is now made manifest by the appearing of our Saviour Jesus Christ , who hath abolished death , and hath brought life and immortality to light through the gospel :
text2: lakini sasa imefunuliwa kwetu kwa kuja kwake Mwokozi wetu Yesu Kristo . Yeye amekomesha nguvu za kifo , na kwa njia ya Habari Njema akadhihirisha uzima usio kufa .

text: Whereunto I am appointed a preacher , and an apostle , and a teacher of the Gentiles .
text2: Mungu amenichagua mimi niwe mtume na mwalimu kwa ajili ya kuhubiri Habari Njema ,

text: For the which cause I also suffer these things : nevertheless I am not ashamed : for I know whom I have believed , and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day .
text2: nami nateseka mambo haya kwa sababu hiyo . Lakini niko bado timamu kabisa kwani namjua yule niliyemwamini , tena nina hakika kwamba yeye aweza kukilinda salama kile alichonikabidhi , mpaka Siku ile .

text: Hold fast the form of sound words , which thou hast heard of me , in faith and love which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Shika kwa makini mafundisho yale ya kweli niliyokufundisha , na kubaki katika hiyo imani na huo upendo wetu katika kuungana na Kristo Yesu .

text: That good thing which was committed unto thee keep by the Holy Ghost which dwelleth in us .
text2: Jambo lile bora ulilokabidhiwa lilinde kwa nguvu ya Roho Mtakatifu anayeishi ndani yetu .

text: This thou knowest , that all they which are in Asia be turned away from me ; of whom are Phygellus and Hermogenes .
text2: Kama unavyojua , watu wote mkoani Asia wameniacha , miongoni mwao wakiwa Fugelo na Hermogene .

text: The Lord give mercy unto the house of Onesiphorus ; for he oft refreshed me , and was not ashamed of my chain :
text2: Bwana aihurumie jamaa ya Onesiforo , kwa sababu aliniburudisha rohoni mara nyingi , wala hakuona haya kwa kuwa nilikuwa kifungoni ,

text: But , when he was in Rome , he sought me out very diligently , and found me .
text2: ila mara tu alipofika Roma , alianza kunitafuta kwa bidii mpaka akanipata .

text: The Lord grant unto him that he may find mercy of the Lord in that day : and in how many things he ministered unto me at Ephesus , thou knowest very well .
text2: Bwana amjalie huruma katika Siku ile ! Nawe wajua vizuri mengi aliyonifanyia huko Efeso .

text: Thou therefore , my son , be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Basi , wewe mwanangu , uwe na nguvu katika neema tunayopata katika kuungana na Kristo Yesu .

text: And the things that thou hast heard of me among many witnesses , the same commit thou to faithful men , who shall be able to teach others also .
text2: Chukua yale mafundisho uliyonisikia nikitangaza mbele ya mashahidi wengi , uyakabidhi kwa watu wanaoaminika , ambao wataweza kuwafundisha wengine pia .

text: Thou therefore endure hardness , as a good soldier of Jesus Christ .
text2: Shiriki katika mateso kama askari mwaminifu wa Kristo yesu .

text: No man that warreth entangleth himself with the affairs of this life ; that he may please him who hath chosen him to be a soldier .
