text2: Mwanajeshi vitani hujiepusha na shughuli za maisha ya kawaida ili aweze kumpendeza mkuu wa jeshi .

text: And if a man also strive for masteries , yet is he not crowned , except he strive lawfully .
text2: Mwanariadha yeyote hawezi kushinda na kupata zawadi ya ushindi kama asipozitii sheria za michezo .

text: The husbandman that laboureth must be first partaker of the fruits .
text2: Mkulima ambaye amefanya kazi ngumu anastahili kupata sehemu ya kwanza ya mavuno .

text: Consider what I say ; and the Lord give thee understanding in all things .
text2: Fikiria hayo ninayosema , kwani Bwana atakuwezesha uyaelewe yote .

text: Remember that Jesus Christ of the seed of David was raised from the dead according to my gospel :
text2: Mkumbuke Yesu Kristo aliyefufuliwa kutoka wafu , aliyekuwa wa ukoo wa Daudi , kama isemavyo Habari Njema ninayoihubiri .

text: Wherein I suffer trouble , as an evil doer , even unto bonds ; but the word of God is not bound .
text2: Kwa sababu ya kuihubiri Habari Njema mimi nateseka na nimefungwa minyororo kama mhalifu . Lakini neno la Mungu haliwezi kufungwa minyororo ,

text: Therefore I endure all things for the elect ' s sakes , that they may also obtain the salvation which is in Christ Jesus with eternal glory .
text2: na hivyo navumilia kila kitu kwa ajili ya wateule wa Mungu , ili wao pia wapate ukombozi upatikanao kwa njia ya Yesu Kristo , na ambao huleta utukufu wa milele .

text: It is a faithful saying : For if we be dead with him , we shall also live with him :
text2: Usemi huu ni wa kweli : " Ikiwa tulikufa pamoja naye , tutaishi pia pamoja naye .

text: If we suffer , we shall also reign with him : if we deny him , he also will deny us :
text2: Tukiendelea kuvumilia , tutatawala pia pamoja naye . Tukimkana , naye pia atatukana .

text: If we believe not , yet he abideth faithful : he cannot deny himself .
text2: Tukikosa kuwa waaminifu , yeye hubaki mwaminifu daima , maana yeye hawezi kujikana mwenyewe . "

text: Of these things put them in remembrance , charging them before the Lord that they strive not about words to no profit , but to the subverting of the hearers .
text2: Basi , wakumbushe watu wako mambo haya , na kuwaonya mbele ya Mungu waache ubishi juu ya maneno . Ubishi huo haufai , ila huleta tu uharibifu mkuu kwa wale wanaousikia .

text: Study to shew thyself approved unto God , a workman that needeth not to be ashamed , rightly dividing the word of truth .
text2: Jitahidi kupata kibali kamili mbele ya Mungu kama mfanyakazi ambaye haoni haya juu ya kazi yake , na ambaye hufundisha sawa ule ujumbe wa kweli .

text: But shun profane and vain babblings : for they will increase unto more ungodliness .
text2: Jiepushe na majadiliano ya kidunia na ya kipumbavu ; kwani hayo huzidi kuwatenga watu mbali na Mungu .

text: And their word will eat as doth a canker : of whom is Hymenaeus and Philetus ;
text2: Mafundisho ya aina hiyo ni kama donda linalokula mwili . Miongoni mwa hao waliofundisha hayo ni Humenayo na Fileto .

text: Who concerning the truth have erred , saying that the resurrection is past already ; and overthrow the faith of some .
text2: Hawa wamepotoka kabisa mbali na ukweli , na wanatia imani ya watu wengine katika wasiwasi kwa kusema ati ufufuo wetu umekwisha fanyika .

text: Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure , having this seal , The Lord knoweth them that are his . And , Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity .
text2: Lakini msingi thabiti uliowekwa na Mungu uko imara , na juu yake yameandikwa maneno haya : " Bwana anawafahamu wale walio wake , " na " Kila asemaye yeye ni wa Bwana , ni lazima aachane na uovu . "

text: But in a great house there are not only vessels of gold and of silver , but also of wood and of earth ; and some to honour , and some to dishonour .
text2: Katika nyumba kubwa kuna mabakuli na vyombo vya kila namna : vingine ni vya fedha na dhahabu , vingine vya mbao na udongo , vingine ni vya matumizi ya pekee na vingine kwa ajili ya matumizi ya kawaida .

text: If a man therefore purge himself from these , he shall be a vessel unto honour , sanctified , and meet for the master ' s use , and prepared unto every good work .
text2: Basi , kama mtu atajitakasa kwa kujitenga mbali na mambo hayo yote maovu , atakuwa chombo cha matumizi ya pekee , kwa sababu amewekwa wakfu , anamfaa Bwana wake na yupo tayari kwa kila kazi njema .

text: Flee also youthful lusts : but follow righteousness , faith , charity , peace , with them that call on the Lord out of a pure heart .
text2: Jiepushe na tamaa za ujana , fuata uadilifu , imani , upendo , amani , pamoja na watu wote ambao wanamwomba Bwana kwa moyo safi .

text: But foolish and unlearned questions avoid , knowing that they do gender strifes .
text2: Epuka ubishi wa kijinga na kipumbavu ; wajua kwamba hayo huleta magomvi .

text: And the servant of the Lord must not strive ; but be gentle unto all men , apt to teach , patient ,
text2: Mtumishi wa Bwana asigombane . Anapaswa kuwa mpole kwa watu wote , mwalimu mwema na mvumilivu ,

text: In meekness instructing those that oppose themselves ; if God peradventure will give them repentance to the acknowledging of the truth ;
text2: ambaye ni mpole anapowaonya wapinzani wake , kwani huenda Mungu akawajalia nafasi ya kutubu , wakapata kuujua ukweli .

text: And that they may recover themselves out of the snare of the devil , who are taken captive by him at his will .
text2: Hapo fahamu zao zitawarudia tena , wakaponyoka katika mtego wa Ibilisi aliyewanasa na kuwafanya wayatii matakwa yake .

text: This know also , that in the last days perilous times shall come .
text2: Kumbuka kwamba , katika siku za mwisho kutakuwa na nyakati za taabu .

text: For men shall be lovers of their own selves , covetous , boasters , proud , blasphemers , disobedient to parents , unthankful , unholy ,
text2: watu watakuwa na ubinafsi , wenye tamaa ya fedha , wenye majivuno , wenye kujiona , wenye kumtukana Mungu , wasiowatii wazazi wao , wasio na shukrani na waovu ;

text: Without natural affection , trucebreakers , false accusers , incontinent , fierce , despisers of those that are good ,
text2: watatokea watu wasio na upendo moyoni , wasio na huruma , wachongezi , walafi na wakali ; watachukia chochote kilicho chema ;

text: Traitors , heady , highminded , lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God ;
text2: watakuwa wahaini , wakaidi na waliojaa kiburi ; watapenda anasa kuliko kumpenda Mungu .

text: Having a form of godliness , but denying the power thereof : from such turn away .
text2: Kwa nje wataonekana kama watu wenye kumcha Mungu , lakini wataikana nguvu yake . Jiepushe kabisa na watu wa namna hiyo .

text: For of this sort are they which creep into houses , and lead captive silly women laden with sins , led away with divers lusts ,
text2: Baadhi yao huenda katika nyumba za watu na huwateka wanawake dhaifu waliolemewa mizigo ya dhambi na ambao wanaongozwa na tamaa za kila aina ;

text: Ever learning , and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth .
text2: wanawake ambao wanajaribu daima kujifunza lakini hawawezi kuufikia ujuzi wa huo ukweli .

text: Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses , so do these also resist the truth : men of corrupt minds , reprobate concerning the faith .
text2: Watu hao huupinga ukweli kama vile Yane na Yambre walivyompinga Mose .

text: But they shall proceed no further : for their folly shall be manifest unto all men , as theirs also was .
text2: Lakini hawataweza kuendelea zaidi kwa maana upumbavu wao utaonekana wazi kwa wote . Ndivyo ilivyokuwa kwa akina Yane na Yambre .

text: But thou hast fully known my doctrine , manner of life , purpose , faith , longsuffering , charity , patience ,
text2: Wewe lakini , umeyafuata mafundisho yangu , mwenendo wangu , makusudi yangu katika maisha , imani yangu , uvumilivu wangu , upendo wangu , subira yangu ,

text: Persecutions , afflictions , which came unto me at Antioch , at Iconium , at Lystra ; what persecutions I endured : but out of them all the Lord delivered me .
text2: udhalimu na mateso yangu . Unayajua mambo yaliyonipata huko Antiokia , Ikonio na Lustra . Nilivumilia udhalimu mkubwa mno ! Lakini Bwana aliniokoa katika mambo hayo yote .

text: Yea , and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution .
text2: Kila mtu anayetaka kuishi maisha ya kumcha Mungu katika kuungana na Kristo Yesu lazima adhulumiwe .

text: But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse , deceiving , and being deceived .
text2: Watu waovu na wadanyanyifu watazidi kuwa waovu zaidi na zaidi kwa kuwadanganya wengine na kudanganyika wao wenyewe .

text: But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of , knowing of whom thou hast learned them ;
text2: Lakini wewe dumu katika ukweli ule uliofundishwa , ukaukubali kabisa . Unawajua wale waliokuwa walimu wako .

text: And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures , which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Unakumbuka kwamba tangu utoto wako umeyajua Maandiko Matakatifu ambayo yaweza kukupatia hekima iletayo wokovu kwa njia ya imani kwa Kristo Yesu .

text: All scripture is given by inspiration of God , and is profitable for doctrine , for reproof , for correction , for instruction in righteousness :
text2: Maandiko yote Matakatifu yameandikwa kwa uongozi wa Mungu , na yanafaa katika kufundishia ukweli , kuonya , kusahihisha makosa , na kuwaongoza watu waishi maisha adili ,

text: That the man of God may be perfect , throughly furnished unto all good works .
text2: ili mtu anayemtumikia Mungu awe mkamilifu , na tayari kabisa kufanya kila tendo jema .

text: I charge thee therefore before God , and the Lord Jesus Christ , who shall judge the quick and the dead at his appearing and his kingdom ;
text2: Nakuamuru mbele ya Mungu , na mbele ya Kristo Yesu atakayewahukumu watu walio hai na wafu , na kwa sababu anakuja kutawala akiwa Mfalme :

text: Preach the word ; be instant in season , out of season ; reprove , rebuke , exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine .
text2: hubiri huo ujumbe , sisitiza kuutangaza ( iwe ni wakati wa kufaa au wakati usiofaa ) , karipia , onya na himiza watu ukiwafundisha kwa uvumilivu wote .

text: For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine ; but after their own lusts shall they heap to themselves teachers , having itching ears ;
text2: Utakuja wakati ambapo watu hawatasikiliza mafundisho ya kweli , ila watafuata tamaa zao wenyewe na kujikusanyia walimu tele watakaowaambia mambo yale tu ambayo masikio yao yako tayari kusikia .

text: And they shall turn away their ears from the truth , and shall be turned unto fables .
text2: Watakataa kuusikia ukweli , watageukia hadithi za uongo .

text: But watch thou in all things , endure afflictions , do the work of an evangelist , make full proof of thy ministry .
text2: Wewe , lakini , uwe macho katika kila hali ; vumilia mateso , fanya kazi ya mhubiri wa Habari Njema , timiza kikamilifu utumishi wako .

text: For I am now ready to be offered , and the time of my departure is at hand .
text2: Kwa upande wangu mimi , niko karibu kabisa kutolewa dhabihu na wakati wa kufariki kwangu umefika .

text: I have fought a good fight , I have finished my course , I have kept the faith :
text2: Nimefanya bidii katika mashindano , nimemaliza safari yote na imani nimeitunza .

text: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness , which the Lord , the righteous judge , shall give me at that day : and not to me only , but unto all them also that love his appearing .
text2: Na sasa imebakia tu kupewa tuzo la ushindi kwa maisha ya uadilifu , tuzo ambalo Bwana Hakimu wa haki , atanipa mimi Siku ile na wala si mimi tu , ila na wale wote wanaotazamia kwa upendo kutokea kwake .

text: Do thy diligence to come shortly unto me :
text2: Fanya bidii kuja kwangu karibuni .

text: For Demas hath forsaken me , having loved this present world , and is departed unto Thessalonica ; Crescens to Galatia , Titus unto Dalmatia .
text2: Dema ameupenda ulimwengu huu akaniacha na kwenda zake Thesalonike . Kreske amekwenda Galatia , na Tito amekwenda Dalmatia .

text: Only Luke is with me . Take Mark , and bring him with thee : for he is profitable to me for the ministry .
text2: Luka peke yake ndiye aliye hapa pamoja nami . Mpate Marko uje naye , kwa maana ataweza kunisaidia katika kazi yangu .

text: And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus .
text2: Nilimtuma Tukiko kule Efeso .

text: The cloke that I left at Troas with Carpus , when thou comest , bring with thee , and the books , but especially the parchments .
text2: Utakapokuja niletee koti langu nililoacha kwa Karpo kule Troa ; niletee pia vile vitabu , na hasa vile vilivyotengenezwa kwa ngozi .

text: Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil : the Lord reward him according to his works :
text2: Yule sonara aitwaye Aleksanda amenitendea maovu mengi ; Bwana atamlipa kufuatana na hayo matendo yake .

text: Of whom be thou ware also ; for he hath greatly withstood our words .
text2: Jihadhari naye kwa sababu aliupinga ujumbe wetu kwa ukali .

text: At my first answer no man stood with me , but all men forsook me : I pray God that it may not be laid to their charge .
text2: Wakati nilipojitetea kwa mara ya kwanza hakuna mtu aliyesimama upande wangu ; wote waliniacha . Mungu asiwahesabie kosa hilo !

text: Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me , and strengthened me ; that by me the preaching might be fully known , and that all the Gentiles might hear : and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion .
text2: Lakini , Bwana alikaa pamoja nami , akanipa nguvu , hata nikaweza kuutangaza ujumbe wote , watu wa mataifa wausikie ; tena nikaokolewa katika hukumu ya kifo kama kinywani mwa simba .

text: And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work , and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom : to whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Bwana ataniokoa na mambo yote maovu , na kunichukua salama mpaka katika Utawala wake wa mbinguni . Kwake uwe utukufu milele na milele ! Amina .

text: Salute Prisca and Aquila , and the household of Onesiphorus .
text2: Wasalimu Priska na Akula , pamoja na jamaa ya Onesiforo .

text: Erastus abode at Corinth : but Trophimus have I left at Miletum sick .
text2: Erasto alibaki Korintho , naye Trofimo nilimwacha Mileto kwa sababu alikuwa mgonjwa .

text: Do thy diligence to come before winter . Eubulus greeteth thee , and Pudens , and Linus , and Claudia , and all the brethren .
text2: Fanya bidii kuja kabla ya majira ya baridi . Ebulo , Pude , Lino na Klaudia wanakusalimu ; vilevile ndugu wengine wote .

text: The Lord Jesus Christ be with thy spirit . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: Bwana awe nawe rohoni mwako . Nawatakieni nyote neema .

text: Paul , a servant of God , and an apostle of Jesus Christ , according to the faith of God ' s elect , and the acknowledging of the truth which is after godliness ;
text2: Mimi Paulo , mtumishi wa Mungu na mtume wa Yesu Kristo naandika . Mimi nimechaguliwa kuijenga imani ya wateule wa Mungu na kuwaongoza waufahamu ukweli wa dini yetu ,

text: In hope of eternal life , which God , that cannot lie , promised before the world began ;
text2: ambayo msingi wake ni tumaini la kupata uzima wa milele . Mungu ambaye hasemi uongo , alituahidia uzima huo kabla ya mwanzo wa nyakati ,

text: But hath in due times manifested his word through preaching , which is committed unto me according to the commandment of God our Saviour ;
text2: na wakati ufaao ulipowadia , akaudhihirisha katika ujumbe wake . Mimi nilikabidhiwa ujumbe huo nuutangaze kufuatana na amri ya Mungu , Mwokozi wetu .

text: To Titus , mine own son after the common faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our Saviour .
text2: Ninakuandikia wewe Tito , mwanangu wa kweli katika imani tunayoshiriki . Nakutakia neema na amani kutoka kwa Mungu Baba , na kutoka kwa Kristo Yesu , Mkombozi wetu .

text: For this cause left I thee in Crete , that thou shouldest set in order the things that are wanting , and ordain elders in every city , as I had appointed thee :
text2: Nilikuacha Krete ili urekebishe yale mambo ambayo hayakuwa yamekamilika bado , na kuwateua wazee wa kanisa katika kila mji . Kumbuka maagizo yangu :

text: If any be blameless , the husband of one wife , having faithful children not accused of riot or unruly .
text2: mzee wa kanisa anapaswa kuwa mtu asiye na hatia ; aliye na mke mmoja tu , na watoto wake wanapaswa kuwa waumini , wasiojulikana kuwa wakorofi au wakaidi .

text: For a bishop must be blameless , as the steward of God ; not selfwilled , not soon angry , not given to wine , no striker , not given to filthy lucre ;
text2: Maana kwa vile kiongozi wa kanisa ni mkurugenzi wa kazi ya Mungu , anapaswa kuwa mtu asiye na hatia . Asiwe mwenye majivuno , mwepesi wa hasira , mlevi , mkorofi au mchoyo .

text: But a lover of hospitality , a lover of good men , sober , just , holy , temperate ;
text2: Anapaswa kuwa mkarimu na anayependa mambo mema . Anapaswa kuwa mtu mtaratibu , mwadilifu , mtakatifu na mwenye nidhamu .

text: Holding fast the faithful word as he hath been taught , that he may be able by sound doctrine both to exhort and to convince the gainsayers .
text2: Ni lazima ashike kikamilifu ujumbe ule wa kuaminika kama unavyofundishwa . Ndivyo atakavyoweza kuwatia wengine moyo kwa mafundisho ya kweli na kuyafichua makosa ya wale wanaoyapinga mafundisho hayo .

text: For there are many unruly and vain talkers and deceivers , specially they of the circumcision :
text2: Maana , wako watu wengi , hasa wale walioongoka kutoka dini ya Kiyahudi , ambao ni wakaidi , wanaowapotosha wengine kwa upumbavu wao .

text: Whose mouths must be stopped , who subvert whole houses , teaching things which they ought not , for filthy lucre ' s sake .
text2: Lazima kukomesha maneno yao , kwani wanavuruga jumuiya nzima kwa kufundisha mambo ambayo hawapaswi kufundisha ; wanafanya hivyo kwa nia mbaya ya kupata faida ya fedha .

text: One of themselves , even a prophet of their own , said , The Cretians are alway liars , evil beasts , slow bellies .
text2: Hata mmoja wa manabii wao , ambaye naye pia ni Mkrete , alisema : " Wakrete , husema uongo daima ; ni kama wanyama wabaya , walafi na wavivu ! "

text: This witness is true . Wherefore rebuke them sharply , that they may be sound in the faith ;
text2: Naye alitoboa ukweli kwa sababu hiyo , unapaswa kuwakaripia vikali , ili wawe na imani kamilifu .

text: Not giving heed to Jewish fables , and commandments of men , that turn from the truth .
text2: Wasiendelee kushikilia hadithi tupu za Kiyahudi na maagizo ya kibinadamu yanayozuka kwa watu walioukataa ukweli .

text: Unto the pure all things are pure : but unto them that are defiled and unbelieving is nothing pure ; but even their mind and conscience is defiled .
text2: Kila kitu ni safi kwa watu walio safi ; lakini hakuna chochote kilicho safi kwa wale waliochafuliwa na wasioamini , maana dhamiri na akili zao zimechafuliwa .

text: They profess that they know God ; but in works they deny him , being abominable , and disobedient , and unto every good work reprobate .
text2: Watu kama hao hujidai kwamba wanamjua Mungu , lakini kwa matendo yao humkana . Ni watu wa kuchukiza mno na wakaidi , hawafai kwa jambo lolote jema .

text: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine :
text2: Lakini wewe unapaswa kuhubiri mafundisho safi .

text: That the aged men be sober , grave , temperate , sound in faith , in charity , in patience .
text2: Waambie wazee kwamba wanapaswa kuwa na kiasi , wawe na busara na wataratibu ; wanapaswa kuwa timamu katika imani yao , upendo na uvumilivu .

text: The aged women likewise , that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness , not false accusers , not given to much wine , teachers of good things ;
text2: Hali kadhalika waambie wanawake wazee wawe na mwenendo wa uchaji wa Mungu ; wasiwe wachongezi , au watumwa wa pombe . Wanapaswa kufundisha mambo mema ,

text: That they may teach the young women to be sober , to love their husbands , to love their children ,
text2: ili wawazoeze kina mama vijana kuwapenda waume zao na watoto ,

text: To be discreet , chaste , keepers at home , good , obedient to their own husbands , that the word of God be not blasphemed .
text2: wawe na kiasi na safi , waangalie vizuri mambo ya nyumbani , na wawatii waume zao , ili ujumbe wa Mungu usije ukadharauliwa .

text: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded .
text2: Kadhalika , wahimize vijana wawe na kiasi .

text: In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works : in doctrine shewing uncorruptness , gravity , sincerity ,
text2: Katika mambo yote wewe mwenyewe unapaswa kuwa mfano wa matendo mema . Uwe mnyofu na uwe na uzito katika mafundisho yako .

text: Sound speech , that cannot be condemned ; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed , having no evil thing to say of you .
text2: Maneno yako yasiwe na hitilafu yoyote ili adui zako waaibike wasipopata chochote kibaya cha kusema juu yetu .

text: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters , and to please them well in all things ; not answering again ;
text2: Watumwa wanapaswa kuwatii wakuu wao na kuwapendeza katika mambo yote . Wasibishane nao ,

text: Not purloining , but shewing all good fidelity ; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things .
text2: au kuiba vitu vyao . Badala yake wanapaswa kuonyesha kwamba wao ni wema na waaminifu daima , ili , kwa matendo yao yote , wayapatie sifa njema mafundisho juu ya Mungu , Mwokozi wetu .

text: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men ,
text2: Maana neema ya Mungu imedhihirishwa kwa ajili ya wokovu wa watu wote .

text: Teaching us that , denying ungodliness and worldly lusts , we should live soberly , righteously , and godly , in this present world ;
text2: Neema hiyo yatufunza kuachana na uovu wote na tamaa za kidunia ; tuwe na kiasi , tuishi maisha adili na ya kumcha Mungu katika ulimwengu huu wa sasa ,

text: Looking for that blessed hope , and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ ;
text2: tukiwa tunangojea siku ile ya heri tunayoitumainia , wakati utakapotokea utukufu wa Mungu Mkuu na Mwokozi wetu Yesu Kristo .

text: Who gave himself for us , that he might redeem us from all iniquity , and purify unto himself a peculiar people , zealous of good works .
text2: Yeye alijitoa mwenyewe kwa ajili yetu ili atukomboe kutoka katika uovu wote na kutufanya watu safi walio wake yeye mwenyewe , watu walio na hamu ya kutenda mema .

text: These things speak , and exhort , and rebuke with all authority . Let no man despise thee .
text2: Basi , fundisha mambo hayo na tumia mamlaka yako yote ukiwahimiza na kuwaonya wasikilizaji wako . Mtu yeyote na asikudharau .

text: Put them in mind to be subject to principalities and powers , to obey magistrates , to be ready to every good work ,
text2: Wakumbushe watu kuwastahi watawala na wenye mamlaka , kuwatii na kuwa tayari kwa kila namna kutenda mambo yote mema .

text: To speak evil of no man , to be no brawlers , but gentle , shewing all meekness unto all men .
text2: Waambie wasimtukane mtu yeyote ; bali waishi kwa amani na masikizano , wawe daima wapole kwa kila mtu .

text: For we ourselves also were sometimes foolish , disobedient , deceived , serving divers lusts and pleasures , living in malice and envy , hateful , and hating one another .
text2: Maana , wakati mmoja sisi tulikuwa wapumbavu , wakaidi na wapotovu . Tulikuwa watumwa wa tamaa na anasa za kila aina . Tuliishi maisha ya uovu na wivu ; watu walituchukia nasi tukawachukia .

text: But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared ,
text2: Lakini wakati wema na upendo wa Mungu , Mwokozi wetu , ulipofunuliwa ,

text: Not by works of righteousness which we have done , but according to his mercy he saved us , by the washing of regeneration , and renewing of the Holy Ghost ;
text2: alituokoa . alituokoa si kwa sababu ya jambo lolote jema tulilotenda sisi , bali alituokoa kwa sababu ya huruma yake , kwa njia ya Roho Mtakatifu anayetujalia tuzaliwe upya na kuwa na maisha mapya kwa kutuosha kwa maji .

text: Which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour ;
text2: Mungu alitumiminia Roho Mtakatifu bila kipimo kwa njia ya Yesu Kristo , Mwokozi wetu ,

text: That being justified by his grace , we should be made heirs according to the hope of eternal life .
text2: ili kwa neema yake tupate kukubaliwa kuwa waadilifu na kuupokea uzima wa milele tunaoutumainia .

text: This is a faithful saying , and these things I will that thou affirm constantly , that they which have believed in God might be careful to maintain good works . These things are good and profitable unto men .
text2: Jambo hili ni kweli . Ninakutaka uyatilie mkazo mambo haya , ili wale wanaomwamini Mungu , wawe na hamu ya kuutumia wakati wao katika kutenda mema , ambayo ni mambo mazuri na ya manufaa kwa watu .

text: But avoid foolish questions , and genealogies , and contentions , and strivings about the law ; for they are unprofitable and vain .
text2: Lakini jiepushe na ubishi wa kipumbavu , ugomvi na mabishano juu ya Sheria . Mambo hayo hayana faida yoyote na ni ya bure tu .

text: A man that is an heretick after the first and second admonition reject ;
text2: Mtu anayesababisha mafarakano mpe onyo la kwanza na la pili , kisha achana naye .

text: Knowing that he that is such is subverted , and sinneth , being condemned of himself .
text2: Wajua kwamba mtu wa namna hiyo amepotoka kabisa , na dhambi zake zathibitisha kwamba amekosea .

text: When I shall send Artemas unto thee , or Tychicus , be diligent to come unto me to Nicopolis : for I have determined there to winter .
text2: Baada ya kumtuma kwako Artema au Tukiko , fanya bidii kuja Nikopoli unione , maana nimeamua kukaa huko wakati wa majira ya baridi .

text: Bring Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey diligently , that nothing be wanting unto them .
text2: Jitahidi kumsaidia mwana sheria Zena na Apolo ili waweze kuanza ziara zao na uhakikishe kwamba wana kila kitu wanachohitaji .

text: And let ours also learn to maintain good works for necessary uses , that they be not unfruitful .
text2: Ni lazima watu wetu wajifunze kuutumia wakati wao katika kutenda mema ili wasaidie katika mahitaji ya kweli , na maisha yao yawe ya kufaa .

text: All that are with me salute thee . Greet them that love us in the faith . Grace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Watu wote walio pamoja nami wanakusalimu . Wasalimu rafiki zetu katika imani . Nawatakieni nyote neema ya Mungu .

text: Paul , a prisoner of Jesus Christ , and Timothy our brother , unto Philemon our dearly beloved , and fellowlabourer ,
text2: Mimi Paulo , mfungwa kwa ajili ya Kristo Yesu , na ndugu Timotheo , ninakuandikia wewe Filemoni mpendwa , mfanyakazi mwenzetu

text: And to our beloved Apphia , and Archippus our fellowsoldier , and to the church in thy house :
text2: na kanisa linalokutana nyumbani kwako , na wewe dada Afia , na askari mwenzetu Arkupo .

text: Grace to you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Tunawatakieni neema na amani kutoka kwa Mungu Baba yetu , na kwa Bwana yesu Kristo .

text: I thank my God , making mention of thee always in my prayers ,
text2: Kila wakati ninaposali nakukumbuka wewe Filemoni , na kumshukuru Mungu

text: Hearing of thy love and faith , which thou hast toward the Lord Jesus , and toward all saints ;
text2: maana nasikia habari za imani yako kwa Bwana wetu Yesu na upendo wako kwa watu wote wa Mungu .

text: That the communication of thy faith may become effectual by the acknowledging of every good thing which is in you in Christ Jesus .
text2: Naomba ili imani hiyo unayoshiriki pamoja nasi ikuwezeshe kuwa na ujuzi mkamilifu zaidi wa baraka zote tunazopata katika kuungana kwetu na Kristo .

text: For we have great joy and consolation in thy love , because the bowels of the saints are refreshed by thee , brother .
text2: Ndugu , upendo wako yameniletea furaha kubwa na kunipa moyo sana ! Nawe umeichangamsha mioyo ya watu wa Mungu .

text: Wherefore , though I might be much bold in Christ to enjoin thee that which is convenient ,
text2: Kwa sababu hiyo , ningeweza , kwa uhodari kabisa , nikiwa ndugu yako katika Kristo , kukuamuru ufanye unachopaswa kufanya .

text: Yet for love ' s sake I rather beseech thee , being such an one as Paul the aged , and now also a prisoner of Jesus Christ .
text2: Lakini kwa sababu ya upendo , ni afadhali zaidi nikuombe . Nafanya hivi ingawa mimi ni Paulo , balozi wa Kristo Yesu , na sasa pia mfungwa kwa ajili yake .

text: I beseech thee for my son Onesimus , whom I have begotten in my bonds :
text2: Basi , ninalo ombi moja kwako kuhusu mwanangu Onesimo , ambaye ni mwanangu katika Kristo kwani nimekuwa baba yake nikiwa kifungoni .

text: Which in time past was to thee unprofitable , but now profitable to thee and to me :
text2: Ni Onesimo yuleyule ambaye wakati mmoja alikuwa hakufai kitu , lakini sasa ananifaa mimi na wewe pia .

text: Whom I have sent again : thou therefore receive him , that is , mine own bowels :
text2: Sasa namrudisha kwako , naye ni kama moyo wangu mimi mwenyewe .

text: Whom I would have retained with me , that in thy stead he might have ministered unto me in the bonds of the gospel :
text2: Ningependa akae nami hapa anisaidie badala yako wakati niwapo kifungoni kwa sababu ya Habari Njema .

text: But without thy mind would I do nothing ; that thy benefit should not be as it were of necessity , but willingly .
text2: Lakini sitafanya chochote bila kibali chako . Sipendi kukulazimisha unisaidie , kwani wema wako unapaswa kutokana na hiari yako wewe mwenyewe na si kwa kulazimika .

text: For perhaps he therefore departed for a season , that thou shouldest receive him for ever ;
text2: Labda Onesimo aliondoka kwako kwa kitambo tu , kusudi uweze tena kuwa naye daima .

text: Not now as a servant , but above a servant , a brother beloved , specially to me , but how much more unto thee , both in the flesh , and in the Lord ?
text2: Na sasa yeye si mtumwa tu , ila ni bora zaidi ya mtumwa : yeye ni ndugu yetu mpenzi . Na wa maana sana kwangu mimi , na kwako atakuwa wa maana zaidi kama mtumwa na kama ndugu katika Bwana .

text: If thou count me therefore a partner , receive him as myself .
text2: Basi , ikiwa wanitambua mimi kuwa mwenzako , mpokee tena kama vile ungenipokea mimi mwenyewe .

text: If he hath wronged thee , or oweth thee ought , put that on mine account ;
text2: Kama alikuwa amekukosea kitu , au alikuwa na deni lako , basi , unidai mimi .

text: I Paul have written it with mine own hand , I will repay it : albeit I do not say to thee how thou owest unto me even thine own self besides .
text2: Naandika jambo hili kwa mkono wangu mwenyewe : Mimi Paulo nitalipa ! ( Tena sina haja ya kusema kwamba wewe unalo deni kwangu la nafsi yako . )

text: Yea , brother , let me have joy of thee in the Lord : refresh my bowels in the Lord .
text2: Haya , basi , ndugu yangu , nifanyie jambo hilo kwa ajili ya jina la Bwana ; burudisha moyo wangu kama ndugu katika Kristo .

text: Having confidence in thy obedience I wrote unto thee , knowing that thou wilt also do more than I say .
text2: Naandika nikitumaini kwamba utanikubalia ombi langu ; tena najua kwamba utafanya hata zaidi ya haya ninayokuomba .

text: But withal prepare me also a lodging : for I trust that through your prayers I shall be given unto you .
text2: Pamoja na hayo , nitayarishie chumba kwani natumaini kwamba kwa sala zenu , Mungu atanijalia niwatembeleeni .

text: There salute thee Epaphras , my fellowprisoner in Christ Jesus ;
text2: Epafra , mfungwa mwenzangu kwa ajili ya Kristo Yesu , anakusalimu .

text: Marcus , Aristarchus , Demas , Lucas , my fellowlabourers .
text2: Nao akina Marko , Aristarko , Dema na Luka , wafanyakazi wenzangu , wanakusalimu .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: Nawatakieni ninyi nyote neema ya Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo .

text: God , who at sundry times and in divers manners spake in time past unto the fathers by the prophets ,
text2: Hapo zamani , Mungu alisema na babu zetu mara nyingi kwa namna nyingi kwa njia ya manabii ,

text: Hath in these last days spoken unto us by his Son , whom he hath appointed heir of all things , by whom also he made the worlds ;
text2: lakini siku hizi za mwisho , amesema nasi kwa njia ya Mwanae . Yeye ndiye ambaye kwa njia yake Mungu aliumba ulimwengu na akamteua avimiliki vitu vyote .

text: Who being the brightness of his glory , and the express image of his person , and upholding all things by the word of his power , when he had by himself purged our sins , sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high ;
text2: Yeye ni mng ' ao wa utukufu wa Mungu , na mfano kamili wa hali ya Mungu mwenyewe , akiutegemeza ulimwengu kwa neno lake lenye nguvu . Baada ya kuwapatia binadamu msamaha wa dhambi zao , aliketi huko juu mbinguni , upande wa kulia wa Mungu Mkuu .

text: Being made so much better than the angels , as he hath by inheritance obtained a more excellent name than they .
text2: Mwana ni mkuu zaidi kuliko malaika , kama vile jina alilopewa na Mungu ni kuu zaidi kuliko jina lao .

text: For unto which of the angels said he at any time , Thou art my Son , this day have I begotten thee ? And again , I will be to him a Father , and he shall be to me a Son ?
text2: Maana Mungu hakumwambia kamwe hata mmoja wa malaika wake : " Wewe ni Mwanangu ; Mimi leo nimekuwa Baba yako . " Wala hakusema juu ya malaika yeyote : " Mimi nitakuwa Baba yake , naye atakuwa Mwanangu . "

text: And again , when he bringeth in the firstbegotten into the world , he saith , And let all the angels of God worship him .
text2: Lakini Mungu alipokuwa anamtuma Mwanae mzaliwa wa kwanza ulimwenguni , alisema : " Malaika wote wa Mungu wanapaswa kumwabudu . "

text: And of the angels he saith , Who maketh his angels spirits , and his ministers a flame of fire .
text2: Lakini kuhusu malaika , Mungu alisema : " Mungu awafanya malaika wake kuwa pepo , na watumishi wake kuwa ndimi za moto . "

text: But unto the Son he saith , Thy throne , O God , is for ever and ever : a sceptre of righteousness is the sceptre of thy kingdom .
text2: Lakini kumhusu Mwana , Mungu alisema : " Utawala wako ee Mungu , wadumu milele na milele ! Wewe wawatawala watu wako kwa haki .

text: Thou hast loved righteousness , and hated iniquity ; therefore God , even thy God , hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows .
text2: Wewe wapenda uadilifu na kuchukia uovu . Ndiyo maana Mungu , Mungu wako amekuweka wakfu na kukumiminia furaha kubwa zaidi kuliko wenzako . "

text: And , Thou , Lord , in the beginning hast laid the foundation of the earth ; and the heavens are the works of thine hands :
text2: Pia alisema : " Bwana , wewe uliumba dunia hapo mwanzo , mbingu ni kazi ya mikono yako .

text: They shall perish ; but thou remainest ; and they all shall wax old as doth a garment ;
text2: Hizo zitatoweka , lakini wewe wabaki daima , zote zitachakaa kama vazi .

text: And as a vesture shalt thou fold them up , and they shall be changed : but thou art the same , and thy years shall not fail .
text2: Utazikunjakunja kama koti , nazo zitabadilishwa kama vazi . Lakini wewe ni yuleyule daima , na maisha yako hayatakoma . "

text: But to which of the angels said he at any time , Sit on my right hand , until I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: Mungu hakumwambia kamwe hata mmoja wa malaika wake : " Keti upande wangu wa kulia , mpaka niwaweke adui zako chini ya miguu yako . "

text: Are they not all ministering spirits , sent forth to minister for them who shall be heirs of salvation ?
text2: Malaika ni roho tu wanaomtumikia Mungu , na Mungu huwatuma wawasaidie wale watakaopokea wokovu .

text: Therefore we ought to give the more earnest heed to the things which we have heard , lest at any time we should let them slip .
text2: Kwa sababu hiyo tunapaswa kuzingatia kwa makini zaidi yote tuliyosikia , ili tusije tukapotoshwa .

text: For if the word spoken by angels was stedfast , and every transgression and disobedience received a just recompence of reward ;
text2: Ujumbe ule waliopewa wazee wetu na malaika ulionyeshwa kuwa kweli , hata mtu yeyote ambaye hakuufuata au hakuutii aliadhibiwa kama alivyostahili .

text: How shall we escape , if we neglect so great salvation ; which at the first began to be spoken by the Lord , and was confirmed unto us by them that heard him ;
text2: Basi , sisi tutaokokaje kama hatuujali wokovu mkuu kama huu ? Kwanza Bwana mwenyewe aliutangaza wokovu huu , na wale waliomsikia walituthibitishia kwamba ni kweli .

text: God also bearing them witness , both with signs and wonders , and with divers miracles , and gifts of the Holy Ghost , according to his own will ?
text2: Mungu pia aliongeza hapo ushahidi wake kwa kufanya kila namna ya miujiza na maajabu , na kwa kuwagawia watu vipaji vya Roho Mtakatifu kadiri ya mapenzi yake .

text: For unto the angels hath he not put in subjection the world to come , whereof we speak .
text2: Mungu hakuwaweka malaika wautawale ulimwengu ujao , yaani ulimwengu ule tunaoongea habari zake .

text: But one in a certain place testified , saying , What is man , that thou art mindful of him ? or the son of man , that thou visitest him ?
text2: Tena yasemwa mahali fulani katika Maandiko : " Mtu ni nini ee Mungu , hata umfikirie ; mwanaadamu ni nini hata umjali ?

text: Thou madest him a little lower than the angels ; thou crownedst him with glory and honour , and didst set him over the works of thy hands :
text2: Ulimfanya kwa kitambo kidogo kuwa chini zaidi kuliko malaika ; ukamvika taji ya utukufu na heshima ,

text: Thou hast put all things in subjection under his feet . For in that he put all in subjection under him , he left nothing that is not put under him . But now we see not yet all things put under him .
text2: ukaweka kila kitu chini ya miguu yake , avitawale . " Yasemwa kwamba Mungu alimweka mtu kuwa mtawala wa vitu vyote yaani bila kuacha hata kimoja . Hata hivyo , hatuoni bado mtu akivitawala vitu vyote sasa .

text: But we see Jesus , who was made a little lower than the angels for the suffering of death , crowned with glory and honour ; that he by the grace of God should taste death for every man .
text2: Lakini twamwona Yesu ambaye alifanywa kwa kitambo kidogo kuwa chini zaidi kuliko malaika , ili kwa neema ya Mungu afe kwa ajili ya watu wote . Sasa tunamwona ametawazwa kwa utukufu na heshima kwa sababu ya kifo alichoteseka .

text: For it became him , for whom are all things , and by whom are all things , in bringing many sons unto glory , to make the captain of their salvation perfect through sufferings .
text2: Ilikuwa haki tupu kwamba Mungu , ambaye huumba na kutegemeza vitu vyote , alimfanya Yesu kuwa mkamilifu kabisa kwa njia ya mateso , ili awalete watoto wengi waushiriki utukufu wake . Maana Yesu ndiye anayewaongoza kwenye wokovu .

text: For both he that sanctifieth and they who are sanctified are all of one : for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren ,
text2: Yeye anawatakasa watu dhambi zao , naye pamoja na wale waliotakaswa , wote wanaye Baba mmoja . Ndiyo maana Yesu haoni aibu kuwaita hao ndugu zake ;

text: Saying , I will declare thy name unto my brethren , in the midst of the church will I sing praise unto thee .
text2: kama asemavyo : " Ee Mungu , nitawatangazia ndugu zangu matendo yako . Nitakusifu katika kusanyiko lao . "

text: And again , I will put my trust in him . And again , Behold I and the children which God hath given me .
text2: Tena asema : " Nitamwekea Mungu tumaini langu . " Na tena : " Mimi niko hapa pamoja na watoto alionipa Mungu . "

text: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood , he also himself likewise took part of the same ; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death , that is , the devil ;
text2: Basi , kwa vile watoto hao , kama awaitavyo , ni watu wenye mwili na damu , Yesu mwenyewe akawa kama wao na kushiriki ubinadamu wao . Alifanya hivyo ili kwa njia ya kifo chake amwangamize Ibilisi , ambaye ana mamlaka juu ya kifo ,

text: And deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage .
text2: na hivyo awaokoe wale waliokuwa watumwa maisha yao yote kwa sababu ya hofu yao ya kifo .

text: For verily he took not on him the nature of angels ; but he took on him the seed of Abraham .
text2: Maana ni wazi kwamba yeye hakuja kwa ajili ya kuwasaidia malaika , bali kama yasemavyo Maandiko ; " Anawasaidia wazawa wa Abrahamu . "

text: Wherefore in all things it behoved him to be made like unto his brethren , that he might be a merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God , to make reconciliation for the sins of the people .
text2: Ndiyo maana ilimbidi awe kama ndugu zake kwa kila namna , ili awe Kuhani Mkuu wao aliye mwaminifu na mwenye huruma katika kumtumikia Mungu , ili dhambi za watu ziondolewe .

text: For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted , he is able to succour them that are tempted .
text2: Na , anaweza sasa kuwasaidia wale wanaojaribiwa na kuteswa .

text: Wherefore , holy brethren , partakers of the heavenly calling , consider the Apostle and High Priest of our profession , Christ Jesus ;
text2: Ndugu zangu watu wa Mungu ambao mmeitwa na Mungu , fikirini juu ya Yesu ambaye Mungu alimtuma awe Kuhani Mkuu wa imani tunayoiungama .

text: Who was faithful to him that appointed him , as also Moses was faithful in all his house .
text2: Yeye alikuwa mwaminifu kwa Mungu aliyemteua kufanya kazi yake kama vile Mose alivyokuwa mwaminifu katika nyumba yote ya Mungu .

text: For this man was counted worthy of more glory than Moses , inasmuch as he who hath builded the house hath more honour than the house .
text2: Mjenzi wa nyumba hupata heshima zaidi kuliko hiyo nyumba yenyewe . Hali kadhalika naye Yesu anastahili heshima kubwa zaidi kuliko Mose .

text: For every house is builded by some man ; but he that built all things is God .
text2: Kila nyumba hujengwa na mjenzi fulani - - na Mungu ndiye mjenzi wa vitu vyote .

text: And Moses verily was faithful in all his house , as a servant , for a testimony of those things which were to be spoken after ;
text2: Mose alikuwa mwaminifu katika nyumba yote ya Bwana kama mtumishi , na alinena juu ya mambo ambayo Mungu atayasema hapo baadaye .

text: But Christ as a son over his own house ; whose house are we , if we hold fast the confidence and the rejoicing of the hope firm unto the end .
text2: Lakini Kristo ni mwaminifu kama Mwana mwenye mamlaka juu ya nyumba ya Mungu . Sisi ni nyumba yake kama tukizingatia uhodari wetu na uthabiti wetu katika kile tunachotumainia .

text: Wherefore ( as the Holy Ghost saith , To day if ye will hear his voice ,
text2: Kwa hiyo , basi , kama asemavyo Roho Mtakatifu : " Kama mkisikia sauti ya Mungu leo ,

text: Harden not your hearts , as in the provocation , in the day of temptation in the wilderness :
text2: msiifanye mioyo yenu kuwa migumu kama wazee wenu walivyokuwa wakati walipomwasi Mungu ; kama walivyokuwa siku ile kule jangwani ,

text: When your fathers tempted me , proved me , and saw my works forty years .
text2: Huko wazee wenu walinijaribu na kunichunguza , asema Bwana , ingawa walikuwa wameyaona matendo yangu kwa miaka arobaini .

text: Wherefore I was grieved with that generation , and said , They do alway err in their heart ; and they have not known my ways .
text2: Kwa sababu hiyo niliwakasirikia watu hao nikasema , Fikira za watu hawa zimepotoka , hawajapata kamwe kuzijua njia zangu .

text: So I sware in my wrath , They shall not enter into my rest . )
text2: Basi , nilikasirika , nikaapa : Hawataingia huko ambako ningewapa pumziko . "

text: Take heed , brethren , lest there be in any of you an evil heart of unbelief , in departing from the living God .
text2: Basi ndugu , jihadharini asije akawako yeyote miongoni mwenu aliye na moyo mbaya hivyo na asiyeamini hata kujitenga na Mungu aliye hai .

text: But exhort one another daily , while it is called To day ; lest any of you be hardened through the deceitfulness of sin .
text2: Maadamu hiyo " Leo " inayosemwa katika Maandiko bado inatuhusu sisi , mnapaswa kusaidiana daima , ili mtu yeyote miongoni mwenu asidanganywe na dhambi na kuwa mkaidi .

text: For we are made partakers of Christ , if we hold the beginning of our confidence stedfast unto the end ;
text2: Maana sisi tunashirikiana na Kristo ikiwa tutazingatia kwa uthabiti tumaini tulilokuwa nalo mwanzoni .

text: While it is said , To day if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts , as in the provocation .
text2: Maandiko yasema hivi : " Kama mkisikia sauti ya Mungu leo , msiifanye mioyo yenu kuwa migumu kama wazee wenu walivyokuwa wakati walipomwasi Mungu . "

text: For some , when they had heard , did provoke : howbeit not all that came out of Egypt by Moses .
text2: Ni akina nani basi , waliosikia sauti ya Mungu wakamwasi ? Ni wale wote walioongozwa na Mose kutoka Misri .

text: But with whom was he grieved forty years ? was it not with them that had sinned , whose carcases fell in the wilderness ?
text2: Mungu aliwakasirikia akina nani kwa miaka arobaini ? Aliwakasirikia wale waliotenda dhambi , maiti zao zikatapakaa kule jangwani .

text: And to whom sware he that they should not enter into his rest , but to them that believed not ?
text2: Mungu alipoapa : " Hawataingia huko ambako ningewapa pumziko , " alikuwa anawasema akina nani ? Alikuwa anasema juu ya hao walioasi .

text: So we see that they could not enter in because of unbelief .
text2: Basi , twaona kwamba hawakuingia huko kwa sababu hawakuamini .

text: Let us therefore fear , lest , a promise being left us of entering into his rest , any of you should seem to come short of it .
text2: Mungu alituahidia kwamba tutaweza kupata pumziko hilo alilosema . Basi , na tuogope ili yeyote kati yenu asije akashindwa kupata pumziko hilo .

text: For unto us was the gospel preached , as well as unto them : but the word preached did not profit them , not being mixed with faith in them that heard it .
text2: Maana Habari Njema imehubiriwa kwetu kama vile ilivyohubiriwa kwa hao watu wa kale . Lakini ujumbe huo haukuwafaa chochote , maana waliusikia lakini hawakuupokea kwa imani .

text: For we which have believed do enter into rest , as he said , As I have sworn in my wrath , if they shall enter into my rest : although the works were finished from the foundation of the world .
text2: Basi , sisi tunaoamini tunapata pumziko hilo aliloahidi Mungu . Kama alivyosema : " Nilikasirika , nikaapa : Hawataingia huko ambako ningewapa pumziko . " Mungu alisema hayo ingawa kazi yake ilikuwa imekwisha malizika tangu alipoumba ulimwengu .

text: For he spake in a certain place of the seventh day on this wise , And God did rest the seventh day from all his works .
text2: Maana Maandiko yasema mahali fulani kuhusu siku ya saba : " Mungu alipumzika siku ya saba , akaacha kazi zake zote . "

text: And in this place again , If they shall enter into my rest .
text2: Tena jambo hili lasemwa pia : " Hawataingia huko ambako ningewapa pumziko . "

text: Seeing therefore it remaineth that some must enter therein , and they to whom it was first preached entered not in because of unbelief :
text2: Wale waliotangulia kuhubiriwa Habari Njema hawakupata pumziko hilo kwa sababu hawakuamini . Wapo , basi , wengine ambao wangejaliwa kulipata .

text: Again , he limiteth a certain day , saying in David , To day , after so long a time ; as it is said , To day if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts .
text2: Jambo hili ni wazi , kwani Mungu aliweka siku nyingine ambayo inaitwa " Leo " . Miaka mingi baadaye Mungu alisema juu ya hiyo siku kwa maneno ya Daudi katika Maandiko yaliyokwisha tajwa : " Kama mkisikia sauti ya Mungu leo , msiifanye mioyo yenu kuwa migumu . "

text: For if Jesus had given them rest , then would he not afterward have spoken of another day .
text2: Kama Yoshua angaliwapa watu hao hilo pumziko , Mungu hangalisema baadaye juu ya siku nyingine .

text: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God .
text2: Kwa hiyo , basi , bado lipo pumziko kwa watu wa Mungu kama kule kupumzika kwake Mungu siku ya saba .

text: For he that is entered into his rest , he also hath ceased from his own works , as God did from his .
text2: Maana , kila anayepata pumziko aliloahidi Mungu atapumzika baada ya kazi yake kama vile pia Mungu alivyopumzika baada ya yake .

text: Let us labour therefore to enter into that rest , lest any man fall after the same example of unbelief .
text2: Basi , tujitahidi kupata pumziko hilo , ili asiwepo yeyote miongoni mwenu atakayeshindwa , kama walivyofanya wao kwa sababu ya ukosefu wao wa imani .

text: For the word of God is quick , and powerful , and sharper than any twoedged sword , piercing even to the dividing asunder of soul and spirit , and of the joints and marrow , and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart .
text2: Neno la Mungu ni hai na lina nguvu ; ni kali zaidi kuliko upanga wenye makali kuwili . Hukata kabisa mpaka mahali ambapo moyo na roho hukutana , mpaka pale vikutanapo viungo vya mwili na mafuta . Neno hilo huchambua nia na fikira za mioyo ya watu .

text: Neither is there any creature that is not manifest in his sight : but all things are naked and opened unto the eyes of him with whom we have to do .
text2: Hakuna kiumbe chochote kilichofichika mbele ya Mungu ; kila kitu kimefunuliwa wazi mbele ya macho yake . Kwake , sisi sote tutapaswa kutoa hoja ya matendo yetu .

text: Seeing then that we have a great high priest , that is passed into the heavens , Jesus the Son of God , let us hold fast our profession .
text2: Basi , tunapaswa kuzingatia kwa uthabiti imani tunayoiungama . Maana tunaye Kuhani Mkuu aliyeingia mpaka kwa Mungu mwenyewe - - Yesu , Mwana wa Mungu .

text: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities ; but was in all points tempted like as we are , yet without sin .
text2: Huyu Kuhani Mkuu wetu si mmoja ambaye hawezi kutuunga mkono katika unyonge wetu , ila ni Kuhani Mkuu ambaye alijaribiwa kama sisi kwa kila namna lakini hakutenda dhambi .

text: Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace , that we may obtain mercy , and find grace to help in time of need .
text2: Basi , na tukikaribie bila hofu kiti cha enzi cha Mungu , palipo na neema , ili tukajipatie huruma na neema ya kutusaidia wakati wa lazima .

text: For every high priest taken from among men is ordained for men in things pertaining to God , that he may offer both gifts and sacrifices for sins :
text2: Kila kuhani mkuu huchaguliwa kutoka miongoni mwa watu kwa ajili ya kumtumikia Mungu kwa niaba yao , kutolea zawadi na tambiko kwa ajili ya dhambi zao .

text: Who can have compassion on the ignorant , and on them that are out of the way ; for that he himself also is compassed with infirmity .
text2: Maadamu yeye mwenyewe yu dhaifu anaweza kuwaonea huruma wale wasiojua kitu na wanaofanya makosa .

text: And by reason hereof he ought , as for the people , so also for himself , to offer for sins .
text2: Na kwa vile yeye mwenyewe ni dhaifu , anapaswa kutolea dhabihu si tu kwa ajili ya watu , bali pia kwa ajili ya dhambi zake .

text: And no man taketh this honour unto himself , but he that is called of God , as was Aaron .
text2: Hakuna mtu awezaye kujitwalia mwenyewe heshima ya kuwa kuhani mkuu . Kila mmoja huteuliwa na Mungu kuwa kuhani mkuu kama alivyokuwa Aroni .

text: So also Christ glorified not himself to be made an high priest ; but he that said unto him , Thou art my Son , to day have I begotten thee .
text2: Hali kadhalika naye Kristo hakujitwalia mwenyewe heshima ya kuwa kuhani mkuu , bali Mungu alimwambia : " Wewe ni Mwanangu ; mimi leo nimekuwa baba yako . "

text: As he saith also in another place , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Alisema pia mahali pengine : " Wewe ni kuhani milele , kufuatana na utaratibu wa ukuhani wa Melkisedeki . "

text: Who in the days of his flesh , when he had offered up prayers and supplications with strong crying and tears unto him that was able to save him from death , and was heard in that he feared ;
text2: Yesu alipokuwa anaishi hapa duniani , kwa kilio kikuu na machozi , alisali na kumwomba Mungu ambaye alikuwa na uwezo wa kumwokoa kutoka kifo ; naye alisikilizwa kwa sababu ya kumcha Mungu .

text: Though he were a Son , yet learned he obedience by the things which he suffered ;
text2: Lakini , ingawa alikuwa Mwana wa Mungu , alijifunza kutii kwa njia ya mateso .

text: And being made perfect , he became the author of eternal salvation unto all them that obey him ;
text2: Na alipofanywa mkamilifu , akawa chanzo cha wokovu wa milele kwa wale wote wanaomtii ,

text: Called of God an high priest after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: naye Mungu akamteua kuwa kuhani mkuu kufuatana na utaratibu wa ukuhani wa Melkisedeki .

text: Of whom we have many things to say , and hard to be uttered , seeing ye are dull of hearing .
text2: Tunayo Mengi ya kusema juu ya jambo hili , lakini ni vigumu kuwaelezeni , kwa sababu ninyi si wepesi wa kuelewa .

text: For when for the time ye ought to be teachers , ye have need that one teach you again which be the first principles of the oracles of God ; and are become such as have need of milk , and not of strong meat .
text2: Sasa mngalipaswa kuwa tayari walimu , lakini mnahitaji bado mtu wa kuwafundisheni mafundisho ya mwanzo ya ujumbe wa Mungu . Badala ya kula chakula kigumu , mnapaswa bado kunywa maziwa .

text: For every one that useth milk is unskilful in the word of righteousness : for he is a babe .
text2: Kila anayepaswa kunywa maziwa huyo ni mtoto bado , hajui uadilifu ni nini .

text: But strong meat belongeth to them that are of full age , even those who by reason of use have their senses exercised to discern both good and evil .
text2: Lakini chakula kigumu ni kwa ajili ya watu waliokomaa , ambao wanaweza kubainisha mema na mabaya .

text: Therefore leaving the principles of the doctrine of Christ , let us go on unto perfection ; not laying again the foundation of repentance from dead works , and of faith toward God ,
text2: Basi , tusonge mbele kwa yale yaliyokomaa na kuyaacha nyuma yale mafundisho ya mwanzo ya Kikristo . Hatuhitaji kuweka msingi tena kwa kurudia yale mafundisho ya mwanzo kama vile kuachana na matendo ya kifo , kumwamini Mungu ;

text: Of the doctrine of baptisms , and of laying on of hands , and of resurrection of the dead , and of eternal judgment .
text2: mafundisho juu ya ubatizo na kuwekewa mikono ; ufufuo wa wafu na hukumu ya milele .

text: And this will we do , if God permit .
text2: tusonge mbele ! Hayo tutayafanya , Mungu akitujalia .

text: For it is impossible for those who were once enlightened , and have tasted of the heavenly gift , and were made partakers of the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Maana watu wanaoiasi imani yao inawezekanaje kuwarudisha watubu tena ? Watu hao walikwisha kuwa katika mwanga wa Mungu , walikwisha onja zawadi ya mbinguni na kushirikishwa Roho Mtakatifu ;

text: And have tasted the good word of God , and the powers of the world to come ,
text2: walikwisha onja wema wa neno la Mungu na nguvu za ulimwengu ujao ,

text: If they shall fall away , to renew them again unto repentance ; seeing they crucify to themselves the Son of God afresh , and put him to an open shame .
text2: kisha wakaiasi imani yao ! Haiwezekani kuwarudisha watubu tena , kwa sababu wanamsulubisha tena Mwana wa Mungu na kumwaibisha hadharani .

text: For the earth which drinketh in the rain that cometh oft upon it , and bringeth forth herbs meet for them by whom it is dressed , receiveth blessing from God :
text2: Mungu huibariki ardhi ambayo huipokea mvua inayoinyeshea mara kwa mara , na kuotesha mimea ya faida kwa mkulima .

text: But that which beareth thorns and briers is rejected , and is nigh unto cursing ; whose end is to be burned .
text2: Lakini kama ardhi hiyo ikiota miti ya miiba na magugu , haina faida ; karibu italaaniwa na Mungu na mwisho wake ni kuchomwa moto .

text: But , beloved , we are persuaded better things of you , and things that accompany salvation , though we thus speak .
text2: Lakini , ingawa twasema namna hii , wapenzi wetu , tunalo tumaini kubwa juu ya hali yenu . Tunajua kwamba mmepokea baraka zile bora za wokovu wenu .

text: For God is not unrighteous to forget your work and labour of love , which ye have shewed toward his name , in that ye have ministered to the saints , and do minister .
text2: Mungu hakosi haki ; yeye hataisahau kazi mliyoifanya au upendo mlioonyesha kwa ajili ya jina lake katika huduma mliyowapa na mnayowapa sasa watu wake .

text: And we desire that every one of you do shew the same diligence to the full assurance of hope unto the end :
text2: Hamu yetu ni kwamba kila mmoja wenu aonyeshe bidii hiyohiyo mpaka mwisho , ili yale mnayotumainia yapate kutimia .

text: That ye be not slothful , but followers of them who through faith and patience inherit the promises .
text2: Msiwe wavivu , bali muwe kama wale wanaoamini na wenye uvumilivu na hivyo wanapokea yake aliyoahidi Mungu .

text: For when God made promise to Abraham , because he could swear by no greater , he sware by himself ,
text2: Mungu alipompa Abrahamu ahadi , aliapa kwa jina lake mwenyewe , maana hakuna aliye mkuu kuliko Mungu ambaye kwa huyo angeweza kuapa .

text: Saying , Surely blessing I will bless thee , and multiplying I will multiply thee .
text2: Mungu alisema : " Hakika nitakubariki na nitakupa wazawa wengi . "

text: And so , after he had patiently endured , he obtained the promise .
text2: Abrahamu alisubiri kwa uvumilivu na hivyo alipokea kile alichoahidiwa na Mungu .

text: For men verily swear by the greater : and an oath for confirmation is to them an end of all strife .
text2: Watu wanapoapa , huapa kwa mmoja aliye mkuu zaidi kuliko wao , na kiapo hicho husuluhisha ubishi wote .

text: Wherein God , willing more abundantly to shew unto the heirs of promise the immutability of his counsel , confirmed it by an oath :
text2: Naye Mungu aliimarisha ahadi yake kwa kiapo ; na kwa namna hiyo akawaonyesha wazi wale aliowaahidia kwamba hatabadili nia yake .

text: That by two immutable things , in which it was impossible for God to lie , we might have a strong consolation , who have fled for refuge to lay hold upon the hope set before us :
text2: Basi , kuna vitu hivi viwili : ahadi na kiapo , ambavyo haviwezi kubadilika na wala juu ya hivyo Mungu hawezi kusema uongo . Kwa hiyo sisi tuliokimbilia usalama kwake , tunapewa moyo wa kushikilia imara tumaini lililowekwa mbele yetu .

text: Which hope we have as an anchor of the soul , both sure and stedfast , and which entereth into that within the veil ;
text2: Tunalo tumaini hilo kama nanga ya maisha yetu . Tumaini hilo ni imara na thabiti , nalo lapenya lile pazia la hekalu la mbinguni mpaka patakatifu ndani .

text: Whither the forerunner is for us entered , even Jesus , made an high priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Yesu ametangulia kuingia humo kwa niaba yetu , na amekuwa kuhani mkuu milele , kufuatana na utaratibu wa ukuhani wa Melkisedeki .

text: For this Melchisedec , king of Salem , priest of the most high God , who met Abraham returning from the slaughter of the kings , and blessed him ;
text2: Melkisedeki alikuwa mfalme wa Salemu , na kuhani wa Mungu Mkuu . Abrahamu alipokuwa anarudi kutoka vitani ambako aliwaua wafalme , Melkisedeki alikutana naye akambariki ,

text: To whom also Abraham gave a tenth part of all ; first being by interpretation King of righteousness , and after that also King of Salem , which is , King of peace ;
text2: naye Abrahamu akampa sehemu ya kumi ya vitu vyote alivyokuwa navyo . ( Maana ya kwanza ya jina hili Melkisedeki ni " Mfalme wa Uadilifu " ; na , kwa vile yeye alikuwa mfalme wa Salemu , jina lake pia lina maana ya " Mfalme wa Amani . " )

text: Without father , without mother , without descent , having neither beginning of days , nor end of life ; but made like unto the Son of God ; abideth a priest continually .
text2: Baba yake na mama yake hawatajwi , wala ukoo wake hautajwi ; haisemwi alizaliwa lini au alikufa lini . Anafanana na Mwana wa Mungu , na anaendelea kuwa kuhani daima .

text: Now consider how great this man was , unto whom even the patriarch Abraham gave the tenth of the spoils .
text2: Basi , mwaona jinsi mtu huyu alivyokuwa maarufu . Baba Abrahamu alimpa sehemu moja ya kumi ya vitu vyote alivyoteka vitani .

text: And verily they that are of the sons of Levi , who receive the office of the priesthood , have a commandment to take tithes of the people according to the law , that is , of their brethren , though they come out of the loins of Abraham :
text2: Tunajua vilevile kwamba kufuatana na Sheria , wana wa Lawi ambao ni makuhani , wanayo haki ya kuchukua sehemu ya kumi kutoka kwa watu , yaani ndugu zao , ingawaje nao ni watoto wa Abrahamu .

text: But he whose descent is not counted from them received tithes of Abraham , and blessed him that had the promises .
text2: Lakini huyo Melkisedeki hakuwa wa ukoo wa Lawi , hata hivyo alipokea sehemu ya kumi kutoka kwa Abrahamu ; tena akambariki yeye ambaye alikuwa amepewa ahadi ya Mungu .

text: And without all contradiction the less is blessed of the better .
text2: Hakuna mashaka hata kidogo kwamba anayebariki ni mkuu zaidi kuliko yule anayebarikiwa .

text: And here men that die receive tithes ; but there he receiveth them , of whom it is witnessed that he liveth .
text2: Tena , hao makuhani wanaopokea sehemu ya kumi , ni watu ambao hufa ; lakini hapa anayepokea sehemu ya kumi , yaani Melkisedeki , anasemekana kwamba hafi .

text: And as I may so say , Levi also , who receiveth tithes , payed tithes in Abraham .
text2: Twaweza , basi , kusema kwamba Abrahamu alipotoa sehemu moja ya kumi , Lawi ( ambaye watoto wake hupokea sehemu moja ya kumi ) alitoa sehemu moja ya kumi pia .

text: For he was yet in the loins of his father , when Melchisedec met him .
text2: Maana Lawi hakuwa amezaliwa bado , bali ni kama alikuwa katika mwili wa baba yake , Abrahamu , wakati Melkisedeki alipokutana naye .

text: If therefore perfection were by the Levitical priesthood , ( for under it the people received the law , ) what further need was there that another priest should rise after the order of Melchisedec , and not be called after the order of Aaron ?
text2: Kutokana na ukuhani wa Walawi , watu wa Israeli walipewa Sheria . Sasa , kama huduma ya Walawi ingalikuwa kamilifu hapangekuwa tena na haja ya kutokea ukuhani mwingine tofauti , ukuhani ambao umefuata utaratibu wa ukuhani wa Melkisedeki , na si ule wa Aroni .

text: For the priesthood being changed , there is made of necessity a change also of the law .
text2: Maana ukuhani ukibadilika ni lazima Sheria nayo ibadilike .

text: For he of whom these things are spoken pertaineth to another tribe , of which no man gave attendance at the altar .
text2: Naye Bwana wetu ambaye mambo hayo yote yanasemwa juu yake , alikuwa wa kabila lingine , na wala hakuna hata mmoja wa kabila lake aliyepata kutumikia madhabahuni akiwa kuhani .

text: For it is evident that our Lord sprang out of Juda ; of which tribe Moses spake nothing concerning priesthood .
text2: Inafahamika wazi kwamba yeye alizaliwa katika kabila la Yuda ambalo Mose hakulitaja alipokuwa anasema juu ya makuhani .

text: And it is yet far more evident : for that after the similitude of Melchisedec there ariseth another priest ,
text2: Tena jambo hili ni dhahiri zaidi : kuhani mwingine anayefanana na Melkisedeki amekwisha tokea .

text: Who is made , not after the law of a carnal commandment , but after the power of an endless life .
text2: Yeye hakufanywa kuwa kuhani kwa sheria na maagizo ya kibinadamu , bali kwa nguvu ya uhai ambao hauna mwisho .

text: For he testifieth , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Maana Maandiko yasema : " Wewe ni kuhani milele , kufuatana na utaratibu wa ukuhani wa Melkisedeki . "

text: For there is verily a disannulling of the commandment going before for the weakness and unprofitableness thereof .
text2: Basi , ile amri ya zamani ilifutwa kwa sababu ilikuwa hafifu na isiyofaa kitu .

text: For the law made nothing perfect , but the bringing in of a better hope did ; by the which we draw nigh unto God .
text2: Maana Sheria ya Mose haikuweza kukamilisha jambo lolote . Lakini sasa , mahali pake pamewekwa tumaini lililo bora zaidi ambalo kwalo tunaweza kumkaribia Mungu .

text: And inasmuch as not without an oath he was made priest :
text2: Zaidi ya hayo hapa pana kiapo cha Mungu . Wakati wale wengine walipofanywa makuhani hapakuwako kiapo .

text: ( For those priests were made without an oath ; but this with an oath by him that said unto him , The Lord sware and will not repent , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec : )
text2: Lakini Yesu alifanywa kuhani kwa kiapo wakati Mungu alipomwambia : " Bwana ameapa , wala hataigeuza nia yake : Wewe ni kuhani milele . "

text: By so much was Jesus made a surety of a better testament .
text2: Basi , kutokana na tofauti hii , Yesu amekuwa mdhamini wa agano lililo bora zaidi .

text: And they truly were many priests , because they were not suffered to continue by reason of death :
text2: Kuna tofauti nyingine pia : hao makuhani wengine walikuwa wengi kwa sababu walikufa na hawakuweza kuendelea na kazi yao .

text: But this man , because he continueth ever , hath an unchangeable priesthood .
text2: Lakini Yesu si kama wao , yeye anaishi milele ; ukuhani wake hauondoki kwake .

text: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him , seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them .
text2: Hivyo , yeye anaweza daima kuwaokoa kabisa wote wanaomwendea Mungu kwa njia yake , maana yeye anaishi milele kuwaombea kwa Mungu .

text: For such an high priest became us , who is holy , harmless , undefiled , separate from sinners , and made higher than the heavens ;
text2: Basi , Yesu ndiye Kuhani Mkuu ambaye anatufaa sana katika mahitaji yetu . Yeye ni mtakatifu , hana hatia wala dhambi ndani yake ; hayumo katika kundi la wenye dhambi na ameinuliwa mpaka juu mbinguni .

text: Who needeth not daily , as those high priests , to offer up sacrifice , first for his own sins , and then for the people ' s : for this he did once , when he offered up himself .
text2: Yeye si kama wale makuhani wakuu wengine ; hana haja ya kutoa dhabihu kila siku , kwanza kwa ajili ya dhambi zake mwenyewe , kisha kwa ajili ya dhambi za watu . Yeye alifanya hivyo mara moja tu wakati alipojitoa yeye mwenyewe , na hiyo yatosha kwa nyakati zote .

text: For the law maketh men high priests which have infirmity ; but the word of the oath , which was since the law , maketh the Son , who is consecrated for evermore .
text2: Sheria ya Mose huwateua watu waliokuwa dhaifu kuwa makuhani wakuu ; lakini ahadi ya Mungu aliyoifanya kwa kiapo na ambayo imefika baada ya sheria imemteua Mwana ambaye amefanywa mkamilifu milele .

text: Now of the things which we have spoken this is the sum : We have such an high priest , who is set on the right hand of the throne of the Majesty in the heavens ;
text2: Basi , jambo muhimu katika hayo tunayosema ni hili : sisi tunaye Kuhani Mkuu wa namna hiyo , ambaye anaketi upande wa kulia wa kiti cha enzi cha Mwenyezi Mungu mbinguni .

text: A minister of the sanctuary , and of the true tabernacle , which the Lord pitched , and not man .
text2: Yeye hutoa huduma ya Kuhani Mkuu katika Mahali Patakatifu sana , yaani ndani ya ile hema ya kweli iliyojengwa na Bwana , siyo na binadamu .

text: For every high priest is ordained to offer gifts and sacrifices : wherefore it is of necessity that this man have somewhat also to offer .
text2: Kila Kuhani Mkuu ameteuliwa kumtolea Mungu vipawa na dhabihu , na hivyo Kuhani Mkuu wetu lazima pia awe na kitu cha kutolea .

text: For if he were on earth , he should not be a priest , seeing that there are priests that offer gifts according to the law :
text2: Kama yeye angekuwa wa hapa duninani , asingekuwa kamwe kuhani , kwani wako makuhani wengine wanaotoa sadaka kufuatana na Sheria .

text: Who serve unto the example and shadow of heavenly things , as Moses was admonished of God when he was about to make the tabernacle : for , See , saith he , that thou make all things according to the pattern shewed to thee in the mount .
text2: Huduma zao za kikuhani ni mfano tu na kivuli cha yale yaliyoko mbinguni . Ndivyo pia ilivyokuwa kwa Mose . Wakati alipokuwa karibu kuitengeneza ile hema , Mungu alimwambia : " Tengeneza kila kitu kufuatana na ule mfano ulioonyeshwa kule mlimani . "

text: But now hath he obtained a more excellent ministry , by how much also he is the mediator of a better covenant , which was established upon better promises .
text2: Lakini sasa Yesu amepewa huduma ya kikuhani iliyo bora zaidi kuliko yao , kama vile agano alilothibitisha kati ya watu na Mungu ni bora zaidi , kwani lina msingi wake katika ahadi za mambo yaliyo bora zaidi .

text: For if that first covenant had been faultless , then should no place have been sought for the second .
text2: Maana kama lile agano la kwanza halingalikuwa na dosari , hakungalikuwa na haja ya agano la pili .

text: For finding fault with them , he saith , Behold , the days come , saith the Lord , when I will make a new covenant with the house of Israel and with the house of Judah :
text2: Lakini Mungu aliwalaumu watu wake aliposema : " Siku zinakuja , asema Bwana , ambapo nitafanya agano jipya na watu wa Israeli na kabila la Yuda .

text: Not according to the covenant that I made with their fathers in the day when I took them by the hand to lead them out of the land of Egypt ; because they continued not in my covenant , and I regarded them not , saith the Lord .
text2: Agano hili halitakuwa kama lile nililofanya na babu zao siku ile nilipowaongoza kwa mkono kutoka nchi ya Misri . Hawakuwa waaminifu kwa agano langu ; na hivyo mimi sikuwajali , asema Bwana .

text: For this is the covenant that I will make with the house of Israel after those days , saith the Lord ; I will put my laws into their mind , and write them in their hearts : and I will be to them a God , and they shall be to me a people :
text2: Na hili ndilo agano nitakalofanya na watu wa Israeli siku zijazo , asema Bwana : Nitaweka sheria zangu akilini mwao , na kuziandika mioyoni mwao . Mimi nitakuwa Mungu wao , nao watakuwa watu wangu .

text: And they shall not teach every man his neighbour , and every man his brother , saying , Know the Lord : for all shall know me , from the least to the greatest .
text2: Hakuna mtu atakayemfundisha mwananchi mwenzake , wala atakayemwambia ndugu yake : Mjue Bwana . Maana watu wote , wadogo na wakubwa , watanijua mimi .

text: For I will be merciful to their unrighteousness , and their sins and their iniquities will I remember no more .
text2: Nitawasamehe makosa yao , wala sitakumbuka tena dhambi zao . "

text: In that he saith , A new covenant , he hath made the first old . Now that which decayeth and waxeth old is ready to vanish away .
text2: Kwa kusema juu ya agano jipya , Mungu alilichakaza lile la kwanza ; na chochote kinachochakaa na kuwa kikuukuu kitatoweka karibuni .

text: Then verily the first covenant had also ordinances of divine service , and a worldly sanctuary .
text2: Agano la kwanza lilikuwa na taratibu zake za ibada na pia mahali patakatifu pa ibada palipojengwa na watu .

text: For there was a tabernacle made ; the first , wherein was the candlestick , and the table , and the shewbread ; which is called the sanctuary .
text2: Palitengenezwa hema ambayo sehemu yake ya nje iliitwa Mahali Patakatifu . Humo mlikuwa na kinara cha taa , meza na mikate iliyotolewa kwa Mungu .

text: And after the second veil , the tabernacle which is called the Holiest of all ;
text2: Nyuma ya pazia la pili , kulikuwa na hema iliyoitwa Mahali Patakatifu Kupita Pote .

text: Which had the golden censer , and the ark of the covenant overlaid round about with gold , wherein was the golden pot that had manna , and Aaron ' s rod that budded , and the tables of the covenant ;
text2: Humo mlikuwa na madhabahu ya dhahabu kwa ajili ya kufukizia ubani , na Sanduku la Agano , ambalo lilikuwa limepakwa dhahabu pande zote , na ndani yake mlikuwa na chungu cha dhahabu kilichokuwa na mana ; fimbo ya Aroni iliyokuwa imechanua majani , na vile vibao viwili vilivyoandikwa agano .

text: And over it the cherubims of glory shadowing the mercyseat ; of which we cannot now speak particularly .
text2: Juu ya hilo Sanduku kulikuwa na viumbe vilivyodhihirisha kuweko kwa Mungu , na mabawa yao yalitanda juu ya mahali ambapo dhambi huondolewa . Lakini sasa , hatuwezi kusema kinaganaga juu ya mambo hayo .

text: Now when these things were thus ordained , the priests went always into the first tabernacle , accomplishing the service of God .
text2: Mipango hiyo ilitekelezwa kisha ikawa desturi kwa makuhani kuingia kila siku katika hema ya nje kutoa huduma zao .

text: But into the second went the high priest alone once every year , not without blood , which he offered for himself , and for the errors of the people :
text2: Lakini kuhani Mkuu peke yake ndiye anayeingia katika lile hema la pili ; naye hufanya hivyo mara moja tu kwa mwaka . Anapoingia ndani huwa amechukua damu ambayo anamtolea Mungu kwa ajili yake mwenyewe na kwa ajili ya dhambi ambazo watu wamezitenda bila wao wenyewe kujua .

text: The Holy Ghost this signifying , that the way into the holiest of all was not yet made manifest , while as the first tabernacle was yet standing :
text2: Kutokana na taratibu hizo Roho Mtakatifu anafundisha wazi kwamba wakati ile hema ya nje ingali ipo imesimama , njia ya kuingia Mahali Patakatifu haijafunguliwa .

text: Which was a figure for the time then present , in which were offered both gifts and sacrifices , that could not make him that did the service perfect , as pertaining to the conscience ;
text2: Jambo hili ni mfano wa nyakati za sasa . Linaonyesha kwamba zawadi na dhabihu zinazotolewa kwa Mungu haziwezi kuifanya mioyo ya wale wanaoabudu kuwa mikamilifu ,

text: Which stood only in meats and drinks , and divers washings , and carnal ordinances , imposed on them until the time of reformation .
text2: kwani haya yote yanahusika na vyakula , vinywaji na taratibu mbalimbali za kutawadha . Yote hayo ni maagizo ya njenje tu ; na nguvu yake hukoma wakati Mungu atakaporekebisha vitu vyote .

text: But Christ being come an high priest of good things to come , by a greater and more perfect tabernacle , not made with hands , that is to say , not of this building ;
text2: Lakini Kristo amekwisha fika , akiwa Kuhani Mkuu wa mambo yaliyo mema , ambayo sasa yamekwisha fika . Yeye anatoa huduma zake katika hema iliyo bora na kamilifu zaidi , isiyofanywa kwa mikono ya watu , yaani isiyo ya ulimwengu huu ulioumbwa .

text: Neither by the blood of goats and calves , but by his own blood he entered in once into the holy place , having obtained eternal redemption for us .
text2: Yeye aliingia Mahali Patakatifu mara moja tu , tena hakuwa amechukua damu ya mbuzi wala ng ' ombe , bali aliingia kwa damu yake yeye mwenyewe , akatupatia ukombozi wa milele .

text: For if the blood of bulls and of goats , and the ashes of an heifer sprinkling the unclean , sanctifieth to the purifying of the flesh :
text2: Watu waliokuwa najisi kidini waliweza kutakasika na kuwa safi waliponyunyiziwa damu ya mbuzi na ya ng ' ombe pamoja na majivu ya ndama .

text: How much more shall the blood of Christ , who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without spot to God , purge your conscience from dead works to serve the living God ?
text2: Lakini , kwa damu ya Kristo , mambo makuu zaidi hufanyika ! Kwa nguvu za Roho wa milele , Kristo alijitolea mwenyewe dhabihu kamilifu kwa Mungu . Damu yake itatutakasa dhamiri zetu kutokana na matendo yaletayo kifo , ili tupate kumtumikia Mungu aliye hai .

text: And for this cause he is the mediator of the new testament , that by means of death , for the redemption of the transgressions that were under the first testament , they which are called might receive the promise of eternal inheritance .
text2: Kwa hiyo , Kristo ndiye aliyeratibisha agano jipya ili wale walioitwa na Mungu wazipokee baraka za milele walizoahidiwa . Watazipata , kwani kifo kimetokea ambacho huwakomboa watu kutoka yale makosa waliyofanya wakati wa lile agano la kale .

text: For where a testament is , there must also of necessity be the death of the testator .
text2: Kwa kawaida wosia hutambuliwa tu kama kifo cha yule aliyeufanya huo wosia kimethibitishwa .

text: For a testament is of force after men are dead : otherwise it is of no strength at all while the testator liveth .
text2: Wosia hauwezi kutekelezwa mpaka kumetokea kifo , kwani wosia hauna maana ikiwa mwenye kuufanya bado anaishi .

text: Whereupon neither the first testament was dedicated without blood .
text2: Ndiyo maana hata lile agano la kwanza halikuwekwa bila damu kumwagwa .

text: For when Moses had spoken every precept to all the people according to the law , he took the blood of calves and of goats , with water , and scarlet wool , and hyssop , and sprinkled both the book , and all the people ,
text2: Kwanza Mose aliwatangazia watu wote amri zote kama ilivyokuwa katika Sheria ; kisha akachukua damu ya ndama pamoja na maji , na kwa kutumia majani ya mti uitwao husopo na pamba nyekundu , akakinyunyizia kile kitabu cha Sheria na hao watu wote .

text: Saying , This is the blood of the testament which God hath enjoined unto you .
text2: Mose alisema : " Hii ni damu inayothibitisha agano mliloamriwa na Mungu mlitii . "

text: Moreover he sprinkled with blood both the tabernacle , and all the vessels of the ministry .
text2: Vilevile Mose aliinyunyizia damu ile hema na vyombo vya ibada .

text: And almost all things are by the law purged with blood ; and without shedding of blood is no remission .
text2: Naam , kadiri ya Sheria karibu kila kitu chaweza kutakaswa kwa damu , na dhambi nazo zaondolewa tu ikiwa damu imemwagwa .

text: It was therefore necessary that the patterns of things in the heavens should be purified with these ; but the heavenly things themselves with better sacrifices than these .
text2: Vitu hivi ambavyo ni mfano tu wa mambo halisi ya mbinguni , vililazimika kutakaswa kwa namna hiyo . Lakini vitu vya mbinguni huhitaji dhabihu iliyo bora zaidi .

text: For Christ is not entered into the holy places made with hands , which are the figures of the true ; but into heaven itself , now to appear in the presence of God for us :
text2: Maana Kristo hakuingia Mahali Patakatifu palipojengwa kwa mikono ya watu , ambapo ni mfano tu wa kile kilicho halisi . yeye aliingia mbinguni kwenyewe ambako sasa anasimama mbele ya Mungu kwa ajili yetu .

text: Nor yet that he should offer himself often , as the high priest entereth into the holy place every year with blood of others ;
text2: Kuhani Mkuu wa Wayahudi huingia Mahali Patakatifu kila mwaka akiwa amechukua damu ya mnyama ; lakini Kristo hakuingia humo ili ajitoe mwenyewe mara nyingi ,

text: For then must he often have suffered since the foundation of the world : but now once in the end of the world hath he appeared to put away sin by the sacrifice of himself .
