text2: maana ingalikuwa hivyo , Kristo angalipaswa kuteswa mara nyingi tangu kuumbwa ulimwengu . Lakini sasa nyakati hizi zinapokaribia mwisho wake , yeye ametokea mara moja tu , kuondoa dhambi kwa kujitoa yeye mwenyewe dhabihu .

text: And as it is appointed unto men once to die , but after this the judgment :
text2: Basi , kama vile kila mtu hufa mara moja tu , kisha husimama mbele ya hukumu ya Mungu ,

text: So Christ was once offered to bear the sins of many ; and unto them that look for him shall he appear the second time without sin unto salvation .
text2: vivyo hivyo Kristo naye alijitoa dhabihu mara moja tu kwa ajili ya kuziondoa dhambi za wengi . Atakapotokea mara ya pili si kwa ajili ya kupambana na dhambi , bali ni kwa ajili ya kuwaokoa wale wanaomngojea .

text: For the law having a shadow of good things to come , and not the very image of the things , can never with those sacrifices which they offered year by year continually make the comers thereunto perfect .
text2: Sheria ya Wayahudi si picha kamili ya mambo yale halisi : ni kivuli tu cha mema yanayokuja . Dhabihu zilezile hutolewa daima , mwaka baada ya mwaka . Sheria yawezaje , basi , kwa njia ya dhabihu hizo , kuwafanya wale wanaoabudu wawe wakamilifu ?

text: For then would they not have ceased to be offered ? because that the worshippers once purged should have had no more conscience of sins .
text2: Kama hao watu wanaomwabudu Mungu wangekuwa wametakaswa dhambi zao kweli , hawangejisikia tena kuwa na dhambi , na dhabihu hizo zote zingekoma .

text: But in those sacrifices there is a remembrance again made of sins every year .
text2: Lakini dhabihu hizo hufanyika kila mwaka kuwakumbusha watu dhambi zao .

text: For it is not possible that the blood of bulls and of goats should take away sins .
text2: Maana damu ya fahali na mbuzi haiwezi kamwe kuondoa dhambi .

text: Wherefore when he cometh into the world , he saith , Sacrifice and offering thou wouldest not , but a body hast thou prepared me :
text2: Ndiyo maana Kristo alipokuwa anakuja ulimwenguni , alimwambia Mungu : " Hukutaka dhabihu wala sadaka , lakini umenitayarishia mwili .

text: In burnt offerings and sacrifices for sin thou hast had no pleasure .
text2: Sadaka za kuteketezwa au za kuondoa dhambi hazikupendezi .

text: Then said I , Lo , I come ( in the volume of the book it is written of me , ) to do thy will , O God .
text2: Hapo nikasema : Niko hapa ee Mungu , tayari kufanya mapenzi yako kama ilivyoandikwa juu yangu katika kitabu cha Sheria . "

text: Above when he said , Sacrifice and offering and burnt offerings and offering for sin thou wouldest not , neither hadst pleasure therein ; which are offered by the law ;
text2: Kwanza alisema : " Hutaki , wala hupendezwi na dhabihu na sadaka , sadaka za kuteketezwa na za kuondoa dhambi . " Alisema hivyo ingawa sadaka hizi zote hutolewa kufuatana na Sheria .

text: Then said he , Lo , I come to do thy will , O God . He taketh away the first , that he may establish the second .
text2: Kisha akasema : " Niko hapa , ee Mungu , tayari kufanya mapenzi yako . " Hivyo Mungu alibatilisha dhabihu za zamani na mahali pake akaweka dhabihu nyingine moja .

text: By the which will we are sanctified through the offering of the body of Jesus Christ once for all .
text2: Kwa kuwa Yesu Kristo alitimiza mapenzi ya Mungu , sisi tunatakaswa dhambi zetu kwa ile dhabihu ya mwili wake aliyotoa mara moja tu , ikatosha .

text: And every priest standeth daily ministering and offering oftentimes the same sacrifices , which can never take away sins :
text2: Kila kuhani Myahudi humhudumia Mungu kila siku , akitoa dhabibu zilezile mara nyingi , dhabibu ambazo haziwezi kuondoa dhambi .

text: But this man , after he had offered one sacrifice for sins for ever , sat down on the right hand of God ;
text2: Lakini Kristo alitoa dhabihu moja tu kwa ajili ya dhambi , dhabihu ifaayo milele , kisha akaketi upande wa kulia wa Mungu .

text: From henceforth expecting till his enemies be made his footstool .
text2: Huko anangoja mpaka adui zake watakapowekwa kama kibao chini ya miguu yake .

text: For by one offering he hath perfected for ever them that are sanctified .
text2: Basi , kwa dhabihu yake moja tu , amewafanya kuwa wakamilifu milele wale wanaotakaswa dhambi zao .

text: Whereof the Holy Ghost also is a witness to us : for after that he had said before ,
text2: Naye Roho Mtakatifu anatupa ushahidi wake . Kwanza anasema :

text: This is the covenant that I will make with them after those days , saith the Lord , I will put my laws into their hearts , and in their minds will I write them ;
text2: " Hili ndilo agano nitakalofanya nao , katika siku zijazo , asema Bwana : Nitaweka sheria zangu mioyoni mwao , na kuziandika akilini mwao . "

text: And their sins and iniquities will I remember no more .
text2: Kisha akaongeza kusema : " Sitakumbuka tena dhambi zao , wala vitendo vyao vya uhalifu . "

text: Now where remission of these is , there is no more offering for sin .
text2: Basi , dhambi zikisha ondolewa , hakutakuwa na haja tena ya kutoa dhabihu za kuondoa dhambi .

text: Having therefore , brethren , boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus ,
text2: Basi , ndugu , kwa damu ya Yesu tunapewa moyo thabiti wa kuingia Mahali Patakatifu .

text: By a new and living way , which he hath consecrated for us , through the veil , that is to say , his flesh ;
text2: Yeye ametufungulia njia mpya na yenye uzima kupitia lile pazia , yaani kwa njia ya mwili wake mwenyewe .

text: And having an high priest over the house of God ;
text2: Basi , tunaye kuhani maarufu aliye na mamlaka juu ya nyumba ya Mungu .

text: Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith , having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience , and our bodies washed with pure water .
text2: Kwa hiyo tumkaribie Mungu kwa moyo mnyofu na imani timilifu , kwa mioyo iliyotakaswa dhamiri mbaya , na kwa miili iliyosafishwa kwa maji safi .

text: Let us hold fast the profession of our faith without wavering ; ( for he is faithful that promised ; )
text2: Tushikilie imara tumaini lile tunalokiri , maana Mungu aliyefanya ahadi zake ni mwaminifu .

text: And let us consider one another to provoke unto love and to good works :
text2: Tujitahidi kushughulikiana kwa ajili ya kuongezeana bidii ya kupendana na kutenda mema .

text: Not forsaking the assembling of ourselves together , as the manner of some is ; but exhorting one another : and so much the more , as ye see the day approaching .
text2: Tusiache ile desturi ya kukutana pamoja , kama vile wengine wanavyofanya . Bali tunapaswa kusaidiana kwani , kama mwonavyo , Siku ile ya Bwana inakaribia .

text: For if we sin wilfully after that we have received the knowledge of the truth , there remaineth no more sacrifice for sins ,
text2: Maana , tukiendelea kutenda dhambi makusudi baada ya kufahamu ukweli , hakuna dhabihu iwezayo kutolewa tena kwa ajili ya kuondoa dhambi .

text: But a certain fearful looking for of judgment and fiery indignation , which shall devour the adversaries .
text2: Linalobaki ni kungojea tu kwa hofu hukumu ya Mungu na moto mkali utakaowaangamiza wote wanaompinga .

text: He that despised Moses ' law died without mercy under two or three witnesses :
text2: Mtu yeyote asiyeitii Sheria ya Mose , huuawa bila ya huruma kukiwa na ushahidi wa watu wawili au watatu .

text: Of how much sorer punishment , suppose ye , shall he be thought worthy , who hath trodden under foot the Son of God , and hath counted the blood of the covenant , wherewith he was sanctified , an unholy thing , and hath done despite unto the Spirit of grace ?
text2: Je , mtu yule anayempuuza Mwana wa Mungu na kuidharau damu ya agano la Mungu iliyomtakasa , mtu anayemtukana Roho wa Mungu , anastahili kupata adhabu kali ya namna gani ?

text: For we know him that hath said , Vengeance belongeth unto me , I will recompense , saith the Lord . And again , The Lord shall judge his people .
text2: Maana tunamfahamu yule aliyesema , " Mimi nitalipiza kisasi , mimi nitalipiza , " na ambaye alisema pia , " Bwana atawahukumu watu wake . "

text: It is a fearful thing to fall into the hands of the living God .
text2: Kuanguka mikononi mwa Mungu aliye hai ni jambo la kutisha mno !

text: But call to remembrance the former days , in which , after ye were illuminated , ye endured a great fight of afflictions ;
text2: Kumbukeni yaliyotokea siku zile za kwanza mlipoangaziwa mwanga wa Mungu . Ingawa siku zile mlipatwa na mateso mengi , ninyi mlistahimili .

text: Partly , whilst ye were made a gazingstock both by reproaches and afflictions ; and partly , whilst ye became companions of them that were so used .
text2: Mara nyingine mlitukanwa na kufedheheshwa hadharani ; mara nyingine mlikuwa radhi kuungana na wale walioteswa namna hiyohiyo .

text: For ye had compassion of me in my bonds , and took joyfully the spoiling of your goods , knowing in yourselves that ye have in heaven a better and an enduring substance .
text2: Mlishiriki mateso ya wafungwa , na mliponyang ' anywa mali yenu mlistahimili kwa furaha , maana mlijua kwamba mnayo mali bora zaidi na ya kudumu milele .

text: Cast not away therefore your confidence , which hath great recompence of reward .
text2: Basi , msipoteze uhodari wenu , maana utawapatieni tuzo kubwa .

text: For ye have need of patience , that , after ye have done the will of God , ye might receive the promise .
text2: Mnahitaji kuwa na uvumilivu , ili mweze kufanya anayotaka Mungu na kupokea kile alichoahidi .

text: For yet a little while , and he that shall come will come , and will not tarry .
text2: Maana kama yasemavyo Maandiko : " Bado kidogo tu , na yule anayekuja , atakuja , wala hatakawia .

text: Now the just shall live by faith : but if any man draw back , my soul shall have no pleasure in him .
text2: Lakini mtu wangu aliye mwadilifu ataamini na kuishi ; walakini akirudi nyuma , mimi sitapendezwa naye . "

text: But we are not of them who draw back unto perdition ; but of them that believe to the saving of the soul .
text2: Basi , sisi hatumo miongoni mwa wale wanaorudi nyuma na kupotea , ila sisi tunaamini na tunaokolewa .

text: Now faith is the substance of things hoped for , the evidence of things not seen .
text2: Kuwa na imani ni kuwa na hakika ya mambo tunayotumainia ; kusadiki kabisa mambo tusiyoyaona .

text: For by it the elders obtained a good report .
text2: Maana wazee wa kale walipata kibali cha Mungu kwa sababu ya imani yao .

text: Through faith we understand that the worlds were framed by the word of God , so that things which are seen were not made of things which do appear .
text2: Kwa imani sisi tunafahamu kwamba ulimwengu uliumbwa kwa neno la Mungu ; vitu vinavyoonekana kutoka vitu visivyoonekana .

text: By faith Abel offered unto God a more excellent sacrifice than Cain , by which he obtained witness that he was righteous , God testifying of his gifts : and by it he being dead yet speaketh .
text2: Kwa imani Abeli alimtolea Mungu dhabihu iliyokuwa bora zaidi kuliko ile ya Kaini . Kwa imani yake alikubaliwa na Mungu kuwa mwadilifu ; Mungu mwenyewe alizikubali sadaka zake . Kwa imani yake ingawa amekufa , bado ananena .

text: By faith Enoch was translated that he should not see death ; and was not found , because God had translated him : for before his translation he had this testimony , that he pleased God .
text2: Kwa imani Henoki alichukuliwa na Mungu , asipate kufa . Hakuonekana tena kwa sababu Mungu alikuwa amemchukua . Maandiko yasema kwamba kabla ya kuchukuliwa kwake , yeye alikuwa amempendeza Mungu .

text: But without faith it is impossible to please him : for he that cometh to God must believe that he is , and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him .
text2: Basi , pasipo imani haiwezekani kumpendeza Mungu . Kwa maana kila mtu anayemwendea Mungu ni lazima aamini kwamba Mungu yuko , na kwamba huwatuza wale wanaomtafuta .

text: By faith Noah , being warned of God of things not seen as yet , moved with fear , prepared an ark to the saving of his house ; by the which he condemned the world , and became heir of the righteousness which is by faith .
text2: Kwa imani Noa alionywa na Mungu juu ya mambo ya baadaye ambayo hakuweza kuyaona bado . Alimtii Mungu , akajenga ile safina ambamo aliokolewa yeye pamoja na jamaa yake . Kutokana na hayo ulimwengu ulihukumiwa , naye Noa akapokea uadilifu unaotokana na imani .

text: By faith Abraham , when he was called to go out into a place which he should after receive for an inheritance , obeyed ; and he went out , not knowing whither he went .
text2: Kwa imani Abrahamu alimtii Mungu alipoitwa aende katika nchi ambayo Mungu angempa iwe yake . Ingawa hakujua alikokuwa anakwenda , Abrahamu alihama .

text: By faith he sojourned in the land of promise , as in a strange country , dwelling in tabernacles with Isaac and Jacob , the heirs with him of the same promise :
text2: Kwa imani aliishi kama mgeni katika nchi aliyoahidiwa na Mungu . Aliishi huko katika hema kama walivyoishi Isaka na Yakobo , ambao pia walishiriki ahadi ileile .

text: For he looked for a city which hath foundations , whose builder and maker is God .
text2: Maana Abrahamu alikuwa akingojea mji wenye misingi imara , mji ambao Mungu mwenyewe ndiye fundi aliyeubuni na kuujenga .

text: Through faith also Sara herself received strength to conceive seed , and was delivered of a child when she was past age , because she judged him faithful who had promised .
text2: Kwa imani hata Sara aliamini kwamba Mungu hutimiza ahadi zake , kwa hiyo akajaliwa kuchukua mimba ingawaje alikuwa amepita umri .

text: Therefore sprang there even of one , and him as good as dead , so many as the stars of the sky in multitude , and as the sand which is by the sea shore innumerable .
text2: Kwa hiyo , kutoka katika mtu huyo mmoja , Abrahamu , ambaye alikuwa kama amekufa , walitokea watu wengi wasiohesabika kama vile nyota za mbinguni na mchanga wa pwani .

text: These all died in faith , not having received the promises , but having seen them afar off , and were persuaded of them , and embraced them , and confessed that they were strangers and pilgrims on the earth .
text2: Watu hawa wote walikufa wakiwa na imani . Walikufa kabla ya kupokea mambo ambayo Mungu alikuwa ameahidi , lakini kwa mbali waliyaona , wakashangilia , na kukiri wazi kwamba wao walikuwa wageni na wakimbizi duniani .

text: For they that say such things declare plainly that they seek a country .
text2: Watu wanaosema mambo kama hayo , huonyesha wazi kwamba wanaitafuta nchi yao wenyewe .

text: And truly , if they had been mindful of that country from whence they came out , they might have had opportunity to have returned .
text2: Kama wangalikuwa wanaifikiria nchi walikotoka zamani , wangalipata nafasi ya kurudi huko .

text: But now they desire a better country , that is , an heavenly : wherefore God is not ashamed to be called their God : for he hath prepared for them a city .
text2: Lakini sasa wanataka nchi iliyo bora zaidi , yaani nchi ya mbinguni . Ndiyo maana Mungu haoni haya wakimwita yeye Mungu wao , kwa sababu yeye mwenyewe amekwisha watayarishia mji .

text: By faith Abraham , when he was tried , offered up Isaac : and he that had received the promises offered up his only begotten son ,
text2: Kwa imani , Abrahamu alimtoa mwanae Isaka sadaka wakati Mungu alipomjaribu . Huyo Abrahamu ndiye aliyekuwa amepokea ahadi ya Mungu , lakini , hata hivyo , alikubali kumtoa dhabihu mwanae wa pekee ,

text: Of whom it was said , That in Isaac shall thy seed be called :
text2: ingawa Mungu alikuwa amemwambia : " Wazawa wako watatokana na Isaka . "

text: Accounting that God was able to raise him up , even from the dead ; from whence also he received him in a figure .
text2: Abrahamu aliamini kwamba Mungu anaweza kuwafufua wafu : na kwa namna fulani kweli Abrahamu alimpata tena mwanae kutoka wafu .

text: By faith Isaac blessed Jacob and Esau concerning things to come .
text2: Kwa imani Isaka aliwabariki Yakobo na Esau , wapate baraka zitakazokuja baadaye .

text: By faith Jacob , when he was a dying , blessed both the sons of Joseph ; and worshipped , leaning upon the top of his staff .
text2: Kwa imani Yakobo alipokuwa karibu kufa , aliwabariki kila mmoja wa wana wa Yosefu , akamwabudu Mungu akiegemea ile fimbo yake .

text: By faith Joseph , when he died , made mention of the departing of the children of Israel ; and gave commandment concerning his bones .
text2: Kwa imani Yosefu alipokuwa karibu kufa , alinena juu ya kutoka kwa Waisraeli katika nchi ya Misri , na pia akawaachia maagizo kuhusu mifupa yake .

text: By faith Moses , when he was born , was hid three months of his parents , because they saw he was a proper child ; and they were not afraid of the king ' s commandment .
text2: Kwa imani wazazi wa Mose walimficha huyo mtoto kwa muda wa miezi mitatu baada ya kuzaliwa kwake . Walimwona kuwa ni mtoto mzuri , wala hawakuiogopa amri ya mfalme .

text: By faith Moses , when he was come to years , refused to be called the son of Pharaoh ' s daughter ;
text2: Kwa imani Mose alipokuwa mtu mzima , alikataa kuitwa mwana wa binti Farao .

text: Choosing rather to suffer affliction with the people of God , than to enjoy the pleasures of sin for a season ;
text2: Aliona ni afadhali kuteseka pamoja na watu wa Mungu kuliko kufurahia raha ya dhambi kwa kitambo kidogo .

text: Esteeming the reproach of Christ greater riches than the treasures in Egypt : for he had respect unto the recompence of the reward .
text2: Alitambua kwamba kuteseka kwa ajili ya Masiha kuna faida kubwa zaidi kuliko utajiri wote wa nchi ya Misri , maana alikuwa anatazamia tuzo la baadaye .

text: By faith he forsook Egypt , not fearing the wrath of the king : for he endured , as seeing him who is invisible .
text2: Kwa imani Mose alihama kutoka nchi ya Misri bila kuogopa hasira ya mfalme ; na wala hakurudi nyuma , kwani alikuwa kama mtu aliyemwona yule Mungu asiyeonekana .

text: Through faith he kept the passover , and the sprinkling of blood , lest he that destroyed the firstborn should touch them .
text2: Kwa imani aliadhimisha siku ya Pasaka , akaamuru damu inyunyizwe juu ya milango , ili yule Malaika Mwangamizi asiwaue wazaliwa wa kwanza wa Israeli .

text: By faith they passed through the Red sea as by dry land : which the Egyptians assaying to do were drowned .
text2: Kwa imani watu wa Israeli walivuka bahari ya Shamu , kana kwamba ilikuwa nchi kavu ; lakini Wamisri walipojaribu kufanya hivyo walikufa maji .

text: By faith the walls of Jericho fell down , after they were compassed about seven days .
text2: Kwa imani kuta za mji wa Yeriko zilianguka watu wa Israeli walipokwisha zunguka kwa muda wa siku saba .

text: By faith the harlot Rahab perished not with them that believed not , when she had received the spies with peace .
text2: Kwa imani Rahabu aliyekuwa malaya hakuangamia pamoja na wale waliomwasi Mungu , kwa sababu aliwakaribisha wale wapelelezi .

text: And what shall I more say ? for the time would fail me to tell of Gedeon , and of Barak , and of Samson , and of Jephthae ; of David also , and Samuel , and of the prophets :
text2: Basi , niseme nini zaidi ? Wakati hauniruhusu kueleza juu ya Gedeoni , Baraki , Samsoni , Yeftha , Daudi , Samweli na manabii .

text: Who through faith subdued kingdoms , wrought righteousness , obtained promises , stopped the mouths of lions ,
text2: Kwa imani hawa wote walipigana vita na wafalme , wakashinda . Walitenda mambo adili , wakapokea yale aliyoahidi Mungu . Walifunga vinywa vya simba ,

text: Quenched the violence of fire , escaped the edge of the sword , out of weakness were made strong , waxed valiant in fight , turned to flight the armies of the aliens .
text2: Walizima mioto mikali , waliepuka kuuawa kwa upanga . Walikuwa dhaifu lakini walipata nguvu . Walikuwa hodari katika vita wakashinda majeshi ya kigeni .

text: Women received their dead raised to life again : and others were tortured , not accepting deliverance ; that they might obtain a better resurrection :
text2: Na , wanawake walioamini walirudishiwa wafu wao wakiwa wamefufuliwa . Baadhi yao walikataa kufunguliwa , wakateswa mpaka kufa ili wapate kufufuliwa na kuingia katika maisha bora zaidi .

text: And others had trial of cruel mockings and scourgings , yea , moreover of bonds and imprisonment :
text2: Wengine walidhihakiwa na kupigwa mijeledi , na wengine walifungwa minyororo na kutupwa gerezani .

text: They were stoned , they were sawn asunder , were tempted , were slain with the sword : they wandered about in sheepskins and goatskins ; being destitute , afflicted , tormented ;
text2: Walipigwa mawe , walipasuliwa vipandevipande , waliuawa kwa upanga . Walizungukazunguka wakiwa wamevaa ngozi za kondoo na ngozi za mbuzi , walikuwa watu maskini , walioteswa na kudhulumiwa .

text: ( Of whom the world was not worthy : ) they wandered in deserts , and in mountains , and in dens and caves of the earth .
text2: Ulimwengu haukustahili kuwa na watu hao . Walitangatanga jangwani na mlimani , wakaishi katika mashimo na mapango ya ardhi .

text: And these all , having obtained a good report through faith , received not the promise :
text2: Watu hawa wote walionekana kuwa mashujaa kwa sababu ya imani yao . Hata hivyo , hawakupokea yale ambayo Mungu aliwaahidia ,

text: God having provided some better thing for us , that they without us should not be made perfect .
text2: maana Mungu alikuwa ameazimia mpango ulio bora zaidi kwa ajili yetu ; yaani wao wangeufikia ukamilifu wakiwa pamoja nasi .

text: Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about with so great a cloud of witnesses , let us lay aside every weight , and the sin which doth so easily beset us , and let us run with patience the race that is set before us ,
text2: Sisi tunalo kundi hili kubwa la mashahidi mbele yetu . Kwa hiyo tuondoe kila kizuizi kinachotuzuia , na dhambi ile inayotung ' ang ' ania . Tupige mbio kwa uvumilivu katika mashindano yaliyowekwa mbele yetu .

text: Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith ; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross , despising the shame , and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God .
text2: Tumwelekee Yesu ambaye ndiye aliyeianzisha imani yetu na ambaye ataikamilisha . Kwa ajili ya furaha iliyokuwa inamngojea , yeye alivumilia kifo msalabani , bila kujali juu ya aibu yake , na sasa anaketi upande wa kulia wa kiti cha enzi cha Mungu .

text: For consider him that endured such contradiction of sinners against himself , lest ye be wearied and faint in your minds .
text2: Fikirini juu ya mambo yaliyompata Yesu , jinsi alivyostahimili upinzani mkubwa kwa watu wenye dhambi . Basi , msife moyo , wala msikate tamaa .

text: Ye have not yet resisted unto blood , striving against sin .
text2: Maana katika kupambana na dhambi , ninyi hamjapigana mpaka kiasi cha kumwaga damu yenu .

text: And ye have forgotten the exhortation which speaketh unto you as unto children , My son , despise not thou the chastening of the Lord , nor faint when thou art rebuked of him :
text2: Je , mmesahau yale maneno ya kutia moyo ambayo Mungu anawataja ninyi kuwa wanawe ? " Mwanangu , usidharau adhabu ya Bwana , wala usife moyo anapokukanya .

text: For whom the Lord loveth he chasteneth , and scourgeth every son whom he receiveth .
text2: Maana Bwana humwadhibu kila anayempenda , humpinga kila anayekubali kuwa mwanae . "

text: If ye endure chastening , God dealeth with you as with sons ; for what son is he whom the father chasteneth not ?
text2: Vumilieni adhabu kwani ni mafundisho ; Mungu huwatendea ninyi kama wanawe . Maana ni mwana gani asiyeadhibiwa na baba yake ?

text: But if ye be without chastisement , whereof all are partakers , then are ye bastards , and not sons .
text2: Lakini msipoadhibiwa kama wana wengine , basi , ninyi si wanawe , bali ni wana haramu .

text: Furthermore we have had fathers of our flesh which corrected us , and we gave them reverence : shall we not much rather be in subjection unto the Father of spirits , and live ?
text2: Zaidi ya hayo sisi tunawaheshimu wazazi wetu waliotuzaa hata wanapotuadhibu . Basi , tunapaswa kumtii zaidi Baba yetu wa kiroho ili tupate kuishi .

text: For they verily for a few days chastened us after their own pleasure ; but he for our profit , that we might be partakers of his holiness .
text2: Wazazi wetu hapa duniani walituadhibu kwa muda , kama wao wenyewe walivyoona kuwa vema ; lakini Mungu anatuadhibu kwa ajili ya faida yetu wenyewe , tupate kuushiriki utakatifu wake .

text: Now no chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous , but grievous : nevertheless afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby .
text2: Kuadhibiwa si jambo la kufurahisha bali la kuhuzunisha . Lakini wale waliofunzwa kuwa na nidhamu mwishowe watavuna tuzo la amani kutoka katika maisha adili !

text: Wherefore lift up the hands which hang down , and the feeble knees ;
text2: Basi , inueni mikono yenu inayolegea na kuimarisha magoti yenu yaliyo dhaifu .

text: And make straight paths for your feet , lest that which is lame be turned out of the way ; but let it rather be healed .
text2: Endeleeni kutembea katika njia iliyonyoka , ili kile kilicholemaa kisiumizwe , bali kiponywe .

text: Follow peace with all men , and holiness , without which no man shall see the Lord :
text2: Jitahidini kuishi kwa amani na watu wote . Ishini maisha ya utakatifu , kwa sababu hakuna mtu atakayemwona Bwana bila ya maisha kama hayo .

text: Looking diligently lest any man fail of the grace of God ; lest any root of bitterness springing up trouble you , and thereby many be defiled ;
text2: Jitahidini sana mtu yeyote asije akapoteza neema ya Mungu . Muwe waangalifu ili mti mchungu usizuke kati yenu na kuwaua wengi kwa sumu yake .

text: Lest there be any fornicator , or profane person , as Esau , who for one morsel of meat sold his birthright .
text2: Jihadharini ili miongoni mwenu pasiwe na mtu mwasherati au mtu asiyemcha Mungu kama Esau , aliyeuza haki yake ya mzaliwa wa kwanza kwa mlo mmoja .

text: For ye know how that afterward , when he would have inherited the blessing , he was rejected : for he found no place of repentance , though he sought it carefully with tears .
text2: Ninyi mnafahamu kwamba hata alipotaka kuipata tena ile baraka iliyokuwa yake , alikataliwa , maana hakupata tena nafasi ya kutubu , ingawa aliitafuta kwa machozi .

text: For ye are not come unto the mount that might be touched , and that burned with fire , nor unto blackness , and darkness , and tempest ,
text2: Ninyi hamkuwasili mlimani Sinai , ambao unaweza kushikika kama walivyofanya watu wa Israeli , hamkufika kwenye moto uwakao , penye giza , tufani ,

text: And the sound of a trumpet , and the voice of words ; which voice they that heard intreated that the word should not be spoken to them any more :
text2: mvumo wa tarumbeta na sauti ya maneno . Wale waliosikia sauti hiyo waliomba wasisikie tena neno jingine ,

text: ( For they could not endure that which was commanded , And if so much as a beast touch the mountain , it shall be stoned , or thrust through with a dart :
text2: kwani hawakuweza kustahimili amri iliyotolewa : " Atakayegusa mlima huu , hata kama ni mnyama , atapigwa mawe . "

text: And so terrible was the sight , that Moses said , I exceedingly fear and quake : )
text2: Hayo yote yalionekana ya kutisha mno , hata Mose akasema , " Naogopa na kutetemeka . "

text: But ye are come unto mount Sion , and unto the city of the living God , the heavenly Jerusalem , and to an innumerable company of angels ,
text2: Lakini ninyi mmefika katika mlima wa Sioni , kwenye mji wa Mungu aliye hai . Mmefika Yerusalemu , mji wa mbinguni , ambapo wamekusanyika malaika elfu nyingi wasiohesabika .

text: To the general assembly and church of the firstborn , which are written in heaven , and to God the Judge of all , and to the spirits of just men made perfect ,
text2: Mmefika kwenye kusanyiko kubwa la wazaliwa wa kwanza wa Mungu , ambao majina yao yameandikwa mbinguni . Mnasimama mbele ya Mungu aliye hakimu wa wote , na mbele ya roho za watu waadilifu waliofanywa kuwa wakamilifu .

text: And to Jesus the mediator of the new covenant , and to the blood of sprinkling , that speaketh better things than that of Abel .
text2: Mmefika kwa Yesu ambaye ameratibisha agano jipya , na ambaye damu yake iliyomwagika inasema mambo mema zaidi kuliko ile ya Abeli .

text: See that ye refuse not him that speaketh . For if they escaped not who refused him that spake on earth , much more shall not we escape , if we turn away from him that speaketh from heaven :
text2: Basi , jihadharini msije mkakataa kumsikiliza yeye ambaye anasema nanyi . Kama wale walikataa kumsikiliza yule aliyewaonya hapa duniani hawakuokoka , sisi tutawezaje kuokoka kama tukikataa kumsikiliza yule anayetuonya kutoka mbinguni ?

text: Whose voice then shook the earth : but now he hath promised , saying , Yet once more I shake not the earth only , but also heaven .
text2: Wakati ule sauti ilitetemesha nchi , lakini sasa ameahidi : " Nitatetemesha nchi tena , lakini si nchi tu bali pia mbingu . "

text: And this word , Yet once more , signifieth the removing of those things that are shaken , as of things that are made , that those things which cannot be shaken may remain .
text2: Neno hili : " tena " linatuonyesha kwamba vitu vyote vilivyoumbwa vitatetemeshwa na kutoweka ili vibaki vile visivyotetemeshwa .

text: Wherefore we receiving a kingdom which cannot be moved , let us have grace , whereby we may serve God acceptably with reverence and godly fear :
text2: Sisi basi , na tushukuru kwani tunapokea utawala usiotikisika . Tuwe na shukrani na kumwabudu Mungu kwa namna itakayompendeza , kwa ibada na hofu ;

text: For our God is a consuming fire .
text2: maana Mungu wetu kweli ni moto mkali unaoteketeza .

text: Let brotherly love continue .
text2: Endeleeni kupendana kidugu .

text: Be not forgetful to entertain strangers : for thereby some have entertained angels unawares .
text2: Msisahau kuwakaribisha wageni ; maana kwa kufanya hivyo watu wengine walipata kuwakaribisha malaika bila kujua .

text: Remember them that are in bonds , as bound with them ; and them which suffer adversity , as being yourselves also in the body .
text2: Wakumbukeni wale waliofungwa kana kwamba mmefungwa pamoja nao . Wakumbukeni wale wanaoteseka kana kwamba nanyi mnateseka kama wao .

text: Marriage is honourable in all , and the bed undefiled : but whoremongers and adulterers God will judge .
text2: Ndoa inapaswa kuheshimiwa na watu wote , na haki zake zitekelezwe kwa uaminifu . Mungu atawahukumu waasherati na wazinzi .

text: Let your conversation be without covetousness ; and be content with such things as ye have : for he hath said , I will never leave thee , nor forsake thee .
text2: Msiwe watu wa kupenda fedha ; toshekeni na vile vitu mlivyo navyo . Mungu mwenyewe amesema : " Sitakuacha kamwe , wala sitakutupa . "

text: So that we may boldly say , The Lord is my helper , and I will not fear what man shall do unto me .
text2: Ndiyo maana tunathubutu kusema : " Bwana ndiye msaada wangu , sitaogopa . Binadamu atanifanya nini ? "

text: Remember them which have the rule over you , who have spoken unto you the word of God : whose faith follow , considering the end of their conversation .
text2: wakumbukeni viongozi wenu waliowatangazieni ujumbe wa Mungu . Fikirieni juu ya mwenendo wao , mkaige imani yao .

text: Jesus Christ the same yesterday , and to day , and for ever .
text2: Yesu Kristo ni yuleyule , jana , leo na milele .

text: Be not carried about with divers and strange doctrines . For it is a good thing that the heart be established with grace ; not with meats , which have not profited them that have been occupied therein .
text2: Msipeperushwe huku na huku kwa mafundisho tofauti ya kigeni . Neema ya Mungu ndiyo inayoimarisha roho zetu na wala si masharti juu ya chakula ; masharti hayo hayakumsaidia kamwe mtu yeyote aliyeyafuata .

text: We have an altar , whereof they have no right to eat which serve the tabernacle .
text2: Sisi tunayo madhabahu ambayo wale wanaotumikia bado katika hema la Wayahudi , hawana haki ya kula vitu vyake .

text: For the bodies of those beasts , whose blood is brought into the sanctuary by the high priest for sin , are burned without the camp .
text2: Kuhani Mkuu wa Kiyahudi huleta damu ya wanyama katika Mahali Patakatifu na kuitoa dhabihu kwa ajili ya dhambi ; lakini nyama za hao wanyama huteketezwa nje ya kambi .

text: Wherefore Jesus also , that he might sanctify the people with his own blood , suffered without the gate .
text2: Ndiyo maana Yesu pia , kusudi apate kuwatakasa watu kwa damu yake mwenyewe , aliteswa na kufa nje ya mji .

text: Let us go forth therefore unto him without the camp , bearing his reproach .
text2: Basi , tumwendee huko nje ya kambi tukajitwike laana yake .

text: For here have we no continuing city , but we seek one to come .
text2: Maana hapa duniani hatuna mji wa kudumu ; lakini tunautafuta ule unaokuja .

text: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually , that is , the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name .
text2: Basi , kwa njia ya Yesu , tumtolee Mungu dhabihu ya sifa daima , yaani sifa zinazotolewa na midomo inayoliungama jina lake .

text: But to do good and to communicate forget not : for with such sacrifices God is well pleased .
text2: Msisahau kutenda mema na kusaidiana , maana hizi ndizo dhabihu zinazompendeza Mungu .

text: Obey them that have the rule over you , and submit yourselves : for they watch for your souls , as they that must give account , that they may do it with joy , and not with grief : for that is unprofitable for you .
text2: Watiini viongozi wenu na kushika amri zao ; wao huchunga roho zenu usiku na mchana , na watatoa ripoti ya utumishi wao mbele ya Mungu . Kama mkiwatii watafanya kazi zao kwa furaha , la sivyo , watazifanya kwa huzuni , na hiyo haitakuwa na faida kwenu .

text: Pray for us : for we trust we have a good conscience , in all things willing to live honestly .
text2: Tuombeeni na sisi . Tuna hakika kwamba tunayo dhamiri safi , maana twataka kufanya lililo sawa daima .

text: But I beseech you the rather to do this , that I may be restored to you the sooner .
text2: Nawasihi sana mniombee ili Mungu anirudishe kwenu upesi iwezekanavyo .

text: Now the God of peace , that brought again from the dead our Lord Jesus , that great shepherd of the sheep , through the blood of the everlasting covenant ,
text2: Mungu amemfufua Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo ambaye ni Mchungaji Mkuu wa kondoo kwa sababu ya kumwaga damu yake iliyothibitisha agano la milele .

text: Make you perfect in every good work to do his will , working in you that which is wellpleasing in his sight , through Jesus Christ ; to whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Mungu wa amani awakamilishe katika kila tendo jema ili mtekeleze mapenzi yake ; yeye na afanye ndani yetu kwa njia ya Kristo yale yanayompendeza mwenyewe . Utukufu uwe kwake , milele na milele ! Amina .

text: And I beseech you , brethren , suffer the word of exhortation : for I have written a letter unto you in few words .
text2: Basi , ndugu , nawasihi mpokee kwa utulivu ujumbe huu wa kuwatieni moyo . Hii ni barua fupi tu ambayo nimewaandikieni .

text: Know ye that our brother Timothy is set at liberty ; with whom , if he come shortly , I will see you .
text2: Napenda kuwajulisheni kwamba ndugu yetu Timotheo amekwisha funguliwa gerezani . Kama akifika hapa mapema , nitakuja naye nitakapokuja kwenu .

text: Salute all them that have the rule over you , and all the saints . They of Italy salute you .
text2: Wasalimieni viongozi wenu wote pamoja na watu wa Mungu ! Ndugu wa Italia wanawasalimuni .

text: Grace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Tunawatakieni nyote neema ya Mungu .

text: James , a servant of God and of the Lord Jesus Christ , to the twelve tribes which are scattered abroad , greeting .
text2: Mimi Yakobo , mtumishi wa Mungu na wa Bwana Yesu Kristo , nawaandikia ninyi , makabila kumi na mawili , yaliyotawanyika ulimwenguni ! Salaam !

text: My brethren , count it all joy when ye fall into divers temptations ;
text2: Ndugu zangu , muwe na furaha mnapopatwa na majaribu mbalimbali ,

text: Knowing this , that the trying of your faith worketh patience .
text2: kwani mwajua kwamba imani yenu ikisha stahimili , itawapatieni uvumilivu .

text: But let patience have her perfect work , that ye may be perfect and entire , wanting nothing .
text2: Muwe na hakika kwamba uvumilivu wenu utawategemeza mpaka mwisho , mpate kuwa wakamilifu na watimilifu , bila kupungukiwa chochote .

text: If any of you lack wisdom , let him ask of God , that giveth to all men liberally , and upbraideth not ; and it shall be given him .
text2: Lakini kama mmoja wenu ametindikiwa hekima , basi , anapaswa kumwomba Mungu ambaye atampatia ; kwani Mungu huwapa wote kwa wingi na kwa ukarimu .

text: But let him ask in faith , nothing wavering . For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed .
text2: Lakini anapaswa kuomba kwa imani bila mashaka yoyote . Mtu aliye na mashaka ni kama mawimbi ya bahari ambayo husukumwa na kutupwatupwa na upepo .

text: For let not that man think that he shall receive any thing of the Lord .
text2: Mtu wa namna hiyo , mwenye nia mbili na asiye na msimamo katika mwenendo wake wote ,

text: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways .
text2: asidhani ya kwamba atapata chochote kile kutoka kwa Bwana .

text: Let the brother of low degree rejoice in that he is exalted :
text2: Ndugu aliye maskini anapaswa kufurahi wakati Mungu anapomkweza ,

text: But the rich , in that he is made low : because as the flower of the grass he shall pass away .
text2: naye tajiri anapaswa kufurahi anaposhushwa na Mungu . Maana tajiri atatoweka kama ua la porini .

text: For the sun is no sooner risen with a burning heat , but it withereth the grass , and the flower thereof falleth , and the grace of the fashion of it perisheth : so also shall the rich man fade away in his ways .
text2: Jua huchomoza na kwa joto lake kali hukausha mimea , nayo maua yake huanguka , na uzuri wake wote huharibika . Vivyo hivyo , tajiri ataangamizwa katika shughuli zake .

text: Blessed is the man that endureth temptation : for when he is tried , he shall receive the crown of life , which the Lord hath promised to them that love him .
text2: Heri mtu anayebaki mwaminifu katika majaribu , kwani akisha stahimili atapewa tuzo la uzima ambalo Mungu aliwaahidia wale wanaompenda .

text: Let no man say when he is tempted , I am tempted of God : for God cannot be tempted with evil , neither tempteth he any man :
text2: Kama mtu akijaribiwa , asiseme : " Ninajaribiwa na Mungu . " Maana Mungu hawezi kujaribiwa na uovu , wala yeye hamjaribu mtu yeyote .

text: But every man is tempted , when he is drawn away of his own lust , and enticed .
text2: Lakini mtu hujaribiwa anapovutwa na kunaswa na tamaa zake mbaya .

text: Then when lust hath conceived , it bringeth forth sin : and sin , when it is finished , bringeth forth death .
text2: Tamaa ikiiva huzaa dhambi ; nayo dhambi ikikomaa huzaa kifo .

text: Do not err , my beloved brethren .
text2: Ndugu zangu wapenzi , msidanganyike !

text: Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above , and cometh down from the Father of lights , with whom is no variableness , neither shadow of turning .
text2: Kila kipaji chema na kila zawadi kamilifu hutoka mbinguni ; hutoka kwa Baba , Muumba wa mianga , ambaye habadiliki wala hana alama yoyote ya ugeugeu .

text: Of his own will begat he us with the word of truth , that we should be a kind of firstfruits of his creatures .
text2: Kwa kupenda kwake mwenyewe alituzaa kwa neno lake la ukweli , ili tuwe namna ya matunda ya kwanza miongoni mwa viumbe vyake .

text: Wherefore , my beloved brethren , let every man be swift to hear , slow to speak , slow to wrath :
text2: Ndugu zangu wapenzi , kumbukeni jambo hili ! Kila mtu na awe mwepesi wa kusikia lakini asiwe mwepesi wa kusema wala mwepesi wa kukasirika .

text: For the wrath of man worketh not the righteousness of God .
text2: Mwenye hasira hawezi kutimiza matakwa ya Mungu yaliyo ya haki .

text: Wherefore lay apart all filthiness and superfluity of naughtiness , and receive with meekness the engrafted word , which is able to save your souls .
text2: Kwa hiyo , tupilieni mbali mwenendo mchafu na tabia zote mbovu ; jiwekeni chini ya Mungu na kupokea ule ujumbe uliopandwa mioyoni mwenu , ambao waweza kuziokoa nafsi zenu .

text: But be ye doers of the word , and not hearers only , deceiving your own selves .
text2: Msijidanganye wenyewe kwa kusikiliza tu neno lake , bali litekelezeni kwa vitendo .

text: For if any be a hearer of the word , and not a doer , he is like unto a man beholding his natural face in a glass :
text2: Yeyote anayesikiliza hilo neno lakini halitekelezi , huyo ni kama mtu anayejiangalia sura yake mwenyewe katika kioo .

text: For he beholdeth himself , and goeth his way , and straightway forgetteth what manner of man he was .
text2: Hujiangalia mwenyewe , kisha huenda zake , na mara husahau jinsi alivyo .

text: But whoso looketh into the perfect law of liberty , and continueth therein , he being not a forgetful hearer , but a doer of the work , this man shall be blessed in his deed .
text2: Lakini mtu anayeangalia kwa makini sheria kamilifu ambayo huwapa watu uhuru , mtu anayeendelea kuizingatia , na si kuisikia tu na kuisahau baadaye , bali anaitekeleza , mtu huyo atabarikiwa katika kila kitu anachofanya .

text: If any man among you seem to be religious , and bridleth not his tongue , but deceiveth his own heart , this man ' s religion is vain .
text2: Kama mtu akijiona kuwa ni mtu mwenye dini , lakini hawezi kuutawala ulimi wake , dini yake haifai kitu , na anajidanganya mwenyewe .

text: Pure religion and undefiled before God and the Father is this , To visit the fatherless and widows in their affliction , and to keep himself unspotted from the world .
text2: Dini iliyo safi na isiyo na hitilafu mbele ya Mungu Baba ni hii : Kuwasaidia yatima na wajane katika shida zao , na kujilinda mwenyewe usichafuliwe na ulimwengu huu .

text: My brethren , have not the faith of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Lord of glory , with respect of persons .
text2: Ndugu zangu , mkiwa mnamwamini Bwana Yesu Kristo , Bwana wa utukufu , msiwabague watu kamwe .

text: For if there come unto your assembly a man with a gold ring , in goodly apparel , and there come in also a poor man in vile raiment ;
text2: Tuseme mtu mmoja ambaye amevaa pete ya dhahabu na mavazi nadhifu anaingia katika mkutano wenu , na papo hapo akaingia mtu maskini aliyevaa mavazi machafu .

text: And ye have respect to him that weareth the gay clothing , and say unto him , Sit thou here in a good place ; and say to the poor , Stand thou there , or sit here under my footstool :
text2: Ikiwa mtamstahi zaidi yule aliyevaa mavazi ya kuvutia na kumwambia : " Keti hapa mahali pazuri , " na kumwambia yule maskini : " Wewe , simama huko , " au " Keti hapa sakafuni miguuni pangu , "

text: Are ye not then partial in yourselves , and are become judges of evil thoughts ?
text2: je , huo si ubaguzi kati yenu ? Je , na huo uamuzi wenu haujatokana na fikira mbaya ?

text: Hearken , my beloved brethren , Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith , and heirs of the kingdom which he hath promised to them that love him ?
text2: Ndugu zangu wapenzi , sikilizeni ! Mungu amechagua watu ambao ni maskini katika ulimwengu huu ili wapate kuwa matajiri katika imani na kupokea Utawala aliowaahidia wale wanaompenda .

text: But ye have despised the poor . Do not rich men oppress you , and draw you before the judgment seats ?
text2: Lakini ninyi mnawadharau watu maskini ! Je , matajiri si ndio wanaowakandamizeni na kuwapeleka mahakamani ?

text: Do not they blaspheme that worthy name by the which ye are called ?
text2: Je , si haohao wanaolitukana hilo jina lenu zuri mlilopewa ?

text: If ye fulfil the royal law according to the scripture , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself , ye do well :
text2: Kama mnaitimiza ile sheria ya Utawala kama ilivyoandikwa katika Maandiko Matakatifu : " Mpende binadamu mwenzako kama unavyojipenda wewe mwenyewe " , mtakuwa mnafanya vema kabisa .

text: But if ye have respect to persons , ye commit sin , and are convinced of the law as transgressors .
text2: Lakini mkiwabagua watu , basi , mwatenda dhambi , nayo Sheria inawahukumu ninyi kuwa mna hatia .

text: For whosoever shall keep the whole law , and yet offend in one point , he is guilty of all .
text2: Anayevunja amri mojawapo ya Sheria , atakuwa na hatia ya kuivunja Sheria yote .

text: For he that said , Do not commit adultery , said also , Do not kill . Now if thou commit no adultery , yet if thou kill , thou art become a transgressor of the law .
text2: Maana yuleyule aliyesema : " Usizini , " alisema pia " Usiue " . Kwa hiyo , hata ikiwa hukuzini lakini umeua , wewe umeivunja Sheria .

text: So speak ye , and so do , as they that shall be judged by the law of liberty .
text2: Basi , semeni na kutenda kama watu watakaohukumiwa kwa sheria iletayo uhuru .

text: For he shall have judgment without mercy , that hath shewed no mercy ; and mercy rejoiceth against judgment .
text2: Maana , Mungu hatakuwa na huruma atakapomhukumu mtu asiyekuwa na huruma . Lakini huruma hushinda hukumu .

text: What doth it profit , my brethren , though a man say he hath faith , and have not works ? can faith save him ?
text2: Ndugu zangu , kuna faida gani mtu kusema ana imani , lakini haonyeshi kwa vitendo ? Je , hiyo imani yawezaje kumwokoa ?

text: If a brother or sister be naked , and destitute of daily food ,
text2: Tuseme kaka au dada hana nguo au chakula .

text: And one of you say unto them , Depart in peace , be ye warmed and filled ; notwithstanding ye give them not those things which are needful to the body ; what doth it profit ?
text2: Yafaa kitu gani ninyi kuwaambia hao : " Nendeni salama mkaote moto na kushiba , " bila kuwapatia mahitaji yao ya maisha ?

text: Even so faith , if it hath not works , is dead , being alone .
text2: Vivyo hivyo , imani peke yake bila matendo imekufa .

text: Yea , a man may say , Thou hast faith , and I have works : shew me thy faith without thy works , and I will shew thee my faith by my works .
text2: Lakini mtu anaweza kusema : " Wewe unayo imani , mimi ninayo matendo ! " Haya ! Nionyeshe jinsi mtu anavyoweza kuwa na imani bila matendo , nami nitakuonyesha imani yangu kwa matendo yangu .

text: Thou believest that there is one God ; thou doest well : the devils also believe , and tremble .
text2: Je , wewe unaamini kwamba yuko Mungu mmoja ? Sawa ! Lakini hata pepo huamini hilo , na hutetemeka kwa hofu .

text: But wilt thou know , O vain man , that faith without works is dead ?
text2: Mpumbavu wee ! Je , wataka kuonyeshwa kwamba imani bila matendo imekufa ?

text: Was not Abraham our father justified by works , when he had offered Isaac his son upon the altar ?
text2: Je , Abrahamu baba yetu alipataje kukubalika mbele yake Mungu ? Kwa matendo yake , wakati alipomtoa mwanae Isaka sadaka juu ya madhabahu .

text: Seest thou how faith wrought with his works , and by works was faith made perfect ?
text2: Waona basi , kwamba imani yake iliandamana na matendo yake ; imani yake ilikamilishwa kwa matendo yake .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled which saith , Abraham believed God , and it was imputed unto him for righteousness : and he was called the Friend of God .
text2: Hivyo yakatimia yale Maandiko Matakatifu yasemayo : " Abrahamu alimwamini Mungu na kwa imani yake akakubaliwa kuwa mtu mwadilifu ; na hivyo Abrahamu akaitwa rafiki wa Mungu . "

text: Ye see then how that by works a man is justified , and not by faith only .
text2: Mnaona basi , kwamba mtu hukubaliwa kuwa mwadilifu kwa matendo yake na si kwa imani peke yake .

text: Likewise also was not Rahab the harlot justified by works , when she had received the messengers , and had sent them out another way ?
text2: Ilikuwa vivyo hivyo kuhusu yule malaya Rahabu ; yeye alikubaliwa kuwa mwadilifu kwa sababu aliwapokea wale wapelelezi na kuwasaidia waende zao kwa kupitia njia nyingine .

text: For as the body without the spirit is dead , so faith without works is dead also .
text2: Basi , kama vile mwili bila roho umekufa , vivyo hivyo imani bila matendo imekufa .

text: My brethren , be not many masters , knowing that we shall receive the greater condemnation .
text2: Ndugu zangu , wengi wenu msiwe walimu . Kama mjuavyo , sisi walimu tutapata hukumu kubwa zaidi kuliko wengine .

text: For in many things we offend all . If any man offend not in word , the same is a perfect man , and able also to bridle the whole body .
text2: Lakini kama mtu hakosi katika usemi wake , basi , huyo ni mkamilifu , na anaweza kutawala nafsi yake yote .

text: Behold , we put bits in the horses ' mouths , that they may obey us ; and we turn about their whole body .
text2: Sisi huwatia farasi lijamu kinywani mwao ili watutii ; na kwa njia hiyo twaweza kuwaongoza kokote tunakotaka .

text: Behold also the ships , which though they be so great , and are driven of fierce winds , yet are they turned about with a very small helm , whithersoever the governor listeth .
text2: Meli nazo pia , ingawa ni kubwa sana , na husukumwa na upepo mkali , huweza kugeuzwa kwa usukani mdogo sana , zikaelekea kokote nahodha anakotaka .

text: Even so the tongue is a little member , and boasteth great things . Behold , how great a matter a little fire kindleth !
text2: Vivyo hivyo , ulimi , ingawa ni kiungo kidogo cha mwili , hujisifia makuu sana . Moto mdogo waweza kuteketeza msitu mkubwa .

text: And the tongue is a fire , a world of iniquity : so is the tongue among our members , that it defileth the whole body , and setteth on fire the course of nature ; and it is set on fire of hell .
text2: Hali kadhalika ulimi ni kama moto . Umejaa maovu chungu nzima , unayo nafasi yake katika miili yetu na hueneza ubaya katika nafsi zetu zote . Huteketeza maisha yetu yote kwa moto utokao Jehanamu kwenyewe .

text: For every kind of beasts , and of birds , and of serpents , and of things in the sea , is tamed , and hath been tamed of mankind :
text2: Binadamu anaweza kuwafuga wanyama , na amefaulu kufuga viumbe vyote - - wanyama wa mwituni , ndege , nyoka na viumbe vya baharini .

text: But the tongue can no man tame ; it is an unruly evil , full of deadly poison .
text2: Lakini hakuna mtu aliyeweza kuufuga ulimi . Ulimi ni kitu kiovu , hakitawaliki , na kimejaa sumu inayoua .

text: Therewith bless we God , even the Father ; and therewith curse we men , which are made after the similitude of God .
text2: Kwa ulimi sisi twamshukuru Bwana na Baba yetu . Kwa ulimi huohuo twawalaani watu , watu ambao wameumbwa kwa mfano wa Mungu .

text: Out of the same mouth proceedeth blessing and cursing . My brethren , these things ought not so to be .
text2: Maneno ya laana na ya kusifia hutoka katika kinywa kimoja . Ndugu zangu , mambo haya hayapaswi kuwa hivyo .

text: Doth a fountain send forth at the same place sweet water and bitter ?
text2: Je , chemchemi moja yaweza kutoa maji matamu na maji machungu pamoja ?

text: Can the fig tree , my brethren , bear olive berries ? either a vine , figs ? so can no fountain both yield salt water and fresh .
text2: Ndugu zangu , je , mti wa mtini waweza kuzaa zeituni ? Au , mzabibu waweza kuzaa tini ? Chemchemi ya maji ya chumvi haiwezi kutoa maji matamu .

text: Who is a wise man and endued with knowledge among you ? let him shew out of a good conversation his works with meekness of wisdom .
text2: Je , ni nani mwenye hekima na akili miongoni mwenu ? Basi , aonyeshe jambo hilo kwa mwenendo wake mzuri na kwa matendo yake mema yanayofanyika kwa unyenyekevu na hekima .

text: But if ye have bitter envying and strife in your hearts , glory not , and lie not against the truth .
text2: Lakini ikiwa mioyo yenu imejaa wivu , chuki na ubinafsi , basi , msijisifu na kusema uongo dhidi ya ukweli .

text: This wisdom descendeth not from above , but is earthly , sensual , devilish .
text2: Hekima ya namna hiyo haitoki juu mbinguni ; hekima hiyo ni ya ulimwengu , na ya kidunia , tena ni ya kishetani .

text: For where envying and strife is , there is confusion and every evil work .
text2: Maana popote palipo na wivu na ubinafsi hapo pana fujo na kila aina ya uovu .

text: But the wisdom that is from above is first pure , then peaceable , gentle , and easy to be intreated , full of mercy and good fruits , without partiality , and without hypocrisy .
text2: Lakini hekima itokayo juu mbinguni , kwanza ni safi ; inapenda amani , upole na huwajali watu ; imejaa huruma na huzaa matunda ya matendo mema ; haina ubaguzi wala unafiki .

text: And the fruit of righteousness is sown in peace of them that make peace .
text2: Uadilifu ni mazao ya mbegu ambazo wapenda amani hupanda katika amani .

text: From whence come wars and fightings among you ? come they not hence , even of your lusts that war in your members ?
text2: Mapigano na magombano yote kati yenu yanatoka wapi ? Hutoka katika tamaa zenu mbaya ambazo hupigana daima ndani yenu .

text: Ye lust , and have not : ye kill , and desire to have , and cannot obtain : ye fight and war , yet ye have not , because ye ask not .
text2: Mnatamani vitu na kwa vile hamvipati mko tayari kuua ; mwatamani sana kupata vitu , lakini hamvipati , hivyo mnagombana na kupigana . Hampati kile mnachotaka kwa sababu hamkiombi kwa Mungu .

text: Ye ask , and receive not , because ye ask amiss , that ye may consume it upon your lusts .
text2: Tena , mnapoomba hampati kwa sababu mnaomba kwa nia mbaya ; mnaomba ili mpate kutosheleza tamaa zenu .

text: Ye adulterers and adulteresses , know ye not that the friendship of the world is enmity with God ? whosoever therefore will be a friend of the world is the enemy of God .
text2: Ninyi ni watu msio na uaminifu kama wazinzi . Je , hamjui kwamba kuwa rafiki wa ulimwengu ni kuwa adui wa Mungu ? Yeyote anayetaka kuwa rafiki wa ulimwengu anajifanya adui wa Mungu .

text: Do ye think that the scripture saith in vain , The spirit that dwelleth in us lusteth to envy ?
text2: Msifikiri kwamba Maandiko Matakatifu yamesema maneno ya bure , yanaposema : " Roho ambaye Mungu amemweka ndani yetu ana wivu mkubwa . "

text: But he giveth more grace . Wherefore he saith , God resisteth the proud , but giveth grace unto the humble .
text2: Lakini , neema tunayopewa na Mungu ina nguvu zaidi ; kama yasemavyo Maandiko : " Mungu huwapinga wenye majivuno lakini huwapa neema wanyenyekevu . "

text: Submit yourselves therefore to God . Resist the devil , and he will flee from you .
text2: Basi , jiwekeni chini ya Mungu ; mpingeni Ibilisi naye atawakimbieni .

text: Draw nigh to God , and he will draw nigh to you . Cleanse your hands , ye sinners ; and purify your hearts , ye double minded .
text2: Mkaribieni Mungu , naye atakuja karibu nanyi . Osheni mikono yenu enyi wakosefu ! Safisheni mioyo yenu enyi wanafiki !

text: Be afflicted , and mourn , and weep : let your laughter be turned to mourning , and your joy to heaviness .
text2: Oneni huzuni , lieni na kuomboleza ; kicheko chenu na kiwe kilio ; na furaha yenu iwe huzuni kubwa .

text: Humble yourselves in the sight of the Lord , and he shall lift you up .
text2: Nyenyekeeni mbele ya Bwana , naye atawainueni .

text: Speak not evil one of another , brethren . He that speaketh evil of his brother , and judgeth his brother , speaketh evil of the law , and judgeth the law : but if thou judge the law , thou art not a doer of the law , but a judge .
text2: Ndugu , msilaumiane ninyi kwa ninyi . Anayemlaumu ndugu yake na kumhukumu , huyo huilaumu na kuihukumu Sheria . Kama ukiihukumu Sheria , basi , wewe huitii Sheria , bali waihukumu .

text: There is one lawgiver , who is able to save and to destroy : who art thou that judgest another ?
text2: Mungu peke yake ndiye mwenye kuweka Sheria na kuhukumu . Ni yeye peke yake anayeweza kuokoa na kuangamiza . Basi , wewe ni nani hata umhukumu binadamu mwenzako ?

text: Go to now , ye that say , To day or to morrow we will go into such a city , and continue there a year , and buy and sell , and get gain :
text2: Basi , sasa sikilizeni ninyi mnaosema : " Leo au kesho tutakwenda katika mji fulani na kukaa huko mwaka mzima tukifanya biashara na kupata faida . "

text: Whereas ye know not what shall be on the morrow . For what is your life ? It is even a vapour , that appeareth for a little time , and then vanisheth away .
text2: Ninyi hamjui hata maisha yenu yatakavyokuwa kesho ! Ninyi ni kama ukungu unaotokea kwa muda mfupi tu na kutoweka tena .

text: For that ye ought to say , If the Lord will , we shall live , and do this , or that .
text2: Mngalipaswa kusema : " Bwana akitujalia tutaishi na tutafanya hiki au kile . "

text: But now ye rejoice in your boastings : all such rejoicing is evil .
text2: Lakini sasa mwajivuna na kujigamba ; majivuno ya namna hiyo ni mabaya .

text: Therefore to him that knoweth to do good , and doeth it not , to him it is sin .
text2: Basi , mtu ambaye hafanyi lile jambo jema analojua kwamba anapaswa kulifanya , anatenda dhambi .

text: Go to now , ye rich men , weep and howl for your miseries that shall come upon you .
text2: Na sasa sikilizeni enyi matajiri ! Lieni na kuomboleza kwa sababu ya taabu zitakazowajieni .

text: Your riches are corrupted , and your garments are motheaten .
text2: Mali zenu zimeoza , na nguo zenu zimeliwa na nondo .

text: Your gold and silver is cankered ; and the rust of them shall be a witness against you , and shall eat your flesh as it were fire . Ye have heaped treasure together for the last days .
text2: Dhahabu yenu na fedha vimeota kutu , na kutu hiyo itakuwa ushahidi dhidi yenu , nayo itakula miili yenu kama vile moto . Ninyi mmejilundikia mali katika siku hizi za mwisho !

text: Behold , the hire of the labourers who have reaped down your fields , which is of you kept back by fraud , crieth : and the cries of them which have reaped are entered into the ears of the Lord of sabaoth .
text2: Hamkuwalipa mishahara watumishi waliofanya kazi katika mashamba yenu . Sikilizeni malalamiko yao ! Kilio cha hao wanaovuna mashamba yenu kimefika masikioni mwa Bwana , Mwenye Nguvu .

text: Ye have lived in pleasure on the earth , and been wanton ; ye have nourished your hearts , as in a day of slaughter .
text2: Mmeishi duniani maisha ya kujifurahisha na ya anasa . Mmejinenepesha tayari kwa siku ya kuchinjwa .

text: Ye have condemned and killed the just ; and he doth not resist you .
text2: Mmemhukumu na kumwua mtu asiye na hatia , naye hakuwapigeni .

text: Be patient therefore , brethren , unto the coming of the Lord . Behold , the husbandman waiteth for the precious fruit of the earth , and hath long patience for it , until he receive the early and latter rain .
text2: Basi , ndugu zangu , muwe na subira mpaka Bwana atakapokuja . Tazameni mkulima anavyongoja kwa subira mimea yake itoe mavuno mazuri . Yeye hungojea kwa subira mvua za masika na za vuli .

text: Be ye also patient ; stablish your hearts : for the coming of the Lord draweth nigh .
text2: Nanyi pia mnapaswa kuwa na subira ; imarisheni mioyo yenu , maana siku ya kuja kwake Bwana inakaribia .

text: Grudge not one against another , brethren , lest ye be condemned : behold , the judge standeth before the door .
text2: Ndugu zangu , msinung ' unikiane ninyi kwa ninyi msije mkahukumiwa na Mungu . Hakimu yu karibu , tayari kuingia .

text: Take , my brethren , the prophets , who have spoken in the name of the Lord , for an example of suffering affliction , and of patience .
text2: Ndugu , mkitaka kuona mfano wa subira na uvumilivu katika mateso , fikirini juu ya manabii ambao walinena kwa jina la Bwana .

text: Behold , we count them happy which endure . Ye have heard of the patience of Job , and have seen the end of the Lord ; that the Lord is very pitiful , and of tender mercy .
text2: Tunawaita hao wenye heri kwa sababu walivumilia . Mmesikia habari za uvumilivu wa Yobu , na mnajua jinsi Bwana alivyomtendea mwishoni . Maana Bwana amejaa huruma na rehema .

text: But above all things , my brethren , swear not , neither by heaven , neither by the earth , neither by any other oath : but let your yea be yea ; and your nay , nay ; lest ye fall into condemnation .
text2: Zaidi ya hayo yote , ndugu zangu , msiape kwa mbingu , wala kwa dunia , wala kwa kitu kingine chochote . Semeni " Ndiyo " kama maana yenu ni ndiyo , na " La " kama maana yenu ni la , na hapo hamtahukumiwa na Mungu .

text: Is any among you afflicted ? let him pray . Is any merry ? let him sing psalms .
text2: Je , pana mtu yeyote miongoni mwenu aliye na shida ? Anapaswa kusali . Je , yuko mwenye furaha ? Anapaswa kuimba nyimbo za sifa .

text: Is any sick among you ? let him call for the elders of the church ; and let them pray over him , anointing him with oil in the name of the Lord :
text2: Je , yuko mgonjwa kati yenu ? Anapaswa kuwaita wazee wa kanisa , nao watamwombea na kumpaka mafuta kwa jina la Bwana .

text: And the prayer of faith shall save the sick , and the Lord shall raise him up ; and if he have committed sins , they shall be forgiven him .
text2: Wakiomba kwa imani mgonjwa ataponyeshwa ; Bwana atampatia nafuu , na dhambi alizotenda zitaondolewa .

text: Confess your faults one to another , and pray one for another , that ye may be healed . The effectual fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much .
text2: Basi , ungamanianeni dhambi zenu , na ombeaneni , ili mpate kuponywa . Sala ya mtu mwema ina nguvu ya kutenda mengi .

text: Elias was a man subject to like passions as we are , and he prayed earnestly that it might not rain : and it rained not on the earth by the space of three years and six months .
text2: Eliya alikuwa binadamu kama sisi . Aliomba kwa moyo mvua isinyeshe , nayo haikunyesha nchini kwa muda wa miaka mitatu na miezi sita .

text: And he prayed again , and the heaven gave rain , and the earth brought forth her fruit .
text2: Kisha akaomba tena , mvua ikanyesha kutoka angani na nchi ikatoa mazao yake .

text: Brethren , if any of you do err from the truth , and one convert him ;
text2: Ndugu zangu , mmoja wenu akipotoka kuhusu ukweli , na mwingine akamrudisha ,

text: Let him know , that he which converteth the sinner from the error of his way shall save a soul from death , and shall hide a multitude of sins .
text2: fahamuni kwamba , huyo anayemrudisha mwenye dhambi kutoka njia yake ya upotovu , ataiokoa roho yake kutoka kifo , na dhambi nyingi zitaondolewa .

text: Peter , an apostle of Jesus Christ , to the strangers scattered throughout Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , Asia , and Bithynia ,
text2: Mimi Petro , mtume wa Yesu Kristo nawaandikia ninyi wateule wa Mungu Baba , ambao mmetawanyika na mnaishi kama wakimbizi huko Ponto , Galatia , Kapadokia , Asia na Bithunia .

text: Elect according to the foreknowledge of God the Father , through sanctification of the Spirit , unto obedience and sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ : Grace unto you , and peace , be multiplied .
text2: Mungu Baba aliwateua ninyi kufuatana na kusudi lake , na mmefanywa watakatifu na Roho , mpate kumtii Yesu Kristo na kusafishwa kwa damu yake . Nawatakieni neema na amani tele .

text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , which according to his abundant mercy hath begotten us again unto a lively hope by the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead ,
text2: Asifiwe Mungu na Baba wa Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo ! Kwa huruma yake kuu alitufanya tuzaliwe upya kwa kumfufua Yesu kutoka wafu . Ametujalia tumaini lenye uzima ,

text: To an inheritance incorruptible , and undefiled , and that fadeth not away , reserved in heaven for you ,
text2: na hivyo tunatazamia kupata baraka zile ambazo Mungu aliwawekea watu wake . Mungu amewawekeeni baraka hizo mbinguni ambako haziwezi kuoza au kuharibika au kufifia .

text: Who are kept by the power of God through faith unto salvation ready to be revealed in the last time .
text2: Hizo zitakuwa zenu ninyi ambao kwa imani mnalindwa salama kwa nguvu ya Mungu kwa ajili ya wokovu ambao uko tayari kufunuliwa mwishoni mwa nyakati .

text: Wherein ye greatly rejoice , though now for a season , if need be , ye are in heaviness through manifold temptations :
text2: Furahini kuhusu jambo hilo , ijapokuwa sasa , kwa kitambo kidogo , itawabidi kuhuzunika kwa sababu ya majaribio mbalimbali mnayoteseka .

text: That the trial of your faith , being much more precious than of gold that perisheth , though it be tried with fire , might be found unto praise and honour and glory at the appearing of Jesus Christ :
text2: Shabaha yake ni kuthibitisha imani yenu . Hata dhahabu yenyewe ambayo huharibika , hujaribiwa kwa moto ; hali kadhalika na imani yenu ambayo ni ya thamani zaidi kuliko dhahabu , ni lazima ijaribiwe ipate kuwa thabiti . Hapo mtapokea sifa na utukufu na heshima Siku ile Yesu Kristo atakapofunuliwa .

text: Whom having not seen , ye love ; in whom , though now ye see him not , yet believing , ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory :
text2: Ninyi mnampenda ingawaje hamjamwona , na mnamwamini ingawa hamumwoni sasa . Hivyo , mnafurahi kwa furaha tukufu isiyoelezeka ,

text: Receiving the end of your faith , even the salvation of your souls .
text2: kwa sababu mnapokea wokovu wa roho zenu ambao ni lengo la imani yenu .

text: Of which salvation the prophets have inquired and searched diligently , who prophesied of the grace that should come unto you :
text2: Manabii walipeleleza kwa makini na kufanya uchunguzi juu ya wokovu huo , wakabashiri juu ya neema hiyo ambayo ninyi mngepewa .

text: Searching what , or what manner of time the Spirit of Christ which was in them did signify , when it testified beforehand the sufferings of Christ , and the glory that should follow .
text2: Walijaribu kujua nyakati na mazingira ya tukio hilo , yaani wakati alioudokezea Roho wa Kristo aliyekuwa ndani yao , akibashiri juu ya mateso yatakayompata Kristo na utukufu utakaofuata .

text: Unto whom it was revealed , that not unto themselves , but unto us they did minister the things , which are now reported unto you by them that have preached the gospel unto you with the Holy Ghost sent down from heaven ; which things the angels desire to look into .
text2: Mungu aliwafunulia kwamba wakati walipokuwa wanasema juu ya hayo mambo ambayo ninyi mmekwisha sikia sasa kutoka kwa wale wajumbe waliowatangazieni Habari Njema kwa nguvu ya Roho Mtakatifu aliyetumwa kutoka mbinguni , hiyo kazi yao haikuwa kwa faida yao wenyewe , bali kwa ajili yenu . Hayo ndiyo mambo ambayo hata malaika wangependa kuyafahamu .

text: Wherefore gird up the loins of your mind , be sober , and hope to the end for the grace that is to be brought unto you at the revelation of Jesus Christ ;
text2: Kwa hiyo , basi , muwe tayari kabisa kwa nia , na kukesha . Wekeni tumaini lenu lote katika baraka ile mtakayopewa wakati Yesu Kristo atakapoonekana !

text: As obedient children , not fashioning yourselves according to the former lusts in your ignorance :
text2: Kama watoto wa Mungu wenye utii , msikubali kamwe kufuata tena tamaa mbaya mlizokuwa nazo wakati mlipokuwa wajinga .

text: But as he which hath called you is holy , so be ye holy in all manner of conversation ;
text2: Bali mnapaswa kuwa watakatifu katika mwenendo wenu wote , kama vile yule aliyewaiteni ni mtakatifu .

text: Because it is written , Be ye holy ; for I am holy .
text2: Maandiko yasema : " Muwe watakatifu , kwa kuwa mimi ni mtakatifu . "

text: And if ye call on the Father , who without respect of persons judgeth according to every man ' s work , pass the time of your sojourning here in fear :
text2: Mnapomtaja Mungu ninyi humwita Baba . Basi , jueni kwamba yeye humhukumu kila mmoja kadiri ya matendo yake , bila ubaguzi . Hivyo tumieni wakati wenu uliowabakia hapa ugenini katika kumcha Mungu .

text: Forasmuch as ye know that ye were not redeemed with corruptible things , as silver and gold , from your vain conversation received by tradition from your fathers ;
text2: Maana mnajua kwamba ninyi mlikombolewa katika mwenendo wenu usiofaa ambao mliupokea kutoka kwa wazee wenu , si kwa vitu vyenye kuharibika : kwa fedha na dhahabu ;

text: But with the precious blood of Christ , as of a lamb without blemish and without spot :
text2: bali mlikombolewa kwa damu tukufu ya Kristo , ambaye alikuwa kama mwana kondoo asiye na dosari wala doa .

text: Who verily was foreordained before the foundation of the world , but was manifest in these last times for you ,
text2: Yeye alikuwa ameteuliwa na Mungu kabla ya ulimwengu kuumbwa , akafunuliwa siku hizi za mwisho kwa ajili yenu .

text: Who by him do believe in God , that raised him up from the dead , and gave him glory ; that your faith and hope might be in God .
text2: Kwa njia yake , ninyi mnamwamini Mungu aliyemfufua kutoka wafu na kumpa utukufu ; na hivyo imani na matumaini yenu yako kwa Mungu .

text: Seeing ye have purified your souls in obeying the truth through the Spirit unto unfeigned love of the brethren , see that ye love one another with a pure heart fervently :
text2: Maadamu sasa , kwa kuutii ukweli , ninyi mmezitakasa roho zenu na kuwapenda wenzenu bila unafiki , basi , pendaneni kwa moyo wote .

text: Being born again , not of corruptible seed , but of incorruptible , by the word of God , which liveth and abideth for ever .
text2: Maana kwa njia ya neno hai la Mungu , ninyi mmezaliwa upya , si kama watoto wa baba awezaye kufa , bali baba asiyekufa milele .

text: For all flesh is as grass , and all the glory of man as the flower of grass . The grass withereth , and the flower thereof falleth away :
text2: Kama Maandiko yasemavyo : " Kila binadamu ni kama nyasi , na utukufu wake wote ni kama maua ya porini . Nyasi hunyauka na maua huanguka .

text: But the word of the Lord endureth for ever . And this is the word which by the gospel is preached unto you .
text2: Lakini neno la Bwana hudumu milele . " Neno hilo ni hiyo Habari Njema iliyohubiriwa kwenu .

text: Wherefore laying aside all malice , and all guile , and hypocrisies , and envies , and all evil speakings ,
text2: Basi , acheni uovu wote ; uongo , unafiki , wivu na maneno ya kashfa visiweko tena .

text: As newborn babes , desire the sincere milk of the word , that ye may grow thereby :
text2: Kama vile watoto wachanga wanavyotamani maziwa , nanyi pia mnapaswa kuwa na hamu ya maziwa halisi ya kiroho , ili kwa nguvu yake mpate kukua na kukombolewa .

text: If so be ye have tasted that the Lord is gracious .
text2: Kama yasemavyo Maandiko Matakatifu : " Mmegundua kwamba Bwana ni mwema . "

text: To whom coming , as unto a living stone , disallowed indeed of men , but chosen of God , and precious ,
text2: Basi , mwendeeni Bwana ! Yeye ndiye jiwe hai lililokataliwa na watu ; lakini mbele ya Mungu ni jiwe teule , na la thamani kubwa .

text: Ye also , as lively stones , are built up a spiritual house , an holy priesthood , to offer up spiritual sacrifices , acceptable to God by Jesus Christ .
text2: Mwendeeni yeye kama mawe hai mkajengeke na kuwa nyumba ya kiroho , ambamo mtatumikia kama makuhani watakatifu , kutolea dhabihu za kiroho zenye kumpendeza Mungu kwa njia ya Yesu Kristo .

text: Wherefore also it is contained in the scripture , Behold , I lay in Sion a chief corner stone , elect , precious : and he that believeth on him shall not be confounded .
text2: Maana Maandiko Matakatifu yasema : " Tazama ! Naweka huko sioni jiwe kuu la msingi , jiwe la thamani kubwa nililoliteua . Mtu atakayemwamini yeye aliye hilo jiwe , hataaibishwa . "

text: Unto you therefore which believe he is precious : but unto them which be disobedient , the stone which the builders disallowed , the same is made the head of the corner ,
text2: Kwenu ninyi mnaoamini , jiwe hilo ni la thamani kubwa ; lakini kwa wale wasioamini , " Jiwe walilokataa waashi , sasa limekuwa jiwe kuu la msingi . "

text: And a stone of stumbling , and a rock of offence , even to them which stumble at the word , being disobedient : whereunto also they were appointed .
text2: Tena Maandiko yasema : " Jiwe hilo ni jiwe la kujikwaa , mwamba wa kuwaangusha watu . " Watu hujikwaa kwa sababu hawauamini ule ujumbe ; na ndivyo walivyopangiwa tangu mwanzo .

text: But ye are a chosen generation , a royal priesthood , an holy nation , a peculiar people ; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light :
text2: Lakini ninyi ni ukoo mteule , makuhani wa Mfalme , taifa takatifu ; watu wake Mungu mwenyewe , mlioteuliwa kutangaza matendo makuu ya Mungu aliyewaiteni kutoka gizani akawaingizeni katika mwanga wake mkuu .

text: Which in time past were not a people , but are now the people of God : which had not obtained mercy , but now have obtained mercy .
text2: Wakati mmoja ninyi hamkuwa watu wa Mungu , lakini sasa ninyi ni watu wake ; wakati mmoja hamkupewa huruma ya Mungu , lakini sasa mmeipokea .

text: Dearly beloved , I beseech you as strangers and pilgrims , abstain from fleshly lusts , which war against the soul ;
text2: Wapenzi wangu , nawasihi ninyi kama wageni na wakimbizi hapa duniani ! Achaneni na tamaa za mwili ambazo hupingana na roho .

text: Having your conversation honest among the Gentiles : that , whereas they speak against you as evildoers , they may by your good works , which they shall behold , glorify God in the day of visitation .
text2: Mwenendo wenu kati ya watu wasiomjua Mungu unapaswa kuwa mwema kabisa , ili hata watakapowasingizieni kwamba mnatenda mabaya , waweze kutambua matendo yenu mema na hivyo wamtukuze Mungu Siku ya kuja kwake .

text: Submit yourselves to every ordinance of man for the Lord ' s sake : whether it be to the king , as supreme ;
text2: Basi , jiwekeni chini ya mamlaka yote ya kibinadamu , kwa ajili ya Bwana : utii kwa mfalme aliye mtawala mkuu ,

text: Or unto governors , as unto them that are sent by him for the punishment of evildoers , and for the praise of them that do well .
text2: utii kwa wakuu wa mikoa ambao wameteuliwa naye kuwaadhibu wahalifu na kuwasifu watendao mema .

text: For so is the will of God , that with well doing ye may put to silence the ignorance of foolish men :
text2: Maana Mungu anataka mweze kuyakomesha maneno ya kijinga ya watu wasio na akili kwa matendo mema mnayofanya .

text: As free , and not using your liberty for a cloke of maliciousness , but as the servants of God .
text2: Ishini kama watu huru ; lakini msiutumie uhuru wenu kuuficha ubaya , bali ishini kama watumishi wa Mungu .

text: Honour all men . Love the brotherhood . Fear God . Honour the king .
text2: Waheshimuni watu wote , wapendeni ndugu zenu waumini , mcheni Mungu , mheshimuni mfalme .

text: Servants , be subject to your masters with all fear ; not only to the good and gentle , but also to the froward .
text2: Enyi watumishi wa nyumbani , watiini wakuu wenu kwa heshima yote , wawe wema na wapole au wenye kuchukiza .

text: For this is thankworthy , if a man for conscience toward God endure grief , suffering wrongfully .
text2: Maana kama mnavumilia maumivu ya mateso msiyostahili kwa sababu mwajua kwamba Mungu anataka hivyo , basi Mungu atawafadhili .

text: For what glory is it , if , when ye be buffeted for your faults , ye shall take it patiently ? but if , when ye do well , and suffer for it , ye take it patiently , this is acceptable with God .
text2: Maana , mtapata tuzo gani mkivumilia mapigo mnayostahili kwa sababu ya makosa yenu ? Lakini kama mnavumilia mateso hata ingawa mmetenda mema , Mungu atawapeni baraka kwa ajili hiyo .

text: For even hereunto were ye called : because Christ also suffered for us , leaving us an example , that ye should follow his steps :
text2: Hayo ndiyo mliyoitiwa ; maana Kristo mwenyewe aliteseka kwa ajili yenu , akawaachieni mfano , ili muufuate mwenendo wake .

text: Who did no sin , neither was guile found in his mouth :
text2: Yeye hakutenda dhambi , wala neno la udanganyifu halikusikika mdomoni mwake .

text: Who , when he was reviled , reviled not again ; when he suffered , he threatened not ; but committed himself to him that judgeth righteously :
text2: Alipotukanwa yeye hakujibu kwa tukano ; alipoteseka yeye hakutoa vitisho , bali aliyaweka matumaini yake kwa Mungu , hakimu mwenye haki .

text: Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree , that we , being dead to sins , should live unto righteousness : by whose stripes ye were healed .
text2: Yeye mwenyewe alizibeba dhambi zetu katika mwili wake juu ya msalaba , tupate kufa kuhusu dhambi , na kuishi kwa ajili ya uadilifu . Kwa majeraha yake , ninyi mmeponywa .

text: For ye were as sheep going astray ; but are now returned unto the Shepherd and Bishop of your souls .
text2: Ninyi mlikuwa kama kondoo waliokuwa wamepotea ; lakini sasa mmemrudia Mchungaji na Mlinzi wa roho zenu .

text: Likewise , ye wives , be in subjection to your own husbands ; that , if any obey not the word , they also may without the word be won by the conversation of the wives ;
text2: Nanyi wake , jiwekeni chini ya mamlaka ya waume zenu , ili kama wako waume wowote wasioamini neno la Mungu , wapate kuamini kwa kuuona mwenendo wenu . Haitakuwa lazima kwenu kusema neno ,

text: While they behold your chaste conversation coupled with fear .
text2: kwani wataona jinsi mwenendo wenu ulivyo safi na wa kumcha Mungu .

text: Whose adorning let it not be that outward adorning of plaiting the hair , and of wearing of gold , or of putting on of apparel ;
text2: Katika kujipamba kwenu msitegemee mambo ya njenje , kama vile mitindo ya kusuka nywele , kujivalia vitu vya dhahabu na nguo maridadi .

text: But let it be the hidden man of the heart , in that which is not corruptible , even the ornament of a meek and quiet spirit , which is in the sight of God of great price .
text2: Bali , uzuri wenu unapaswa kutokana na hali ya ndani ya utu wa kweli , uzuri usioharibika wa wema na utulivu wa roho , ambao ni wa thamani kubwa mbele ya Mungu .

text: For after this manner in the old time the holy women also , who trusted in God , adorned themselves , being in subjection unto their own husbands :
text2: Ndivyo walivyojipamba hapo kale wanawake waadilifu waliomtumainia Mungu ; walijiweka chini ya mamlaka ya waume zao .

text: Even as Sara obeyed Abraham , calling him lord : whose daughters ye are , as long as ye do well , and are not afraid with any amazement .
text2: Sara kwa mfano alimtii Abrahamu na kumwita yeye bwana . Ninyi mmekuwa sasa binti zake kama mkitenda mema bila kuogopa tisho lolote .

text: Likewise , ye husbands , dwell with them according to knowledge , giving honour unto the wife , as unto the weaker vessel , and as being heirs together of the grace of life ; that your prayers be not hindered .
text2: Kadhalika nanyi waume , katika kuishi na wake zenu mnapaswa kutambua kwamba wao ni dhaifu na hivyo muwatendee kwa heshima ; maana nao pia watapokea pamoja nanyi zawadi ya uzima anayowapeni Mungu . Hapo ndipo sala zenu hazitakataliwa .

text: Finally , be ye all of one mind , having compassion one of another , love as brethren , be pitiful , be courteous :
text2: Mwisho nasema hivi : mnapaswa kuwa na moyo mmoja , na fikira moja ; mnapaswa kupendana kidugu , kuwa wapole na wanyenyekevu ninyi kwa ninyi .
