text: Not rendering evil for evil , or railing for railing : but contrariwise blessing ; knowing that ye are thereunto called , that ye should inherit a blessing .
text2: Msiwalipe watu ovu kwa ovu , au tusi kwa tusi ; bali watakieni baraka , maana ninyi mliitwa na Mungu mpate kupokea baraka .

text: For he that will love life , and see good days , let him refrain his tongue from evil , and his lips that they speak no guile :
text2: Kama yasemavyo Maandiko Matakatifu : " Anayetaka kufurahia maisha , na kuona siku za fanaka , anapaswa kuacha kusema mabaya na kuacha kusema uongo .

text: Let him eschew evil , and do good ; let him seek peace , and ensue it .
text2: Na ajiepushe na uovu , atende mema , atafute amani na kuizingatia .

text: For the eyes of the Lord are over the righteous , and his ears are open unto their prayers : but the face of the Lord is against them that do evil .
text2: Maana Bwana huwatazama kwa wema waadilifu na kuzisikiliza sala zao . Lakini huwapa kisogo watu watendao maovu . "

text: And who is he that will harm you , if ye be followers of that which is good ?
text2: Ni nani atakayeweza kuwadhuru ninyi kama mkizingatia kutenda mema ?

text: But and if ye suffer for righteousness ' sake , happy are ye : and be not afraid of their terror , neither be troubled ;
text2: Lakini , hata kama itawapasa kuteseka kwa sababu ya kutenda mema , basi , mna heri . Msimwogope mtu yeyote , wala msikubali kutiwa katika wasiwasi .

text: But sanctify the Lord God in your hearts : and be ready always to give an answer to every man that asketh you a reason of the hope that is in you with meekness and fear :
text2: Lakini mtukuzeni Kristo kama Bwana mioyoni mwenu . Muwe tayari kumjibu yeyote atakayewaulizeni juu ya matumaini yaliyo ndani yenu ,

text: Having a good conscience ; that , whereas they speak evil of you , as of evildoers , they may be ashamed that falsely accuse your good conversation in Christ .
text2: lakini fanyeni hivyo kwa upole na heshima . Muwe na dhamiri njema , kusudi mnapotukanwa , wale wanaosema ubaya juu ya mwenendo wenu mwema kama Wakristo , waone aibu .

text: For it is better , if the will of God be so , that ye suffer for well doing , than for evil doing .
text2: Maana ni afadhali kuteseka kwa sababu ya kutenda mema , kama Mungu akipenda , kuliko kuteseka kwa sababu ya kutenda uovu .

text: For Christ also hath once suffered for sins , the just for the unjust , that he might bring us to God , being put to death in the flesh , but quickened by the Spirit :
text2: Kwa maana Kristo mwenyewe alikufa kwa ajili ya dhambi zenu ; alikufa mara moja tu na ikatosha , mtu mwema kwa ajili ya waovu , ili awapeleke ninyi kwa Mungu . Aliuawa kimwili lakini akafanywa hai kiroho ;

text: By which also he went and preached unto the spirits in prison ;
text2: na kwa maisha yake ya kiroho alikwenda kuwahubiria wale roho waliokuwa kifungoni .

text: Which sometime were disobedient , when once the longsuffering of God waited in the days of Noah , while the ark was a preparing , wherein few , that is , eight souls were saved by water .
text2: Hao ndio wale waliokataa kumtii Mungu alipowangoja kwa saburi wakati Noa alipokuwa anatayarisha ile safina . Ndani ya chombo hicho ni watu wachache tu , yaani watu wanane , waliookolewa majini ,

text: The like figure whereunto even baptism doth also now save us ( not the putting away of the filth of the flesh , but the answer of a good conscience toward God , ) by the resurrection of Jesus Christ :
text2: ambayo yalikuwa mfano wa ubatizo unaowaokoa ninyi sasa . Ubatizo si shauri la kuondoa uchafu mwilini , bali ni ahadi kwa Mungu inayofanyika katika dhamiri njema . Huwaokoeni kwa njia ya ufufuo wa Yesu Kristo ,

text: Who is gone into heaven , and is on the right hand of God ; angels and authorities and powers being made subject unto him .
text2: ambaye alikwenda mbinguni na sasa amekaa upande wa kulia wa Mungu , anatawala juu ya malaika , wakuu na wenye enzi .

text: Forasmuch then as Christ hath suffered for us in the flesh , arm yourselves likewise with the same mind : for he that hath suffered in the flesh hath ceased from sin ;
text2: Maadamu Kristo aliteseka kimwili , nanyi pia mnapaswa kujiimarisha kwa nia hiyo yake ; maana mtu akisha teseka kimwili hahusiki tena na dhambi .

text: That he no longer should live the rest of his time in the flesh to the lusts of men , but to the will of God .
text2: Tangu sasa , basi , maisha yaliowabakia kuishi hapa duniani yanapaswa kuongozwa na matakwa ya Mungu , si na tamaa za kibinadamu .

text: For the time past of our life may suffice us to have wrought the will of the Gentiles , when we walked in lasciviousness , lusts , excess of wine , revellings , banquetings , and abominable idolatries :
text2: Wakati uliopita mlikuwa na muda mrefu wa kufanya mambo wanayofanya watu wasiomjua Mungu . Mliishi maisha ya anasa , ubinafsi , ulevi , ugomvi , kunywa mno na ya ibada haramu za sanamu .

text: Wherein they think it strange that ye run not with them to the same excess of riot , speaking evil of you :
text2: Sasa , watu hao wasiomjua Mungu wanashangaa wanapoona kwamba hamwandamani nao tena katika hali ya kuishi vibaya , na hivyo wanawatukaneni .

text: Who shall give account to him that is ready to judge the quick and the dead .
text2: Lakini watapaswa kutoa hoja juu ya jambo hilo mbele yake Mungu aliye tayari kuwahukumu wazima na wafu !

text: For for this cause was the gospel preached also to them that are dead , that they might be judged according to men in the flesh , but live according to God in the spirit .
text2: Kwa sababu hiyo , hao waliokufa ambao walikuwa wamehukumiwa katika maisha yao ya kimwili kama anavyohukumiwa kila mmoja , walihubiriwa Habari Njema kusudi katika maisha yao ya kiroho waishi kama aishivyo Mungu .

text: But the end of all things is at hand : be ye therefore sober , and watch unto prayer .
text2: Mwisho wa vitu vyote umekaribia . Kwa hiyo mnapaswa kuwa na utaratibu na nidhamu , ili mweze kusali .

text: And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves : for charity shall cover the multitude of sins .
text2: Zaidi ya yote pendaneni kwa moyo wote , maana upendo hufunika dhambi nyingi .

text: Use hospitality one to another without grudging .
text2: Muwe na ukarimu ninyi kwa ninyi bila kunung ' unika .

text: As every man hath received the gift , even so minister the same one to another , as good stewards of the manifold grace of God .
text2: Kila mmoja anapaswa kutumia kipaji alichojaliwa na Mungu kwa faida ya wengine , kama vile uwakili mwema wa zawadi mbalimbali za Mungu .

text: If any man speak , let him speak as the oracles of God ; if any man minister , let him do it as of the ability which God giveth : that God in all things may be glorified through Jesus Christ , to whom be praise and dominion for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Anayesema kitu , maneno yake na yawe kama maneno ya Mungu ; anayetumika anapaswa kutumikia kwa nguvu anayojaliwa na Mungu , ili katika mambo yote , Mungu atukuzwe kwa njia ya Yesu Kristo , ambaye utukufu na nguvu ni vyake milele na milele ! Amina .

text: Beloved , think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you , as though some strange thing happened unto you :
text2: Wapenzi wangu , msishangae kuhusu majaribio makali mnayopata kana kwamba mnapatwa na kitu kisicho cha kawaida .

text: But rejoice , inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ ' s sufferings ; that , when his glory shall be revealed , ye may be glad also with exceeding joy .
text2: Ila furahini kwamba mnashiriki mateso ya Kristo ili mweze kuwa na furaha tele wakati utukufu wake utakapofunuliwa .

text: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ , happy are ye ; for the spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you : on their part he is evil spoken of , but on your part he is glorified .
text2: Heri yenu ikiwa mnatukanwa kwa sababu ya jina la Kristo ; jambo hilo lamaanisha kwamba Roho mtukufu , yaani Roho wa Mungu , anakaa juu yetu .

text: But let none of you suffer as a murderer , or as a thief , or as an evildoer , or as a busybody in other men ' s matters .
text2: Asiwepo mtu yeyote miongoni mwenu ambaye anapaswa kuteseka kwa sababu ni muuaji , mwizi , mhalifu au mwovu .

text: Yet if any man suffer as a Christian , let him not be ashamed ; but let him glorify God on this behalf .
text2: Lakini kama mtu akiteseka kwa sababu ni Mkristo , basi asione aibu , bali amtukuze Mungu , kwa sababu mtu huyo anaitwa kwa jina la Kristo .

text: For the time is come that judgment must begin at the house of God : and if it first begin at us , what shall the end be of them that obey not the gospel of God ?
text2: Wakati wa hukumu umefika , na hukumu hiyo inaanza na watu wake Mungu mwenyewe . Ikiwa hukumu hiyo inaanzia kwetu sisi , basi mwisho wake utakuwa namna gani kwa wale wasioamini Habari Njema ya Mungu ?

text: And if the righteous scarcely be saved , where shall the ungodly and the sinner appear ?
text2: Kama yasemavyo Maandiko Matakatifu : " Ni vigumu kwa watu waadilifu kuokolewa ; itakuwaje basi kwa wasiomcha Mungu na wenye dhambi ? "

text: Wherefore let them that suffer according to the will of God commit the keeping of their souls to him in well doing , as unto a faithful Creator .
text2: Kwa hiyo , wale wanaoteseka kufuatana na matakwa ya Mungu , wanapaswa , kwa matendo yao mema , kujiweka chini ya Muumba wao ambaye ni wa kuaminika kabisa .

text: The elders which are among you I exhort , who am also an elder , and a witness of the sufferings of Christ , and also a partaker of the glory that shall be revealed :
text2: wazee ! Mimi niliye mzee ninalo ombi moja kwenu wazee wenzangu . Mimi mwenyewe nilishuhudia kwa macho yangu mateso ya Kristo na natumaini kuushiriki ule utukufu utakaofunuliwa . Mimi nawaombeni

text: Feed the flock of God which is among you , taking the oversight thereof , not by constraint , but willingly ; not for filthy lucre , but of a ready mind ;
text2: mlichunge lile kundi la Mungu mlilokabidhiwa , mlitunze si kwa kulazimika , bali kwa hiari kama atakavyo Mungu . Fanyeni kazi hiyo si kwa tamaa ya fedha , bali kwa moyo wenu wote .

text: Neither as being lords over God ' s heritage , but being ensamples to the flock .
text2: Msiwatawale kwa mabavu hao waliowekwa chini ya ulinzi wenu , bali muwe mfano kwa hilo kundi .

text: And when the chief Shepherd shall appear , ye shall receive a crown of glory that fadeth not away .
text2: Na wakati Mchungaji Mkuu atakapotokea , ninyi mtapokea taji ya utukufu isiyofifia .

text: Likewise , ye younger , submit yourselves unto the elder . Yea , all of you be subject one to another , and be clothed with humility : for God resisteth the proud , and giveth grace to the humble .
text2: Kadhalika nanyi vijana mnapaswa kujiweka chini ya mamlaka ya wazee . Ninyi nyote mnapaswa kuwa na unyenyekevu mpate kutumikiana ; maana Maandiko Matakatifu yasema : " Mungu huwapinga wenye majivuno , lakini huwajalia neema wanyenyekevu . "

text: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God , that he may exalt you in due time :
text2: Basi , nyenyekeeni chini ya mkono wa enzi wa Mungu , ili awainue wakati ufaao .

text: Casting all your care upon him ; for he careth for you .
text2: Mwekeeni matatizo yenu yote , maana yeye anawatunzeni .

text: Be sober , be vigilant ; because your adversary the devil , as a roaring lion , walketh about , seeking whom he may devour :
text2: Muwe macho ; kesheni ! Maana adui yenu , Ibilisi , huzungukazunguka kama simba angurumaye akitafuta mawindo .

text: Whom resist stedfast in the faith , knowing that the same afflictions are accomplished in your brethren that are in the world .
text2: Muwe imara katika imani na kumpinga , mkijua kwamba ndugu zenu pote duniani wanapatwa na mateso hayohayo .

text: But the God of all grace , who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus , after that ye have suffered a while , make you perfect , stablish , strengthen , settle you .
text2: Lakini mkisha teseka muda mfupi , Mungu aliye asili ya neema yote na ambaye anawaiteni muushiriki utukufu wake wa milele katika kuungana na Kristo , yeye mwenyewe atawakamilisheni na kuwapeni uthabiti , nguvu na msingi imara .

text: To him be glory and dominion for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Kwake uwe uwezo milele ! Amina .

text: By Silvanus , a faithful brother unto you , as I suppose , I have written briefly , exhorting , and testifying that this is the true grace of God wherein ye stand .
text2: Nimewaandikieni barua hii fupi kwa msaada wa Silwano , ndugu ambaye namjua na kumwamini . Nataka kuwapeni moyo na kushuhudia kwamba jambo hili ni neema ya Mungu kweli . Kaeni imara katika neema hiyo .

text: The church that is at Babylon , elected together with you , saluteth you ; and so doth Marcus my son .
text2: Jumuiya ya wenzenu walioteuliwa na Mungu hapa Babuloni wanawasalimuni . Vilevile mwanangu Marko anawasalimuni .

text: Greet ye one another with a kiss of charity . Peace be with you all that are in Christ Jesus . Amen .
text2: Salimianeni kwa ishara ya upendo wa Kikristo . Nawatakieni amani ninyi mlio wake Kristo .

text: Simon Peter , a servant and an apostle of Jesus Christ , to them that have obtained like precious faith with us through the righteousness of God and our Saviour Jesus Christ :
text2: Mimi Simoni Petro , mtumishi na mtume wa Yesu Kristo , nawaandikia ninyi ambao , kwa wema wake Mungu wetu , na Mwokozi Yesu Kristo , mmejaliwa imani ileile ya thamani kuu tuliyojaliwa sisi .

text: Grace and peace be multiplied unto you through the knowledge of God , and of Jesus our Lord ,
text2: Nawatakieni neema na amani tele katika kumjua Mungu na Yesu Bwana wetu .

text: According as his divine power hath given unto us all things that pertain unto life and godliness , through the knowledge of him that hath called us to glory and virtue :
text2: Kwa uwezo wake wa kimungu , Mungu ametujalia mambo yote tunayohitaji , ili tuishi maisha ya kumcha Mungu kwa kumjua yeye aliyetuita tuushiriki utukufu na wema wake yeye mwenyewe .

text: Whereby are given unto us exceeding great and precious promises : that by these ye might be partakers of the divine nature , having escaped the corruption that is in the world through lust .
text2: Kwa namna hiyo ametujalia zawadi kuu na za thamani ambazo alituahidia , ili kwa zawadi hizo mpate kuziepa kabisa tamaa mbaya zilizomo duniani , na mpate kuishiriki hali yake ya kimungu .

text: And beside this , giving all diligence , add to your faith virtue ; and to virtue knowledge ;
text2: Kwa sababu hiyo , fanyeni bidii ya kuongeza fadhila katika imani yenu : ongezeni elimu katika fadhila yenu ,

text: And to knowledge temperance ; and to temperance patience ; and to patience godliness ;
text2: kuwa na kiasi katika elimu yenu , uvumilivu katika kuwa na kiasi , uchaji wa Mungu katika uvumilivu wenu ,

text: And to godliness brotherly kindness ; and to brotherly kindness charity .
text2: udugu katika uchaji wenu , na mapendo katika udugu wenu .

text: For if these things be in you , and abound , they make you that ye shall neither be barren nor unfruitful in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Mkiwa na sifa hizo zote kwa wingi , zitawawezesheni kuwa watendaji na kupata faida katika kumjua Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo .

text: But he that lacketh these things is blind , and cannot see afar off , and hath forgotten that he was purged from his old sins .
text2: Lakini mtu asiye na sifa hizo ni kipofu , hawezi kuona na amesahau kwamba alikwisha takaswa dhambi zake za zamani .

text: Wherefore the rather , brethren , give diligence to make your calling and election sure : for if ye do these things , ye shall never fall :
text2: Kwa hiyo basi , ndugu zangu , fanyeni bidii zaidi kuufanya huo wito wenu mlioitiwa na Mungu uwe jambo la kudumu katika maisha yenu ; kama mkiishi namna hiyo hamtaanguka kamwe .

text: For so an entrance shall be ministered unto you abundantly into the everlasting kingdom of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ .
text2: Kwa namna hiyo mtafaulu kupewa haki kamili ya kuingia katika Utawala wa milele wa Bwana na Mwokozi wetu Yesu Kristo .

text: Wherefore I will not be negligent to put you always in remembrance of these things , though ye know them , and be established in the present truth .
text2: Kwa hiyo nitaendelea kuwakumbusheni daima mambo haya , ingawa mmekwisha yafahamu , na mko imara katika ukweli mlioupokea .

text: Yea , I think it meet , as long as I am in this tabernacle , to stir you up by putting you in remembrance ;
text2: Nadhani ni jambo jema kwangu , muda wote niishio hapa duniani , kuwapeni moyo na kuwakumbusheni juu ya mambo haya .

text: Knowing that shortly I must put off this my tabernacle , even as our Lord Jesus Christ hath shewed me .
text2: Najua kwamba karibu nitauweka kando mwili huu wenye kufa , kama Bwana alivyoniambia waziwazi .

text: Moreover I will endeavour that ye may be able after my decease to have these things always in remembrance .
text2: Basi , nitajitahidi kuwapatieni njia ya kuyakumbuka mambo haya kila wakati , baada ya kufariki kwangu .

text: For we have not followed cunningly devised fables , when we made known unto you the power and coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , but were eyewitnesses of his majesty .
text2: Wakati tulipowafundisheni juu ya ukuu wa kuja kwake Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo , hatukutegemea hadithi tupu zisizo na msingi . Sisi tuliuona utukufu wake kwa macho yetu wenyewe .

text: For he received from God the Father honour and glory , when there came such a voice to him from the excellent glory , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Sisi tulikuwapo wakati alipopewa heshima na kutukuzwa na Mungu Baba , wakati sauti ilipomjia kutoka kwake yeye aliye Utukufu Mkuu , ikisema : " Huyu ni Mwanangu mpenzi , nimependezwa naye . "

text: And this voice which came from heaven we heard , when we were with him in the holy mount .
text2: Tena , sisi wenyewe tulisikia sauti hiyo kutoka mbinguni wakati tulipokuwa pamoja naye juu ya ule mlima mtakatifu .

text: We have also a more sure word of prophecy ; whereunto ye do well that ye take heed , as unto a light that shineth in a dark place , until the day dawn , and the day star arise in your hearts :
text2: Tena , ujumbe wa manabii watuthibitishia jambo hilo ; nanyi mwafanya vema kama mkiuzingatia , maana ni kama taa inayoangaza mahali penye giza mpaka Siku ile itakapopambazuka na mwanga wa nyota ya asubuhi utakapong ' ara mioyoni mwenu .

text: Knowing this first , that no prophecy of the scripture is of any private interpretation .
text2: Zaidi ya hayo , lakini , kumbukeni kwamba hakuna mtu yeyote awezaye kufafanua mwenyewe unabii ulio katika Maandiko Matakatifu .

text: For the prophecy came not in old time by the will of man : but holy men of God spake as they were moved by the Holy Ghost .
text2: Maana hakuna ujumbe wa kinabii unaotokana na matakwa ya binadamu , bali watu walinena ujumbe wa Mungu wakiongozwa na Roho Mtakatifu .

text: But there were false prophets also among the people , even as there shall be false teachers among you , who privily shall bring in damnable heresies , even denying the Lord that bought them , and bring upon themselves swift destruction .
text2: Palitokea manabii wa uongo kati ya watu , na vivyo hivyo walimu wa uongo watatokea kati yenu . Watu hao wataingiza mafundisho maharibifu na kumkana Bwana aliyewakomboa , na kwa njia hiyo watasababisha ghafla maangamizi yao wenyewe .

text: And many shall follow their pernicious ways ; by reason of whom the way of truth shall be evil spoken of .
text2: Tena watu wengi watazifuata hizo njia zao mbaya , kwa sababu yao , wengine wataipuuza Njia ya ukweli .

text: And through covetousness shall they with feigned words make merchandise of you : whose judgment now of a long time lingereth not , and their damnation slumbereth not .
text2: Kwa tamaa yao mbaya watajipatia faida kwa kuwaambieni hadithi za uongo . Lakini kwa muda mrefu sasa Hakimu wao yu tayari , na Mwangamizi wao yu macho !

text: For if God spared not the angels that sinned , but cast them down to hell , and delivered them into chains of darkness , to be reserved unto judgment ;
text2: Malaika walipotenda dhambi , Mungu hakuwahurumia , bali aliwatupa katika moto wa Jehanamu ambako wamefungwa wakingojea Siku ile ya Hukumu .

text: And spared not the old world , but saved Noah the eighth person , a preacher of righteousness , bringing in the flood upon the world of the ungodly ;
text2: Mungu hakuihurumia dunia ya hapo kale , bali alileta gharika kuu juu ya nchi ile ya watu wasiomcha Mungu ; lakini Noa ambaye alihubiri uadilifu , Mungu alimwokoa pamoja na watu wengine saba .

text: And turning the cities of Sodom and Gomorrha into ashes condemned them with an overthrow , making them an ensample unto those that after should live ungodly ;
text2: Mungu aliadhibu miji ya Sodoma na Gomora , akaiteketeza kwa moto , akaifanya iwe mfano wa mambo yatakayowapata watu wasiomcha Mungu .

text: And delivered just Lot , vexed with the filthy conversation of the wicked :
text2: Alimwokoa Loti , mtu mwema , ambaye alisikitishwa sana na mwenendo mbaya wa watu hao waasi .

text: ( For that righteous man dwelling among them , in seeing and hearing , vexed his righteous soul from day to day with their unlawful deeds ; )
text2: Loti aliishi miongoni mwa watu hao , na kwa siku nyingi moyo wake ulikuwa katika wasiwasi mkuu aliposikia matendo yao maovu .

text: The Lord knoweth how to deliver the godly out of temptations , and to reserve the unjust unto the day of judgment to be punished :
text2: Kwa hiyo , basi , Bwana anajua jinsi ya kuwaokoa katika majaribu watu wanaomcha Mungu , na jinsi ya kuwaweka waovu katika adhabu hadi Siku ile ya hukumu ,

text: But chiefly them that walk after the flesh in the lust of uncleanness , and despise government . Presumptuous are they , selfwilled , they are not afraid to speak evil of dignities .
text2: hasa wale wanaofuata tamaa mbaya za mwili na kupuuza mamlaka . Watu hao ni washupavu na wenye majivuno , huvitukana na hawaviheshimu viumbe vitukufu vya juu .

text: Whereas angels , which are greater in power and might , bring not railing accusation against them before the Lord .
text2: Lakini malaika , ambao wana uwezo na nguvu zaidi kuliko hao walimu wa uongo , hawawashtaki na kuwatukana hao mbele ya Bwana .

text: But these , as natural brute beasts , made to be taken and destroyed , speak evil of the things that they understand not ; and shall utterly perish in their own corruption ;
text2: Watu hao ambao hutukana chochote kile wasichoelewa , ni sawa na wanyama wasio na akili , ambao huzaliwa na baadaye hukamatwa na kuchinjwa ! Wataangamizwa kutokana na uharibifu wao wenyewe ,

text: And shall receive the reward of unrighteousness , as they that count it pleasure to riot in the day time . Spots they are and blemishes , sporting themselves with their own deceivings while they feast with you ;
text2: na watalipwa mateso kwa mateso ambayo wameyasababisha . Furaha yao ni kufanya , tena mchana kabisa , chochote kinachotosheleza anasa zao za mwili . Hao ni fedheha na aibu tupu kwa jumuiya yenu wakati wanapojiunga nanyi katika karamu zenu , bali wakifurahia njia zao za udanganyifu .

text: Having eyes full of adultery , and that cannot cease from sin ; beguiling unstable souls : an heart they have exercised with covetous practices ; cursed children :
text2: Macho yao yamejaa uzinzi na uwezo wao wa kutenda dhambi hauna kikomo . Huwaongoza watu walio dhaifu mpaka mitegoni . Mioyo yao imezoea kuwa na tamaa ya mali . Wapo chini ya laana ya Mungu !

text: Which have forsaken the right way , and are gone astray , following the way of Balaam the son of Bosor , who loved the wages of unrighteousness ;
text2: Wameiacha njia iliyonyoka , wakapotoka na kuifuata njia aliyofuata Balaamu , mwana wa Beori , ambaye alipendelea kupata faida kwa kufanya udanganyifu ,

text: But was rebuked for his iniquity : the dumb ass speaking with man ' s voice forbad the madness of the prophet .
text2: akakaripiwa kwa ajili ya uovu wake . Punda ambaye hasemi alinena kwa sauti ya binadamu , akaukomesha wazimu wa huyo nabii .

text: These are wells without water , clouds that are carried with a tempest ; to whom the mist of darkness is reserved for ever .
text2: Watu hao ni kama chemchemi zilizokauka , kama mawingu yanayopeperushwa na tufani ; makao yao waliyowekewa ni mahali pa giza kuu .

text: For when they speak great swelling words of vanity , they allure through the lusts of the flesh , through much wantonness , those that were clean escaped from them who live in error .
text2: Husema maneno ya majivuno na yasiyo na maana , na kutumia tamaa zao mbaya za kimwili kuwatega wale ambao wamejitenga hivi karibuni na watu waishio katika udanganyifu .

text: While they promise them liberty , they themselves are the servants of corruption : for of whom a man is overcome , of the same is he brought in bondage .
text2: Huwaahidi watu wengine eti watakuwa huru , kumbe wao wenyewe ni watumwa wa upotovu - - maana mtu ni mtumwa wa chochote kile kinachomtawala .

text: For if after they have escaped the pollutions of the world through the knowledge of the Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ , they are again entangled therein , and overcome , the latter end is worse with them than the beginning .
text2: Watu waliokwisha ponyoka katika upotovu wa ulimwengu kwa kupata kumjua Bwana na Mwokozi wetu Yesu Kristo , kisha wakakubali kunaswa na kutawaliwa tena na upotovu huo , hali yao itakuwa mbaya zaidi kuliko awali .

text: For it had been better for them not to have known the way of righteousness , than , after they have known it , to turn from the holy commandment delivered unto them .
text2: Ingalikuwa afadhali kwao kama wasingalijua kamwe njia hiyo ya uadilifu kuliko kujua na kisha kuiacha na kupoteza amri takatifu waliyopokea .

text: But it is happened unto them according to the true proverb , The dog is turned to his own vomit again ; and the sow that was washed to her wallowing in the mire .
text2: Ipo mithali isemayo : " Mbwa huyarudia matapishi yake mwenyewe , " na nyingine isemayo : " Nguruwe aliyekwisha oshwa hugaagaa tena katika matope ! " Ndivyo ilivyo kwao sasa .

text: This second epistle , beloved , I now write unto you ; in both which I stir up your pure minds by way of remembrance :
text2: Wapenzi wangu , hii ni barua ya pili ninayowaandikia . Katika barua hizo mbili nimejaribu kufufua fikira safi akilini mwenu kwa kuwakumbusheni mambo haya .

text: That ye may be mindful of the words which were spoken before by the holy prophets , and of the commandment of us the apostles of the Lord and Saviour :
text2: Napenda mkumbuke maneno yaliyosemwa na manabii watakatifu , na ile amri ya Bwana na Mwokozi mliyopewa na mitume wenu .

text: Knowing this first , that there shall come in the last days scoffers , walking after their own lusts ,
text2: Awali ya yote jueni kwamba siku za mwisho watakuja watu ambao mienendo yao inatawaliwa na tamaa zao mbaya . Watawadhihaki ninyi

text: And saying , Where is the promise of his coming ? for since the fathers fell asleep , all things continue as they were from the beginning of the creation .
text2: na kusema : " Aliahidi kwamba atakuja ! Je , sasa yuko wapi ? Mambo ni yaleyale tangu babu zetu walipokufa ; hali ya vitu ni ileile kama ilivyokuwa mwanzo wa ulimwengu ! "

text: For this they willingly are ignorant of , that by the word of God the heavens were of old , and the earth standing out of the water and in the water :
text2: Watu hao , kwa makusudi , husahau kwamba zamani Mungu alinena , nazo mbingu na nchi zikaumbwa . Dunia iliumbwa kutoka katika maji na kwa maji ;

text: Whereby the world that then was , being overflowed with water , perished :
text2: na kwa maji hayo , yaani yale maji ya gharika kuu , dunia ya wakati ule iliangamizwa .

text: But the heavens and the earth , which are now , by the same word are kept in store , reserved unto fire against the day of judgment and perdition of ungodly men .
text2: Lakini mbingu na nchi za sasa zahifadhiwa kwa neno la Mungu kwa ajili ya kuharibiwa kwa moto . Zimewekwa kwa ajili ya Siku ile ambapo watu wasiomcha Mungu watahukumiwa na kuangamizwa .

text: But , beloved , be not ignorant of this one thing , that one day is with the Lord as a thousand years , and a thousand years as one day .
text2: Lakini , wapenzi wangu , msisahau kitu kimoja ! Mbele ya Bwana , hakuna tofauti kati ya siku moja na miaka elfu ; kwake yote ni mamoja .

text: The Lord is not slack concerning his promise , as some men count slackness ; but is longsuffering to us - ward , not willing that any should perish , but that all should come to repentance .
text2: Bwana hakawii kutimiza yale aliyoahidi kama watu wengine wanavyofikiri kuwa atakawia . Yeye ana saburi kwa ajili yenu , maana hapendi hata mmoja wenu apotee , bali huwavuta wote wapate kutubu .

text: But the day of the Lord will come as a thief in the night ; in the which the heavens shall pass away with a great noise , and the elements shall melt with fervent heat , the earth also and the works that are therein shall be burned up .
text2: Siku ya Bwana itakuja kama mwizi . Siku hiyo , mbingu zitatoweka kwa kishindo kikuu ; vitu vyake vya asili vitateketezwa kwa moto , nayo dunia itatoweka pamoja na kila kitu kilichomo ndani yake .

text: Seeing then that all these things shall be dissolved , what manner of persons ought ye to be in all holy conversation and godliness ,
text2: Maadamu kila kitu kitaharibiwa namna hiyo , je , ninyi mnapaswa kuwa watu wa namna gani ? Mnapaswa kuishi kitakatifu na kumcha Mungu ,

text: Looking for and hasting unto the coming of the day of God , wherein the heavens being on fire shall be dissolved , and the elements shall melt with fervent heat ?
text2: mkiingojea Siku ile ya Mungu na kuifanya ije upesi - - Siku ambayo mbingu zitateketezwa kwa moto na kuharibiwa , na vitu vyake vya asili vitayeyushwa kwa joto .

text: Nevertheless we , according to his promise , look for new heavens and a new earth , wherein dwelleth righteousness .
text2: Lakini sisi , kufuatana na ahadi yake , twangojea mbingu mpya na dunia mpya ambayo imejaa uadilifu .

text: Wherefore , beloved , seeing that ye look for such things , be diligent that ye may be found of him in peace , without spot , and blameless .
text2: Kwa hiyo wapenzi wangu , mkiwa mnangojea Siku ile , fanyeni bidii kuwa safi kabisa bila hatia mbele ya Mungu , na kuwa na amani naye .

text: And account that the longsuffering of our Lord is salvation ; even as our beloved brother Paul also according to the wisdom given unto him hath written unto you ;
text2: Mnapaswa kuuona uvumilivu wa Bwana kuwa ni nafasi anayowapeni mpate kuokolewa , kama Paulo ndugu yetu mpenzi alivyowaandikia akitumia hekima aliyopewa na Mungu .

text: As also in all his epistles , speaking in them of these things ; in which are some things hard to be understood , which they that are unlearned and unstable wrest , as they do also the other scriptures , unto their own destruction .
text2: Hayo ndiyo asemayo katika barua zake zote anapozungumzia suala hilo . Yapo mambo kadhaa katika barua zake yaliyo magumu kuyaelewa , mambo ambayo watu wajinga , wasio na msimamo , huyapotosha kama wanavyopotosha sehemu nyingine za Maandiko Matakatifu . Hivyo wanasababisha maangamizi yao wenyewe .

text: Ye therefore , beloved , seeing ye know these things before , beware lest ye also , being led away with the error of the wicked , fall from your own stedfastness .
text2: Lakini ninyi , wapenzi wangu , mmekwisha jua jambo hili . Basi , muwe na tahadhari msije mkapotoshwa na makosa ya waasi , mkaanguka kutoka katika msimamo wenu imara .

text: But grow in grace , and in the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ . To him be glory both now and for ever . Amen .
text2: Lakini endeleeni kukua katika neema na katika kumjua Bwana wetu na Mwokozi Yesu Kristo . Utukufu uwe kwake , sasa na hata milele ! Amina .

text: That which was from the beginning , which we have heard , which we have seen with our eyes , which we have looked upon , and our hands have handled , of the Word of life ;
text2: Habari hii ya yahusu Neno la uzima lililokuwako tangu mwanzo . Sisi tumepata kulisikia na kuliona kwa macho yetu wenyewe ; tulilitazama na kulishika kwa mikono yetu wenyewe .

text: ( For the life was manifested , and we have seen it , and bear witness , and shew unto you that eternal life , which was with the Father , and was manifested unto us ; )
text2: Uzima huo ulipotokea sisi tuliuona na sasa tunasema habari zake na kuwaambieni juu ya uzima huo wa milele uliokuwa kwa Baba na uliodhihirishwa kwetu .

text: That which we have seen and heard declare we unto you , that ye also may have fellowship with us : and truly our fellowship is with the Father , and with his Son Jesus Christ .
text2: Tulichokiona na kukisikia ndicho tunachowatangazieni ninyi pia ili nanyi mpate kushirikiana nasi katika umoja tulio nao na Baba na Mwanae Yesu Kristo .

text: And these things write we unto you , that your joy may be full .
text2: Tunawaandikia ninyi mambo haya kusudi furaha yetu ikamilike .

text: This then is the message which we have heard of him , and declare unto you , that God is light , and in him is no darkness at all .
text2: Basi , habari tuliyoisikia kwake Yesu na tunayowahubirieni ndiyo hii : Mungu ni mwanga na hamna giza lolote ndani yake .

text: If we say that we have fellowship with him , and walk in darkness , we lie , and do not the truth :
text2: Tukisema kwamba tuna umoja naye , na papo hapo twaishi gizani , tutakuwa tumesema uongo kwa maneno na matendo .

text: But if we walk in the light , as he is in the light , we have fellowship one with another , and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin .
text2: Lakini tukiishi katika mwanga , kama naye alivyo katika mwanga , basi tutakuwa na umoja sisi kwa sisi , na damu yake Yesu Kristo , Mwanae , inatutakasa dhambi zote .

text: If we say that we have no sin , we deceive ourselves , and the truth is not in us .
text2: Tukisema kwamba hatuna dhambi , tunajidanganya wenyewe na ukweli haumo ndani yetu .

text: If we confess our sins , he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins , and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness .
text2: Lakini tukiziungama dhambi zetu , basi Mungu ni mwaminifu na mwadilifu , naye atatusamehe dhambi zetu na kututakasa na uovu wote .

text: If we say that we have not sinned , we make him a liar , and his word is not in us .
text2: Tukisema kwamba hatujatenda dhambi , tutakuwa tumemfanya Mungu mwongo , na neno lake halimo ndani yetu .

text: My little children , these things write I unto you , that ye sin not . And if any man sin , we have an advocate with the Father , Jesus Christ the righteous :
text2: Watoto wangu , ninawaandikieni mambo haya , kusudi msitende dhambi . Lakini , ikijatokea mtu akatenda dhambi , tunaye mmoja ambaye hutuombea kwa Baba , ndiye Yesu Kristo aliye mwadilifu kabisa .

text: And he is the propitiation for our sins : and not for ours only , but also for the sins of the whole world .
text2: Kristo ndiye sadaka iondoayo dhambi zetu ; wala si dhambi zetu sisi tu , bali pia dhambi za ulimwengu wote .

text: And hereby we do know that we know him , if we keep his commandments .
text2: Tukizitii amri za Mungu , basi , tunaweza kuwa na hakika kwamba tunamjua .

text: He that saith , I know him , and keepeth not his commandments , is a liar , and the truth is not in him .
text2: Mtu akisema kwamba anamjua , lakini hazitii amri zake , basi mtu huyo ni mwongo , na ukweli haumo ndani yake .

text: But whoso keepeth his word , in him verily is the love of God perfected : hereby know we that we are in him .
text2: Lakini mtu yeyote anayeshika neno la Mungu , huyo ndiye aliye na upendo kamili wa Mungu ndani yake . Hivi ndivyo tunavyoweza kuwa na hakika kwamba tunaungana naye :

text: He that saith he abideth in him ought himself also so to walk , even as he walked .
text2: mtu yeyote anayesema kwamba ameungana na Mungu , anapaswa kuishi kama alivyoishi Yesu Kristo .

text: Brethren , I write no new commandment unto you , but an old commandment which ye had from the beginning . The old commandment is the word which ye have heard from the beginning .
text2: Wapenzi wangu , amri hii ninayowaandikieni si amri mpya ; ni amri ileile ya zamani mliyokuwa nayo tangu mwanzo . Amri hiyo ya zamani ni ule ujumbe mliousikia .

text: Again , a new commandment I write unto you , which thing is true in him and in you : because the darkness is past , and the true light now shineth .
text2: Hata hivyo , amri hii ninayowaandikieni ni amri mpya , na ukweli wake unaonekana ndani ya Kristo na ndani yenu pia . Maana giza linatoweka , na mwanga wa ukweli umekwisha anza kuangaza .

text: He that saith he is in the light , and hateth his brother , is in darkness even until now .
text2: Yeyote asemaye kwamba yumo katika mwanga , lakini anamchukia ndugu yake , mtu huyo bado yumo gizani .

text: He that loveth his brother abideth in the light , and there is none occasion of stumbling in him .
text2: Yeyote ampendaye ndugu yake , yuko katika mwanga , na hamna chochote ndani yake kiwezacho kumkwaza mtu mwingine .

text: But he that hateth his brother is in darkness , and walketh in darkness , and knoweth not whither he goeth , because that darkness hath blinded his eyes .
text2: Lakini anayemchukia ndugu yake , yumo gizani ; anatembea gizani , na hajui anakokwenda , maana giza limempofusha .

text: I write unto you , little children , because your sins are forgiven you for his name ' s sake .
text2: Ninawaandikieni ninyi watoto , kwa kuwa dhambi zenu zimeondolewa kwa jina la Kristo .

text: I write unto you , fathers , because ye have known him that is from the beginning . I write unto you , young men , because ye have overcome the wicked one . I write unto you , little children , because ye have known the Father .
text2: Nawaandikieni ninyi kina baba kwani mnamjua yeye ambaye amekuwako tangu mwanzo , Nawaandikieni ninyi vijana kwa sababu mmemshinda yule Mwovu .

text: I have written unto you , fathers , because ye have known him that is from the beginning . I have written unto you , young men , because ye are strong , and the word of God abideth in you , and ye have overcome the wicked one .
text2: Nawaandikieni ninyi watoto , kwa sababu mnamjua Baba . Nawaandikieni ninyi kina baba , kwa kuwa mnamjua yeye ambaye amekuwako tangu mwanzo . Nawaandikieni ninyi vijana kwa sababu mna nguvu ; neno la Mungu limo ndani yenu na mmemshinda yule Mwovu .

text: Love not the world , neither the things that are in the world . If any man love the world , the love of the Father is not in him .
text2: Msiupende ulimwengu , wala chochote kilicho cha ulimwengu . Mtu anayeupenda ulimwengu , upendo wa Baba hauwezi kuwamo ndani yake .

text: For all that is in the world , the lust of the flesh , and the lust of the eyes , and the pride of life , is not of the Father , but is of the world .
text2: Vitu vyote vya ulimwengu - tamaa mbaya za mwili , vitu wanavyoviona watu na kuvitamani , majivuno yasababishwayo na mali - vyote hivyo havitoki kwa Baba , bali vyatoka kwa ulimwengu .

text: And the world passeth away , and the lust thereof : but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever .
text2: Ulimwengu pamoja na vitu vyake vyote vyenye kutamanika unapita ; lakini mtu atendaye atakalo Mungu , anaishi milele .

text: Little children , it is the last time : and as ye have heard that antichrist shall come , even now are there many antichrists ; whereby we know that it is the last time .
text2: Watoto , mwisho u karibu ! Mlikwisha sikia kwamba adui wa Kristo anakuja , na sasa adui wengi wa Kristo wamekwisha fika , na hivyo twajua kwamba mwisho u karibu .

text: They went out from us , but they were not of us ; for if they had been of us , they would no doubt have continued with us : but they went out , that they might be made manifest that they were not all of us .
text2: Watu hao wametokea kati yetu lakini hawakuwa kweli wa kwetu na ndiyo maana walituacha ; Kama wangalikuwa wa kwetu , wangalibaki nasi . Lakini waliondoka , wakaenda zao , kusudi ionekane wazi kwamba hawakuwa kamwe wa kwetu .

text: But ye have an unction from the Holy One , and ye know all things .
text2: Ninyi , lakini , mlipata kumiminiwa Roho Mtakatifu na Kristo , na hivyo mnaujua ukweli .

text: I have not written unto you because ye know not the truth , but because ye know it , and that no lie is of the truth .
text2: Basi , nawaandikieni , si kwa kuwa hamuujui ukweli , bali kwa sababu mnaujua ; na pia mnajua kwamba uongo wowote haupatikani katika ukweli .

text: Who is a liar but he that denieth that Jesus is the Christ ? He is antichrist , that denieth the Father and the Son .
text2: Mwongo ni nani ? Ni yule anayekana kwamba Yesu ni Masiha . Mtu wa namna hiyo ni adui wa Kristo - - anamkana Baba na Mwana .

text: Whosoever denieth the Son , the same hath not the Father : ( but ) he that acknowledgeth the Son hath the Father also .
text2: Maana yeyote anayemkana Mwana , anamkana pia Baba ; na yeyote anayemkubali Mwana , anampata Baba pia .

text: Let that therefore abide in you , which ye have heard from the beginning . If that which ye have heard from the beginning shall remain in you , ye also shall continue in the Son , and in the Father .
text2: Basi , ujumbe ule mliousikia tangu mwanzo na ukae mioyoni mwenu . Kama ujumbe huo mliousikia tangu mwanzo ukikaa ndani yenu , basi , mtaishi daima katika umoja na Mwana na Baba .

text: And this is the promise that he hath promised us , even eternal life .
text2: Na ahadi aliyotuahidia sisi ndiyo hii : uzima wa milele .

text: These things have I written unto you concerning them that seduce you .
text2: Nimewaandikieni mambo haya kuhusu wale wanaotaka kuwapotosha ninyi .

text: But the anointing which ye have received of him abideth in you , and ye need not that any man teach you : but as the same anointing teacheth you of all things , and is truth , and is no lie , and even as it hath taught you , ye shall abide in him .
text2: Lakini , kwa upande wenu ninyi , Kristo aliwamiminieni Roho wake . Na kama akiendelea kukaa ndani yenu , hamhitaji kufundishwa na mtu yeyote . Maana Roho wake anawafundisheni kila kitu na mafundisho yake ni ya kweli , si ya uongo . Basi shikeni mafundisho ya huyo Roho na kubaki katika muungano na Kristo .

text: And now , little children , abide in him ; that , when he shall appear , we may have confidence , and not be ashamed before him at his coming .
text2: Naam , watoto , kaeni ndani yake kusudi wakati atakapotokea tuwe hodari bila kuwa na sababu ya kujificha kwa aibu Siku ya kuja kwake .

text: If ye know that he is righteous , ye know that every one that doeth righteousness is born of him .
text2: Mnajua kwamba Kristo ni mwadilifu kabisa ; basi , mnapaswa kujua pia kwamba kila mtu atendaye mambo adili ni mtoto wa Mungu .

text: Behold , what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us , that we should be called the sons of God : therefore the world knoweth us not , because it knew him not .
text2: Oneni basi , jinsi Baba alivyotupenda mno hata tunaitwa watoto wa Mungu ! Na kweli , ndivyo tulivyo . Ndiyo maana ulimwengu haututambui sisi , kwani haumjui Mungu .

text: Beloved , now are we the sons of God , and it doth not yet appear what we shall be : but we know that , when he shall appear , we shall be like him ; for we shall see him as he is .
text2: Wapenzi wangu , sisi ni watoto wa Mungu sasa , lakini bado haijaonekana wazi jinsi tutakavyokuwa . Lakini tunajua kwamba wakati Kristo atakapotokea , tutafanana naye kwani tutamwona vile alivyo .

text: And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself , even as he is pure .
text2: Basi , kila mtu aliye na tumaini hili katika Kristo , hujiweka safi kama vile Kristo alivyo safi kabisa .

text: Whosoever committeth sin transgresseth also the law : for sin is the transgression of the law .
text2: Kila mtu atendaye dhambi anavunja sheria ya Mungu , maana dhambi ni uvunjaji wa sheria .

text: And ye know that he was manifested to take away our sins ; and in him is no sin .
text2: Mnajua kwamba Kristo alikuja kuziondoa dhambi zetu , na kwamba kwake hamna dhambi yoyote .

text: Whosoever abideth in him sinneth not : whosoever sinneth hath not seen him , neither known him .
text2: Basi , kila aishiye katika muungano na Kristo hatendi dhambi ; lakini kila mtu atendaye dhambi hakupata kamwe kumwona , wala kumjua Kristo .

text: Little children , let no man deceive you : he that doeth righteousness is righteous , even as he is righteous .
text2: Basi , watoto wangu , msikubali kupotoshwa na mtu yeyote . Mtu atendaye matendo maadilifu ni mwadilifu kama vile Kristo alivyo mwadilifu kabisa .

text: He that committeth sin is of the devil ; for the devil sinneth from the beginning . For this purpose the Son of God was manifested , that he might destroy the works of the devil .
text2: Lakini atendaye dhambi ni wa Ibilisi , maana Ibilisi ametenda dhambi tangu mwanzo . Lakini Mwana wa Mungu alikuja duniani kuiharibu kazi ya Ibilisi .

text: Whosoever is born of God doth not commit sin ; for his seed remaineth in him : and he cannot sin , because he is born of God .
text2: Kila aliye mtoto wa Mungu hatendi dhambi , maana anayo hali ya kimungu ndani yake ; hawezi kutenda dhambi kwa sababu yeye ni mtoto wa Mungu .

text: In this the children of God are manifest , and the children of the devil : whosoever doeth not righteousness is not of God , neither he that loveth not his brother .
text2: Lakini yeyote asiyetenda mambo maadilifu , au asiyempenda ndugu yake , huyo si mtoto wa Mungu . Hiyo ndiyo tofauti iliyoko kati ya watoto wa Mungu na watoto wa Ibilisi .

text: For this is the message that ye heard from the beginning , that we should love one another .
text2: Na , ujumbe mliousikia tangu mwanzo ndio huu : Tunapaswa kupendana !

text: Not as Cain , who was of that wicked one , and slew his brother . And wherefore slew he him ? Because his own works were evil , and his brother ' s righteous .
text2: Tusiwe kama Kaini ambaye , kwa kuongozwa na yule Mwovu , alimuua ndugu yake . Na , kwa nini alimuua ? Kwa sababu matendo yake yalikuwa maovu , lakini yale ya ndugu yake yalikuwa mema !

text: Marvel not , my brethren , if the world hate you .
text2: Basi , ndugu zangu , msishangae kama ulimwengu unawachukia ninyi .

text: We know that we have passed from death unto life , because we love the brethren . He that loveth not his brother abideth in death .
text2: Sisi tunajua kwamba tumekwisha pita kutoka katika kifo na kuingia katika uzima kwa sababu tunawapenda ndugu zetu . Mtu asiye na upendo hubaki katika kifo .

text: Whosoever hateth his brother is a murderer : and ye know that no murderer hath eternal life abiding in him .
text2: Kila anayemchukia ndugu yake ni muuaji ; nanyi mnajua kwamba muuaji yeyote yule hana uzima wa milele ndani yake .

text: Hereby perceive we the love of God , because he laid down his life for us : and we ought to lay down our lives for the brethren .
text2: Sisi tumepata kujua upendo ni nini , kwani Kristo aliyatoa maisha yake kwa ajili yetu . Nasi vilevile tunapaswa kuyatoa maisha yetu kwa ajili ya ndugu zetu .

text: But whoso hath this world ' s good , and seeth his brother have need , and shutteth up his bowels of compassion from him , how dwelleth the love of God in him ?
text2: Basi , mtu akiwa na mali za hapa duniani , halafu akamwona ndugu yake ana shida , lakini akawa na moyo mgumu bila kumwonea huruma , anawezaje kusema kwamba anampenda Mungu ?

text: My little children , let us not love in word , neither in tongue ; but in deed and in truth .
text2: Watoto wangu , upendo wetu usiwe maneno matupu , bali uwe upendo wa kweli na wa vitendo .

text: And hereby we know that we are of the truth , and shall assure our hearts before him .
text2: Hivyo ndivyo tuwezavyo kuwa na hakika kwamba sisi ni watu wa ukweli ; na hatutakuwa na wasiwasi mbele ya Mungu .

text: For if our heart condemn us , God is greater than our heart , and knoweth all things .
text2: Kwa maana , hata kama dhamiri yetu yatuhukumu , twajua kwamba Mungu ni mkuu zaidi kuliko dhamiri , na kwamba yeye ajua kila kitu .

text: Beloved , if our heart condemn us not , then have we confidence toward God .
text2: Wapenzi wangu , kama dhamiri yetu haina lawama juu yetu , basi , twaweza kuwa na uthabiti mbele ya Mungu ,

text: And whatsoever we ask , we receive of him , because we keep his commandments , and do those things that are pleasing in his sight .
text2: na twaweza kupokea kwake chochote tunachoomba , maana tunazitii amri zake na kufanya yale yanayompendeza .

text: And this is his commandment , That we should believe on the name of his Son Jesus Christ , and love one another , as he gave us commandment .
text2: Na , amri yake ndiyo hii : Kumwamini Mwanae Kristo , na kupendana kama alivyotuamuru .

text: And he that keepeth his commandments dwelleth in him , and he in him . And hereby we know that he abideth in us , by the Spirit which he hath given us .
text2: Anayezitii amri za Mungu anaishi katika muungano na Mungu na Mungu anaishi katika muungano naye . Kwa njia ya Roho ambaye Mungu ametujalia , sisi twajua kwamba Mungu anaishi katika muungano nasi .

text: Beloved , believe not every spirit , but try the spirits whether they are of God : because many false prophets are gone out into the world .
text2: Wapenzi wangu , msimsadiki kila mtu asemaye kwamba ana Roho wa Mungu , bali chunguzeni kwa makini kama huyo mtu anaongozwa na Roho wa Mungu au la , Maana manabii wengi wa uongo wamezuka ulimwenguni .

text: Hereby know ye the Spirit of God : Every spirit that confesseth that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is of God :
text2: Hii ndiyo njia ya kujua kama mtu anaongozwa na Roho wa Mungu : Kila anayekiri kwamba Kristo alikuja , akawa binadamu , mtu huyo anaye Roho wa Mungu .

text: And every spirit that confesseth not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is not of God : and this is that spirit of antichrist , whereof ye have heard that it should come ; and even now already is it in the world .
text2: Lakini mtu yeyote asiyemkiri Kristo hivyo , hana huyo Roho atokaye kwa Mungu . Mtu huyo ana roho ambaye ni wa Adui wa Kristo ; nanyi mlikwisha sikia kwamba anakuja , na sasa tayari amekwisha wasili ulimwenguni !

text: Ye are of God , little children , and have overcome them : because greater is he that is in you , than he that is in the world .
text2: Lakini ninyi , watoto , ni wake Mungu na mmekwisha washinda hao manabii wa uongo ; maana Roho aliye ndani yenu ana nguvu zaidi kuliko roho aliye ndani ya hao walio wa ulimwengu .

text: They are of the world : therefore speak they of the world , and the world heareth them .
text2: Wao husema mambo ya ulimwengu , nao ulimwengu huwasikiliza kwani wao ni wa ulimwengu .

text: We are of God : he that knoweth God heareth us ; he that is not of God heareth not us . Hereby know we the spirit of truth , and the spirit of error .
text2: Lakini sisi ni wake Mungu . Mtu anayemjua Mungu hutusikiliza , mtu asiye wa Mungu hatusikilizi . Basi , kwa njia hiyo tunaweza kutambua tofauti kati ya Roho wa ukweli na roho wa uongo .

text: Beloved , let us love one another : for love is of God ; and every one that loveth is born of God , and knoweth God .
text2: Wapenzi wangu , tupendane , maana upendo hutoka kwa Mungu . Kila mtu aliye na upendo ni mtoto wa Mungu , na anamjua Mungu .

text: He that loveth not knoweth not God ; for God is love .
text2: Mtu asiye na upendo hamjui Mungu , maana Mungu ni upendo .

text: In this was manifested the love of God toward us , because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world , that we might live through him .
text2: Na Mungu alionyesha upendo wake kwetu kwa kumtuma Mwanae wa pekee ulimwenguni , ili tuwe na uzima kwa njia yake .

text: Herein is love , not that we loved God , but that he loved us , and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins .
text2: Hivi ndivyo upendo ulivyo : si kwamba sisi tulikuwa tumempenda Mungu kwanza , bali kwamba yeye alitupenda hata akamtuma Mwanae awe sadaka ya kutuondolea dhambi zetu .

text: Beloved , if God so loved us , we ought also to love one another .
text2: Wapenzi wangu , ikiwa Mungu alitupenda hivyo , basi , nasi tunapaswa kupendana .

text: No man hath seen God at any time . If we love one another , God dwelleth in us , and his love is perfected in us .
text2: Hakuna mtu aliyekwisha mwona Mungu kamwe ; lakini kama tukipendana Mungu anaishi katika muungano nasi , na upendo wake unakamilika ndani yetu .

text: Hereby know we that we dwell in him , and he in us , because he hath given us of his Spirit .
text2: Tunajua kwamba tunaishi katika umoja na Mungu , naye Mungu anaishi katika umoja nasi , kwani yeye ametupa Roho wake .

text: And we have seen and do testify that the Father sent the Son to be the Saviour of the world .
text2: Sisi tumeona na kuwaambia wengine kwamba Baba alimtuma Mwanae awe Mwokozi wa ulimwengu .

text: Whosoever shall confess that Jesus is the Son of God , God dwelleth in him , and he in God .
text2: Kila mtu anayekiri kwamba Yesu ni Mwana wa Mungu , Mungu anaishi katika muungano na mtu huyo , naye anaishi katika muungano na Mungu .

text: And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us . God is love ; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God , and God in him .
text2: Basi , sisi tunajua na tunaamini upendo alio nao Mungu kwetu sisi . Mungu ni upendo , na kila mtu aishiye katika upendo , anaishi katika muungano na Mungu , na Mungu anaishi katika muungano naye .

text: Herein is our love made perfect , that we may have boldness in the day of judgment : because as he is , so are we in this world .
text2: Upendo umekamilika ndani yetu kusudi tuweze kuwa na ujasiri Siku ile ya Hukumu ; kwani maisha yetu hapa duniani ni kama yale ya Kristo .

text: There is no fear in love ; but perfect love casteth out fear : because fear hath torment . He that feareth is not made perfect in love .
text2: Palipo na upendo hapana uoga ; naam , upendo kamili hufukuza uoga wote . Basi , mtu mwenye uoga hajakamilika bado katika upendo , kwani uoga huhusikana na adhabu .

text: We love him , because he first loved us .
text2: Sisi tuna upendo kwa sababu Mungu alitupenda kwanza .

text: If a man say , I love God , and hateth his brother , he is a liar : for he that loveth not his brother whom he hath seen , how can he love God whom he hath not seen ?
text2: Mtu akisema kwamba anampenda Mungu , hali anamchukia ndugu yake , huyo ni mwongo . Maana mtu asiyempenda ndugu yake ambaye anamwona , hawezi kumpenda Mungu ambaye hamwoni .

text: And this commandment have we from him , That he who loveth God love his brother also .
text2: Basi , hii ndiyo amri aliyotupa Kristo : Anayempenda Mungu anapaswa pia kumpenda ndugu yake .

text: Whosoever believeth that Jesus is the Christ is born of God : and every one that loveth him that begat loveth him also that is begotten of him .
text2: Kila mtu anayeamini kwamba Yesu ni Kristo , huyo ni mtoto wa Mungu ; na , anayempenda mzazi humpenda pia mtoto wa huyo mzazi .

text: By this we know that we love the children of God , when we love God , and keep his commandments .
text2: Hivi ndivyo tunavyojua kwamba tunawapenda watoto wa Mungu : Kwa kumpenda Mungu na kuzitii amri zake ;

text: For this is the love of God , that we keep his commandments : and his commandments are not grievous .
text2: maana kumpenda Mungu ni kuzitii amri zake . Na , amri zake si ngumu ,

text: For whatsoever is born of God overcometh the world : and this is the victory that overcometh the world , even our faith .
text2: maana kila aliye mtoto wa Mungu anaweza kuushinda ulimwengu . Hivi ndivyo tunavyoushinda ulimwengu : kwa imani yetu .

text: Who is he that overcometh the world , but he that believeth that Jesus is the Son of God ?
text2: Nani , basi , awezaye kuushinda ulimwengu ? Ni yule anayeamini kwamba Yesu ni Mwana wa Mungu .

text: This is he that came by water and blood , even Jesus Christ ; not by water only , but by water and blood . And it is the Spirit that beareth witness , because the Spirit is truth .
text2: Yesu Kristo ndiye aliyekuja kwa maji ya ubatizo wake na kwa damu ya kifo chake . Hakuja kwa maji tu , bali kwa maji na kwa damu . Naye Roho anashuhudia kwamba ni kweli , kwani Roho ni ukweli .

text: For there are three that bear record in heaven , the Father , the Word , and the Holy Ghost : and these three are one .
text2: Basi , wako mashahidi watatu :

text: And there are three that bear witness in earth , the spirit , and the water , and the blood : and these three agree in one .
text2: Roho , maji na damu ; na ushahidi wa hawa watatu waafikiana .

text: If we receive the witness of men , the witness of God is greater : for this is the witness of God which he hath testified of his Son .
text2: Ikiwa twaukubali ushahidi wa binadamu , ushahidi wa Mungu una uzito zaidi ; na huu ndio ushahidi alioutoa Mungu mwenyewe juu ya Mwanae .

text: He that believeth on the Son of God hath the witness in himself : he that believeth not God hath made him a liar ; because he believeth not the record that God gave of his Son .
text2: Anayemwamini mwana wa Mungu anao ushahidi huo ndani yake ; lakini asiyemwamini Mungu , anamfanya yeye kuwa mwongo , maana hakuamini ushahidi alioutoa Mungu juu ya Mwanae .

text: And this is the record , that God hath given to us eternal life , and this life is in his Son .
text2: Na , ushahidi wenyewe ndio huu : Mungu alitupatia uzima wa milele , na uzima huo uko kwa Bwana .

text: He that hath the Son hath life ; and he that hath not the Son of God hath not life .
text2: Yeyote , aliye na Mwana wa Mungu anao uzima huo ; asiye na Mwana wa Mungu , hana uzima .

text: These things have I written unto you that believe on the name of the Son of God ; that ye may know that ye have eternal life , and that ye may believe on the name of the Son of God .
text2: Nawaandikieni mpate kujua kwamba mnao uzima wa milele ninyi mnaoamini kwa jina la Mwana wa Mungu .

text: And this is the confidence that we have in him , that , if we ask any thing according to his will , he heareth us :
text2: Na sisi tuko thabiti mbele ya Mungu kwani tuna hakika kwamba tukimwomba chochote kadiri ya mapenzi yake , yeye hutusikiliza .

text: And if we know that he hear us , whatsoever we ask , we know that we have the petitions that we desired of him .
text2: Yeye hutusikiliza kila tunapomwomba ; na kwa vile tunajua kwamba yeye hutusikiliza kila tunapomwomba , twajua pia kwamba atupatia yote tunayomwomba .

text: If any man see his brother sin a sin which is not unto death , he shall ask , and he shall give him life for them that sin not unto death . There is a sin unto death : I do not say that he shall pray for it .
text2: Mtu akimwona ndugu yake ametenda dhambi isiyompeleka kwenye kifo anapaswa kumwombea kwa Mungu , naye Mungu atampatia uzima . Nasema jambo hili kuhusu wale waliotenda dhambi ambazo si za kifo . Lakini ipo dhambi yenye kumpeleka mtu kwenye kifo nami sisemi kwamba mnapaswa kumwomba Mungu kwa ajili ya hiyo .

text: All unrighteousness is sin : and there is a sin not unto death .
text2: Kila tendo lisilo adilifu ni dhambi , lakini kuna dhambi isiyompeleka mtu kwenye kifo .

text: We know that whosoever is born of God sinneth not ; but he that is begotten of God keepeth himself , and that wicked one toucheth him not .
text2: Tunajua kwamba kila aliye mtoto wa Mungu hatendi dhambi , kwa sababu Mwana wa Mungu humlinda salama , na yule Mwovu hawezi kumdhuru .

text: And we know that we are of God , and the whole world lieth in wickedness .
text2: Tunajua kwamba sisi ni wake Mungu ingawa ulimwengu wote unatawaliwa na yule Mwovu .

text: And we know that the Son of God is come , and hath given us an understanding , that we may know him that is true , and we are in him that is true , even in his Son Jesus Christ . This is the true God , and eternal life .
text2: Twajua pia kwamba Mwana wa Mungu amekuja , akatupa elimu ili tumjue Mungu wa kweli ; tuishi katika muungano na Mungu wa kweli - - katika muungano na Mwanae , Yesu Kristo . Huyu ndiye Mungu wa kweli , na huu ndio uzima wa milele .

text: Little children , keep yourselves from idols . Amen .
text2: Watoto wangu , epukaneni na sanamu za miungu .

text: The elder unto the elect lady and her children , whom I love in the truth ; and not I only , but also all they that have known the truth ;
text2: Mimi Mzee nakuandikia wewe Bimkubwa mteule , pamoja na watoto wako ninaowapenda kweli . Wala si mimi tu ninayewapenda , bali pia wote wanaoujua ule ukweli wanawapenda ninyi ,

text: For the truth ' s sake , which dwelleth in us , and shall be with us for ever .
text2: kwa sababu ukweli unakaa nasi milele .

text: Grace be with you , mercy , and peace , from God the Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ , the Son of the Father , in truth and love .
text2: Neema na huruma na amani zitokazo kwa Mungu Baba na kwa Yesu Kristo , Mwana wa Baba , zitakuwa pamoja nasi katika ukweli na upendo .

text: I rejoiced greatly that I found of thy children walking in truth , as we have received a commandment from the Father .
text2: Nilifurahi sana kuona kwamba baadhi ya watoto wako wanaishi katika ukweli kama Baba alivyotuamuru .

text: And now I beseech thee , lady , not as though I wrote a new commandment unto thee , but that which we had from the beginning , that we love one another .
text2: Basi , Bimkubwa , ninalo ombi moja kwako : tupendane . Ombi hili si amri mpya , bali ni amri ileile tuliyokuwa nayo tangu mwanzo .

text: And this is love , that we walk after his commandments . This is the commandment , That , as ye have heard from the beginning , ye should walk in it .
text2: Upendo maana yake ni kuishi kwa kuzitii amri zake Mungu . Amri niliyoisikia tangu mwanzo ndiyo hii : mnapaswa nyote kuishi katika upendo .

text: For many deceivers are entered into the world , who confess not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh . This is a deceiver and an antichrist .
text2: Wadanganyifu wengi wamezuka duniani , watu ambao hawakiri kwamba Yesu Kristo amekuja kwetu akawa binadamu . Mtu asemaye hivyo ni mdanganyifu na ni Adui wa Kristo .

text: Look to yourselves , that we lose not those things which we have wrought , but that we receive a full reward .
text2: Basi , jihadharini ninyi wenyewe ili msije mkapoteza kile mlichokishugulikia , bali mpate tuzo lenu kamili .

text: Whosoever transgresseth , and abideth not in the doctrine of Christ , hath not God . He that abideth in the doctrine of Christ , he hath both the Father and the Son .
text2: Asiyezingatia na kudumu katika mafundisho ya Kristo , bali anayakiuka , hana Mungu . Lakini anayedumu katika mafundisho hayo anaye Baba na Mwana .

text: If there come any unto you , and bring not this doctrine , receive him not into your house , neither bid him God speed :
text2: Basi , kama mtu akija kwenu bila kuwaleteeni mafundisho hayo , msimkaribishe nyumbani kwenu , wala msimsalimu .

text: For he that biddeth him God speed is partaker of his evil deeds .
text2: Maana anayemsalimu mtu huyo , anashirikiana naye katika matendo yake maovu .

text: Having many things to write unto you , I would not write with paper and ink : but I trust to come unto you , and speak face to face , that our joy may be full .
text2: Ninayo mengi ya kuwaambieni lakini sipendi kufanya hivyo kwa karatasi na wino ; badala yake , natumaini kuwatembeleeni na kuzungumza nanyi ana kwa ana , ili furaha yetu ikamilike .

text: The children of thy elect sister greet thee . Amen .
text2: Watoto wa dada yako mteule wanakusalimu .

text: The elder unto the wellbeloved Gaius , whom I love in the truth .
text2: Mimi mzee nakuandikia wewe Gayo , rafiki yangu , ninayekupenda kweli .

text: Beloved , I wish above all things that thou mayest prosper and be in health , even as thy soul prospereth .
text2: Mpenzi wangu , nakutakia mafanikio mema ya kila aina ; nakutakia afya njema ya mwili kama ulivyo nayo rohoni .

text: For I rejoiced greatly , when the brethren came and testified of the truth that is in thee , even as thou walkest in the truth .
text2: Nimefurahi sana ndugu kadhaa walipofika hapa , wakaiambia juu ya uaminifu wako kuhusu ukweli ; naam , wewe unaishi daima katika ukweli .

text: I have no greater joy than to hear that my children walk in truth .
text2: Hakuna kitu kinachonifurahisha zaidi kuliko kusikia kwamba watoto wangu wanaishi katika ukweli .

text: Beloved , thou doest faithfully whatsoever thou doest to the brethren , and to strangers ;
text2: Mpenzi wangu , wewe ni mwaminifu kila mara unapowahudumia ndugu , hata kama ni wageni .

text: Which have borne witness of thy charity before the church : whom if thou bring forward on their journey after a godly sort , thou shalt do well :
text2: Ndugu hao wamelieleza kanisa hapa habari za upendo wako . Tafadhali uwasaidie waendelee na safari yao kwa namna itakayompendeza Mungu ,

text: Because that for his name ' s sake they went forth , taking nothing of the Gentiles .
text2: Maana wanaanza safari yao katika utumishi wa Kristo bila kupokea msaada wowote kutoka kwa watu wasioamini .

text: We therefore ought to receive such , that we might be fellowhelpers to the truth .
text2: Basi , sisi tunapaswa kuwasaidia watu hawa , ili nasi tupate kushiriki katika kazi yao kwa ajili ya ukweli .

text: I wrote unto the church : but Diotrephes , who loveth to have the preeminence among them , receiveth us not .
text2: Niliandika barua fupi kwa hilo kanisa ; lakini Diotrefe , ambaye hupenda kuwa kiongozi wao , hataki kabisa kunisikiliza .

text: Wherefore , if I come , I will remember his deeds which he doeth , prating against us with malicious words : and not content therewith , neither doth he himself receive the brethren , and forbiddeth them that would , and casteth them out of the church .
text2: Basi , nitakapokuja nitayafichua mambo yote anayofanya , maneno mabaya anayotutolea na uongo anaosema juu yetu . Isitoshe , yeye hukataa kuwakaribisha hao ndugu walio safarini , na hata huwazuia watu wengine wanaotaka kuwakaribisha , na hujaribu kuwafukuzia nje ya kanisa .

text: Beloved , follow not that which is evil , but that which is good . He that doeth good is of God : but he that doeth evil hath not seen God .
text2: Mpenzi wangu , usifuate mfano mbaya , bali mfano mwema . Kila atendaye mema ni wa Mungu ; lakini anayetenda mabaya hajapata kumwona Mungu .

text: Demetrius hath good report of all men , and of the truth itself : yea , and we also bear record ; and ye know that our record is true .
text2: Kila mtu anamsifu Demetrio ; naam , ukweli wenyewe unamsifu . Nasi pia tunatoa ushahidi wetu juu yake , nawe wajua kwamba tunachosema ni kweli .

text: I had many things to write , but I will not with ink and pen write unto thee :
text2: Ninayo bado mengi ya kukwambia , lakini sipendi kuyaandika kwa kalamu na wino .

text: But I trust I shall shortly see thee , and we shall speak face to face . Peace be to thee . Our friends salute thee . Greet the friends by name .
text2: Natumaini kukuona karibuni na hapo tutazungumza ana kwa ana . ( G1 - 15 ) Nakutakia amani . Rafiki zako wanakusalimu . Wasalimu rafiki zetu wote kila mmoja binafsi .

text: Jude , the servant of Jesus Christ , and brother of James , to them that are sanctified by God the Father , and preserved in Jesus Christ , and called :
text2: Mimi Yuda , mtumishi wa Yesu Kristo , ndugu yake Yakobo , nawaandikia ninyi mlioitwa na Mungu na ambao mnaishi katika upendo wa Mungu Baba , na katika ulinzi wa Yesu Kristo .

text: Mercy unto you , and peace , and love , be multiplied .
text2: Nawatakieni huruma , amani na upendo kwa wingi .

text: Beloved , when I gave all diligence to write unto you of the common salvation , it was needful for me to write unto you , and exhort you that ye should earnestly contend for the faith which was once delivered unto the saints .
text2: Ndugu wapenzi , wakati nimo katika jitihada ya kuwaandikieni juu ya ule wokovu tunaoshiriki sote , nimeona lazima ya kuwaandikieni na kuwahimizeni mwendelee kupigana kwa ajili ya imani ambayo Mungu amewajalia watu wake mara moja tu kwa wakati wote .

text: For there are certain men crept in unawares , who were before of old ordained to this condemnation , ungodly men , turning the grace of our God into lasciviousness , and denying the only Lord God , and our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Maana watu wasiomcha Mungu wamepata kujiingiza kwa siri miongoni mwetu , watu ambao , kwa faida ya maisha yao mabaya , wanaupotosha ujumbe wa neema ya Mungu wetu na kumkana Yesu Kristo aliye peke yake kiongozi na Bwana wetu . Maandiko Matakatifu yalikwisha bashiri tangu awali hukumu inayowangojea watu hao .

text: I will therefore put you in remembrance , though ye once knew this , how that the Lord , having saved the people out of the land of Egypt , afterward destroyed them that believed not .
text2: Nataka kuwakumbusheni mambo fulani ambayo mmekwisha yajua : kumbukeni jinsi Bwana alivyowaokoa watu wa Israeli na kuwatoa katika nchi ya Misri , lakini baadaye aliwaangamiza wale ambao hawakuamini .

text: And the angels which kept not their first estate , but left their own habitation , he hath reserved in everlasting chains under darkness unto the judgment of the great day .
text2: Na , malaika ambao hawakuridhika na cheo chao , wakayaacha makao yao ya asili , Mungu amewafunga gizani kwa minyororo ya milele wahukumiwe Siku ile kuu .

text: Even as Sodom and Gomorrha , and the cities about them in like manner , giving themselves over to fornication , and going after strange flesh , are set forth for an example , suffering the vengeance of eternal fire .
text2: Kumbukeni pia Sodoma na Gomora , na miji ya kandokando yake ; wenyeji wake walifanya kama wale malaika ; walifanya uzinzi na mambo yaliyo kinyume cha maumbile , wakapewa hukumu ya moto wa milele , iwe onyo kwa watu wote .

text: Likewise also these filthy dreamers defile the flesh , despise dominion , and speak evil of dignities .
text2: Hivyo ndivyo pia walivyo watu hawa . ndoto zao huwaongoza katika kuichafua miili yao wenyewe , kuyadharau mamlaka ya Mungu na kuvitukana viumbe vitukufu vya huko juu .

text: Yet Michael the archangel , when contending with the devil he disputed about the body of Moses , durst not bring against him a railing accusation , but said , The Lord rebuke thee .
text2: Hata Mikaeli , malaika mkuu , hakufanya hivyo . Katika ule ubishi kati yake na Ibilisi waliobishana juu ya mwili wa Mose , Mikaeli hakuthubutu kumhukumu Ibilisi kwa matusi ; ila alisema : " Bwana mwenyewe na akukaripie . "

text: But these speak evil of those things which they know not : but what they know naturally , as brute beasts , in those things they corrupt themselves .
text2: Lakini watu hawa hutukana chochote wasichokielewa ; mambo yaleyale wanayoyajua kwa silika kama vile wanyama wanayoyajua ndiyo yanayowaangamiza .

text: Woe unto them ! for they have gone in the way of Cain , and ran greedily after the error of Balaam for reward , and perished in the gainsaying of Core .
text2: Ole wao ! Watu hao wamefuata mwenendo uleule wa Kaini . Kwa ajili ya fedha , wamejiingiza katika mkosi uleule wa Baalamu . Wameasi kama Kora alivyoasi na wameangamizwa kama yeye alivyoangamizwa .

text: These are spots in your feasts of charity , when they feast with you , feeding themselves without fear : clouds they are without water , carried about of winds ; trees whose fruit withereth , without fruit , twice dead , plucked up by the roots ;
text2: Kwa makelele yao yasiyo na adabu , watu hao ni kama madoa machafu katika mikutano yenu ya karamu ya Bwana . Hujipendelea wao wenyewe tu , na wako kama mawingu yanayopeperushwa huko na huko na upepo bila ya kuleta mvua . Wao ni kama miti isiyozaa matunda hata wakati wa majira yake , wamekufa kabisa .

text: Raging waves of the sea , foaming out their own shame ; wandering stars , to whom is reserved the blackness of darkness for ever .
text2: Watu hao ni kama mawimbi makali ya bahari , na matendo yao ya aibu yanaonekana dhahiri kama vile mapovu ya mawimbi . Wao ni kama nyota zinazotangatanga , ambao Mungu amewawekea mahali pao milele katika giza kuu .

text: And Enoch also , the seventh from Adam , prophesied of these , saying , Behold , the Lord cometh with ten thousands of his saints ,
text2: Henoki , ambaye ni babu wa saba tangu Adamu , alibashiri hivi juu ya watu hawa : " Sikilizeni ! Bwana atakuja pamoja na maelfu ya malaika wake watakatifu

text: To execute judgment upon all , and to convince all that are ungodly among them of all their ungodly deeds which they have ungodly committed , and of all their hard speeches which ungodly sinners have spoken against him .
text2: kutoa hukumu juu ya binadamu wote , kuwahukumu wote kwa ajili ya matendo yao yote maovu waliyotenda na kwa ajili ya maneno yote mabaya ambayo watu waovu walimkashifu nayo . "

text: These are murmurers , complainers , walking after their own lusts ; and their mouth speaketh great swelling words , having men ' s persons in admiration because of advantage .
text2: Watu hawa wananung ' unika daima na kuwalaumu watu wengine . Hufuata tamaa zao mbaya , hujigamba na kuwasifu watu wengine mno kusudi wafaulu katika mipango yao .

text: But , beloved , remember ye the words which were spoken before of the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ ;
text2: Lakini ninyi wapenzi wangu , kumbukeni yale mliyoambiwa hapo awali ni mitume wa Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo .

text: How that they told you there should be mockers in the last time , who should walk after their own ungodly lusts .
text2: Waliwaambieni : " Siku za mwisho zitakapofika , watatokea watu watakaowadhihaki ninyi , watu wafuatao tamaa zao mbaya . "

text: These be they who separate themselves , sensual , having not the Spirit .
text2: Hao ndio watu wanaosababisha mafarakano , watu wanaotawaliwa na tamaa zao za kidunia , watu wasio na Roho wa Mungu .

text: But ye , beloved , building up yourselves on your most holy faith , praying in the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Lakini ninyi , wapenzi wangu , endeleeni kujijenga kikamilifu katika imani yenu takatifu . Salini kwa nguvu ya Roho Mtakatifu ,

text: Keep yourselves in the love of God , looking for the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ unto eternal life .
text2: na kubaki katika upendo wa Mungu , mkiwa mnamngojea Bwana wetu Yesu Kristo awapeni uzima wa milele kwa huruma yake .

text: And of some have compassion , making a difference :
text2: Muwe na huruma kwa watu walio na mashaka ;

text: And others save with fear , pulling them out of the fire ; hating even the garment spotted by the flesh .
text2: waokoeni kwa kuwanyakua kutoka motoni ; na kwa wengine muwe na huruma pamoja na hofu , lakini chukieni hata mavazi yao ambayo yamechafuliwa na tamaa zao mbaya .

text: Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling , and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy ,
text2: Kwake yeye awezaye kuwalinda msije mkaanguka , na kuwaleta ninyi bila hatia mpaka mbele ya utukufu wake ,

text: To the only wise God our Saviour , be glory and majesty , dominion and power , both now and ever . Amen .
text2: kwake yeye aliye peke yake Mungu , Mkombozi wetu , uwe utukufu , ukuu , nguvu na mamlaka kwa njia ya Kristo Bwana wetu , tangu zama zote , sasa na hata milele ! Amina .

text: The Revelation of Jesus Christ , which God gave unto him , to shew unto his servants things which must shortly come to pass ; and he sent and signified it by his angel unto his servant John :
text2: Hizi ni habari za mambo ambayo yalifunuliwa na Yesu Kristo . Mungu alimpa Kristo ufunuo huu ili awaonyeshe watumishi wake mambo ambayo yanapaswa kutukia karibuni . Kristo alimtuma malaika wake amjulishe Yohane , mtumishi wake , mambo hayo ,

text: Who bare record of the word of God , and of the testimony of Jesus Christ , and of all things that he saw .
text2: naye Yohane , ameyasema yote aliyoyaona . Na hii ndio taarifa yake kuhusu ujumbe wa Mungu na ukweli uliofunuliwa na Yesu Kristo .

text: Blessed is he that readeth , and they that hear the words of this prophecy , and keep those things which are written therein : for the time is at hand .
text2: Heri yake mtu anayesoma kitabu hiki ; heri yao wale wanaosikiliza maneno ya ujumbe huu wa kinabii na kushika yaliyoandikwa humu , maana wakati umekaribia ambapo mambo haya yatatukia .

text: John to the seven churches which are in Asia : Grace be unto you , and peace , from him which is , and which was , and which is to come ; and from the seven Spirits which are before his throne ;
text2: Mimi Yohane nayaandikia makanisa yaliyoko mkoani Asia . Nawatakieni neema na amani kutoka kwake yeye aliyeko , aliyekuwako na anayekuja ; na kutoka kwa roho saba walio mbele ya kiti chake cha enzi ,

text: And from Jesus Christ , who is the faithful witness , and the first begotten of the dead , and the prince of the kings of the earth . Unto him that loved us , and washed us from our sins in his own blood ,
text2: na kutoka kwa Yesu Kristo , shahidi mwaminifu , wa kwanza kufufuliwa kutoka wafu , na ambaye ni mtawala wa wafalme wa dunia . Yeye anatupenda , na kwa damu yake ametufungua kutoka vifungo vya dhambi zetu ,

text: And hath made us kings and priests unto God and his Father ; to him be glory and dominion for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: akatufanya sisi kuwa ufalme wa makuhani , tumtumikie Mungu , Baba yake . Kwake Yesu Kristo uwe utukufu na nguvu , milele na milele ! Amina .

text: Behold , he cometh with clouds ; and every eye shall see him , and they also which pierced him : and all kindreds of the earth shall wail because of him . Even so , Amen .
text2: Tazama ! Anakuja katika mawingu ! Kila mtu atamwona , hata wale waliomchoma . Makabila yote duniani yataomboleza juu yake . Naam ! Amina .

text: I am Alpha and Omega , the beginning and the ending , saith the Lord , which is , and which was , and which is to come , the Almighty .
text2: " Mimi ni Alfa na Omega , " asema Bwana Mungu Mwenye Uwezo , aliyeko , aliyekuwako na anayekuja .

text: I John , who also am your brother , and companion in tribulation , and in the kingdom and patience of Jesus Christ , was in the isle that is called Patmos , for the word of God , and for the testimony of Jesus Christ .
text2: Mimi ni Yohane , ndugu yenu ; na kwa kuungana na Kristo nashiriki pamoja nanyi katika kustahimili mateso yanayowapata wale walio wa Utawala wake . Mimi nilikuwa kisiwani Patmo kwa sababu ya kuhubiri ujumbe wa Mungu na ukweli wa Yesu .

text: I was in the Spirit on the Lord ' s day , and heard behind me a great voice , as of a trumpet ,
text2: Basi , wakati mmoja , siku ya Bwana , nilikumbwa na Roho , nikasikia nyuma yangu sauti kubwa kama sauti ya tarumbeta .

text: Saying , I am Alpha and Omega , the first and the last : and , What thou seest , write in a book , and send it unto the seven churches which are in Asia ; unto Ephesus , and unto Smyrna , and unto Pergamos , and unto Thyatira , and unto Sardis , and unto Philadelphia , and unto Laodicea .
text2: Nayo ilisema , " Andika katika kitabu yote unayoyaona , ukipeleke kwa makanisa haya saba : Efeso , Smurna , Pergamoni , Thuatira , Sarde , Filadelfia na Laodikea . "

text: And I turned to see the voice that spake with me . And being turned , I saw seven golden candlesticks ;
text2: Basi , nikageuka nimwone huyo aliyesema nami , nikaona vinara vya taa saba vya dhahabu ,
